original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>You are blessed to walk the foundations of Pharloom.<br>Humble yourself before the shells of those who gave their lives to hold our kingdom’s weight.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>行走于纺络根基是你的殊荣。<br>在这些为王国献出生命者的躯壳前，应保持谦卑。
translated_text: 关于飞行员。<br>我很幸运 ， 有一个 Mac 。<br>我们在那些为承担国家重担而献出生命的人的遗体面前感到谦卑。
secondary_translated_text: About pilots.<br>I am lucky to have a Mac.<br>We feel humbled before the remains of those who have sacrificed their lives to bear the burden of our country.

original_en_text: <hpage>You are wrong, Lady...<hpage>I knew the wish, and the price to achieve it. And now, across these many ages, I have only come to know it better...<hpage>Strength... in mind, in care, in claw. Strength enough that I may live to see a world better than our own, or to craft a world as I desire. <hpage>That was the wish, of my mother, of my mentor, and of you...<page>...Indeed, spider... So much pain you must have passed to speak our hope so simply...<page>For her you become... who knows clear our desire, and has seen full the darkness beneath our house, I would show you the gift...
original_zh_text: <hpage>您错了，夫人……<hpage>我知道您寄望于我，也知道达成这期愿的代价。历经岁月后，如今的我的看法愈发透彻……<hpage>心志、仁念、爪牙——皆需刚强。强大到能让我亲眼见证美好世界之降临，强大到能助我亲手创造一个理想世界。<hpage>此乃生母、恩师与您的共期之愿……<page>……诚然，小蜘蛛……你一定历经了不可估量之苦痛，才得此彻悟……<page>既然你已经成长……明晰我们的期愿，也见识过我们家园下深藏的黑暗……我这便将礼物赠予你……
translated_text: <hpage>“小姐 ， 我错了。"<hpage>我知道这个愿望 ， 以及实现它的代价 ， 现在 ， 多年后 ， 我对它有了更深刻的理解。<hpage>力量是 ...生活的能力 ， 比我们自己更好地看到世界 ， 创造我们想要的世界。<hpage>我的意志 ， 你的意志 ， 我的意志。<page>...事实上 ， 我们必须忍受很多痛苦 ， 以表达我们的希望。<page>上帝知道我们的愿望 ， 并且可以看到我们家中的黑暗。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Miss, I was wrong. "<hpage>I know this wish and the cost of realizing it, and now, years later, I have a deeper understanding of it.<hpage>Power is... The ability to live is to see the world better than we ourselves and create the world we want.<hpage>My will, your will, my will.<page>... In fact, we have to endure a lot of pain to express our hope.<page>God knows our wishes and can see the darkness in our homes.

original_en_text: Coral sways,<br>Clear water flows,<br>Upon our river free of time.
original_zh_text: 珊瑚轻摇，<br>净水长流，<br>河流超脱时光之外。
translated_text: 珊瑚在发抖。<br>在水的流动中 ，<br>没有时间去河流。
secondary_translated_text: The coral is shaking.<br>As water flows,<br>There is no time to go to the river.
... Finally, finally... ...

translated_text: ...那是丝绸。
secondary_translated_text: ... That is silk.

original_en_text: Witness, the first light. The only means we possess to resist that void with which our family is forever linked.<page>Reach forth, child grown strong. Wrest it from this remembrance. Burn yourself free from our sad fate...
original_zh_text: 来吧，见证这道最初的光芒。这是我们抵御虚空的唯一手段。而那虚空，却与我们的族群永世相连。<page>伸出手来，我的孩子，你已通过历练变得强大。在这忆境中夺取那光芒，焚尽我们悲惨宿命的枷锁……
translated_text: 亲眼目睹第一道光线是面对与家庭永远相连的空虚的唯一途径。<page>当他们成年时 ， 孩子们变得更强壮 ， 从记忆中抹去 ， 并从悲惨的命运中解放出来。
secondary_translated_text: Seeing the first ray of light with your own eyes is the only way to face the emptiness that is forever connected to your family.<page>As they come of age, children become stronger, erased from memory, and liberated from their tragic fate.

translated_text: ...我们的力量，
secondary_translated_text: ... Our strength,

translated_text: ...¿我们是谁？
secondary_translated_text: ...¿Who are we?

translated_text: ...我希望你醒过来。
secondary_translated_text: ... I hope you wake up.

original_en_text: ...Ignore them, daughter... their whispers...<page>...Greater, grander... Weaver, guardian, queen... Those are their desires... not your own. Certainly not mine...<page>...Only if you resist them, you might see it, another hope... beyond...<page>...But to recall these words, in time so far... Will you even remember me, child? Could you?...<page>...A mother... before the mask... before I lay forever in duty...
original_zh_text: ……莫听，女儿……她们的絮语……<page>……伟大……崇高……织者、守护者、女王……皆为他们所欲……非你所求，更非我所愿……<page>……唯有抵抗，方可见……另一线希望……<page>……但时过境迁，这些话……你可会记得？你可会记得我？...<page>……作为母亲，在戴上面甲之前……在因责任而永眠之前……
translated_text: ...不要注意那个女孩和她的耳语。<page>...韦伯格 ， 迪恩 ， 里贾纳 ， 这是你的愿望 ， 我 ... ...不， 不是我。<page>...只有反抗 ， 我们才能看到更多 ， 另一个希望。<page>...但是当你回头看这句话时 ， 你还记得我吗 ？"如果你... "<page>...在我母亲戴上面具之前 ， 在我永远承担责任之前。
secondary_translated_text: ... Don't pay attention to the girl and her whisper.<page>... Weber, Dean, Regina, this is your wish, I... ... No, not me.<page>... Only by resisting can we see more, another hope.<page>... But when you look back at this sentence, do you still remember me? "If you- "<page>... Before my mother put on a mask, before I took responsibility forever.

original_en_text: ...Show us your craft, child...<page>...Show it splendid, as only we can teach...<page>...Prove yourself more Weaver than Wyrm...
original_zh_text: ……展现你的技艺，孩子……<page>……展现那唯有我等能传授的绝技……<page>……证明自己更像织者，而非沃姆……
translated_text: ...这证明了他们的能力。<page>...因为我们是唯一能教导他们的人。<page>...他看起来更像一个恶魔。
secondary_translated_text: ... This proves their ability.<page>... Because we are the only ones who can teach them.<page>... He looks more like a demon.

original_en_text: At water’s source,<br>And coral’s heart,<br>Our lord born last to rule.
original_zh_text: 水源尽头，<br>珊瑚心核，<br>末生之主将临。
translated_text: 泉水 ，<br>珊瑚的心脏。<br>上帝生来就是国王。
secondary_translated_text: Spring water,<br>Heart of coral.<br>God was born king.

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... Called us divine... She lied...
original_zh_text: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……皆是谎言……
translated_text: ...她称我们为女儿 ， 她称我们为圣人 ， 而我撒谎了。
secondary_translated_text: ... She called us daughters, she called us saints, and I lied.

translated_text: ...伙计们 ， 编织者。
secondary_translated_text: ... Guys, weavers.

translated_text: ...诚实， 工会。
secondary_translated_text: ... Honest, union.
... Come on, friend. Spider... ...

original_en_text: ...Alas... spider’s child...<page>...For our ways you will think us harsh... You will think us uncaring, unrepentant...<page>...And so we must seem, for such is the cost of our wish...
original_zh_text: ……唉……蜘蛛之子……<page>……你必定认为我等冷酷……认为我等无情且固执……<page>……但我等必须如此，此为实现期愿之代价……
translated_text: ...¡哦 ， 是的！蜘蛛的儿子。<page>...他们认为我们冷漠 ， 不后悔。<page>...这就是我们为自己的愿望付出的代价。
secondary_translated_text: ...¡Oh, yes! Spider's son.<page>... They think we are indifferent and have no regrets.<page>... This is the price we pay for our wishes.

translated_text: ...提醒他们。
secondary_translated_text: ... Remind them.

translated_text: ...取下壳。
secondary_translated_text: ... Remove the shell.

translated_text: ...她的声音 ， 她的歌。
secondary_translated_text: ... Her voice, her song.

translated_text: ...¡长大！长大！
secondary_translated_text: ...¡Grow up! Grow up!

translated_text: ...永恒的奉献。
secondary_translated_text: ... Eternal dedication.

translated_text: ...灵魂的统一
secondary_translated_text: ... Unity of soul

translated_text: ...我把它们都连接起来了。
secondary_translated_text: ... I connected them all.

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... She called us divine...
original_zh_text: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……
translated_text: ...她称我们为圣代 ， 她称我们为圣人。
secondary_translated_text: ... She called us daughters, she called us saints.

original_en_text: ...We are life... We are growth... What world without us?...
original_zh_text: ……我等即生命……我等即生长……无我则世如荒土……
translated_text: ...我们是生命 ， 但我们是在一个没有我们的世界里长大的吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: ... We are life, but did we grow up in a world without us?

translated_text: ...站起来， 站起来。
secondary_translated_text: ... Stand up, stand up.

translated_text: ...来阻止我们的觉醒吧。
secondary_translated_text: ... Come and stop our awakening.

original_en_text: ...Good... Better...<page>...Yet still you will need to be faster...<page>...In time, they will come for you... Those who fear your nature, and those seeking to claim it...<page>...To survive our world, you must learn to sting... swift and sudden...
original_zh_text: ……尚可……精进……<page>……你仍需更快一些……<page>……终有一日，畏惧你本性者将至……欲夺你本性者将至……<page>……欲存于世，须学蛰刺……快如闪电……
translated_text: ...好吧， 好吧。<page>...但我们必须更快地做。<page>...他们害怕自己的本性 ， 想要确认自己的本性 ， 他们最终会来找你。<page>...为了在这个世界上生存 ， 我们必须学会如何沐浴。
secondary_translated_text: ... Okay, okay.<page>... But we must do it faster.<page>... They are afraid of their nature, want to confirm their nature, and they will eventually come to you.<page>... In order to survive in this world, we must learn how to bathe.

original_en_text: ...Our claws to crush... Our claws to rule... Our claws to save them all...
original_zh_text: ……以爪粉碎……以爪统治……以爪拯救众生……
translated_text: ...我们的武器摧毁了现有的武器 ， 拯救了我们的武器。
secondary_translated_text: ... Our weapons destroyed existing weapons and saved our weapons.

original_en_text: ...To dance... And love... And end... Together...
translated_text: ...他们跳舞 ， 爱 ， 结束 ， 一起。
secondary_translated_text: ... They dance, love, end, together.

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>May these fields of flame sear away all impurity.<br> That you be granted ascendance to the verdant lands above.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>愿这烈焰原野焚尽一切污秽。<br>赐你升入苍翠之地的权利。
translated_text: 关于飞行员。<br>让火烧掉不洁净的东西。<br>您有权在上面的绿色降落。
secondary_translated_text: About pilots.<br>Let the fire burn away unclean things.<br>You have the right to land in the green above.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun mad... than none...
original_zh_text: ……宁要癫狂之子……也好过膝下无子……
translated_text: ...宁可没有孩子 ， 也不如发疯。
secondary_translated_text: ... It is better to have no children than to go crazy.

translated_text: ...《蜘蛛侠》的歌曲还在继续。
secondary_translated_text: ... The song of "Spider-Man" continues.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun frail... than none...
original_zh_text: ……宁要脆弱之子……也好过膝下无子……
translated_text: ...做一个软弱的孩子总比什么都没有好。
secondary_translated_text: ... Being a weak child is better than nothing.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun pure... than them...
translated_text: ...一个干净的孩子比他们更好。
secondary_translated_text: ... A clean child is better than them.

translated_text: ...“我的东西永远是我的。
secondary_translated_text: ... "What is mine will always be mine.

original_en_text: ...For her light... eternal... our song sustains...
translated_text: ...永远 ， 你们的光芒和音乐将继续。
secondary_translated_text: ... Forever, your light and music will continue.

translated_text: ...我听说过。
secondary_translated_text: ... I've heard of it.

original_en_text: We speak the wish of the Master Herald,<br>he who signs an Age’s end.<br><page>Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,<br>Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,<page>Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,<br>Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,<page>Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,<br>Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,<page>Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,<br>That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
original_zh_text: 此乃使者大人祈愿，<br>宣告纪元终结到来。<page>圣堂倾颓君威下，<br>骸营覆灭黑丝劫。<page>焦土边际髓骨灼，<br>纺塔孤医灰沼别。<page>囚笼首罪逆丝客，<br>霜心振翼费岳阙。 <page>摇篮极顶终试炼，<br>菌主临鉴纪元歇。
translated_text: 古人的愿望。<br>谁将在本世纪末签署协议 ？<br><page>当王国掌握在教会的手中时 ，<br>地球被一条黑线所覆盖。<page>地球将燃烧红色 ， 树皮将燃烧黑色。<br>塔倒塌了 ， 附近的外科医生被拒绝。<page>笼子里的男人对丝绸很生气。<br>它从冰层的中心掉下来 ， 爬得很高。<page>经过最后的测试和准备，<br>时间不多 ， 这就是证明。
secondary_translated_text: The wish of the ancients.<br>Who will sign the agreement by the end of the century?<br><page>When the kingdom is in the hands of the Church,<br>The earth is covered with a black line.<page>The earth will burn red and the bark of the tree will burn black.<br>The tower collapsed and nearby surgeons were rejected.<page>The man in the cage was very angry with the silk.<br>It fell from the center of the ice and climbed high.<page>After final testing and preparation,<br>There is not much time, and this is proof.

original_en_text: ...How we hunted... How we sang... My children, I saw you glorious...
original_zh_text: ……昔日狩猎……昔日咏唱……我的孩子，我曾见你们辉煌……
translated_text: ...你是怎么唱的 ？如何唱歌？伙计们 ， 很高兴见到你们。
secondary_translated_text: ... How do you sing? How to sing? Guys, nice to meet you.

original_en_text: ...From our Silk... A child born loyal...
translated_text: ...丝绸。一个忠实的儿子诞生了。
secondary_translated_text: ... Silk. A loyal son was born.

original_en_text: <hpage>So, the Herald visits this land too...<hpage>If he is here, now, then great change or a savage end is inevitable. He would care to see nothing else...
original_zh_text: <hpage>使者竟也踏足此地……<hpage>若他在此现身，巨变或浩劫将无可避免。除此之外，他目空一切……
translated_text: <hpage>报纸访问了该地区。<hpage>如果他现在在这里 ， 巨大的变化和残酷的结局将是不可避免的。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The newspaper visited the area.<hpage>If he were here now, huge changes and cruel endings would be inevitable.

original_en_text: Ah... I understand, stranger. I presume too much of one who is not a flea.<page>I’ve heard the settlement below us is setting up a wishwall. Perhaps I’ll send Grishkin down to hang up our wish...<page>
original_zh_text: 唉……我明白。对外族提这种要求太过分了。<page>听说下面营地建了祈愿墙，我让格里什琴去挂上我们的愿望吧……
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。我觉得你看起来很奇怪。对于那些不是跳蚤的人来说 ， 有很多观点。<page>据说 ， 在下面的村庄里建造了一堵愿望墙 ， 所以也许他应该派格里什金来实现他的愿望。"<page>
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. I think you look weird. For those who are not fleas, there are many opinions.<page>It is said that a wall of wishes was built in the village below, so maybe he should send Grishkin to fulfill his wish. "<page>

original_en_text: Bug not flea, my learnings, all have been scratched to your maps. Can give no more.<page>Leave now! Seek and save lost fleas, for a caravan full and whole!
original_zh_text: 外族虫，位置都标在你图上了。没其他的了。<page>快去吧！找到那些迷途跳蚤，凑满旅团！
translated_text: 昆虫不是跳蚤 ， 我的教训就在你的地图上。<page>快走 ， 快走！寻找并拯救丢失的跳蚤 ， 并建立一个完整的商队！
secondary_translated_text: Insects are not fleas, and my lesson is on your map.<page>Let's go, let's go! Find and save lost fleas and build a complete caravan!

original_en_text: Have you met her yet? Our burly new companion, Vog! Fresh returned from a long time spent tracking.<hpage>We have met, Fleamaster. It gladdens me that so strong a flea exists as her.<hpage>Yours was a caravan sorely lacking for protection, and I am too bound by my own tasks to provide it for you.<page>Why, we would never impose so! And now, no matter! Her scent may be strong, and her taste for brew bottomless, but her skill is sharp.<page>If predators draw close, her talents will provide much confidence to our caravan.
original_zh_text: 见过我们的新成员沃葛了吗？她的追踪术很是了得！<hpage>见过了。有这般强力的跳蚤存在，我也轻松一些。<hpage>毕竟你们旅团缺少护卫，而我又有要务在身。<page>怎么敢劳烦您！放心吧，虽然沃葛经常臭烘烘的，又嗜酒，但本事过硬。<page>如果有掠食者靠近，她的本领能安大伙的心。
translated_text: 你以前见过他吗 ？她的伴侣从 Vogue 的长途旅行回来了。<hpage>我看到了这一点 ， 斯特拉总理 ， 你很幸运有这么强大的芯片。<hpage>“我不能保护你 ， 因为我的任务受到攻击。<page>好吧 ， 我们永远不会强迫你这样做！现在我没事！啤酒有浓郁的香气 ， 味道难以形容 ， 但技术是尖锐的。<page>随着捕食者越来越近 ， 他的天赋将给球队带来信心。
secondary_translated_text: Have you seen him before? Her partner is back from a long trip to Vogue.<hpage>I saw this, Prime Minister Stella, you are lucky to have such a powerful chip.<hpage>"I can't protect you because my mission is under attack.<page>Well, we would never force you to do this! Now I'm fine! Beer has a strong aroma and an indescribable taste, but the technology is sharp.<page>As the Predators get closer, his talent will give the team confidence.

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You could help find! And bring! For all to come together now that times turn dark...<page>But no map you hold! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......<page>但你没有地图！想要情报，先准备地图。在此之前无可奉告。
translated_text: 如果你停下来 ， 昆虫不是跳蚤 ， 对吗 ？我们需要一个服务 ， 对吧 ？你在干什么？我听到并闻到了这些小东西 ， 并了解了很多关于失落的洞穴的位置。<page>时代变了 ， 我们团结在一起。<page>如果你想知道一封信 ， 你需要一张地图 ， 现在你什么也做不了。
secondary_translated_text: If you stop, insects are not fleas, are they? We need a service, right? What are you doing? I heard and smelled these little things and learned a lot about the location of the lost cave.<page>Times have changed, and we are united.<page>If you want to know about a letter, you need a map, and now you can't do anything.

original_en_text: Our travels have end, and now soon the world will also have end! At such bitter of times, brew with friends is most sweet.
original_zh_text: 旅途结束，世界也要完蛋了！这种苦涩的时候，跟朋友一起喝药酿最甜。
translated_text: 我们的旅程结束了 ， 世界终结了。在这个艰难的日子里 ， 和朋友一起喝啤酒是你能做的最甜蜜的事情。
secondary_translated_text: Our journey is over and the world is over. Drinking beer with friends is the sweetest thing you can do on these tough days.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Heh heh!<page>The Fleamaster, that old bore, tells me to call you Miss Hornet. But such a prickly name ill befits such a delicate beauty! Shall I call you something prettier, like ‘Nectarsweet’, my dear?<hpage>You shall not. Address me by my name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course! Heh heh. And now, I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！全托你的福！亲爱的小甜心！嘿嘿！<page>跳蚤首领那老古板让我称呼你为大黄蜂小姐。但这带刺的名字配不上娇花！叫你"蜜糖甜心"如何？<hpage>当然不行。要么称呼我的本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>您可以安全地参加此护送。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦 ， 是的！谢谢你的评论 ， 亲爱的。<page>自由之王 ， 可恨的老人叫我 Bumble 小姐 ， 但是这样一个迷人的名字不适合一个美丽的女人。<hpage>用你永远不会称呼他们的名字来称呼我们。<page>我告诉你我的小秘密。我的车就像最智能的水疗中心之一。<page>我们内心的水比诗歌更纯净！我很高兴使用它 ， 它并不贵！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You can safely participate in this escort.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh, yes! Thank you for your comment, dear.<page>King of Liberty, the hateful old man calls me Miss Bumble, but such a charming name does not suit a beautiful woman.<hpage>Call us by names you would never call them.<page>I'll tell you my little secret. My car is like one of the smartest spas around.<page>The water in our hearts is purer than poetry! I am very happy to use it, it is not expensive!

original_en_text: Dear one, how shameful for the world to end while poor Kratt still has so much living left in him!<page>But how sweet of you to join me here! Will you play the Flea Bounce game, that I may appreciate the beauty of your agile form while I await my doom?<page>To play is simple. Leap up and keep bouncing on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，可惜末日来得太早，可怜的克拉特还没活够呢！<page>但有甜心你在就好！要玩这跳蚤蹦蹦的游戏吗？我想欣赏你美丽灵巧的身姿呢！<page>规则很简单，跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: 世界末日是多么可耻啊 ， 可怜的克里特岛上有这么多的生命！<page>很高兴你加入我们！你需要一个新的跳蚤吗 ？你能欣赏他们的才华并等待他们的命运吗 ？<page>这个游戏很容易。下载并跳到尽可能多的芯片！
secondary_translated_text: What a shame it is to end the world, with so many lives on poor Crete!<page>Glad you joined us! Do you need a new flea? Can you appreciate their talent and wait for their destiny?<page>This game is easy. Download and jump to as many chips as possible!

original_en_text: Strange beasts prowl these grey lands. I hear them roar and shriek outside camp. Is best to stay inside and make quiet.
original_zh_text: 这片灰地时常能听见怪物吼叫，最好待在营地里别出声。
translated_text: 一个奇怪的野兽在灰色的地面上行走 ， 我听到田野后面的尖叫声。
secondary_translated_text: A strange beast was walking on the gray ground, and I heard screams behind the fields.

translated_text: 什么是道奇队？
secondary_translated_text: What are the Dodgers?

original_en_text: At longest last, have our flea roamings ended! Every sandy grain and stinky squelchy maggot was worth to endure, to claim such a home!<page>Is time for rest and celebrate, and none have earned such more than you, Miss Hornet! Raise your flask and drink most heartily with us!
original_zh_text: 终于不用流浪了！这一路上吃沙喝风忍蛆虫都值了！<page>是时候庆祝了！大黄蜂小姐，和我们一起举杯吧！
translated_text: 跳蚤的旅程结束了！每一块石头和每一个臭味都值得忍受 ， 就像这所房子一样！<page>现在是休息和庆祝的时候了 ， 没有人比你赚得更多的钱 ， 夫人 ， 我给你带来一瓶酒喝。
secondary_translated_text: The flea's journey is over! Every stone and every stench is worth putting up with, just like this house!<page>Now is the time to rest and celebrate. No one makes more money than you, madam. I brought you a bottle of wine.

original_en_text: We will camp here in these grey lands until more fleas find their way to the caravan. Please lend your aid to any of our fellows you find lost out on the roads!
original_zh_text: 我们会在这灰地扎营，直到更多同胞归队。请继续帮助寻找迷途的跳蚤！
translated_text: 当其他跳蚤没有遇到大篷车时 ， 我们将带走这片灰色的地面。帮助那些在旅途中迷路的人！
secondary_translated_text: When the other fleas do not encounter the caravan, we will carry the gray ground with us. Help those who are lost during the journey!

original_en_text: <hpage>I am travelling these lands for my own reasons, Fleamaster. However, if I happen upon any fleas on my travels, I will aid them as best I can.<page>Oh, oh, I could ask for nothing more! They must all be hiding or stuck in dangerous places, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here to us.<page>May the kingdom bless your travels and keep you safe, stranger! You are welcome to rest here with us whenever the roads bring you back!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的旅途有自己的目的，但若路遇跳蚤，会尽力相助。<page>那就足够了！他们肯定是困在各处险地，只要脱困就会自己寻路归来。<page>愿王国庇佑您旅途平安！也随时欢迎您回来歇息！
translated_text: <hpage>“我来到这个国家是有原因的。但是 ， 如果您在旅行中遇到跳蚤 ， 请尽可能。<page>” 哦， 我不能要求更好！每个人都必须躲藏或被困在危险的地方 ， 但如果我们唤醒他们 ， 他们一定会找到我们的方式。"<page>愿上帝保佑你的旅程 ， 让你安全。每次你回来， 我建议你和我们一起放松。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"I came to this country for a reason. However, if you encounter fleas while traveling, please do your best.<page>"Oh, I couldn't ask for better! Everyone must hide or be trapped in dangerous places, but if we wake them up, they will surely find our way. "<page>May God bless your journey and keep you safe. Every time you come back, I suggest you relax with us.

original_en_text: The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! I’m told it’s good luck to bring a guest along when travelling, so we must have you to thank!<page>I trust the trip was agreeable for you. A pleasure perhaps? Nestled in with our dear little ones...<hpage>They certainly make for energetic travel companions. I’ve not often had opportunity to socialise with such spirited sorts.<page>Splendid! And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 这趟旅途虽长，但没丢一只跳蚤！听说带贵客同行能带来好运，肯定是您的功劳！<page>旅途可还舒适？和小家伙们挤在一起挺开心吧？<hpage>他们确实精力旺盛，我很少和这么活泼的旅伴打交道。<page>那就好！现在去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: 我们走了很长的路 ， 但我们没有失去任何东西。我听说欢迎旅行的客人会带来好运。<page>这次旅行会让你开心。和我们亲爱的孩子在一起 ， 这可能是一件有趣的事情。<hpage>对于能源旅行者来说 ， 这是理想的选择。你很少有机会与这样一个活跃的人交流。<page>这太不可思议了！我必须去看看格里斯金 ， 他坐在锅炉旁边。经过漫长的旅程 ， 格里芬！
secondary_translated_text: We have come a long way, but we have not lost anything. I heard that guests who welcome travel bring good luck.<page>This trip will make you happy. Being with our beloved children can be a fun thing.<hpage>This is an ideal choice for energy travelers. You rarely have the opportunity to communicate with such an active person.<page>This is unbelievable! I had to go and see Griskin, who was sitting next to the boiler. After a long journey, Griffin!

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, your bottle is full of Flea Brew. You know what such means! You must have drink! Har har!<page>When you have finish drinking, return and we will fill flask again! I’m is always brewing!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你身上的药酿还满着呢，得先喝光！<page>喝完了就回来找我！我这儿药酿管够！
translated_text: “切尔西 ， 你的瓶子里装满了啤酒。“哈。<page>喝一杯 ， 喝一杯 ， 我一直在想。
secondary_translated_text: "Chelsea, your bottle is full of beer. "Ha.<page>Have a drink, have a drink, I keep thinking.

original_en_text: My fellows give much worry for the other fleas, but I’m not give at all. They will find their way to us, and if not, who keep count of them anyway? Har har!
original_zh_text: 大伙总爱担心那些迷途的同胞，我才不愁！该来的自会找来，没来谁又数得清？哈哈！
translated_text: 我的伴侣担心其他跳蚤 ， 但我一点也不在乎。他们还记得我们吗 ？哈！
secondary_translated_text: My partner is worried about other fleas, but I don't care at all. Do they still remember us? Ha!

original_en_text: Ahh, and before the road steals you away from us again, allow me to offer you a humble gift!<page>One of the little ones found a pale artefact while digging about in the sands. A spiny, cold sort of thing.<page>I see no use in it for we fleas, so of course we are all too pleased, eager even, to bestow it upon our dear friend!
original_zh_text: 趁您还没走，请收下这份薄礼！<page>有个小家伙在沙地里挖到件苍白古物，冷冰冰带尖刺。<page>对我们没用，正好赠予挚友！
translated_text: 哦 ， 在这条路把你从我们身边带走之前 ， 我给你一份谦卑的礼物。<page>其中一个小男孩发现了一个苍白的遗物 ， 他正在沙子里挖。<page>我不认为它以任何方式帮助了我们 ， 所以我们当然会把它给一个快乐和关心的朋友！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, before this road takes you away from us, I give you a gift of humility.<page>One of the little boys found a pale relic and was digging in the sand.<page>I don't think it helped us in any way, so of course we would give it to a happy and caring friend!

original_en_text: For your hard efforts and eternal friendship, please accept these meagre rosaries as reward.<page>Think of we fleas when you find chance to trade them!
original_zh_text: 为了酬谢您的辛劳，请收下这些念珠。<page>旅途上别忘了我们跳蚤，朋友！
translated_text: 我们恳请你们接受这份卑微的念珠 ， 作为你们努力和持久友谊的奖赏。<page>如果您有机会交换跳蚤 ， 请记住我们的跳蚤！
secondary_translated_text: We ask you to accept this humble rosary as a reward for your hard work and lasting friendship.<page>If you have the opportunity to trade fleas, remember our fleas!

original_en_text: Dear one, my lone light amongst the darkness! Will you bathe in Kratt’s spa-carriage and let the warm waters wash away your worries?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的！黑暗中的明灯！可愿光临克拉特的温泉车厢，让暖流洗去烦忧？
translated_text: 亲爱的 ， 黑暗中唯一的光 ， 为什么不去垃圾浴室洗澡 ， 用热水冲洗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Dear, the only light in the darkness, why not go to the garbage bathroom to take a bath and rinse it with hot water?

original_en_text: Please, my dear, step inside! I will stand guard here while you bathe... Right on this very spot!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，请进吧！我就在这为你站岗……寸步不离！
translated_text: “进来吧 ， 小姐 ， 我去看看你 ， 我游泳。"
secondary_translated_text: "Come in, miss, I'll go and see you, I'll swim. "

original_en_text: Dodeshna. Want for shelter from the thick, grey air? Is heavy, and wet. I’m worry for the little flea’s health in this land.<page>And they make play in the filthy water. I say them stop, but they just laugh and splash on me. They are lack respect!<hpage>Most bugs instinctively obey those with strength and will. Speak with authority, or your commands may go unheeded.<page>Ugh... really, is Fleamaster’s job to teach the fleas such. I will just have rest here until is time to move on.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳。要来避一避吗？这的空气又闷又湿，小跳蚤们要生病了。<page>他们还玩脏水，说了也不听，反而溅我一身！没大没小！<hpage>虫类大多听从强者，你得用权威口吻。<page>唉……这本是首领该做的。我还是好好休息等旅团出发吧。
translated_text: 多迪什纳先生 ， 你想避免灰色的空气吗 ？我担心这个地区的小跳蚤的健康 ， 因为它们又重又湿。<page>在脏水里玩耍。我告诉他们停下来 ， 但他们摔倒了 ， 扔了水。<hpage>大多数昆虫本能地跟随那些有力量和意志力的人。如果您不咨询当局 ， 您的命令将被忽略。<page>是的 ， 是的 ， 是的 ... ...事实上 ， 火焰大师的任务是训练跳蚤。我们会休息 ， 直到我们动不动。
secondary_translated_text: Mr. Dodisna, do you want to avoid the gray air? I am worried about the health of the small fleas in this area because they are heavy and wet.<page>Playing in dirty water. I told them to stop, but they fell and threw water.<hpage>Most insects instinctively follow those with strength and will. If you do not consult the authorities, your orders will be ignored.<page>Yes, yes, yes... ... In fact, the Fire Master's mission is to train fleas. We will rest until we move.

original_en_text: Away then, bug. Await challenger, shall I.
original_zh_text: 那就走吧。我会等下一个挑战者。
translated_text: 加油宝贝。他们在寻找竞争对手。
secondary_translated_text: Come on, baby. They are looking for competitors.

original_en_text: Vikna! Our little game has ended. But I trust, after a short rest, you will play with us again?
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束。不过你应该还没尽全力吧，休息会儿再战？
translated_text: 我们的小游戏已经结束了 ， 但在短暂的休息之后 ， 我想我们会再次和他们一起玩。
secondary_translated_text: Our Mini games are over, but after a short break, I think we'll play with them again.

translated_text: "Gigler"
secondary_translated_text: "Gigler"

original_en_text: Ahh! Do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help gather the lonely fleas to our caravan? Truly?
original_zh_text: 啊！我没听错吧？您愿意帮忙召集流落各处的跳蚤？当真？
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！这是一个奇怪的故事， 你知道吗？你能帮我在我们的大篷车里养一只孤独的跳蚤吗 ？事实上？
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! This is a strange story, you know? Can you help me keep a lonely flea in our caravan? Actually?

original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！跳蚤的救星！我们等候您很久了！<page>看看这块宝地！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: 霍恩夫人！《救世主！” 来到我这里， 请。<page>“超越了黑暗和死亡的邻近地球 ， 这是你给我们的美丽和安全的地方。<page>这个农场没有殖民地 ， 所以旅程就在这里结束。<hpage>我很高兴这是一个很好的地方， 娜娜。我很高兴跳蚤幸存了下来。大多数甲虫似乎有一个更悲惨的命运。<page>是的 ， 一个充满希望的未来只能通过你的努力等待。为了庆祝我们的到来 ， 我很高兴为您提供一个小服务。<page>她学会了缝纫 ， 跳蚤收集材料。您可以在行李中添加额外的口袋 ， 使您的旅行更轻松。<page>这比你应得的要少得多 ， 但我希望无论如何你都会满意。
secondary_translated_text: Mrs. Horn! "Savior!" Come to me, please.<page>"Beyond the darkness and death of the neighboring earth, this is the beautiful and safe place you give us.<page>This farm has no colonies, so the journey ends here.<hpage>I'm so happy this is a great place, Nana. I am so happy that the flea survived. Most beetles seem to have a more tragic fate.<page>Yes, a promising future can only be awaited through your efforts. To celebrate our arrival, I am pleased to provide you with a small service.<page>She learned to sew and flea collect materials. You can add extra pockets to your luggage to make your travel easier.<page>It's much less than you deserve, but I hope you'll be satisfied no matter what.

original_en_text: <hpage>I know not what you plan, Fleamaster, and at this time I cannot participate.<page>Ahhhh. Ahhhhhhh! Wretches, wretches, all of us! How can we begin without you, dear friend?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不知您作何打算，跳蚤首领，但此刻我无法参与庆典。<page>啊啊啊！可惜啊，这太令我们难过了！没有您这位挚友，庆典如何开始？
translated_text: <hpage>我不知道你在做什么 ， 但我现在不能参加。<page>是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！可怜的东西 ， 可怜的东西 ， 我们所有人！从哪里开始 ， 亲爱的朋友 ？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I don't know what you're doing, but I can't participate now.<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! Poor thing, poor thing, all of us! Where to start, dear friend?

original_en_text: Gathered here we are, to honour the grand champion of this very final of all festivals!<page>Now, Miss Hornet! Strike the great effigy with all your might!
original_zh_text: 我们相聚于此，为这末日庆典的总冠军加冕！<page>大黄蜂小姐，现在请全力击打巨像！
translated_text: 感谢所有最新的节日获奖者！<page>“大黄蜂小姐。拿出最好的雕像！“"
secondary_translated_text: Thanks to all the latest festival winners!<page>"Miss Bumblebee. Bring out the best statue!“"

original_en_text: The little fleas like this place most of all. They are as much happy as I ever hear them!
original_zh_text: 小家伙们非常喜欢这地方！我从没听他们这么欢腾过！
translated_text: 这么小的跳蚤是最好的 ， 我从来没有听说过你这么快乐。
secondary_translated_text: Such a small flea is the best. I have never heard of you so happy.

original_en_text: Oh, dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at our marvellous troupe! Their numbers full. Their spirits bright. All thanks to your heroic efforts!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看，我们壮盛的队伍！跳蚤们无一遗漏，个个精神饱满，全仰赖您的英勇相助！
translated_text: 哦 ， 我亲爱的朋友 ， 大黄蜂小姐 ， 看看我们的好朋友！房间里挤满了人 ， 他们的灵魂是明亮的。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Bumblebee, look at our good friend! The room is full of people, their souls are bright.

translated_text: 跳上一只跳蚤？
secondary_translated_text: Jump on a flea?

original_en_text: Another journey complete! And a new, high spot for our rest, upon the doorstep of that mighty Citadel, no less!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! Maybe it was your company that brought us luck, Miss Hornet? It surely put us fleas at ease to have you and your weapon riding close.
original_zh_text: 又一趟旅程结束了！这次竟然停在了圣堡门廊这样的高处！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！或许是您带来的好运？有您持械护卫，大伙安心不少。
translated_text: 旅行又回来了！“这是我们将依靠的新平台。走进你的大城堡！<hpage>幸运的是 ， 我所有的朋友都经历过这段漫长的旅程。在他旁边 ， 一棵树在他面前抓住 ， 杀死了无数的昆虫。<page>“你说得对 ， 风险越来越大。也许是你的伴侣带来了好运 ， 女孩。这是一个房子 ， 我和我的朋友。"
secondary_translated_text: Travel is back! "This is the new platform we will rely on. Enter your great castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all my friends have gone through this long journey. Next to him, a tree grabbed in front of him, killing countless insects.<page>"You are right, the risks are getting bigger and bigger. Maybe your partner brings good luck, girl. This is a house for me and my friends. "

original_en_text: Oh, and look, Miss Hornet, look at how many lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 噢对了，大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: “嘿 ， 泡泡小姐 ， 看看跳蚤的数量！” 最后一个似乎和我们在一起。
secondary_translated_text: "Hey, Miss Bubble, look at the number of fleas!" The last one seems to be with us.

original_en_text: Ah! Aha! A native of these fiery lowlands approaches! Have no fear, my friend, we fleas are but humble travellers!<hpage>Well met, sir, though like you I am not of these lands. I am merely journeying through.<page>Oh. Oho! A kindred spirit! It’s good luck for wanderers to meet on an unfamiliar path.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！是这片灼热低地的原住民！别怕朋友，我们跳蚤都是卑微的旅者！<hpage>幸会，不过我和你一样只是途经此地。<page>噢！原来也是流浪旅者！听说路遇同道是好兆头呢！
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！这片温暖的草原上的人们来了！“别担心 ， 我的朋友 ， 跳蚤是个卑微的旅行者。<hpage>“我和你一样来自这个国家 ， 但我很开心。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！对于流浪汉来说 ， 这是一个在陌生的街道上与他见面的绝佳机会。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! Oh, Oh, Oh! The people from this warm grassland are here! "Don't worry, my friend, flea is a humble traveler.<hpage>"I come from this country like you, but I'm very happy.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! For the homeless man, this is a great opportunity to meet him on an unfamiliar street.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dear one, dodeshna! Heh heh! Have you returned to use Kratt’s luxurious spa-carriage? I’ve kept it roastily warm for you...
original_zh_text: 多德什纳亲爱的！要来泡克拉特的豪华车厢温泉吗？泉水一直为你温着呢！
translated_text: 亲爱的 Dodeschner！这是什麽啊！为你燃烧， 为你燃烧。
secondary_translated_text: Dear Dodeschner! What is this? Burn for you, burn for you.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, and the Flea Juggle champion has set an even higher score! Tremble in awe, dear fleas, at the might of our dear Miss Hornet!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，耍耍记录刷新！颤抖吧跳蚤们，见证大黄蜂小姐的实力！
translated_text: 比赛结束了 ， 免费棋盘冠军提高了分数！我亲爱的跳蚤 ， 吓得发抖吧 ， 我们亲爱的跳蚤小姐！
secondary_translated_text: The game is over and the free board champion improves his score! My dear flea, tremble with fear, our dear Miss Flea!

original_en_text: There are many lost and lonely fleas still scattered across this kingdom. If only some more of them joined us, the caravan could continue its journey.<page>You’ll find the little dears in all sorts of strange places, for they love to peek and pry and play, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here!
original_zh_text: 还有太多同胞流落四方。如果能多召集些，旅团就能继续前行。<page>那些小家伙总爱躲在古怪角落玩耍，但被发现就会自己寻路回来！
translated_text: 帝国一直被一只孤独的跳蚤打断。随着越来越多的人加入 ， 团队也在不断地发展。<page>他们喜欢看 ， 看和玩 ， 所以你可以在所有陌生的地方找到他们 ， 但当他们醒来时 ， 他们会找到自己的方式！
secondary_translated_text: The empire has been interrupted by a lonely flea. As more and more people join, the team continues to develop.<page>They love to watch, watch and play, so you can find them in all strange places, but when they wake up, they will find their way!

original_en_text: Those great rumbles from beneath, they have sound similar to giant beast. Such beast is much sorrowful though, I am think.<page>Fleas and monsters alike have their troubles...
original_zh_text: 下面传来的轰隆声，像巨兽哀嚎。或许长得越大，悲伤也就越大吧。<page>跳蚤和怪物各有各的苦……
translated_text: 下面是一个巨大的爆炸 ， 就像一个巨大的野兽。<page>怪物和怪物有麻烦了。
secondary_translated_text: Below was a huge explosion, like a huge beast.<page>Monsters and monsters are in trouble.

original_en_text: <hpage>The Fleamaster and his caravan sought for caves offering space and safety. This calm lake and shore may prove suitable.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤旅团在寻找宽敞又安全的驻地，这片湖岸看着很合适。
translated_text: <hpage>Flex Master 和他的大篷车正在寻找一个可以提供空间和安全的洞穴 ， 而这个宁静的湖泊和海岸将是完美的。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flex Master and his caravan are looking for a cave that can provide space and security, and this tranquil lake and coast will be perfect.

original_en_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! Wonder at how large our caravan has grown! So bold and boisterous! This gilded chamber can barely contain us all!<page>The many fleas are itching to journey once more, to find a space to stretch their wings. But from here, as their leader, I am hesitant to order us so swiftly away.<page>These heights hold too much danger to set forth without a safe goal held clear in mind.<page>What of you, Miss Hornet? Your tasks carry you throughout this kingdom. Have you ever encountered a place appropriate?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！看旅团现在多热闹！这金色大厅都快装不下了！<page>大伙急着再次启程找个宽敞的地方，但身为领袖，我不敢贸然行动。<page>高地危机四伏，没有明确目标不能冒险。<page>您有什么看法？您走遍了纺络，可曾遇见过合适的去处？
translated_text: 我非常抱歉。女士。我很想知道这支充满激情的球队是如何成长的。勇敢和积极！这个金色的房间不能容纳我们所有人！<page>许多跳蚤向后移动 ， 寻找空间来展开翅膀。但从那里 ， 他犹豫了一会儿作为老板 ， 并命令他立即离开。<page>如果没有明确的安全目标 ， 这种高度可能非常危险。<page>你是大黄蜂小姐 ， 你的任务是穿越王国。
secondary_translated_text: I'm so sorry. Ma 'am. I would love to know how this passionate team grew. Courage and positive! This golden room cannot accommodate all of us!<page>Many fleas move backwards, looking for space to spread their wings. But from there, he hesitated for a moment as boss and ordered him to leave immediately.<page>Without clear safety goals, such heights can be very dangerous.<page>You are Miss Bumblebee, and your mission is to travel through the kingdom.

original_en_text: We will camp here a time before moving onward. These moments of safety and calm must be treasured, rare as they are.
original_zh_text: 我们会在这里暂驻。安宁时光难得，要好好珍惜。
translated_text: 我们在这里呆了一会儿 ， 然后我们继续前进。虽然像这样的安全与和平的时刻是罕见的 ， 但我们会很感激。
secondary_translated_text: We stayed here for a while, and then we moved on. While moments of security and peace like these are rare, we would be grateful.

original_en_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at how many of the lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: 哦 ， 我亲爱的朋友 ， 大黄蜂小姐 ， 看看丢失的跳蚤的数量！最后一个似乎与我们同在。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Bumblebee, look at the number of fleas lost! The last one seems to be with us.

original_en_text: And now that we have met, know that I am Fleamaster Mooshka, leader of this caravan!<page>Our own journey has barely begun, but you are most welcome to tarry here a while, stranger. Where ways are dark and winding, good bugs must stay close together!
original_zh_text: 既然相遇，容我介绍——我是跳蚤首领穆什卡，旅团领袖！<page>我们刚启程不久，但欢迎您在此歇息。现在外面混乱得很，好虫子们应抱团取暖！
translated_text: 现在我们是飞行大师 ， 这支球队的队长！<page>我们刚刚开始我们的旅程， 但我们会在这里停留一段时间。在黑暗和曲折的地方 ， 好的昆虫必须被亲吻！
secondary_translated_text: Now we are flying masters and captains of this team!<page>We have just begun our journey, but we will be here for a while. In dark and tortuous places, good insects must be kissed!

original_en_text: The bellowing sandy land was full of much danger. We was almost lost poor Varga to hungry worms as we travel up!<page>Sadly, he is finding way here after all. Har! Is only jest. Grishkin and Varga is great friends, just like all fleas is being.
original_zh_text: 这片沙地凶险得很！来的路上瓦尔加差点就进了蠕虫的肚子！<page>可惜最后他找到路回来了！哈哈开玩笑，格里什琴和瓦尔加关系好着呢！
translated_text: 这个游戏充满了危险。当我们爬上去的时候 ， 可怜的巴尔加被一只饥饿的昆虫困住了。<page>他终于找到了一条出路。噢 ， 噢！格里芬和巴尔加是朋友 ， 就像其他跳蚤一样。
secondary_translated_text: This game is full of dangers. As we climbed up, poor Balga was trapped by a hungry insect.<page>He finally found a way out. Oh, Oh! Griffin and Balga are friends, just like other fleas.

translated_text: 我可以再来一杯啤酒吗？
secondary_translated_text: Can I have another beer?

original_en_text: You have brought them all, bug not flea. My work is done! No more searching needed. Ours is a caravan full!<page>Now my duty must change. To watch. To protect. This new task I am looking much to liking.
original_zh_text: 你把他们全找齐了，外族虫。我也不用再四处搜寻了！旅团满员！<page>现在改当护卫，这新差事合我胃口。
translated_text: 我把他们都带走了。这些虫子不是跳蚤。完成这项工作！不需要进一步的研究。车子已经满了！<page>请注意 ， 我的职责正在改变。
secondary_translated_text: I took them all away. These bugs are not fleas. Finish the job! No further research is needed. The car is full!<page>Please note that my responsibilities are changing.

original_en_text: Is warm here, you agree? Is very... what is say, cosy?<page>The Fleamaster though, is always want to move on. We will be drag away somewhere much worse soon, I think.
original_zh_text: 这儿暖和，对吧？很……温馨？<page>但首领总想挪窝，我猜迟早会搬去更糟的地方。
translated_text: 你觉得暖和吗 ？事实上？有很多 ... ...我的意思是， 先生。你觉得怎么样 ， 康纳 ？<page>然而 ， Flackmaster 一直想继续前进 ， 我认为我们很快就会处于更糟糕的境地。
secondary_translated_text: Do you feel warm? Actually? There are many... ... I mean, sir. What do you think, Connor?<page>However, Flackmaster has always wanted to move on, and I think we will soon be in a worse situation.

original_en_text: Oh... what a shame. Heh heh! I think you’d find the waters inside delectably soothing, if you’d only reconsider!
original_zh_text: 噢……真遗憾。这泉水能舒服到骨头里哦！要不再考虑考虑？
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。多么可耻啊！这是什麽啊！当你想到它， 你会发现水是如此的舒适！
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. How shameful! What is this? When you think about it, you will find that the water is so comfortable!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Such dedication you continue to show us, Miss Hornet!<page>While we may seem safe out here at range from danger, we cannot go far to forage, and the many fleas need much nurture!<page>Food and provisions, such as you bring, are crucial in these desperate times.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我从钟心镇带了补给来。<page>大黄蜂小姐，您总是这么关照我们！<page>这里看似安全，但难以远行觅食，这么多张嘴要喂呢！<page>你带来的食物和物资真是雪中送炭！
translated_text: <hpage>队长 ， 我们从伯哈特大使那里准备了一包补给品。<page>” 你是未婚夫， 哈蒂小姐。"<page>我们似乎已经脱离了危险 ， 但我们不能走得太远。<page>在这个绝望的时刻 ， 你需要食物和用品 （ 例如 ， 带走的东西 ） 。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Captain, we have a package of supplies from Ambassador Burhart.<page>"You are my fiancé, Miss Hattie. "<page>We seem to be out of danger, but we cannot go too far.<page>In this desperate moment, you need food and supplies (e.g., things to take away).

original_en_text: This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon platforms, avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.
original_zh_text: 这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。
translated_text: 这种测试旨在预防跳蚤。留在球场上 ， 以避免攻击。你停留的时间越长 ， 你的分数就越高。
secondary_translated_text: This test is designed to prevent fleas. Stay on the court to avoid attacks. The longer you stay, the higher your score will be.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dodeshna! I am saying, welcome to our caravan, stranger!<page>You are a very funny, very strange flea, isn’t it? No fur at all, and your wings fall off!<page>Har, har har har! Is just jest, of course. Us fleas famous for giving jokes!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，多德什纳！我的意思是，欢迎来到旅团！<page>你真是个滑稽的跳蚤，没长毛还掉翅膀！哈哈！<page>开个玩笑啦！我们跳蚤最爱逗乐子！
translated_text: 欢迎来到 Trailer ， 陌生人！<page>你是个有趣而奇怪的跳蚤 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？没有皮肤 ， 翅膀会掉下来。<page>哈！这是一个笑话 ， 我们以笑话而闻名。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome to Trailer, stranger!<page>You're a funny and strange flea, aren't you? Actually? Without skin, wings will fall off.<page>Ha! This is a joke, and we are famous for jokes.

original_en_text: Some beasts here, I see them eat through the bony ground. Is very smart! Bone is everywhere much abundant! If only I had such stomach, har har!
original_zh_text: 这有些野兽会啃地上的骨头，真聪明！这到处都是骨头，我要有这胃口多好！哈哈！
translated_text: 这是一只会变成骨头的野兽 ， 它非常聪明！到处都是骨头！我希望我能有这样的船。
secondary_translated_text: This is a beast that will turn to bones. It is very smart! There are bones everywhere! I wish I had a boat like this.

original_en_text: Drink to full, Miss Hornet! Why waste? Be merry with us fleas before it all ends!
original_zh_text: 喝个痛快，大黄蜂小姐！浪费？都要完蛋了，只管开心就好了！
translated_text: ” 喝一杯， 霍尼夫人。为什么要使用它？让我们的跳蚤满足 ， 直到一切都结束！
secondary_translated_text: "Have a drink, Mrs. Horney. Why use it? Let our fleas be satisfied until it's all over!

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended, and you have bested your old score. Rishkiz, champion!
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。你超越了自己，里什基兹，祝贺你，冠军！
translated_text: 考试结束了 ， 你违反了原来的成绩。“好吧 ， 冠军！"
secondary_translated_text: The exam is over, and you violated your original grade. "All right, champ! "

original_en_text: Normally I would never burden a visitor with the caravan’s worries. But! Isn’t it the custom of this kingdom to share your deepest wishes with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is for the poor lost fleas of these lands to find their way to our caravan! Stranger, could you not help us?
original_zh_text: 本不该让客人操心旅团的琐事，但据说倾诉愿望是纺络的风俗？<page>我的愿望就是迷途跳蚤能回归旅团！能请您帮助我吗？
translated_text: 通常情况下 ， 他们不担心大篷车或游客的问题。还有更多！与陌生人分享最深的愿望 ， 这难道不是这个国家的习俗吗 ？<page>我希望这片土地上流浪的可怜的跳蚤能找到我们的大篷车！很有趣 ， 能帮我吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Usually, they don't worry about caravans or tourists. There are more! Isn't it a custom in this country to share one's deepest wishes with strangers?<page>I hope the poor flea wandering in this land can find our caravan! Very interesting. Can you help me?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, if your troupe is still prepared to travel, I have discovered a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient aqueducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has at last been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining for this new journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要是旅团已经准备妥当，我发现圣堡外的古渠尽头有处洞穴或许适合你们。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！终于找到目标了，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>福雷斯特 ， 如果你的公司还在计划旅行 ， 我在旧运河尽头的城堡外发现了一个洞穴。<hpage>旅程可能需要很长时间 ， 但当你到达时 ， 你会发现一个大而干净的湖泊旁边有一个没有捕食者的沙滩。<page>就是这样！” 是的， 是的。命运终于决定了 ， 旅程还在继续。<page>“泡泡小姐 ， 你是跳蚤最好的朋友。我们在这里让你感到受欢迎。你想参加这次旅行吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forrest, if your company is still planning a trip, I found a cave outside the castle at the end of the old canal.<hpage>The journey can take a long time, but when you arrive, you will find a large, clean lake next to it with a sandy beach without predators.<page>That's it!" Yes, yes. Fate has finally been decided and the journey continues.<page>"Miss Bubble, you are flea's best friend. We are here to make you feel welcome. Do you want to take this trip?

original_en_text: My treasured guest... what need have I of rosaries, now that all is ending? Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 尊贵的客人……如今万物都将终结，我还要念珠何用？请随意使用温泉车厢吧，分文不取！亲爱的克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: 亲爱的客人 ， 现在结束了 ， 我能做什么呢 ？免费使用汽车的 SPA 。Shellkrat 将很乐意帮助您！
secondary_translated_text: Dear guests, now that it is over, what can I do? Free use of the car's SPA. Shellkrat will be happy to help you!

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company!<page>But still there may be more out there in this wide world... What a wonder it would be if they too found their way to our fresh paradise!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>但或许还有其他流落者……要是他们也能找到这新乐园该多好！
translated_text: 有这么多迷路的跳蚤来了 ， 我没想到会有这么大的团队！<page>如果他们能找到通往新乐园的路 ， 他们会多么高兴啊！
secondary_translated_text: With so many lost fleas coming, I didn't expect such a big team!<page>How happy they would be if they could find their way to a new paradise!

original_en_text: Auugghhh... the pain! Such fury, over a mistake! Poor little Kratt did not mean to steal a look!<page>This old carriage needs constant care. I was only doing repairs! I had no intent to intrude! And I barely saw a thing!<hpage>Lie no more to me, flea, and be grateful you still live. Know that if you peer again, you will die.<page>Of course! Kratt would never! Let’s consider the matter forgotten, and you shall forever be my treasured guest!
original_zh_text: 啊嗷！好痛！发这么大火干嘛！克拉特不是故意偷看的！<page>车厢需要养护，我只是在修补！这是无心之过，而且我基本什么也没看见！<hpage>不必编故事了，这次没死算你走运。下次再偷看，你必死无疑。<page>不敢不敢！这事就这么翻篇吧！您永远是贵宾！
translated_text: 如果她是反对邪恶的 ， 那只可怜的猫就不会倒下！<page>汽车需要不断的维护。他们会修复的！“我从来不想打扰你。我几乎什么也没看到！<hpage>别骗我 ， 开玩笑 ， 谢谢你让我活着 ， 如果我再见到你 ， 我会死的。<page>是啊 ， 不！你可能会被扭曲 ， 但你将永远是我的客人！
secondary_translated_text: If she were against evil, the poor cat would not have fallen!<page>Cars require constant maintenance. They will fix it! "I never wanted to disturb you. I saw almost nothing!<hpage>Don't lie to me, be kidding, thank you for keeping me alive. If I see you again, I will die.<page>Yeah, no! You may be distorted, but you will always be my guest!

original_en_text: Dodeshna! Miss Hornet, is it? Welcome to our new camp! The travelling is done, and so we drink! <page>Is no better way to revive spirit than to drink the famous Flea Brew! I’m have just finished a batch, bubbling and warm!<page>You are friend, finder of lost, little fleas, hmm? Here, take bottle of Flea Brew with you! Will keep you warm while you travel.<page>I am always brewing here, so have no fear to drink plenty, and return whenever you are wanting more!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳！是大黄蜂小姐吗？欢迎来新营地！旅途结束，该喝点啦！<page>来点提神的跳蚤秘酿！我刚熬好一锅，热乎着呢！<page>是你帮忙找回流落在外的同胞对吧？那这瓶药酿送你！路上暖暖身子。<page>我整天都在熬制药酿，喝完了随时来取！
translated_text: Duddzna！你是黄蜂小姐。欢迎来到新营地！旅程结束了 ， 我们去喝酒吧！<page>如果你不喝著名的纳米啤酒 ， 你将永远不会重生！我们刚刚结束了聚会 ， 它的气味很辛辣。<page>你是一个朋友 ， 你正在寻找丢失的跳蚤。一杯啤酒 ， 让我在旅途中保持温暖。<page>我总是在这里喝酒， 所以如果你想看更多， 喝更多！
secondary_translated_text: Duddzna! You are Miss Wasp. Welcome to the new camp! The journey is over, let's go have a drink!<page>If you don't drink the famous nano beer, you will never be born again! We had just finished the party and it smelled very spicy.<page>You are a friend and you are looking for lost fleas. A glass of beer keeps me warm during the journey.<page>I always drink here, so if you want to see more, drink more!

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? If service is you here seeking, none is left for me to provide. All fleas are here, collected close.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？如果是要找我帮忙，那我帮不了什么了，跳蚤们都回来了。<page>现在大家都聚在一起，只剩等待最后的终局了。
translated_text: 如果你停下来 ， 昆虫不是跳蚤 ， 对吗 ？“如果你是来服务的 ， 我就不能。所有的跳蚤都在这里 ， 收集得很好。<page>一切都好得多 ， 因为跳蚤已经聚集在一起 ， 准备提供结果。
secondary_translated_text: If you stop, insects are not fleas, are they? "If you are here to serve, I cannot. All the fleas are here and are well collected.<page>Everything is much better because the fleas have gathered together and ready to provide results.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, would you share them with me? I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>The locations! For price they could be shared, but you hold no map to mark! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>位置，拿念珠换！但你连地图都没有！想要交易，先弄张地图来！
translated_text: <hpage>为巴黎干杯。在他的众多同伴中 ， 我并不担心他会活下来 ， 找到商队。<hpage>你需要做什么工作才能以这种可怕的方式离开你的朋友 ？<page>跟随我的脚步 ， 气味和强烈的情绪。找到我们的跳蚤朋友 ， 最年轻的跳蚤 ， 让我们抓住他们 ， 让他们变得更强壮。<hpage>如果你知道芯片在哪里 ， 你会分享吗 ？” 我们可以把它在一个大篷车。<page>师傅！关于价格 ， 我们可以分享。没有纸张！如果你想知道 ， 你需要一张地图 ， 现在你什么也做不了。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Here's to Paris. Among his many companions, I was not worried that he would survive and find the caravan.<hpage>What work do you need to do to leave your friends in this horrific way?<page>Follow my footsteps, smells and strong emotions. Find our flea friends, the youngest flea, and let us catch them and make them stronger.<hpage>If you knew where the chip was, would you share it?" We can take it in a caravan.<page>Master! Regarding the price, we can share. No paper! If you want to know, you need a map, and there's nothing you can do now.

original_en_text: Bug. World is ending. Nothing left but to test ourselves.<page>This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon the platforms. Avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.<page>To score most is to become champion. This is only thing left to strive for.
original_zh_text: 虫子，世界就要毁灭，除了试炼也没别的事可做。<page>这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。<page>分最高的就是冠军，而夺冠是最后的意义。
translated_text: 世界已经破碎了 ， 你别无选择 ， 只能证明这一点。<page>这种测试旨在预防跳蚤。如果您留在平台上 ， 您可以避免攻击。你停留的时间越长 ， 你的分数就越高。<page>“最重要的是成为冠军 ， 这是我们唯一需要争取的。"
secondary_translated_text: The world is broken, and you have no choice but to prove it.<page>This test is designed to prevent fleas. If you stay on the platform, you can avoid attacks. The longer you stay, the higher your score will be.<page>"The most important thing is to be a champion, that's the only thing we need to fight for. "

original_en_text: Bug, you are champion of Flea Dodge, but trial is still open to you. Can you defeat your own score?
original_zh_text: 虫子，跳蚤溜溜的冠军归你了。但挑战还将继续，你能突破自己的成绩吗？
translated_text: Bug ， 你是道奇队的冠军 ， Noomi ， 但这个过程仍在进行中。
secondary_translated_text: Bug, you are the champion of the Dodgers, Noomi, but the process is still in progress.

original_en_text: So bug not flea, you return. World is ruined. Final end comes soon, says Fleamaster.<hpage>This land is gravely wounded, but death need not follow. It is now my task to free this kingdom from its dark fall.<page>Grrr... such words are just fancy. Nothing left now, except to protect what little we have.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，你回来了。首领说，世界要完蛋了。<hpage>纺络遭受重创，但未必没有转机。我会帮王国摆脱黑暗。<page>吼……漂亮话谁都会说，现在我们也只能死守这点家当了。
translated_text: 根据弗莱默的说法 ， 蠕虫会回来 ， 世界将被摧毁 ， 而不是跳蚤 ， 最终结果将很快公布。<hpage>地球受到了严重的伤害 ， 但死亡必须继续。现在我的任务是把这个王国从黑暗的崩溃中解放出来。<page>是的 ， 是的 ， 是的 ... ...它很薄。“我们唯一能做的就是保护我们拥有的小东西。
secondary_translated_text: According to Flemmer, the worms will come back, the world will be destroyed, not fleas, and the final results will be announced soon.<hpage>The earth has been severely damaged, but death must continue. Now my task is to liberate this kingdom from its dark collapse.<page>Yes, yes, yes... ... It's very thin. "The only thing we can do is protect the little things we have.

original_en_text: Come, you revellers! Try the Flea Juggle game! Keep striking fleas upwards. Keep them airborne for as long as possible!
original_zh_text: 来啊狂欢者！玩跳蚤耍耍！把跳蚤打飞，滞空越久越好！
translated_text: 加油 ， 粉丝们！你必须尝试跳蚤游戏！与跳蚤的战斗正在进行中 ， 所以尽可能长时间地留在空中。
secondary_translated_text: Come on, fans! You must try flea games! The battle against fleas is ongoing, so stay in the air as long as possible.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have seen a place, Fleamaster, a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient ducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining the caravan on this journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我见过一处地方，在圣堡外的古渠尽头，或许符合你们的需求。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！目标已定，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>在城堡后面 ， 你可以看到一个叫做 Flamemaster 的洞穴。在旧烟斗的尽头。<hpage>旅程可能需要很长时间 ， 但当你到达时 ， 你会发现一个大而干净的湖泊旁边有一个没有捕食者的沙滩。<page>就是这样！” 是的， 是的。命运决定了 ， 旅程继续。<page>“泡泡小姐 ， 你是跳蚤最好的朋友。我们在这里让你感到受欢迎。你想参加这一天吗？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Behind the castle, you can see a cave called Flamemaster. At the end of the old pipe.<hpage>The journey can take a long time, but when you arrive, you will find a large, clean lake next to it with a sandy beach without predators.<page>That's it!" Yes, yes. Fate is decided and the journey continues.<page>"Miss Bubble, you are flea's best friend. We are here to make you feel welcome. Do you want to participate in this day?

original_en_text: All are here now, bug not flea. For your seeking, ours is a caravan full.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 跳蚤全齐了，外族虫。托你的福，旅团满员了。<page>世界就要完蛋了，抱团总比落单好。
translated_text: 但不是所有的昆虫 — 这里是跳蚤。我们的舰队已经满足您的搜索。<page>一切都好得多 ， 因为跳蚤已经聚集在一起 ， 准备提供结果。
secondary_translated_text: But not all insects-here they are fleas. Our fleet has satisfied your search.<page>Everything is much better because the fleas have gathered together and ready to provide results.

original_en_text: Ooh, heh heh heh! What a turn, for dear Kratt to be strung up in such a dank little cave!<hpage>Cursed threads stretch throughout this land, set to ensnare the unwary. You seem no worse for it now, at least.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿！没想到克拉特会在这阴暗的洞窟里翻船！<hpage>丝咒遍地，一不留神被缠住。你看起来倒是不担心？<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: 是的 ， 是的！亲爱的克里特先生 ， 我很高兴能在这样一个潮湿的洞穴里玩耍！<hpage>被诅咒的线条旨在防止不小心的人在地板上奔跑。它看起来不那么糟糕， 至少在一段时间。<hpage>我想这台金属机器是你的。<page>哦 ， 是的 ， 是的！“我加入了舰队 ， 对吧 ？ ”事实上？它是安全的， 对吧？我厌倦了独自冒险。<page>你...你认为我们会在那里见面吗？这台机器隐藏着一个秘密 ， 所以下次我看到它时 ， 我想和你分享。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, yes! Dear Mr. Crete, I am so happy to play in such a damp cave!<hpage>The cursed lines are designed to prevent inadvertent people from running on the floor. It didn't look so bad, at least for a while.<hpage>I think this metal machine is yours.<page>Oh, yes, yes! "I joined the fleet, right? "In fact? It's safe, right? I'm tired of taking risks alone.<page>you... Do you think we'll meet there? This machine hides a secret, so the next time I see it, I want to share it with you.

original_en_text: And now, with our caravan bursting, we’ve rested here long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! First, please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 如今旅团拥挤不堪，我们也休整已久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>哎呀，我真是失礼！还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: 舰队已经满了 ， 我们可以在这里休息 ， 筹码必须上升。<page>我是多么的懒惰。首先 ， 你会叫他什么 ？<hpage>“你可以叫我 Bubbleby ， 弗雷大师。“很高兴看到你的坏朋友在你的舰队中是安全的。独自旅行是一个非常危险的国家。<page>他们走了！换句话说， 我不敢相信！多么美丽啊！我们都在一起。“<page>亲爱的朋友们 ， 汉布尔比小姐 ， 我们的火车正朝着沼泽和高处飞驰。
secondary_translated_text: The fleet is full. We can rest here. The chips must rise.<page>How lazy I am. First of all, what would you call him?<hpage>"You can call me Bubbleby, Master Frey. "It's good to see your bad friends are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a very dangerous country.<page>They're gone! In other words, I can't believe it! How beautiful! We're all together.“<page>Dear friends, Miss Hambleby, our train is speeding towards the swamps and heights.

original_en_text: I have marked your map, bug. See the learnings of fleas lost across the lands.<page>If you are as brave as told by fellow fleas, seek them. Save them. For a caravan whole.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，地图标好了。上面有流落同胞的位置。<page>如果你真如传言般勇敢，就去救他们吧。凑满我们的旅团。
translated_text: 鲍勃 ， 我浏览过你的地图。我知道跳蚤会去任何地方。<page>正如你的跳蚤同事所说 ， 如果你勇敢 ， 就去寻找它们。” 整个队。
secondary_translated_text: Bob, I looked through your map. I know fleas go anywhere.<page>As your flea colleague said, if you are brave, go look for them." The whole team.

original_en_text: You are welcome here always, Miss Hornet, true friend of fleas!<page>Stay as long as you care. Rest and restore. We many fleas do so enjoy your company.
original_zh_text: 随时欢迎您回来，跳蚤的挚友！<page>想留多久都可以。好好休息，我们都喜欢与您相伴。
translated_text: 你总是快乐的 ， 泡泡小姐 ， 我的跳蚤朋友！<page>只要你能照顾好自己 ， 你就会留在那里。休息和恢复。许多跳蚤爱好者都喜欢这家公司。
secondary_translated_text: You are always happy, Miss Bubble, my flea friend!<page>As long as you can take care of yourself, you will stay there. Rest and recovery. Many flea enthusiasts like this company.

original_en_text: Dear friend of fleas, please! If ever you come upon a cave both wide and free, return with haste and tell us.<page>The fleas are oh so eager to journey, and I’m eager to see them to a destination safe!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤之友啊！如果发现宽敞安全的洞穴，请速来告知！<page>大伙迫不及待地要启程，我也盼着带他们去安全的归宿！
translated_text: 如果你看到一个空白 ， 请告诉我。<page>Worm 是一个旅行爱好者 ， 希望看到他安全到达目的地！
secondary_translated_text: If you see a blank space, please let me know.<page>Worm is a travel enthusiast and wants to see him reach his destination safely!

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>And so happy have you made we fleas! Even as the darkness comes to claim us, we would be honoured to bestow one final gift, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past.<page>May it mark you in Pharloom’s final moment as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我素来喜好独行，但与你们相遇确是暖心之事。见你们团聚也很是欣慰。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也欢喜得很！因此在这黑暗将至的时刻，请让我为您送上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。<page>愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>我深深地踏进了这片土地。无论你走到哪里 ， 你都会遇到像你这样的好奇心。<hpage>跳蚤对冒险有一种不寻常的胃口 ， 他们的技能几乎是无与伦比的 ， 但令人惊讶。<hpage>我已经习惯了独自旅行很长一段时间 ， 但我很高兴跟随您的旅程并分享我的进步。<page>我很高兴你让我飞起来！即使当黑暗降临时 ， 我也很荣幸地从跳蚤的光荣过去的宝藏中给你最后的礼物。<page>过去的几天 ， 我们像朋友一样度过。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I stepped deeply into this land. Wherever you go, you will encounter curiosity like yours.<hpage>Fleas have an unusual appetite for adventure, and their skills are almost unmatched but surprising.<hpage>I have been used to traveling alone for a long time, but I am happy to follow your journey and share my progress.<page>I'm so glad you made me fly! Even when darkness falls, I am honored to give you my final gift from the treasure of flea's glorious past.<page>We spent the past few days like friends. "

original_en_text: You are have luck, Miss Hornet, to lack the fur of we fleas. All the blowy sand of that place is getting very stuck inside!
original_zh_text: 你真幸运，大黄蜂小姐。不像我们长着毛，这破地方的沙子全钻进了毛里！
translated_text: “泡泡小姐 ， 我很高兴你没有跳蚤的头发。
secondary_translated_text: "Miss Bubble, I'm glad you don't have flea hair.

original_en_text: The beasts here are... much frightful, hm? Scary?<page>But if give them space, they leave alone. You respect beast, beast respect you.
original_zh_text: 这里的野兽……挺吓人？<page>保持距离就没事。你对它们敬而远之，它们也一样。
translated_text: 有一个野兽， 不是吗？嗯 ， 对吧 ？还有其他恐怖分子吗？<page>如果你给他们空间 ， 他们会自己出来。你是动物 ， 动物是你。
secondary_translated_text: There's a beast, isn't there? Yeah, right? Are there other terrorists?<page>If you give them space, they will come out on their own. You are an animal, and the animal is you.

original_en_text: Grand Champion... bug called Hornet. Will you once again challenge the Flea Dodge trial?
original_zh_text: 名为大黄蜂的虫……总冠军。你要再次挑战跳蚤溜溜吗？
translated_text: 在比赛中 ， 有一种叫做 “Shersh ” 的昆虫。你想再一次体验神秘的火焰过程吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: In the competition, there was an insect called "Shersh". Do you want to experience the mysterious fire process again?

original_en_text: Fierce one, my dear Grand Champion! Will you dance and fly with us above the water?
original_zh_text: 小辣椒，亲爱的总冠军！和我们一起在水面上共舞吧！
translated_text: 亲爱的冠军 ， 亲爱的冠军。你想和我跳舞吗？你想在水面上飞行吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Dear champion, dear champion. Do you want to dance with me? Do you want to fly on water?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Ahh, such a kindly gesture adds much warmth to our celebration!<page>These poor little fleas will never grow to roam the world as we have, so let us give them what happiness we can before the end.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我带来了钟心镇的支援物资。<page>啊，这份善意让庆典更添暖意！<page>这些可怜的小跳蚤注定无法像我们一样游历世界，就让我们在终结前尽力给予他们欢愉吧。
translated_text: <hpage>队长 ， 我们从伯哈特大使那里准备了一包补给品。<page>哦 ， 这样一个善良的姿态 ， 为我们的庆祝活动增添了温暖！<page>在一切都结束之前 ， 我们尽一切努力让他们快乐。因为这些可怜的跳蚤不像我们那样长大 ， 并且在世界各地旅行。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Captain, we have a package of supplies from Ambassador Burhart.<page>Oh, such a kind gesture adds warmth to our celebrations!<page>Before it's all over, we do everything we can to make them happy. Because these poor fleas don't grow up like we do and travel around the world.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! Heh heh. All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Pray tell, what does one call such a delicate beauty? Surely yours is a name most sweet and soothing. Are you Fairgrace? Or Nectarsweet?<hpage>I am Hornet, sir. Address me by that name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course. My dear, Hornet! I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！嘿嘿，全托你的福！敢问美女芳名？定是甜美如"香露仙子"？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂，要么称我本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！亲爱的大黄蜂小姐！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>您可以安全地参加此护送。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦 ， 是的！噢 ， 谢谢 ， 谢谢！” 这位美丽的女人叫什么名字？他的名字是最甜蜜和最安慰的名字。这是一个宝贵的祝福吗？尼克塔龙 ？<hpage>你叫他的名字 ， 还是不叫他 ？<page>“是的 ， 当然 ， 亲爱的 Bubbleby ， 我会告诉你我的小秘密。“我的车已经成为一个疗愈的 SPA ， 也是最聪明的车。<page>我们内心的水比诗歌更纯净！我很高兴使用它 ， 它并不贵！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You can safely participate in this escort.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh, yes! Oh, thank you, thank you!" What is the name of this beautiful woman? His name is the sweetest and most comforting name. Is this a precious blessing? Niktaron?<hpage>Do you call him by his name or not?<page>"Yes, of course, dear Bubbleby, I will tell you my little secret. "My car has become a healing SPA and the smartest car.<page>The water in our hearts is purer than poetry! I am very happy to use it, it is not expensive!

original_en_text: Mamashka. The trial begins. Flea Dodge!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡。跳蚤溜溜，试炼开始！
translated_text: “妈妈 ， 审判已经开始了。太糟糕了 ， 道奇。
secondary_translated_text: "Mom, the trial has begun. That's too bad, Dodge.

original_en_text: <hpage>I saw your plea posted at Bellhart, sir flea, and accept your request.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在钟心镇看到了你的祈愿，跳蚤先生，我接受。
translated_text: <hpage>我读了你寄给 Berhardt 的地址 ， 并接受了。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I read the address you sent to Berhardt and accepted it.

original_en_text: The dirge I sing is for the end of our old lives...<page>Here at the end of times, our paradise crumbles beneath us. Flea and friend alike, all will soon be consumed...
original_zh_text: 我唱这首哀歌，祭奠旧日终结……<page>末日将至，乐园崩塌。跳蚤与挚友，终将湮灭……
translated_text: 我所唱的赞美诗 ， 是我们旧生活的终结。<page>在世界末日 ， 天空将落在我们身上。土豆就像一个朋友 ， 一切都很快耗尽。
secondary_translated_text: The hymns I sing are the end of our old lives.<page>At the end of the world, the sky will fall on us. Potato is like a friend, everything runs out quickly.

original_en_text: Ahh, look! The poor fleas are starting to make their way to us! What a precious thing!<page>We have much to thank you for already! And I hope we will have even more to be thankful for very soon! Please, keep seeking out our lost fellows!
original_zh_text: 快看！迷途的同胞开始回归了！多么珍贵的情谊！<page>我们对您感激不尽！还请您继续帮忙寻找失散的同胞！
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。看看我！可怜的跳蚤来了！多么珍贵啊！<page>我们已经有这么多值得感激的东西了！谢谢你找到了我失踪的朋友。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Look at me! Here comes the poor flea! How precious!<page>We already have so much to be grateful for! Thank you for finding my missing friend.

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug, not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave. I only ask what task causes you to perch alone atop these dank ducts?<page>Task? Mine is a work most important, but not for talking of here, where danger waits close. Soon, I depart to seek fleas, my fellows, and join them.<page>Now... Grrr. You leave me! I go soon to seek other fleas. A flea alone is good, but fleas together is best! Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤，也不打算抢你山洞。就是好奇你独自在这做什么？<hpage>做什么？当然是重要的事，但没空多说，附近有危险。我马上就要离开，去找我的同胞。<page>唔……你走吧！跳蚤还是聚在一起更合适，我待会就去找他们！现在要先休息！
translated_text: 咕噜 ， 这是昆虫 ， 不是跳蚤。胜利是我的公平游戏。<hpage>” 不久， 小姐， 我怀疑你有权进入这个洞穴。“我想一个人呆着。<page>我的工作是我最重要的工作之一 ， 但我不在这里谈论它 ， 危险就在这里。很快 ， 我开始寻找我的同伴 ， 并加入了他们。<page>目前 ， 这 ...哦 ， 天哪！让世界来吧！“土豆很棒 ， 但它们是最好的！与此同时 ， 休息吧！bug 已经关闭。
secondary_translated_text: Gollum, this is an insect, not a flea. Winning is my fair game.<hpage>"Soon, miss, I doubt you have the right to enter this cave. "I want to be alone.<page>My job is one of my most important jobs, but I'm not talking about it here, the danger is here. Soon, I began looking for my companions and joined them.<page>Currently, this... Oh, my God! Let the world come! "Potatoes are great, but they are the best! In the meantime, rest! The bug has been closed.

original_en_text: Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: 亲爱的朋友们 ， 黄蜂小姐 ， 我很抱歉 ， 但我有另一个给你。
secondary_translated_text: Dear friends, Miss Wasp, I'm sorry, but I have another one for you.

original_en_text: It is time for the Festival of the Flea! One last, grand celebration before the black quakes pull us all down into the darkness!<page>Rouse yourself fleas, one last time! Let the games begin!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤庆典就要开始了！在黑暗将我们拖入深渊前，最后一场盛大狂欢！<page>跳蚤们，最后一次振作起来！游戏开始！
translated_text: 今天是 Fletch 的日子。地震前的最后一个盛大的聚会把我们推到了黑暗中！<page>最后 ， 您必须携带自己的液体。让我们从游戏的教训开始。
secondary_translated_text: Today is Fletch's day. The last big party before the earthquake pushed us into the darkness!<page>Finally, you must bring your own liquids. Let's start with the lessons of the game.

original_en_text: Ahhh! Alas. Then we shall pray your own path remains safe.<page>And now, our new home is calling. We venture again!<hpage>Good travels, Fleamaster. May your journey ahead be safe and smooth.
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，唉，那就祝您前路平安。<page>好了，新家在召唤，我们又要启程了！<hpage>一路顺风，跳蚤首领。
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！是的 ， 对。我们希望您的旅程是安全的。<page>它被称为新家 ， 你又处于危险之中！<hpage>我们希望未来的旅行是安全和成功的。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! Yes, right. We want your journey to be safe.<page>It's called your new home, and you're in danger!<hpage>We want future travel to be safe and successful.

original_en_text: But stranger! While you’re with us, you must hear of the miracle that has occurred!<page>See all these fleas gathered to our troupe? It seems so many! An impossible number, yet here they are, safely joined together. Our most cherished wishes answered!<hpage>If you were seeking fleas to join your caravan, I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh! Can it be? Then you here are our saviour, our dear fleafriend! For all have made their way right, straight to us!<page>And now, with our caravan full to bursting, we’ve rested long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but saviour, how remiss of me! First, please tell, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 这位朋友！既然与我们同行，您可要听听旅团发生的奇迹！<page>看见归队的跳蚤们了吗？数量超乎想象！原以为这不可能，但它们已然齐聚于此。我们的祈愿实现了！<hpage>如果你是在寻找跳蚤，我在旅途中解救了许多。<page>噢！难道是您？那您便是我们的救星了，亲爱的跳蚤挚友！所有伙伴都因您重聚于此！<page>如今商队拥挤不堪，休整也已足够久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>噢，救星阁下，原谅我失礼了！请问该如何称呼您？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴你能和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: 可是 ， 外国人！当你和我们在一起时 ， 你会听到已经发生的奇迹！<page>你见过我们剧院里收藏的跳蚤吗 ？我觉得这太多了！这是一个不可能的数字 ， 但结合安全性。我最大的愿望终于实现了！<hpage>如果您正在寻找跳蚤加入您的舰队 ， 我在旅行中发现并释放了许多跳蚤。<page>哦 ， 我的上帝！你没事吧 ？你是我们的救主 ， 也是我们从跳蚤中亲爱的朋友。因为大家都来找我。<page>球队已经满了 ， 她休息了很多。'<page>“我很懒 ， 我的救世主。首先 ， 告诉我你会叫他什么 ？"<hpage>“你可以叫我 Bubbleby ， 弗雷大师。“很高兴看到你的坏朋友在你的舰队中是安全的。独自旅行是一个非常危险的国家。<page>他们走了！换句话说， 我不敢相信！多么美丽啊！我们都在一起。“<page>亲爱的朋友们 ， 汉布尔比小姐 ， 我们的火车正朝着沼泽和高处飞驰。
secondary_translated_text: But foreigners! When you are with us, you will hear the miracles that have happened!<page>Have you seen the fleas collected in our theater? I think this is too much! This is an impossible number, but combined with security. My greatest wish has finally come true!<hpage>If you are looking for fleas to join your fleet, I have discovered and released many fleas during my travels.<page>Oh, my God! Are you okay? You are our Savior and our dear friend from the fleas. Because everyone comes to me.<page>The team was full and she had a lot of rest. '<page>"I am lazy, my savior. First, tell me what you would call him? "<hpage>"You can call me Bubbleby, Master Frey. "It's good to see your bad friends are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a very dangerous country.<page>They're gone! In other words, I can't believe it! How beautiful! We're all together.“<page>Dear friends, Miss Hambleby, our train is speeding towards the swamps and heights.

original_en_text: Welcome back, my fierce one. Dodeshna! Heh heh! I’m sure your travels have wearied you.<page>Oh no, I wouldn’t dare take rosaries from such a treasured guest! Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来小辣椒！嘿嘿，旅途累了吧？<page>哦不，我哪敢收您钱！随便泡！克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: 欢迎回来 ， 我亲爱的朋友 ， Doshner！这是什麽啊！你的旅行可能会很无聊。<page>哦 ， 我从来没有勇气把玫瑰经带给这么尊贵的客人！免费使用汽车的 SPA 。Shellkrat 将很乐意帮助您！
secondary_translated_text: Welcome back, my dear friend, Doshner! What is this? Your trip can be boring.<page>Oh, I have never had the courage to bring the Rosary to such an honored guest! Free use of the car's SPA. Shellkrat will be happy to help you!

original_en_text: Miss Hornet! You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，您包揽了所有跳蚤游戏的冠军！<page>我宣布，您是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: 霍恩夫人！你是我们赢得的每一场跳蚤锦标赛的冠军！<page>本届盛会的获奖者已经出来了。当然还有你！<page>闭幕式已经开始了。布洛克 ， 我准备好了。
secondary_translated_text: Mrs. Horn! You are the champion of every flea tournament we have won!<page>The winners of this grand event have already come out. And of course you!<page>The closing ceremony has already begun. Brock, I'm ready.

original_en_text: Good friend of fleas is you, Miss Hornet. Now must join and drink much. Be merry before all ends. Brew is made, enough for all!<page>No charge for you if needing more. Why waste when future is final?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，我们跳蚤的挚友，快来喝！末日临头该及时行乐！药酿管够！<page>尽管喝吧！都要完蛋了还留着干嘛？
translated_text: Bubbleby 小姐 ， 跳蚤最好的朋友是你。现在你需要喝更多。<page>如果你需要更多 ， 你不必付钱。如果未来是确定的 ， 为什么要浪费时间去思考未来呢 ？
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bubbleby, flea's best friend is you. Now you need to drink more.<page>If you need more, you don't have to pay. If the future is certain, why waste time thinking about it?

original_en_text: A strange flea has joined our troupe. All are welcome, but something about this one sets my fur to raise.<page>His carriage offers a steaming service, but the charge in rosaries is stiff, especially for us fleas who carry few.<page>For the companionship we provide, and the safety of our numbers, surely some discount is deserved?
original_zh_text: 有个怪跳蚤入伙了。虽然我们来者不拒，但这家伙让我寒毛直竖。<page>他提供蒸疗服务，但要价高昂，我们跳蚤哪有这么多念珠？<page>看在我们提供庇护的份上，总该打个折吧？
translated_text: 他们在一个群体中花费。这很好 ， 但我的夹克更糟糕。<page>她的车提供蒸汽服务 ， 但玫瑰的成本很高 ， 特别是对于我们这些穿着小跳蚤的人来说。<page>由于我们提供的客房的善良和安全， 我们不得不打折扣。"
secondary_translated_text: They spend in a group. That's great, but my jacket is worse.<page>Her car provides steam service, but roses are expensive, especially for those of us wearing small fleas.<page>Due to the kindness and security of the rooms we provide, we have had to discount. "

original_en_text: Vikna! Dear one, you outdo yourself! To beat your previous high score is a marvel indeed!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！亲爱的，你又破了自己的记录！太神奇了！
translated_text: 维卡兰托你比你自己还高。赢得最后一场倒计时是一个奇迹！
secondary_translated_text: Vicaranto, you are taller than yourself. Winning the countdown to the last game is a miracle!

original_en_text: You still here, bug not flea? Is rest I need before I leave for caravan. Not chat. You feel trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again at the caravan, amongst your fellows.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就去找旅团。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们旅团再见。
translated_text: 你还在这里吗 ？昆虫不是跳蚤吗？我们需要在去大篷车之前休息一下 ， 没有猫 ， 他们认为有问题 ， 所以他切断了外壳。<hpage>“好吧 ， 夫人 ， 我得走了。在旅途中 ， 保持静止。我想在车上见你。
secondary_translated_text: Are you still here? Aren't insects fleas? We needed to rest before going to the caravan, there were no cats, and they thought there was a problem, so he cut off the shell.<hpage>"Well, madam, I have to go. Stay still during the journey. I want to see you in the car.

original_en_text: Ah, of course. Perhaps you will be trying one of the other games?
original_zh_text: 啊，好的，想玩其他游戏吗？
translated_text: 为什么不试试另一个游戏呢 ？
secondary_translated_text: Why not try another game?

original_en_text: Grrr... bug not flea. Still wishing for knowings of my work? But you hold no map to mark! Until a map is owned, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，还惦记我的情报？但你连地图都没有！先弄到地图再来。
translated_text: 是的 ， 是的 ， 是的 ... ...昆虫不是跳蚤 ， 你知道它们是什么吗 ？我没有文件要写！在地图创建之前 ， 几乎什么都没有。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, yes, yes... ... Insects are not fleas, do you know what they are? I have no papers to write! Before the map was created, there was almost nothing.

original_en_text: Thank you. Thank you! I’ll treasure these sweet-smelling rosaries dearly! Now, don’t be shy. Step inside!
original_zh_text: 多谢惠顾！这些香香的念珠我会珍藏的！别害羞，快请进！
translated_text: 再次谢谢！“我对这种香味很感兴趣。请不要害羞。
secondary_translated_text: Thanks again! "I am very interested in this fragrance. Please don't be shy.

original_en_text: Vikna! My dear one, my dancer, the game has ended and you have proven yourself the champion!<page>None can best your score. You have shamed us all with your fearsome grace! But you will keep playing for me, yes?<page>The end of the world need not be a lonely thing... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，我的亲爱的舞王！你已加冕冠军！<page>无法超越的优雅身姿！但你还会继续玩吧？<page>末日狂欢可不该独自度过，嘿嘿……
translated_text: 亲爱的丹卡诺 ， 比赛结束了 ， 你证明了自己是冠军！<page>你以可怕的恩典得罪了我们所有人！“你愿意为我工作吗？” 真的？<page>世界末日不是一个单一的事件。是的 ， 对。
