secondary_translated_text: Dear Dancano, the game is over and you have proved yourself a champion!<page>You have offended us all with your terrible grace! "Would you like to work for me?" Really?<page>The end of the world is not a single event. Yes, right.

original_en_text: Excellent, excellent! Let us make preparations and be off without delay! Rouse yourself fleas, for the caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 太好了！即刻整装出发！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: 很勇敢！勇敢的人！干得好！干得好！干得好！干得好！干得好！准备好了 ， 现在走吧！把你的车放进卡车里休息吧！
secondary_translated_text: Very brave! Brave people! Well done! Well done! Well done! Well done! Well done! Ready, let's go now! Put your car in the truck and rest!

original_en_text: My dear, will you play Flea Bounce for me once more? Leap up and bounce on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，再玩一次蹦蹦游戏嘛！只需跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: 亲爱的 ， 你能把它从跳蚤身上拿出来吗 ？尽可能多地下载 ， 然后跳到跳蚤！
secondary_translated_text: Honey, can you get it off the flea? Download as many as you can, and then jump to Flea!

original_en_text: Say you dodeshna to the new flea sitting there? Is quiet one, but is very good at games!<page>Have no worry for him, Grishkin will look after. Will fill him with brew and meet him to all the other fleas.
original_zh_text: 看见新来的安静跳蚤没？他玩游戏可厉害了！<page>别担心，格里什琴会照顾他的。先灌他药酿再介绍给大家！
translated_text: 假设你对新的 Dodeshna 芯片是正确的。一个安静的游戏 ， 但非常好！<page>“别担心 ， 我会照顾你。他把啤酒倒满 ， 看着其他跳蚤。
secondary_translated_text: Suppose you are right about the new Dodeshna chip. A quiet game, but very good!<page>"Don't worry, I will take care of you. He filled the beer and looked at the other fleas.

original_en_text: Here we shall remain, for a time, Miss Hornet, and pray that more lost fleas find their way to us.<hpage>What others I encounter, I shall send your way, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 我们会暂驻此地，祈祷更多迷途同胞能够找来。<hpage>如果在路上遇到跳蚤，我会让他们来找你。
translated_text: 大黄蜂夫人 ， 我们可以在这里呆一会儿 ， 我祈祷其他迷路的跳蚤能找到他们的路。<hpage>当我遇到其他人时 ， 我会把他们带到主人努米那里。"
secondary_translated_text: Lady Bumblebee, we can stay here for a while, and I pray that the other stray fleas will find their way.<hpage>When I meet other people, I take them to my owner Numi. "

translated_text: 想要跳蚤啤酒吗？
secondary_translated_text: Want a flea beer?

translated_text: 原名 ： Boundback
secondary_translated_text: Original name: Boundback

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure, which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>Ahh, and so happy too have you made we fleas!<page>I would be honoured to bestow one final gift unto you, Miss Hornet, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past. May it mark you forever as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我向来独来独往，但与你们相遇也令我感到暖心。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也高兴得很！<page>请允许我献上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>好的 ， 伙计们。我走进了这片土地的深处。无论我走到哪里 ， 我都会遇到像你这样好奇的人。<hpage>Free 有一种不寻常的冒险欲望 ， 即使这种欲望不匹配 ， 也很有趣。<hpage>我已经习惯了独自旅行很长一段时间 ， 但我很高兴跟随您的旅程并分享我的进步。<page>我很高兴你送我鲜花。<page>“大黄蜂先生 ， 我很荣幸能成为光荣过去的跳蚤宝藏的最后一份礼物。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Okay, guys. I went deep into this land. No matter where I go, I always meet curious people like you.<hpage>Free has an unusual desire for adventure, and even if that desire doesn't match, it's interesting.<hpage>I have been used to traveling alone for a long time, but I am happy to follow your journey and share my progress.<page>I'm so glad you sent me flowers.<page>"Mr. Bumblebee, I am honored to be the last gift from the flea treasure of the glorious past. "

original_en_text: The spa is yours, dear guest! And always open for one so considerate and kindly as yourself... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 请享受温泉吧，亲爱的顾客！这里随时向您这样贴心又善良的客人开放，嘿嘿嘿……
translated_text: 亲爱的客人 ， SPA 中心是你的！永远对像你这样富有同情心和善良的人开放。是的 ， 对。
secondary_translated_text: Dear guests, the SPA center is yours! Always open to people like you who are compassionate and kind. Yes, right.

original_en_text: With luck, my dear, we will meet again when I have joined the flea caravan.<page>My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly to share with you when next we meet!
original_zh_text: 运气好的话，我们在旅团再见。<page>我的车厢里给你留了一份惊喜呢，下次见面再为你揭晓！
translated_text: 如果你幸运的话 ， 如果你加入了自由大篷车 ， 你会再次见到他们。<page>这辆车隐藏了一个秘密。下次我看到它 ， 我会和你分享。
secondary_translated_text: If you are lucky, if you join the Freedom Caravan, you will see them again.<page>This car hides a secret. Next time I see it, I will share it with you.

original_en_text: The pact is made then. Fellows! Steel yourself! It is time, it is time!
original_zh_text: 那么契约达成！伙计们！打起精神！时候到了，时候到了！
translated_text: 交易结束了 ， 孩子们。我强烈要求！现在是我独自一人的时候了。
secondary_translated_text: The deal is over, boys. I strongly demand! Now it's time for me to be alone.

original_en_text: This long lake... Space is much more big here. Finally I have some quiet from the little fleas.
original_zh_text: 这片湖……真宽敞。终于能躲开小跳蚤们清净会儿了。
translated_text: 这是一个很长的湖泊， 所以有更多的空间， 这样我就可以最终放松下来。
secondary_translated_text: It's a long lake, so there's more space so I can finally relax.

original_en_text: Ahh, that is a shame, but I understand. I’m sure our roads will cross each other soon enough.<page>And now, we must be off! Rouse yourself, fleas. The caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 唉，虽然遗憾，但能理解。相信我们很快会重逢的。<page>现在，我们该出发了！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: “对不起 ， 我们的路马上就到了。"<page>我们必须回去恢复 ， 弗洛伊德的大篷车又开始了！
secondary_translated_text: "Sorry, our road is almost there. "<page>We must go back and recover, Floyd's caravan is starting again!

original_en_text: The grand ceremony has ended, but still we play! Will you honour us with a display of Flea Juggle, Miss Grand Champion Hornet?
original_zh_text: 庆典虽已落幕，但游戏不止！冠军大人愿意赏脸继续玩跳蚤耍耍吗？
translated_text: 比赛结束了 ， 但是我们还在玩。“大黄蜂小姐 ， 我可以看看获胜者的跳蚤浴室吗 ？ ”"
secondary_translated_text: The game is over, but we are still playing. "Miss Bumblebee, can I see the winner's flea bathroom?”"

original_en_text: Wonderful! Wonderful! The fleas will be overjoyed to share this next journey with our favoured companion! Let us away!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会因为有贵客同行而欢欣雀跃！我们这就出发！
translated_text: 他们是伟大的。这太不可思议了！我们期待着与我们亲爱的朋友分享我们的下一次旅行！快点 ， 快点！他在那儿！“
secondary_translated_text: They are great. This is unbelievable! We look forward to sharing our next trip with our dear friends! Come on, come on! There he is!“

original_en_text: Mamashka! Let our beautiful game begin! Flea Bounce!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！蹦蹦游戏开始！
translated_text: 恭喜你 ， 妈妈！好游戏开始了！自由弹跳
secondary_translated_text: Congratulations, Mom! Good game begins! Free bounce

original_en_text: <hpage>Unfortunately not, Fleamaster. I have visited many of this kingdom’s caves, and none would offer the safety and space you require.<hpage>If ever I come upon such a place, I will let you know.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，并没有。我去过的洞窟都不符合你们的需求。<hpage>但若将来遇到，肯定前来告诉你们。
translated_text: <hpage>他是飞行员！我参观了王国的许多洞穴 ， 但没有一个能为您提供所需的安全和空间。<hpage>如果我来到这样的地方 ， 我会告诉你的。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>He's a pilot! I have visited many caves in the kingdom, but none of them can provide you with the security and space you need.<hpage>If I came to a place like this, I would tell you.

translated_text: 箭头。
secondary_translated_text: Arrow.

original_en_text: How do you like our festival, Miss Hornet? While the world crumbles around us, we will laugh and dance and frolick!<page>Make merry with us, and play some of the games of old!<hpage>My time is slim, Fleamaster. If I am to join your games, know it will be only to hone my skills for the greater trial I must soon face below.<page>Of course! Of course! Joy or learnings! Any reason is fine by us, Miss Hornet!<page>And look here, we have Flea Juggle, where the challenge is to strike fleas upwards and keep them airborne for as long as possible.<page>To have our treasured guest challenge this humble game would be an honour for us, truly!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐觉得我们的庆典如何？就算外面世界崩塌，我们照样欢欣起舞！<page>开心点，来陪我们玩玩老游戏吧！<hpage>我时间紧迫。参加游戏只是为了磨练技艺，应对接下来的恶战。<page>都行都行！不管是玩乐或修行都可以！<page>看这里，这是跳蚤耍耍——把跳蚤打上天，滞空越久越好！<page>贵客肯赏脸挑战，我们荣幸之至！
translated_text: “霍尼特小姐 ， 怎么回事 ？ ”” 你觉得我们的假期吗？当世界在我们周围崩溃时 ， 我们在笑 ， 跳舞 ， 玩耍！<page>来玩得开心 ， 玩一些老游戏吧！<hpage>如果我是你的游戏的一部分 ， 我会磨练我的技能 ， 以应对你所面临的最大挑战。<page>当然了！当然了！快乐就是学习！” 无论如何， 夫人 Hornet 。"<page>这就是跳蚤的作用所在 ， 任务是让跳蚤尽可能长时间地飞行。<page>我们很荣幸地欢迎我们尊贵的客人参加这次卑微的会议。
secondary_translated_text: "Miss Honeyit, what's going on? "Do you think our vacation? When the world collapses around us, we laugh, dance, and play!<page>Come and have fun and play some old games!<hpage>If I were part of your game, I would hone my skills to meet the biggest challenges you face.<page>Of course! Of course! Happiness is learning!" Anyway, Mrs. Hornet. "<page>That's what fleas are for, and the task is to keep the fleas flying for as long as possible.<page>We are honored to welcome our distinguished guest to this humble meeting.

original_en_text: A mistake, treasured guest! Never again! Ohhh. Never again!
original_zh_text: 一场误会啊贵客！绝不再犯！我保证！
translated_text: “亲爱的客人 ， 这是一个错误。
secondary_translated_text: "Dear guests, this was a mistake.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Amongst all of your troupe, I had little doubt you would survive to reach this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Bug not flea! Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, share them with me. I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>My learnings? Not free for you, bug not flea. Rosaries! Give those and I shall say of what I have sensed. Work like mine... much long, and hard. For that, I deserve some riches held.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。你能平安到达这里倒是不令我意外。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>我的发现？外族虫，不白给，拿念珠来！我这行当又苦又累，理应拿点报酬。
translated_text: <hpage>为巴黎干杯。有了你的团队 ， 我毫不怀疑你会加入这个团队。<hpage>你需要做什么工作才能以这种可怕的方式离开你的朋友 ？<page>虫子不是跳蚤 ， 而是跳蚤。在矿井后面 ， 有一辆卡车 ， 一种气味 ， 一种强烈的感觉。找到我们的跳蚤朋友 ， 最年轻的跳蚤 ， 让我们抓住他们 ， 让他们变得更强壮。<hpage>如果您找到另一个跳蚤的地方 ， 请与我分享 ， 它们可以安全地在大篷车中运输。<page>在我的研究中？它对你来说不是免费的 ， 错误也不是一种耻辱。考虑到这一点 ， 我想分享我的感受。就像我一样 ， 很多。这就是他们需要财富的原因。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Here's to Paris. With your team, I have no doubt that you will join this team.<hpage>What work do you need to do to leave your friends in this horrific way?<page>Insects are not fleas, they are fleas. Behind the mine, there is a truck, a smell, a strong feeling. Find our flea friends, the youngest flea, and let us catch them and make them stronger.<hpage>If you find another place for fleas, please share with me, they can be safely transported in caravans.<page>In my research? It's not free for you, and mistakes are not a shame. With this in mind, I want to share my feelings. Just like me, a lot. This is why they need wealth.

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company.<page>But, oh! The world has grown so dangerous, and there may be more lost fleas out there. I do so hope they can find their way to us!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>如今外面更凶险了，可能还有其他流落的同胞。真希望他们能找到我们！
translated_text: 有这么多迷路的跳蚤来了 ， 我没想到会有这么大的公司。<page>妈妈 ， 哦 ， 世界是危险的 ， 更多的跳蚤消失。
secondary_translated_text: With so many lost fleas coming, I didn't expect such a big company.<page>Mom, oh, the world is dangerous, more fleas are disappearing.

original_en_text: We fleas are all gathered, but now the world has loudly marked its ending! As great as our numbers grew, it seems our caravan will be the last.<page>There is only one thing left to do... but the preparations require time. If your travels wind their way back to us, dear friend, you yourself are welcome to participate...
original_zh_text: 跳蚤们虽已团聚，但世界即将毁灭！恐怕我们是最后的旅团了…….<page>只剩最后一事可做……但需时间准备。亲爱的朋友，如果再来，欢迎参与……
translated_text: 蠕虫们聚集在一起 ， 但现在世界正在接近终结。球队的数量越来越多 ， 但我认为我们的球队是最后一个。<page>我们只有一件事要做 ， 但我们需要时间来准备。亲爱的朋友们 ， 我们请您在旅行回来时亲自加入我们。
secondary_translated_text: The worms are gathered, but now the world is coming to an end. There are more and more teams, but I think our team is the last one.<page>We only have one thing to do, but we need time to prepare. Dear friends, we ask you to join us in person when you return from your trip.

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, I must tell, we’ve seen evidence nearby of a hunter of our tribe, a flea that seeks fleas!<page>As pungent and gruff as their sort often are, they’re still useful to have around a caravan.<page>A flea of their rare skill, settled among us, could offer defence and more.<page>If you’re still to be helping grow our town, search them out, up atop the muck choked ducts.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！附近有我们族群的猎手出没的迹象，那是位专逮跳蚤的跳蚤！<page>虽然那家伙臭烘烘的又粗鲁，但对旅团很有用。<page>这样的好手要是能入伙，既能当护卫又有大用。<page>如果您还愿意帮忙壮大我们的旅团，就去腐殖渠上面找找吧！
translated_text: “大黄蜂小姐 ， 我看到证据表明 ， 我们部落的猎人正在寻找跳蚤。普拉加斯！<page>它们通常是辛辣和厚的 ， 但在大篷车周围仍然非常有用。<page>具有罕见能力的芯片被安装在我们中间 ， 提供防御等。<page>但是如果你想帮助城市发展 ， 看看那些被泥土堵塞的管道。
secondary_translated_text: "Miss Bumblebee, I see evidence that hunters in our tribe are looking for fleas. Pragas!<page>They are usually spicy and thick, but are still very useful around caravans.<page>Chips with rare capabilities are installed among us, providing defense and so on.<page>But if you want to help the city grow, look at the pipes blocked by mud.

original_en_text: A cauldron full of Flea Brew.
translated_text: 这是一个啤酒瓶。
secondary_translated_text: This is a beer bottle.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive safe to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine was to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together so strong they could grow.<page>A task once important, mine! But not now. All fleas are here, safe. A rare many! Time for toasts, and brew to fill our bellies!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我以前负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<page>这差事曾经很重要，但不需要了！现在大伙都齐了！该喝酒庆祝！
translated_text: <hpage>为巴黎干杯。在我们的许多同志中 ， 我们根本不担心火车是否安全。<hpage>你需要做什么工作才能以这种可怕的方式离开你的朋友 ？<page>我们的目标是通过指纹 ， 气味和敏感性来追踪它。找到最年轻的跳蚤 ， 让我们一起变得更强。<page>这是我的伟大工作！不是现在 ， 我知道。巴黎是安全的在这里. 是时候喝酒和填补你的胃酒！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Here's to Paris. Among many of our comrades, we are not worried at all about whether trains are safe.<hpage>What work do you need to do to leave your friends in this horrific way?<page>Our goal is to track it through fingerprints, smell and sensitivity. Find the youngest flea and let us become stronger together.<page>This is my great job! Not now, I know. Paris is safe here. It's time to drink and fill your stomach with wine!

original_en_text: Look here! All these lively fleas flocked to our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, our numbers grow grand. Mayhap, in time, we could grow to match even those caravans of our fabled past?<hpage>To see so many safe is a welcome sight, Fleamaster. Their playful cheer suggests you are a fine steward for the swelling troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 看！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。或许能重现当年先祖们的盛况？<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: 你必须看到这个！“这些活跃的跳蚤已经入侵了舰队。多亏了你和狩猎 ， 我们的人数越来越多。随着时间的推移 ， 你可以将它与过去的传说中的大篷车进行比较。<hpage>这是一件好事 ， 让许多人看起来很安全 ， Flex Master 。你有趣的掌声表明你是一家成长中的公司的优秀经理。<page>” 女孩， 你很漂亮。在角落里！我很幸运能有好朋友！<page>现在我得走了！这片土地已经是我们的主人很长一段时间了 ， 是时候去干燥的洞穴了！<page>“你是巴黎最好的朋友 ， 不是吗 ？ ”“你愿意陪我去下一次旅行吗？
secondary_translated_text: You must see this! "These active fleas have invaded the fleet. Thanks to you and hunting, our numbers are growing. Over time, you can compare it to legendary caravans of the past.<hpage>This is a good thing that makes many people seem safe, Flex Master. Your funny applause shows that you are a good manager of a growing company.<page>"Girl, you are beautiful. In the corner! I am lucky to have good friends!<page>Now I have to go! This land has been our owner for a long time, and it's time to go to the dry caves!<page>"You are Paris's best friend, aren't you? "" Would you like to accompany me on my next trip?

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended.<page>Bug not flea... impressive was your performance. Your score exceeds even my own.<page>To see skill so much, moments before everything ends, gives me unexpected joy.<page>Rishkiz... I congratulate you, champion.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。<page>虫子，你超越了我，没想到外族也有这种身手。<page>末日临近还能见识这般技艺，着实是意料之外的惊喜。<page>里什基兹……祝贺你，冠军。
translated_text: Wicker ： 审判已经结束。<page>虫子不是跳蚤 ， 而是跳蚤。他的表现令人印象深刻。” 你的分数高于我的。"<page>在过去的几分钟里 ， 我看到了很多技术 ， 并感受到了意想不到的喜悦。<page>恭喜你 ， 冠军！
secondary_translated_text: Wicker: The trial is over.<page>Insects are not fleas, they are fleas. His performance was impressive." Your score is higher than mine. "<page>In the past few minutes, I have seen a lot of technology and felt unexpected joy.<page>Congratulations, champion!

translated_text: ” 道奇说。
secondary_translated_text: "Dodge said.

original_en_text: Ahh, Miss Hornet! Greetings, and well met, once again!<page>The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! And now fate has brought us back together again... what a marvel!<hpage>It is good to see you safe, Fleamaster. The journey to this moor from the caverns below is long and dangerous.<page>Dangerous, certainly, but we fleas are born to roam!<page>And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 啊！大黄蜂小姐！又见面真是太好了！<page>长途跋涉到这但没丢一只跳蚤！命运也让我们重逢……真是奇迹！<hpage>旅团平安就好，从下方洞窟到这沼地，路上肯定充满危险。<page>确实有不少危险，但跳蚤天生爱流浪！<page>现在，您去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: “对不起 ， 霍恩先生。早上好 ， 再见！<page>我们走了很长的路 ， 但我们没有失去任何东西。这是一个神奇的命运 ， 让我们团结在一起。<hpage>从洞穴到沼泽地的旅程漫长而危险。<page>当然 ， 这很危险 ， 但跳蚤天生就是为了行走。<page>我必须去看看格里斯金 ， 他坐在锅炉旁边。经过漫长的旅程 ， 格里芬！
secondary_translated_text: "I'm sorry, Mr. Horn. Good morning, goodbye!<page>We have come a long way, but we have not lost anything. This is a magical destiny that unites us.<hpage>The journey from cave to swamp is long and dangerous.<page>Of course, it's dangerous, but fleas are born to walk.<page>I had to go and see Griskin, who was sitting next to the boiler. After a long journey, Griffin!

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave.<hpage>I have encountered several of your fellow fleas, united in a caravan. Perhaps you would consider joining with them?<hpage>Yours seems a hardy hide, and I fear alone they lack the strength to survive long in this land.<page>Caravan? Grrr. Felt it in my fur... Time for change. If caravan is close, then my task, these lands, may near be complete.<page>Now... Grrr. Much talk I gave. You leave me! Meet again at caravan, amongst good fellows. There I share my learnings of fleas and Pharloom. Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤。也不打算抢你山洞。<hpage>我在一个旅团见过你的同胞。为何不加入他们？<hpage>你看着有些本事，他们也缺少护卫。<page>旅团？吼……感觉到了……是时候了。旅团出发，我在这的活也要结束了。<page>唔……不废话了。你走吧！在旅团再见，到时告诉你跳蚤位置的情报。现在我要休息！
translated_text: Gollum 昆虫不是跳蚤。胜利是我的公平游戏。<hpage>” 不会很长时间， 小姐， 但我怀疑你是对的， 在这个洞穴。»<hpage>我在大篷车的一个隔离区遇见了他的同伴。<hpage>她的皮肤看起来很强壮 ， 但她自己没有能力在这个地球上长寿。<page>大篷车？哦 ， 天哪！“我感觉到它在我的皮肤上 ， 现在是改变的时候了。如果大篷车靠近 ， 我在地球上的使命可能已经接近完成。<page>现在是 ... ... Gollum ， 我们讲了很多故事。因为我在一个朋友的商队里 ， 我分享了我学到的关于跳蚤和法老的知识。现在我需要休息！bug 已经关闭。
secondary_translated_text: Gollum insects are not fleas. Winning is my fair game.<hpage>"Not for long, miss, but I suspect you are right, in this cave."<hpage>I met his companion in a quarantine area of the caravan.<hpage>Her skin looks strong, but she herself has no ability to live long on this earth.<page>Caravan? Oh, my God! "I feel it on my skin and now it's time for a change. If the caravan approaches, my mission on earth may be nearly completed.<page>Now is... ... Gollum, we told many stories. Because I was in a friend's caravan, I shared what I had learned about fleas and pharaohs. Now I need to rest! The bug has been closed.

original_en_text: Ohhhh! What other choice do we poor wretches have?! Cruel fate leaves us with only one last task...<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 唉！我们这些可怜虫别无选择！残酷的命运只留下这一最后任务……<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: 哦 ， 我的上帝！穷人会做出什么样的选择 ？艰难的生活终于结束了。<page>亲爱的朋友们 ， 黄蜂小姐 ， 我很抱歉 ， 但我有另一个给你。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God! What choices do poor people make? The difficult life is finally over.<page>Dear friends, Miss Wasp, I'm sorry, but I have another one for you.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>Miss Hornet, with your skill, I’m certain you could best all three of our games and become the grandest champion of them all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束！新的耍耍冠军诞生了！太强了！<page>以大黄蜂小姐的本事绝对能包揽我们三种游戏的冠军！
translated_text: 游戏结束了 ， 一艘新船出现了。这太不可思议了！<page>“大黄蜂小姐 ， 凭借你的天赋 ， 我相信你会成为我们三场比赛中最好的赢家 ， 也是所有比赛中最好的赢家。
secondary_translated_text: The game is over and a new ship appears. This is unbelievable!<page>"Miss Bumblebee, with your talent, I believe you will be the best winner of our three games and the best winner of all games.

original_en_text: My, what a sweet face now emerges from the darkness! Poor Kratt has been hiding here from those blackened beasts for too long, all alone!<hpage>The beasts and bugs ensnared by the black thread are dangerous indeed. You have done right to hide yourself from them, sir.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 哇，没想到黑暗中竟出现这样一张美丽的脸！可怜的克拉特独自在这躲避黑丝好久了。<hpage>受丝咒侵蚀的虫兽确实危险，你躲起来是对的。<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: 可怜的老鼠躲在这里很长一段时间 ， 远离黑色的野兽！<hpage>被困在黑线上的动物和昆虫非常危险。<hpage>我想这台金属机器是你的。<page>哦 ， 是的 ， 是的！“我加入了舰队 ， 对吧 ？ ”事实上？它是安全的， 对吧？我厌倦了独自冒险。<page>你...你认为我们会在那里见面吗？这台机器隐藏着一个秘密 ， 所以下次我看到它时 ， 我想和你分享。
secondary_translated_text: The poor mouse hid here for a long time, away from the black beasts!<hpage>Animals and insects trapped on the black line are very dangerous.<hpage>I think this metal machine is yours.<page>Oh, yes, yes! "I joined the fleet, right? "In fact? It's safe, right? I'm tired of taking risks alone.<page>you... Do you think we'll meet there? This machine hides a secret, so the next time I see it, I want to share it with you.

original_en_text: There are still many fleas for us to be united with though, and we’ve rested long enough. The caravan must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! I introduced myself earlier without ever asking for your own name. Forgive me! Please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<hpage>I still have a long journey ahead of me. If I come across any more fleas, I will assist where I am able.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing for me to hear!<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan must be away now, toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 虽然还有许多同胞未归，但我们休整太久了。旅团该向高处进发了！<page>哎呀我真是失礼！之前只顾自报家门，还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<hpage>我的旅途尚未结束，如果再遇见跳蚤，会尽力帮助他们的。<page>哎呀！这可太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: 然而 ， 我们仍然组装了许多芯片 ， 并得到了良好的休息。<page>我是多么的懒惰。我已经介绍了自己 ， 但我没有问他的名字 ， 我该叫他什么 ？<hpage>“你可以叫我 Bubbleby ， 弗雷大师。“很高兴看到你的坏朋友在你的舰队中是安全的。独自旅行是一个非常危险的国家。<hpage>我还有很长的路要走 ， 但如果我找到更多的跳蚤 ， 我会尽我所能。<page>他们走了！换句话说， 我不敢相信！我很高兴听到这个消息！"<page>“我亲爱的朋友们 ， 汉布尔比小姐 ， 我们的商队必须出发前往广阔的高原平原。
secondary_translated_text: However, we still assembled many chips and got a good rest.<page>How lazy I am. I have introduced myself, but I have not asked his name. What should I call him?<hpage>"You can call me Bubbleby, Master Frey. "It's good to see your bad friends are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a very dangerous country.<hpage>I still have a long way to go, but if I find more fleas, I will do my best.<page>They're gone! In other words, I can't believe it! I am so happy to hear this news! "<page>"My dear friends, Miss Hambleby, our caravan must set out for the vast plateau plains.

original_en_text: So many awful places have us fleas travelled. Many times I almost die. But here is seems safe enough.<page>You will have rest too? Is space enough for us all now... friend.
original_zh_text: 旅团闯过了多少险地，好几回我都差点死了。但这里似乎很安全。<page>你也留下休息吧，朋友？现在地方够大。
translated_text: 跳蚤去了可怕的地方 ， 有几次他们几乎死了 ， 但这个地方相当安全。<page>你也想休息一下吗？有足够的空间给我们所有人吗 ？我是你的。
secondary_translated_text: Fleas went to scary places and a few times they almost died, but the place was pretty safe.<page>Do you want to take a break too? Is there enough space for all of us? I am yours.

original_en_text: Welcome again, Miss Hornet! See how high our caravan has climbed, resting right on the doorstep of that mighty Citadel!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! We have seen the many husks in passing. A mighty luck must shine on us, to journey with such success.
original_zh_text: 欢迎您，大黄蜂小姐！看我们攀得多高啊，就在圣堡大门旁！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！沿途见到了无数空壳。我们定是受命运庇佑。
translated_text: 你好 ， 黄蜂小姐 ， 看看我们的大篷车已经爬了多高 ， 在一座强大的城堡门口停了下来！<hpage>幸运的是 ， 我所有的朋友都经历过这段漫长的旅程。在他旁边 ， 一棵树在他面前抓住 ， 杀死了无数的昆虫。<page>“你说得对 ， 风险越来越大。我们看到了很多软体动物 ， 所以我们很幸运能取得这样的成功。
secondary_translated_text: Hello, Miss Wasp, look how high our caravan has climbed and stopped at the gate of a powerful castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all my friends have gone through this long journey. Next to him, a tree grabbed in front of him, killing countless insects.<page>"You are right, the risks are getting bigger and bigger. We see a lot of mollusks, so we are lucky to have this kind of success.

original_en_text: Look, look! So many fleas have joined the caravan! What a miracle! We can not thank you enough for honouring our humble wish!
original_zh_text: 看呐！这么多跳蚤加入了旅团！真是奇迹！真不知该如何感激您实现愿望！
translated_text: 看看我！看看我！我们的团队里有很多人！这是个奇迹！谢谢你实现了我的小小愿望！
secondary_translated_text: Look at me! Look at me! There are many people in our team! This is a miracle! Thank you for fulfilling my little wish!

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You help find! And bring! Best we come together, we fleas all... now that times turn dark...
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......
translated_text: 如果你停下来 ， 昆虫不是跳蚤 ， 对吗 ？我们需要一个服务 ， 对吧 ？你在干什么？我听到并闻到了这些小东西 ， 并了解了很多关于失落的洞穴的位置。<page>请帮我找到他！你最好把他们都杀了 ， 时间会创造一个新的洞。
secondary_translated_text: If you stop, insects are not fleas, are they? We need a service, right? What are you doing? I heard and smelled these little things and learned a lot about the location of the lost cave.<page>Please help me find him! You better kill them all, time will create a new hole.

original_en_text: As you wish, sweet one. Shall we just rest here together on the shore of eternity instead?
original_zh_text: 如你所愿，甜心。要不就和我在这岸边静静地守望末日？
translated_text: 我们会在永恒的尽头再次相遇吗？
secondary_translated_text: Will we meet again at the end of eternity?

translated_text: 我可以去 SPA 吗？
secondary_translated_text: Can I go to the SPA?

original_en_text: Mamashka! I am saying, let the game begin! Flea Juggle!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！我是说，游戏开始！跳蚤耍耍！
translated_text: 恭喜你 ， 妈妈！让游戏开始吧！巴黎的陷阱！
secondary_translated_text: Congratulations, Mom! Let the game begin! The trap of Paris!

original_en_text: What a beautiful spot you’ve gifted us, Miss Hornet! Safe apart from the dark and death of the lands beside. A place for fleas to grow smart and strong.<page>Here we shall see our travels end, for in Pharloom there could be no finer place to settle.<hpage>I am glad the location suits, Fleamaster. It is a calming thing to know these many fleas may survive. Most bugs of Pharloom seem destined for far bleaker fates.<page>Indeed! A hopeful future awaits! And only because of yourself and your efforts. To commemorate our arrival, it would be my pleasure to perform a small service for you.<page>I have been learning to sew, and the little fleas have been gathering materials for me. I thought I could add an extra pocket to your tool pouch, to make your travels just a little easier.<page>A trifling favour, much less than you deserve, but still I hope it meets to your satisfaction!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐选的地方太好了！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: Gaunette 夫人， 给了我们一个宝贵的地方！这是一个跳蚤聪明而强壮的地方 ， 远离黑暗和死亡。<page>这个农场没有殖民地 ， 所以旅程就在这里结束。<hpage>我很高兴这是一个很好的地方， 娜娜。我很高兴跳蚤幸存了下来。大多数甲虫似乎有一个更悲惨的命运。<page>是的 ， 一个充满希望的未来只能通过你的努力等待。为了庆祝我们的到来 ， 我很高兴为您提供一个小服务。<page>她学会了缝纫 ， 跳蚤收集材料。您可以在行李中添加额外的口袋 ， 使您的旅行更轻松。<page>这比你应得的要少得多 ， 但我希望无论如何你都会满意。
secondary_translated_text: Mrs. Gaunette, gave us a precious place! This is a place where fleas are smart and strong, far away from darkness and death.<page>This farm has no colonies, so the journey ends here.<hpage>I'm so happy this is a great place, Nana. I am so happy that the flea survived. Most beetles seem to have a more tragic fate.<page>Yes, a promising future can only be awaited through your efforts. To celebrate our arrival, I am pleased to provide you with a small service.<page>She learned to sew and flea collect materials. You can add extra pockets to your luggage to make your travel easier.<page>It's much less than you deserve, but I hope you'll be satisfied no matter what.

original_en_text: My dear Flea Bounce champion, will you play with us again? Let us dance and fly above the waters until the world itself falls away!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的蹦蹦冠军，要再玩一次吗？在水面上飞舞直至世界崩塌吧！
translated_text: 亲爱的反弹冠军 ， 你想继续和我们一起玩吗 ？让我们在水面上跳舞和飞行 ， 直到世界消失。
secondary_translated_text: Dear rebound champion, do you want to continue playing with us? Let's dance and fly on the water until the world disappears.

original_en_text: Sweet one! What a delight to see you emerge from the horrible darkness now enveloping the world!<page>Poor Kratt feared he would have only his mangy fellow fleas for company at the end of everything. How kind of you to spend your last moments here with me!
original_zh_text: 甜心！没想到世界末日还能和你见面，真高兴！<page>可怜的克拉特本以为最后只能和脏跳蚤们作伴，多谢你在这最后时刻陪着我！
translated_text: 上帝啊 ， 我的爱！我很高兴我们逃离了笼罩整个世界的可怕的黑暗！<page>可怜的老鼠害怕他最终会成为肮脏的跳蚤的伴侣。我们很高兴我们一起度过了最后一分钟。
secondary_translated_text: God, my love! I'm so happy we escaped the terrible darkness that shrouded the entire world!<page>The poor mouse was afraid that he would end up being a companion to the dirty flea. We are so happy that we spent the last minute together.

translated_text: 关于 WASP
secondary_translated_text: About WASP

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan? I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh yes, indeed! And look here, they all have made their way to us! So many gathered, it seems a miracle. Our wishes granted before even your promise was known!
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地祈愿墙接下你的委托。你在召集跳蚤加入旅团？我在旅途中已经解救了许多跳蚤。<page>没错！看啊，它们全都归队了！我们的祈愿尚未传达，就已然实现，真是个奇迹！
translated_text: <hpage>火焰之主 ， 我收到了一个请求 ， 要求为朝圣地建造一堵愿望墙。在我的旅程中 ， 我遇到了许多人 ， 并释放了他们。<page>是的， 是的， 是的！大家都想来这里！真是奇迹啊 ， 这么多人聚在一起。我们的希望在承诺被承认之前就实现了！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Lord of Fire, I have received a request to build a wall of wishes for the pilgrimage site. During my journey, I met many people and released them.<page>Yes, yes, yes! Everyone wants to come here! It's a miracle that so many people got together. Our hope was realized before the promise was recognized!

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, but you can play again, as much you wish... until the end of the world comes for us all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！我是说，游戏结束，但随时可以重玩……直到世界末日！
translated_text: 游戏结束了 ， 但直到世界末日 ， 如果你愿意 ， 你可以再玩一次！
secondary_translated_text: The game is over, but until the end of the world, you can play it again if you want!

original_en_text: Stranger, will you hear my worry? The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>Would you, could you, help us find these poor, lost fleas? We daren’t continue our journey until some of the poor dears have found their way here to us!
original_zh_text: 旅者，愿意跟我聊聊么？我们跳蚤的祖辈曾相聚同行，现在我想是时候召集同胞了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>您……愿意帮忙寻找迷途的跳蚤们吗？同胞没有到齐我们不敢上路啊！
translated_text: 奇怪的是 ， 你听到我的担忧了吗 ？跳蚤 ， 像前几代人一样 ， 是时候找到彼此并一起旅行了。<page>王国的跳蚤包围着我们的大篷车 ， 但时代变得越来越危险。你也能听到 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？我妹妹躲起来了。"<page>你能帮我找到丢失的芯片吗？他们不敢继续他们的旅程 ， 直到他们被穷人的亲戚发现。
secondary_translated_text: Strangely enough, do you hear my concerns? Fleas, like previous generations, it's time to find each other and travel together.<page>The fleas of the kingdom surround our caravans, but times become increasingly dangerous. You can hear it too, can't you? Actually? My sister is hiding. "<page>Can you help me find the missing chip? They dared not continue their journey until they were discovered by relatives of the poor.

translated_text: 什么是免费大篷车？
secondary_translated_text: What is a free caravan?

original_en_text: Alas, Miss Hornet! Until our paths cross again, our dearest wishes go with you.<hpage>Safe travels to you and your troupe, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 那好吧，大黄蜂小姐！愿好运常伴您左右，下次再见！<hpage>也祝你们一路平安。
translated_text: 在我们的道路再次相遇之前 ， 我们与你同在 ， 胜过我们的心。<hpage>祝你和你的船员旅程愉快。
secondary_translated_text: Until our paths meet again, we are with you more than our hearts.<hpage>I wish you and your crew a pleasant journey.

original_en_text: And so the great ceremony has reached its climax and its grand champion has emerged!<page>Thank you for spending your last moments with us here, Miss Hornet.<page>Though the world will soon end, and our paradise will crumble, the memories of friendship we all shared shall surely echo through the oncoming void for all eternity!<hpage>Fleamaster, your sentiment is kind, but this world will not end.<page>Oh? How good of you to speak words of hope for our benefit, but we have accepted our fate. Come, let us forget the past and revel together!<hpage>It is not merely hope that I offer you, sir, but a promise. This kingdom’s suffering has a singular cause, and by my own claw will it be cleansed.<hpage>Perhaps not every flea will survive what is coming... but the world will not die, and your settlement may still see chance to prosper.<page>Ahh? You speak... with such conviction. But I cannot bring myself to hope such, I am sorry.<page>Come what may, we fleas will be here until the end. And the games will continue, of course! Celebrate with us for as long as you wish, dear friend.
original_zh_text: 加冕仪式结束，庆典高潮已过，总冠军诞生！<page>大黄蜂小姐，感谢您与我们共度最后的时光。<page>纵使世界即将毁灭，乐园即将倒塌，我们的友谊也会永存于虚空之间！<hpage>谢谢你，跳蚤首领。但世界不会终结的。<page>感谢您在这最后关头还给我们希望，但我们认命了。还是及时行乐吧！<hpage>我给的并非虚无缥缈的希望，而是承诺。纺络的苦难都有源头，而我一定会亲手将其终结。<hpage>或许不是所有跳蚤都能幸存……但只要世界不毁灭，旅团终将再次启程。<page>啊哈哈，您这话……信念坚定。但我已不敢奢望。<page>无论如何，跳蚤们会坚持到最后。游戏永不停止！您想在这里玩多久都行，朋友！
translated_text: 派对来了 ， 伟大的冠军来了！<page>谢谢你最后一次 ， 霍尼特小姐。<page>即使世界崩溃 ， 天堂崩溃 ， 友谊的记忆将永远在等待我们的空虚中回荡。<hpage>“火焰之主 ， 你的关系很好 ， 但世界不会结束。<page>你在干什么？真的吗？我们倾听希望的话语 ， 但我们接受命运。忘记过去 ， 玩得开心！<hpage>他们不仅给了我们希望 ， 也给了我们一个承诺。这个国家的苦难只有一个原因 ， 我会用我的指甲清除它。<hpage>然而 ， 世界不会死去 ， 殖民地仍然有机会繁荣。<page>这是什么 ？你在干什么？请用这种信念说话。我真的很抱歉 ， 我没有希望。<page>无论发生什么 ， 我们都会坚持到最后。当然 ， 游戏还在继续。亲爱的朋友们 ， 如果你愿意的话 ， 请加入我们的庆祝活动。
secondary_translated_text: The party is here, the great champion is here!<page>Thank you for the last time, Miss Honeyet.<page>Even if the world collapses and the heaven collapses, the memory of friendship will always echo in the emptiness that awaits us.<hpage>"Lord of Fire, you have a good relationship, but the world will not end.<page>What are you doing? Really? We listen to the words of hope, but we accept destiny. Forget the past and have fun!<hpage>They not only gave us hope, but also gave us a promise. There is only one reason for this country's suffering, and I will use my fingernails to clear it away.<hpage>However, the world will not die, and the colonies will still have a chance to prosper.<page>What is this? What are you doing? Please speak with this belief. I'm really sorry, I have no hope.<page>No matter what happens, we will persist until the end. Of course, the game continues. Dear friends, if you would like, please join us in our celebration.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，新的耍耍冠军诞生！太强了！<page>您已称霸所有跳蚤游戏！<page>是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: 游戏结束了 ， 一艘新船出现了。这太不可思议了！<page>你是我们赢得的每一场跳蚤锦标赛的冠军！<page>本届盛会的获奖者已经出来了。当然还有你！<page>闭幕式已经开始了。布洛克 ， 我准备好了。
secondary_translated_text: The game is over and a new ship appears. This is unbelievable!<page>You are the champion of every flea tournament we have won!<page>The winners of this grand event have already come out. And of course you!<page>The closing ceremony has already begun. Brock, I'm ready.

original_en_text: You not want my learnings, bug not flea? Rare it is we share such things with ones outside our own.
original_zh_text: 不想要我情报？我们可很少愿意和外族分享这些。
translated_text: 你知道昆虫不是跳蚤吗 ？我很少和别人分享。
secondary_translated_text: Did you know that insects are not fleas? I rarely share it with others.

translated_text: 游戏的竞争？
secondary_translated_text: Competition in games?

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, you are the greatest of us all in the Flea Juggle! But will you challenge yourself to ever higher achievements?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐是耍耍之王！要挑战更高记录吗？
translated_text: 黄蜂小姐 ， 你是最棒的跳蚤！您是否正在寻求更好的结果 ？
secondary_translated_text: Miss Wasp, you are the best flea! Are you looking for better results?

original_en_text: Dodeshna, stranger. You are looking a little... tired, is it? Unhealthy?<page>You can rest with us here, if wish. Is nice and dark, and warmth from below brings good health.<page>Still, you should make care not to stay much long. You are not flea, after all.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，旅者。你看着……有点累？<page>想休息可以留下。这儿又暗又暖，很适合休养。<page>但别待太久，毕竟你终究不是跳蚤。
translated_text: 陌生人 ： 累了吗 ？你在干什么？<page>阳光 ， 黑暗和炎热的天气会让你更健康。<page>但要注意不要呆太久。毕竟 ， 你不是跳蚤。
secondary_translated_text: Stranger: Are you tired? What are you doing?<page>Sun, darkness and hot weather will make you healthier.<page>But be careful not to stay too long. After all, you are not a flea.

original_en_text: You still here, bug? Is rest I need before I travel. Not chat. You is trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again in more hospitable surrounds.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就走。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们下次再见。
translated_text: “爸爸 ， 你在吗 ？ ”“在旅行之前 ， 你需要休息一下。猫很难把它从外壳里拉出来。<hpage>“好吧 ， 夫人 ， 我得走了。在旅途中要坚强。
secondary_translated_text: "Dad, are you there? "You need to rest before traveling. It is difficult for the cat to pull it out of its shell.<hpage>"Well, madam, I have to go. Be strong during the journey.

original_en_text: Look, Miss Hornet! See the many lively fleas that form our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, so many are here! And all are eager again to travel!<page>We had once wished to match the numbers of our fabled past, yet now, we may even have exceeded them!<hpage>It is a welcome sight, Fleamaster, and the playful cheer about the caravan suggests you are a fine steward to the troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 请看，大黄蜂小姐！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。大家都盼着再度启程！<page>我们曾奢望恢复传说中的旅团规模，而现在或许已经超越了传说！<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: ” 看看这个， 霍尼夫人。看看组成我们舰队的许多活跃跳蚤。谢谢孩子们！太多的人！每个人都想再次旅行。<page>我想追赶过去的传奇英雄 ， 但现在我可以击败他们。<hpage>“舰队大师 ” 是一个受欢迎的节目 ， 商队的欢呼声证明他已经达到了处理尸体的地步。<page>” 女孩， 你很漂亮。在角落里！我很幸运能有好朋友！<page>现在我得走了！这片土地已经是我们的主人很长一段时间了 ， 是时候去干燥的洞穴了！<page>“你是巴黎最好的朋友 ， 不是吗 ？ ”“你愿意陪我去下一次旅行吗？
secondary_translated_text: "Look at this, Mrs. Horney. Take a look at the many active fleas that make up our fleet. Thank you children! Too many people! Everyone wants to travel again.<page>I wanted to catch up with the legendary heroes of the past, but now I can defeat them.<hpage>"Fleet Master" was a popular show, and the cheers of the caravan proved that he had reached the point of disposing of corpses.<page>"Girl, you are beautiful. In the corner! I am lucky to have good friends!<page>Now I have to go! This land has been our owner for a long time, and it's time to go to the dry caves!<page>"You are Paris's best friend, aren't you? "" Would you like to accompany me on my next trip?

original_en_text: Marvellous! We fleas shall be overjoyed to have your company on the road.<page>Now! Our new home is calling. We must travel!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会为与你同行而欢呼！<page>现在！该向着新家进发了！
translated_text: 这太不可思议了！我们的俱乐部很高兴和你在一起。<page>来吧 ， 现在！它被称为新家 ， 你必须去旅行！
secondary_translated_text: This is unbelievable! Our club is happy to be with you.<page>Come on, now! It's called your new home and you have to travel!

original_en_text: I’m wonder at this land... Something heavy hangs above, like shadow. I’m hope the little fleas have not much danger here...
original_zh_text: 这地方不对劲……总觉得天上有黑影压着。但愿小家伙们别出事……
translated_text: 我对这片土地非常感兴趣。沉重的东西挂在那里， 像一个影子。希望你的小猫咪不会有危险。
secondary_translated_text: I am very interested in this land. Something heavy hangs there like a shadow. I hope your kitten is not in danger.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan?<page>Oh, yes! The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>But... do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help find the poor, lost fleas? Truly?
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地看到了你的祈愿。你要召集跳蚤加入旅团？<page>正是！跳蚤们该像祖辈那样聚首同行了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>但……您真的愿帮忙寻找我们迷途的同胞？当真？
translated_text: <hpage>火焰之主 ， 我收到了一个请求 ， 要求为朝圣地建造一堵愿望墙。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦 ， 是的！跳蚤 ， 像前几代人一样 ， 是时候找到彼此并一起旅行了。<page>王国的跳蚤包围着我们的大篷车 ， 但时代变得越来越危险。你也能听到 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？我妹妹躲起来了。"<page>更多 ... ...这是一个奇怪的故事， 你知道吗？您能帮我找回丢失的芯片吗 ？事实上？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Lord of Fire, I have received a request to build a wall of wishes for the pilgrimage site.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh, yes! Fleas, like previous generations, it's time to find each other and travel together.<page>The fleas of the kingdom surround our caravans, but times become increasingly dangerous. You can hear it too, can't you? Actually? My sister is hiding. "<page>more... ... This is a strange story, you know? Can you help me retrieve the lost chip? Actually?

original_en_text: That great vein of bells there... some of the fleas wanted to shelter inside, but I was not so sure. The whole creaking mass seems unstable! It makes me tremble!<hpage>You were wise not to head inside, Fleamaster. A silken curse has taken hold of the settlement within. Advise your fellows to avoid that place.<page>A curse, you say?! W-well then! Our thanks are owed again. I shall let all fleas know they must not venture closer.
original_zh_text: 那串巨钟……有些跳蚤想躲进去，但我总觉得不牢靠！看着就发颤！<hpage>不在里面扎营是明智之举。那里已被丝咒侵蚀，告诫同胞远离为妙。<page>丝咒？！那……那可要多谢提醒！我这就通知大伙别靠近。
translated_text: 一只发光的手表。有一些跳蚤试图躲在里面 ， 但它没有工作。声音是非常不稳定的。你在发抖！<hpage>” 普里莫尔斯先生， 请不要进来。丝绸的诅咒统治着这座城市。<page>你觉得这是诅咒吗？好吧 ， 好吧！好吧 ， 好吧！好吧！再次感谢您的帮助。“我警告你 ， 不要靠近所有的跳蚤。
secondary_translated_text: A glowing watch. Some fleas tried to hide inside, but it didn't work. The sound is very unstable. You are shaking!<hpage>"Mr. Primores, please don't come in. The curse of silk rules this city.<page>Do you think this is a curse? Okay, okay! Okay, okay! Okay! Thank you again for your help. "I warn you not to go near all fleas.

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended. Your score can be seen on the board beside me.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。成绩在我身旁的榜上。
translated_text: 这个过程已经完成 ， 您的帐户就在我旁边的桌子上。
secondary_translated_text: The process is complete and your account is on the table next to me.

original_en_text: Ah, miss! Course you’d be one to survive through all this! Capable as you seem and all. <page>It’s a sad thing, but I can’t say most folk down here’ve fared so fortunate. And our once fine camp below ain’t no longer safe for any bug, all crushed and consumed by this black calamity.<hpage>Nowhere is safe, sir, but I am glad you few remain. Know I shall work to fix this, as best I’m able.<page>Calming our raging world? That’s a lofty goal, miss. I’m not thinkin’ any one bug’d be able to stop these happenings, but it’s heartenin’ knowing you’ve still got fire enough to feel different.<page>Rest here with us, long as you like. A little company’s about the best thing we few’re wishin’ for now.
original_zh_text: 啊！小姐。就知道您能挺过来！看着就靠谱。<page>可惜底下多数虫没这运气。咱们的好营地也被黑灾碾碎吞没了，没一处安全。<hpage>无处安全，先生，但各位幸存值得庆幸。我必会竭力修补这残局。<page>平息这混乱世道？志向够远大的，小姐。我不信单凭一虫能办到，但您有这份心总是好的。<page>您想歇多久都行，眼下能期盼的也就是有个陪伴。
translated_text: 哦 ， 天哪！你是唯一能克服它的人！你很有能力。<page>我们下面的田野对昆虫不再友好 ， 所有的昆虫都被黑死病压碎和吞噬。<hpage>“没有安全的地方 ， 但我很高兴你很好。我们将尽最大努力解决这个问题 ” 。"<page>一个平静而愤怒的世界 — 我相信错误是不可避免的 ， 但我很高兴知道你仍然有足够的兴奋来改变事情。<page>如果你想在这里放松， 小企业是最好的， 我们可以期待在这个时候。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God! You are the only one who can overcome it! You are very capable.<page>The fields below us are no longer insect friendly, and all insects are crushed and swallowed by the Black Death.<hpage>"There is no safe place, but I'm glad you're okay. We will do our best to solve this problem." "<page>A calm and angry world-I believe mistakes are inevitable, but I'm glad to know you're still excited enough to change things.<page>If you want to relax here, small businesses are the best, and we can look forward to this time.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring supplies from the town of bells up above, to aid your camp and its residents.<page>Ah! Mighty thankful these folks’ll be. Most arrive here with nothin’ but their shell. Your delivery there’ll make things a little easier on ‘em.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我从钟心镇带来物资支援此营地和住民。<page>啊！大伙会感激不尽的。多数虫来到这时就剩个空壳，你这趟可算解了燃眉之急。
translated_text: <hpage>我从上贝尔带来了一些物资 ， 以帮助您的营地和居民。<page>是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！谢谢你 ， 谢谢大多数人只带着贝壳来这里。当你带着它 ， 事情变得更容易。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have brought some supplies from Oberbell to help your camp and residents.<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! Thank you, thank you for most people who come here with only shells. When you carry it, things get easier.

original_en_text: Mm. Mmm! Who is it? An intruder! Terrible! To interrupt a humble druid as they work!<hpage>I meant no intrusion, druid. The sound of your laughter drew me to investigate.<page>What? Laughter? No idea what you mean. Nonsense!
original_zh_text: 嗯。嗯嗯！谁在那儿？入侵者！可恶！竟敢打扰德鲁伊修行！<hpage>无心冒犯，德鲁伊。你的笑声引我前来探查。<page>什么？笑声？不知所云！荒唐！
translated_text: 哦 ， 天哪！是的 ， 是的！“你是谁？入侵！！！！可怕的是 ， 卑微的机器人的工作已经停止了！<hpage>机器人不想干扰他的笑声 ， 让我去调查。<page>这是什么 ？清洁 ？我不知道这是什么意思 ， 混蛋。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God! Yes, yes! "Who are you? Invasion!!! The scary thing is that the humble robot's work has stopped!<hpage>The robot didn't want to interfere with his laughter and asked me to investigate.<page>What is this? Clean? I don't know what that means, asshole.

original_en_text: May your travels bring you fortune, hunter. And may the Citadel come to fear your freedom in our land.
original_zh_text: 祝你一路顺风，猎手。愿圣堡因你在这片土地上行走而战栗。
translated_text: 猎人 ， 愿你的旅程带给你财富。
secondary_translated_text: Hunter, may your journey bring you wealth.

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, it’s you again. Please, no more talk of bells or travel. I’m trying to stay hidden.<hpage>I mean no intrusion, ma’am. Are you composing yourself here before you leave on your own journey?<page>Like all the others, my brothers and sisters who trudged off to die? No, I think I’ll linger here a little longer with my thoughts...
original_zh_text: 什……又是你啊。别提钟啊路啊的了，我正躲清净呢。<hpage>无意打扰，女士。是在为启程做准备？<page>像其他送死的兄弟姐妹一样？我看还是在这多琢磨会儿……
translated_text: 这是什么 ？你在干什么？我们不再谈论旅行和旅行 ， 她试图隐藏。<hpage>“别担心 ， 小姐 ， 你准备好了吗 ？ ”»<page>像其他人一样 ， 我的兄弟姐妹也惨死。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? We no longer talk about travel and travel, she tries to hide.<hpage>"Don't worry, miss, are you ready?”»<page>Like everyone else, my brothers and sisters died miserably.

original_en_text: Must be terrifying out there, beyond the settlement. Nothing but monsters and madness lurking in the darkness.<page>I’ve heard tales of a safe place, though. Just up above here, where the moss paints the stones green, there’s an old village. Bit of a holy place, apparently, well protected.<hpage>I’ve visited the settlement you speak of. It was built around a burial spire, corpse-home to an ancient Weaver.<hpage>It is hardly safe though. The terrain is treacherous, and predators prowl its commons. I advise you avoid that place.<page>Oh... I see. Of course. Nowhere is really free of danger, is it? That’s just the way for us pilgrims...
original_zh_text: 外面肯定很可怕，黑暗里潜伏着怪物与疯狂。<page>不过听说上面有安身所。青苔覆石的地方有古村，据说是受庇护的圣地。<hpage>我到过那村落。它围着一座葬仪尖塔而建，是古代织者的安息之所。<hpage>那里并不安全。地势险恶，又有掠食者出没，劝你最好避开。<page>唉……果然。没有真正安全之处。朝圣者命该如此。
translated_text: 在黑暗中 ， 你可能会遇到可怕的怪物或疯子。<page>再往前走一点 ， 有一个古老的村庄 ， 绿色的石头上沾满了苔藓。"<hpage>我们参观了一座建筑 ， 尸体是用旧织物建造的 ， 围绕着墓地的尖塔。<hpage>但这并不意味着它是安全的。地形继续生长 ， 捕食者进入公共空间。我们建议你避开这个地方。<page>是的 ， 对。到处都有危险 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？为朝圣者祈祷。
secondary_translated_text: In the dark, you may encounter scary monsters or lunatics.<page>A little further forward, there is an ancient village with green stones covered with moss. "<hpage>We visited a building where the bodies were built of old fabric and surrounded the steeple of the cemetery.<hpage>But that doesn't mean it's safe. The terrain continues to grow and predators move into public spaces. We recommend you avoid this place.<page>Yes, right. There are dangers everywhere, right? Actually? Pray for the pilgrims.

original_en_text: For though, as pilgrims, we aim our sights high and never waver from our path, the loss of a brother or sister still stops our trembling limbs in place.
original_zh_text: 纵然身为朝圣者需心志坚定，但手足殒命仍令我等颤足难行。
translated_text: 作为朝圣者 ， 我们的目标很高 ， 我们的旅程是坚不可摧的 ， 但失去我们的兄弟姐妹是令人震惊的。
secondary_translated_text: As pilgrims, our goals are high and our journey is indestructible, but the loss of our brothers and sisters is shocking.

original_en_text: Few are as foreign as you, hunter dear. Visit me when you care.<page>I’ll look forward to hearing how your steps might shake our world. Oho. Yes!
original_zh_text: 鲜少有虫如你这般，俏丽的异乡猎手。有空的话不妨再来。<page>我期待听到你的针刃撼动这片土地的那天。嚯，定会如此！
translated_text: 很少有外国人像你一样。<page>我迫不及待地想看到你的脚步震撼世界。
secondary_translated_text: There are few foreigners like you.<page>I can't wait to see your footsteps shake the world.

original_en_text: Ohh, the world trembles! But we can hear it... beating steady... beating free...
original_zh_text: 噢，大地战栗！但我们听见了……平稳的搏动……自由的搏动……
translated_text: 这个世界真可怕！我觉得天气很稳定 ， 所以我可以自由地跳舞。
secondary_translated_text: This world is terrible! I think the weather is stable, so I can dance freely.

original_en_text: Granter refuses! I understand. Granter is petty, evil. Misguided! When your mind clears, return here. Return here and grant my wish!
original_zh_text: 授愿者拒绝！我懂。授愿者小气，邪恶。误入歧途！待你清醒，再来此地。应我祈愿！
translated_text: 格兰特拒绝了。我认为格兰特错了。我搞错了。如果你有良心 ， 请回来。我在这里是为了实现你的愿望！“
secondary_translated_text: Grant refused. I think Grant was wrong. I made a mistake. If you have a conscience, please come back. I am here to fulfill your wish!“

original_en_text: Oh... you’ve come to hide down here too, then? ‘Tis a fearful world out there. If you can keep quiet, I don’t mind you joining me.<hpage>You’ve chosen a curious place to rest, ma’am. This pit of bells and the structure around it... they suggest a station for travel, though one long abandoned.<page>Aye. Rumours in the camp say these bells run throughout the lands, great veins of them, forged by our ancient kin.<page>And some even say bugs used to travel through them, in gilded carriages no less!<page>Surely such fanciful travel would be a sin for us pilgrims. We must walk and climb and crawl using only our own meagre claws... Only thus can we prove our devotion.
original_zh_text: 哦……这位小姐也来躲难？外头真是可怕。你不出声的话，可以一起躲藏。<hpage>女士，你选了个怪地方歇脚。这钟坑与周遭构造……似是废弃驿站。<page>是啊。营地传言说古虫铸就钟脉贯穿大地。<page>还有虫说以前能乘镀金车厢穿行其间！<page>这般奢靡行径对朝圣者可是大不敬！我们该用卑微虫爪攀爬跋涉……唯有如此方能证虔心。
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。你躲起来了吗？外面的世界是个可怕的地方。如果你停下来 ， 你就会和我在一起。<hpage>我选了一个奇怪的地方。时钟塔旁边的一座建筑被提议建造一座现在废弃的客运大楼。<page>是的 ， 在农村地区 ， 这些手表散落在地球上 ， 据说这些巨大的线条是由古代亲戚建造的。<page>昆虫在金色的马车上经过或行走。<page>对于我们朝圣者来说 ， 这种反复无常的旅程无疑是罪恶的。我们只需要用脚趾甲行走 ， 爬上去 ， 爬上去。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Are you hiding? The world out there is a terrible place. If you stop, you'll be with me.<hpage>I chose a strange place. A building next to the clock tower has been proposed to build a now-abandoned passenger terminal building.<page>Yes, in rural areas, these watches are scattered across the earth, and these huge lines are said to have been built by ancient relatives.<page>Insects pass by or walk on golden carriages.<page>For us pilgrims, this capricious journey is undoubtedly sinful. We just have to walk with our toenails, climb up, climb up.

original_en_text: Did you take a look at the wishwall? You might’ve noticed I added a cheeky little wish of my own.<page>Fair’s fair, I did build the thing. Seems like the kingdom should be granting my wish before anyone else’s.
original_zh_text: 看过许愿墙了？应该注意到我加的小私心了吧。<page>公平嘛，墙是我造的，圣堡该先实现我的愿望才对。
translated_text: 你见过欲望之墙吗 ？正如你所看到的 ， 我添加了一个小小的愿望。<page>老实说 ， 我认为我做到了。我的王国似乎满足了我的愿望。
secondary_translated_text: Have you ever seen the wall of desire? As you can see, I added a little wish.<page>To be honest, I think I did it. My kingdom seems to have fulfilled my wish.

original_en_text: You keep the berries to yourself? All for you? Mmm. Promise breaker! Promise breaker!
original_zh_text: 私藏莓果？全归你？嗯。背信者！背信者！
translated_text: 你有浆果吗 ？为了你的？哦 ， 天哪！叛徒！叛徒！
secondary_translated_text: Do you have berries? For yours? Oh, my God! Traitor! Traitor!

original_en_text: Never shared my name with you, did I? Awfully remiss of me.<page>It’s Pilby. Been nice spending time with you, miss.<hpage>Likewise, sir. It’s been some time since I had such ample opportunity for friendly conversation.<hpage>My name is Hornet. It is good to be properly acquainted at last.<page>Hornet, eh? Strong name, that. It certainly suits you, miss. Heh heh...
original_zh_text: 我还未说过姓名吧？真是失礼。<page>我叫皮尔比。和你相处很愉快，小姐。<hpage>我也是，先生。很久没有过友善交谈了。<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。幸会。<page>大黄蜂？好气魄的名字，和你很相配，哈哈……
translated_text: ” 你从来没有一个名字， 是吗？我太轻率了。<page>我很高兴能和你在一起。<hpage>另外 ， 我已经很久没有进行过友好的交谈了。<hpage>他们称之为炸弹。“我很高兴终于正式见面了。<page>黄蜂是真的吗 ？这是一个美丽的名字 ， 你会没事的 ， 女孩。是的 ， 对。
secondary_translated_text: "You never had a name, did you? I was too rash.<page>I am so happy to be with you.<hpage>Besides, it has been a long time since I had a friendly conversation.<hpage>They call it a bomb. "I'm very happy to finally meet officially.<page>Are wasps real? It's a beautiful name, you'll be okay, girl. Yes, right.

original_en_text: The Mossberries. Do you still hunt them, little you? My wish was granted, but clear now that more are needed! More!<page>Bring more Mossberries here. Mmm. Yes, we will trade. Precious rosaries for fresh berries!
original_zh_text: 苔莓。仍在猎取吗，小小虫？我祈愿已实现，但需要更多！更多！<page>带更多苔莓来。嗯。以念珠换鲜果！
translated_text: “小子 ， 你还在追我吗 ？ ”“我的愿望实现了 ， 但现在我想要更多！“这是可能的。<page>请给我一块摩丝。好吧 ， 我们做个交易。美丽的玫瑰和新鲜浆果！
secondary_translated_text: "Boy, are you still chasing me? "My wish came true, but now I want more! "It's possible.<page>Please give me a piece of mousse. All right, let's make a deal. Beautiful roses and fresh berries!

original_en_text: <hpage>As promised, druid, I have your berries. What is your need for such common fruits?<page>Common!? No. No... Special. Cherished. Only a druid knows it! The berries bright! For my wish. My wish so dear!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如约而至，德鲁伊。莓果在此。要这寻常果实有何用？<page>寻常！？不，不……特别。珍贵。只有德鲁伊知晓！莓果明艳！为我祈愿。珍贵祈愿！
translated_text: <hpage>确保机器人 ， 我已经采取了你的指纹 ， 你想从这些水果得到什么 ？"<page>什么是正常的？不 ， 我特别担心 ， 这是只有机器人知道的事情。浆果很大。我的愿望是宝贵的。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Make sure the robot, I've taken your fingerprints, what do you want from these fruits? "<page>What is normal? No, I'm particularly worried. This is something only robots know about. The berries are big. My wish is precious.

original_en_text: I’ll soon be making my way up to the great Citadel. As holy as I am with rosaries, I’m sure my path will not be an arduous one...
original_zh_text: 很快要上圣堡了。揣着这么多念珠，肯定能一路顺畅……
translated_text: 虽然我是一位念珠圣人 ， 但我相信我的旅程并不困难。
secondary_translated_text: Although I am a rosary saint, I believe my journey will not be difficult.

original_en_text: Oh! And you can’t be leavin’ without some reward for your work. Take these beads for labour.<page>Rosaries ain’t provin’ much use to us lot anymore, but hopefully you in all your journeyin’ can still put ‘em to use.
original_zh_text: 噢！您可不能白忙活。这些念珠当工钱收下吧。<page>念珠对我们这群家伙早没用了，但您四处奔波说不定还用得上。
translated_text: 哦 ， 我的上帝！如果你的工作不赚钱 ， 你就不能离开。<page>我不再使用玫瑰花 ， 但我希望我能在旅行中使用它们。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God! If your job doesn't make money, you can't leave.<page>I no longer use roses, but I wish I could use them while traveling.

original_en_text: You’re here, in here, so why did you send you? Hm? Did you hear my wish? Granter of wishes? You?<hpage>Granter of wishes?<page>Wishes, yes! My wish! I need fruits of the world, three little darlings. I need them, so I wish! Does the kingdom not send you, little you, to grant my desire?
original_zh_text: 你在此处，在此处，为何派你来？嗯？听到我的祈愿了？授愿者？是你？<hpage>授愿者？<page>祈愿，对！我的祈愿！我要这世间的三枚果实，小宝贝果实。我需要，所以祈愿！小小虫，王国没派你来满足我的祈愿？
translated_text: 走吧 ， 走吧 ， 好吗 ？你为什么派他来？你在干什么？你在干什么？你能感觉到我的愿望吗？你的愿望会实现吗 ？你是谁？你是谁？<hpage>你的愿望会实现吗 ？<page>我的希望 ， 是的 ， 我的愿望。你需要三个孩子才能结出世界的果实。” 我想要他们， 所以我想要他们。
secondary_translated_text: Let's go, let's go, okay? Why did you send him? What are you doing? What are you doing? Can you feel my wish? Will your wish come true? Who are you? Who are you?<hpage>Will your wish come true?<page>My hopes, yes, my wishes. You need three children to bear the fruits of the world." I want them, so I want them.

original_en_text: Your travels have taken you far, haven’t they? While I’m yet to even start my journey. Shameful behaviour for a pilgrim, really, to tarry here so long.<hpage>I see no shame in it, sir. Your life is your own, and need not be squandered at the ghostly call of the Citadel. Journey out for your own sake, or not at all.<page>Heh... you truly aren’t a pilgrim, that’s for certain. That’s blasphemy, spoken with friendly intentions or not.<page>And yet... I don’t recoil from what you say. Perhaps I’m not much of a pilgrim either.
original_zh_text: 你已去过许多地方，而我尚未启程。作为朝圣者却在此踌躇不前，实在可耻。<hpage>先生，我未见可耻之处。生命属于你，不必为了圣堡幽灵般的召唤虚掷。你可以为己而行，也可以就此止步。<page>呵……你确实不是朝圣者，这种亵渎之言，无论善意与否都不能说。<page>但……我不抗拒这话。或许我也不是合格的朝圣者。
translated_text: 这是一条漫长的路 ， 不是吗 ？你在干什么？我知道我的旅程还没有开始。很遗憾 ， 朝圣者可以呆这么久。<hpage>你的生命是你的 ， 不要召唤城堡的鬼魂来发送它。不要单独旅行或旅行<page>嘿 ， 哟！你不是一个朝圣者 ， 但你是一个朝圣者。如果这是真的 ， 那就是亵渎。<page>同时 ， 或 ... ...我不怕你说的话 ， 我不是朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: It's a long road, isn't it? What are you doing? I know my journey has not begun yet. It's a pity that pilgrims can stay for so long.<hpage>Your life is yours, do not call on the ghosts of the castle to send it. Don't travel alone or travel<page>Hey, yo! You are not a pilgrim, but you are a pilgrim. If this is true, it is blasphemy.<page>Simultaneously, or... ... I am not afraid of what you say. I am not a pilgrim.

original_en_text: This stone’s a beauty, isn’t it? They say it’ll help you gather up rosaries on the road ahead. You’ll come back and share some with me, won’t you?
original_zh_text: 这石头美极了吧？据说能助你在路上收集念珠。等你回来可要分我一些！
translated_text: 这块石头不是很漂亮吗？你在干什么？据说它将帮助你在通往未来的道路上收集玫瑰经。事实上？
secondary_translated_text: Isn't this stone beautiful? What are you doing? It is said to help you collect the rosary on your way to the future. Actually?

original_en_text: Ah, thank you for sharing, sister. For the honourable and steadfast Pilby, we will sing.
original_zh_text: 啊，多谢相告，姐妹。我们将为坚定可敬的皮尔比歌唱。
translated_text: 谢谢你的分享 ， 我们为姐妹们的荣耀和坚强的比利唱歌。
secondary_translated_text: Thank you for sharing, we sing for the glory of our sisters and the strong Billy.

original_en_text: Mmm. You can hear it, yes? Listen close. Weak, but precious. A pulse, a beat! Faint... Our very own...
original_zh_text: 嗯。听见了吗？……细听。微弱，但珍贵。搏动，节拍！但渐弱……吾等独有的……
translated_text: 哦 ， 天哪！“你听到了 ， 对吧 ？ ”真的吗？它看起来很脆弱 ， 但值得。我甚至失去了良心。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God! "You heard that, didn't you? "Really? It may seem fragile, but it is worth it. I even lost my conscience.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries filling your pockets? I can string ‘em up safe, so you won’t go losing them. Might seem a simple art, but it takes some talent to keep ‘em properly secure.
original_zh_text: 兜里念珠装满了？我可将其编织成串以防遗失。这手艺看着简单，没点天赋可编不牢靠。
translated_text: 你口袋里有玫瑰花吗 ？这可能看起来像是一门简单的艺术 ， 但它需要人才来保护它们的安全。
secondary_translated_text: Do you have roses in your pocket? This may seem like a simple art, but it requires talent to keep them safe.

original_en_text: Hm? I recognise you. You’ve returned to the camp, then? Are you a pilgrim, or just a wanderer?<hpage>I am no pilgrim, sir, though I have travelled their paths.<page>Not a pilgrim? Well, it makes no difference, I suppose. We all must walk the roads, up and up, though most of us will fall long before we see the grand gates.<page>If you’re wise, you’ll stop here and rest a while before heading back out into that dangerous world...
original_zh_text: 嗯？我认得你。重返营地了？是朝圣者还是流浪者？<hpage>我并非朝圣者，先生，但走过他们路途。<page>不是？也罢。众生皆须行路攀爬，但大多未睹圣门便殒命。<page>你若明智，再入险地前应该在此休整……
translated_text: 这是什么 ？你在干什么？我知道你是谁 ， 我知道。” 回到营地吗？“你是朝圣者吗 ？ ”“你是外国人吗 ？ ”»<hpage>我不是一个朝圣者 ， 但我在他的路上。<page>你不是朝圣者吗 ？“我们都必须沿着这条路走 ， 但我们大多数人在看到美丽的大门之前摔倒了。<page>如果你是明智的 ， 停在这里 ， 你会休息一下 ， 然后你会回到这个危险的世界。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? I know who you are, I know." Back to camp? "Are you a pilgrim? "Are you a foreigner?”»<hpage>I am not a pilgrim, but I am on his way.<page>Aren't you a pilgrim? "We all had to follow this road, but most of us fell before we saw the beautiful gate.<page>If you are wise, stop here, you will rest, and then you will return to this dangerous world.

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! Yes, fragrant and round. So round! For you, you who finds berries, a nice reward of rosaries!
original_zh_text: 嗯，珍果！芬芳饱满，如此圆润！给你，寻果者，念珠回报！
translated_text: 这是一种美丽的圆形水果 ， 有芳香的气味。这轮！对于那些寻找水果的人来说 ， 玫瑰经是一个巨大的奖励！
secondary_translated_text: This is a beautiful round fruit with a fragrant smell. This round! For those looking for fruit, the Rosary is a huge reward!

original_en_text: O-oh! Traveller! Destined for the Citadel, yes? Well, before you embark, won’t you stop and make trade with an old pilgrim?<hpage>I’d see your wares, madam, though I fear I may have nothing worthy to offer in return.<page>Oh, worry not! If you lack fine goods to trade, we can barter still. In this devout land, we deal in the currency of faith!<page>Rosaries! Those finely carved beads of prayer! If you will only share some with me, I will trade you something fair.
original_zh_text: 噢！旅者！要上圣堡吧？启程前不如和我这个老朝圣者做笔生意？<hpage>我确实想看看货品，女士，但恐怕没有等价之物。<page>没事！没有等价货物，仍可交易。虔信之地，信仰就是通货！<page>我是说念珠！为祈祷精雕细琢的念珠！要是愿意分享，我肯定给与公道的报酬。
translated_text: 哦 ， 我的上帝！旅行者！这是一个名字， 不是吗？这是什么 ？现在 ， 他们为什么在离开之前没有与古代朝圣者达成协议 ？<hpage>我想看看你的产品 ， 但我可能没有任何东西可以退货。<page>别担心 ， 伙计！总有一个高质量的产品市场 ， 你没有。在这个宗教王国里 ， 我们交换信仰的硬币！<page>Rosalie！美丽的玫瑰雕塑如果你想和我分享 ， 我会给你正确的。"
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God! Traveler! It's a name, isn't it? What is this? Now, why didn't they reach an agreement with the ancient pilgrims before leaving?<hpage>I want to see your products, but I may not have anything to return.<page>don't worry, man! There is always a market for high-quality products that you don't have. In this religious kingdom, we exchange coins of faith!<page>Rosalie! Beautiful rose sculpture If you want to share it with me, I will give you the right one. "

original_en_text: Seems like just a key, but who knows what it’ll unlock? I reckon it’s come from the Citadel, so it must open the way to something holy!
original_zh_text: 看着是把普通钥匙，说不定能打开什么？这东西肯定是来自圣堡的，所以肯定也能开启通往圣物的道路！
translated_text: 它可能看起来像一把简单的钥匙 ， 但你永远不知道什么可以打开它。我相信我是从城堡里来的 ， 所以我必须去圣地！
secondary_translated_text: It may seem like a simple key, but you never know what will open it. I believe I come from the castle, so I must go to the Holy Land!

original_en_text: A rare find, this. Shinier than faith and harder than a Craggler’s hide. A skilled craftsbug could fashion something nice out of it, if they’ve got the knowledge.
original_zh_text: 这可是稀罕物。比信仰耀眼，比岩甲坚硬。要是有个懂得门道的巧匠，就能将其打造成宝物。
translated_text: 这是一个不寻常的发现 ， 它比信仰更轻 ， 比追逐者的皮肤更坚硬。有了这些知识 ， 经验丰富的宇航员可以做到这一点。
secondary_translated_text: This is an unusual finding, lighter than faith and harder than the skin of the chaser. With this knowledge, experienced astronauts can do this.

original_en_text: For comin’ all this way, take a few beads. You’ve well earned ‘em.
original_zh_text: 大老远跑来，拿几颗念珠走吧，这是你应得的。
translated_text: 在路上捡一颗珍珠。
secondary_translated_text: Pick up a pearl on the road.

original_en_text: <hpage>Druid, I require a pitcher of your Mossberry Stew to satiate a gourmand of the Citadel. Will you pass some to me?<page>Mmmm! A bug who’ll consume my berry brew? Strong they’d be to bear a taste so sharp!<page>Here is a flavour so ripe! Searing! Flavour of pleasure and pain! They too may see the visions if they taste it strong. The visions, could they see?<page>Grant the stew! For your bug, mmmm... to share the visions. Yes! We shall pass it!
original_zh_text: <hpage>德鲁伊，我需要一些苔莓浓汤满足圣堡饕客。可否分享？<page>嗯嗯！有虫愿意喝我的莓酿？肯定是强者才能接受这等烈味！<page>这风味！炽烈！痛楚与愉悦交织！多喝可见幻象。他们能见得到吗？<page>拿好！给你那虫……分享幻象。对！应当分享！
translated_text: <hpage>你需要一锅干鸽子在城堡里。我能做点什么来帮助你吗？<page>哦！哦！昆虫会吃水果吗 ？你必须强壮才能忍受这么强烈的气味。<page>他很有钱 ， 他被烧死了。享受与悲伤的味道。如果你喜欢它的味道 ， 看看这些地方。你看到一个愿景吗？<page>为死人干杯。是的 ， 我们有一个共同的愿景。哦 ， 是的！他们在路上！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You need a pot of dried pigeons in the castle. What can I do to help you?<page>Oh! Oh! Can insects eat fruit? You have to be strong to endure such a strong smell.<page>He was rich, and he was burned to death. The taste of happiness and sadness. If you like the taste, check out these places. Do you see a vision?<page>Here's to the dead. Yes, we have a common vision. Oh, yes! They're on the road!

original_en_text: Ahhh! Ahhh-ohhhh! The smell again! Stronger, stronger now! But still young yet! Listen to your sisters, little one, and grow! Oh, grow!
original_zh_text: 啊啊！啊——噢！气息再现！浓烈！但仍稚嫩！聆听你的姐妹之声，小家伙，生长吧！啊，生长！
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！我又感觉到了！坚强点 ， 坚强点！他们还很年轻！听着 ， 亲爱的 ， 醒醒！“成长！
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! I feel it again! Be strong, be strong! They are still very young! Listen, honey, wake up! "Growth!

original_en_text: Oh... mmm. Do they hurt you also, the visions? The stink? Nasty, horrible fruits. The pain!<page>Enough berries. We need no more. For you though, my one and only friend. My beloved. A reward!<page>Your amulet. Let me... transfuse. Yes. Your amulet’s tears will flow stronger still!
original_zh_text: 噢……嗯。幻象可有伤你？腐臭味？是秽果，可憎。痛楚！<page>莓果已足够，无需更多。但为你，我唯一挚友。馈赠！<page>你的护符。让我……灌注。嗯，护符的眼泪将更加汹涌！
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 天哪！“你伤害了他的意见吗 ？ ”气味？令人厌恶和可怕的水果但它伤害！<page>贝瑞很好。” 我不需要你， 我的朋友。轻盈的奖励！<page>他们将是你的保护者。输血 ： 是的 ， 你的捍卫者会流出更多的眼泪！
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, my God! "Did you hurt his opinion? "Smell? Disgusting and terrible fruit but it hurts!<page>Berry is fine." I don't need you, my friend. A light reward!<page>They will be your protectors. Blood transfusion: Yes, your defenders will shed more tears!

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! So precious! And perhaps now, we have enough. Enough, enough! For our work often begins, but never ends!
original_zh_text: 嗯，珍果！如此珍稀！或许……已足够。足够，够了！大业常启，但无终时！
translated_text: 水果非常珍贵。也许这已经足够了。够了， 够了！我们的工作经常开始 ， 但永远不会结束。
secondary_translated_text: Fruit is very precious. Maybe this is enough. Enough, enough! Our work often begins, but never ends.

original_en_text: Ah, hello again! What a blessing to see a familiar face on this treacherous climb.<hpage>Greetings, sir. I see you have begun your pilgrimage, or else set out for your own sake. Either way, I am glad to see you here unharmed.<page>Not quite unharmed... I’ve suffered my share of scrapes and burns. That’s just the nature of the journey, I suppose.<page>But I’ve seen so much! Great metal structures and vast scorched fields! The grandeur of it all is humbling indeed, even for one like me who was so humble to begin with.<page>I’ll rest here just a little longer before resuming my climb.
original_zh_text: 啊，又见面了！能在这险途中看到熟面孔，感谢圣堡庇佑。<hpage>幸会，先生。见你安然无恙，无论为了朝圣，抑或是为了自己，我都感到欣慰。<page>倒也不是安然无恙。多少有些小伤，攀登之路上难免擦碰。<page>但这一路真是大开眼界！巨型造物、焦黑旷野，宏伟又令人敬畏！<page>我打算休息片刻就继续攀登。
translated_text: 哦 ， 我们见面了！“我很幸运能在这个危险的攀登中看到熟悉的面孔。<hpage>您好 ， 医生 ， 我见过他去朝圣或独自去。<page>但这并不意味着她是完全无辜的。他也被烧毁和烧毁。<page>你看到太多了！巨大的金属结构和巨大的粘土。即使对于像我这样从一开始就很谦卑的人来说 ， 这种伟大也是非常谦卑的。<page>我们将在这里休息 ， 继续上升。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, we meet! "I was lucky to see familiar faces on this dangerous climb.<hpage>Hello, doctor, I have seen him go on a pilgrimage or alone.<page>But that doesn't mean she's completely innocent. He was also burned and burned.<page>You see too much! Huge metal structures and huge clay. Even for someone like me who has been humble from the beginning, this greatness is very humble.<page>We will rest here and continue to rise.

original_en_text: Mmm! Mmm! This is them, the precious, promised fruits!<page>Drop them in, there they go, and now at last we can begin!
original_zh_text: 嗯嗯！嗯嗯！就是它们，许诺的珍果！<page>投入其中，终于……可以开始！
translated_text: 哦！哦！噢 ， 噢！他们的诺言已经兑现。<page>把它放在他们的位置上 ， 现在我们终于可以开始了！
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh, Oh! Their promise has been fulfilled.<page>Put it in their place and now we can finally get started!

original_en_text: Just a piece of something greater, but finely crafted. You should take it with you, traveller, for luck.
original_zh_text: 虽然只剩残片，却很精巧。带上吧旅者，图个吉利。
translated_text: 这是不错的， 但做得很好， 幸运的是， 旅行者会带着它。
secondary_translated_text: It's nice, but it's well done, and fortunately travelers will carry it.

original_en_text: Farewell, little pilgrim. May your shell harden the path for others to tread.
original_zh_text: 安息吧，小朝圣者。愿你的甲壳为后来者铺路。
translated_text: 再见了 ， 朝圣者。你的身体为别人铺平了道路。
secondary_translated_text: Farewell, pilgrim. Your body paves the way for others.

original_en_text: Times like this, all we can do is put our heads down and try to rebuild.
original_zh_text: 这种时候，除了埋头重建还能干啥？
translated_text: 在这种情况下 ， 我们所能做的就是低下头 ， 站起来。
secondary_translated_text: In this situation, all we can do is lower our heads and stand up.

original_en_text: <page>Mmmm! Is it time? Our lands shake their sorrow! For the new beat, yes? Demanding! For a new rhythm...<hpage>These quakes you feel, they are not your land’s sadness, they are its collapse, one bound to happen if their source cannot be quelled.<page>What? No, no no... the beat... It is the beat our land wishes! Calls for it! Needs one new!
original_zh_text: <page>嗯嗯！！时候到了？？大地震颤，哀鸣！是为新的搏动？……如此迫切！为新的韵律……<hpage>你感知的震颤并非大地哀鸣，而是其崩解前兆。若源头不稳，终将倾覆。<page>什么？不，不不……那搏动……是大地所求！大地呼唤！亟需换新！
translated_text: <page>哦！哦！是时候到达了吗 ？我们的国家在痛苦中崩溃了！新节奏？事实上？非常需要！新节奏。<hpage>你们正在经历的地震不是你们的地球的痛苦 ， 而是地球的毁灭 ， 如果它的根不融化 ， 这将不可避免地发生。<page>这是什么 ？不 ， 不。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Oh! Oh! Is it time to arrive? Our country collapsed in pain! New rhythm? Actually? Very much needed! New rhythm.<hpage>The earthquake you are experiencing is not the suffering of your earth, but the destruction of the earth, which will inevitably occur if its roots do not melt.<page>What is this? No, no.

original_en_text: Head quick for that vein of bells, and find my uncle hidden there. If anyone’s able to point you to a cure for that thing twisting within your shell, it’ll be him.
original_zh_text: 速速前往钟脉，寻我叔父踪迹。要说有谁能解你甲壳内的扭曲之物，非他莫属。
translated_text: 当我走近门铃时 ， 叔叔走了。如果有人可以教你如何治疗身体的扭曲 ， 那就是这个人。
secondary_translated_text: When I approached the doorbell, my uncle left. If anyone can teach you how to treat distortions in your body, it is this person.

original_en_text: Mmm! Mmm. Who are you, little you? Not a wish granter. For you haven’t enough fruits. Three we need, three I need! Find them, find them!
original_zh_text: 嗯嗯！嗯。你是谁，小小你？不是授愿者。苔莓不够。要三颗，我要三颗！去找，快去找！
translated_text: 哦！哦！哦 ， 天哪！” 你是谁， 孩子？这不是一个有希望的想法 ， 因为我们没有足够的水果。你需要三个！我找到他了 ， 我找到他了！
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh, my God!" Who are you, son? This is not a promising idea because we don't have enough fruit. You need three! I found him, I found him!

original_en_text: Ah! Here she is, safe after all! I was worried your battle with that enormous beast had left you badly wounded.<page>Shames me to have left you in danger there, missy, but I’m no warrior, and my tools ain’t no match for a creature like that.<hpage>It is well that you kept yourself safe. This settlement needs a fixer now, not a warrior.<page>Heh, maybe that’s true. Times like these all we can do is put our heads down and try to rebuild.
original_zh_text: 啊！你还活着！我还担心你和那头巨兽搏斗会受重伤。<page>让你独自涉险真是惭愧，但我不是战士，工具也对付不了那种怪物。<hpage>你保全自身是对的。这里需要的是维修师，不是战士。<page>嘿，或许吧。这种时候，埋头干活才是正理。
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！“你在这里 ， 你会很安全的。<page>“夫人 ， 我很惭愧让你处于危险之中 ， 但我不是一个士兵 ， 我的工具也无法抵抗这个生物。" "<hpage>确保自己的安全是美好的 ， 但这个决定需要一个仲裁者 ， 而不是一个战士。"<page>在这种情况下 ， 我们所能做的就是低下头 ， 站起来。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! "You'll be safe here.<page>"Ma 'am, I am ashamed to put you in danger, but I am not a soldier, and my tools cannot resist this creature. " "<hpage>Ensuring your own safety is nice, but the decision requires an arbitrator, not a fighter. "<page>In this situation, all we can do is lower our heads and stand up.

original_en_text: Rest here with us, long as you like. Mightn’t be much time left, but at least we few won’t have to face that fate alone.
original_zh_text: 您想歇多久都行。虽然时日无多，但至少不必孤零零面对。
translated_text: 时间可能很短 ， 但至少我们中的一些人不必独自面对这种命运。
secondary_translated_text: Time may be short, but at least some of us don't have to face this fate alone.

original_en_text: Ah! Glad I caught you for a moment, miss. You’ve done a fair service to this camp, given much more’n most.<page>I’d been thinkin’ on all your efforts, and set to making a little something to repay ‘em.<page>S’only a token, really! But I’ve put all me talent into it, much as I’ve got! Something to keep you company on the lonely roads above.<page>Hold onto it on your travels, and remember that you’re always welcome down here with us.
original_zh_text: 啊！可算遇着你了，小姐。您为这营地做的贡献比谁都多。<page>我琢磨着您的好意，做了个小玩意当回礼。<page>就是个信物！但我把看家本事都使上了！让它在孤独的旅途上陪您解个闷。<page>带着它上路吧，记得这里永远欢迎您。
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！” 很高兴见到你， 夫人。你在这件事上比我更公平。<page>我同情你的努力 ， 并愿意做一些事情来奖励你。<page>这只是一个象征 ， 你知道的。我尽力了 ， 我尽力了！在孤独的道路上有东西<page>我们欢迎您在您的旅程的每一刻。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes!" Nice to meet you, ma 'am. You are fairer than I am in this matter.<page>I sympathize with your efforts and am willing to do something to reward you.<page>It's just a symbol, you know. I tried, I tried! There is something on the lonely road<page>We welcome you every moment of your journey.

original_en_text: <hpage>This camp seems in poor condition, good bug. With the lands around turning deadly, I’d worry for its safety.<page>Aye. We surely aren’t seeing its finest moment, but this place has been serving us passing bugs for as long as any can remember.<page>It’s faith, you see! All those pilgrims, now and past. Our devotion holds it together. The camp’ll remain, and provide, no matter the troubles.<page>
original_zh_text: <hpage>这处营地破败不堪，周遭又暗藏危险，我担忧其安危。<page>唉，确实不是鼎盛时候。但这里长久以来侍奉过往虫众，已不知过了多少年月。<page>是信仰维系着这片营地，明白吗？是古今朝圣者的虔心庇佑着这里。任外面灾厄横行，营地永存。
translated_text: <hpage>土壤不好 ， 昆虫不好。我担心你们的安全 ， 因为你们周围的地球可能会致命。<page>当然 ， 我们还没有看到比这更好的时刻 ， 但只要有人记得它 ， 这个地方就为我们提供了错误服务。<page>朝圣者是现在和过去的人。我们的承诺将他们团结起来。<page>
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The soil is bad, the insects are bad. I fear for your safety because the earth around you can be deadly.<page>Of course, we haven't seen a better moment, but as long as someone remembers it, this place serves us the wrong way.<page>Pilgrims are people of the present and the past. Our commitment unites them.<page>

original_en_text: <hpage>What ritual calls you all together, pilgrim?<page>Our brother, this poor wretch in my arms, has walked his last aching step. We gather here to sing him farewell, and to mourn our great loss.
original_zh_text: <hpage>诸位聚集在此举行什么仪式？<page>这位兄弟，我怀中的可怜虫，已走完最后一步。我们在此唱别，哀悼逝者。
translated_text: <hpage>亲爱的朝圣者们 ， 你们在举行什么仪式 ？<page>我可怜的弟弟 ， 在我怀里 ， 在痛苦中迈出了最后一步。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Dear pilgrims, what ceremony are you holding?<page>My poor brother, in my arms, took the last step in pain.

original_en_text: If the veiled bugs have an interest in you, enough to brave the wastes beyond our borders, then you must be rather special, yes?<hpage>In my own lands, some may once have seen me so. In this place, with my strength sapped, I am just another traveller.<page>Ohho! A traveller, but still something more. I can see it now. Of course! That focus!<page>Did those veiled bugs realise who they snared? Perhaps it is they who should be worried, eh?
original_zh_text: 既然覆面者对你有兴趣，甚至不惜穿越边境荒原掳走你，你肯定不是什么等闲之辈吧？<hpage>在故土，或许曾有虫如此看待我。但在此地，力衰之躯只不过是一介旅者。<page>嚯嚯！旅者？不止如此。我可看得很清楚，这专注的眼神！<page>那些覆面虫知道自己网住了谁吗？该提心吊胆的怕是他们，对吧？
translated_text: 如果锅炉的昆虫是你的 ， 你有勇气越过边界 ， 你必须是特别的。<hpage>在我的国家 ， 我的力量正在减弱 ， 我只是一个旅行者 ， 也许有人看到它。<page>是的 ， 喊！旅行者 ， 等等。我已经见过他了！” 这种方法！<page>谁把一只伪装的昆虫关进了监狱 ？我应该担心他们吗 ？
