original_zh_text: 您偏爱这类机轮刃？我可基-基-据此改良。加回收装置。强化储能。
translated_text: 你对放射性感兴趣吗 ？根据我对这个想法的理解请把这个还给我。让他们进入强制性存款。
secondary_translated_text: Are you interested in radioactivity? Based on my understanding of the idea, please return this to me. Put them in mandatory deposits.

original_en_text: Acquire {0} more tools to prove aptitude.
original_zh_text: 再收集{0}件工具以证明资质。
translated_text: 购买这个产品。{0}这是一种展示能力的工具。
secondary_translated_text: Buy this product.{0}This is a tool to demonstrate capabilities.

original_en_text: Hrrrrrr. Me can not say much more, friend. Thems is watching. Us must keep working.
original_zh_text: 唔唔唔唔。咱不能多说了，朋友。上边看着呢。咱得接着干。
translated_text: 先生们先生们 ， 我不能再说了 ， 我们正在被监视 ， 我们必须继续工作。
secondary_translated_text: Gentlemen gentlemen, I can't say any more, we are being watched and we must keep working.

original_en_text: A locked gate bearing the symbol of an Architect.
original_zh_text: 一扇锁住的门，刻有建筑师徽记。
translated_text: 一扇门 ， 建筑师的签名。
secondary_translated_text: A door, signature by the architect.

original_en_text: Raw materials, for creation. Carry them with you always, that y-y-you may be prepared.
original_zh_text: 原材料，随身携带。有-有备无患。
translated_text: 创意原材料 — 我们总是随身携带它们 ， 以便做好准备。
secondary_translated_text: Creative raw materials-we always carry them with us to be ready.

original_en_text: Acquire 1 more tool to prove aptitude.
original_zh_text: 再收集1件工具以证明资质。
translated_text: 购买其他工具来展示你的技能。
secondary_translated_text: Buy other tools to showcase your skills.

original_en_text: Those pieces of a h-h-heart-core you carry upon you, how did you acquire-recover an artefact so rare?<hpage>They were scattered about the Citadel, each seemingly laid with purpose. Someone wished the thing dismantled, but showed respect enough to see it stored safe.<page>That heart is an inspired form, conceived by the first of my line for a knight of cog and blade.<page>In it, I see my predecessor’s talent, immense, now lost-forgotten. I could never create-copy a work s-s-so fine.<hpage>And the knight that once bore the heart? Tell me of them.<page>A gleaming order, cogwork sentinels, so impressive-majestic in function they were charged-b-b-bound to the highest holy duty.<page>Long before the c-c-creation of the core, the sentinels ventured, even beyond these walls, to see all bugs brought-forced safe to serve the Citadel.<page>If the h-h-h-heart were restored within the sentinel’s shell, would it give thanks for the awakening? Or would it grieve those lands now l-l-lost?<hpage>In time, maker, I may find out...
original_zh_text: 您携带的心-心-脏残片，您是怎么找到如此珍贵造物的？<hpage>它们散落在圣堡各处，似乎是被刻意安置。虽然被拆解，却有妥善保管。<page>这心脏构造精妙，出自我的先辈之手，为机枢骑士所铸造。<page>我能在其中看到先辈才华，如今却已失-失-传。我无法复刻这份神工。<hpage>那曾经承载这颗心的骑士？我想了解详情。<page>光辉教团，机枢戍卫。他们曾经威仪赫赫，掌管圣职。<page>远在核心铸-铸-造之前，戍卫就远征墙外，强掳众虫效忠圣堡。<page>如果将此心-心-脏重新装入戍卫甲中，它会为苏醒而感激？还是为圣堡衰颓哀伤？<hpage>假以时日，大师，或许我能知晓……
translated_text: 如何回收你拥有的核废料 ？<hpage>他们分散在城堡周围 ， 每个人都在撒谎。有人想要它 ， 但表现出足够的尊重来保持它的安全。<page>“Heart ” 是 Gear and Blade Knight 最初想法的灵感来源。<page>在那里 ， 我看到了我伟大的前任被遗忘的才能。<hpage>” 照顾你的男人告诉我。<page>智者骑士 ， 狗牙的守护者 ， 履行了非常令人印象深刻和有价值的职能 ， 并被赋予了最高的神圣职责。<page>早在中心建成之前 ， 警卫就处于危险之中 ， 即使是穿过这些墙壁的昆虫也必须为城堡安全工作。<page>当你的心回到它的守护壳 ， 你感激它被唤醒了吗 ？这是否意味着地球已经消失了 ？<hpage>最终 ， 我们会发现我们的造物主。
secondary_translated_text: How to recycle the nuclear waste you own?<hpage>They were scattered around the castle and everyone was lying. Someone wants it but shows enough respect to keep it safe.<page>"Heart" was the inspiration for Gear and Blade Knight's original idea.<page>There, I saw the forgotten talents of my great predecessor.<hpage>"The man who took care of you told me.<page>Knights of the Wise, guardians of dog teeth, performed very impressive and valuable functions and were given the highest sacred duties.<page>Long before the center was built, guards were at risk, and even insects that penetrated these walls had to work for castle safety.<page>When your heart returns to its protective shell, are you grateful that it has been awakened? Does this mean that the earth has disappeared?<hpage>Eventually, we will discover our creator.

original_en_text: This band of metal teeth, sharp and light-fine. It could be woven within your red outer layer? A hidden weapon.
original_zh_text: 金属齿环，轻便锐利。可编入您的红色披风？作为暗器。
translated_text: 你的金属手镯锋利而轻盈 ， 你能看到红色吗 ？阴影的影子。
secondary_translated_text: Your metal bracelet is sharp and light. Can you see the red color? Shadow of shadow.

original_en_text: <page=S>You seem displeased, Old One. We only did as you asked, yes? The snare is sprung, the creature consumed.<hpage>You bound it to that void!<page=S>Don’t play daft. You should well know our family’s fixations. Surely you had a hunch?<page=B>How else could we hope to trap one of your pale kin? Or see her consumed with such insatiable efficiency?<hpage>Then you have miscalculated, gravely. The white knight, she fell with the mother...<page=M>Oh ho... The quakes, yes? We have felt their force, even here. So the mother resists the dark... to save the child?<hpage>That is my guess. I must descend to the void below, and see clear that truth for myself.<page=M>Ohhhh. How… unfortunate. All of Pharloom will fall to her flailing.<hpage>So it may, but I will not watch idle while it crumbles.
original_zh_text: <page=S>古老者，您似乎不太高兴？我们不过照您吩咐行事罢了。陷阱已发，猎物入彀。<hpage>你们把它和虚空捆在了一起！<page=S>别装傻了。您该清楚我们家族对力量百无禁忌，难道没料到这步？<page=B>不然怎困得住您那苍白同族？又怎教她贪婪吞噬得这般彻底？<hpage>那你们可大错特错了，那苍白骑士也随其母亲一同坠落了……<page=M>哦嚯嚯……是说那些震颤？即便在这里也能感知到。所以是母亲正抵抗黑暗……为了救孩子？<hpage>我是这么猜想的。但必须亲自下去深渊，看清真相。<page=M>哎呀呀……这可……不妙。整个纺络都要被她垂死挣扎掀翻。<hpage>或许吧，但我不会坐视王国崩塌。
translated_text: <page=S>“这听起来很痛苦 ， 老头子 ， 你会照你说的做。你在干什么？陷阱出来了 ， 生物体被吸收了。<hpage>把它放在一个空的空间里！<page=S>我们需要更多地了解家庭是如何运作的。<page=B>我们如何联系我们的祖父母 ？还是我们会被贪婪的效率所消耗 ？<hpage>我在计算上犯了一个大错误。那个穿白衣的骑士和他的母亲一起倒下了。<page=M>这是一个地震， 对吧？事实上？因此 ， 母亲们抵制黑暗 ， 以拯救孩子。<hpage>这就是我的假设 ： 我去天堂 ， 看到真相。<page=M>哦 ， 那是什么 ？为什么呢？法老所有的财物都在他手中。<hpage>这可能是真的 ， 但我无法逃避它。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>"It sounds painful, old man, and you'll do as you say. What are you doing? The trap comes out and the organism is absorbed.<hpage>Put it in an empty space!<page=S>We need to know more about how families work.<page=B>How do we contact our grandparents? Or will we be consumed by greedy efficiency?<hpage>I made a big mistake in my calculations. The knight in white fell with his mother.<page=M>It was an earthquake, right? Actually? So mothers resist the darkness to save their children.<hpage>This is my assumption: I go to heaven and see the truth.<page=M>Oh, what's that? Why? All Pharaoh's belongings were in his hands.<hpage>This may be true, but I can't escape it.

original_en_text: This lump here is well heavy, and shiny too, so it’s surely worth somethin’!
original_zh_text: 这块沉甸甸的，还闪着光，肯定值点钱儿！
translated_text: 在这里， 这部分是沉重和明亮的， 所以它是值得的！
secondary_translated_text: Here, this part is heavy and bright, so it's worth it!

original_en_text: Desperate times make for desperate customers, heh heh! So let’s get to tradin’, eh?
original_zh_text: 世道混乱，方便宰客！嘿嘿！赶紧的！
translated_text: 绝望的时刻会产生绝望的顾客。想创业吗？
secondary_translated_text: Desperate moments produce desperate customers. Want to start a business?

original_en_text: Again... Huu... Huu. Truly incredible!<page>Was it the course? Did I lose focus? Or are you simply the bug I have waited so long for? Her of such skill that my wish could, at last, be granted?<page>Another reward must be given for your speed, nimble bug. One deserved in full!
original_zh_text: 又输了……呼……真不可思议！<page>是我分心了？还是你太强？我的心愿终于有机会实现了吗？<page>我得再送你个奖励，你应得的！
translated_text: 我回来了。打电话 ， 打电话。我真不敢相信！<page>这是一个种族吗？你失去了注意力吗 ？这就是我们一直在等待的 BAP 吗 ？我知道你的权力一定很高。我的愿望会实现吗 ？"<page>你必须为速度和敏捷性错误提供额外的奖励。
secondary_translated_text: I'm back. Make the phone, make the phone. I can't believe it!<page>Is this a race? Have you lost your concentration? Is this the BAP we have been waiting for? I know you must have a lot of power. Will my wish come true? "<page>You must provide additional rewards for speed and agility errors.

original_en_text: Have you heard, miss grown-up? Beyond the moss, in the crumbled caverns filled with worms, much change is happening, different to the horrid, stretching dark outside.<page>What brings such bright and bold transformation? Is it a beast? Or a bug unseen? How wondrous it would be to discover them, hidden away in some deep corner!<page>You must go searching, miss grown-up! You and that sharp, sharp blade. Think of the strange and succulent shell waiting to be added to your journal?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐听说了吗？苔原深处满是蠕虫的崩塌洞窟里，正在发生剧变，与外界的恐怖黑灾截然不同。<page> 是什么带来这种鲜明蜕变？是巨兽？还是未知虫类？要是能知道它们是什么，藏在哪里，该多奇妙呀！<page> 你一定要去探索，大姐姐！带上你那锋利的针刃，给记录册里多添上几份奇异的甲壳记录！
translated_text: 陛下 ， 您听到了吗 ？在地衣的另一端 ， 在一个由破坏性和感染性昆虫组成的洞穴中 ， 许多变化正在发生 ， 不像正在蔓延的可怕的黑暗。<page>为什么要做出如此大胆的改变？他是一个怪物吗？一个看不见的错误？如果我能把它藏在一个深角 ， 那将是多么美丽啊！<page>” 陛下， 看。你和你的剑。想象一下一个奇怪的多汁的贝壳 ， 等待被添加到你的日记。
secondary_translated_text: Your Majesty, did you hear that? On the other end of the lichen, in a cave of destructive and infectious insects, many changes are taking place, unlike the terrible darkness that is spreading.<page>Why make such bold changes? Is he a monster? An invisible mistake? If I could hide it in a deep corner, how beautiful it would be!<page>"Your Majesty, look. You and your sword. Imagine a strange juicy shell waiting to be added to your diary.

original_en_text: Now, isn’t this a wondrous place! Golden bells, for weary shells! Ha ha ha!<hpage>This settlement offers safety now, little pilgrim. Perhaps you should make a home here?<hpage>You’ve done well to make it this far, and the roads ahead will only be more dangerous.<page>Oh, dangerous they surely are! But I will gladly tread any path that holds wonders as magnificent as this, red maiden!
original_zh_text: 这地方太妙了！金钟给累瘫的虫子报时！哈哈哈！<hpage>小朝圣者，此处暂时安全，为何不在此安家？<hpage>走到这里实属不易，前方只会更加凶险。<page>凶险又如何！能见到这般奇景，刀山火海我也愿前往！
translated_text: 这不是一个好地方 ， 是吗 ？钟声响在疲惫的贝壳上。哈！<hpage>这种和解将确保年轻朝圣者的安全。<hpage>在这个阶段 ， 我们面前的道路只会变得更加危险。<page>这真的很危险！“我可以创造这样一个奇迹 ， 雷德小姐。
secondary_translated_text: This is not a good place, is it? The bell rings on the tired shells. Ha!<hpage>This reconciliation will ensure the safety of young pilgrims.<hpage>At this stage, the road ahead of us will only become more dangerous.<page>This is really dangerous! "I can create such a miracle, Miss Reid.

original_en_text: <hpage>You have keen sight for my skill, bug, but my childhood has long since passed. What has happened here? I see signs of battle all around.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的眼力不错，我确是一名战士，但早已称不上是孩子。这是怎么回事？到处是打斗痕迹。
translated_text: <hpage>你们知道我的能力 ， 虫子 ， 但是我的童年已经结束了 ， 到处都是挣扎的迹象。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You know what I can do, bugs, but my childhood is over and there are signs of struggle everywhere.

translated_text: <hpage>...
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>...

original_en_text: <hpage>The time is close, Shakra. The cost was grave, and the challenge steep, but I have claimed a power that can put end to this disaster. <page>Gendaa... This is good, Hornet Wielding Needle, essential. My own strength has near reached its limit, and the dark husks continue their assault unceasing.<page>Take your final action, and let us all see the end of this.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时机到了。虽然代价惨重，但我找到了终结灾祸的方法。<page>哏嗒……太好了，小姑娘。我正好快撑不住了，黑虫的攻势永不停歇。<page>放手去干吧，让我们一起见证结局。
translated_text: <hpage>时机已经到来 ， 沙尔克的代价是巨大的 ， 问题是巨大的 ， 但我有能力阻止这场灾难。<page>到目前为止 ， 它一直是 ...黄蜂可以维持针的平衡。它的强度已经达到了极限 ， 黑暗的外壳继续攻击。<page>让我们进入最后一步 ， 看看这一切的结束。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The time has come, the cost for Schalke is huge, the problem is huge, but I have the power to prevent this disaster.<page>So far, it has been... Wasps can maintain the balance of needles. Its intensity has reached its limit, and the dark shell continues to attack.<page>Let's take the final step and see how it all ends.

original_en_text: Your achievements in the games are inspiring! In time, I may have to challenge those impressive scores...
original_zh_text: 你创下的记录真令我激动！改天我要挑战看看！
translated_text: 游戏中的成功令人鼓舞。随着时间的推移 ， 你将不得不面对这个令人印象深刻的结果。
secondary_translated_text: The success in the game is encouraging. Over time, you will have to face this impressive result.

original_en_text: <hpage>Good luck on your quest Garmond. If you hope to claim justice for your fellows passed, I suspect you’ve some challenge yet ahead.<page>Aye! Zaza and I’ll fight to cavern’s end if it need be, for the bugs held in our hearts, and our honour as knights!
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你们好运，要找圣堡讨公道可不容易。<page>为了心中的记忆，为了骑士的荣耀！就算要杀遍每处洞穴我们也在所不惜！
translated_text: <hpage>如果你想为死去的同胞伸张正义 ， 我认为你仍然会遇到一些麻烦。<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！如果有必要的话 ， 我和 Zi 将为心虫和骑士的荣誉而战斗到洞穴的尽头。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If you want to get justice for your dead fellow citizens, I think you will still have some trouble.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! If necessary, Zi and I will fight to the end of the cave for the honor of Heartworm and Knight.

original_en_text: Ahh, can you feel it too? The thralls of the Citadel are gathered close, in overwhelming numbers!<page>Together though, the three of us would be more overwhelming still! Would you allow us to fight by your side, brave sister?
original_zh_text: 啊哈，感觉到了吗？圣堡的傀儡在集结，非常多！<page>咱们三个联手，肯定不可阻挡！要一起战斗吗，勇敢的姐妹？
translated_text: 你也听到了吗？城堡里的奴隶们聚集在人群中！<page>如果我们三个人 ， 那就更好了。” 亲爱的， 你能让我打吗？". " "
secondary_translated_text: Did you hear that too? The slaves in the castle gathered in the crowd!<page>If there were three of us, it would be even better." Honey, can you let me call? ". " "

original_en_text: Well, well! See what happens to nasty bully-bugs when they come after poor old Grindle? That’s a well-deserved end, we reckon.<page>We heard this old Sitty-dell was nice and quiet and burstin’ with goodies. So what’s happened, eh? Why’s it crawlin’ with bullies and busybodies?<hpage>The creature that haunts this place is stirring, little thief. The Citadel’s caste now roam the halls. You would do well to leave soon, if you mean to survive.<page>What what? You bein’ mirthful? We’re stayin’ here ‘til we’re done pilfering! You should be the one leavin’ if you’re so afeared!
original_zh_text: 啧啧！瞧瞧那些欺负格林德尔恶霸虫是什么下场？真是活该！<page>都说圣堡既清净，宝贝又多，怎么全是打手？<hpage>掌控此地的怪物正在苏醒，圣堡的守卫四处游荡，想活命就快逃吧，小毛贼。<page>怕什么！起码得等偷够本再说！你要是害怕了，那就自己逃吧！
translated_text: 当这个邪恶的愿景到达可怜的 Grindell 时会发生什么 ？我觉得这是正确的结局。<page>我听说这个古老的市政厅很漂亮 ， 很安静 ， 充满了美丽的东西 ， 但为什么到处都是土匪和吵闹的人 ？<hpage>侵扰这个地方的生物将是复活的小偷。城堡现在徘徊在走廊里。如果你想活下去 ， 最好尽快开始。<page>这是什么 ？你在笑吗 ？我会一直呆到飞机结束。如果你害怕 ， 那就快点。
secondary_translated_text: What happens when this evil vision reaches poor Grindell? I think this is the right ending.<page>I heard that this ancient city hall is beautiful, quiet and full of beautiful things, but why are there so many bandits and noisy people everywhere?<hpage>Creatures that invade this place will be resurrected thieves. The castle now hangs in the corridors. If you want to survive, you'd better start as soon as possible.<page>What is this? Are you smiling? I will stay until the end of the plane. If you're scared, hurry up.

original_en_text: High up, above the caverns all of crust, Nuu has been told of a hole, filled with writhing things, all zipping and zapping.<page>But so sad! Nuu cannot herself see it. The lands quake and rattle. The savage threads stretch. The dangers are too much.<page>It must be you, miss grown-up, older, stiffer, a shell less precious. Seek the cave, and the things within. How else will the journal be complete?
original_zh_text: 努努听说，在布满硬壳的洞窟高处，有个满是扭动生物的洞穴，噼啪作响。<page> 但好可惜！努努不能去看。大地震动，凶暴丝线蔓延，太危险了。<page> 必须靠你了，大姐姐，你甲壳厚实，经验丰富。去探查那个洞穴吧！不然记录册怎么完整呢？
translated_text: 在那里 ， 诺亚感觉到每个洞穴都在树皮上有洞 ， 里面装满了扭曲的物体。<page>但是她很伤心！没有人能看见诺亚 ， 也没有人能看见他。大地在颤抖 ， 野蛮的痕迹还在继续。现在的危险已经太大。<page>他们都是报纸。你老了 ， 工作辛苦 ， 你的封面是无用的。打开洞穴和里面的东西。你是怎么结束的 ？
secondary_translated_text: There, Noah felt that each cave had a hole in the tree bark, filled with distorted objects.<page>But she was very sad! No one can see Noah, and no one can see him. The earth is shaking, and the traces of barbarism continue. The danger now is too great.<page>They are all newspapers. You are old and work hard, and your cover is useless. Open the cave and what's inside. How did you end it?

original_en_text: Ahh miss grown-up, Nuu hoped you would return here. For clever Nuu can track well where you have been, she sees your cut-marks and sniffs out your fragrant trail!<page>And look where the trail has led sweet Nuu! A thick wriggler lived in this nest, rumbling and crackling in the darkness.<page>Its sour juices still line these rocky insides, and patient Nuu will gather it all up!<hpage>There is much to learn in these crusted highlands Nuu, but much danger as well. Indulge your curiosity if you must, but keep your senses trained on the darkness.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努跟着你的刀痕和体香找到这啦！<page>这个巢穴住着条乱扭的胖家伙，在黑暗里咔咔响！<page>岩壁上还粘着它的酸液，努努要全部收集！<hpage>这里虽然知识多，但也很危险，别只顾着好奇，也要小心黑暗中的动静。
translated_text: ” 先生， 请回到这里。SmartNuu 可以追踪您的位置。我看着你的刀 ， 我闻到了它的味道。<page>巢里住着一只巨大的鳄鱼 ， 它在黑暗中挖鼻子。<page>石头仍然充满了苦味 ， 病人的姐妹们正在收集它！<hpage>在硬核环境中有很多东西需要学习 ， 但也有很多风险 ， 所以如果你需要的话 ， 请满足你的好奇心 ， 并在黑暗中训练你的感官。
secondary_translated_text: "Sir, please come back here. SmartNuu can track your location. I looked at your knife, and I smelled it.<page>A huge crocodile lived in the nest, picking its nose in the dark.<page>The stone is still full of bitterness and the patient's sisters are collecting it!<hpage>There is a lot to learn in a hard-core environment, but there are also a lot of risks, so if you need to, satisfy your curiosity and train your senses in the dark.

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! If strength remains, simply step again to the challenge. Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 别灰心！还有力气就再比一次！
translated_text: 不要陷入失败 ， 不要陷入灵活性的错误 ， 如果我们想要留下来 ， 我们必须再次战斗。快点 ， 快点！
secondary_translated_text: Don't fall into failure, don't fall into the mistake of flexibility, if we want to stay, we have to fight again. Come on, come on!

original_en_text: Oh! Those horrible beasty-beasts are gone! Much and many thanks for you, mighty warrior!<hpage>It was a simple thing, small bug. I assume you are Tipp, the courier?<hpage>Frey, the Bellhart trader, seemed concerned for your safety... and for the cargo you carry.<page>She sent you?! Bah! She needs to learny-learn a little patience! I’m is barely been away! But still... is lucky-lucky for me you came.
original_zh_text: 哇！那些丑、丑八怪全被干掉了！多谢勇士！<hpage>举手之劳。你是蒂普？<hpage>钟心镇的芙蕾很担心你……还有你带的货。<page>她找的你？切！让她学、学着点耐心！我才离开一会儿！
translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！野兽消失了！谢谢你 ， 伟大的士兵。<hpage>你是一个经纪人， 对吧？事实上？<hpage>伯哈特的商人弗雷似乎担心伯哈特的安全和货物。<page>你派他来了？哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！你必须学会有耐心！我几乎没有错过！然而 ， 尽管如此 ... ...我很幸运能在这里。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! The beast has disappeared! Thank you, great soldier.<hpage>You're an agent, right? Actually?<hpage>Burhart businessman Frey seemed concerned about Burhart's safety and cargo.<page>You sent him? Oh, Oh, Oh! You must learn to be patient! I hardly missed it! However, despite this... ... I am very lucky to be here.

translated_text: 照片来源 ： Beach Car
secondary_translated_text: Photo source: Beach Car

original_en_text: Well, I’m is be off now. That old grubly-grub in the bell will come after me herself if she not get her goods!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我这就送货去。再不回去那个老、老财迷要亲自追来了！
translated_text: 如果那张固执的纸什么都不做 ， 它会来找我。
secondary_translated_text: If that stubborn piece of paper does nothing, it will come to me.

original_en_text: Now I must train, and strive, further and faster by your example. Your skill upon these tracks has roused my spirit, nimble bug. You shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 现在，我要以你为榜样加倍训练！你点燃了我的斗志！我会永远感谢你的！
translated_text: 现在我必须训练 ， 效仿他的榜样 ， 走得更快。你在这个轨道上的技能唤醒了我的头脑 ， 敏捷的 bug 。谢谢您的持续支持。
secondary_translated_text: Now I have to train, follow his example, and go faster. Your skills on this track awakened my mind, agile bug. Thank you for your continued support.

original_en_text: A town built within the thick vein of bells that runs through Pharloom’s core. One wonders who would craft so many, and for what purpose?
original_zh_text: 建在钟脉上的小镇。谁造的这么多钟？图什么？
translated_text: 它被深深的静脉所包围 ， 这些静脉贯穿法鲁的心脏。我想知道是谁做了什么。
secondary_translated_text: It is surrounded by deep veins that run through Faro's heart. I want to know who did what.

original_en_text: Hornet Wielding Needle! With my master’s passing, I have resolved to improve my skills that, in time, I may match her prime.<page>Much work I must do to achieve that goal. I have found this wide bare stone fine ground on which to train.<page>Would you spar with me now? Raise that blade and test my rings! You may prove my greatest challenge yet.
original_zh_text: "使针的小姑娘！导师不在了，我决定要练到她巅峰水平。<page>这块裸岩地正适合特训。<page>来比划比划？亮兵器吧！你或许是我最大的挑战。"
translated_text: 师父去世后 ， 我决定提高自己的技能 ， 最终达到师父的巅峰。<page>为了实现这个目标 ， 我们做出了巨大的努力。“我找到了这个宽敞的地方 ， 我可以像一块裸露的石头一样爬行。"<page>你想和我竞争吗 ？拿起床单并检查戒指可能是我面临的最大挑战。
secondary_translated_text: After my master passed away, I decided to improve my skills and eventually reach the peak of my master.<page>In order to achieve this goal, we have made great efforts. "I found this spacious place where I could crawl like a bare stone. "<page>Do you want to compete with me? Picking up the sheets and checking the rings was probably the biggest challenge I faced.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your charts and tools show fine skill, Shakra. I’ve met few who’d match your talent.<page>Cartography! Peh. Bakallo! It is a craft-skill common amongst my tribe. Most important to keep one’s mind sharp when on a journey.<page>The charting of caverns, the memory of travel, the knowing of one’s place within the kingdom, an engaging task for a warrior’s mind.<page>An unfortunate thing that my great mentor never learnt the skill. Her talent at getting lost... I should almost be impressed...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的图纸工具很专业，很少见过这般手艺。<page>测绘？呵！吧咔咯！这是我们部落必学的手艺，最重要的是能在旅途中保持专注。<page>记山洞、画路线、辨方位，最适合战士动脑子的活计。<page>可惜我得导师没这本事。她迷路的本事……反而令我佩服……
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra 说 ， 他的卡片和工具显示出令人难以置信的技巧 ， 很少有东西能与他的天赋相匹敌。"<page>画一张地图！佩珀卡洛！这是我们部落的一种常见技能 ， 旅行时保持头发干净很重要。<page>绘制洞穴地图 ， 穿越记忆 ， 发现自己在王国中的位置 ， 是战士们迷人的职业。<page>不幸的是 ， 我的前任从未学过这种技术。我失去了我几乎印象深刻的角色。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra said his cards and tools show incredible skill and few can match his talent. "<page>Draw a map! Pepper Karlo! This is a common skill in our tribe and it is important to keep your hair clean while traveling.<page>Mapping caves, traveling through memories, and discovering their place in the kingdom are fascinating occupations for soldiers.<page>Unfortunately, my predecessor never learned this technique. I lost a role that I was almost impressed with.

original_en_text: Lots of good stuff tucked away in this old prison... lovely place to bring a lucky little snitchbug like Grindle! What a favour those lugs did us! O-hoho!
original_zh_text: 这破监狱藏着不少好货呀……格林德尔就爱关在这种地方！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: 这个老监狱有很多好处 ， 是一个完美的地方 ， 容纳像格林代尔这样快乐的告密者！耳朵很有用！哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！
secondary_translated_text: This old prison has many advantages and is the perfect place to accommodate happy whistleblowers like Greendale! Ears are very useful! Oh, Oh, Oh!

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<hpage>I am sorry, Nuu. Though I recognise the value in your wish, my own task is too pressing.
original_zh_text: 呜呜，天啊。大姐姐，你拒绝可怜的努努？好伤心！<hpage>抱歉，努努。我知道你这份祈愿的价值，但我的使命更为紧迫。
translated_text: 妈咪！你会拒绝穷人吗 ？太酸了。<hpage>“我知道你的愿望很重要 ， 但我的工作非常紧迫。
secondary_translated_text: Mommy! Would you reject the poor? It's too sour.<hpage>"I know your wish is important, but my job is very urgent.

original_en_text: Come to rest here, miss grown-up? Then let Nuu see our journal, for she is eager to see your cuts!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐来这休息？那快让努努看看记录册，等不及要看你的战果啦！
translated_text: ” 这不是休息的地方吗？” 我想看看这个视频， 姐姐。看看报纸吧！
secondary_translated_text: "Isn't this a place to rest?" I want to watch this video, sister. Read the newspaper!

original_en_text: This great structure... It would have taken the lifetimes of so many bugs to build it. Now its wounds run deep, and I can hear the groaning of its final breaths.<page>Everything that grows must pass, I suppose. Still, to witness even its current state is a privilege I’ll not squander.<page>And what of you, friend Hornet? Where are your travels taking you?<hpage>They have taken me deep, and will take me yet deeper still. I have a responsibility to cut this land free of its dark fate.<hpage>That is no concern of yours though, sir. You should continue your own journey, albeit with a claw on your weapon at all times.
original_zh_text: 这宏伟建筑……不知耗费了多少代虫的心血。如今却只能发出垂死呻吟。<page>盛极必衰吧，大概。不过能见证这最后的余晖也是荣幸。<page>你呢？你的旅途通向哪里？<hpage>我要往更深处去，我有责任斩断这片土地的诅咒。<hpage>但这与你无关。继续你的旅程吧，但要记得握紧武器。
translated_text: 我一生都在犯无数的错误 ， 伤口已经掉了下来 ， 我开始感觉到我最后的呼吸。<page>有机会以这种方式看到它是一种特权 ， 不能错过。<page>“你好吗 ， 蜜蜂 ？ ”您的旅程将带您去哪里 ？<hpage>他们深深地爱我 ， 深深地爱我。<hpage>即使你的武器有点 '你必须继续你的旅程。
secondary_translated_text: I have made countless mistakes throughout my life, the wound has fallen off, and I begin to feel my last breath.<page>The opportunity to see it in this way is a privilege and cannot be missed.<page>"How are you, bee? "Where will your journey take you?<hpage>They love me deeply, love me deeply.<hpage>Even if your weapon is a bit 'you have to continue your journey.

original_en_text: To our safe haven? Our home... This is what’s left of it after the great breaking began.<page>There was that terrible noise from above. Everything shook and fell apart, and the black threads sprung up from beneath. Many a poor pilgrim has already been lost to the destruction.<page>You might have been too, if not for some fleeing pilgrims who found you fallen and carried you back to us.<hpage>The black threads... I may understand their source.<hpage>I must speak with the old Caretaker. Do you know what has become of him? I see he has left you his garb.<page>Oh, yes. He charged me with looking after those remaining here, said he had to confer with his family down below.<hpage>Down below... Then they have slunk away to hide in their ruined chapel.<hpage>I must pay them a visit. Thank you, Sherma. Stay safe, and take care of your fellow pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 这里原本是我们的避难所……大崩塌之后就变成这样了。<page>头顶传来可怕的巨响，天花板塌了，地下还冒出黑丝，好多同袍都被卷走了。<page>要不是几个逃难的同袍发现你昏倒在路边，恐怕你也……<hpage>那些黑丝……我大概知晓其源头。<hpage>我得去找老看守者。你可知道他去哪了？你穿着他的衣服。<page>他让我照顾留下的人，说要去下面和家人商量事情。<hpage>下面……肯定是躲到破教堂里了。<hpage>我得去找他们。你多保重，照顾好大家。
translated_text: 安全的港口。骄傲倒台后 ， 房子被遗弃了。<page>有一个可怕的噪音从上面传来。一切都在颤抖和崩溃 ， 一条黑线从地板上露出 ， 许多可怜的朝圣者死于破坏。<page>如果你不是带领我们找到他的逃犯 ， 也许你就是同一个人。<hpage>黑色线条显示了它的起源。<hpage>我想和一个老兵谈谈 ， 你知道发生了什么吗 ？这是她的衣服。"<page>哦 ， 是的 ， 我说我必须照顾住在这里的人 ， 并与下面的家人交谈。<hpage>他走进一座废弃的教堂。<hpage>他们必须去探望。谢谢你 ， 谢尔曼。请保持安全并照顾朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: Safe port. After the fall of Pride, the house was abandoned.<page>There was a terrible noise coming from above. Everything trembled and collapsed, a black line emerged from the floor, and many poor pilgrims died of destruction.<page>If you weren't the fugitive who led us to him, maybe you are the same person.<hpage>Black lines show its origin.<hpage>I want to talk to a veteran, do you know what happened? These are her clothes. "<page>Oh, yes, I said I have to take care of the people who live here and talk to the family down there.<hpage>He walked into an abandoned church.<hpage>They have to visit. Thank you, Sherman. Please stay safe and take care of the pilgrims.

original_en_text: Bakkana! A battle well won! The haunted bugs have been defeated and the way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon, away from this dreadful Citadel.
original_zh_text: 啵咔呐！赢得漂亮！迷途虫都被消灭了，你可以继续前行了。后会有期，离这鬼圣堡远点。
translated_text: 你在巴尔干赢得的战斗已经失败 ， 通往未来的道路是你的。选择这座可怕的城堡 ， 你很快就会看到它。
secondary_translated_text: The battles you won in the Balkans have been lost, and the path to the future is yours. Choose this terrible castle and you will see it soon.

original_en_text: Huge caves ascending to Pharloom’s Citadel. The roads are slowly being devoured by sand and howling wind.
original_zh_text: 通向圣堡的巨洞，风沙正在逐渐吞噬这里的道路。
translated_text: 一个巨大的洞穴一直延伸到帕勒姆城堡。街道被沙子和噪音吞噬。
secondary_translated_text: A huge cave stretches all the way to Palham Castle. The streets were swallowed up by sand and noise.

original_en_text: <hpage>Farewell, tall bug, until we cross again.<page>Or until death calmly claims us both...
original_zh_text: <hpage>再会，下次碰面……<page>或许就是我们的死期……
translated_text: <hpage>再见 ， 直到你回来。<page>直到死亡悄然过去 ，
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Goodbye until you come back.<page>Until death passed quietly,

original_en_text: Again and again you prove your mastery, nimble bug, yet still I never tire of the challenge!<page>As reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I have only this small trophy, a memento given by my own speed teacher, now fairly passed to you.
original_zh_text: 你一次又一次证明了自己！但我永不厌倦挑战！<page>对这份惊人耐力的奖励，我只有这小奖杯了，是我师父给我的，现在传给你了！
translated_text: 你一次又一次地展示了你的技能 ， 你的敏捷性 ， 但我喜欢这个挑战！<page>我有这个小奖杯作为对这个令人印象深刻的耐心结果的奖励。我记得我的超级支配者 ， 现在我把它交给了他。
secondary_translated_text: You have shown your skills, your agility time and time again, but I love this challenge!<page>I have this little trophy as a reward for this impressive patient result. I remember my super dominator, and now I give it to him.

original_en_text: <page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=S>亲爱的朋友们 ， 请把你们的心给我。最后 ， 我失败了。在保留这些记忆之前 ， 让我们来看看被遗忘的昆虫的地球力量。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Dear friends, please give me your hearts. In the end, I failed. Before retaining these memories, let's take a look at the earth power of the forgotten insects.

original_en_text: Tch... Hahahaa. Marvelous! So the spider knows something of fathomless beings, and still it hopes to stand against one, a god... <page>Where do you hide this boundless strength you claim, spider? I’ve watched your struggle towards us. Yours was a painful, broken trek. One needs grace to stand before the divine.<hpage>Then best you keep watching, child. I’ve found those who claim themselves a god can rarely match the title.<hpage>And experience tells me, even gods can fall.
original_zh_text: 哈！有意思！明知对手是神还妄想反抗？<page>你的底气在哪？爬得又慢又狼狈，谒见神明要优雅！<hpage>那你就继续看好了。自封为神的存在往往名不副实。<hpage>何况经验告诉我，即使是神也会陨落。
translated_text: 他的名字叫海尔 ， 他是伟大的。蜘蛛知道一些关于无意识的东西 ， 但它们仍然想与上帝作战。<page>无限的力量是我看到你在这段旅程中奋斗的地方 ， 这是一段痛苦而破碎的旅程 ， 人需要恩典才能站在上帝面前。<hpage>我很高兴见到孩子们 ， 但一个自称是上帝的人不配得到这个头衔。<hpage>经验告诉我 ， 上帝也会堕落。
secondary_translated_text: His name is Haier, and he is great. Spiders know something about the unconscious, but they still want to fight God.<page>Infinite power is where I see you struggling on this journey, a painful and broken journey where one needs grace to stand before God.<hpage>I am happy to see the children, but a man who claims to be God does not deserve this title.<hpage>Experience tells me that God can fall.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you look well at home in these wilds.<page>Poshanka! These scorched fields offer many paths and much combat. To leap from vantage upon the red-shells or to meet them face-front with rings ready? These are decisions to live for!<page>I am much surprised those soft pilgrims ever safely climbed this scorched and savage place.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我看你在这荒野中自在的很。<page>啵尚咔！这片荒野多的是战斗机会。是从高处突袭红壳怪？还是正面对决？这才是战士的生活！<page>那些软脚的朝圣者能爬上这鬼地方，倒是让我吃惊。
translated_text: <hpage>沙克拉 ， 你在沙漠中感到平静。<page>博尚卡！博尚卡！这片燃烧的沙漠提供了许多道路和许多战斗。我应该跳进红色的贝壳吗 ？我应该在额头上戴一个戒指来说 “早上好 ” 吗 ？这是我们生命中的选择！<page>我感到惊讶的是 ， 语言朝圣者在这个被烧毁和残酷的地方被拯救。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, you feel peaceful in the desert.<page>Boshanka! Boshanka! This burning desert provides many roads and many battles. Should I jump into the red shells? Should I wear a ring on my forehead and say "Good Morning"? This is the choice in our lives!<page>I was surprised that language pilgrims were rescued in this burned and cruel place.

original_en_text: Here, the proof of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: 它是我们伟大的一部分 ， 也是上帝律法的象征。
secondary_translated_text: It is a part of our greatness and a symbol of God's law.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>If you are seeking challengers, sir, you should choose a location less far afield. It is rare chance I, or any bug, would come upon this distant cavern.<page>True! Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！<hpage>先生，若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: 这是什麽啊！灵活性 ， 终于！无限 （Infinite）<hpage>如果你正在寻找一个竞争对手 ， 选择一个不太远的地方。昆虫进入这个偏远洞穴的可能性非常小。<page>制片人！!但一旦你找到它 ， 什么是完美的 ？这具巨大的骨头尸体离国家农场很远。<page>你可以自由地测试你的速度和敏捷性。你可以在这里竞争。<page>挑战者？你想做这样的事情吗？我希望我的愿望能实现！让我们一起探索边界！
secondary_translated_text: What is this? Flexibility, finally! Infinite (infinite)<hpage>If you are looking for a competitor, choose a place that is not too far away. The possibility of insects entering this remote cave is very small.<page>Producer!! But once you find it, what is perfect? The huge bone corpse is far from the national farm.<page>You are free to test your speed and agility. You can compete here.<page>Challenger? Do you want to do something like this? I hope my wish can come true! Let's explore the boundaries together!

original_en_text: Our capital, built grand... The seat of our sovereignty... slipped from my mind...<page>Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 我的宏伟的都城……我的王座……为什么记不清了……<page>为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: 资本是奇妙的。主权在哪里 ？她从我的脑海里消失了。<page>他为什么消失了 ？为什么我们不记得圣地 ？
secondary_translated_text: Capital is wonderful. Where is sovereignty? She disappeared from my mind.<page>Why did he disappear? Why don't we remember the Holy Land?

original_en_text: Zaza and I will tarry here a little longer... These pilgrims need watching over, and we are committed to the task.
original_zh_text: 我和扎扎会在这多待一会……这些朝圣者需要照看。
translated_text: 谁和我将在这里停留一段时间 ， 这些朝圣者需要得到照顾 ， 我们致力于这个使命。
secondary_translated_text: Who and I will be here for a while, these pilgrims need to be taken care of, and we are committed to this mission.

original_en_text: Delicious! I like you already!<page>But what a bore it would be to cut you down now, when you’re so achingly close to our grand Citadel...<page>Climb higher, little spider. I want to savour your struggle just a little longer!
original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！<page>但现在杀你太无聊了，离圣堡就差一步……<page>继续爬吧小蜘蛛！让我想多看看你挣扎的样子！
translated_text: 这是美味！我知道我爱上了他！<page>然而， 它非常接近我们美丽的城堡， 所以把它分开是无聊的。"<page>“醒醒 ， 孩子。我想再打一次。
secondary_translated_text: This is delicious! I know I'm in love with him!<page>However, it is very close to our beautiful castle, so dividing it up is boring. "<page>"Wake up, child. I want to call again.

original_en_text: But Nuu is sensible, she understands. Miss grown-up has purpose, she must be away.<page>The cleaning can wait for another time. Nuu is patient... always patient.
original_zh_text: 但努努很懂事，知道大姐姐有正事要忙。<page>清洁可以等下次，努努很耐心……最有耐心了……
translated_text: 丹尼很聪明 ， 也很有同情心 ， 这个女人有一个目的 ， 她必须离开。<page>下次 ， 我等待清洁。我总是很有耐心。你总是必须有耐心。
secondary_translated_text: Danny is smart and compassionate, and this woman has a purpose and she has to leave.<page>Next time, I wait for cleaning. I am always patient. You always have to be patient.

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem to have some familiarity with this prison and its guards. Do you know a path to escape?<page>Escape! A little jailbug like you ain’t ever escapin’ anything! Get out of here, will you? Stop bothering us! You got nothing to steal, so we got nothing to talk about!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你看起来对这里很熟，知道越狱路线吗？<page>想逃？就你？下辈子吧！别烦我们了，身上什么也没有，没资格跟爷说话！
translated_text: <hpage>他知道监狱和看守。<page>快跑快跑！像你这样的囚犯 ， 永远逃不掉！” 离开这里， 不要打扰我， 不要偷窃， 不要争吵。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>He knows about prisons and guards.<page>Run, run, run! Prisoners like you will never escape!" Get out of here and don't bother me, don't steal, don't argue. "

original_en_text: Though the dust has not yet settled over our battle here, Zaza and I must soon be away. The memory of our village calls us ever onward. Farewell, brave sister!
original_zh_text: 虽然战斗激起的尘埃还没落定，但我们该走啦。村里的大伙催着我们前进呢，保重，姐妹！
translated_text: 我们在这里的斗争还没有结束 ， 但我和 Zi 必须尽快离开。人们的记忆带领我们前进。祝你好运。
secondary_translated_text: Our struggle here is not over yet, but Zi and I must leave as soon as possible. People's memories lead us forward. Good luck.

original_en_text: <page>You would challenge again, nimble bug? You have proven yourself time and again.<hpage>Your course can still provide understanding, sir. Upon it, I see my own limits clearer and learn to push them further. <page>Of course! Of course! And I can learn much following behind your fair form.<page>I’d need only a moment, and the track would again be ready.
original_zh_text: <page>还要比？你已经证明实力了。<hpage>还需练习，你的赛道让我能看清自己的极限。<page>那当然好！跟在你这矫健身姿后面也能学到很多！<page>稍等，马上就能布置好新赛道！
translated_text: <page>挑战是再次失去她。我试过很多次了。<hpage>师父 ， 您的道路带给我们直觉。从那时起 ， 我学会了更清楚地看到自己的局限性 ， 并进一步推动它们。<page>当然了！是啊 ， 不！我们可以从这种美丽中学到很多。<page>这将需要一段时间 ， 课程将再次准备就绪。
secondary_translated_text: <page>The challenge is losing her again. I've tried it many times.<hpage>Master, your path gives us intuition. Since then, I have learned to see my limitations more clearly and push them further.<page>Of course! Yeah, no! We can learn a lot from this beauty.<page>This will take a while and the course will be ready again.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your threats are worthless, child. If you are my foe, stay your voice and raise your blade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>不必多费口舌，孩子，要打的话，就亮兵器吧。
translated_text: <hpage>如果你是我的敌人 ， 请提高你的声音 ， 举起你的剑。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If you are my enemy, please raise your voice and raise your sword. "

original_en_text: I can save you, little spider. All the trouble you’d face above. All the suffering. It’s so simple.<page>I’ll just skewer you here and now, pluck that flickering life right out of you.
original_zh_text: 我能救你哦~小蜘蛛。只要现在刺穿你，把那点小火星掐灭……<page>所有的苦痛，所有的折磨，就都能解脱了。
translated_text: ” 我可以帮助你， 蜘蛛。他们面临的每一个问题 ， 每一个痛苦 ， 都很简单。<page>我现在加入你们 ， 为你们带来光明的生命。
secondary_translated_text: "I can help you, spider. Every problem and every pain they face is simple.<page>I join you now to bring you a bright life.

original_en_text: How sad. A little spider has fallen from its cage. So lost. So weak. Poor little morsel.
original_zh_text: 可怜的小蜘蛛从笼中跌落。多迷茫，多脆弱，真是令人心疼。
translated_text: 不幸的是 ， 一只小蜘蛛从笼子里掉了下来 ， 我失去了它。我是一个非常脆弱和贫穷的孩子。
secondary_translated_text: Unfortunately, a little spider fell out of the cage and I lost it. I am a very fragile and poor child.

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, is well-begun. Many creatures have been recorded, but many many more still to be learned of!<page>Miss grown-up, you should rest quick and venture out to hunt again soon, thinks Nuu!
original_zh_text: 哇哇，开了个好头！记了好多生物，但还有更多等着发现！<page>大姐姐赶紧休息完再去打猎呀！
translated_text: 我们已经记录了许多有机体 ， 但我们需要了解更多。<page>我早早起床去打猎。
secondary_translated_text: We have documented many organisms, but we need to know more.<page>I got up early to go hunting.

original_en_text: Well fought sister, well fought! Though terrible and tenacious, the beast was no match for us.<page>Be proud! The bugs of this land will sing of our victory to their offspring, and their offspring’s offspring, forever more!
original_zh_text: 打得漂亮！这畜生虽然强悍，但不是我们的对手！<page>等着听这儿的虫子们传唱咱们的战绩吧！
translated_text: 这只野兽是可怕的 ， 可怕的 ， 但它不是我们的敌人。<page>我为你感到骄傲！昆虫将永远歌唱我们的胜利。
secondary_translated_text: This beast is terrible, terrible, but it is not our enemy.<page>I am proud of you! Insects will always sing of our victory.

original_en_text: Hah... aha ha ha ha ha!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your sting, and you’ve bared the truth of my pathetic empty shell.<hpage>You always had the scent, child. You are no bug. Yours is a life born entirely from thread.<page>Life? You’re too generous! This weak, wasting existence. This was not life, just a husk shaped to act as a child.<hpage>Yours was life, pale one. Do not confuse your unique creation with its absence. I have seen others make the same mistake.<page>Platitudes, spider? From you? Don’t be gross.<page>Head on. Climb up, up and away. You’ve earned your audience with the divine.<page>Face the holy mother who would fashion so cruel and crude a daughter as me.
original_zh_text: 哈……哈哈哈哈！<page>恭喜啊小蜘蛛，你终于刺痛了我……也知道了我是具可悲的空壳。<hpage>我早察觉到了，孩子。你根本不是虫类，纯粹是丝线捏造的生命。<page>生命？你还真是心善！这种虚弱、日渐腐朽的身躯……这算什么生命，就是具空壳罢了。<hpage>你确实活着，苍白之子。我见过与你类似的存在……即便内里空无一物，你也是独一无二的生命。<page>少说漂亮话了，我只觉得恶心。<page>上去吧，你赢得觐见神明的资格了。<page>去面见那位造出我这般残次品的'圣母'吧……
translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！<page>恭喜你蜘蛛。最后 ， 我感受到了你的痛苦 ， 你找到了我的痛苦。<hpage>你将永远是 ， 我的女儿 ， 你不是一只昆虫 ， 你的生命是在线下诞生的。<page>你的生活怎么样？你太慷慨了！“这不是生命 ， 而是一个像孩子一样运作的身体。<hpage>不要把他的白色生活 ， 他的白色生活 ， 你唯一的创造 ， 与你的缺席混淆。<page>老蜘蛛？戴蒂 ？别伤害我。<page>起来 ， 起来 ， 去吧 ， 你配得上圣洁的倾听者！<page>如果你面对圣母玛利亚 ， 她会把你变成一个残忍和暴力的孩子 ， 就像我一样。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your pain, and you found my pain.<hpage>You will always be, my daughter, you are not an insect, your life is born offline.<page>How is your life? You are so generous! "This is not life, but a body that functions like a child.<hpage>Don't confuse his white life, his white life, your only creation, with your absence.<page>Old spider? Dee? don't hurt me.<page>Get up, get up, go, you deserve a holy listener!<page>If you face the Virgin Mary, she will turn you into a cruel and violent child, just like me.

original_en_text: Conversing is a pleasure, but I must return to my observance. Try not to leave too much of a trail when you leave, please.
original_zh_text: 和你聊天很愉快，但我得继续去观察了。离开时注意别留太多痕迹。
translated_text: 我很喜欢讲这个故事 ， 但我们必须恢复良心。当你离开时 ， 不要留下任何痕迹。
secondary_translated_text: I love telling this story, but we must regain our conscience. When you leave, don't leave any traces.

original_en_text: <page=M>Enough chatting, Old One. Best you get heading below. Whatever action you’re planning, time is against you.
original_zh_text: <page=M>那么闲话少叙，古老者。赶紧下去吧，您的计划可拖不起。
translated_text: <page=M>停下来 ， 老人 ， 做这个 ， 无论你做什么 ， 时间都会反对你。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Stop, old man, do this, no matter what you do, time will be against you.

original_en_text: For sharing this moment I shall have you accept a gift, one I had believed I would never pass. <page>You would take these rings, and the learnings to make more.<page>They are built of a clever method devised by my master and will crush hard this kingdom’s toughest shell. Use them, and she is remembered!<hpage>My thanks, Shakra. To gain a tool so defined by its owner, I am much grateful. They shall prove a great aid on my own journey.
original_zh_text: 谢谢你陪我度过这一时刻，这些东西我本想永远留着……你当作谢礼收下吧。<page>这些环刃和制法都传给你。<page>它们是按我导师的巧思打造的，能击碎最硬的壳。希望你用得上，以此纪念她！<hpage>感激不尽，沙克拉。能继承如此珍贵的武器，对我的旅程大有帮助。
translated_text: 为了分享这一刻 ， 你可以接受你从未给予过的礼物。<page>我会拿着戒指 ， 查出所有细节。<page>它建造得很好 ， 我的主人设计它是为了打破王国最坚硬的外壳。<hpage>谢谢你 ， 谢谢这就是我们描述的工具。我们感谢业主给我们这个机会 ， 并感谢他们。这对我的旅行有很大的帮助。
secondary_translated_text: To share this moment, you can accept gifts you have never given before.<page>I'll take the ring and find out every detail.<page>It was well built, and my master designed it to break through the hardest shell of the kingdom.<hpage>Thank you, thank you. This is the tool we describe. We thank the owners for giving us this opportunity and thank them. This was a great help for my trip.

original_en_text: The warmth of these caverns keeps many smells alive! Is good for Nuu, who is always searching carefully for learnings!
original_zh_text: 洞窟里的余温保留着气味！正适合努努慢慢探索！
translated_text: 这个洞穴的热量散发出令人愉快的气味！对于那些一直在寻找知识的人来说 ， 这是个好消息！"
secondary_translated_text: The heat of this cave gives off a pleasant smell! This is good news for those who have been looking for knowledge! "

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but even so you should not let down your guard.<hpage>You must have seen now that the bugs of this Citadel are long fallen to the Haunting.<page>Ahh... some of my brothers and sisters have seemed... lost somehow, yes. But to be lost is to be sometime found, is it not sung?<page>Yes... The Citadel will provide for them. It is a holy place indeed, that holds wonders such as this lovely warm bath!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，别因为泡澡放松警惕。<hpage>你也看到了，此地的虫民多半被丝咒侵蚀。<page>有些同袍确实……看着不太对劲。但迷途终有归时，对吧？<page>圣堡自会庇佑他们。能有这么舒服的暖泉，肯定是圣地没错！
translated_text: <hpage>一根小管子 ， 像这样的浴缸 ， 可以暂时缓解外界的危险 ， 但它甚至不能缓解警惕。<hpage>正如你所看到的 ， 城堡里的昆虫落入了鬼魂的手中。<page>是的 ， 对。为什么他们不能像我的兄弟一样成功 ？你会找到你失去的东西吗 ？<page>这是一个真正的神圣的地方， 像这个美丽的温泉一样奇迹！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>A small tube, such as this bathtub, can temporarily relieve external dangers, but it cannot even relieve vigilance.<hpage>As you can see, the insects in the castle have fallen into the hands of the ghost.<page>Yes, right. Why can't they be as successful as my brothers? Will you find what you lost?<page>This is a truly sacred place, as miraculous as this beautiful hot spring!

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！再战一轮！<page>我马上布置新的赛道！
translated_text: 我们开始了一场伟大的鱼类比赛！
secondary_translated_text: We started a great fish race!

original_en_text: Hoy! We thought one of them buzzing bullies was sneakin’ up on us, but it’s just a mangy jailbug!<page>Why you in here, then? Caught thievin’ were you? Greedy, greedy!<hpage>I’ve stolen nothing. Rather, I suspect the wardens are servants of the Citadel. The cage used in my capture bore similar runes to the one that first brought me to this land.<hpage>Bound in that cage, I’d have proved a fine gift were they to deliver me to their masters.<page>Pah, there ain’t nothin’ fine about you, jailbug. We recognised a fellow thief soon as we saw you!<page>Now, don’t be lingerin’ around here. Those guards’ll be wanting to pop you back in your cage quick quick!<hpage>They’ll not get the chance. I will reclaim my belongings and leave this grim place with haste.
original_zh_text: 还当是狱卒呢，结果是只脏老鼠！<page>你是因为偷什么进来的？贪心鬼！<hpage>我没偷东西。这儿的狱卒应该侍奉于圣堡，抓我的笼子和最初那个有相同印记。<hpage>如此执着于我，看来它们真的认为我是一份献给主人的好礼物。<page>呸，你身上有什么好的！少装蒜，我一看你就一脸贼相！<page>快走快走！别在附近瞎晃悠，小心又被关回笼子！<hpage>他们没机会的，我取回自己的东西就走。
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。我知道人群会来 ， 但这只是一个肮脏的逃生！<page>你为什么在这里 ？你抓到小偷了吗？有贪婪 ， 有贪婪。<hpage>我从未偷过任何东西。让我们假设一个守卫是城堡的仆人。我被关在笼子里 ， 上面刻着符文的字母 ， 就像把我带到这个地球上的笼子一样。<hpage>如果我被交给我的主人 ， 被关在笼子里 ， 那将是一份伟大的礼物。<page>当我看到它时 ， 我认出了小偷。<page>守卫回到笼子里 ， 快跑！<hpage>我想拿回我的行李 ， 尽快离开这个黑暗的地方。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. I knew the crowd would come, but it was just a dirty escape!<page>Why are you here? Did you catch the thief? There is greed, there is greed.<hpage>I've never stolen anything. Let us assume that a guard is a servant of the castle. I was kept in a cage with runic letters engraved on it, just like the cage that brought me to this earth.<hpage>If I were handed over to my master and locked in a cage, it would be a great gift.<page>When I saw it, I recognized the thief.<page>Guard back in the cage and run!<hpage>I want to get my luggage back and get out of this dark place as soon as possible.

original_en_text: You recover quickly. Already, my ring-marks have faded from your shell. If you are prepared, let us duel again.
original_zh_text: 你恢复真快，我留下的环印都消了。准备好了我们就再战。
translated_text: 她的康复加速 ， 我戒指上的指纹从她的外壳中消失了。当我准备好了 ， 我会再战斗。
secondary_translated_text: Her recovery accelerated and the fingerprints on my ring disappeared from her shell. When I am ready, I will fight again.

original_en_text: ...Yes, communication is the heart of it. The grandest boasts and the tiniest murmurings all have their meanings...<page>...Your point is well made. Even the flowers have their stories to tell. Light can be cast anywhere...<hpage>I’ve no desire to interrupt your meditations, Herald, but I am eager to speak with you, if you would listen...<page>...Take note of it all, render it in line, you’ll be glad that you did. You can take the journey home with you...
original_zh_text: ……沟通至关重要。无论豪言壮语还是呢喃低语皆有深意……<page>……此言甚是。野花亦在诉说故事。光明无处不在...<hpage>使者大人，无意打扰冥思，但我急盼能与您交谈，您……<page>……记录所见所闻，他日必将受用。故乡之路存于心……
translated_text: ...沟通就是心脏。大口哨和小口哨是有原因的。<page>...花儿有故事。灯光可以投射到任何地方。<hpage>我不想打断你的想法 ， 先锋先生 ， 但如果你愿意听我说话 ， 我想和你谈谈。<page>...如果你把一切都写下来并按顺序发送 ， 你会很高兴这样做。
secondary_translated_text: ... Communication is the heart. There is a reason for big whistles and small whistles.<page>... Flowers have stories. Light can be cast anywhere.<hpage>I hate to interrupt your thoughts, Mr. Pioneer, but if you're willing to listen to me, I'd like to talk to you.<page>... If you write everything down and send it in order, you will be happy to do so.

original_en_text: Oooh, but the scroll is so heavy with beautiful beasts! Could it be that the works is almost complete? Miss grown-up, you must keep your preyings up. No time for rest!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，记录册都快写满了！是不是快完成了？大姐姐不能偷懒哦！
translated_text: 电影里有很多很棒的动物。您的项目几乎完成了吗？孩子们 ， 我们继续打猎。现在不是休息的时候！
secondary_translated_text: There are many great animals in the movie. Is your project almost complete? Children, let's keep hunting. Now is not the time to rest!

original_en_text: The myth we made... by grace... by blade...<page>All bowed before we princes green...
original_zh_text: 我们缔造的传说……凭恩泽……凭利刃……<page>万虫皆向绿王臣服……
translated_text: 创造的神话我很感激你的善良。你应该用刀子。<page>每个人都喜欢绿色的王子。
secondary_translated_text: I appreciate your kindness. You should use a knife.<page>Everyone loves the green prince.

original_en_text: So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: 它们往往很简单 ： 自由和快乐。
secondary_translated_text: They are often simple: freedom and happiness.

original_en_text: Do you see? How crass and frail that Citadel’s machines! This one groans in pain at its very existence.<hpage>Its mechanism is likely jammed. If the gears were unstuck its clamorous complaints would soon cease, and it could become a useful place to rest.<page>A place to rest or no, I desire only for the noise to stop!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？圣堡的破机器嘎吱乱叫，活着都费劲。<hpage>齿轮卡住了。修好应该能当个歇息的好地方，噪音也能停。<page>歇不歇息无所谓，我只想赶紧让这破响动停下来！
translated_text: 你看到这个了吗？多么简单又脆弱的堡垒啊！一个男人在他面前呻吟 ， 痛苦。<hpage>一旦移除设备 ， 噪音就会停止 ， 成为一个舒适的休息场所。<page>我只想停止制造噪音 ， 不管我是否休息。
secondary_translated_text: Do you see this? What a simple and fragile fortress! A man groaned in front of him, in pain.<hpage>Once the equipment is removed, the noise stops and it becomes a comfortable place to rest.<page>I just want to stop making noise, whether I rest or not.

original_en_text: These root-woven roads show evidence of my master’s passage. A thrice-crushed bug, gouged wood, score-prints of sharp claws passing. Small signs that only I can read.<page>Though the trail is cold, it eases me to know she is still within this land.
original_zh_text: 这附近有导师踪迹：尖锐的爪痕、凿开的树木、压扁的虫尸……只有我看得懂。<page>虽然痕迹都挺久了，但知道她还在纺络我就安心了。
translated_text: 这条迷失在根源中的道路 ， 就是师父所走的道路。昆虫被打破了三次 ， 树被打破了 ， 指甲有锋利的痕迹。<page>路上很冷 ， 但知道他还在地上 ， 这让他松了一口气。
secondary_translated_text: This path lost in its roots is the path taken by the Master. The insect was broken three times, the tree was broken, and the nails had sharp marks.<page>The road was cold, but he breathed a sigh of relief knowing that he was still on the ground.

original_en_text: <hpage>These are dangerous fields, young one, not for casual wandering. What task sees you brave them?<page>A treacherous quest! But a crucial one! Upon the last wish of my father, I’ve taken up the study of these wild caves.<page>These fields still display life and growth, even as the lands around erode to dust.<page>There is a hot harmony here that eludes the grey wastes above and the dry Marrow beside. With time and study, I shall uncover why.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小虫子，这片荒野很危险，你怎么有胆子进来闲逛？<page>虽然危险，但很重要！我是继承父亲遗志在研究这些洞穴！<page>即便到处都是腐蚀和灰烬，这片荒野却还显露着生机。<page>这里肯定有特殊热源维系，我要找出原因！
translated_text: <hpage>“伙计们 ， 这是一个危险的地方。别坐在这里。<page>这是一个非常危险的任务！但这是强制性的！在我父亲的要求下 ， 我开始探索野生洞穴。<page>尽管周围的土地被摧毁并化为尘土 ， 但这些领域仍然活跃并不断增长。<page>它具有温暖的和谐 ， 可以避免顶部的灰色碎片和旁边的干燥骨髓。随着时间的推移和研究 ， 我们会明白为什么。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Guys, this is a dangerous place. don't sit here.<page>This is a very dangerous mission! But this is mandatory! At my father's request, I began exploring wild caves.<page>Although the surrounding land was destroyed and turned to dust, these fields remained active and growing.<page>It has a warm harmony that avoids gray debris on the top and dry bone marrow next to it. Over time and research, we will understand why.

original_en_text: Track your location throughout these winding lands with a bone compass. Each member of our tribe can craft them. I would pass you mine, for a small price.
original_zh_text: 这个骨制罗盘能让你分辨自己的位置。我们部落都会做，付点小钱就给你。
translated_text: 使用骨罗盘来监视变形地球的位置。我们部落里的任何人都可以做到这一点。
secondary_translated_text: Use a bone compass to monitor the position of the deformed earth. Anyone in our tribe can do this.

original_en_text: Ooooh, ma ma! Even young Nuu never guessed that Pharloom held so many fascinating creatures! Soft ones, hard ones, small ones, big ones! Nuu is greedy to see what remains!
original_zh_text: 哇！连努努都没想到纺络有这么多神奇生物！软的硬的大的小的！好贪心，好想看剩下的！
translated_text: 我的母亲 ， 甚至她的姐姐 ， 都不知道法罗群岛有这么多迷人的生物。硬 ， 软 ， 小 ， 大！我想看看其余的。
secondary_translated_text: My mother, or even her sister, had no idea that the Faroe Islands had so many fascinating creatures. Hard, soft, small, big! I want to see the rest.

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before. They mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>It is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>Without rosaries, the shrine remains hidden. I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. This kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>无念珠者不得休憩，纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: 你看到你面前的红色女人了吗？我清楚地记得这次朝圣。<page>当你唱歌时 ， 神奇的神庙升起 ， 成为休息的地方。<hpage>唤醒圣殿的不是一首歌 ， 而是念珠。<hpage>玫瑰经不存在 ， 圣所是隐藏的。我们在通往帕尔马岛的路上找到了一座类似的建筑。王国没有休息。
secondary_translated_text: Do you see the red woman in front of you? I remember this pilgrimage clearly.<page>As you sing, the magical temple rises and becomes a place to rest.<hpage>What awakened the temple was not a song, but a rosary.<hpage>The Rosary does not exist, the sanctuary is hidden. We found a similar building on the road to Palma. The kingdom has no rest.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These I have fashioned from the husks of old bells. A hard task to make, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用古钟的壳打磨成的，可费劲了。
translated_text: 您可以使用它在地图上显示重要地点和回忆。<br><br>这是一项艰巨的工作 ， 所以成本反映了额外的努力。
secondary_translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>It's a tough job, so the cost reflects the extra effort.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Here we meet, high atop this twisted steel structure. I can sense fierce enemies ahead.<page>It seems you too draw closer to your trail’s end. With my own task now resolved, my rings call for combat.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, shall we fight forward together?
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！你好啊，又见面了。我能感受到前面有强大的敌人在呢。<page>看来你的旅途也走了很远了。现在我的任务也完成了，正手痒呢。<page>使针的小姑娘，怎么说，我们一起上吧？
translated_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！就在这个扭曲的钢结构上方 ， 你可以感觉到一个凶猛的敌人在你面前。<page>现在 ， 我的使命结束了 ， 我的戒指必须战斗。<page>蜜蜂会转动针头来战斗吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! Boshanka! Just above this twisted steel structure, you can feel a fierce enemy in front of you.<page>Now, my mission is over and my ring must fight.<page>Will bees turn their needles to fight?

original_en_text: All of these marvellous healing supplies... Surely they, at least, are some proof of the Citadel’s holy nature?
original_zh_text: 这么多神奇药品……至少说明圣堡还是灵验的吧？
translated_text: 他们是至少一个证据的神圣的性格教会 ？
secondary_translated_text: Are they at least one proof of the sacred character of the Church?

original_en_text: H-hoy red m-maiden! Have no f-fear, ‘tis only I, Sherma!<page>I found healing supplies, b-but then the way back collapsed... and I heard moaning from the dark... oh, how thankful I am to see you!
original_zh_text: 红、红衣姑娘！是我是我！<page>我找到药，可是路塌了……又听见黑暗里有怪声……见到你太好了！
translated_text: 我的小红姑娘。“别担心 ， 是我 ， 谢尔曼。<page>我很感激我看到了它 ， 找到了治愈的材料 ， 听到了回家路上的黑暗的低语！
secondary_translated_text: My little red girl. "Don't worry, it's me, Sherman.<page>I am so grateful that I saw it, found the material for healing, and heard the dark whisper on the way home!

translated_text: 的 Worm 。
secondary_translated_text: Worm.

translated_text: 我们应该一起战斗吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Should we fight together?

original_en_text: The great Citadel is so close, I can hear the voices of our brother and sister pilgrims calling out to us!
original_zh_text: 圣堡近在咫尺！兄弟姐妹的呼唤已传到我耳中了！
translated_text: 附近有一座大城堡 ， 我能听到朝圣者的尖叫声。
secondary_translated_text: There was a large castle nearby and I could hear the screams of pilgrims.

original_en_text: What a battle, brave warrior! You’re the first I’ve seen who could match the red-shells and emerge victorious.<hpage>They are deadly foes indeed, and seemingly keen hunters. You did well to keep yourself hidden from them, young bug.<page>I did, didn’t I? Disguise and subterfuge are skills I’ve honed keenly, all in aid of my most important work!
original_zh_text: 打得太漂亮了！我还是头回见有虫能干掉红壳怪！<hpage>它们确实是狠角色，狩猎本能很强。你躲得挺好。<page>是吧？伪装潜行可是我的绝活，都是为了伟大研究！
translated_text: 多么英勇的战士 ， 多么英勇的战斗！你是第一个在红包中竞争并获胜的人。<hpage>他看起来像一个致命的敌人和一个贪婪的猎人。<page>你做到了 ， 对吧 ？事实上？服装和特技是你需要完善的技能 ， 以完成最重要的事情！
secondary_translated_text: What a heroic soldier, what a heroic battle! You are the first person to compete and win in red envelopes.<hpage>He looked like a deadly enemy and a greedy hunter.<page>You did it, didn't you? Actually? Costumes and stunts are the skills you need to improve to get the most important things done!

original_en_text: Mind yourself while you travel this grim land. A great winged beast has been stalking the heights, swooping without warning and tearing the life out of unwary travellers!<hpage>I believe I have seen the creature you speak of. It may have marked me as prey, and followed me down onto the lower roads of the moor.<page>What what! Gurrrooo! The beast has been spotted! Once Zaza has fully rested, we’ll set to tracking it down!
original_zh_text: 当心天上，有只长翅膀的畜生专抓路人！<hpage>我见过它，多半是盯上我了，还跟到了沼泽这边。<page>你说什么！嘎噜！那畜生就在附近！等扎扎歇够了就去宰了它！
translated_text: 在这个充满挑战的国家旅行时要小心 ， 因为巨大的捕食者在天空中漫游 ， 毫无征兆地躲藏起来 ， 并夺走鲁莽的旅行者的生命！<hpage>“我知道你是什么样的生物 ， ” 他带我出去吃点东西 ， 然后我们去了沙漠。<page>这是什么 ？你在干什么？Gollum！野兽被发现了。当孩子完全休息时 ， 他开始打猎。
secondary_translated_text: Be careful when traveling in this challenging country, as giant predators roam the skies, hiding without warning and taking the lives of reckless travelers!<hpage>"I know what kind of creature you are," he took me out for something to eat, and then we went to the desert.<page>What is this? What are you doing? Gollum! The beast was found. When the child was completely rested, he began hunting.

original_en_text: Welcome back red maiden, and thank you again for coming to my aid.<page>I’m no healer, but with the supplies we found in the ward below even my unlearned claws can ease the suffering of our brothers and sisters.<page>That such darkness could creep into this most holy of places, even though we pilgrims kept our promise to ascend...<page>I confess, I wonder at the meaning of it all. But enlightenment does not come easily, or all at once... I should just continue my task in the meantime.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘回来啦！再次感谢你帮忙。<page>我本来不懂医术，不过从下面拿来了药，简单包扎也能止痛。<page>我们千辛万苦爬上来，黑暗还是钻进了圣地……<page>实在想不通！但悟道要慢慢来……先做好手头的事吧！
translated_text: 欢迎回家 ， 红色的女孩 ， 谢谢你的帮助。<page>我不是一个治疗师 ， 但我在下面的房间里发现的材料可以减轻我的兄弟姐妹的痛苦 ， 即使我没有学会如何做指甲。<page>我们朝圣者信守了登山的诺言 ， 但黑暗正在升起到这个最神圣的地方。<page>然而 ， 启蒙并不容易 ， 也不会突然到来 ， 同时我们必须继续我们的使命。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome home, red girl, thank you for your help.<page>I'm not a therapist, but the materials I found in the room below can relieve the pain of my siblings, even if I haven't learned how to do nails.<page>We pilgrims have kept our promise to climb mountains, but darkness is rising into this most sacred place.<page>However, enlightenment is not easy and does not come suddenly, and we must continue our mission.

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! I was hoping we would meet here, red maiden.<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of my brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. You have seen now the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！没想到在这儿碰上了！<page>能登上圣堡和这么多同袍团聚……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？想必你已看清此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: 这是什么 ？你在干什么？哦 ， 我的上帝 ， 它在这里。再见 ， 红色。<page>最后 ， 我成为了这座城市的大祭司 ， 也是许多兄弟姐妹的中保。这确实是一种祝福。是的 ， 这是一种祝福。<hpage>小小的朝圣者啊 ， 把这种恐惧隐藏在信仰中。现在你看到了这个荒野的现实 ， 你怎么看 ？
secondary_translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? Oh, my God, it's here. Goodbye, Red.<page>In the end, I became the high priest of the city and the mediator of many brothers and sisters. This is indeed a blessing. Yes, this is a blessing.<hpage>Little pilgrim, hide this fear in your faith. Now that you see the reality of this wilderness, what do you think?

original_en_text: Safely-saved is Pill! But who is this rare carer for the shell of another? Name yourself, good bug!<hpage>I am Hornet, Pill. Your brother wished for your return to Bellhart, where he waits now. I’m sure he will be eager to see you alive.<page>Young Tipp! How he worries always. Blessed I am for the care, him and you Miss Hornet! A lucky bug is me!
original_zh_text: 皮尔安、安全了！这位好心女士怎么称呼？<hpage>我叫大黄蜂。你的兄弟蒂普在钟心镇等你，快回去吧。<page>小蒂普！总是瞎操心。多谢你啦大黄蜂小姐！我运气真好！
translated_text: 药物是安全的。但是谁是处理别人贝壳的特殊人？请告诉我你的名字。<hpage>- 你的哥哥说你活着回到了巴巴特 ， 你想见他。<page>我一直很担心她 ， 我很幸运能照顾他和你 ， 肖维特小姐。
secondary_translated_text: Drugs are safe. But who is the special person who handles other people's shells? Please tell me your name.<hpage>- Your brother said you made it back to Babate alive and that you wanted to see him.<page>I've been worried about her, and I'm lucky to take care of him and you, Miss Showitt.

original_en_text: I pray my dice bring you luck on your final climb, sister. And I pray that by parting with them, my own ascent shall be made lighter.
original_zh_text: 愿骰子保佑你登顶，姐妹。送走它们，我身上的负担也轻了。
translated_text: 姐姐 ， 我祈祷我的数据能给我最后一次扬升带来好运。我祈祷当我分心的时候 ， 我的扬升会更容易。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, I pray that my data will bring good luck on my last Ascension. I pray that when I am distracted, my Ascension will be easier.

original_en_text: See here, this old statue. I’ve been thinking long on it, what clues it might hold.<page>The claw-work seems beyond the other structures throughout these caves. Who was she I wonder, to deserve such refined remembrance?<hpage>Hers is the form of a dancer, and the craft is indeed exquisite. There must once have been more to these ants, before the Haunting snared their shells and minds.
original_zh_text: 看这尊古雕像！我盯着它看了好久。<page>工艺比周围建筑精细多了。她到底是谁呢，值得被这样铭记？<hpage>看样子是名舞者，造型确实精美。看来蚁族被丝咒控制前肯定辉煌过。
translated_text: 看着这座古老的雕像 ， 我很久以来一直在想它到底意味着什么。<page>大炮似乎超过了洞穴中的其他结构。<hpage>她的风格是一种舞蹈形式 ， 技术真的很棒。蚂蚁必须在鬼魂关闭壳和心脏之前做更多的事情。
secondary_translated_text: Looking at this ancient statue, I have been wondering for a long time what it means.<page>The cannon seemed to outperform other structures in the cave.<hpage>Her style is a form of dance and the technique is really great. Ants must do more before the ghost closes its shell and heart.

translated_text: 是的 ， 对。禁忌的味道。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. The taste of taboo.

original_en_text: Holy water, nice and hot,<br>Makes a perfect swimming spot,<br>Heals your worries in a flash,<br>So jump on in... splash splash splash! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 圣水暖又清，<br>泡澡好舒心，<page>烦恼顷刻散，<br>扑通跳进来！哈哈哈！
translated_text: 圣水是温暖的。<br>最好的地方游泳。<br>他立即表达了他的担忧。<br>跳， 跳！
secondary_translated_text: Holy water is warm.<br>Best place to swim.<br>He immediately expressed his concerns.<br>Jump, jump!

original_en_text: Very, very lucky little trinket we got ‘ere! Pulls ‘em little clickie-clackies right into yer waitin’ claws!
original_zh_text: 超级幸运的招财符！把叮当响都吸过来！
translated_text: 这些都是幸福的小事！把他们放在你的脚上！
secondary_translated_text: These are all happy little things! Put them on your feet!

original_en_text: Gurrroo! A fellow warrior braves this blighted place! Know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza.<page>Together, Zaza and I are wish bound to scale this Citadel, and vanquish the horrors at its heart!<hpage>Then good luck to you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another of sound mind and fortitude enough to fight back against the many haunted husks.<page>Aye! Never-ending, these unnatural opponents! This Citadel seems its twisted source, and honour decrees we must fight on, until we rend the heart of its decay!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！又来个勇士！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<page>我们要杀上圣堡，端了诅咒的老巢！<hpage>那祝你好运。难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊，这些傀儡，杀都杀不完！圣堡似乎就藏着祸根，必须捣毁！
translated_text: 快点 ， 快点！快点 ， 快点！同志们勇敢地站在这片荒芜之地！我知道我面对的是受人尊敬的骑士 Gamone 和他勇敢的同伴 Ziza 。<page>吉和我要一起去城堡消除恐惧！<hpage>祝你好运 ， bugs. It ’ s迷人的看到别人是多么聪明 ， 坚定和幽灵般的扔这么多的贝壳。<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！永远 ， 这些不自然的敌人。这座城堡似乎是这场混乱的根源 ， 我们必须尊重心脏勋章 ， 直到我们能够挖掘出里面腐烂的心脏！
secondary_translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! Comrades stand bravely in this deserted land! I knew I was facing the respected knight Gamone and his brave companion Ziza.<page>Ji and I are going to the castle to dispel the fear!<hpage>Good luck, bugs. It's fascinating to see how smart, determined and ghostly others are to throw so many shells.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Forever, these unnatural enemies. This castle seems to be the source of this chaos, and we must respect the Heart Medal until we can dig out the rotten heart inside!

original_en_text: <hpage>I found the well in the hidden chambers beyond. The power that remained at its base I have taken for myself.<page=S>Bound yourself a new nature, aye? And from the shells of our ancestors, no less, all those many who’ve called these lands their own.<page=S>You make it seem so simple-like. All o’that learning, all o’that strength... sucked up in a whirl of Silk.<page=M>We’d call you a thief, Old One, and cruel for the taking, but its all coming down soon if you can’t stop it.<page=M>If there’s advantage in your act that might see these caves safe, then it’s better you make your claim.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在密室深处找到了那口井。已将其底部的力量纳为己用。<page=S>给自己添了一种新本源，嗯？用的还是我们先祖的躯壳——那些曾以此地为家的无数先祖。<page=S>你说得轻巧。所有学识，所有力量……都被灵丝漩涡吸走了。<page=M>我们本该骂你是小偷，古老者，如此残忍夺取……但若你阻止不了黑暗，一切马上都要崩塌了。<page=M>若你真能保全这些洞窟，那还是由你取走为好。
translated_text: <hpage>我们在一个遥远的隐藏房间里找到了一口井 ， 并以此为基础接管剩余的电力。<page=S>同样 ， 在我们祖先的壳中 ， 每一个声称拥有这片土地的国家都是在我们祖先的壳中诞生的。<page=S>所有的知识 ， 所有的力量 ， 都被吸收在丝绸的漩涡中。<page=M>” 我叫你小偷。“偷窃是残酷的 ， 但如果你不阻止它 ， 它很快就会发生。"<page=M>如果你的行动有利于保护这些洞穴 ， 那么你最好提出你的问题。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>We found a well in a remote hidden room and used it as a basis to take over the remaining electricity.<page=S>Likewise, in the shell of our ancestors, every country that claims to own this land was born in the shell of our ancestors.<page=S>All knowledge and all power are absorbed in the whirlpool of silk.<page=M>"I called you a thief. "Stealing is cruel, but if you don't stop it, it will happen quickly. "<page=M>If your actions are conducive to protecting these caves, then you'd better ask your questions.

original_en_text: Best keep your visits brief, Hornet Wielding Needle. Without swift action taken, our world’s ruin seems certain.<page>If you cannot calm Pharloom’s tortured throes, then certainly no other bug could face the task. <hpage>As you say, Shakra. I shall do what I must.
original_zh_text: 别逗留太久，小姑娘。不快点解决，世界就要完蛋了。<page>如果你都搞不定，更没虫能行。<hpage>我会尽力而为。
translated_text: 谈话很简短 ， 汉布尔比用一根针操纵。如果没有迅速的反应 ， 世界肯定会被摧毁。<page>如果我们不能减轻法老的痛苦 ， 那么其他昆虫肯定无法完成这项工作。<hpage>正如我之前所说的 ， 我正在做我必须做的事情。
secondary_translated_text: The conversation was brief, and Hambleby manipulated it with a needle. Without a quick response, the world will surely be destroyed.<page>If we cannot alleviate the pharaoh's suffering, then other insects will surely not be able to complete the job.<hpage>As I said before, I am doing what I have to do.

original_en_text: Near the edge of those lands swept by wind and sand, Nuu has seen it, a single bug, watching, waiting.<page> Too scared was Nuu to crawl close, for fear it would wake, and its big blade might mark this perfect shell.<page>For the journal’s sake, you should seek the bug, up on edge, through a tall tunnel hidden by crust.<page>A hard find, that one, but Nuu is not worried! She knows your adult cunning will see you there quick!
original_zh_text: 在风沙之地的边缘，努努曾看见一只虫子在守望等待。<page> 努努怕它醒来，怕它的巨刃划破我的漂亮甲壳，所以不敢靠近。<page> 但为了使记录册完整，大姐姐去找它吧——就在高处边缘，穿过一段硬壳掩藏的高耸隧道就到了。<page> 虽然难找，但努努不担心！以成年虫的机灵劲儿肯定能很快找到！
translated_text: 昆虫爬在被风和沙子覆盖的土壤边缘 ， 等待着看到它。<page>井被吓坏了 ， 不敢靠近 ， 害怕醒来 ， 大树叶显示出完美的外壳。<page>为了写日记 ， 你必须穿过隐藏在贝壳中的高隧道 ， 最后找到一只昆虫。<page>很难发现 ， 但我不担心。我相信你的成熟将很快在这里！
secondary_translated_text: The insect crawls on the edge of the soil covered by wind and sand, waiting to see it.<page>The well was so scared that he didn't dare to get close, afraid of waking up, and the big leaves showed their perfect shells.<page>In order to keep a diary, you must walk through high tunnels hidden in shells and finally find an insect.<page>Hard to spot, but I'm not worried. I believe your maturity will be here soon!

original_en_text: For my mapping stock, we have traded all the charts and tools I can provide. While this new threat remains, I shall not make more.<page>My cartography may be a simple sort, but I hope that my craft shared has made your travels easier.
original_zh_text: 我的存货都卖光了。危机不解除，我也没法做新的。<page>我绘制的图纸可能有些简略，但希望能帮上你的忙。
translated_text: 在我的地图库存中 ， 我交换了所有我能提供的地图和工具。只要这个新的威胁存在 ， 我就不再相信它了。<page>我的绘画可能很简单 ， 但我希望我分享的工匠能让您的旅程更轻松。
secondary_translated_text: In my map inventory, I exchanged all the maps and tools I could provide. As long as this new threat exists, I no longer believe in it.<page>My paintings may be simple, but I hope the craftsmen I share will make your journey easier.

original_en_text: Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: 带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: 姐妹们 ， 请带我来。我付了税 ， 看着他。
secondary_translated_text: Sisters, please bring me here. I paid my taxes and looked at him.

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, has opened the way forward for us!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？骨门听到歌声，为我们让路了！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。你看到这个了吗？红色的老妇人 ， 大门 ， 倾听我的歌声 ， 以无限的慈悲为我们开辟道路！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Do you see this? Red old woman, door, listen to my song, open the way for us with infinite mercy!

original_en_text: <hpage>Must you not press on, sirs?<page>Oh, yes! We will be off at once. Very soon. I fear though, that Zaza must rest a little longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位还不出发么？<page>马上！这就出发！我就是觉得，扎扎可能要多休息一会……
translated_text: <hpage>朋友们 ， 我们可以继续吗 ？<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦 ， 是的！很快 ， 我想吉尔会休息一下。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Friends, can we continue?<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh, yes! Soon, I think Jill will take a break.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！
translated_text: 波斯娜波斯娜！清晰和明确！
secondary_translated_text: Bosna Bosna! Clear and clear!

original_en_text: <page=M>Even knowing her motivation, it is a shock the monarch can resist so long. We’d thought none could survive that void.<hpage>She will have retreated within her protective form, that cocoon of thread. Even as the dark eats its outer, she will spin its Silk anew.<hpage>The effort would be immense and it will strain her soul thin, but what other choice remains?<hpage>This is the desperate act of a dying god. A defiance that, left unchallenged, will bring your kingdom’s ruin.
original_zh_text: <page=M>就算清楚她的动机，君主能撑这么久也是令我们惊讶。本以为生物不可能在虚空中存活。<hpage>她必是缩进了护体茧壳。这样即便外层被黑暗啃噬，也能重织新丝。<hpage>但这样耗力巨大，魂魄都将稀薄，但还有得选吗？<hpage>这是垂死神明的困兽之斗。若不阻止，必会让王国化为废墟。
translated_text: <page=M>令人震惊的是 ， 国王能够忍受这么长时间 ， 尽管他知道他的动机。<hpage>他回到他的保护形式 — 管。她的外表被黑暗所掩盖 ， 但她重新获得了丝绸般的形象。<hpage>努力是巨大的 ， 它会吸收你的灵魂 ， 但是它是什么 ？还有什么其他选择 ？<hpage>这就是面对神的死亡的绝望 ， 如果我们不拒绝这种抵抗 ， 神的国将被摧毁。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>It is shocking that the king was able to endure for so long, even though he knew his motives.<hpage>He returned to his form of protection-tube. Her appearance was concealed by darkness, but she regained her silky image.<hpage>Hard work is huge, it will absorb your soul, but what is it? What other options are there?<hpage>This is the despair of God's death. If we do not reject this resistance, God's kingdom will be destroyed.

original_en_text: <page=M>The quakes... This collapse will take Pharloom all.<hpage>If the void doesn’t claim it first. Surely you’ve seen them, the black threads that wrack your lands? The dark leeches up, possessed upon the fallen monarch’s Silk.<hpage>Pharloom’s roads were not safe before. Now they’ll prove impassable. Those pilgrims still alive in your lands best huddle and hope. <hpage>If there can be another end to this, it is up to us to discover it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>这震颤……纺络要全塌了。<hpage>怕不是会被虚空先吞了去。没见那些撕裂大地的黑丝么？黑暗正顺着坠落君王的灵丝涌上来。<hpage>纺络的道途本就不安稳，如今更是绝路，残存的朝圣者只能抱团等死。<hpage>但若还有转机，唯有靠我们能寻得。
translated_text: <page=M>地震和山体滑坡是罪魁祸首<hpage>你有没有见过一条黑线穿过你的国家 ？一个黑暗的吸血鬼与一个堕落的君主的丝绸。<hpage>我知道帕劳的街道并不安全。他们没有被超越。朝圣者仍然生活在自己的土地上。<hpage>如果还有别的结局 ， 你必须找到它。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Earthquakes and landslides are the main culprits<hpage>Have you ever seen a black line running through your country? The silk of a dark vampire and a fallen monarch.<hpage>I know the streets of Palau are not safe. They have not been surpassed. Pilgrims still live on their own land.<hpage>If there is another ending, you must find it.

original_en_text: <hpage>Why do you sing, little one? This bony gate seems like a poor audience.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，为何对着骨门歌唱？这可不是什么知音。
translated_text: <hpage>孩子 ， 你为什么要唱歌 ？狭窄的门似乎是一群可怜的旁观者。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Boy, why are you singing? The narrow door seemed to be a group of poor onlookers.

original_en_text: <hpage>Can you safely make your way back to the settlement, little one? I could escort you if need be.<page>Oh no, I’ll lay no more of my troubles upon you, red maiden. With the way cleared I can return under my own guidance.<page>After all, what’s another pilgrimage, eh? Ha ha!<page>Oh! And I have something for you as well. I found it buried amongst the broken relics down here in the darkness, glowing with a pale light.<page>’Tis an odd-looking thing... not exactly holy-seeming... but I would be honoured if you accepted it all the same!
original_zh_text: <hpage>需要我护送你回去吗？<page>不能再给你添麻烦了！路通了我就自己走。<page>就当再朝圣一回呗！哈哈！<page>对了，这个送你。在黑乎乎的地方挖到的，会发光。<page>虽然看着不像圣物……但请你收下吧！
translated_text: <hpage>他能否安全返回村庄 ？如果你愿意 ， 我可以给你看。<page>我的红色女孩 ， 我再也不会责备你了。如果你清理道路， 你可以在我的指导下返回。"<page>最后 ， 他？pilgrimage 是什么意思哈！<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！他被埋在黑暗中 ， 在废墟中 ， 他看到了一道苍白的光。<page>我不敢相信他不是圣人 ， 但我希望他能把它拿回来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Can he return to the village safely? If you want, I can show you.<page>My red girl, I will never blame you again. If you clear the road, you can return under my guidance. "<page>Finally, he? What does pilgrimage mean?<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! He was buried in the darkness, and in the ruins, he saw a pale light.<page>I can't believe he's not a saint, but I hope he gets it back.

original_en_text: The challenge! The course! It shall be improved. Yes! Yes! The truest test is still to come. We shall fly fast together once more!
original_zh_text: 赛道还要改良！没错，真正的考验在后头！
translated_text: 挑战者！是啊 ， 不！那会更好 ， 是的。哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！但真正的证据还没有到来。我希望他们能再次在一起！
secondary_translated_text: Challenger! Yeah, no! That would be better, yes. Oh, yes! Oh, yes! But the real evidence has not yet arrived. I hope they can be together again!

original_en_text: I’ve learnt too that travelling is not without its dangers... but I find myself wielding my weapon quite adeptly.<page>It’s curious, the way our instincts can guide us with such precision.
original_zh_text: 我现在知道旅途中总伴有危险……不过我武器用得倒挺顺手。<page>本能的指引竟如此精准，真奇妙。
translated_text: 此外 ， 虽然他们知道这次旅行是安全的 ， 但他们能够非常熟练地使用武器。<page>令人惊讶的是 ， 我们的直觉如何正确地引导我们。
secondary_translated_text: In addition, although they knew the trip would be safe, they were able to use weapons very skillfully.<page>It's amazing how our instincts guide us correctly.

translated_text: 伯特兰的信。
secondary_translated_text: Bertrand's letter.

original_en_text: Un-Daak... well struck. To face the fury of your weapon in a true battle would be an experience indeed. I would gladly duel again, if you have the time for it.
original_zh_text: 唔-嗒克……打得好。跟你打一架真是受益匪浅，等你有空我们再练。
translated_text: “Wynn Doc ” 做得非常好。愤怒 ， 当然是面对战斗中的武器的经验。如果我有时间 ， 我会战斗。
secondary_translated_text: "Wynn Doc" did a very good job. Anger, of course, is the experience of facing weapons in battle. If I had time, I would fight.

original_en_text: Hoho sister, my whiskers are still quivering! That’s how you know you had a rousing battle!<page>You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 嚯嚯，真是一场酣畅淋漓的战斗！我的胡子都还在颤抖呢！<page>你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: 胡子可以继续吸烟 ， 知道他们正在打一场激动人心的战斗！<page>Purple 和我在这里是为了保护和阻止那些背后的人。
secondary_translated_text: Beards can keep smoking knowing they are fighting an exciting battle!<page>Purple and I are here to protect and stop those behind it.

original_en_text: Hoy, red maiden. ‘Tis a prayer answered to see you safely wake.<hpage>Little Sherma? What has happened here?
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！圣堡庇佑，你醒了！<hpage>小谢尔玛，此处发生了什么？
translated_text: 早上好 ， 红色小姐 ， 我祈祷你会平静地醒来。<hpage>“小谢尔曼 ， 怎么了 ？ ”
secondary_translated_text: Good morning, Miss Red, I pray you will wake up peacefully.<hpage>"Little Sherman, what's wrong?”

original_en_text: Poshanka! So you found my calling ring, Child Wielding Needle. I recognised the sound of your weapon’s foreign metal against it.<page>On the hunt for my master, I am often away, but I still use this place as camp. Use the ring to call me whenever you wish to make trade.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！发现我的传讯了？听到你武器发出的那异域的金属声就知道是你。<page>我把这当作据点，但常外出寻找导师。想找我交易就摇铃。
translated_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！找到我的戒指的人戴着针 ， 知道异物和金属如何影响武器。<page>通常我们正在寻找一个主机， 但它仍然是一个露营地。如果你想谈判 ， 用你的手机打电话。
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! Boshanka! The person who found my ring wore a needle and knew how foreign objects and metals could affect weapons.<page>Normally we are looking for a host, but it is still a campsite. If you want to negotiate, make a call on your mobile phone.

translated_text: 偏远地区的地图。
secondary_translated_text: Map of remote areas.

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly I will accept your aid Shakra. Let us cut closer to this Citadel’s haunted heart.<page>Garrok! Hornet Wielding Needle. Beside you, I will gladly raise my rings!
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。一起杀进圣堡里去吧。<page>嘎咯克！使针的姑娘。能和你并肩作战，我的战环乐意至极！
translated_text: <hpage>谢谢你帮助沙库拉接近这座城堡的鬼魂中心。<page>” 不， 泡沫是随着针移动。我把戒指放在身边。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Thank you for helping Shakula get closer to the ghost center of this castle.<page>"No, the foam moves with the needle. I put the ring next to me.

original_en_text: I’d hoped to never step these hateful halls, yet here I stand, as all those hapless bugs before.<hpage>You’ve journeyed far from that damp cell, tall bug. If you would oppose the minions of this Citadel, you have my respect.<page>Hmph. Then we share a rare stance, warrior.
