Few others seem possessed of will enough to resist.<page>So many weak minds, drawn up and strung, in love with the great golden leech atop their lands.
original_zh_text: 我本不想踏入这憎恶之地，却还是步了前虫的后尘。<hpage>你既然从潮湿牢笼走到这里，若是想反抗圣堡，我愿助一臂之力。<page>哼，倒是难得。鲜少有虫能生出抵抗之心。<page>大多数都意志薄弱，沉溺受缚，被上头那黄金监牢所蛊惑。
translated_text: 我从来不想进入这个充满仇恨的房间 ， 但它就像一只不幸的昆虫在我面前。<hpage>我走出一个湿透的房间 ， 只有昆虫大小。如果你不同意这座城堡 ， 我尊重你。"<page>我们共享一个不寻常的地方 ： 士兵 ， 很少有人反抗。<page>许多虚弱和紧张的人爱上了他们土地上的印加巨人。
secondary_translated_text: I never wanted to enter this room full of hatred, but it was like an unfortunate insect in front of me.<hpage>I walked out of a soaked room, the size of an insect. If you disagree with this castle, I respect you. "<page>We share an unusual place: soldiers, few of whom resist.<page>Many weak and nervous people fell in love with the Inca giants of their land.

original_en_text: Ho there, brave sister! What poetry has fate writ, that we should meet here at the peak of this ghastly Citadel!<page>Beasts and fiends, all here are lost to that horrid Haunting! And out from this golden corpse it seeps to plague the good bugs of the land below. Well, no more we say!<hpage>You should beware brave sirs, the creature that commands this curse is a foe far beyond bug. I would not see your lives given in vain.<page>Pah! We beware nothing! We would give our lives a hundred times over to finally cut away the evil that clutches our kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哟，勇敢的姐妹！真有缘，能在这鬼圣堡顶上见面！<page>那些被邪丝牵着走的虫兽，就是从这金色死城跑出去祸害纺络的，但到此为止了！<hpage>当心，萦绕于圣堡之上的存在远非虫类能敌，不要白白丢了性命。<page>呸！我们才不怕！只要能斩断缠住这破地方的丝线，死一百回都值！
translated_text: 什么是关于命运的诗歌 ？我们在城堡的顶部见。<page>动物和恶魔消失了 ， 像幽灵一样 ， 所有的恐惧！他逃离了这具金色的尸体 ， 在良好的土壤的虫害。<hpage>勇敢的先生们 ， 这种被诅咒的生物比敌人昆虫要好得多。<page>哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！我从来没有真正关心过任何事情！我们将付出一百倍的生命来根除我们王国周围的邪恶。
secondary_translated_text: What is poetry about destiny? We'll meet at the top of the castle.<page>Animals and demons disappeared, like ghosts, all fear! He escaped from the golden corpse, infested by pests in good soil.<hpage>Brave gentlemen, this cursed creature is much better than the enemy insect.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! I never really cared about anything! We will pay a hundred times our lives to eradicate evil around our kingdom.

original_en_text: Goodness! This is just too embarrassing! Detected even through my perfect cover! What tell? What error? Surely something gave me away!<hpage>It was no one thing, young bug. Your disguise is near faultless. I’ve merely spent a long life being watchful.<page>Gah! Then I’ll just have to hope the beasts about don’t share such keen sight. It’ll be so much harder to accomplish my work if I’m detected, or eaten!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！太丢脸了！完美伪装都被识破！哪里露馅了？<hpage>你没露出破绽，小虫子。只是我活得够久，眼神也比较好。<page>好吧！但愿怪物们没这么眼尖。万一被发现或被吃掉都会耽误我工作！
translated_text: 哦 ， 我的上帝！太热了！封面很完美 ， 我说了什么 ？发生了什么事？有东西被展示出来了！<hpage>衣服几乎是完美的。我们已经准备了很长时间。<page>是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！我希望我周围的动物没有这么敏锐的眼睛。吞咽 ， 吞咽 ， 这将使工作变得困难！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God! It's too hot! The cover is perfect. What did I say? What happened? Something is being displayed!<hpage>The clothes are almost perfect. We have been preparing for this for a long time.<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! I wish the animals around me didn't have such sharp eyes. Swallow, swallow, it will make work difficult!

original_en_text: <hpage>The battle ahead may indeed be arduous. I accept your offer of aid, sirs.<page>Gurrrro! Yes! No force in the kingdom can withstand our might! Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: <hpage>前方战斗凶险，有劳二位了。<page>嘎噜！咱们联手肯定所向披靡！带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: <hpage>从今以后 ， 战斗将是艰苦的。女士们先生们 ， 我会帮助你的。<page>快点 ， 快点！快点 ， 快点！哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！王国无法抗拒权威！姐妹们 ， 请带我来。我付了税 ， 看着他。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>From now on, the battle will be tough. Ladies and gentlemen, I will help you.<page>Come on, come on! Come on, come on! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! The kingdom cannot resist authority! Sisters, please bring me here. I paid my taxes and looked at him.

original_en_text: Sister, sister, tired and glum,<br>We will sing, and you can hum,<br>Together we shall overcome!
original_zh_text: 姐妹同袍，圣途相聚，<br>齐声歌唱，忘却忧伤，<br>同心协力，共度难关！
translated_text: 我的妹妹 ， 我的妹妹 ， 疲惫和沮丧。<br>我可以抽烟和唱歌。<br>我们一起失败了。“
secondary_translated_text: My sister, my sister, tired and depressed.<br>I can smoke and sing.<br>We failed together.“

original_en_text: <page=M>Oh ho! Back from the depths with nary a scratch! Is it as you feared?<hpage>It is, and worse. Your snare has sunk the monarch deep, deeper than I can safely descend.<hpage>To cut Pharloom free, I must plunge below the surface of that lake of liquid nothing.<page=B> No shell survives submersion in that void, Old One, not even yours.<hpage>Not without aid, certainly. Though aid may exist. The flower that resists the dark. Do you know of it?<page=M>The Everbloom?... We’ve heard the tale, but had thought it a myth. If ever it sprouted in our lands we would surely have known?<hpage>I would not seek it in these lands. I need its power full, and it is too fragile to sustain here long. I would seek it in my memory.<page=S> Oh ho ho! So you’d have us wrench open your soul, to retrieve the fabled bloom? Can such a thing be done?<hpage>For another bug, no, but I am Weaver enough to attempt it.<hpage>In the distant past, I knew the flower. My thread still holds its faint memory. If the Everbloom was grasped strongly enough within my Silk, it could be made to manifest.<page=M>Ah! So you’re asking another spell of us? To reveal the flower clear?... But to illuminate one of your kind’s old memories, so acutely... This is no easy thing, even for us...<page=M>Old One, you must give us a moment to confer...
original_zh_text: <page=M>哦嚯！毫发无损从深渊归来！情况果真如您所料？<hpage>比预料的更糟。你们的陷阱将君主沉得极深，深过我安全下潜的极限。<hpage>要斩断纺络的枷锁，须要直入虚无之湖深处。<page=B>古老者，没有躯壳能在虚空浸泡中幸存，您也不例外。<hpage>单凭自己当然不成，但若有助力……那朵抗暗之花，你们知道吗？<page=M>永绽花？……听说过，但只当是传说。如果曾在此地绽放过，我们怎会不知？<hpage>此地当然找不到，我需要完全盛放的花，此地养不活。得去我的记忆中找。<page=S>哦嚯嚯！是要我们撕开您魂魄，取出那朵神花？这真能成功？<hpage>其他虫不行，但我有织者血脉，可以一试。<hpage>在遥远过去，我记得此花，灵丝中尚存其残影。若能在记忆中紧紧抓住，或许能使其显形。<page=M>啊！所以又要我们施法？让花影清晰？……可要照彻您这一族的古老回忆……就算是我们也……<page=M>古老者，请让我们商议一下……
translated_text: <page=M>是的 ， 喊！“对不起 ， 我想你真的很担心。<hpage>你的陷阱落在国王的手中 ， 比我安全的还要深。<hpage>为了释放法罗 ， 我什么也没做 ， 我冲进了湖里。<page=B>蝎子无法在这个古老的真空中生存。你自己也一样。<hpage>这并没有真正帮助。你知道如何抵制深色 ， 这对你有帮助吗 ？<page=M>永恒的色彩？我听说过这个故事 ， 但我认为这是一个神话。如果他们是在我们国家长大的 ， 那么<hpage>我在地球上找不到它 ， 我需要它 ， 但我太虚弱了 ， 不能在这里呆太久 ， 我在我的记忆中找到了它。<page=S>哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！你想打开你的灵魂 ， 宣布传奇的花朵吗 ？你能做到吗？"<hpage>至于其他的错误 ， 不是 ， 但我穿了足够的尝试。<hpage>我认识这朵花很久了 ， 我的记忆总是脆弱的 ， 如果我的丝绸足够坚固 ， 挂在那朵永恒的花上 ， 它就会出现。<page=M>是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！” 你想使用魔法？鲜花应该被点亮吗 ？然而 ， 他显然能够揭示他的种族的旧记忆 ， 这对我们来说并不是一件容易的事情。<page=M>“爸爸 ， 我们需要时间来谈谈。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Yes, shout! "I'm sorry, I think you're really worried.<hpage>Your trap has fallen deeper into the king's hands than I am safe.<hpage>I didn't do anything to free Farrow. I rushed into the lake.<page=B>Scorpions cannot survive in this ancient vacuum. You do the same yourself.<hpage>This doesn't really help. Do you know how to resist dark colors? Does that help you?<page=M>Eternal color? I've heard this story, but I think it's a myth. If they grew up in our country, then<hpage>I couldn't find it on earth, I needed it, but I was too weak to stay here long, and I found it in my memory.<page=S>Oh, Oh, Oh! Do you want to open your soul and announce the legendary flower? Can you do that? "<hpage>As for the other mistakes, no, but I wore them enough to try.<hpage>I have known this flower for a long time, and my memory is always fragile. If my silk is strong enough to hang on that eternal flower, it will appear.<page=M>Yes, right. Oh, yes!" You want to use magic? Should flowers be lit? However, he was clearly able to reveal old memories of his race, which was not an easy task for us.<page=M>"Dad, we need time to talk.

translated_text: 猎人地图
secondary_translated_text: Hunter Map

original_en_text: My wish is granted... and now everything I love is lost...
original_zh_text: 愿望实现了……可我珍视的一切都消失了……
translated_text: 我的愿望实现了 ， 我所爱的一切都消失了。
secondary_translated_text: My wish came true and everything I loved disappeared.

original_en_text: Gara Takana! What has happened to you, Child Wielding Needle, to cause you such brutal weakening?<hpage>You are seeing the effects of a parasite, Shakra, a writhing entity implanted by force. It will not kill me, not quickly at least, but its presence wears greatly on my shell.<page>It is a horrid state you suffer. Fight yourself free, or find help with haste. I would not wish to see you defeated by such deceitful strength.
original_zh_text: 加拉塔卡纳！使针的小姑娘，你怎么了？竟变成这副惨状？<hpage>是寄生物的影响，沙克拉。它被强行植入了我的躯壳。虽不会立刻致命，但持续侵蚀着我。<page>这状态太可怕了。要么挣脱它，要么快去寻求援助。我可不愿见你败给如此诡诈的力量。
translated_text: 在法国 ， 它很高！是什么让你这么软弱 ？<hpage>你所看到的是寄生脉轮的影响 ， 它被存在的力量改变和加强。它可能不会杀死我 ， 至少不会很快 ， 但它的存在会对我的外壳造成很大的磨损。<page>这就是他们所遭受的可怕的痛苦。尽快寻求帮助！我不想被这样一个欺骗的力量打败。
secondary_translated_text: In France, it's high! What makes you so weak?<hpage>What you see is the influence of the parasitic chakras, which is changed and strengthened by the forces of being. It may not kill me, at least not quickly, but its presence can cause a lot of wear and tear on my shell.<page>This is the terrible suffering they suffer. Get help as soon as possible! I don't want to be defeated by such a deceptive force.

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
translated_text: 我们开始了一场伟大的鱼类比赛！
secondary_translated_text: We started a great fish race!

original_en_text: You’re in the habit of craftin’ all kinds’a nasty tools’n traps, aint’cha? This kit’ll let you build ‘em even nastier, heh heh...
original_zh_text: 你这家伙成天捣鼓些工具跟陷阱，是吧？这匣子能帮你更进一步，嘿嘿……
translated_text: 你已经习惯了使用各种无聊的工具和陷阱 ， 对吧 ？事实上？他们会让事情变得更糟吗？
secondary_translated_text: You're used to using all kinds of boring tools and traps, right? Actually? Will they make things worse?

original_en_text: Poshanka, Child Wielding Needle. This heart-home is cut free of its curse.<page>Tell me, was it your blade that brought its saving? My shock would be great if another here managed the feat.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>By voice and claw it aided, perhaps guided, the thread that strung the town. <page>Weaver? Those vicious old things! To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔，使针的小姑娘。这镇子的诅咒解除了？<page>是你干的？别的虫可没这本事。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: 波斯尼亚的孩子们挥舞着针。淋浴释放了诅咒。<page>剑能带来救赎吗 ？我会很惊讶如果有人这样做。<hpage>我杀了一个巨大的生物在城市上空。它是故意扭曲的 ， 但我怀疑那是眼泪。<hpage>它有助于声音和指甲 ， 并有助于控制连接城市的电线。<page>剧院在哪里？很久以前 ， 我们把这些故事告诉了一个年轻人 ， 他认为他已经死了很久了 ， 在箭头里 ， 他只是一具尸体。<hpage>他仍然活着 ， 但如果是眼泪 ， 他会受重伤。<hpage>她的丝绸深深地绑在她的外壳上 ， 这是她从未见过的残酷惩罚。<page>当嫉妒被打破时 ， 嫉妒仍然存在研发传奇技术战斗意味着为胜利而自豪。
secondary_translated_text: Children in Bosnia wield needles. The shower releases the curse.<page>Can the sword bring redemption? I would be surprised if anyone did this.<hpage>I killed a huge creature over the city. It was deliberately distorted, but I suspect it was tears.<hpage>It helps with sound and nails, and helps control the wires that connect the city.<page>Where is the theater? A long time ago, we told these stories to a young man who thought he had been dead for a long time, and in the arrow, he was just a corpse.<hpage>He is still alive, but if it were tears, he would have been seriously injured.<hpage>Her silk was tied deeply to her shell, a cruel punishment she had never seen.<page>When jealousy is broken, jealousy remains there. Research and development legendary technological battles mean being proud of winning.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings, Shakra. You are a welcome sight amidst the sodden gloom of these caverns. <page>Child Wielding Needle, your aspect is still sharp. My respect remains. Heed a warning, many fierce bugs roost nearby.<page>On the lake beyond this cave nest a ragged horde atop an old watermound. Their mastery of flight makes them dangerous. My shell will forever carry the score of their pins.<page>If you’re seeking a safer path, head back, towards this land’s core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。能在这阴湿洞穴里见到你真好。<page>使针的小姑娘，身手还是那么利索。提醒你，附近猛虫可不少。<page>前面湖心住着群飞虫，我壳上被它们的针弄得全是伤。<page>想走安全点的路就就回头，往这地方的中心走。
translated_text: <hpage>早上好 ， 欢迎来到夏奇拉的湿洞穴。<page>她的外表总是很强壮。维护我们的尊重。如果你注意警告 ， 你会发现附近有许多凶猛的昆虫。<page>洞穴后面是一个古老的部落 ， 坐落在一个古老的湖水山上。他们的飞行能力使他们陷入危险。我的贝壳总是有我的象征的结尾。<page>如果您正在寻找更安全的路线 ， 请返回地球中心。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good morning and welcome to Shakira's Wet Cave.<page>She always looks strong on the outside. Maintain our respect. If you pay attention to the warnings, you will notice many ferocious insects nearby.<page>Behind the cave is an ancient tribe located on an ancient lake hill. Their ability to fly puts them in danger. My shells always have my symbolic ending.<page>If you are looking for a safer route, return to the center of the earth.

original_en_text: Nuu is a long way from her safe lodging... perhaps she will stay in this nice, dark little squeezy place a little longer.
original_zh_text: 努努离家好远……暂时在这个黑暗小缝里窝会儿吧。
translated_text: 您可以在这个美丽， 黑暗和拥挤的地方停留一点。
secondary_translated_text: You can stop for a while in this beautiful, dark and crowded place.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sherma, I bring supplies from the town of bells below. Since you are now caretaker here, I entrust them to you.<page>Oh, what a blessing! This will surely raise the hopes of our poor brothers and sisters.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小谢尔玛，我从下面镇子带了补给。既然现在你是看守者，就交给你了。<page>真是雪中送炭！兄弟姐妹们肯定会振作起来的！
translated_text: <hpage>泽曼 ， 我从贝尔敦带来了一些货物。你是这个地方的守护者。” 我有一切给你。<page>哦 ， 多么好的机会啊！这给我们可怜的兄弟姐妹带来希望。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Zeman, I brought some cargo from Belton. You are the guardian of this place." I have everything for you.<page>Oh, what a great opportunity! This gives hope to our poor brothers and sisters.

original_en_text: Red maiden, you have some great task ahead of you, do you not? If so, then I fear the time of our final parting draws near.<hpage>You sense it true, Sherma. I shall soon descend to the darkness below the kingdom and quell the source of Pharloom’s rending.<hpage>If that task is achieved, my future may take me far from Pharloom, but know I have faith that you will hold these bugs together, and see them prosper.<page>Ah! In truth, I’m still only a fool, but I’ll hold dearly to your faith in me. That warmth will help me to endure whatever challenges lie ahead!<page>Now let me pray for you, dear friend, and may my hopes follow you into the deepest darkness and beyond!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，您身负重大使命，对吧？若是如此，恐怕我们分别的时刻临近了。<hpage>你的直觉得没错，谢尔玛。我即将深入王国底部的黑暗，平息撕裂纺络的源头。<hpage>若使命达成，我或许会远行。但我坚信你能团结这些虫子，带领他们重建繁荣。<page>哈！说得对，说得对！毕竟我虽然攀登至此，但终究只是个愚者，而看护这些虫民同胞的生涯才刚开始。<page>现在我要为您祈祷，亲爱的红衣姑娘，静待我们齐声歌颂您凯旋的时刻！
translated_text: “我们还有很多工作要做 ， 不是吗 ？ ”如果是这样的话 ， 他担心最后撤退的时刻即将到来。<hpage>” 你是对的， 萨曼。很快我就会进入王国的黑暗 ， 扼杀祖国的毁灭。<hpage>当这项任务完成后 ， 我的未来可能远离法勒姆 ， 但我相信我会把这些错误放在一起 ， 看看我如何茁壮成长。"<page>是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！其实我还是疯了 ， 但我深信你的信任。这种温暖将帮助你克服所有困扰你的困难！<page>亲爱的朋友们 ， 请为我祈祷 ， 让我的希望能在黑暗的深处和更远的地方存活下来。
secondary_translated_text: "We still have a lot of work to do, don't we? If so, he fears that the final moment of retreat is approaching.<hpage>"You are right, Sam. Soon I will enter the darkness of the kingdom and stifle the destruction of my motherland.<hpage>When this task is completed, my future may be far away from Farham, but I am sure I will put these mistakes together and see how I thrive. "<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! I'm still crazy, but I believe in your trust. This warmth will help you overcome all the difficulties that bother you!<page>Dear friends, please pray for me so that my hope may survive deep in the darkness and beyond.

translated_text: 供应商 PIN
secondary_translated_text: Supplier PIN

original_en_text: The way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon.
translated_text: 前进的道路是你的。
secondary_translated_text: The way forward is yours.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you pit yourself against the black-threaded bugs? They are dangerous foes, even for a hardened warrior.<page>I relish such danger, and have little choice besides. These creatures besiege the town within. They are relentless, and empowered. <hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, this force, its nature. If it senses soul within, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! Many bugs now huddle within the bells. Nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<page>Some luck, at least, that I chose to remain, and can offer my rings’ defence.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task.<hpage>I ask you hold fast till then. This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在独自抵挡黑灾虫群？再强悍的战士面对它们也很危险。<page>我享受这份危险，但也没得选择。它们在围攻小镇，没完没了，还有邪力加持。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<page>我选择留下已经算他们走运，至少还能挡一阵。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>查克拉 ， 你能对抗黑线上的错误吗 ？他们是一个危险的敌人 ， 即使是强大的士兵。<page>“我喜欢冒险 ， 我别无选择 ， 只能这样做。生物们围绕着城市。他们是冷的和强大的。<hpage>...这是一个穿越世界和它的外壳的真空。我知道他的力量 ， 他的本性。如果你能感觉到那里的灵魂 ， 你会渴望它。<page>正如你所说的！这款手表充满了错误。随着这种黑色威胁的增加 ， 其他一切都是真的。<page>幸运的是 ， 我决定留下来 ， 并且能够在戒指上提供防守。<hpage>脉轮 ， 因为我肩负着巨大的责任 ， 我正在努力结束这场新的灾难 ， 但我知道这需要时间来完成我的使命。<hpage>这一次 ， 请你尽你所能。城市和它的昆虫需要有人来照顾他们。我想不出比这更好的东西。<page>奥尼托移动他的针。这是一个强大的协议。如果我想摆脱这种毒药 ， 我会用我的新信仰来战斗。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Chakra, can you fight against mistakes on the black line? They are a dangerous enemy, even powerful soldiers.<page>"I like to take risks and I have no choice but to do this. Creatures surround the city. They are cold and powerful.<hpage>... This is a vacuum that passes through the world and its shell. I know his strength, his nature. If you can feel the soul there, you will desire it.<page>Just as you said! This watch is full of mistakes. As this black threat grows, everything else is real.<page>Fortunately, I decided to stay and was able to provide defense on the ring.<hpage>Chakra, because of the huge responsibilities I have on my shoulders, I am working hard to end this new disaster, but I know it will take time to complete my mission.<hpage>This time, please do your best. The city and its insects need someone to take care of them. I can't think of anything better.<page>Onitto moved his needle. This is a strong agreement. If I wanted to get rid of this poison, I would fight with my new faith. "

original_en_text: Let us charge on. My rings shall sing loud on the shells of our enemies.
original_zh_text: 冲吧！让我用战环在敌人的壳上奏响战歌！
translated_text: 我的戒指在敌人的子弹中歌唱。
secondary_translated_text: My ring sings in the bullets of the enemy.

original_en_text: And now, miss grown-up, the task is done! Nuu must be away.<page>But do not be sour! Just think! Pharloom is only one land. So many more must hide out there, filled full with beasts and scents and tastes, all waiting to be discovered.<page>For Nuu, her journey is only at its start. And for you, miss grown-up, Nuu wishes too your happy hunting, much and more!
original_zh_text: 任务完成了！那么大姐姐，努努要出发了。<page>别难过！纺络只是开始！外面还有无数大地等着探索呢！<page>努努的旅程刚开始，祝大姐姐也狩猎愉快！
translated_text: “夫人 ， 你已经完成了你的任务。<page>停下山 ， 思考！法罗群岛是一个必须隐藏一些东西的国家。野兽 ， 气味 ， 一切都在等待被发现。<page>我们的旅程才刚刚开始。
secondary_translated_text: "Madam, you have completed your task.<page>Stop the mountain and think! The Faroe Islands are a country that must hide something. Beasts, smells, everything is waiting to be discovered.<page>Our journey has just begun.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, what has happened here? For these masses to huddle so amongst such destruction?<page>The dark-spun bugs, they besiege the town, relentless. I have defended against each wave anew, but they are empowered in foul ways, and I am much fatigued.<hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, that force, its nature. If it senses soul, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! All these bugs, gathered close within the bells... but nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task. I would ask you hold fast till then.<hpage>This town and its bugs needs a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，这是怎么回事？废墟里挤着这么多虫？<page>黑虫围攻小镇，击退一波又来一波。它们有邪力加持，我快顶不住了。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakur 到底怎么了 ？我们是否卷入了这场灾难？<page>我保护了所有的海浪 ， 但我很累 ， 因为我没有吃足够的食物。<hpage>...这是一种空虚 ， 蔓延到世界和它的外壳。我知道他的力量 ， 他的本性。“当你感觉到一个灵魂时 ， 你会不安全地接近它。"<page>正如你所说的！当钟声响起时 ， 这些昆虫会聚集 ， 但随着这种黑色威胁的增加 ， 其他地方将变得不安全。<hpage>脉轮 ， 因为我肩负着巨大的责任 ， 我正在努力结束这场新的灾难 ， 但我知道这需要时间来完成我的使命。<hpage>城市和它的昆虫需要有人来照顾他们。我想不出更好的人。<page>奥尼托移动他的针。这是一个强大的协议。如果我想摆脱这种毒药 ， 我会用我的新信仰来战斗。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>What happened to Shakur? Are we involved in this disaster?<page>I protected all the waves, but I was tired because I didn't eat enough food.<hpage>... It is an emptiness that spreads into the world and its outer shell. I know his strength, his nature. "When you feel a soul, you approach it insecurely. "<page>Just as you said! When the bell rings, the insects will gather, but as this black threat increases, other places will become unsafe.<hpage>Chakra, because of the huge responsibilities I have on my shoulders, I am working hard to end this new disaster, but I know it will take time to complete my mission.<hpage>The city and its insects need someone to take care of them. I can't think of a better person.<page>Onitto moved his needle. This is a strong agreement. If I wanted to get rid of this poison, I would fight with my new faith. "

original_en_text: Eugh. Is it gettin’ hotter down here? Mustier? Grindle’s been down here too long. Reckon it’s time to climb back up soon, to where all the serious treasures is!
original_zh_text: 呃。这底下是不是越来越热了？格林德尔在这底下待太久了，该上去淘真宝贝了！
translated_text: 这里热吗 ？没有枪？“格林德尔在这里待了这么久 ， 我想是时候尽快回来 ， 找到所有重要的宝藏了！»
secondary_translated_text: Is it hot here? No gun? "Greendale has been here for so long, I think it's time to come back as soon as possible and find all the important treasures!"

translated_text: 黑市 （Black Market）
secondary_translated_text: Black Market (Black Market)

original_en_text: So this is... defeat? Can it be? Huu... A shell so fast! Wonder of Pharloom! A bug whose pace could match my own.<page>Though I set a simple course, you have proven its match and more. Take this small reward, nimble bug, and remember well our grand contest!
original_zh_text: 居然……输了？怎么可能？呼……太快了！真是神奇！<page>虽然这条赛道不难，但你证明了自己！收下这个奖励，纪念我们的巅峰对决！
translated_text: 这就是全部 ， 失败吗 ？你没事吧 ？法老的奇迹 ： 他是一只像我一样快的昆虫。<page>我们安装了一个简单的路径 ， 但我们发现它是兼容的。注意这些小奖金 ， 错误 ， 并记住伟大的游戏！
secondary_translated_text: Is that all, failure? Are you okay? The miracle of the pharaoh: He was an insect as fast as me.<page>We installed a simple path, but we found it to be compatible. Pay attention to these little bonuses, mistakes, and remember the great games!

original_en_text: Oh, hoy there! Why, I must have dropped off to sleep as soon as I arrived!<page>Certainly, the pilgrim’s way is exhausting, but a good rest is a reward unto itself!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！刚到这地方就睡着了！<page>朝圣虽累，但一场美梦就是最好的犒赏！
translated_text: 他来了！为什么呢？我穿好衣服 ， 去睡觉了。<page>当然 ， 朝圣可能会让人筋疲力尽 ， 但良好的休息本身就是一种奖励！
secondary_translated_text: Here he comes! Why? I got dressed and went to bed.<page>Of course, the pilgrimage can be exhausting, but a good rest is a reward in itself!

original_en_text: That was a battle well-fought, Child Wielding Needle. Your master would be proud of you.<hpage>The one who trained me long ago... I never called her master. Whether she would be proud of what has become of me, I cannot say.<page>Nu-Hakkata! Whether she is dead or alive, have faith! Nothing a pupil does escapes their master’s sight!
original_zh_text: 打得好！你的导师肯定很骄傲。<hpage>教导我的……我从没叫过她导师。她会不会以我为荣……我不知道。<page>努-哈咔嗒！不管她是死是活，你都要自信！徒弟干的事，师傅都看在眼里！
translated_text: 这是一场精彩的战斗 ， 孩子们挥舞着针头。您的客人会为您感到骄傲！<hpage>他们训练了我很长时间。“我不叫他师父。我不知道你是否为发生在我身上的事情感到自豪。<page>空的一面！生命和死亡需要信仰。学生所做的任何事情都无法逃脱老师的注意力。
secondary_translated_text: It was a wonderful battle, with the children waving needles. Your guests will be proud of you!<hpage>They trained me for a long time. "I don't call him Master. I don't know if you're proud of what happened to me.<page>Empty side! Life and death require faith. Nothing a student does escapes the teacher's attention.

original_en_text: Wide, dim hollows, choked by rag and dust. The bugs who once tended these lands have clearly lost their way.
original_zh_text: 昏暗广袤的洞窟塞满破布灰尘，原本照料这里的虫早已迷失了方向。
translated_text: 当然 ， 巨大而黑暗的空虚被灰尘和尘埃所覆盖 ， 曾经保护这片土地的昆虫已经消失了。
secondary_translated_text: Of course, the huge and dark void is covered with dust and dust, and the insects that once protected the land have disappeared.

original_en_text: Red maiden! Dear sister! At last, our great pilgrimage is at its end!<page>Our faith never wavered, and now here awaits our glorious reward, the shining Citadel! Where all sing as one!<hpage>I will not tell you to turn back, for I know you will not, but I urge you at least to be cautious. Terrible things lurk within this Citadel, little pilgrim.<page>Oh, sister! There is no need for caution, and no need for fear. Let us step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！好姐妹！我们终于到了！<page>守住信念不容易，现在终于看到圣堡了！大家齐声歌颂的地方！<hpage>我知道劝不动你回头，但千万小心。这里头藏着可怕的东西。<page>用不着小心！跟着信仰往前走就对了！
translated_text: 红色的女孩！亲爱的姐姐！伟大的朝圣之旅终于结束了！<page>我们的信心没有胜利 ， 荣耀的奖赏在此刻等待着我们。<hpage>我以为你不会回来 ， 所以我没有告诉你回来 ， 但至少你必须小心。小朝圣者 ， 这座城堡里有可怕的东西。<page>早上好 ， 姐姐！信仰之路 ， 就是信仰之路。你不必害怕 ， 你不必害怕。
secondary_translated_text: Red girl! Dear sister! The great pilgrimage is finally over!<page>Our faith has no victory, and the reward of glory awaits us at this moment.<hpage>I thought you wouldn't come back, so I didn't tell you to come back, but at least you have to be careful. Little pilgrim, there is something terrible in this castle.<page>Good morning, sister! The road of faith is the road of faith. You don't have to be afraid, you don't have to be afraid.

original_en_text: This vein of gilded bells creates an effectively defended settlement. I can see it once gave a long time of peace to its bugs.<page>And yet, look at their numbers now. Stricken by cursed thread. Only a few have survived.<page>We must learn from them, Child Wielding Needle. Peace is a slow poison that would wither even the hardiest bug.
original_zh_text: 这金钟钟脉易守难攻，以前肯定十分安全。<page>看看现在，大半被丝咒侵蚀了，虫民也所剩寥寥。<page>要从这镇子上吸取教训，使针的小姑娘。安逸最腐蚀虫心。
translated_text: 这个金钟是一种有效的防御解决方案 ， 我早就看到它给了我内心的平静。<page>看看这些数字 ， 你是否被困在队列中 ？只有少数幸存下来。<page>我们必须教导我们的孩子 ， 世界是一种缓慢的毒药 ， 即使是最顽固的昆虫也会传播。
secondary_translated_text: This golden bell is an effective defensive solution, and I have long seen it give me inner peace.<page>Looking at these numbers, are you stuck in the queue? Only a few survived.<page>We must teach our children that the world is a slow poison that spreads even the most stubborn insects.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your camp here looks comfortably set, Shakra. Are you planning to stay a time?<page>Perhaps, yes. This heart-home makes a fine base for now and later if needed.<page>Still! I must take care not to rest overlong. My shell would soften and my senses dull.<page>
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我瞧你营地布置得不错，打算长住？<page>或许吧，这镇子看来能暂时当个据点。<page> 但不能久待，会钝了爪子和脑子。
translated_text: <hpage>查克拉， 露营似乎非常舒适。你打算留一段时间吗？<page>如果有必要 ， 这个心脏的房子将永远是一个很好的基础。<page>休息！注意 ， 让你的皮肤变得柔软 ， 情绪消失。<page>
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Chakra, camping seems very comfortable. Are you planning on staying for a while?<page>If necessary, this heart house will always be a good foundation.<page>Rest! Pay attention to make your skin soft and your emotions disappear.<page>

original_en_text: Oh, hullo again! This time, I most certainly do recognise you! ‘Tis a pleasure to bump into you here, deep in this serene wood.<page>Do you have a name, like I do? Would you share it with me?<hpage>Certainly, sir. I am Hornet.<hpage>I notice you gazing at the buds above us... are they familiar to you, perhaps?<page>Hm? No, not at all. Very beautiful though! Perhaps I should gather some up before venturing on...
original_zh_text: 又见面了！这次绝对认得你！能在这林中深处偶遇也是缘分。<page>能告诉我你的名字吗？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。<hpage>你在看那些苍白花苞……莫非曾经见过？<page>那倒没有，但它们很美！出发前或许该采些带着……
translated_text: 上帝 ， 我回来了！这一次 ， 我完全承认。“很高兴在这片宁静的树林里见到你。"<page>你的名字和我的一样吗？你能和我分享这个吗？<hpage>“我是一只蜜蜂。<hpage>他意识到他正在看着他脑袋里的子弹。<page>这是什么 ？你在干什么？不是每个人 ， 但它很漂亮。在你开始冒险之前 ， 你可能想带一些东西。
secondary_translated_text: God, I'm back! This time, I fully admit it. "It's nice to see you in this peaceful forest. "<page>Is your name the same as mine? Can you share this with me?<hpage>"I am a bee.<hpage>He realized he was looking at the bullet in his head.<page>What is this? What are you doing? Not everyone, but it's beautiful. Before you embark on the adventure, you may want to bring something with you.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These markers I have modelled after the sheen of my own shell. Perhaps you will think of me when you use them.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>按我的壳抛光做的，用的时候会想起我吧？
translated_text: 您可以使用它在地图上显示重要地点和回忆。<br><br>我做了一个标志 ， 模仿我的贝壳灯 ， 当你使用它时记住我。
secondary_translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>I made a sign that mimics my shell lamp and remember me when you use it.

original_en_text: There are signs that pilgrims once travelled even these crumbling paths, long ago. Now only the voracious worms nest here.
original_zh_text: 这破路早年也有朝圣者走，现在只剩贪吃蠕虫。
translated_text: 在过去 ， 有迹象表明朝圣者走了一条不可持续的路线 ， 现在他们只能用昆虫来筑巢。
secondary_translated_text: In the past, there were signs that pilgrims had followed an unsustainable route, but now they can only use insects to build nests.

original_en_text: Hoi! Nimble bug! Surely you have reconsidered? Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 嘿！改变主意没？来一起突破极限！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 这是个明智的错误！你确定你检查过它吗 ？让我们一起探索边界！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, that was a wise mistake! Are you sure you checked it? Let's explore the boundaries together!

original_en_text: You have purchased the last of my mapping stock, for now. Stay alive on your journey, and when our paths next cross we may trade again.
original_zh_text: 你把我的货买光啦，小姑娘。多保重，下次碰面再做交易。
translated_text: 你可以让它在旅行时保持良好的心情 ， 下次看到它时再卖一次。
secondary_translated_text: You can keep it in a good mood while traveling and sell it again the next time you see it.

original_en_text: Don’t be lingerin’ here too long! We got snitchin’ to do and we ain’t keen on company!
original_zh_text: 别在这儿磨蹭太久！我们还要干活呢，不欢迎围观！
translated_text: 我很想这么说 ， 但我的同事们不这么做。
secondary_translated_text: I would love to say this, but my colleagues don't.

original_en_text: If you venture further and higher into these caverns, beware. The sickly air only grows thicker.
original_zh_text: 如果你要往高处的话，走小心，那儿的瘴气更浓。
translated_text: 进入洞穴时要小心 ， 因为这只会使痛苦的空气变得更糟。
secondary_translated_text: Be careful when entering the cave, as this will only make the air of pain worse.

original_en_text: I’ll be off soon, once I’m good and rested. Beyond the wood lies the final climb, and then at last we shall reach the Citadel!<page>Which of us will reach the Grand Gate first? If it’s me, I shall wait for you so we can enter together!
original_zh_text: 歇够了我就出发，穿过甲木林就是最后攀登，圣堡就在眼前！<page>看我们谁先到巨门？要是我先到，肯定会等你一起进去！
translated_text: 当他感觉好些时 ， 他爬上了一棵树 ， 最后一次攀登终于到达了城堡。<page>谁会是第一个进入星际之门的人 ？如果我在那里 ， 我会等待和你一起去。
secondary_translated_text: When he felt better, he climbed a tree and finally reached the castle on his final climb.<page>Who will be the first person to enter the stargate? If I were there, I would wait to go with you.

original_en_text: If you would fight alone, I will say nothing more.
original_zh_text: 你要自己上的话，我也没意见。
translated_text: 如果你独自战斗 ， 我不会告诉你。
secondary_translated_text: If you fight alone, I won't tell you.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair meeting again, sir knight. I see this bell has drawn you too towards its safety.<page>Who would have guessed, sister! A safe corner, hidden so high atop Pharloom’s cursed crown!<page>Our fair village may have fallen, but for these fellows... these scared few, our honour charges us to keep them safe. Our hornlance shall raise for them! After some rest, of course.<hpage>Hold fast to your new charge, Garmond. See these bugs survive, and know I aim, in time near, to cut down this curse at its core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，骑士。看来这钟也把你吸引过来了。<page>谁能想到呢，圣堡顶上还有避难所！<page>村子没了，但这些吓坏了的……为了荣耀，我会拿起长枪保护好他们！不过得先歇会。<hpage>守好他们，加蒙德。我会斩断诅咒的核心，不会让你等太久的。
translated_text: <hpage>很好的引用 ， 我的朋友。手表非常注意安全。<page>谁能猜到？躲在一个安全的角落里 ， 在被诅咒的灯塔的皇冠上！<page>我们伟大的人民可能会倒下 ， 但那是为了他们。我们的荣誉要求我们保护这个可怕的少数民族。我们的号角会为他们吹响。短暂的休息， 当然。<hpage>保护你的新攻击 ， 盖蒙！只要这些错误仍然存在 ， 我的目标就是在不久的将来根除这个诅咒。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Great quote, my friend. The watch pays great attention to safety.<page>Who can guess? Hide in a safe corner, on the crown of the cursed lighthouse!<page>Our great people may fall, but that is for them. Our honor requires us to protect this terrible minority. Our horn will sound for them. A short break, of course.<hpage>Protect your new attack, Gaimon! As long as these mistakes persist, my goal is to eradicate this curse in the near future.

translated_text: 罪人之书
secondary_translated_text: Book of Sinners

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>Beneath here and further on, the burly bellheads have a big, hot, gleaming hive! Full of all sorts of tasty snitchables!<page>But there’s this big gate they got down in its belly... shut tight, locked up. If you could wriggle through, you’d get your claws on all kindsa goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>底下更深的地方，那些钟头怪物有个又大又亮的宝库！全是好东西！<page>但最底下有道大门被锁死了。要是能溜进去就发啦！
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！卡门 · 格林代尔 （ Carmen Greendale ） 为那些记住我们秘密的人祈祷。<page>在这个动荡的时代 ， 有大而温暖的闪闪发光的峡谷在这里和其他地方！有很多优秀的记者<page>但是他们把门放在他的肚子里 ， 关上了 ， 关上了。如果你能克服它 ， 你的指甲会把一切都举起来！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Carmen Greendale prays for those who remember our secrets.<page>In these turbulent times, there are big and warm glistening canyons here and elsewhere! There are many great reporters<page>But they put the door in his stomach, closed it, closed it. If you can get over it, your nails will lift everything up!

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before, they mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>I suspect it is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. It seems this kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>我认为唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>我在路上曾遇到过此类长椅，看来纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: 你看到你面前的红色女人了吗？我经历了和以前一样的经历 ， 这给了我一个朝圣的好信号。<page>当你唱歌时 ， 神奇的神庙升起 ， 成为休息的地方。<hpage>我相信圣殿不是被一首歌唤醒 ， 而是被念玫瑰经唤醒。<hpage>在通往法老宫殿的路上 ， 我们发现了一座类似的建筑。王国不会在和平中安息。
secondary_translated_text: Do you see the red woman in front of you? I went through the same experience as before, which gave me a good sign for a pilgrimage.<page>As you sing, the magical temple rises and becomes a place to rest.<hpage>I believe that the temple was awakened not by a song, but by the recitation of the rosary.<hpage>On the way to the pharaoh's palace, we found a similar building. The kingdom will not rest in peace.

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>There’s lots of pickings round here, right? Well, it’s all nothing compared to what they got hidden up, up above us. The great big Sitty-del they calls it!<page>A golden place, groaning with goodies! Could never steal it all in a thousand snitch-bug lifetimes they reckon!<page>Oh yes, that’s where ol’ Grindle is headin’. Don’t you dare follow us, though! We want it all for us-selves!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>这附近好东西不少对吧？但跟上边的圣堡比，什么都不是！<page>听说那是金山银山，几辈子都掏不完！<page>格林德尔这就去捞个够！你可别跟来抢！
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！卡门 · 格林代尔 （ Carmen Greendale ） 为那些记住我们秘密的人祈祷。<page>你有很多皮卡， 不是吗？这与隐藏在我们头脑中的东西相比 ， 什么都不是。它叫做 “大城堡 ” 。<page>一个金色的地方， 充满了美丽的风景！一个人不能偷走一千条生命。<page>这就是见证人的命运。“跟我们来！我们都在做我们的工作！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Carmen Greendale prays for those who remember our secrets.<page>You have a lot of pickup trucks, don't you? This is nothing compared to what is hidden in our minds. It is called the "Great Castle".<page>A golden place full of beautiful scenery! One man cannot steal a thousand lives.<page>This is the fate of the witness. "Come with us! We're all doing our jobs!

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>You know where all them dreary raggedies are camping? Back near the ol’ chapel? Well, beyond that chapel is a dirty great grave!<page>Not much in there but husks, right? But but! My sniffer tells me there’s something worth the trouble buried down at the bottom!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>你知道那处破破烂烂的朝圣者营地吧？那附近的破教堂后头有个大坟场！<page>那乍一看都是尸壳对吧？但是但是！我能嗅到底下埋着值钱货，我鼻子灵得很！
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！它在格林德尔的口袋里 ， 给那些记得我们秘密的人。<page>你知道垃圾在哪里吗？你会回到老教堂吗 ？教堂后面有一个肮脏的坟墓。<page>这只是一个封面， 不是吗？事实上？妈妈 ， 妈妈 ， 妈妈！当我闻到它的味道时 ， 我很害怕。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! It's in Greendale's pocket for those who remember our secrets.<page>Do you know where the garbage is? Will you go back to the old church? There is a filthy tomb behind the church.<page>It's just a cover, isn't it? Actually? Mom, mom, mom! When I smelled it, I was scared.

original_en_text: <hpage>The groaning docks, beyond the caverns of bone. There I have seen a vessel able to pass below, a heavy bell built for descent.<hpage>I need only gain access, and an operator to assist. I will investigate the docks, and uncover the means.<page=M>You’d be the first in an age to dive so deep, Old One. That space below remains long unseen, even to our family. <hpage>For those depths, I am more prepared than most. I will reach the base of this land, and know the truth of the new disaster we, together have wrought.
original_zh_text: <hpage>穿越骸骨洞窟，那锈蚀的深坞中停着一口沉钟，专为下潜打造。<hpage>只需寻得入口与操钟人。我会探查深坞，找出通路。<page=M>古老者，您是数个纪元以来第一个敢下潜的。那片黑暗连我们家族都未曾窥见。<hpage>对于深渊，我早有准备。我会抵达此地根基，看清你我共酿的新灾祸。
translated_text: <hpage>有一艘船可以从它下面经过 ， 还有一块沉重的手表让它掉下来。<hpage>所有你需要的是访问和操作员 ： 找到一扇门 ， 找到一条路。<page=M>在此期间 ， 学生将首先加深他们的研究。下面的空间并不总是被家庭所知。<hpage>我们将在地球上闪耀 ， 发现我们共同创造的新灾难的真相。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>There was a boat that could pass under it, and a heavy watch that made it fall.<hpage>All you need is access and operator: find a door, find a path.<page=M>During this period, students will first deepen their research. The space below is not always known to families.<hpage>We will shine on earth and discover the truth about the new catastrophe we have created together.

original_en_text: Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: 他为什么消失了 ？为什么我们不记得圣地 ？
secondary_translated_text: Why did he disappear? Why don't we remember the Holy Land?

original_en_text: <hpage>Here you lie, monarch. Sunk so deep, yet still you cling to life. <hpage>Would you let your lands be choked black... to protect just her?
original_zh_text: <hpage>苍白之主，沉沦至此也要苟活么？<hpage>你宁愿让纺络被黑暗吞噬……只为护着她？
translated_text: <hpage>上帝 ， 你是个骗子。如果你沉得很深 ， 你还活着。<hpage>你愿意保护你的土地吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>God, you're a liar. If you sink deep, you are still alive.<hpage>Are you willing to protect your land?

original_en_text: <hpage>Take care, Garmond. Whatever dangers these lands present, I’m sure what waits in that Citadel will be worse.<page>Aye, sister! Until that Citadel is reached and justice is served, Zaza and I shall not fall.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，加蒙德。圣堡必然比外面更加危险。<page>你也保重，姐妹！不跟圣堡之主讨个公道，我和扎扎不会倒下的！
translated_text: <hpage>无论在地球上的这座城堡里等待我们的危险是什么 ， 我相信它会更糟。<page>紫色和我不会倒下 ， 直到我们到达堡垒 ， 正义得到恢复。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Whatever the danger awaits us in this castle on earth, I believe it will be worse.<page>Purple and I will not fall until we reach the fortress and justice is restored.

original_en_text: Letting you live was my rebellion, spider. I’ve denied my mother your silken strength. I’ve won.<page>She can thrash, and waste, and know her pathetic, broken child caused the mortal wound.<page>Rejoice! And let it all come down.<hpage>I will not. I have already stood the sentinel for one dying land. That role... I will never play again.<hpage>While I live, and possess the strength to resist, this kingdom, and the bugs within it, shall not fall.
original_zh_text: 留着你的性命就是我的反叛。母亲得不到你的灵丝，是我赢了。<page>让她抓狂吧！知道是我这残次品带给她致命伤！<page>欢呼吧！一切都将崩塌！<hpage>恕难从命。我曾守望过一个将死的国度，同样的角色……我不想再扮第二次。<hpage>只要我还活着，还有力气反抗，这个王国与其子民就不会陨落。
translated_text: 我没有把权力给蜘蛛妈妈 ， 我赢了。<page>他知道鞭子是无用的 ， 疼痛会破裂 ， 孩子会受伤。<page>让我们快乐！放下一切。<hpage>我不是死亡之地 ， 我是这份文件的保管人 ， 我再也不会碰它。<hpage>只要它还活着 ， 并且有力量抵抗 ， 那么王国和包含它的昆虫就不会倒下。
secondary_translated_text: I didn't give power to Mother Spider, I won.<page>He knew that the whip was useless, that pain would break, and that children would get hurt.<page>Make us happy! Drop everything.<hpage>I am not a place of death, I am the custodian of this document, and I will never touch it again.<hpage>As long as it is alive and has the strength to resist, the kingdom and the insects that contain it will not fall.

original_en_text: Hahahhaa! Spider. Spider. What a marvellous specimen you are! You fight and fight, heedless as the world crumbles around you.<page>Pharloom and her bugs will be crushed to dust, and still you’ll be vainly swinging your blade.<hpage>...There may still be a way to prevent that fate. I will claim the hidden power, the bloom that repels the dark.<hpage>Those snails share some fault in the snare, and their callous use of the void. They shall help me now to seek its counter.<hpage>I will return, child, when I bear the strength to dive below, and cut this land finally free of your mother’s grasp.
original_zh_text: 哈哈哈哈！顽固的小蜘蛛！即便你继续挣扎，这个世界一样会崩塌！<page>一切都将化为尘埃，继续挥舞那针刃还有什么用<hpage>……或许还有转机。我会取得驱散黑暗的永绽花。<hpage>蜗牛一族滥用虚空难辞其咎，现在它们得帮我找到破局之法。<hpage>等我取得力量，就来斩断你母亲的掌控。
translated_text: 哈！哈！当我们周围的世界崩溃时 ， 我们无意识地挣扎和挣扎。<page>释放自己 ， 你的昆虫将被撕成碎片 ， 你挥舞着剑徒劳。<hpage>...我有一种隐藏的力量 ， 我拒绝黑暗的花朵。<hpage>这些蜗牛陷阱也有其缺点 ， 并且总是利用漏洞。他们将帮助我找到反击。<hpage>我的儿子 ， 当我沉入大海时 ， 我会回来 ， 我终于有力量把这片土地从你母亲的手中解放出来。
secondary_translated_text: Ha! Ha! When the world around us collapses, we unconsciously struggle and struggle.<page>Release yourself and your insects will be torn to pieces, and you wield your sword in vain.<hpage>... I have a hidden power, I reject the flowers of darkness.<hpage>These snail traps also have their shortcomings and always exploit loopholes. They will help me find a counterattack.<hpage>My son, when I sink into the sea, I will come back, and I finally have the strength to liberate this land from your mother's hands.

original_en_text: After some tasty goodies? We never say no to a fair trade, heh heh! Take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 想要宝贝？只接受公平交易！随便看看吧……
translated_text: 吃完美味的饭后？我不反对公平贸易。
secondary_translated_text: After a delicious meal? I am not opposed to fair trade.

original_en_text: We could add a little pocket to yer tool pouch for you. You could pack even more goodies in there! All your shards’n sharp things!
original_zh_text: 给你工具包加个兜，能多装点好宝贝。
translated_text: 你可以在工具箱里放一个小口袋。你可以穿得更好！你的每一个部分都很强大。
secondary_translated_text: You can put a small pocket in your toolbox. You can dress better! Every part of you is strong.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, if I may, I’d ask a small task of your carving talents.<hpage>Within the halls of the Citadel, I encountered a means of travel new to me, a network of pipes traversed in vessels propelled by steam and air.<hpage>That Citadel is a labyrinth, and pins to mark each station would prove useful to me.<page>What you describe sounds as hideous and unnatural as anything in that place. Still, if it will aid you, I shall craft the pins.<page>Seek me at a moment not long from now. The pins will be carved, and we may trade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，方便的话，借你的手艺办件小事。<hpage>圣堡里有种我没见过的蒸汽管道交通网。<hpage>但那跟一座迷宫一样，因此我需要标记站点的图钉。<page>圣堡里都是这种难看又不自然的玩意。但你要就给你做吧。<page>过阵子再来找我，图钉做好了才能交易。
translated_text: <hpage>“Shakra ， 我希望你能利用你在这方面的天赋来做一些工作。<hpage>在城堡的客厅里 ， 我发现了一种奇怪的旅行方式 ： 一个管道网络 ， 船只和飞机通过。<hpage>城堡就像一个迷宫， 每个季节显示的松树都非常有用。<page>你画的东西听起来像这个地方的其他地方一样可怕和不自然 ， 但如果它有用 ， 我会做一个菠萝。<page>我们会尽快找到他们的。旋转可以雕刻和可互换。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Shakra, I hope you can use your talent in this area to do some work.<hpage>In the living room of the castle, I discovered a strange way to travel: a network of pipes through which ships and planes pass.<hpage>The castle is like a maze, and the pine trees displayed every season are very useful.<page>What you draw sounds as scary and unnatural as the rest of this place, but if it works, I'll make a pineapple.<page>We'll find them as soon as possible. Rotation can be engraved and interchangeable.

original_en_text: These overgrown caves offer little challenge to a skilled warrior. A place for reflection, perhaps.
original_zh_text: 这长满苔藓的洞穴对高手没挑战性，适合发呆。
translated_text: 这些人口稠密的洞穴对熟练的士兵来说几乎没有问题。也许这是一个反思的地方。
secondary_translated_text: These densely populated caves pose few problems for skilled soldiers. Maybe this is a place for reflection.

original_en_text: Fear not, red maiden! This shrine will surely rise for us, we only need to patiently wish for it!
original_zh_text: 别担心！只要诚心祈愿，圣椅定会为我们显现！
translated_text: 你没有什么可害怕的。红色的圣母与我们同在。我们所要做的就是耐心地祈祷。
secondary_translated_text: You have nothing to be afraid of. The Red Virgin is with us. All we have to do is pray patiently.

original_en_text: <page=M>In the heights of the great wood, nestled deep in its roots, vines and branches, find the one who sowed the first seed.<page=S>They’re the very essence of the place, the nub of it all. Ain’t really a bug, to be told, but a powerful presence nonetheless.<page=M>We’d heard the Citadel once made grudging accord with that creature, sent their servants in reverence, even built a shrine up there somewhere. Maybe it’s worth you searching for it?
original_zh_text: <page=M>甲木林最深处，根枝藤蔓之间，埋着最初播种者。<page=S>那是纺络的精华所在，虽算不得虫子，但也十分强大。<page=M>听说圣堡曾与之立约，建造圣所供奉，还派遣仆从侍奉。或许值得一探？
translated_text: <page=M>在树根和树枝的深处 ， 他发现了播下第一粒种子的人。<page=S>我是这个地方的精髓 ， 我是一切的中心。换句话说 ， 这不是一个错误 ， 但它仍然是一个强大的实体。<page=M>我听说城堡违背他的意愿与这个生物签署了一项条约 ， 让他的仆人哭泣 ， 并在某个地方建造了一座寺庙。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Deep in the roots and branches, he found the man who planted the first seed.<page=S>I am the essence of this place, I am the center of everything. In other words, it's not a mistake, but it's still a powerful entity.<page=M>I heard that the castle signed a treaty with this creature against his will, made his servants cry, and built a temple somewhere.

original_en_text: Old roads and passages overrun by roaches and their keepers. The ways are covered thick with filth.
original_zh_text: 被蟑螂及其饲主侵占的古道，路面上覆满污秽。
translated_text: 街道和走廊充满了蟑螂和他们的警卫 ， 街道很脏。
secondary_translated_text: The streets and corridors are full of roaches and their guards, and the streets are dirty.

original_en_text: In this moment, I have no more items to trade. Perhaps, if we meet again on the roads ahead, I shall have crafted new goods to sell.
original_zh_text: 暂时没货了，小姑娘。下次碰面会准备好新玩意的，保重。
translated_text: 目前没有可交换的产品。如果您旅行 ， 您可以创建和销售新的产品。
secondary_translated_text: There are currently no exchangeable products. If you travel, you can create and sell new products.

original_en_text: You like this gleaming spinner I snitched from the big Sitty-dell? There’s a way to make it sing to you, or so they says!
original_zh_text: 从圣堡顺来的转轮！据说用某种方法能让它唱歌呢！
translated_text: 你喜欢我带到大教堂的闪闪发光的旋转器吗 ？我们有一种唱歌或至少说话的方式。
secondary_translated_text: Do you like the shiny spinner I brought to the cathedral? We have a way of singing or at least talking.

translated_text: 骨髓图； 骨髓图；
secondary_translated_text: bone marrow map; bone marrow map;

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>This dark-shell material is cold to the touch, and more resilient than it looks.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>黑壳材质冷冰冰的，比看着结实。
translated_text: 您可以使用它在地图上显示重要地点和回忆。<br><br>这种深厚的材料给人一种比看起来更凉爽、更有弹性的感觉。
secondary_translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>This deep material gives a feeling that is cooler and more elastic than it looks.

original_en_text: Crumbling roads built upon the shells of ancient bugs. All of Pharloom rests upon these fragile foundations.
original_zh_text: 建在古虫壳上的破路，整个纺络都靠这些脆架子撑着。
translated_text: 这条不稳定的道路建在一个古老的昆虫壳上 ， 整个灯塔都建在这个脆弱的基础上。
secondary_translated_text: This unstable road is built on an ancient insect shell, and the entire lighthouse is built on this fragile foundation.

original_en_text: Crusted heights above those howling steps. Signs suggest great warriors once ruled this winding place, though the sand has eroded much of their mark.
original_zh_text: 风蚀台阶上的矿脉高地。迹象表明曾有强族统治，现已被沙尘掩埋。
translated_text: 有迹象表明 ， 一位伟大的战士曾经统治过这个曲折的地方 ， 但沙子摧毁了大部分的遗迹。
secondary_translated_text: There are signs that a great warrior once ruled this tortuous place, but the sand destroyed most of the ruins.

original_en_text: <hpage>To search these lands so thoroughly, Shakra... I wonder, who is it you hope to find?<page>Okklu-Din... a perceptive question. I travel in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I have followed her trail throughout this kingdom, but have so far failed to catch her.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant, we shall reunite.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了。我看你把这片地区都找遍了……你到底在找谁？<page>唉……问得好。我在找导师，我们部落的最强者。我追着她的踪迹跑遍了王国，还是没找到。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>仔细看看这片土地 ， 沙库尔 ， 你知道我想见谁吗 ？<page>我把他赶出了这个王国 ， 因为他去见我的主人 ， 部落的最高领主 ， 但我还没有抓住他。<page>现在它还在继续 ， 但如果我继续保持警惕 ， 我们可能会再次在一起。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Look carefully at this land. Shakur, do you know who I want to see?<page>I kicked him out of the kingdom because he went to see my master, the supreme lord of the tribe, but I had not yet caught him.<page>Now it's going on, but if I continue to be vigilant, we may be together again. "

original_en_text: The stone structures of this place suggest clear waters once ran throughout.<page>What fantasy that now seems! Even this swamp’s inhabitants seem spawned of its noxious nature.
original_zh_text: 这里的石制结构说明以前有清水流过。<page>现在呢？连原本栖居在这里的虫都像是从毒瘴里孕育出来的。
translated_text: 石头表明水已经干涸。<page>现在有多大啊。即使是这个沼泽的居民 ， 由于它的毒性 ， 似乎也在增加。
secondary_translated_text: The stones indicate that the water has dried up.<page>How big is it now? Even the residents of the swamp seem to be increasing due to its toxicity.

original_en_text: But look here! As soon as our sacred journey begins, we are tested. This huge gate stands between us and the way forward.<page>Only holy prayer and song will open the way! In this kingdom, even mighty bone is moved by music!
original_zh_text: 可你看看！朝圣之路刚启程就遇到考验，被这道巨大骨门拦住了去路。<page>唯有圣歌能够撼动它！在纺络，最顽固的骨头都会为旋律让道！
translated_text: 但你必须看到它！当圣日开始时 ， 我们将体验到它。一扇门挡住了我们 ， 挡住了我们的路。<page>只有祷告和天主的歌唱 ， 才能开启道路。即使是世界上最强壮的骨头也能演奏音乐。
secondary_translated_text: But you must see it! When the Holy Day begins, we will experience it. A door blocked us, blocked our path.<page>Only prayer and God's singing can open the way. Even the strongest bones in the world can play music.

original_en_text: You win again! Never have I met a luckier pilgrim...<hpage>You mistake, sir. It was skill that won me this game. One must be careful not to rely merely on luck.<page>Hmph. Fairly said, sister.<page>I must confess something though. Truth is, I already lost the last of my rosaries. I can’t pay our last wager.<page>I do have something small for you, at least. These dice. They certainly seem to have taken a liking to you. Take them, in memory of our meeting.
original_zh_text: 你又赢了！没见过运气这么好的朝圣者……<hpage>错了，我是靠技术赢的，别光指望运气。<page>哼，倒也说得在理。<page>其实……我已经输光家底了。最后这把的赌注我给不起。<page>但我可以把这些小玩意送你。这对骰子跟你有缘，收下当纪念吧。
translated_text: 我们会赢的！我从未见过这么快乐的朝圣者。<hpage>科技让我走进了这个行业。<page>我姐姐说话很好。<page>我不得不承认 ， 我错过了最后一个位置。<page>至少我有一些东西给你。” 我喜欢这张纸。" "
secondary_translated_text: We will win! I have never seen such a happy pilgrim.<hpage>Technology has brought me into this industry.<page>My sister speaks very well.<page>I have to admit that I missed the last position.<page>At least I have something for you." I like this paper. " "

original_en_text: <page>Who are you hoping you’ll find down there, spider? An ailing child and a Silk starved beast? <page>If so, I’m afraid we may sorely disappoint. What waits below is me no longer.
original_zh_text: <page>小蜘蛛，你指望能在下面见到谁？虚弱的傀儡还是饥渴的空壳？<page>要让你失望了，在下面等着的早已不是我。
translated_text: <page>蜘蛛侠你在找谁 ？生病的儿童和饥饿的动物。<page>如果是这样的话 ， 我们会非常失望。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Spiderman, who are you looking for? Sick children and hungry animals.<page>If this is the case, we will be very disappointed.

original_en_text: Hoy, you’re still hanging around then? Quiet in here. Good for hidin’ out.<page>You gots the li’l clicky-clackies on you then, eh? The rolly-roundies? What the shops like to swap for?
original_zh_text: 哟，还在附近晃悠呢？这很安静，适合躲藏。<page>带叮当响了没？就是商店爱换的那种小圆珠？
translated_text: 还在动吗？很安静 ， 所以你可以躲起来。<page>这就是森林存在的原因吗 ？事实上？你想改变你的商店吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Is it still moving? It's quiet, so you can hide.<page>Is this why forests exist? Actually? Do you want to change your store?

translated_text: 杯盘 （ Cup Plate ）
secondary_translated_text: Cup Plate

original_en_text: You... So, it is done... My wish granted before ever I arrived...<hpage>The bronze pair that danced this chamber, it is clear, tall bug, how closely they mimicked your shell. Was it you who provided their inspiration?<page>Not I, warrior. For this place, my heart holds only loathing...<page>The dancers... they were the last free act of my partner... Always hopeful. Always naive.<page>His whole he gave, in desperate trade to see our own caves left safe. His shell and soul became the mould.<page>So long, I dared not visit... Even as our lands fell to thread and ruin... Instead I wasted, a coward caged, too weak to witness his grace bound in parody so cruel.<hpage>Take some solace, tall bug. His soul is now free from that shell of iron, and the fate that befell your lands, this Citadel too has been claimed full by it.<page>Aye... Slim consolation, warrior, now that everything I loved is lost...
original_zh_text: 你……这样啊……竟然在我抵达前就完成了……<hpage>厅里那对铜像，分明是照着你的模样铸的。是你给的灵感？<page>与我无关。对这地方……我只剩恶心……<page>舞者……是我伴侣最后的自由创作……他总是满怀天真与希望。<page>为保我们故土平安，他献出了全部。躯壳和灵魂都成了铸模。<page>这么久以来，我不敢来看……哪怕故土被丝咒吞噬……懦弱地困在牢里，不敢面对他的优雅被如此践踏……<hpage>宽心吧，至少现在他的灵魂挣脱铁壳了。你们故土遭受的厄运，圣堡也逃不过。<page>是啊……但这不过是无力的安慰……如今我爱的一切都化为乌有……
translated_text: 你是谁？在她到达之前 ， 她的愿望已经实现了。<hpage>在房间里跳舞的青铜同伴们太清晰 ， 太大了 ， 无法模仿水槽有多近。你有什么灵感吗 ？<page>“不是我 ， 士兵 ， 我讨厌这里。<page>跳舞的人。这是我们合作伙伴的最后一次免费演出。他们总是充满了希望。我总是天真。<page>他尽了最大的努力来保证山洞的安全 ， 身体和灵魂是一体的。<page>尽管我们的土地已经荒凉 ， 变成废墟 ， 但笼子的网格太弱 ， 无法直接看到它的恩典 ， 因为这种残酷的模仿。<hpage>放松 ， 高昆虫 ， 你的灵魂已经从铁壳中解放出来 ， 你的命运落在你的土地上 ， 城堡被它占领。<page>是的 ， 一点安慰 ， 士兵 ， 我所爱的一切都消失了。
secondary_translated_text: Who are you? Her wish had been fulfilled before she arrived.<hpage>The bronze companions dancing in the room were too clear and too big to imitate how close the sink was. Do you have any inspiration?<page>"Not me, soldier, I hate it here.<page>People who dance. This is the last free performance for our partners. They are always full of hope. I am always naive.<page>He did his best to ensure the safety of the cave, and his body and soul were one.<page>Although our land has become desolate and reduced to ruins, the grid of the cage is too weak to directly see its grace because of this cruel imitation.<hpage>Relax, tall insect, your soul has been freed from its iron shell, your destiny lies on your land, and the castle is occupied by it.<page>Yes, a little comfort, soldier, everything I loved is gone.

original_en_text: <page=M>What’s this? That’s an unexpected heart you’re holding, Old One...<page=M>We can guess to its source, though we’d believed it long gone from these lands. <hpage>The heart of a graceful lord. In its taking I was able to witness his caves and kingdom as once they flourished.<hpage>A stunning sight. Unique. All gone... Lost to the pale monarch... and the system to keep her caged.
original_zh_text: <page=M>咦？这颗心出乎意料啊，古老者……<hpage>一位优雅领主的心。取心时我见到了其洞窟王国昔日繁盛景象。<hpage>真是瑰丽无双。但都消逝了……毁于苍白君主……以及囚困她的体系。
translated_text: <page=M>这是什么 ？她有一颗意想不到的心。<page=M>关于它的起源的猜测是可能的 ， 但人们可以认为地球自古以来就存在。<hpage>这是上帝的恩典。在拍摄过程中 ， 我看到了他的洞穴和王国的繁荣。<hpage>他们都决心打败苍白的君主和将他关在笼子里的制度。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>What is this? She has an unexpected heart.<page=M>Speculation about its origin is possible, but one can think that the earth has existed since ancient times.<hpage>This is God's grace. During the filming, I saw his caves and the prosperity of his kingdom.<hpage>They are all determined to defeat the pale monarch and the system that keeps him in a cage.

original_en_text: A beat of rosaries is our wager. Once you find enough, I’d be happy to play.
original_zh_text: 赌注是一奏念珠。等你攒够了，我很乐意再陪你玩。
translated_text: 我们的赌注是一串念珠 ， 如果我们找到足够的赌注 ， 我们会很高兴地玩。
secondary_translated_text: Our bet is a string of rosary beads, and if we find enough bets, we will happily play.

original_en_text: Nimble bug, you return refreshed! And so perfectly timed, for I have a new challenge prepared.<page>The course shall remain the same as last, but length, the laps, will greatly extend.<hpage>You propose a test of endurance? I have undertaken many in my time.<page>Excellent! Excellent! Though know, for this race, I can only provide slight reward for victory.<page>What say you, nimble bug? Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 你看起来状态绝佳！正好我准备了新的挑战！<page>赛道和上次一样，但长度、圈数大幅增加！<hpage>要比耐力？我平时可没少锻炼。<page>那太好了！不过这次如果你赢了，奖励价值或许不高。<page>怎么说？一起冲刺吧！
translated_text: 聪明的昆虫 ， 你又恢复健康了！现在是最好的时机 ， 因为我们正在为新的挑战做准备。<page>这场比赛与前一场比赛相同 ， 但增加了所需的时间 （ 圈数 ） 。<hpage>我需要控制阻力吗 ？在我的生活中 ， 我做了很多。<page>这太不可思议了！这太不可思议了！在这个游戏中 ， 您只能获得小额奖金。<page>速度误差是什么意思？"走 ， 走 ， 走。"
secondary_translated_text: Smart insect, you are healthy again! Now is the best time because we are preparing for new challenges.<page>This race was the same as the previous race, but with an increased amount of time (number of laps) required.<hpage>Do I need to control resistance? I have done a lot in my life.<page>This is unbelievable! This is unbelievable! In this game, you can only get a small bonus.<page>What does speed error mean? "Go, go, go. "

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time, Shakra. I am always eager to learn, but for now my tasks call me away. <page>Bakelo! Answer to your tasks, then. My rings shall await your return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>改天吧。虽然想锻炼技艺，但要事在身。<page>吧咔咯！那忙你的去吧！我的战环随时恭候。
translated_text: <hpage>“下一个是樱桃。我一直想学习 ， 但现在我不需要了。"<page>好吧 ， 你做你的工作！我希望我的戒指能回来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"The next one is cherries. I always wanted to learn, but now I don't need to. "<page>All right, you do your job! I hope my ring comes back.

original_en_text: Gurrroo! Fellow warrior, if you are wishing to lock blades, know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza. Together we will face bold to any challenge!<hpage>I have no wish to fight you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another on these roads of sound mind, and with fortitude enough to fight back against the haunted husks.<page>Aye! Too many, these unnatural opponents! We did hope Pharloom’s vast expanse would still possess some place free of that tainted thread. <page>Alas, so far we’ve encountered only violence and decay. We greatly fear the Haunting afflicts this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！想打架？先报上名来！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<hpage>没兴趣比武。只是难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊！到处都是被操控的傀儡！还以为纺络如此广袤，说不定能有片净土……<page>唉，结果走到哪都是腐烂和杀戮！这诅咒怕是蔓延全境了！
translated_text: 快点 ， 快点！快点 ， 快点！同志 ， 如果你想把你的剑 ， 你知道你面对的是珍贵的骑士加蒙和他勇敢的同伴吉吉。<hpage>“我不想和你争吵 ， 贝克先生 ， 在这条明智的道路上遇到另一个人是很有趣的 ， 他有足够的耐心来抵消鬼魂的外壳。<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！这些不自然的敌人就足够了。我仍然希望有一个广阔的蓝色景观的一部分 ， 没有污染线。<page>到目前为止 ， 我们只看到腐败和暴力 ， 我们担心这种痴迷可能会影响到王国中的每个人。"
secondary_translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! Comrade, if you want to draw your sword, you know you are facing the precious knight Gamon and his brave companion Gigi.<hpage>"I don't want to argue with you, Mr. Baker, it's interesting to meet another man on this wise path who has enough patience to offset the ghost shell.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! These unnatural enemies are enough. I still want to have a vast blue landscape part of it, without pollution lines.<page>So far, we have only seen corruption and violence, and we fear that this obsession may affect everyone in the kingdom. "

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!<page>In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe, and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！<page>在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: 波斯娜波斯娜！清晰和明确！<page>我们国家的军人向我们致敬。你是个新生儿 ， 但你也是个士兵。<page>我是一个部落的飞行员 ， 他绘制了这片土地 ， 如果我们可以交换货物和货物。
secondary_translated_text: Bosna Bosna! Clear and clear!<page>The soldiers of our country pay tribute to us. You are a newborn, but you are also a soldier.<page>I am a pilot for a tribe who charted this land if we could exchange goods and goods.

original_en_text: Rest below while you can. In the lands beyond these bells, it is rare to see such safety.
translated_text: 我尽可能多地休息 ， 这种安全感在这些物种背后的国家是罕见的。
secondary_translated_text: I rest as much as possible, a sense of security that is rare in the country behind these species.

translated_text: Gremoire 唐飞
secondary_translated_text: Map of Gremoire

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, if your wish is to gain learning of this land’s creatures, why not hunt them yourself?<page>Ma? Nuu, herself to hunt? No, no! Is not Nuu’s nature to hunt, is hers to come later and learn. Such is the way of things!<page>But you... a predator! Know it from your smells can clever Nuu! So Nuu asks you to cut and record, so we both may learn!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小丫头，想了解生物怎么不自己去抓？<page>啊？努努自己去？不行不行！努努的天职是研究，这是规矩！<page>但你……是掠食者！努努闻得出来！所以拜托你砍怪记录，我们一起学习！
translated_text: <hpage>我的女儿 ， 如果你想了解这片土地上的生物 ， 为什么不亲自去打猎呢 ？<page>妈妈 ， 你想追你自己吗 ？不 ， 不！不 ， 不！大自然不是用来打猎的 ， 而是用来学习的。<page>你是捕食者！可以说 ， 它们是聪明的气味。修改并保存以了解它。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>My daughter, if you want to understand the creatures of this land, why not go hunting yourself?<page>Mom, do you want to chase yourself? No, no! No, no! Nature is not for hunting, but for learning.<page>You are a predator! It can be said that they are smart odors. Modify and save to understand it.

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but there is a still safer place high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>A settlement has formed around the old shrine there. The bell housed within seems to provide some sanctuary from the dangers of the Haunting.<hpage>Your brother and sister pilgrims who now huddle around it would be glad of your company, I am sure.<page>Oh, how wonderful! Yes, I will make my way over there with haste... after I have bathed a little longer. I want to arrive fresh and clean to such a holy place!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，温泉虽然舒服，但圣堡另一边更安全。<hpage>老钟殿旁边有个新聚落，那里的钟声能抵御丝咒。<page>逃到那边的同伴肯定欢迎你。<page>太好了！等我泡舒服了就过去……拜见圣地前得收拾体面！
translated_text: <hpage>作为一个小朝圣者 ， 这个浴缸提供了一个减少外部危险的机会 ， 但在城堡的另一边有一个更安全的地方。<hpage>殖民地在古老的避难所周围形成 ， 内部时钟似乎可以避免入侵的危险。<hpage>聚集在这里的朝圣兄弟姐妹们会很高兴与你们在一起。<page>哦 ， 那太棒了！是的 ， 我会去的。当我有了灵魂 ， 我想去一个如此神圣的地方。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>As a young pilgrim, the bathtub provides an opportunity to reduce external dangers, but there is a safer place on the other side of the castle.<hpage>Colonies formed around ancient sanctuaries, and internal clocks seemed to avoid the danger of invasion.<hpage>The pilgrimage brothers and sisters gathered here will be happy to be with you.<page>Oh, that's great! Yes, I will. When I have a soul, I want to go to such a sacred place.

original_en_text: You hold many charts, Child Wielding Needle. You should consider trading for a quill.<page>With a quill in claw, your maps can be further extended from your own travels. Record enough and you may, in time, come to know this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 你身上的图纸不少，使针的小姑娘，该买支笔了。<page>带着笔就能边走边画。画够多了，迟早能摸清纺络的全貌。
translated_text: 有许多图表 ， 让孩子们思考如何玩针和使用铅笔。<page>通过将手柄安装在脚上 ， 您可以将地图延伸到您的旅程之外。如果你有足够的资源 ， 你就能了解这个王国。
secondary_translated_text: There are many charts that make children think about how to play with needles and use pencils.<page>By mounting the handle on your feet, you can extend the map beyond your journey. If you have enough resources, you can understand the kingdom.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle. You too have discovered this haven of bells.<page>For a long time, I avoided this place for sense of something strange. Now arrived, I find it free, and its few remaining residents offering trade and welcome.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>It was her you may have sensed. A formidable force, even aged. By voice and claw she aided, perhaps guided, the haunted thread that grasps these lands. <page>Weaver? Those vicious things. To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！使针的小姑娘。你也找到这镇子了？<page>之前总能察觉到这儿的古怪，就一直避开。现在诅咒没了，剩下的住民还挺热情。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>你此前察觉到的应该就是它。是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线，很难对付。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！孩子们挥动针头 ， 即使这种动物也有安全的避难所。<page>现在 ， 当我到达时 ， 我意识到这个地方是免费的 ， 剩下的少数居民也提供商业和招待。<hpage>我杀了一个巨大的生物在城市上空。它是故意扭曲的 ， 但我怀疑那是眼泪。<hpage>你能感觉到它 ， 但你听不到它。老年人也表现出很大的力量。她的声音和腿帮助他们 ， 也许会引导他们收集关于这片土地上的鬼魂的线索。<page>剧院在哪里？很久以前 ， 我把这个故事讲给一个年轻的死人听 ， 但他以为箭头里只有一具尸体。<hpage>他仍然活着 ， 但如果是眼泪 ， 他会受重伤。<hpage>她的丝绸深深地绑在她的外壳上 ， 这是她从未见过的残酷惩罚。<page>当嫉妒被打破时 ， 嫉妒仍然存在研发传奇技术战斗意味着为胜利而自豪。
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! Boshanka! Children wield needles, and even this animal has a safe haven.<page>Now, when I arrived, I realized that the place was free and that the few remaining residents also provided commerce and hospitality.<hpage>I killed a huge creature over the city. It was deliberately distorted, but I suspect it was tears.<hpage>You can feel it, but you can't hear it. Elderly people also show great strength. Her voice and legs help them and may lead them to gather clues about the ghosts in the land.<page>Where is the theater? A long time ago, I told this story to a young dead man, but he thought there was only one body in the arrow.<hpage>He is still alive, but if it were tears, he would have been seriously injured.<hpage>Her silk was tied deeply to her shell, a cruel punishment she had never seen.<page>When jealousy is broken, jealousy remains there. Research and development legendary technological battles mean being proud of winning.

original_en_text: This outpost that the shambling pilgrim-bugs have built for themselves... Dondakku!<page>Where are the armaments? The watch-poles? Never have I seen such a poorly defended encampment!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no mind for war, Shakra. I suspect most depart for the Citadel soon after their arrival.<page>Hmph. If they persist in their carelessness, they will find only death in these harsh lands.
original_zh_text: 朝圣虫建的这破营地……东达库！<page>防御工事呢？瞭望塔呢？没见过这么不设防的营地！<hpage>朝圣者们不懂争斗，估计刚到就奔着圣堡去了。<page>哼！继续这么马虎，迟早死在纺络的险地里。
translated_text: 这个不稳定的基地是由朝圣者建造的。<page>你的枪在哪里 ？保罗怎么样了 ？我从未见过这么弱的地方！<hpage>这里的朝圣者似乎没有任何战争的概念 ， 大多数人一到达城堡就到达了。<page>如果他们不小心 ， 他们会死在这片荒凉的土地上。
secondary_translated_text: This unstable base was built by pilgrims.<page>Where's your gun? How is Paul? I have never seen anything so weak!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no concept of war, and most arrive as soon as they arrive at the castle.<page>If they are not careful, they will die in this desolate land.

original_en_text: What’s this? The little spider climbs so high, here to stand aquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Neither you nor your land have proven my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧？小蜘蛛抖抖索索爬到圣堡脚下了。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: 这是什么 ？这只小蜘蛛坐在一座美丽的城堡里 ， 爬到了高处。<hpage>他是一个蓝色的男孩， 不是吗？你又减少了吗？这并不意味着你和你的国家把我当作敌人。<page>“亲爱的 ， 亲爱的 ， 你为什么这么乐观 ？ ”“我不认为我有这种力量； 它很快就扼杀了希望。<hpage>愚蠢的孩子 ， 你以为我永远不会见到你的国王吗 ？嗯 ， 对吧 ？<hpage>地球的美丽 ， 昆虫的忠诚 ， 以及围绕它们的诅咒。<hpage>他的王国是由一个超然的存在 ， 蠕虫 ， 最高的种姓之一统一。<hpage>无论你多么渴望丝绸和贝壳 ， 你都会发现你对这两样东西都有强烈的依恋。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? The little spider sat in a beautiful castle and climbed high.<hpage>He's a blue boy, isn't he? Have you reduced it again? That doesn't mean that you and your country regard me as an enemy.<page>"Honey, honey, why are you so optimistic? "I don't think I have that power; it kills hope quickly.<hpage>Foolish boy, do you think I will never see your king? Yeah, right?<hpage>The beauty of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that surrounds them.<hpage>His kingdom is unified by one transcendent being, the worm, one of the highest castes.<hpage>No matter how much you crave silk and shells, you will find that you have a strong attachment to both.

original_en_text: Aren’t those solemn judge-bugs nice? They do not speak or sing, but I sense great wisdom behind their gleaming gazes!<hpage>Beware them, little one. Wise or not, their judgements are often followed by violence. Many of your fellow pilgrims have fallen to them on these great steps.<page>Oh...? But even the fallen will sometimes stand again, and all pilgrimages will be completed, yes? That’s how I’ve heard it!
original_zh_text: 看那些肃穆的判官虫多亲切！虽然他们不言语也不歌唱，但眼中却闪着智慧！<hpage>要小心，小家伙。他们的判决常伴暴力，不知多少朝圣者倒在这些石阶上。<page>可是……倒下者终会再起，朝圣终将完成，不是吗？
translated_text: 法官的错误是错误的吗 ？他们不会说话或唱歌 ， 但他们可以感觉到隐藏在他们明亮的眼睛后面的伟大智慧。<hpage>知识与否 ， 他们的审判伴随着暴力 ， 许多朝圣者在这群人中被捕。<page>是啊 ， 不是吗 ？但有时 ， 即使是倒下的人也会站起来 ， 朝圣也会结束。嗯 ， 对吧 ？事实上？我听说过。
secondary_translated_text: Are the judge's mistakes wrong? They cannot speak or sing, but they can feel the great wisdom hidden behind their bright eyes.<hpage>Knowledge or not, their trials were accompanied by violence, and many pilgrims were arrested among this group.<page>Yeah, right? But sometimes, even the fallen will stand up and the pilgrimage will end. Yeah, right? Actually? I've heard of it.

original_en_text: These twisting tunnels hide many worthy opponents, but many traps as well. Watch your footing closely.
original_zh_text: 这些弯道里藏着不少好对手，但陷阱也多。走路看着点。
translated_text: 这条曲折的隧道不仅隐藏着许多宝贵的敌人 ， 而且还隐藏着许多陷阱。
secondary_translated_text: This winding tunnel not only hides many precious enemies, but also hides many traps.

original_en_text: As you requested, these pins will mark the travel stations within that hideous structure of steel and steam.
original_zh_text: 按你要求的，这些图钉能标记那些铁皮蒸汽管的站点。
translated_text: 根据要求 ， 引脚指定了坚固的钢结构和蒸汽上的支架。
secondary_translated_text: As required, the pins are specified with strong steel construction and brackets on steam.

original_en_text: <hpage>Head fast for Bellhart, Pill. These lands are not for travelling without a sharp blade in claw.<page>Aye! Yes! To Bellhart, and my brother, I shall fly quickly-quick. If you pass that way again, stop and give greeting!
original_zh_text: <hpage>回钟心镇吧，这地方没武器别乱跑。<page>这就回！我飞得可、可快了！你要是经过钟心镇记得和我打招呼！
translated_text: <hpage>贝尔哈德和药丸这些土地不适合没有指甲旅行。<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！我飞得很快 ， 伯哈特和他的兄弟们。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Belhard and Pills These lands are not suitable for traveling without nails.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! I fly fast, Burhart and his brothers.

original_en_text: <hpage>Who are you calling for, Shakra? Your voice echoes through the caverns.<page>I came deeper into Pharloom in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I could not keep pace though, and her trail grew cold.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant I will reunite with her.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在喊谁？整个山洞都是你回声。<page>我来纺络深处寻找导师，我们部落的最强者。可惜跟丢了。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>这意味着 ... ...谁打电话来？她的声音在山洞里回荡。<page>我到灯塔去寻找我部落中最好的主人 ， 我的主人 ， 但他不能再走路了 ， 他的脚很冷。<page>现在她已经过了这一点 ， 但如果我醒来 ， 我会再次见到她。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>This means... ... Who called? Her voice echoed in the cave.<page>I went to the lighthouse to find the best master in my tribe, my master, but he could no longer walk, his feet were cold.<page>She's past that now, but if I wake up, I'll see her again.

original_en_text: We must never let our shells soften, or Pharloom’s sharp teeth will sink in quick.<page>Would you duel with me, Hornet Wielding Needle? Together we shall sharpen one another’s skill.
original_zh_text: 战士不能养尊处优，纺络到处藏着危险。<page>来切磋吧？我们互相磨练技艺。
translated_text: 不要让你的皮肤变软。如果你不这样做 ， 鹰的锋利牙齿很快就会出现。<page>马塞尔 · 尼德尔 （ Marcel Niddle ） 《你想要我吗 ？ 》 （ You Want Me？我们将共同努力 ， 提高我们的技能。
secondary_translated_text: Don't let your skin soften. If you don't do this, the eagle's sharp teeth will soon appear.<page>Marcel Niddle,"Do You Want Me?》 （ You Want Me？We will work together to improve our skills.

original_en_text: I’ll wish you success in your grand task, miss, but forgive me my sadness for knowing the cruel cost...
original_zh_text: 我希望你能成功，女士。但一想到代价这么沉重，还是很难过。
translated_text: 我希望你对你的出色工作感到满意。“我知道价格。"
secondary_translated_text: I hope you are satisfied with your excellent work. "I know the price. "

original_en_text: Hurry it up, let us out quickly then! We got places to go, bugs to see, trinkets to pilfer!
original_zh_text: 快点放人！我们还要去捞宝贝呢！
translated_text: 快走 ， 快走！有地方参观， 昆虫可以看到， 飞行场景！
secondary_translated_text: Let's go, let's go! There are places to visit, insects can see, flying scenes!

original_en_text: Warrior... I heard your approach. Why do you come? Surely you’ve no desire to see these long collapsed caves?<hpage>The way was open, sir. I merely followed the path through. Am I correct to guess you were once a resident of these borderlands?<page>Aye... and glorious they were, in their time. Pharloom’s end approaches, but my caves, these caves, fell to fate long before. <page>Of that fair land, I am the last... Now to remain till the end, and remember the splendour that was...
original_zh_text: 战士……我听见你的脚步了。来这废墟做什么？<hpage>道路通畅，我只是顺路而来。你曾是边境之民？<page>曾是……昔日辉煌……不复存在。如今纺络快完了，但我的家园……早就覆灭了。<page>我是故土最后的遗民……要守到末日，铭记曾经的荣光……
translated_text: 我听到他走近 ， 你怎么样了 ？你不想看到那个长洞 ， 对吧 ？事实上？<hpage>道路是开放的。我刚走上了这条路。你是边境地区的居民吗 ？<page>秋天即将结束 ， 我的洞穴 ， 这些洞穴 ， 已经落入命运的手中。<page>在这个美丽的世界里 ， 我是最后一个。你必须努力工作 ， 直到最后 ， 忘记荣耀。
secondary_translated_text: I heard him approaching. How are you? You don't want to see that long hole, do you? Actually?<hpage>The road is open. I just started this road. Are you a resident of the border area?<page>Autumn is coming to an end, and my caves, these caves, have fallen into the hands of destiny.<page>In this beautiful world, I am the last one. You must work hard until the end and forget the glory.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, you have hunted long with little rest, thinks Nuu.<page>Perhaps you are covered in too many juices, weighed down by beastly filth? Let sweet Nuu clean you, make you fresh!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，你一直狩猎，好久没休息了吧？<page>是不是浑身都沾满了黏液和血液？让努努帮你清洁吧！
translated_text: 陛下已经打猎很长一段时间了 ， 但休息的时间很少。<page>你是一个被太多的汁液或粘液包裹的动物吗 ？Sweet Noo 会让你感觉新鲜和新鲜！
secondary_translated_text: His Majesty has been hunting for a long time, but he has very little time to rest.<page>Are you an animal wrapped in too much juice or mucus? Sweet Noo will make you feel fresh and fresh!

original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！
translated_text: 这是美味！我知道我爱上了他！
secondary_translated_text: This is delicious! I know I'm in love with him!

original_en_text: <page=M>We could do it. The spell can be cast, with enough power, enormous power, equal maybe to that monarch...<hpage>I cannot grant you mine, if it even were enough. My strength is still needed to face her below. Where else do you propose we seek a source?<page=M>From Pharloom! Ho ho ho! Remember, ours is a kingdom of wishes granted.<page=B>Pharloom was not born of that monarch, Old One. Power existed in these lands even before she bound them beneath her.<page=B>Grnk. Seek the old hearts of our kingdom and the last successors to bear their strength.<page=M>They’re still out there, hidden away, much faded by the pale one’s long dominion. You must make them stir.<page=M>We will teach you how, in the way befitting a Weaver, a sombre song to reach down into their memories and enliven them a final time.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们或许能够施咒，但要有足够力量，堪比那君主的力量。<hpage>我给不了这份力，即便有也要留着对付她。还能从哪里获取？<page=M>纺络！嚯嚯！别忘了，我们的王国最擅长实现愿望。<page=B>纺络并非君主创造，古老者。在她到来之前，这片土地就存在着力量。<page=B>您该去寻找古老的纺络之心，与其最后的传承者。<page=M>虽然几乎被苍白统治消磨殆尽，他们仍在某处苟存。必须唤醒他们。<page=M>我们会教你织者的方法。用挽歌深入他们的记忆，激醒他们的力量。
translated_text: <page=M>这是一个咒语 ， 我们可以做 ， 功能和强大。相当于君主吗 ？<hpage>即使这样 ， 我也不会把我的东西给你。你需要强大的力量来处理这个问题。你觉得我会在别的地方找到它吗？<page=M>"法鲁姆" — 哦 ， 哦！王国是一个可以实现的王国。<page=B>这不是国王的错。这种权力在这些土地被控制之前就已经存在了。<page=B>边境！“他将寻找我们王国的最后一位长老和继承人 ， 并夺取权力。<page=M>他们仍然在那里 ， 并被隐藏在苍白的长期统治。<page=M>我们将教你如何在适合你的组织的忧郁歌曲结束时激活自己。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>It's a mantra that we can do, functional and powerful. Is it equivalent to a monarch?<hpage>Even so, I won't give you what's mine. You need strong power to deal with this problem. Do you think I'll find it somewhere else?<page=M>"Farum" -Oh, Oh! A kingdom is a kingdom that can be realized.<page=B>It was not the king's fault. This power existed before these lands were controlled.<page=B>Border!
