"He will seek the last elder and heir of our kingdom and seize power.<page=M>They are still there and hidden under the pale long reign.<page=M>We will teach you how to activate yourself at the end of melancholy songs that suit your organization.

original_en_text: Owoww, what a rotten turn! Keep your nasty junk to yourself, then!
original_zh_text: 哎哟！真倒霉！你就自个儿留着这些破烂货吧！
translated_text: 哇 ， 多么大的变化啊！把垃圾留给我。
secondary_translated_text: Wow, what a big change! Leave me the garbage.

original_en_text: O-hoho! Share some of your little clicky-clackies with us, help us fill our pockets. If you do, we’ll share a sneaky secret with you!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！分点叮当响给我们，就告诉你个秘密！
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！分享你的歌曲来填补你的口袋。如果是这样 ， 我们将分享你的秘密。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Share your songs to fill your pockets. If so, we will share your secrets.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, for your continued huntings you should climb up, up above here, above the tallest spinning towers!<page>Hidden in the dark thickets are strange bugs who call up dancing flames. So pretty! So warm!<page>But when Nuu tried to crawl near, the flames became angry and swooped all around! Poor Nuu was half roasted!<page>Nuu leaves it to you, miss grown-up, to climb up there and cut those flames apart. For our journal, such must be done.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，要继续狩猎的话，你得往上爬，越过最高的纺塔！<page> 暗蕨丛里藏着会召唤舞焰的怪虫。好漂亮！好暖和！<page> 可努努刚靠近，火焰就发怒冲了上来！差点把努努烤焦啦！<page> 这事就交给你啦，大姐姐，上去把那些火焰斩碎吧。为了填满记录册，必须这么做！
translated_text: 先生 ， 为了继续狩猎 ， 我们必须爬上最高的旋转塔的顶部。<page>一只奇怪的昆虫躲在黑暗的丛林里 ， 他称之为火焰。<page>然而 ， 当他的姐姐试图靠近时 ， 火焰变得如此猛烈 ， 以至于它们到处反弹。Nono （ 音 ）<page>你已经承担了责任。站起来 ， 把灯关掉。这对杂志来说是必不可少的。
secondary_translated_text: Sir, in order to continue hunting, we must climb to the top of the highest revolving tower.<page>A strange insect hides in the dark jungle. He calls it a flame.<page>However, when his sister tried to get closer, the flames became so fierce that they bounced everywhere. Nono<page>You have accepted your responsibility. Stand up and turn off the lights. This is essential for magazines.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle, have you seen trace of my master nearby? I feel she was here only recently!<hpage>I cannot say for certain, Shakra, though if she travels seeking skilled opponents, these steps would serve her well. The warriors watching over them are formidable.<page>True! Impressive guardians they are, fighting defensively and loath to leave their stations. They swing their weapons with a cold brutality that should not be underestimated.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！见过我导师的踪迹吗？感觉她刚来过！<hpage>我不确定。但她若是想找高手过招，这台阶的守卫正合适。<page>没错！这些守卫死守岗位，出手狠辣，不能小瞧。
translated_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！我是那个男孩芬恩 ， 你看到师父的指纹了吗 ？看起来我们刚刚到。<hpage>查克拉 ， 我不知道 ， 但如果你正在寻找一个经验丰富的对手 ， 这一步是为你。<page>制片人！!他们是令人印象深刻的守门员 ， 他们在防守上挣扎 ， 不想离开自己的位置。他们的武器的残酷和残忍不容低估。
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! Boshanka! I'm the boy Finn. Have you seen the master's fingerprints? Looks like we just arrived.<hpage>Chakra, I don't know, but if you are looking for an experienced opponent, this step is for you.<page>Producer!! They are impressive goalkeepers who struggle defensively and don't want to leave their position. The cruelty and cruelty of their weapons cannot be underestimated.

original_en_text: Poshanka, Hornet Wielding Needle. For that is your name, is it not? I have heard it spoken in this land with reverence.<page>I had hoped you would accept my summons. In these moments one is good, but two is best.<hpage>I would not deny the wish, Shakra. A sombre ceremony seemed likely at this trail’s end, and I am sadly proved correct. This then is your master?<page>The fiercest of my tribe, here she lies. I called her master, true, but she was mother just as much, more by far than the bug who bore me.<hpage>Among the many marvels of this kingdom, she found a fine place to meet her end.<page>Ended by age... My tribe would call that shame, but I see only strength unbeaten.<page>Even as her shell betrayed her, she walked this kingdom’s breadth. It was her trail followed that allowed me to share witness to its dignity.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, you too have journeyed these many paths, as my master before us. Join me now for her song-sending.<page>It is time for her soul to walk beyond her shell...
original_zh_text: 你来啦，使针的小姑娘！你叫大黄蜂，对吧？最近可名气不小呢。<page>希望你别推辞我的请求，现在的情况，需要你搭把手，我自己一个不够。<hpage>我不会推辞的，沙克拉。看这情景，要是我没猜错……这是你的导师吧？<page>这里躺着的是我们部落的最强者。我叫她导师，但她其实更像我母亲。<hpage>她挑了个好地方长眠呢……<page>她是老死的……部落会觉得这很丢脸吧，但我只看到不败的强者。<page>拖着老旧的甲壳丈量大地，是跟着她的足迹我才能见证许多。<page>使针的小姑娘，你也走过这些路。陪我给她唱首送魂曲吧。<page>该送她的灵魂离壳了……
translated_text: 你的脊椎被针刺了 ， 对吧 ？我在这个国家听到了这一点 ， 我恭敬地说。<page>我希望你能更好地理解我的引用 ： 一个好 ， 两个。<hpage>在路的尽头 ， 有一个黑暗的良心 ， 但不幸的是 ， 我发现他是对的。<page>我叫她老师 ， 她也是母亲。<hpage>在这个王国的许多奇迹中 ， 他找到了一个结束生命的地方。<page>我的部落称之为耻辱 ， 但我只看到了不可战胜的力量。"<page>虽然他的身体背叛了她 ， 但他回到了他的王国。"<page>黄蜂倒了针 ， 你来了很多 ， 就好像你是我们面前的老师一样。<page>是时候让灵魂离开肉体了。
secondary_translated_text: You got a needle in your spine, right? I heard this in this country, and I say respectfully.<page>I hope you can understand my quote better: one good, two.<hpage>At the end of the road, there was a dark conscience, but unfortunately I found out he was right.<page>I call her teacher, and she is also a mother.<hpage>Among the many miracles of this kingdom, he found a place to end his life.<page>My tribe calls it a disgrace, but I only see invincible power. "<page>Although his body betrayed her, he returned to his kingdom. "<page>The wasp fell, and many of you came, as if you were the teacher in front of us.<page>It's time for the soul to leave the body.

original_en_text: From this safe vantage, I can keep watch for threats while I work. These lowlands are brittle and dangerous. Keep your weapon close.
original_zh_text: 这位置安全，能边干活边警戒。低处危险易碎，注意武器别离手。
translated_text: 在安全方面 ， 可以识别工作场所的威胁。较低的地区是脆弱和危险的。把枪关上。
secondary_translated_text: In terms of security, threats to the workplace can be identified. Lower areas are fragile and dangerous. Turn the gun off.

original_en_text: Have you tried your claw at the games? Rollicking good fun, don’t you think?<page>I wonder if I could score a little higher if I tried again...
original_zh_text: 你玩过游戏没？超有意思！<page>不知道我再试几次能不能刷新记录……
translated_text: 你玩的时候会戴指甲吗 ？你不觉得这很有趣吗？<page>如果你再试一次 ， 你的分数会更高。
secondary_translated_text: Do you wear nails when playing? Don't you think this is interesting?<page>If you try again, your score will be higher.

original_en_text: After all... it’s you that she wants... is it not?
original_zh_text: 毕竟……她要的是你……不是吗？
translated_text: 最后 ， 她想要你 ， 对吧 ？
secondary_translated_text: Finally, she wants you, right?

original_en_text: Hoi! Magnificent! May our mighty contest of shells commence.<page>But a final note, nimble bug! If ever you run off course or desire a quick convene, simply play what music you’re able and my companion shall whisk you back to our starting line.<page>Now! The track calls us. Allow me a moment to assemble a course worthy to test our skill.<page>
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！太棒了！史诗对决即将开始！<page>最后提醒一下，要是跑岔道了或想集合，就随便来点音乐，我的跟班会带你回起点。<page>好了，等我布置条配得上咱们实力的赛道就开始！
translated_text: 这是一个伟大的把戏！兔子的比赛开始了。<page>如果你想从地面上下来 ， 并且想快速冷静下来 ， 那么播放一些你可以播放的音乐。我的朋友会让我回到起跑线。<page>来吧 ， 现在！随着时间的推移 ， 我们将组织有用的课程来测试我们的技能。<page>
secondary_translated_text: This is a great trick! The rabbit race has begun.<page>If you want to get off the ground and calm down quickly, play some music you can play. My friends will get me back to the starting line.<page>Come on, now! Over time, we will organize useful courses to test our skills.<page>

original_en_text: <hpage>Hold your gratitude, little one. The dead are stirring.
translated_text: <hpage>一个死于发烧的小男孩玩着感恩。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>A little boy who died of a fever played with gratitude.

original_en_text: <hpage>It is time, shamans. I have the hearts, enough as requested. Enough to build your spell, yes?<page=B>Aye. We’re ready. Still, it’s a sad set you’re holding there, strength such as few shall ever know... and all about to burn for Pharloom’s saving.<page=S>I’ll warn ya, Old One, this first part might not be pleasant, but we’ll get you in there, deep as needed.<page=M>Now you’ve only to ready yourself for what comes after. Lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时候到了，萨满们。三颗心已集齐，够施咒了吧？<page=B>足够了。唉，这几颗残心曾经承载何等伟力……如今却要为了救世燃尽。<page=S>我得提醒你，古老者。这法咒一开始可能不太舒服，但一定能把您送进记忆深处。<page=M>接下来就看你造化了。做好准备，躺在祭坛上，就可以开始了。
translated_text: <hpage>” 萨蒙， 现在是时候。我会这么做 ， 够了。一个咒语就足够了 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？<page=B>是的 ， 我们已经准备好了 ， 但你所看到的是一场悲伤的表演。一种几乎未知的力量。为了赎罪 ， 一切都被烧毁了。<page=S>第一部分可能会让你感到不舒服 ， 但如果你愿意 ， 你可以参加。<page=M>我们必须为即将发生的事情做好准备 ” 。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Samon, now is the time. I'll do that, that's enough. One spell is enough, isn't it? Actually?<page=B>Yes, we are ready, but what you see is a sad performance. An almost unknown force. Everything was burned to atone for atonement.<page=S>The first part may make you uncomfortable, but you can participate if you want.<page=M>We must be prepared for what is about to happen."

original_en_text: Charting the heights of this great mount would prove a mighty challenge. For now, I have seen only its base.<page>Once I have completed the search for my master, I would like to return and attempt the climb in full.
original_zh_text: 测绘这大山是个不小的挑战。现在我只探了山脚。<page>等找到导师，一定要回来爬个痛快。
translated_text: 山的高度很难 ， 所以现在我们只能看到它的基础。<page>找到主人后 ， 我想做一个真正的徒步旅行。
secondary_translated_text: The height of the mountain is difficult, so now we can only see its foundation.<page>After finding the owner, I wanted to go on a real hiking trip.

original_en_text: Worm-ridden caverns, shaking and unstable. There remain faint signs that pilgrims once travelled these tight paths.
original_zh_text: 被蠕虫所蛀的摇晃洞穴。隐约能看出朝圣者曾走过这窄路。
translated_text: 这个被昆虫感染的洞穴很大 ， 沿着狭窄的街道有朝圣者的小散步。
secondary_translated_text: The insect-infected cave is large, with small walks of pilgrims along the narrow street.

original_en_text: Hooof... let us stop the duel there.<page>I... hoof... I hope in my excitement I did not... hoof... bring down my lance too heavy upon you, sister.<hpage>It was combat honourably conducted, sirs. But now, we should all of us keep moving. It will not remain quiet here for long.<page>Y-yes, of course. Our good works are never done, and we must press ever on. There is no time to waste!
original_zh_text: 呼……点到为止。<page>我……呼……希望我没……呼……下手太重。<hpage>二位打得很好，但此地不宜久留，我们该上路了。<page>对、对，正事要紧，不能浪费时间，该走了！
translated_text: 我接到一个电话 ， 让我们结束这场战斗。<page>我的意思是， 先生。情绪 （ Emotion ）<hpage>先生们 ， 这是一场光荣的战斗 ， 但现在我们必须展望未来。这个地方已经很久没有安静过了。<page>当然 ， 我们的善行永远不会停止 ， 所以请继续下去。我们没有时间浪费！
secondary_translated_text: I got a call asking us to end this battle.<page>I mean, sir. Emotion (Emotion)<hpage>Gentlemen, this has been a glorious battle, but now we must look to the future. This place has not been quiet for a long time.<page>Of course, our good deeds will never stop, so please continue. We have no time to waste!

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! Simply step to the challenge. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 别灰心，输一次不算什么！振作起来再战！
translated_text: 灵活的错误 ， 以避免失败冲突是一个挑战。他想再在一起！“
secondary_translated_text: Flexibility to mistakes to avoid conflicts of failure is a challenge. He wants to be together again!“

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause saw you first ascend to this Citadel, Garmond?<page>Mine is only the most sacred quest, sister! One shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We sought this Citadel, to stand before its rulers, and demand their answer! By force if necessary! All for our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk.... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们最初来圣堡要做什么？<page>我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们要为了村子，向圣堡的君主讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>你为什么要参观城堡 ？<page>“姐姐 ， 我的追求是最神圣的 ， 我与我最忠实的伴侣 ， 我心爱的儿子分享其中之一。<page>让我们调查城堡 ， 与它的统治者见面 ， 并寻找答案。如果有必要 ， 我们将使用你的力量。亲爱的城市！我们将提供丝绸。<page>我们美丽的人民所征服的线程的可怕问题 — 我们想离开人民 ， 他们的记忆 ， 并以某种方式看到正义得到伸张。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Why do you want to visit the castle?<page>"Sister, my pursuits are the most sacred, and I share one of them with my most loyal companion, my beloved son.<page>Let us investigate the castle, meet its rulers, and find answers. If necessary, we will use your power. Dear city! We will provide silk.<page>The terrible issues of the thread conquered by our beautiful people-we want to leave the people, their memories, and somehow see justice done.

original_en_text: Ahh, a fellow pilgrim. I’ve been praying alone here too long, with only the wind’s voice to join mine.<page>We’re so close. Our pilgrimage is almost over. Just one final, brutal climb, hm?<hpage>The Citadel is near, pilgrim. You must have had some strength in you. Few of your fellows seem to reach these heights.<page>Aye, the roads become lonelier the longer they’re travelled and the higher we climb.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of faith to make it this far, though I’m sure I don’t need to tell you that.
original_zh_text: 啊，又一个朝圣者。我在这独自祈祷太久了，只有风声作伴。<page>快到终点了。朝圣之旅即将结束，只剩最后这段险途了对吧？<hpage>圣堡就在眼前。你本事不错，能走到这的朝圣者没几个。<page>是啊，这路越走越长，越往上爬同伴越少。<page>走到这需要运气和信念，不过你肯定懂。
translated_text: “我的朝圣者们 ， 我独自在这里祈祷了很长时间 ， 只有风的声音使我的声音更大。<page>朝圣即将结束 ， 但这是最后一步吗 ？事实上？<hpage>很少有人能达到这个水平。<page>是的 ， 越长 ， 攀登的高度越高 ， 道路就越孤独。<page>它需要很多运气和信心才能到达这里 ， 但我不认为你应该这么说。
secondary_translated_text: "My pilgrims, I prayed alone here for a long time, only the sound of the wind made my voice louder.<page>The pilgrimage is coming to an end, but is this the last step? Actually?<hpage>Few people can reach this level.<page>Yes, the longer you go, the higher you climb, the more lonely the road will be.<page>It takes a lot of luck and confidence to get here, but I don't think you should say that.

original_en_text: Huu... You have done it... Huu. Huu... Hoof.<page>Never would I have believed, a shell so fast in all of Pharloom! Wonder of wonders!<page>You have proven it, nimble bug, fulfilled my wish, seen my pace matched and beaten, my limits broken wide.
original_zh_text: 呼……你赢了……呼……呼……<page>难以置信！纺络还存在这般疾速！简直是奇迹！<page>你做到了！实现了我的夙愿，突破了我的极限！
translated_text: 电话来了 ， 你做到了 ， 你打电话给 Calling. Feels 。<page>富勒姆的球跑得那么快 ， 这是不可能的。一个奇迹的奇迹。<page>你试过了 ， 狡猾的昆虫 ， 你看到了我的愿望实现了 ， 我的脚步重新团结起来 ， 我的界限被打破了。
secondary_translated_text: The call came, you did it, you called Calling. Feels 。<page>It was impossible for Fulham's ball to run so fast. A miracle.<page>You have tried, cunning insect, you have seen my wish come true, my steps have been united again, my boundaries have been broken.

original_en_text: Gurro! I have a notion for you, sister. What say we cross our weapons here before we move on? Engage in some rollicking combat together? Have no fear, I will not strike a mortal blow!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！我有个提议，走之前要不要切磋切磋，来场友谊赛热热身？别担心，保证不打死你！
translated_text: 快点 ， 快点！快点 ， 快点！“我有个主意 ， 我们一起去吧。“我们应该一起战斗吗？“别担心 ， 我不会打你的。
secondary_translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! "I have an idea, let's go together. "Should we fight together? "Don't worry, I won't hit you.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir knight, I am sorry... This was the only means to free you from the cursed threads.<page>Hohhhh... fret not.... little one...<page>Be proud... you’ve grown so strong!<page>Zaza... let us just rest a little... and then we’ll be away...
original_zh_text: <hpage>骑士先生，对不起……只有这样才能斩断你身上的黑丝诅咒……<hpage>咳……别难过……小姑娘……<page>你很强大……应该骄傲……<page>扎扎……可以休息了……
translated_text: <hpage>“对不起 ， 奈特先生。只有这样 ， 才能摆脱这个该死的陷阱。<page>是的 ， 对。别担心这个男人。<page>你为自己这么强大而自豪！<page>是他啊！让我们休息一下 ， 然后走吧。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"I'm sorry, Mr. Knight. Only in this way can we escape this damn trap.<page>Yes, right. don't worry about this man.<page>You are proud to be so strong!<page>It's him! Let's take a break and then go.

original_en_text: Nuu’s wish, it is granted. But miss grown-up will continue cutting creatures and adding them to our journal, of course?<hpage>I will. Knowing a creature’s form and habits is an advantage that can decide the outcome of a battle. Recording these details is worth the effort.<page>Oh yes! Is very much worth it! Nuu hopes you will share your new learnings with her often!<page>And take a gift to help with your huntings, miss grown-up! Nuu will add a pocket to your tool pouch, for the bringing of many tools on your hunts!<page>
original_zh_text: 努努的愿望达成了，但大姐姐会继续砍怪记录对吧？<hpage>会的。了解生物习性对战斗有帮助，值得记录。<page>超值得！要经常和努努分享新发现哦！<page>送你个狩猎礼物！给你的工具包加个口袋，多装点装备！
translated_text: 诺亚的愿望会实现 ， 但女性会继续切割这些生物并将它们添加到报纸上吗 ？<hpage>我们知道 ， 了解生物体的形状和习惯是决定战斗结果的优势。<page>快走 ， 快走！非常值得！他们经常分享新的知识。<page>我们有一个礼物来帮助你狩猎！网添加口袋到您的工具包 ， 并允许您在狩猎时携带大量的装备！<page>
secondary_translated_text: Noah's wish will come true, but will women continue to cut these creatures and add them to newspapers?<hpage>We know that understanding the shapes and habits of organisms is an advantage in determining the outcome of a battle.<page>Let's go, let's go! Very worth it! They often share new knowledge.<page>We have a gift to help you hunt! Net adds pockets to your kit and allows you to carry a lot of equipment while hunting!<page>

original_en_text: Just a piece of a mask, innit? Don’t ask us where the other bits are... you’ll have to sniff ‘em out for yourself!
original_zh_text: 只是一块面甲碎片。不知道剩下的在哪……自己找去！
translated_text: 这只是一个面具， 不是吗？你在干什么？不要问别人你在哪里 ， 倾听自己。
secondary_translated_text: It's just a mask, isn't it? What are you doing? Don't ask others where you are, listen to yourself.

translated_text: 蒙特费伊。
secondary_translated_text: Monte Faye.

original_en_text: <hpage>Nuu, I have completed your request, recording many creatures of Pharloom in the journal.<page>Oooh, ooh! Ma ma ma! Look here at the marvelous beasts and bugs, all listed so beautifully!<page>Miss grown-up, so many creatures now you have cut and beat and smashed! Their essences linger on you, their scents mixing with your own!<page>Oooh, ma... Nuu simply must sample it for herself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>努努，你要的生态记录完成了。<page>哇！快看这些奇虫异兽，记录得好详细！<page>大姐姐砍了好多生物！它们的精华都沾在你身上，味道混在一起了！<page>啧啧……努努好想尝一口！
translated_text: <hpage>不 ， 我同意了你的请求 ， 并在我的日记中记录了许多人的存在。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！妈咪！妈咪！看看那些怪物和昆虫！<page>男人和女人 ， 你们杀死了许多生物 ， 杀死了许多人。你的精华会让你大吃一惊 ， 你的香水会与你的香水混合！<page>妈咪！好吧， 你可以自己做。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>No, I agreed to your request and recorded the existence of many people in my diary.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Mommy! Mommy! Look at the monsters and insects!<page>Men and women, you have killed many creatures and killed many people. Your essence will amaze you, and your perfume will mix with your perfume!<page>Mommy! Well, you can do it yourself.

original_en_text: You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: Purple 和我在这里是为了保护和阻止那些背后的人。
secondary_translated_text: Purple and I are here to protect and stop those behind it.

original_en_text: Nuu understands, ma. To sup on such a fierce predator’s juices would be divine... but is not right to do. Such behaviour is unfriendly.<page>Nuu’s wish to see many fine beasts, though... miss grown-up, you have surely granted it! All of Nuu’s thanks goes to you!
original_zh_text: 对不起嘛……虽然掠食者的汁液很诱人……但这样不礼貌。<page>不过见识了这么多神奇生物……太感谢大姐姐了！
translated_text: 我不知道 ， 妈妈 ， 我很想享受这个残酷的捕食者的果汁 ， 但这是一个谎言。” 她不友好。<page>“我希望看到很多漂亮的动物 ， 教授 ， 我同意你的看法。谢谢你为我做的一切！
secondary_translated_text: I don't know, Mom, I would love to enjoy the juice of this cruel predator, but it's a lie." She's not friendly.<page>"I hope to see many beautiful animals, professor, and I agree with you. Thank you for everything you have done for me!

original_en_text: I will soon leave these crumbling roads, but if you stop by the settlement below we may meet again. I pass there often to trade with the pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 我马上要离开这段破路了，但我常去下面的聚落交易，或许还会碰面。
translated_text: 我很快就会离开这条不稳定的道路 ， 但如果我在殖民地下停下来 ， 我会再见到你。
secondary_translated_text: I will soon be off this unstable path, but if I stop under the colonies, I will see you again.

original_en_text: Here, the trail of the stag touched pale... We hunted her, felled her, as none before were able...<page>Proof it became, of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这里留有苍白苜鹿的痕迹……我们猎杀了无虫能及的传说……<page>这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: 这里的驯鹿的足迹已经变蓝了 ， 所以让我们猎杀它们并切割它们。因为没人能做到。<page>这就是我们的尊严 ” 。“神圣律法的象征 ” 。
secondary_translated_text: The tracks of the reindeer here have turned blue, so let's hunt them and cut them. Because no one can do it.<page>This is our dignity." "Symbol of the Holy Law."

original_en_text: Beautiful this, a glowy little piece of somethin’. Stinks of them horrid crawling whisperers a bit, so might be dangerous. You should take it! Give us your rosaries and lighten my claws of it!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的，漂亮的很！就是带着点难闻的织者味儿。危险货，快买走！
translated_text: 它们是如此美丽和明亮的小东西。它闻起来很臭 ， 所以很危险。你必须接受这一点！“把你的念珠给我 ， 点燃我的指甲。"
secondary_translated_text: They are such beautiful and bright little things. It smells bad, so it's dangerous. You must accept this! "Give me your rosary beads and light my nails. "

original_en_text: Ho, sister! A grand victory achieved, again. The haunted might of this place cannot stand against our pure hearts!
original_zh_text: 哈！又赢一场！圣堡的空壳子挡不住我们的正义之心！
translated_text: 哦 ， 姐妹 ， 这个地方的幽灵力量无法阻止我们纯洁的心！
secondary_translated_text: Oh sister, the ghostly power of this place cannot stop our pure hearts!

original_en_text: <page=M>This task before you... This is mortal power you would claim, the hearts of bugs. It will cost their last strength to save this land.<page=M>Even we have some hesitation in this. Despite our desire to touch their power, we’d never wished to see it expended so utterly.<hpage>Better to leave your land weak in wonder, if it means your shells, and those of your fellows, stay intact.
original_zh_text: <page=M>您需要明白……这方法需要夺取凡虫之心，也会耗尽它们最后一丝力气。<page=M>即便是我们也心有不忍。虽然渴望见识这份力量，但并不希望看到它燃尽。<hpage>让这片土地虚弱而存，总好过让虫族壳裂身死。
translated_text: <page=M>这被称为人类的力量 ， 或昆虫的头脑。我们需要最后的力量来拯救这个世界。<page=M>我们希望利用它的力量 ， 但我们不希望它完全耗尽。<hpage>最好的解决办法是使土壤脆弱。这意味着你和你的伴侣之间没有联系。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>This is called the power of humans, or the mind of insects. We need the last power to save the world.<page=M>We want to use its power, but we don't want it to be completely exhausted.<hpage>The best solution is to make the soil fragile. This means that there is no connection between you and your partner.

original_en_text: Gurrrooooo! Gallantly answered, sister! Prepare your weapon!
translated_text: 快点 ， 快点！快点 ， 快点！勇敢 ， 兄弟们 ， 准备好武器！
secondary_translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! Courage, brothers, prepare your weapons!

original_en_text: Uaahhhhh! Miss grown-up... your journal is bursting with every sort of creature! Overflowing! Surely, we can call this complete!<page>To think, that such a task could even be done! So clever is Nuu, to have set such a fierce predator onto the work!<hpage>These vast lands hold so much life, and to catalogue it all has taught me greatly. It is an effort worth continuing even after I leave this kingdom.<page>Ooh ma, such a hunger is worthy indeed! You and I are of accord, miss grown-up, hunters both. Our methods are different but our appetites have become very similar!<page>Nuu has for you this token, a symbol of all your efforts, and a marker of your true nature. It carries with it her sweet, sweet smell!
original_zh_text: 啊啊啊！记录册要满出来了！绝对算完成了吧！<page>没想到真能做完！努努真聪明，找对帮手了！<hpage>这片大地生机勃勃，记录它们让我受益匪浅。以后我会保留这个习惯。<page>哇！这才是真正的饥渴！大姐姐和我都是合格的猎手！方法不同但胃口一样大！<page>送你一个象征努力的标记，沾着努努的体香哦！
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！陛下 ， 报纸上充斥着生物泄漏！可以称之为完成。<page>当我想到它 ， 我可以做这份工作。我们足够聪明 ， 可以与这些邪恶的掠夺者合作！<hpage>许多形式的生命生活在这片广阔的土地上 ， 对它们进行分类是非常有用的。即使你离开王国 ， 也值得跟随。<page>我们都是成年女性 ， 我们都是猎人。虽然方法不同 ， 但食欲非常相似。<page>“我创造这个符号是为了象征他的努力和天性。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! Your Majesty, the newspapers are full of biological leaks! You can call it completion.<page>When I think about it, I can do the job. We are smart enough to cooperate with these evil predators!<hpage>Many forms of life live in this vast land, and it is very useful to classify them. Even if you leave the kingdom, it is worth following.<page>We are all adult women, we are all hunters. Although the methods are different, the appetite is very similar.<page>"I created this symbol to symbolize his efforts and nature.

original_en_text: All bowed before we princes green...
translated_text: 每个人都喜欢绿色的王子。
secondary_translated_text: Everyone loves the green prince.

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause sees you travelling these blighted lands, Garmond? Do you also seek the Citadel above?<page>Aye! But do not mistake a valorous adventurer for a mere pilgrim. Mine is a sacred quest, shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We seek that Citadel not for its gifts. Nay, sister! We seek its rulers, to demand their answer! By force if necessary! For our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们因何来到这里，莫非也是要去圣堡？<page>对，但我们可不是来朝圣的！我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们去那圣堡，是想为村子讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>“你知道我为什么来到这片荒野吗 ？ ”” 你在寻找楼上的城堡吗？<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！但不要把勇敢的冒险家和纯粹的朝圣者混淆。我的使命是一项神圣的使命 ， 它将由我最忠实的同伴 ， 亲爱的扎扎完成。<page>找到城堡不是礼物 ， 也不是姐妹！我们正在寻找他们的领袖 ， 并寻找答案！如果有必要 ， 就会使用武力。以我们所爱的人的名义 ， 我们进行了一次伪装。"<page>我们美丽的人民所征服的线程的可怕问题 — 我们想离开人民 ， 他们的记忆 ， 并以某种方式看到正义得到伸张。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Do you know why I came to this wilderness? "Are you looking for the castle upstairs?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! But don't confuse brave adventurers with pure pilgrims. My mission is a sacred mission, and it will be accomplished by my most loyal companion, dear Zaza.<page>Finding the castle is not a gift, nor is it a sister! We are looking for their leaders and looking for answers! If necessary, force will be used. In the name of those we love, we put in a disguise. "<page>The terrible issues of the thread conquered by our beautiful people-we want to leave the people, their memories, and somehow see justice done.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. It was a welcome surprise to hear your call echo through these crumbling tunnels. How goes the search for your master?<page>Poshanka! It is a difficult task to track anything in these caverns while the worms ceaselessly churn the rock.<page>Still, I can see that my master has travelled here. Her path within this land winds strangely... I wonder at her intent.<page>It is no matter though. She can enlighten me when again we meet. Until then, I will continue in her shadow.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。听到你喊声从塌方隧道传来很是惊喜。寻找导师有进展吗？<page>啵尚咔！虫子拱得这附近摇来晃去，追踪太难。<page>但她肯定来过这里，行踪诡异……猜不透意图。<page>无所谓。跟她重逢时自然就明白了。在此之前，先继续追。
translated_text: <hpage>很高兴听到你的声音穿过一个松散的隧道。<page>博尚卡！博尚卡！只要蠕虫在岩石上摇摆不定 ， 在这个洞穴里追逐任何东西都可能很困难。<page>我看到老师们来了。走在地球的街道上。<page>很高兴见到你 ， 我躲在你的影子下。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good to hear your voice through a loose tunnel.<page>Boshanka! Boshanka! As long as the worms sway over the rocks, chasing anything in this cave can be difficult.<page>I saw the teachers coming. Walking on the streets of earth.<page>It's nice to meet you, I'm hiding in your shadow.

original_en_text: Lockin’ us up in a place like this... what a shameful act!
original_zh_text: 把我们关在这种地方……太缺德了！
translated_text: 我很抱歉来到这里。
secondary_translated_text: I'm sorry to be here.

original_en_text: Come now beast, let us hear your voice! Sing with me, sing with me, sing sing sing! Make caverns echo and great roads ring!
original_zh_text: 来吧大块头，亮开嗓子，与我同唱！让洞窟共鸣，让圣道震颤！
translated_text: “来吧 ， 傻瓜 ， 让你的声音听起来。一起唱。一起唱。
secondary_translated_text: "Come on, fool, make your voice sound. Sing together. Sing together.

original_en_text: Very well, sister. Perhaps it is better that we all just rest here a little longer.
original_zh_text: 好吧，姐妹。就在这歇会儿也行。
translated_text: “是的 ， 姐姐 ， 你需要在这里休息。
secondary_translated_text: "Yes, sister, you need to rest here.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You forfeited the race? It is true that sometimes a reset is needed, for the health of mind and shell.<page>But what say you now? Surely you are eager to return to the track. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛了？确实，有时为了身心健康，重头再来是必要的。<page>现在怎么说？你肯定渴望重返赛道，那就让我们再次一同飞驰吧！
translated_text: 这是个明智的错误！你输掉了游戏吗 ？事实上 ， 重启有时是心脏和皮肤健康所必需的。<page>但你现在在说什么？我想回到球场。他想再在一起！“
secondary_translated_text: This was a wise mistake! Did you lose the game? In fact, restarting is sometimes necessary for heart and skin health.<page>But what are you talking about now? I want to go back to the court. He wants to be together again!“

original_en_text: These black threads... they reach upwards with such a powerful longing. No wonder they can force themselves through even mighty stone!
original_zh_text: 这些黑色丝线……向上的渴求如此强烈，难怪能穿透坚岩！
translated_text: 黑线。带着这个愿望 ， 我伸出了手。难怪他能在岩石上行走。
secondary_translated_text: Black line. With this wish, I extended my hand. No wonder he can walk on rocks.

original_en_text: Us snitchbugs can wriggle into any place we want, but with this key even a big oafy bug like you can get through a locked door!
original_zh_text: 我们虽然能钻进任何地方，但有了这把钥匙，像你这样的大块头也能开锁！
translated_text: 告密者可以去任何地方 ， 但有了这把钥匙 ， 即使是像你这样的白痴也可以带着钥匙穿过门！
secondary_translated_text: A whistleblower can go anywhere, but with this key, even an idiot like you can walk through the door with it!

original_en_text: <page=M>Through their march, at the far border of these lowlands, seek the last queen of the ant hunters. We can sense her still... just.<page=B>In youth, her voice united the wild tribes. Gave them the strength to resist the pale monarch’s will... longer than most at least.
original_zh_text: <page=M>穿越低地边境，寻找蚂蚁猎群最后的蚁后。虽然气息微弱，但我们仍能感知到……<page=B>年轻时她一声令下，野外部落群起反抗苍白君主……虽终究不敌。
translated_text: <page=M>他们发现了最后一位穿越平原边界的蚁后猎人。但我仍然能感觉到它。寂寞 ， 孤独 ， 孤独 ... ...<page=B>当他年轻的时候 ， 他的声音比大多数人更长时间地把野蛮的部落团结在一起 ， 或者至少给了他们抵抗苍白统治者意志的力量。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>They found the last queen hunter crossing the border of the plain. But I can still feel it. Loneliness, loneliness, loneliness... ...<page=B>When he was young, his voice held the savage tribes together for longer than most, or at least gave them the strength to resist the will of their pale rulers.

original_en_text: Let us head on, sister! Together we shall step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 走吧姐妹！咱们一起跟着信仰进圣城！
translated_text: 姐妹们 ， 加油！我们必须用信心来引导我们。
secondary_translated_text: Come on, sisters! We must guide us with faith.

original_en_text: Needle Child. Hakk! I encountered a settlement near here, at the core of a vein of old bells. The bugs there were snared silent on a web of Silk.<page>It seemed the pernicious trap of some unseen predator. I left quickly, making sure to avoid the glimmering threads.<hpage>I passed the town myself. The thread sickness, I’ve seen its like upon the roads, but there it does not discriminate.<hpage>The curse that strikes the town, it is driven, focused. A cold use of Silk at a concerning scale.<hpage>If the path permits, I will investigate its source.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘！哈克！附近钟心镇被邪丝罩着，居民全中招了。<page>像是某种没见过的掠食者设的陷阱，我躲着丝溜走了。<hpage>我也路过了那里。路上丝咒多是个例，但那镇子上的邪丝却不挑目标。<hpage>这等规模和冷血手段，显然受到操纵。<hpage>我会顺路追查其源头。
translated_text: 这家伙是个针 ， 看看！我们在附近的老钟楼的中心发现了一处物业。蚊子被困在网中。<page>就像一个隐形捕食者的死亡陷阱 ， 你会跑到火焰的前面。<hpage>我在城里走来走去 ， 在街上看到了它 ， 但没有歧视。<hpage>一个诅咒击中了这座城市 ， 你会集中精力。这个尺寸的丝绸是用来冷却的。<hpage>如果道路允许 ， 我会检查来源。
secondary_translated_text: This guy is a needle, look at it! We found a property in the center of the nearby Old Bell Tower. Mosquitoes are trapped in the net.<page>Like a death trap for an invisible predator, you will run in front of the flames.<hpage>I walked around the city and saw it on the street, but there was no discrimination.<hpage>A curse hits the city and you focus. Silk of this size is used for cooling.<hpage>If the road permits, I will check the source.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? Though no reward remains to give, I would delight to soar together with you again!
original_zh_text: 意下如何？虽然没有奖励可以赠予，但能再次与您一同疾驰，我仍乐意至极！
translated_text: 速度误差是什么意思？虽然没有奖励， 我很高兴再次与您一起飞行！
secondary_translated_text: What does speed error mean? Although there is no reward, I am very happy to fly with you again!

original_en_text: Snnnrk... Zaza... Snnnrnrrk... Look sharp my lad...
original_zh_text: 呼噜噜……扎扎……呼噜噜……盯紧点……
translated_text: M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A.SNRK. Snnnrrrrk ， 我的孩子 ， 你很漂亮。
secondary_translated_text: M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A.SNRK. Snnnrrrk, my child, you are beautiful.

original_en_text: You haven’t enough rosaries for trading? The mad pilgrims in the overgrown village near here always carry some with them.<page>Will you take what you need from them? Leaving them to wander their path endlessly is a false mercy.
original_zh_text: 带的念珠不够？附近那些疯癫朝圣者身上多的是。<page>去抢点？让他们继续这么晃悠才是真残忍。
translated_text: 有很多经销商可以替换吗 ？在附近的绿色城市 ， 热情的朝圣者总是有东西可以提供。<page>你能给我我需要的吗 ？错误的善意将使他们无限纠缠在一起。
secondary_translated_text: Are there many dealers that can be replaced? In the nearby green city, enthusiastic pilgrims always have something to offer.<page>Can you give me what I need? Misguided goodwill will entangle them infinitely.

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay out in defence of their lands!<page>Impressive that you managed to survive such a brutal blow. Your shell must be mighty thick!<hpage>Thick enough, though I’d rather have avoided the trap altogether.<hpage>I’ll let it be a reminder to remain wary, even when no foes are nearby.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的陷阱真是防不胜防！<page>你真厉害，挨了这么重的一击还能活，壳一定很厚！<hpage>厚归厚，但还是别中招为好。<hpage>吃一堑长一智，以后没敌人也得保持警惕。
translated_text: 哦 ， 这是一个伟大的陷阱 ， 红色哈米保护地球！<page>很高兴能在这场艰苦的战斗中幸存下来。皮肤应该定期清洁。<hpage>我想完全避免陷阱 ， 但它太厚了。<hpage>当你周围没有敌人时要小心。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, this is a great trap, the red hami protects the earth!<page>I am happy to have survived this tough battle. Skin should be cleaned regularly.<hpage>I wanted to avoid the trap completely, but it was too thick.<hpage>Be careful when there are no enemies around you.

translated_text: ...请原谅我。
secondary_translated_text: ... Please forgive me.

original_en_text: Well, what a pleasure. The road has carried you back to me.<page>Care for a few games of dice, while we’re here? For the same wager, a beat of rosaries? Just sit here beside me and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: 真是有缘，又见面了。<page>既然如此，再玩几局骰子？还是老规矩，一奏念珠？想玩的话就坐我旁边吧。
translated_text: 哦 ， 多么荣幸啊 ， 这条路把你带到了我身边。<page>你想在这里玩吗？我可以用相同的赌注赢得彩票吗 ？坐在你身边。让我们从现在开始
secondary_translated_text: Oh, what an honor, this road has brought you to me.<page>Do you want to play here? Can I win the lottery with the same bet? Sitting next to you. Let's start now.

original_en_text: These docks, I thought them small when first I passed. Now I feel the structure’s true bulk hides below the molten lake.
original_zh_text: 原以为码头很小，结果熔岩湖下还藏着大家伙。
translated_text: 当我参观这个港口时 ， 我以为这是一个小港口 ， 但我意识到熔岩湖下隐藏的结构体积。
secondary_translated_text: When I visited the port, I thought it was a small port, but I realized the hidden structural volume beneath the lava lake.

original_en_text: The bellways, gilded veins that run throughout the lands. Supposedly, they were once used for travel?<br><br>These pins will mark stations on your map.
original_zh_text: 遍布各地的鎏金钟道，据说以前是交通线路？<br><br>这些图钉能够标记钟脉站点。
translated_text: 地球的黄金居所 ， 钟楼。你在旅行中使用过它吗 ？<br><br>松树代表地图上的车站。
secondary_translated_text: Earth's golden dwelling, the Bell Tower. Have you used it on travel?<br><br>Pine trees represent stations on the map.

original_en_text: Again... to see... this land abandoned... betrayed...<page>...And a throne I could not sit alone...<hpage>You were mortal bugs, caught beneath a being pale... Devotion or destruction... these are the only fates my kind allow.
original_zh_text: 再次见证……故土荒废……王座空悬……独坐无味……<hpage>你们只是凡虫，屈身于苍白存在脚下……臣服或毁灭……是我的族群唯二的“恩赐”。
translated_text: 我回来了。看哪 ， 大地荒凉 ， 被出卖了。<page>...没有一个宝座 ， 没有一个人坐在那里。<hpage>达洛格是我们人民唯一能承受的命运。
secondary_translated_text: I'm back. Look, the earth is desolate and betrayed.<page>... There is no throne, no one sitting there.<hpage>Dallog is the only destiny our people can bear.

original_en_text: The world has grown much dangerous, but still we must learn! Cut through the black threads, miss grown-up, and hunt down every beast of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 世界变危险了，但研究不能停！大姐姐快斩断黑灾诅咒，把纺络的野兽全砍遍！
translated_text: 世界变得越来越危险 ， 但我们必须学习！与黑线作战 ， 崇拜众神 ， 追逐所有法老的野兽！
secondary_translated_text: The world is becoming more and more dangerous, but we must learn! Fight the Black Line, worship the gods, and chase all the beasts of Pharaoh!

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you too brave these bogs? The heights of Pharloom offer harsh welcome.<page>So winds my master’s path, and so I follow. Yet true you speak! This is no place for me.<page>That Citadel’s shadow falls heavy here. I can sense its horrid bulk besides.<page>It is no surprise to see it choke these caverns dank and stagnant. That monstrosity of metal and stone cares not for the lands it consumes.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉也来闯沼泽？圣堡脚下可没好地方。<page>导师走过这，我只能跟上。但你说得对，这破地真不适合我。<page>圣堡的阴影笼罩着这里，走在路上都能感觉到它的存在。<page>把洞穴都憋得发霉了，但那堆又大又丑的石头可不会管脚下这片土地。
translated_text: <hpage>沙库尔 ， 你在那个瓶子里勇敢吗 ？我们在上面受到了热烈的欢迎。<page>我主的道是可耻的 ， 我要跟随他。这不是我的家 ” 。<page>我看到了城堡 ， 感受到了它的规模。<page>难怪你会在一个潮湿、停滞的洞穴中窒息。金属或石头怪物不关心他们吸收的地球。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakur, are you brave in that bottle? We received a warm welcome above.<page>The way of my Lord is shameful, and I will follow Him. This is not my home."<page>I saw the castle and felt its scale.<page>No wonder you suffocate in a damp, stagnant cave. Metal or stone monsters don't care about the earth they absorb.

translated_text: 那个人说他是。
secondary_translated_text: The man said he was.

original_en_text: My master would have found her way to these wilds, I am sure. Her warrior’s sense has no equal. Surely, I must be drawing closer to her!
original_zh_text: 导师肯定来过这片荒野。她战斗直觉无虫能及，我快追上她了！
translated_text: 上帝找到了一条穿过沙漠的路。他们的战士精神是无与伦比的。我应该靠近她。
secondary_translated_text: God found a way through the desert. Their warrior spirit is unparalleled. I should be close to her.

original_en_text: Leave us to our noble hunt, sister! The Citadel’s twisted bugs still infest these gilded halls. Many are their numbers, but we shall see their life’s thread severed.
original_zh_text: 姐妹不必管我们！即便圣堡余孽众多，但来多少我们也能杀多少！
translated_text: 开始你的高贵狩猎吧！城堡里的昆虫仍然生活在金色的房间里。然而 ， 许多人的生命线被切断了。
secondary_translated_text: Start your noble hunt! The insects in the castle still live in the golden rooms. However, many people's lifeline has been cut off.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>The shell of the red-hunters makes for a vivid marker indeed.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用红猎手的壳做的标记，足够醒目。
translated_text: 您可以使用它在地图上显示重要地点和回忆。<br><br>红色的猎人贝壳是生命的象征。
secondary_translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>The red hunter shell is a symbol of life.

original_en_text: How dank and fetid are these ancient roads, sister! My delicate whiskers are nearly overcome by the stench of evil in the air.<page>Woe betide those with delicate senses, such as poor Zaza here. The shadow of that ghastly Citadel falls heavily upon this place!<hpage>I’ve seen many mighty structures fall to decay in my time. Such places often become home to predators. Keep your sights trained on what lurks in the fog, sirs.
original_zh_text: 这破路又暗又臭！我的漂亮胡子都沾上味了！<page>像扎扎这样鼻子灵的，都快被熏坏了！<hpage>我见过不少腐朽崩塌的宏伟建筑，常沦为掠食者巢穴。当心雾里藏着的东西。
translated_text: 路上又湿又臭！我柔软的胡子几乎被空气的难闻气味弄伤了。<page>有些人对情绪很敏感 ， 比如可怜的孩子。这座可怕的城堡的影子落在这里！<hpage>在我的时代 ， 我目睹了许多美丽的建筑物的倒塌。这些地区往往是捕食者的家园。小心不要躲在雾中。
secondary_translated_text: The road was wet and smelly! My soft beard was almost hurt by the bad smell of the air.<page>Some people are sensitive to emotions, like poor children. The shadow of this terrible castle falls here!<hpage>In my time, I have witnessed the collapse of many beautiful buildings. These areas are often home to predators. Be careful not to hide in the fog.

original_en_text: Hoy, you been creepin’ around this dusty old place for while then, eh? You must be carryin’ a lot of goodies with you! Let a poor old snitchfly ‘ave a quick look!
original_zh_text: 哟，你在这附近转悠了半天，捞到不少好东西吧？让我瞧瞧！
translated_text: 你在这个尘土飞扬的老地方呆了很长时间吗？应该有很多好东西！让我们来看看记者。
secondary_translated_text: Have you been in this dusty old place for a long time? There should be a lot of good things! Let's take a look at the reporter.

original_en_text: I’m Sherma, by the way. Just another humble pilgrim like yourself. If you ever need assistance on the road ahead, sing out my name and I’ll be sure to find you. Me and my lucky chime are at your service!
original_zh_text: 我叫谢尔玛，和你一样是朝圣者。路上需要帮忙就喊我！我和幸运铃铛随叫随到！
translated_text: 我也是一个谢尔曼像你一样谦卑的人 ， 如果你在旅途中需要帮助 ， 请唱我的名字。你和我伟大的工作。
secondary_translated_text: I'm also a man as humble as Sherman is, and if you need help on the journey, please sing my name. You and I have a great job.

original_en_text: We ain’t leavin’ ‘til we’re done pilfering! You be off, if you’re so scared!
original_zh_text: 我才不走，还没偷够呢！怕死就自己跑！
translated_text: 滚出逃亡！“如果你害怕 ， 就跑。
secondary_translated_text: Get out and run! "If you are afraid, run.

original_en_text: Please take some rosaries in exchange, red maiden!<page>Though in these dark times their promise of holy reward may never be met, still they carry with them our fondest well-wishes.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，请收下这些念珠吧！<page>虽然现在形势不好，但这些念珠装着我们最真诚的祝福！
translated_text: ” 霍恩先生， 我想换个座位。<page>在这个黑暗的时代 ， 神的奖赏应许可能永远不会实现 ， 但它带给我们最好的祝福。
secondary_translated_text: "Mr. Horn, I want to change my seat.<page>In these dark times, God's promise of reward may never be realized, but it brings us the best blessings.

original_en_text: Gate, gate, gate! Nicest gate I’ve met!<br>Gate, gate, gate! Greatest miracle yet! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 骨门骨门最贴心！<br>骨门骨门真神迹！哈哈哈！
translated_text: 贝维！勇敢！勇敢！门！我见过的最好的门！<br>门！门！门！有史以来最伟大的奇迹 ， 哈哈。
secondary_translated_text: Bevy! Courage! Courage! The door! The best door I have ever seen!<br>The door! The door! The door! The greatest miracle of all time, haha.

original_en_text: <page=M>Those docks, atop the lake of flame, they still possess the means to pass below, though you’d be the first in an age to dare the descent.<hpage>Then my path is clear. Remain in your sanctuary and await my return. If this land can be saved, you may have a part to play yet.
original_zh_text: <page=M>熔岩湖上的深坞仍保有通往下层的手段，但长久以来无虫敢试。<hpage>前路已明，你们就守着圣所等我归来吧。若此地尚存生机，或许还用得上各位。
translated_text: <page=M>这个海岸线位于弗拉米斯湖的顶部 ， 下面仍然有一条运河 ， 但你将是这个时代的第一个挑战。<hpage>我的路是清晰的。” 穿上你的外套， 等你回来。“如果我们能够保护这片土地 ， 我们可以利用它一点点。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>This coastline sits at the top of Lake Flamis and there is still a canal underneath it, but you will be the first challenge of this era.<hpage>My path is clear." Put on your coat and wait for you to come back. "If we can protect this land, we can use it a little bit.

original_zh_text: 要挑战飞毛腿斯威夫特吗？
translated_text: 大师的速度。
secondary_translated_text: The speed of the master.

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay in defence of their lands!<page>I’ve narrowly avoided a few nasty ends myself. It certainly adds a thrill to my investigations...
original_zh_text: 呀！红壳怪的陷阱真阴险！<page>我好几次都差点中招。调查工作有点刺激过头了……
translated_text: 哦 ， 这是一个伟大的陷阱 ， 红色哈米保护地球！<page>我差点死了 ， 这让我对研究充满热情。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, this is a great trap, the red hami protects the earth!<page>I almost died, which made me passionate about research.

original_en_text: Well now! How brilliant! In all these fine games you have matched my scores and more!<page>What wonder to be here, and able to witness a display of such profound talent.<hpage>Besting your scores proved an immense challenge, Seth, and yet you seem to have achieved them yourself with relative ease.<page>You flatter me! But yes, my own aptitude continues to surprise me. So many skills I cannot recall learning... <page>But do not underplay your own achievements, for they too are significant, inspiring even!<page>In fact, for my deep respect I insist you take this small medallion. I found it within my belongings, and know not where I came upon it, but it has a most pleasant sense.<page>Let it serve as marker of a friendship I feel has only just begun.<hpage>Thank you, Seth. I shall keep it close.
original_zh_text: 太精彩了！所有游戏你都破了我的记录！<page>能在这见证这么惊艳的表演，真是幸运。<hpage>破你纪录可不容易，但你达成记录时却挺轻松？<page>我自己都惊讶！很多技巧根本不记得学过……<page>但你的成就更能激励我！<page>为表敬意，请收下这枚勋章。不知从哪来的，但带着令人安心。<page>就当我们友谊的信物吧。<hpage>多谢，我会珍藏。
translated_text: 我没事 ， 我没事！好吧 ， 好吧！好吧！会很棒的！在所有这些伟大的游戏中 ， 你的分数等于我的分数 ， 甚至更好！<page>很高兴看到这样的天赋。<hpage>赛斯 ， 打破计数是一个巨大的挑战 ， 但结果似乎相对简单。<page>他们会爱上我！我对自己的天赋感到惊讶 ， 但我不记得我学到了多少技术。<page>所以不要低估结果。<page>“出于尊重 ， 请你保留这枚小勋章。我在我的文章中找到了它。我不知道我在哪里找到了它 ， 但它是最好的感觉。<page>作为友谊的象征 ， 我认为这仅仅是个开始。<hpage>谢谢你 ， 塞思 ， 我会继续的。
secondary_translated_text: I'm okay, I'm okay! Okay, okay! Okay! It'll be great! In all these great games, your score equals my score, or even better!<page>It's nice to see such talent.<hpage>Seth, breaking the count is a huge challenge, but the results seem relatively simple.<page>They will fall in love with me! I was amazed at my talent, but I can't remember how much technology I learned.<page>So don't underestimate the results.<page>"Out of respect, please keep this little medal. I found it in my article. I don't know where I found it, but it's the best feeling.<page>As a symbol of friendship, I think this is just the beginning.<hpage>Thank you Seth, I will continue.

original_en_text: While we rest for the journey ahead, care to test your luck with a game of dice? You know how to play, I trust?<hpage>I’m sure I can grasp the rules quickly enough, sir. What is the wager?<page>A beat of rosaries on each roll. What say you? Sound fair? Let our worries roll away with the dice!
original_zh_text: 休息时要来玩玩骰子吗？你应该知道规则吧？<hpage>我学得快，要赌什么？<page>每次押一奏念珠。公平吧？让骰子带走烦恼！
translated_text: 为什么不休息时摇动骨头来试试运气呢 ？” 你知道如何玩吗？事实上？<hpage>我很快就会学会规则。<page>每一行都有几颗珍珠。你能听到吗？小心你的数据！
secondary_translated_text: Why not try your luck by shaking your bones during rest?" Do you know how to play? Actually?<hpage>I will soon learn the rules.<page>There are several pearls in each row. Can you hear me? Be careful with your data!

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! ‘Tis a pleasure to meet you here at the end of our long journey, sister.<page>I am Sherma, a simple pilgrim like yourself. What a wonder to find ourselves finally here, eh?<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of our brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. To have travelled this far is to have seen the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 哎呀！姐妹！走了这么远终于碰面了！<page>我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。能走到这儿太不容易了！<page>和这么多同袍登上圣堡……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？既已走到这里，想必你也看清了此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: 这是什么 ？你在干什么？哦 ， 我的上帝 ， 它在这里。“很高兴在这段漫长的旅程结束时见到你。<page>我是一个萨满 ， 一个普通的朝圣者 ， 就像你一样 ， 如果我终于到达那里 ， 你不会感到惊讶吗 ？<page>随着时间的推移 ， 我爬上了城堡 ， 成为众多兄弟姐妹中的一员。这确实是一种祝福。是的 ， 这是一种祝福。<hpage>小小的朝圣者啊 ， 把这种恐惧隐藏在信仰中。当我来到这里 ， 我看到了这个荒凉的地方的现实。你觉得呢？
secondary_translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? Oh, my God, it's here. "It's nice to see you at the end of this long journey.<page>I am a shaman, an ordinary pilgrim, just like you, wouldn't you be surprised if I finally got there?<page>Over time, I climbed the castle and became one of many brothers and sisters. This is indeed a blessing. Yes, this is a blessing.<hpage>Little pilgrim, hide this fear in your faith. When I came here, I saw the reality of this desolate place. What do you think?

original_en_text: Hoy! You again? This place used to be nice and quiet, but now we can’t get a moment’s peace!
original_zh_text: 喂！又是你？这地方本来安安静静的，现在连喘口气都难！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。你也是？它曾经是一个和平的地方 ， 但现在它不再是和平。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. You too? It used to be a peaceful place, but now it is no longer peaceful.

original_en_text: Ahh, sister! You have awoken. I hope that our powerful strikes did not leave you in too weak a condition.<page>We would even be willing to duel again, if you still have the strength!
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，姐妹，你醒啦？没打疼你吧？<page>你要还有力气想再打一轮，我们随时奉陪！
translated_text: 哦 ， 妹妹！他们醒了 ， 希望强烈的攻击不会削弱他们。<page>如果你坚强 ， 你会再次战斗。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, sister! They woke up, hoping that a strong attack would not weaken them.<page>If you are strong, you will fight again.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir Guardian... I scarcely thought we would meet again after our encounter.<page>Hm? Apologies friend, I fear I don’t recognise you. And I’m sure I would remember such a striking figure!<hpage>...Pay no heed, sir. It seems I mistook you for another.<hpage>You are... a traveller through these quaking lands, I take it?<page>I suppose I am indeed! I was born into this world not long ago, waking beside a lake with only this weapon laying beside me.<page>Seth is my name, though I know not who gave it to me.<page>The custom of the newly-born is to explore the world, is it not? So that is what I have set out to do! I will rest here a moment, then continue my journey.
original_zh_text: <hpage>守卫者先生……没想到能再见。<page>抱歉朋友，我们见过吗？像你这样的虫我肯定忘不掉。<hpage>……抱歉，是我认错了。<hpage>你是……旅行者？<page>算是吧！我刚降生不久，就在湖边，身边还有这些武器。<page>我叫赛斯，但不知谁取的名。<page>新生儿就该探索世界对吧？我休息一会儿就继续上路。
translated_text: <hpage>自从我们相遇以来 ， 我从来没有想过再见面。<page>这是什么 ？你在干什么？“对不起 ， 我不认识你。“我会记得这样一个伟大的人。"<hpage>...“我认为你和其他人一样。<hpage>你是谁？我认为你是一个旅行者 ， 在颤抖的地球上旅行。<page>我以为是他！“就在我来到这个世界之前 ， 我在湖边醒来 ， 手里拿着这把枪。<page>我不知道是谁给我的 ， 但塞思是我的名字。<page>孩子们有探索世界的习惯 ， 不是吗 ？让我们从这里开始吧！我会休息一下 ， 开始我的旅程。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Since we met, I have never thought of seeing each other again.<page>What is this? What are you doing? "I'm sorry, I don't know you. "I will remember such a great man. "<hpage>... "I think you're like everyone else.<hpage>Who are you? I think you are a traveler, traveling on the trembling earth.<page>I thought it was him! "Just before I came into this world, I woke up by the lake with this gun in my hand.<page>I don't know who gave it to me, but Seth is my name.<page>Children have a habit of exploring the world, don't they? Let's start here! I will take a break and start my journey.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! What sweet surprise for Nuu! The world rumbles and the black threads stretch. Not safe now to wander.<page>But you! You are adult yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt, no matter the darkness?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Before it all ends? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努好惊喜！世界在震颤，黑灾在蔓延。现在独自游荡可不安全。<page>但你！你是成虫对吧？完全长大了？准备好狩猎了，无惧黑暗？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？趁着一切还没有终结，收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: 陛下 ， 夫人！这对我们来说是一个巨大的惊喜！在一个黑线延伸的世界里 ， 走路是危险的。<page>但是我们做到了！他们是大人吗？总增长？“你准备好打猎了吗 ？ ”“你准备好面对黑暗了吗 ？ ”<hpage>我不是孩子 ， 当然。<page>更多在这里。你必须许一个愿望！» 为此 ， 你可以在灯塔里找到很多新鲜的昆虫 ， 并切割它们。<page>你用刀子割断了它！用一颗成熟的心摧毁它 ， 测试一颗成熟的心。<page>你需要帮助南希吗？直到最后 ？你能带一个卷轴来填写你的编辑知识页面吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Your Majesty, Madam! This was a huge surprise for us! In a world where black lines stretch, walking is dangerous.<page>But we did it! Are they adults? Total growth? "Are you ready to hunt? "Are you ready to face the darkness?”<hpage>I'm not a child, of course.<page>More here. You must make a wish!" To do this, you can find a lot of fresh insects in the lighthouse and cut them.<page>You cut it with a knife! Destroy it with a mature heart and test a mature heart.<page>Do you need help Nancy? Until the end? Can you bring a scroll to fill out your editing knowledge page?

original_en_text: ...Great strides move the world, but small steps shouldn’t be overlooked...<page>...One mystery leads to another. Scrutinising the belly of the thing will prove useful...<hpage>The meaning behind your musings is as opaque as ever. Would you converse with me directly, sir?<page>...Trust yourself. And each other. The solution is always within grasp...
original_zh_text: ……大变革撼动天地，但小细节亦不容忽视……<page>……谜题环环相扣。剖开事物本质方能解惑……<hpage>先生高论依旧晦涩，能否直言相告？<page>……信己信人。答案触手可及……
translated_text: ...你可以用一大步触动世界 ， 但你不能用一小步忽略它。<page>...一个谜团导致了另一个谜团。我建议你仔细研究一些东西的顶部。<hpage>像往常一样 ， 冥想的含义尚不清楚。<page>...如果你相信自己 ， 别人的反应总是在你的控制之下。
secondary_translated_text: ... You can touch the world with one big step, but you cannot ignore it with one small step.<page>... One mystery leads to another mystery. I suggest you study the top of something carefully.<hpage>As always, the meaning of meditation is unclear.<page>... If you believe in yourself, the reactions of others are always under your control.

original_en_text: The creatures of this wood can disguise themselves amongst the many branches. Watch for unexpected movement and be prepared to strike.
original_zh_text: 林子里虫子会伪装成树枝。注意周围动静，随时准备出手。
translated_text: 这片森林中的生物可以躲在许多树枝后面。注意意外的步骤 ， 并准备好攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Creatures in this forest can hide behind many branches. Pay attention to unexpected steps and be prepared to attack.

original_en_text: Spider dear, what a delight to have you visit! It is oh so lonely here at the bottom of the world.<hpage>I cannot share your mirth, child. Your small rebellion above now causes this kingdom’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 小蜘蛛，你来啦！真高兴，独自在这世界之底，好寂寞呢~<hpage>我可高兴不起来，孩子。你那点小小的反叛就要毁灭上方的王国了。
translated_text: “蜘蛛先生 ， 我很高兴你在这里 ， 在世界的尽头 ， 你是孤独的。<hpage>我不能和你分享你的幸福 ， 这导致了一场小小的叛乱 ， 导致了王国的崩溃。
secondary_translated_text: "Mr. Spider, I'm so glad you're here, at the end of the world, you're alone.<hpage>I couldn't share your happiness with you, which led to a minor rebellion that led to the collapse of the kingdom.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. I had a sense I would find you in these winding tunnels, filled as they are with the marks of combat.<page>Poshanka! You trust your instincts rightly. The red-shelled warriors who carved out these roads make for excellent opponents indeed.<page>I would gladly spend much time here, testing myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must keep to my task. As should you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。看到那些打斗痕迹，我就知道能在附近碰上你。<page>啵尚咔！你直觉真准。那些红壳战士真够厉害，打得痛快！<page>真想多待会儿练练手，但任务要紧。你也别耽搁！
translated_text: <hpage>早上好 ， 我相信我能找到它 ， 因为夏奇拉的斗争遗迹堆积在一条曲折的隧道里。<page>博尚卡！博尚卡！红十字会是唯一能够穿越这条路线的组织。<page>我很高兴在这里度过了这么长时间 ， 并试图与他们的剑和狡猾的陷阱作斗争 ， 但我必须继续我的使命。“你也应该是你。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, I believe I can find it because the relics of Shakira's struggle are piled up in a winding tunnel.<page>Boshanka! Boshanka! The Red Cross is the only organization that can cross this route.<page>I am happy to have spent so long here and try to fight their swords and cunning traps, but I must continue my mission. "You should be you too.

original_en_text: Hahhh... hahhh... oh, sister. What a toll it exacts on us... this endless combat! Certainly when peace finally comes, we will be in the right mind to appreciate it...<hpage>You place too much burden upon yourself, sir.<hpage>Though I share your ambition to free this land from its curse, I counsel you to rest, even if only for a short while.<page>Us, rest? While you, my dear sister, fight on so gallantly? Hahhhh... we cannot.<page>What would our old village think of us, were we to quit our charge? No, regardless of what you may believe, there’s strength enough still in these old shells!
original_zh_text: 哈……哈……噢，姐妹。这架打得骨头都快散架了……等太平了可得好好睡一觉……<hpage>别把担子全压自己身上。<hpage>我也想终结诅咒，但该休息还是得休息。<page>休息？你也还在拼命，我们哪能躺下？<page>要是半途而废，村里的大伙会怎么想！别看我们一身旧壳，里头可有劲呢！
translated_text: 喂 ， 喂 ， 喂！哈！“姐姐 ， 这对我们来说是个巨大的损失。当然 ， 当和平来临时 ， 我们会以正义的心来感恩。<hpage>你给自己带来了太多的负担。<hpage>虽然我和你一样雄心勃勃 ， 并且希望把这个国家从诅咒中解放出来 ， 但我建议你至少休息一下。<page>让我们休息一下 ， 好吗 ？他怎么能这么勇敢地战斗？哈！不 ， 不。<page>如果我们放弃攻势 ， 这个古老的村庄会怎么想 ？不管你信不信 ， 这个古老的贝壳仍然有足够的力量！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey! Ha! "Sister, this is a huge loss for us. Of course, when peace comes, we will be grateful with a righteous heart.<hpage>You have put too much burden on yourself.<hpage>Although I am as ambitious as you and want to liberate this country from its curse, I suggest you at least take a break.<page>Let's take a break, okay? How could he fight so bravely? Ha! No, no.<page>What will this ancient village think if we give up the offensive? Believe it or not, this ancient shell still has enough power!

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, I hold the means to descend. Let us meet one final time, and quell this black ruin of our making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我有办法下潜。我们再最后见一面，终结这黑暗吧。
translated_text: <hpage>我的孩子 ， 有一条路要走。让我们最后一次回来 ， 让我们沉默我们创造的黑色废墟。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>My child, there is a way to go. Let us come back one last time and silence the black ruins we have created.

original_en_text: <hpage>Learning about a land’s inhabitants is a worthwhile undertaking. Perhaps you are more grown than you realise, Nuu.<page>Ma! Such delicious praise will make Nuu shrivel! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>研究生态是好事，努努。或许你比看起来要成熟。<page>呀！这么夸人家要害羞啦！快去打猎，开始我们的研究！
translated_text: <hpage>很高兴认识这个国家的人民。你可能比你想象的更成熟。<page>妈咪！这种恭维让我心疼。打猎 ， 打猎 ， 教学。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>It's a pleasure to meet the people of this country. You may be more mature than you think.<page>Mommy! This kind of compliment makes me feel distressed. Hunting, hunting, teaching.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. What do you make of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>The scale of it all impresses me. If this is merely an outpost of the Citadel above, then their capital must be grand beyond measure.<page>Yokkala... Perhaps so. They must have prized indeed the work done here, to build something so vast in such a dangerous place.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，你怎么看这吱呀乱响的大家伙？<hpage>规模惊人。若这仅是圣堡的一处前哨，那主城的宏伟难以想象。<page>哟咔啦……或许吧。在这种险地修这么大工程，肯定费了不少劲。
translated_text: 一个孩子挥舞着一根针 ， 你觉得这个巨大的结构怎么样 ？<hpage>如果它是一个更高的前哨 ， 它的资本将大大增长。<page>洋子先生 ， 也许他很感激在危险的地方做了一些非凡的事情。
secondary_translated_text: A child wields a needle. What do you think of this huge structure?<hpage>If it were a higher outpost, its capital would grow significantly.<page>Mr. Yoko, maybe he was grateful for doing something extraordinary in a dangerous place.

translated_text: 狩猎标志
secondary_translated_text: hunting sign

original_en_text: Seek swift to calm our crying land, Hornet Wielding Needle. And know that I shall remain here, to stand against these husks gone dark.
original_zh_text: 快去平息纺络的哀嚎，使针的小姑娘。我会保护这里的虫民。
translated_text: 蜜蜂挥动着针 ， 试图快速治愈我的眼泪 ， 我想留在这里 ， 与这个黑壳战斗。
secondary_translated_text: Bees waved needles, trying to quickly heal my tears, and I wanted to stay here and fight this black shell.

original_en_text: I’ll bring the healing supplies to the settlement with all haste, red maiden.<page>Fear not on my behalf. My fellow pilgrims are all praying for me, and thereby no harm will befall me!
original_zh_text: 我这就把药送回去。<page>别担心我！大伙都在为我祈祷，不会有事的！
translated_text: “红女士 ， 请你尽快拿到治疗材料。<page>“别担心 ， 我的朝圣者正在祈祷 ， 希望我不会受到伤害。
secondary_translated_text: "Ms. Hong, please get the treatment materials as soon as possible.<page>"Don't worry, my pilgrims are praying that I won't get hurt.

original_en_text: ‘Tis now my charge to care for those who stay here, including yourself. If I can aid you in any way, please let me know!
original_zh_text: 现在我负责照顾大伙，包括你在内。有什么需要尽管说！
translated_text: “我的工作是照顾住在这里的人 ， 包括你。“如果有什么我可以帮忙的 ， 让我知道！" "
secondary_translated_text: "My job is to take care of the people who live here, including you. "If there is anything I can help, let me know! " "

original_en_text: Oh, what a shock! Discovered again so easily! Like a hapless little hatchling!<page>If you’re going to make a sport of tracking me, I’ll have to redouble my efforts at camouflage!
original_zh_text: 吓我一跳！又被发现了！跟刚破壳的小虫似的！<page>你要是想拿我当猎物练手，我可要升级伪装术了！
translated_text: 哦 ， 天哪 ， 这是一个震惊！您可以轻松地重新开始！他看起来像个不幸的孩子。<page>如果你想把我看作是一项运动 ， 我必须做更多的事情来隐藏它。"
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God, this is a shock! You can easily start over! He looks like an unfortunate child.<page>If you want to see me as a sport, I have to do more to hide it. "

original_en_text: The jagged crest looming over all of Pharloom. Its whipping winds and bitter cold would pierce the strongest shell.
original_zh_text: 俯瞰纺络的尖峰，寒风能刺穿最坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: 落基山脉覆盖了整个法罗群岛 ， 强风和极端寒冷渗透到最强的盆地。
secondary_translated_text: The Rocky Mountains cover the entire Faroe Islands, with strong winds and extreme cold penetrating the strongest basins.

original_en_text: Ahh, the shining bench has risen for us! Pharloom’s kindness to we pilgrims is inexhaustible!<page>Please rest, red maiden, and fear not. Our kingdom watches over us all!
original_zh_text: 看！圣椅为我们升起了！纺络永远眷顾朝圣者！<page>安心歇息吧，王国在庇护我们呢！
translated_text: 给我们一盏光！我们不是一个无辜的法老。<page>“安息吧 ， 红姑娘 ， 不要害怕 ， 我们的王国会保护我们所有人。
secondary_translated_text: Give us a light! We are not an innocent pharaoh.<page>"Rest in peace, Red Girl, don't be afraid, our kingdom will protect us all.

original_en_text: Join your voice with mine, red maiden! You, me, and my lucky chime will sing together until the great gate opens!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，快加入合唱！你我加上幸运铃铛，肯定能用歌声叩开大门！
translated_text: 加入我的声音 ， 红姑娘！你和我 ， 还有我快乐的仆人 ， 我们将一起唱歌 ， 直到大门打开。
secondary_translated_text: Join my voice, red girl! You and I, and my happy servant, we will sing together until the door opens.

original_en_text: Hrm? Hoy there! I was looking for somewhere to rest my weary shell and found this cosy station!<hpage>These lands are dangerous. I had thought perhaps some harm had come to you.<page>Harm? O red maiden, have faith! No harm can come to us on this holy ascent! We only need to keep our gaze upwards.<page>Isn’t this all so terribly grand? The great stone steps, the winds lifting us up like the voices of a choir, and just beyond it all is our pilgrimage’s end. The great Citadel at last!
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！我正在找地方歇脚，这驿站多舒适啊！<hpage>此处很凶险，我担心你遭遇不测。<page>不测？要对圣途有信心！只要仰望圣堡，灾祸自会远离！<page>这景象多壮丽啊！巨大石阶，乘着风声，宛如圣歌，终点就在眼前了！
translated_text: 这是什么 ？你在干什么？早上好， 我正在寻找一个地方来休息我疲惫的身体， 我发现这个舒适的度假村！<hpage>土地是危险的 ， 可能会受伤。"<page>你指责我吗？“我的红色孩子 ， 相信我。“在这个神圣的扬升中 ， 我们什么都不做！小心 ， 朋友。<page>它太大了吗 ？我们的朝圣之旅结束了 ， 我们穿过一个巨大的石阶 ， 像风中的钟声一样把我们举起来。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? Good morning, I was looking for a place to rest my tired body and I found this comfortable resort!<hpage>Land is dangerous and can be injured. "<page>Are you accusing me? "My red boy, trust me. "In this sacred Ascension, we do nothing! Be careful, friend.<page>Is it too big? Our pilgrimage was over and we passed through a huge stone step that lifted us up like a bell in the wind.

translated_text: <hpage>一个小小的朝圣者？你睡着了吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>A little pilgrim? Are you asleep?

original_en_text: She and her like have red-rocky shells to protect their softnesses. Inside is very sweet! Very hard to crack them open though, so is best to wait. Is always best to wait!
original_zh_text: 它们用红岩壳保护内部的软肉。里面超甜！但壳太难撬，最好等自然腐烂！
translated_text: 她和她的同伴有一个红色的岩石外壳来保护他们的甜蜜。里面很甜。但是 ， 最好等待 ， 因为它很难打破。
secondary_translated_text: She and her companions have a red rock shell to protect their sweetness. It's very sweet inside. But, it's better to wait because it's hard to break.

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly, Shakra. Upon this stone, let us test our shells.
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。就在此石台上一较高下吧。
translated_text: <hpage>夏奇拉 ， 我为你感到高兴。有了这块石头 ， 我们将尝试使用贝壳。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakira, I'm happy for you. With this stone, we will try to use shells.

original_en_text: Well met, sister. Though the beastly Citadel has finally been slain, still the lands caught beneath it suffer!<page>The evils long done by that cursed place have sunk into the kingdom’s very foundations, and now they rise up as a black sickness.<hpage>This darkness, it is a curse deadlier than the Haunting... a force from far below that will consume all if given the opportunity.<page>Hmm... Just so! And while wickedness still stalks these lands, our hornlance shall not rest!
original_zh_text: 又见面了，姐妹。圣堡祸根虽除，但下面的土地还在遭罪！<page>诅咒早已根植在纺络的各处，现在化作黑暗冒了出来。<hpage>这黑暗远比丝咒致命……来自最深的邪恶，一有机会就会吞噬一切。<page>哼……果然！只要邪恶还没除净，我们的长枪就放不下！
translated_text: 野兽的城堡倒塌了 ， 但地球仍在遭受痛苦。<page>这片被诅咒的土地的邪恶 ， 早已被埋葬在王国的根源中 ， 像黑色的疾病一样蔓延。<hpage>这种黑暗是一种比幽灵更致命的诅咒 ， 一种来自下面的力量 ， 当机会出现时 ， 它会包围一切。<page>是的 ， 是的 ， 是的 ... ...哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！我们的邪恶永远不会停止 ， 直到它覆盖了地球。
secondary_translated_text: The beast's castle has fallen, but the earth is still suffering.<page>The evil of this cursed land has long been buried in the roots of the kingdom, spreading like a black disease.<hpage>This darkness is a curse more deadly than ghosts, a power from below that surrounds everything when opportunity arises.<page>Yes, yes, yes... ... Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Our evil will never stop until it covers the earth.

original_en_text: Sturdy gaaaaa-aaate, I don’t ask you break or beee-eeend,<br>Just open a little for me, and my tall maiden frieeee-eeend!
original_zh_text: 骨门呀骨门，不求你折断，<br>只要开条缝让咱过，我和高个姑娘谢你恩典！
translated_text: 我不打你 ， 我不打你。<br>为我和我伟大的处女朋友打开它！
secondary_translated_text: I won't hit you, I won't hit you.<br>Open it for me and my great virgin friend!

original_en_text: These waters, at land’s edge... and the shrine atop... our furtive escape... our brief retreat from rule...<page>So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 这片水岸……我们暂时远离王权的休憩……<page>那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: 这些水是地球的尽头 ， 他们有祭司。我们走得更远了 ， 超越了规则。<page>它们往往很简单 ： 自由和快乐。
secondary_translated_text: These waters are the end of the earth, and they have priests. We have gone further and exceeded the rules.<page>They are often simple: freedom and happiness.

original_en_text: What say you, sister? Shall we join together in valiant combat?
translated_text: 我说了什么， 姐姐？我们应该勇敢地战斗吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: What did I say, sister? Should we fight bravely?

original_en_text: Oh red maiden, sorry to have lured you into such danger!<page>And those poor bugs, bewitched by the thread. No sin could possibly warrant such a fate...<hpage>Your pity is not misplaced, but better suited for another time. For now, you should look to your own care.<page>Ah... yes. I should get these healing supplies back to the pilgrims’ settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，对不起把你卷进来！<page>那些被丝线控制的同伴……他们犯了什么错……<hpage>有怜悯之心固然好，但要先顾好自己。<page>对……我得把药送回聚落。他们等太久了。
translated_text: ” 红女士， 我很抱歉， 让你处于危险之中。<page>犯下罪行的人没有这样的命运。<hpage>她的同情心不坏 ， 但下次会更好。现在他必须照顾好自己。<page>是的 ， 对。是的 ， 治疗材料必须返还给上述朝圣中心。我的兄弟姐妹们已经等了很久。
secondary_translated_text: "Miss Hong, I'm sorry to put you in danger.<page>There is no such fate for those who commit crimes.<hpage>Her compassion is not bad, but it will be better next time. Now he must take care of himself.<page>Yes, right. Yes, treatment materials must be returned to the above-mentioned pilgrimage center. My brothers and sisters have been waiting for a long time.

original_en_text: <hpage>The parasite writhing within my shell has a violent aversion to the void. <hpage>Despite the protection granted by the Everbloom, even now I can feel those wretched roots preventing my descent.<hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我壳里的寄生物极度抗拒虚空。<hpage>虽然有永绽花保护，但那些根须还是在阻止我下潜。<hpage>要斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>寄生虫在贝壳上行走 ， 讨厌清理它们。<hpage>尽管有永恒的色彩的保护 ， 我仍然感觉到我贫穷的根源 ， 拯救我免于衰落。"<hpage>如果我想跳过并将地球从黑暗的诅咒中分离出来 ， 我必须首先找到一种方法来追逐入侵者。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The parasites walk on shells and hate cleaning them up.<hpage>Despite the protection of eternal color, I still felt the root cause of my poverty, saving me from decline. "<hpage>If I wanted to skip and separate the earth from the curse of darkness, I had to first find a way to chase the invaders.

original_en_text: Many foes await us. Shall we duel with one another before moving on?
original_zh_text: 前方有不少恶战等着，先来场热身赛？
translated_text: 有许多敌人在等待着我们 ， 但我们必须战斗并继续前进吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: There are many enemies waiting for us, but must we fight and move on?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Nuu. You have travelled far from your lodgings, I was not expecting to meet you in these lowlands.<page>Oh, hello again miss grown-up! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she goes great distances to follow the scent of learnings.<page>And look what Nuu has found! A great big beast, cracked open and broken apart! There is much to learn from him, so Nuu will savour it all slowly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，努努。你跑得真远，没想到在低地遇见你。<page>大姐姐！努努虽然腿短，但跟着知识气味能走超远！<page>看努努发现了什么！这个被肢解的大家伙！慢慢研究肯定能学到好多！
translated_text: <hpage>你没想到会在这个低洼的地方相遇 ， 远离你住的地方。<page>- 是的 ， 威尔不是最快的 ， 但在呼吸学习方面还有很长的路要走。<page>他有很多东西要学习 ， 所以 Nu 会慢慢品尝。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You didn't expect to meet in this low-lying place, far away from where you live.<page>- Yes, Will is not the fastest, but there is still a long way to go in breathing learning.<page>He has a lot to learn, so Nu will taste it slowly.

original_en_text: With this quill, you can add any new areas you discover to the maps that you own. We pluck these quills from Golpeni hunted by my tribe. Their hollowed shafts make the perfect charting tool.
original_zh_text: 用这羽毛笔能把新发现的区域补到地图上。羽毛是从我们部落猎的高尔佩尼鸟身上拔的，中空的羽管最适合拿来绘图。
translated_text: 此笔可用于在地图上添加新区域 ， 并发现它所属的区域。我从赫尔的恐慌中拿起了这支笔 ， 我的部落正在追捕。电缆是一种很好的绘画工具。
secondary_translated_text: This pen can be used to add a new area to the map and discover which area it belongs to. I picked up this pen from Hull's panic, and my tribe was pursuing it. Cable is a good painting tool.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, how far our wanderings take us! The cold air here bites through our shells as true as any blade. Warm yourself by my lantern while I call. <hpage>Pharloom is a land of harsh extremes. Perhaps that is, in part, why the pilgrims have a culture of testing themselves against it so fervently.<page>Perhaps. When I first encountered them, I had little respect for the weak, rag-bundled bugs. Too cowardly to even carry a weapon!<page>But... Dondakku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. There is a subtle strength to them, though it is difficult for me to truly understand it.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，咱们跑得真远！这里寒气刺骨，来灯笼边暖暖。<hpage>纺络环境真是极端，或许这也是朝圣者们测试信仰的一部分。<page>也许吧。当初觉得他们是群软蛋，连武器都不敢带！<page>但……咚嗒库！也算是我看走眼吧，他们有种我说不清的韧劲。
translated_text: 孩子们带来了针头 ， 我们的流浪带我们回来了！冷空气穿过我们的洗手间。当我打电话时 ， 他们用灯取暖我。<hpage>法罗群岛是一个残酷的国家 ， 这可能是朝圣者如此渴望体验这种文化的原因之一。<page>当我第一次看到它时 ， 我可能不喜欢这些脆弱的爬行动物。<page>更多 ... ...有时他们判断得太快 ， 并且拥有微妙的力量 ， 但很难理解。
secondary_translated_text: The children brought needles, and our vagrants brought us back! Cold air flows through our bathroom. When I was on the phone, they warmed me with lights.<hpage>The Faroe Islands are a cruel country, which may be one reason why pilgrims are so eager to experience this culture.<page>When I first saw it, I probably didn't like these fragile reptiles.<page>more... ... Sometimes they judge too quickly and have subtle powers that are difficult to understand.

original_en_text: Ahh, the caress of this warm water on my weary limbs is welcome indeed. As soothing as a psalm, haha!<page>Will you splishy-splash in the holy bath with me, red maiden? We can sing together to aid in our rejuvenation!
original_zh_text: 泡着热水澡真舒服！比唱圣歌还解乏，哈哈！<page>要和我一起泡吗？边泡边唱歌更解乏！
translated_text: 热水抚摸着我疲惫的手臂。他们非常受欢迎。休息就像诗歌。"<page>红色的女孩， 不是吗？你愿意和我一起洗个神圣的澡吗 ？让我们一起唱歌 ， 帮助你康复！" "
secondary_translated_text: Hot water caressed my tired arm. They are very popular. Rest is like poetry. "<page>Red girl, right? Would you like to take a sacred bath with me? Let us sing together to help you recover! " "

original_en_text: Want yer clicky-clackies threaded nice and tight? Old Grindle will do it gladly, if you let ‘im snitch a few for hisself...
original_zh_text: 要把叮当响串稳当？格林德尔来帮你！抽点佣金就行！
translated_text: 你想让你的关系更好、更持久吗 ？如果他没有直接向老格林代尔汇报 ， 他会很高兴的。
secondary_translated_text: Do you want your relationship to be better and more lasting? He would have been happy if he hadn't reported directly to Old Greendale.

original_en_text: D-do not judge me a doubter! The Citadel is a holy place indeed, resplendent and vast beyond my wildest hopes!<page>But yet... the grand halls ache with silence, and I see suffering in the shadows wherever I peer too deeply.<page>Fear, and pain... why were these things allowed into our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not yet earned their holy reward?
original_zh_text: 别当我是叛信者！圣堡确实是圣地，比我想的还壮观！<page>可是……大殿里死气沉沉，角落里到处都藏着苦痛。<page>恐惧啊伤痛啊……为什么让这些脏东西进圣地？我们还不够虔诚吗？
translated_text: 请不要以为我是个怀疑论者。这座城堡真的是一个神圣的地方 ， 宏伟而广阔 ， 超出了我最狂野的希望！<page>更多 ... ...大客厅一片寂静 ， 虽然他看着远处 ， 但他可以看到阴影中的痛苦。<page>恐惧与悲伤？为什么我们被允许进入天堂 ？我的弟兄姊妹没有得到神的赏赐吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Please don't think I'm a skeptic. This castle is truly a sacred place, majestic and vast, beyond my wildest hopes!<page>more... ... The large living room was silent. Although he looked into the distance, he could see the pain in the shadows.<page>Fear and sadness? Why are we allowed to enter heaven? Have my brothers and sisters not received God's reward?

original_en_text: ...Crossed weapons, sleeping of course, but shaped unlike any you’ve seen before...<page>...To travel underneath is one thing, but travelling up above may require a different sort of sight...<hpage>Sir Herald... It seems rare coincidence for us to meet in this distant land. Unless, perhaps, you followed me here?<page>...A path that meets itself is an ill portent indeed. Those who peer sideways know well enough...<page>
original_zh_text: ……崇山深谷，却非你所熟知的形态……<page>……穿行地底是一回事，但翱翔天际需另种眼界……<hpage>使者大人……在这偏远之地重逢，是巧合还是您尾随而来？<page>……道途相逢并非吉兆。小家伙还是别多嘴了……
translated_text: ...显然 ， 跨界车是为睡眠而设计的 ， 但它并不是它看起来的那样。<page>...发生的事是一回事 ， 发生的事是另一回事。<hpage>在一个遥远的国家相遇 ， 似乎是一个奇怪的巧合除非你跟着我。<page>...你的道路是个不好的迹象。周围看到我的人都知道。<page>
secondary_translated_text: ... Obviously, the crossover is designed for sleep, but it's not what it seems.<page>... What happens is one thing, what happens is another.<hpage>Meeting in a distant country seems like a strange coincidence unless you follow me.<page>... Your path is a bad sign. Everyone around me who saw me.<page>

original_en_text: Nice little pair of rolly-rollies we got ‘ere. Sure to bring luck to any snitchin’ expedition...
translated_text: 有一个有趣的小预告片 ， 为原告的冒险带来好运。
secondary_translated_text: There is an interesting little trailer that brings good luck to the plaintiff's adventure.

original_en_text: ...The elements do not conspire against you. They have their own desires...<page>...When one spies a great peak, the natural inclination is to begin climbing...<page>...The little left-behind... you’ve decided, then? A companion for the journey...
original_zh_text: ……万物并非与你为敌，它们自有渴求……<page>……望见高峰，攀爬便是本能……<page>……那个被遗弃的小家伙……你决定带他同行了？……
translated_text: ...这不是对你的阴谋。<page>...当一个人遇到一座山时 ， 自然的倾向是开始攀登。<page>...¿那么 ， 你做出了什么决定 ？旅游公司 （Tourist Company）
secondary_translated_text: ... This is not a conspiracy against you.<page>... When one encounters a mountain, the natural tendency is to start climbing it.<page>...¿So, what decision did you make? Tourist Company

original_en_text: <hpage>Feel guilt at your absence, sir, but know the end was inexorable, the outcome set, whether you remained or not.<page>Do not seek to console me, warrior... This memory is mine alone... I’ll not brook your brutish intrusion...<page>You who dare trespass this sacred chamber, ready yourself... to see us, and know us, Verdania’s rulers, together in our finest form...
original_zh_text: <hpage>无需为自己的缺席感到愧疚，结局早已注定，无关你的去留。<page>少来安慰我……战士……这是我的回忆……容不得莽夫插嘴……<page>擅闯圣殿者……准备见证翠庭国双王的最强形态吧！
translated_text: <hpage>我为你的缺席感到内疚。但如果没有 ， 后果是不可避免的 ， 甚至是致命的。<page>” 别安慰我， 士兵。“这些记忆是我的 ， 我无法忍受你的野蛮攻击。<page>准备好 ， 准备好进入这个神圣的房间。你看着我们 ， 你认识我们。“维尔达尼亚的领导人将以最好的形式与我们在一起。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I feel guilty for your absence. But if not, the consequences are inevitable and even fatal.<page>"Don't comfort me, soldier. "These memories are mine, and I can't stand your barbaric attacks.<page>Get ready, get ready to enter this sacred room. You look at us, you know us. "Verdanha's leaders will be with us in the best possible form.

original_en_text: If you choose to rest here, I will watch over you, Child Wielding Needle. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is far off yet.
original_zh_text: 想休息的话，我给你放哨。我暂时不睡，还得多琢磨琢磨图纸。
translated_text: 如果你决定在这里放松 ， 我会照顾你。这些画作需要很长时间的照顾 ， 我的梦想仍然很遥远。
secondary_translated_text: If you decide to relax here, I will take care of you. These paintings require a long time to take care of, and my dream is still far away.

original_en_text: Beasty, beastly, big fat beast! Strong as a boulder, or a rock at least! Let’s sing together ‘til you’re released!<page>Oh! Look here red maiden, this poor creature is all tangled up in white bindings! Surely you know a song for unsticking such stickiness?<hpage>It will take a power greater than song to break these bindings, little one. In my current diminished state even I can not cut through them.<page>Well, worry not! If something is needed, the road will bring it to us!
original_zh_text: 大块头啊大块头，壮如磐石力无穷！与我合唱放你走！<page>红衣姑娘快看！这可怜家伙被白丝缠住了！你会解缚之歌吗？<hpage>这束缚并非歌唱能解。凭我现在的气力，也斩不断这些丝线。<page>不必担心！所需之物肯定就在圣途之上！
translated_text: 野兽 ， 野兽 ， 野兽！坚强如石头 ， 或至少坚强如石头 ， 我们将一起歌唱 ， 直到我们自由。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！看 ， 红姑娘 ， 这个可怜的小家伙被一根白线绑住了。<hpage>打破这种束缚需要比歌曲更大的力量 ， 因为我的软弱无法打破它。<page>好吧 ， 别担心！如果你需要什么 ， 道路会给你。
secondary_translated_text: Beast, beast, beast! Strong as a stone, or at least strong as a stone, we will sing together until we are free.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Look, Miss Hong, this poor little thing is tied up by a white line.<hpage>Breaking this bondage requires greater power than a song, because my weakness cannot break it.<page>Okay, don't worry! If you need anything, the path will give you.

translated_text: 手表就在你的手中。
secondary_translated_text: The watch is in your hand.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You abandoned the race? Surely it was only an error?<page>In the pursuit of speed all reason can ofttimes be lost, left in the wind as it were.<page>At least you seem recovered of your lapse. And surely you are eager now?<page>We must sprint on! Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛？肯定是失误了对吧？<page>专注追求速度经常会忘记思考。<page>看来你已经调整好了，继续吧？<page>让我们一起继续冲刺！
translated_text: 这是个明智的错误！你放弃了游戏吗 ？这只是一个错误 ， 不是吗 ？“<page>在寻求速度的过程中 ， 整个心灵往往会消失 ， 就像被风吹走一样。<page>至少他从错误中恢复过来了。<page>我们要冲刺 ， 走吧！
secondary_translated_text: This was a wise mistake! Have you given up the game? It was just a mistake, wasn't it?“<page>In the process of seeking speed, the entire mind often disappears, as if it is blown away by the wind.<page>At least he recovered from his mistake.<page>We're going to sprint, let's go!

translated_text: 销售汽油。
secondary_translated_text: Selling gasoline.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. These are stale roads, ill-fitted for warriors such as ourselves.<page>There is fair combat here against the roach-beasts and their keepers, but the air is sickly and the water writhes with parasites.<hpage>This environment is harsh indeed, though life seems to adapt itself to many hardships. Do you believe your master travelled these roads?<page>I had thought not at first, but upon closer search I found the fragments of a trail winding through these fetid ruins.<page>Perhaps she saw something here that I did not? Her senses are often keen where mine are clouded.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘。这路太安稳了，配不上咱们战士。<page>打打蟑螂和饲者还行，但空气污浊，水里全是寄生虫。<hpage>环境糟糕，但生命总能适应。你觉得你的导师来过这儿？<page>本来觉得不会，结果在废墟里找到了些许踪迹。<page>难道她发现了什么我没注意到的东西？她的眼光总是比我毒辣。
