translated_text: 这条路很旧 ， 不适合像我们这样的士兵。<page>蟑螂和它的守护者之间的战斗是正确的 ， 但空气是痛苦的 ， 水里充满了寄生虫。<hpage>虽然环境非常艰难 ， 但生活似乎已经适应了许多挑战。你认为你已经走上了这条路吗？<page>起初我不相信 ， 但当我仔细观察时 ， 我发现废墟的气味中有一条曲折的路径。<page>如果我的感情是盲目的 ， 你的往往是尖锐的。
secondary_translated_text: The road is old and not suitable for soldiers like us.<page>The battle between the cockroach and its keeper is right, but the air is painful and the water is full of parasites.<hpage>Although the environment is very difficult, life seems to have adapted to many challenges. Do you think you have embarked on this path?<page>I didn't believe it at first, but when I looked closely, I noticed a winding path in the smell of the ruins.<page>If my feelings are blind, yours are often sharp.

original_en_text: Hold there, sister! A great beast stalks this land, swooping and screeching like an ill-mannered tyrant!<page>Zaza has been following the creature’s scent, and now I’m sure we’re almost upon it! We’re so close my whiskers are bristling!<page>Such a beast is worthy quarry for the valiant, aye? What say you, shall we hunt the creature together?
original_zh_text: 姐妹留步！附近藏着一只大家伙，俯冲尖啸，不好对付！<page>扎扎一路闻着它的味道呢，肯定就在附近！我的胡子都翘起来了！<page>那是个难得的好对手。怎么说，要不要联手干掉它？
translated_text: 巨大的野兽跳到地上 ， 像一个尖叫的暴君一样摔倒了！<page>扎扎一直在追逐那个生物的气味 ， 但很快就会消失。当我们走近时 ， 我剪掉了胡子。<page>这么野蛮的野兽难道不值得一个勇敢的人去死吗 ？嗯 ， 对吧 ？你觉得这些动物怎么样 ？
secondary_translated_text: The huge beast jumped to the ground and fell like a screaming tyrant!<page>Zaza had been chasing the creature's scent, but it would soon disappear. As we approached, I cut off my beard.<page>Isn't such a savage beast worth dying for a brave man? Yeah, right? What do you think of these animals?

original_en_text: Many of Pharloom’s bugs have useful equipment and items to trade. It would do you well to keep track of their locations with this pin.<br><br>These pins will mark vendors on your map.
original_zh_text: 达罗穆有很多虫带着好货，最好记下他们的位置。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记商贩位置。
translated_text: 许多 Faloma 昆虫都有有用的设备和物品。在虹膜的帮助下监测情况是一件好事。<br><br>酒吧代表地图上的卖家。
secondary_translated_text: Many Faloma insects have useful equipment and items. Monitoring the situation with the help of the iris is a good thing.<br><br>Bars represent sellers on the map.

original_en_text: Basic tool’o the job, here. Throw your big needle and scratch shinies straight off your target’s shell!
original_zh_text: 干我们这行的基础道具，直接从目标身上把宝贝钩下来！
translated_text: 用大针直接从镜子外壳中捕捉光线！
secondary_translated_text: Use a large needle to capture light directly from the mirror housing!

translated_text: 莫斯地图
secondary_translated_text: Moss Map

original_en_text: ...Oh. Wyrm child. No surprise it’s you who meets me here.<page>Following me are you? Or calling me? It is true I would not have sought the lands below if not for your grand actions within them.<page>But now, having journeyed their breadth, what singular sights I beheld... Flaming lakes, tangled woods, caves consumed by sand and frost...<page>Remarkable things all, though given their void claimed state it seems you and I may be the last to hold those memories.<hpage>I cannot allow that outcome, Herald. I act now to save that place, both for myself and for those bugs still alive within.<hpage>As one who has seen so much, tell me simply, do you believe my efforts in vain?<page>Me? Certainly you can ask, but I cannot provide good answer. I’ve no mind for outcomes. Always my vision is too clouded by the present.<page>Only the journey... the now. For myself, that is the purpose, and as far as my sight can see.<page>If any other could come to understand that state, Wyrm child, I suspect it may be you... <page>Though maybe not yet, not this present, hmmm? Maybe in a future far, when your actions might hail me so again?<page>Alas, from these quaking caves it is past time I made my swift exit. Ours each may be long and winding roads, but I hope you too come to know the many joys upon the path...
original_zh_text: ……哦。沃姆后裔。在此相遇倒也不意外。<page>尾随还是召唤？若非你在地底闹出大动静，我本不会来此。<page>如今游历四方，得见何等奇景……熔岩湖、缠藤林、冰封沙穴……<page>叹为观止，然虚空侵蚀之下，唯你我留存此间记忆。<hpage>我无法坐视，使者大人。此刻行动既为自救，也为庇佑残存生灵。<hpage>作为见证者，请您直言相告，我等努力是否为徒劳？<page>问我？答不上来。未来迷雾重重，我目光唯见当下。<page>唯有旅程……此时此刻。于我而言，此即意义，也即我目之能视。<page>沃姆之女，或许唯你能懂此心境……<page>也许尚非此时？待你功成之日再唤我来？<page>唉，该离开这震颤洞穴。前路漫漫，愿你亦能领略沿途风光……
translated_text: ...¡哦 ， 魔鬼！我在这里也不感到惊讶。<page>你愿意跟我来吗？还是你在打电话给我 ？如果不是因为你在地球上的奇迹 ， 我永远找不到那片土地。<page>但是现在 ， 当我走过这个广阔的世界时 ， 我看到了一些奇怪的景观 ： 温暖的湖泊 ， 交织的森林 ， 被沙子和冰包围的洞穴。<page>尽管有所有这些令人惊讶的事情 ， 尽管你声称自己处于空虚状态 ， 但你和我是最后一个拥有这种记忆的人。<hpage>我试图挽救这个地方。这对我来说 ， 也对生活在那里的昆虫来说。<hpage>你觉得我作为一个熟人的努力是徒劳的吗 ？<page>你在干什么？你可以问一个问题 ， 但你不能给出一个好的答案。无论结果如何 ， 我的观点总是错误的。<page>据我所知 ， 一次旅行 ， 这就是我的目标。<page>维龙的儿子 ， 如果有人了解情况 ， 我想就是你。<page>这可能不是真的 ， 但这不是礼物。事实上？在遥远的将来 ， 他的行为将再次受到我的尊重。"<page>是时候穿越这个可怕的洞穴了。这可能是漫长和曲折的 ， 但享受它。
secondary_translated_text: ...¡Oh, devil! I'm not surprised here.<page>Would you like to come with me? Or are you calling me? If it weren't for your miracle on earth, I would never have found that land.<page>But now, as I walk through the vast world, I see some strange landscapes: warm lakes, intertwined forests, caves surrounded by sand and ice.<page>Despite all these surprises, despite your claims to be in a state of emptiness, you and I are the last people to have this memory.<hpage>I tried to save this place. This is for me and for the insects that live there.<hpage>Do you think my efforts as an acquaintance are in vain?<page>What are you doing? You can ask a question, but you can't give a good answer. No matter what the outcome is, my opinion is always wrong.<page>As far as I know, one trip, that's my goal.<page>Veron's son, if anyone knows the situation, I think it's you.<page>This may not be true, but it is not a gift. Actually? In the distant future, his actions will once again be respected by me. "<page>It's time to travel through this terrible cave. It may be long and tortuous, but enjoy it.

original_en_text: You would fight alone, sister? You would be undefeatable with me by your side! And Zaza also! You need only ask, and our hornlance would be yours.
original_zh_text: 你想单打独斗？有我和扎扎助阵肯定能百战百胜！需要帮忙就开口，我们的长枪自会跟上！
translated_text: 姐姐 ， 你一个人吗 ？“如果我和你在一起 ， 你会是不可战胜的。我们的仇恨是你的 ， 我们的仇恨是你的 ， 我们的仇恨是你的。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, are you alone? "If I were with you, you would be invincible. Our hatred is yours, our hatred is yours, our hatred is yours.

original_en_text: ...Do they realise it would only be the beginning? If they cleave themselves free, they would need to find their way anew...
original_zh_text: ……他们可知这只是开端？即使能得解脱，众生仍需寻觅新途……
translated_text: ...¿你知道这只是个开始吗？当我们摆脱奴隶制时 ， 我们必须找到回去的路。
secondary_translated_text: ...¿Do you know this is just the beginning? When we get rid of slavery, we must find a way back.

original_en_text: My hopes go with you, red maiden. They will follow you into the deepest darkness, and beyond!
original_zh_text: 我的希望与您同在，红衣姑娘。它将随您深入至暗，直至彼岸！
translated_text: ” 我的希望与你， 红色的小姐。他们会跟着你走到黑暗的深处。
secondary_translated_text: "My hope is with you, Miss Red. They will follow you into the depths of darkness.

original_en_text: Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪占满荒野洞穴，它们是个好对手。这里的生物也比髓骨地更凶残。
translated_text: 较轻的贝壳在大洞穴中筑巢。我们与他们的斗争是激烈的。法老的军队给人留下了深刻的印象。
secondary_translated_text: Lighter shells nest in large caves. Our struggle with them is fierce. The pharaoh's army was impressive.

translated_text: 深坞站 （ Deep Dock ）
secondary_translated_text: Deep Dock Station

original_en_text: <hpage>Even if only your shadow remains, to release your mother’s grip my blade would see it slain.<page>Then why hold, even this moment? Surely terror hasn’t suddenly claimed your hardened heart?<page>Take the final plunge, spider. Join us in my drowning palace, and let oblivion swallow us all.<hpage>Oblivion may take you, child. My own life, I shall not sacrifice.<hpage>I have survived the fury of your land. I have borne its barbs and its blades, and I have seen wonder behind its dangers.<hpage>But always, child, I remain a daughter of Hallownest. And the void below all things, that darkness I will fear no longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>就算你只剩一道暗影，我也会斩断你母亲的丝线。<page>那还犹豫什么？难道你害怕了？<page>跳下来啊，小蜘蛛！和我一同沉溺，让虚无吞噬我们！<hpage>虚无或许能吞噬你，但我绝不献祭自己。<hpage>我熬过了纺络的无数荆棘，也在危机中见证过奇迹。<hpage>但我永远是圣巢之女。对万物之底的虚空……再无畏惧！
translated_text: <hpage>如果阴影还在 ， 我的剑将杀死她 ， 释放我母亲的奴役。<page>现在为什么要坚持？恐惧能突然摆脱一颗冰冷的心吗 ？<page>愿你与我同在 ， 在我沉没的宫殿中 ， 被遗忘。<hpage>“我的孩子 ， 即使你忘记了我的生命 ， 我也不会死。" "<hpage>我忍受了你人民的愤怒 ， 我忍受了荆棘和刀剑 ， 我看到了他们危险背后的奇迹。<hpage>“我的孩子 ， 我将永远是肯尼斯的女儿。在这片空虚中 ， 我不再害怕黑暗。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If the shadow still exists, my sword will kill her and release my mother from slavery.<page>Why insist now? Can fear suddenly get rid of a cold heart?<page>May you be with me, forgotten in my sunken palace.<hpage>"My child, even if you forget my life, I will not die. " "<hpage>I have endured the anger of your people, I have endured thorns and swords, I have seen the miracle behind their dangers.<hpage>"My child, I will always be Kenneth's daughter. In this emptiness, I am no longer afraid of the darkness.

original_en_text: Oooh! Greedy are you? Mean to poor li’l snitchbugs like us? Won’t survive out there without our secrets, oh no no!
original_zh_text: 小气鬼！欺负老实虫？没我们的秘密帮衬你在外头活不过三天！
translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！你是你的老师吗？对于像我这样的记者来说 ， 这是一个坏事吗 ？我不能没有秘密生活。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Are you your teacher? Is this a bad thing for reporters like me? I can't live without secrets.

original_en_text: Our last race was grand, yes? But I see now I set too mild a challenge for one as spritely as yourself!<page>I prepared only to race, but you arrived bringing destiny! In you my wish may finally be granted, the barriers of speed broken wide!<page>Are you prepared nimble bug? The time is upon us. The final test for the swift and spry!
original_zh_text: 上回比赛还不错吧？但我还是低估你了！<page>原本只想跑个痛快，但你说不定能实现我突破速度极限的愿望！<page>灵巧的虫子，时候到了！准备好突破速度的桎梏了吗？
translated_text: 这个游戏真的很酷 ， 不是吗 ？不是这样的 ， 是吗 ？然而 ， 我发现你对像你这样充满活力的人提出的挑战太温和了。<page>我正在为比赛做准备 ， 但命运给了我！在你里面 ， 我的愿望实现了 ， 速度之墙被打破了。<page>你准备好了吗？期末考试的时刻到了。
secondary_translated_text: This game is really cool, isn't it? That's not how it works, is it? However, I find the challenge you pose to people as dynamic as you are too gentle.<page>I was preparing for the game, but fate gave it to me! In you, my wish has been realized, and the wall of speed has been broken.<page>Are you ready? It's time for the final exam.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up has hunted much, so soon is time for Nuu to venture out, she thinks. Keep your sights keen, for to meet in the wilds would be a delight!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐这么能干，努努也该出门探险了！期待在荒野偶遇哦！
translated_text: 据他介绍 ， 是时候开始冒险了 ， 因为成年人和年轻女性都已经在进行一场大狩猎。当你睁开眼睛 ， 你会很高兴在自然中找到它！
secondary_translated_text: According to him, it's time to take the risk, as adults and young women are already on a big hunt. When you open your eyes, you will be happy to find it in nature!

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>Are you too a prisoner here, small bug? If we ally our efforts, escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! Just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你也被关起来了？我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！它们似乎有点不相容。<hpage>” 巴格， 你知道吗？“你是个囚犯吗 ？ ”它们使得他们的逃跑更容易。<page>这是什么 ？你在开玩笑吗 ？监狱里没有盟友 ， 当你去闻到气味时 ， 你撞到了墙上！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! They seem a little incompatible.<hpage>"Bagh, you know? "Are you a prisoner? "They make their escape easier.<page>What is this? Are you kidding me? There are no allies in prison, and when you go to smell the smell, you hit the wall!

original_en_text: A scroll detailing the scents and tastes of Pharloom’s various bugs and beasts.
original_zh_text: 这本册子记录着纺络虫兽的气味与口感。
translated_text: 轮子描绘了秋天昆虫和动物的各种气味和味道。
secondary_translated_text: The wheels depict the various smells and smells of insects and animals in autumn.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! Nuu had fear that the awful rumblings of the world or sticky black threads had snatched you away from her!<hpage>I have survived, Nuu, and shall fight on while my strength remains.<hpage>The kingdom has grown darkly dangerous, but this hearth-home seems to still provide some safety. I suggest you remain here for now.<page>Of course! Nuu shall stay inside. The sickening sense of those twisted threads has spoilt the joy of my venturings.<page>You though, miss grown-up... is now not the perfect time to fully complete our journal?<page>The world-rumblings will surely have scared up many creatures from their hiding places! So go and hunt, and show sweet Nuu what you learn!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！还以为你被地震或黑灾吃掉啦！<hpage>就差一点，不过我没事。<hpage>外面愈发混乱，但这还算安全。你暂时别出去。<page>努努才不出去！那些扭曲的丝线太讨厌了，毁了探险的兴致！<page>但大姐姐……现在不正是完善记录的好时机？<page>地震肯定把怪物都吓出洞了！快去打猎给努努开眼界吧！
translated_text: 陛下 ， 夫人！他担心这个世界可怕的噪音和项链上的黑线会把他从她身边带走！<hpage>只要我还活着 ， 我就会拼命战斗。<hpage>这个王国变得越来越危险 ， 但烟囱似乎仍然提供了安全。我强烈建议你在这里呆一段时间。<page>是啊 ， 不！扭曲的线条所带来的不愉快的感觉破坏了冒险的乐趣。<page>现在不是写日记的最佳时机吗？<page>世界末日一定会吓到许多生物 ， 他们无法躲藏。所以 ， 去打猎 ， 让我们看看你学到的美丽的 NO！
secondary_translated_text: Your Majesty, Madam! He was afraid that the terrible noise of the world and the black line on the necklace would take him away from her!<hpage>As long as I am alive, I will fight hard.<hpage>The kingdom is becoming increasingly dangerous, but chimneys still seem to provide security. I strongly recommend you stay here for a while.<page>Yeah, no! The unpleasant feeling caused by the twisted lines undermines the joy of adventure.<page>Isn't this the best time to write a diary?<page>The end of the world will surely scare many creatures, and they will not be able to hide. So go hunting and show us the beautiful NO you learned!

original_en_text: Why spurn a little duel, sister? Surely it would put us in good stead for the trials ahead!<hpage>If we were to duel it would doubtless be illuminating. Unfortunately, I lack the time for such frivolity. Farewell, sirs.
original_zh_text: 干嘛拒绝呢，切磋下嘛！就当战前热身！<hpage>切磋的好处……对你更多。我没空陪你玩，告辞。
translated_text: 为什么要放弃一点战斗？这将有助于今后的测试。<hpage>如果你想与它战斗 ， 这是非常令人兴奋的。不幸的是 ， 我们没有时间讨论这些问题。再见 ， 先生。
secondary_translated_text: Why give up a little fight? This will facilitate future testing.<hpage>If you want to fight it, this is very exciting. Unfortunately, we don't have time to discuss these issues. Goodbye, sir.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cowards. Here you hide, even as you cause your own land’s demise.
original_zh_text: <hpage>懦夫。你们亲手葬送自己的土地，却躲在此处。
translated_text: <hpage>懦夫们躲藏起来 ， 但他们正在摧毁他们的土地。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Cowards are hiding, but they are destroying their land.

original_en_text: Ka, va! Your shell is ridden with those gruesome maggots. It was a foolish choice of yours to swim in their sickly pools.<hpage>This was by no means desired, Shakra. For now, I think it best you remain at limb’s length. <hpage>I shall not abide this infestation long. By Silk or by rest I shall soon see myself cleansed.
original_zh_text: 咔呀！你的壳上爬满了恶心的蛆虫。在那些毒水池子里游泳真是太蠢了。<hpage>我也不想这样，沙克拉。你最好离远点。<hpage>我不会让这些蛆虫待太久的，靠灵丝或休整自会清除。
translated_text: 等一下 ， 等一下！它的外壳充满了可怕的昆虫。在游泳池里游泳是一个愚蠢的选择。<hpage>莎拉 ， 这不是我想要的。<hpage>这种攻击不会持续很长时间。如果丝绸破碎或破碎 ， 它很快就会被移除。
secondary_translated_text: Wait, wait! Its shell is filled with terrible insects. Swimming in the pool is a stupid choice.<hpage>Sarah, this is not what I want.<hpage>Such attacks will not last long. If the silk breaks or breaks, it will be removed quickly.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You seem to have lost your way upon the course. Surely it was only an error? You already seem recovered of your lapse.<page>You are eager to run again, yes, yes? Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 看来你迷路了，肯定是小失误！<page>调整好了？那就再比一次吧！
translated_text: 这是个明智的错误！我想我迷路了 ， 这只是一个错误 ， 不是吗 ？他似乎从错误中恢复过来。<page>你想再跑一次吗 ？快点 ， 快点！
secondary_translated_text: This was a wise mistake! I think I got lost, it was just a mistake, wasn't it? He seemed to recover from his mistake.<page>Do you want to run again? Come on, come on!

original_en_text: ...One can visit the past, but then memories become contradictory...<page>...When the call rings out again, will you let your previous actions cloud your vision?<page>...By claw, by voice... History always rises to meet us...
original_zh_text: ……即便往昔可以重访，但记忆终将悖逆……<page>……当唤声再起，你会让昔日的抉择蒙蔽双眼么？<page>……以爪为刃，以声为引……历史永远不会等候我们……
translated_text: ...人们可以回顾过去 ， 但他们的记忆是矛盾的。<page>...当你的手机再次响起时 ， 你是否被你过去的行为所欺骗 ？<page>...通过指甲 ， 通过声音 ， 历史总是站起来迎接我们。
secondary_translated_text: ... People can look back, but their memories are contradictory.<page>... When your phone rings again, are you deceived by your past actions?<page>... Through our nails, through our sound, history always stands up to welcome us.

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<page>Think of all the delectable learnings can we dig out of the creatures living here!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，大姐姐拒绝努努？好狠心！<page>想想能从这些生物身上挖出多少美味的知识啊！
translated_text: 妈咪！你会拒绝穷人吗 ？太酸了。<page>想想你能从生活在这里的生物那里学到的有趣的事情！
secondary_translated_text: Mommy! Would you reject the poor? It's too sour.<page>Think of the interesting things you can learn from the creatures that live here!

translated_text: 爆炸性土壤 （ Explosive Terrain ）
secondary_translated_text: Explosive soil (Explosive Terrain)

original_en_text: But wait! Before you depart. Your exceptional skill requires an equally fine reward!<page>This shining shard of ancient mask is yours! Take it. Cherish it. And know, you shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 等等，临走前再送个配得上你的宝贝！<page>这块远古面甲碎片归你了！谢谢你，希望你永远铭记这场较量！
translated_text: 等待 ， 等待。有才华的人在离开之前需要得到奖励。<page>面具是你的 ， 你必须接受它 ， 关心它 ， 你将永远感激它。
secondary_translated_text: Wait, wait. Talented people need to be rewarded before leaving.<page>The mask is yours, you must accept it, care about it, and you will always be grateful for it.

original_en_text: This is a fine shiny-shiny, ain’t it? Those dirty old raggedies like to carry these around, and we like to snitch ‘em away when we can! O-ho-ho!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的小玩意！那些破烂朝圣者喜欢带这个，就从他们身上顺的！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: 肮脏的老人喜欢穿它们 ， 并希望尽可能多地责怪他们！哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！
secondary_translated_text: Dirty old people love to wear them and want to blame them as much as possible! Oh, Oh, Oh!

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, you make Nuu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land, and record them in this scroll!
original_zh_text: 哇大姐姐你真好！猎杀这里的生物，把见闻记在本子上！
translated_text: 亲爱的母亲 ， 你让我们很幸福。
secondary_translated_text: Dear mother, you have made us very happy.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings Shakra, in these drifts consumed by crust and sand.<hpage>These caverns have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures buried throughout.<page>The shells of their builders rest in a tower above. A grand tribe they seemed, and strong fighters I’m sure. Alas, they exist now only as hardened husks.<page>Lament, Child Wielding Needle! We lived too late to match their claws.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。这里已被沙岩吞没了。<hpage>洞穴虽然复归原貌，但岩层里似乎埋着宏伟建筑。<page>建造者的尸壳堆在上面的塔里呢。当年肯定是强盛部落，也有不少勇士。可惜都只剩下空壳了。<page>可惜啊，使针的小姑娘，我们生不逢时，无缘与他们较量。
translated_text: <hpage>在这些被树皮和沙子吸收的游泳者中 ， 有一个美丽的萨卡亚尔致敬。<hpage>虽然洞穴已经恢复自然 ， 但仍然可以看到隐藏在洞穴中的大胆结构的证据。<page>建筑师们站在塔顶上 ， 他们就像一个伟大的部落 ， 我认为他们是强大的战士。” 它就像一只贝壳。<page>可怜的针 ， 你的指甲太迟了。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Among these swimmers absorbed by tree bark and sand was a beautiful Sacayar tribute.<hpage>Although the cave has returned to nature, evidence of the bold structures hidden in the cave can still be seen.<page>The architects stood on the top of the tower, they were like a great tribe, and I think they were powerful warriors." It's like a shell.<page>Poor needle, your nails are too late.

original_en_text: Don’t despair, pilgrim frieeeee-eeend,<br>Lift your sight and raise your voice!<br>Have no fear, pilgrim truuuuu-uuuuue,<br>Believing is a happy choice!<page>Hoy there! Aren’t these fields marvellous? And above us are the bountiful moors, where every pilgrim can fill their belly!<hpage>These hot fields are a wonder indeed, but hunters prowl the long grass. Playing your instrument will only alert them to your presence.<page>Well then, alert them I shall! For where many gather, great songs are sung!
original_zh_text: 莫沮丧啊朝圣友，<br>昂首放歌莫踌躇！<page>别畏惧啊同道虫，<br>心怀信念最幸福！<page>看这原野多壮美啊！上方沼地还能让每个朝圣者饱腹！<hpage>原野虽好，长草中却有猎手潜伏。奏乐只会暴露行踪。<page>暴露又何妨！聚在一块，正好一起高歌！
translated_text: “别担心 ， 我的朝圣者。<br>睁开你的眼睛 ， 提高你的声音！<br>不要害怕 ， 朝圣者 Truuu @ u<br>我认为这是一个幸福的选择！<page>早上好， 嗯？这个地方还好吗？在我们上面是一个肥沃的沙漠 ， 朝圣者可以在那里填补他们的船只。<hpage>温暖的田野是一个真正的奇迹 ， 但猎人在长长的灌木丛中徘徊 ， 演奏乐器 ， 只是记住他们的存在。<page>我会记住你。“很多人唱了一首美丽的歌！
secondary_translated_text: "Don't worry, my pilgrim.<br>Open your eyes and raise your voice!<br>Don't be afraid, pilgrim Truuu@u<br>I think this is a happy choice!<page>Good morning, huh? How is this place? Above us is a fertile desert where pilgrims can fill their ships.<hpage>The warm fields are a real miracle, but hunters wander through the long bushes, playing instruments, just remembering their presence.<page>I will remember you. "Many people sang a beautiful song!

original_en_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims have made an encampment in a safer place than this, high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>They would surely allow you to stay there, if you could resist causing them mischief.<page>An en-camp-ment, eh? Sounds like a jolly place for old Grindle! Mayhaps we’ll have a sniff around later.<page>That’s a good tip, that. And you’ve just done given it to us for free! O-hoho, head fulla muck you got!
original_zh_text: <hpage>圣堡另一边的高处，朝圣者们新建了安全营地。<hpage>你老实点的话，他们应该能留你。<page>朝圣者的营地？听着像个能偷光光的好地方！<page>这情报不赖，还是白送的！你个蠢脑袋！
translated_text: <hpage>一些朝圣者在城堡的另一边露营 ， 那里比这里更安全。<hpage>如果你和我玩 ， 他们会让我留下来。<page>那夏令营呢？看起来像一个快乐的老地方 Grindle！再见 ， 姑娘。<page>这是一个美丽的回忆 ， 你免费传递它！脑袋里有屎。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims camp on the other side of the castle, which is safer there than here.<hpage>If you play with me, they'll let me stay.<page>What about summer camp? Looks like a happy old place Grindle! Bye, girl.<page>This is a beautiful memory, you pass it on for free! There is shit in my head.

original_en_text: Well well! Seems I won the last of your rosaries. Luck is granted to the faithful, it is sung, so I must be very faithful indeed.<page>If you happen on any more rosaries though, I’d be well happy to play you again.
original_zh_text: 哎呀！赢光你的念珠了。都说运气眷顾虔诚者，看来我够虔诚。<page>等你再带着念珠的时候，我很乐意跟你再玩几局。
translated_text: 你有这个！我明白了！我得到了最后一朵玫瑰。带着信仰和好运之歌 ， 我必须忠诚。"<page>当我回到罗萨里奥时 ， 我想再次和他一起踢球。
secondary_translated_text: You have this! I understand! I got the last rose. With faith and good luck songs, I must be loyal. "<page>When I return to Rosario, I want to play with him again.

translated_text: 标记金属铅笔
secondary_translated_text: Marking metal pencil

original_en_text: <hpage>Already, I have cut down many of this lands inhabitants, but I agree, documenting those creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time still permits, I shall do as you wish.<page>Ma! How wonderful for Nuu! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的确已斩杀这片土地上的许多住民，但记录这些生物是值得的。<hpage>若时间允许，我会尽力帮你。<page>好呀！努努太高兴啦！去吧！狩猎吧，掠食吧，开始我们的研究吧！
translated_text: <hpage>我已经杀死了这片土地上的许多居民 ， 但我同意记录这些生物是值得做的事情。<hpage>如果我有时间 ， 我会做你喜欢做的事。<page>妈咪！享受它是美妙的。快点 ， 快点！打猎 ， 打猎 ， 教学。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have killed many residents of this land, but I agree that documenting these creatures is something worth doing.<hpage>If I had time, I would do what you like.<page>Mommy! Enjoying it is wonderful. Come on, come on! Hunting, hunting, teaching.

original_en_text: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poor little snitchbug like Grindle.<page>Hoy, you’re smellin’ fancy! You got some pockets under your cloak? Hidin’ away some goodies for us to pilfer?<hpage>Beware your greed, thief. You’d be dead before your claw reached my cloak.<page>O-hoho! Never mind then, bully. Plenty of tasties lying around for us down here. We smells ‘em!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！终于自由啦！这破牢房关了格林德尔大爷太久啦！<page>你身上有股阔气味儿！斗篷里藏啥好东西了？<hpage>管好你的爪子，小偷。碰到我斗篷前你就会没命。<page>哎哟！开个玩笑嘛！底下好东西够多了，犯不着冒险！
translated_text: 终于自由了！这是一个教育像格林代尔这样的告密者的好地方。<page>嘿 ， 多臭啊！夹克下面有一个口袋 ， 里面藏着可以偷来的好东西。<hpage>贪婪的小偷 ， 在你的指甲碰到我的外套之前 ， 你已经死了。<page>噢 ， 噢！很多美味的东西在等着你。我能闻到它的味道！
secondary_translated_text: Finally free! This is a great place to educate whistleblowers like Greendale.<page>Hey, how smelly! There is a pocket under the jacket that hides good things you can steal.<hpage>Greedy thief, you were dead before your fingernails touched my coat.<page>Oh, Oh! A lot of delicious things are waiting for you. I can smell it!

translated_text: Shell Map （ 英文版 ）
secondary_translated_text: Shell Map (English version)

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your task in these lands is finished. Will you now return to your tribe? <page>I shall not return, Hornet Wielding Needle... I cannot. To leave my tribe’s nest-plains, that journey has only one direction. <page>This has always been our way, our long leaving, for those few who survive till age seeks to claim their shell, and those fewer who choose to send them on.<page>But these lands, Pharloom... My nest-plains I once saw so grand, now they become small. A place for birth, and growing, but a place too narrow to live a bug’s life full.
original_zh_text: <hpage>既然你已经找到导师，任务完成，打算回部落吗？<page>回不去了……离开部落只有一条路可走。<page>这是我们传统，我们的远行。活够了的年长者自行出走，少数选择送行的亲属也不能再回。<page>从前觉得部落很大，但到了纺络，才知道部落有多小。那是我出生、成长的地方，但容不下虫活一辈子。
translated_text: <hpage>” 查克拉， 师父找到了他。我们在地球上的使命已经完成。你想回到部落吗 ？<page>我不会回到巢穴。我不能 ， 先生。我将离开我的部落巢穴 ， 进入平原。"<page>我们分开了 ， 分开了很久。一些活着的人想把尸体还给他们 ， 所以他们决定把它交给他们。<page>法老的人曾经看过我的大平原的巢穴 ， 但现在他们越来越小。这是你出生和成长的地方 ， 但太小了 ， 昆虫无法完全生存。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Chakra, the master found him. Our mission on earth has been accomplished. Do you want to go back to the tribe?<page>I will not go back to the nest. I can't, sir. I will leave my tribal nest and enter the plains. "<page>We were separated, separated for a long time. Some of the living people wanted to give the body back to them, so they decided to give it to them.<page>The pharaohs 'people once saw my nests in the Great Plains, but now they are getting smaller and smaller. This is where you were born and raised, but it's too small for insects to fully survive.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... Her strength was needed, what was left, to cut Pharloom free of its black thread threat. It was a savage act, no doubt, but the reason was just.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只巨型古蚁才刚死不久……但她的存在……<page>难道是她？是她在维持这里的生态？……但既然她死了，接下来会怎么样？<hpage>会枯萎，并消逝……而她是死在我针下。<page>你？为什么？为什么要杀掉这么关键的存在？<hpage>这说来话长……我需要她的力量来斩断黑灾诅咒。这虽然残忍，但有必要。<hpage>假以时日，这些洞穴或许能重生、繁盛……但需几代虫的努力。<hpage>这份重任，就要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子了。
translated_text: 死亡似乎发生在最近 ， 但它就在这里。<page>是你吗 ？嗯 ， 对吧 ？什么样的力量支撑着这个洞穴 ？如果是这样的话 ， 未来会发生什么 ？<hpage>他们消失了 ， 他们消失了 ， 不幸的是 ， 我的针杀死了她。<page>“是你吗 ， 小姐 ？ ”为什么呢？你在寻找这么重要的东西吗 ？<hpage>你需要你的力量来消除黑线农场的威胁 ， 这很难简单地解释。毫无疑问 ， 这是野蛮的行为 ， 但原因是显而易见的。<hpage>随着时间的推移 ， 洞穴看到了再次成长和繁荣的机会 ， 但再生可能是一项艰巨的任务。<hpage>如果你想成功 ， 你必须依靠像你这样的昆虫播下第一颗种子。
secondary_translated_text: Death seems to have occurred recently, but it is here.<page>Is that you? Yeah, right? What forces support this cave? If so, what will happen in the future?<hpage>They disappeared, they disappeared, and unfortunately, my needle killed her.<page>"Is that you, miss? "Why? Are you looking for something so important?<hpage>You need your strength to eliminate the threat of Black Line Farm, which is difficult to explain simply. There is no doubt that this was barbaric behavior, but the reasons are obvious.<hpage>Over time, the cave sees an opportunity to grow and prosper again, but regeneration can be a difficult task.<hpage>If you want to succeed, you must rely on insects like you to plant the first seed.

original_en_text: <page=M>Hold it, Old One! That intruder writhing within your shell... <page=S>Our ritual ain’t gonna work while that cruel creature’s present. We’d be tugging at its memories as much as your own.<hpage>Then free me of the affliction. Surely you have the skill?<page=S>Not for this! Our power’s all of soul and that thing’s all physical. You’re gonna need more traditional tools of healing.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>慢着！古老者，您壳里那扭动的异物……<page=S>有这东西在，仪式会同时拽出它的记忆。<hpage>那就替我除了它，你们不是擅长各种法术吗？<page=S>治不了！我们擅灵魂之术，这东西却是实体。您得去找传统医具。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧，听说她在那片湿地里苟活。<page=B>她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>等待老人。凶手在贝壳上上吊自杀。<page=S>如果一个暴力的生物出现了 ， 你的意识就会停止工作 ， 你会恢复记忆 ， 就像你恢复记忆一样。<hpage>为了让我摆脱痛苦 ， 你需要这些技能 ， 对吗 ？事实上？<page=S>所有的力量来自灵魂 ， 所有的力量来自身体。<page=B>她寻求庇护 ， 寻找 Balhart ， 据我所知 ， 她被赶出了潮湿的沙漠。<page=B>他有工具来完成他的使命 ， 并在当下生存的狡猾。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Waiting for the elderly. The killer hanged himself on the shell.<page=S>If a violent creature appears, your consciousness will stop working and you will regain your memory, just as you will regain your memory.<hpage>To get me out of my pain, you need these skills, right? Actually?<page=S>All power comes from the soul, all power comes from the body.<page=B>She sought refuge, looking for Balhart, and as far as I know, she was driven out of the humid desert.<page=B>He has the tools to fulfill his mission and the cunning to survive in the present.

original_en_text: When travelling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember safe places to camp.<br><br>These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
original_zh_text: 在险地旅行要记好安全营地。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记长椅和休息点。
translated_text: 在敌对国家旅行时 ， 重要的是要记住安全的露营。<br><br>此条形图代表一系列地图和其他区域。
secondary_translated_text: When traveling in hostile countries, it is important to remember to camp safely.<br><br>This bar chart represents a series of maps and other areas.

original_en_text: Nuu takes time with her creatures, she must inspect closely. Thick arms, flakey hair, delicate eyes... Nuu will inspect it all!
original_zh_text: 努努研究可仔细了！粗胳膊、鳞片毛发、精致眼睛……全要检查！
translated_text: 你必须花时间与动物在一起 ， 并仔细研究它们。厚厚的手 ， 肮脏的头发 ， 细长的眼睛 ， 没有人能控制这一切。
secondary_translated_text: You have to spend time with animals and study them carefully. Thick hands, dirty hair, long eyes, no one can control all this.

original_en_text: Maiden, strong, wreathed in red,<br>Shield her shell, bless her thread!<br>She fights for us until the end,<br>Please protect my dearest friee-end!
original_zh_text: 红绸披身的坚强战士啊，<br>为我们奋战至最终时刻！<br>护佑她的甲壳，祝福她的灵丝，<br>我们的辉光，我的宝贵挚友！
translated_text: 戴着红色皇冠的女孩。<br>保护你的皮肤 ， 保佑你的线条！<br>他奋斗到最后。<br>保护我的朋友。
secondary_translated_text: The girl with the red crown.<br>Protect your skin and bless your lines!<br>He fought until the end.<br>Protect my friends.

original_en_text: If chance allows, visit the tower above. It is an impressive sight, not overgrown by the crust upon these caverns, but rather formed full of the material itself. <page>If the old tribe of this place were able to guide its growth to such grand degree... then they possessed a power to rival even that Citadel.
original_zh_text: 有空的话去上面塔楼看看，挺壮观的。那可不是岩壳自然生长形成的，而是用整块材料塑造而成。<page>如果这里的古老部落能引导砂岩生长至这等规模……那他们拥有的力量不逊于圣堡。
translated_text: 如果你有机会 ， 你可以参观这座塔。这是一个令人印象深刻的景色。这个洞穴的地壳不是郁郁葱葱的绿色 ， 而是充满了物质。<page>如果这个古老的部落能够继续发展到这一点 ， 那么它的力量将与堡垒相媲美。
secondary_translated_text: If you have the opportunity, you can visit the tower. This is an impressive scenery. The crust of this cave is not lush green, but full of matter.<page>If this ancient tribe can continue to develop to this point, its power will be comparable to that of the fortress.

original_en_text: These strange, shuffling pilgrims... In the camp below they were docile enough, but up here they seem to have lost their senses. They cry out to the darkness and attack their fellow travellers.<page>Yakkanesh! Keep your weapon drawn and your bearings true! The way ahead is winding, and to lose one’s way invites only death.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 那些朝圣者……在下面还算安分，到这上面就发疯了。对着黑暗哭喊，还攻击路人。<page>雅卡内什！握紧你的武器，可别走神了！前面的路曲折危险，迷路就是死。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: 这些奇怪的朝圣者撤退到下面的田野 ， 跟随他们 ， 但在这里他们似乎失去了心脏 ， 攻击他们的同伴 ， 在黑暗中大喊大叫。<page>他掏出手枪 ， 把它指向正确的方向。如果你迷路了 ， 你就会死。<page>我是一个部落的飞行员 ， 他绘制了这片土地 ， 如果我们可以交换货物和货物。
secondary_translated_text: These strange pilgrims retreated into the fields below and followed them, but here they seemed to lose their hearts, attacked their companions, and shouted in the darkness.<page>He took out his pistol and pointed it in the right direction. If you get lost, you will die.<page>I am a pilot for a tribe who charted this land if we could exchange goods and goods.

original_en_text: Ma, ma! Much hunting has you done, and so many sweet little creatures in our records!<page>Nuu is drooling from such excess of learnings! Please keep working, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 呀呀！砍了这么多可爱小生物！<page>知识多到流口水！大姐姐继续努力呀！
translated_text: 妈咪妈咪！这里有很多狩猎 ， 我们的登记册上有很多漂亮的生物！<page>“夫人 ， 继续你的工作。
secondary_translated_text: Mommy! Mommy! There is a lot of hunting here and there are many beautiful creatures on our register!<page>"Madam, continue your work.

original_en_text: In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.
original_zh_text: 在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。
translated_text: 我们国家的军人向我们致敬。你是个新生儿 ， 但你也是个士兵。
secondary_translated_text: The soldiers of our country pay tribute to us. You are a newborn, but you are also a soldier.

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>We meet again, little thief. Are you familiar with this place?<hpage>If we ally our efforts, our escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! You can just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你对这里很熟么？<hpage>我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！它们似乎有点不相容。<hpage>“你好 ， 先生 ， 你知道这个地方吗 ？ ”<hpage>它们使得他们的逃跑更容易。<page>这是什么 ？你在开玩笑吗 ？他在监狱里没有盟友 ， 所以他爬上墙去嗅。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! They seem a little incompatible.<hpage>"Hello, sir, do you know this place?”<hpage>They make their escape easier.<page>What is this? Are you kidding me? He had no allies in prison, so he climbed up the wall to sniff.

original_en_text: <hpage>Safe journey, tall bug.<page>This is Pharloom, warrior. Safety is a myth.
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你一路平安。<page>此地是纺络，战士。安全只是虚妄。
translated_text: <hpage>早上好 ， 安全旅行。<page>他是一个法老和战士 ， 安全是一个神话。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, travel safely.<page>He was a pharaoh and soldier, and security was a myth.

translated_text: Kanka Pin （英文）
secondary_translated_text: Kanka Pin (English)

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Seth. It is a welcome surprise to see you here amongst these festivities.<page>Hullo, hullo! Yes, my wandering was long, and I began to fear I would meet my end in those sticky swamps below.<page>How lucky I was to stumble upon the home of these friendly revellers!<page>They said I could be a flea here with them, so of course I agreed. Seems as good a place as any to call home, at least for a time.<page>Now I just need to grow a little fur and sprout some wings, eh? Ha ha!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，赛斯。没想到在庆典能遇见你。<page>是啊！之前在下面粘糊沼泽差点没命了。<page>幸亏遇到这群办庆典的好心虫！<page>他们说我可以当个跳蚤住下，我当然同意！这地方看着很适合安家<page>现在就只差长点毛和翅膀了！哈哈！
translated_text: <hpage>早上好 ， 很高兴在塞思的派对上见到你。<page>嘿 ， 嘿 ， 是的 ， 我过了这么久 ， 我开始害怕死在闪闪发光的沼泽下面。<page>我们很幸运能看到这个美丽的房子！<page>他们说我可以在这里做芯片 ， 所以我当然接受了。这对每个人来说都是一个美妙的地方 ， 至少有一段时间。<page>你需要翅膀和贝壳 ， 对吧 ？哈！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, nice to see you at Seth's party.<page>Hey, hey, yeah, after all this time, I started to be afraid of dying under the shining swamp.<page>We are so lucky to see this beautiful house!<page>They said I could make chips here, so of course I accepted it. This is a wonderful place for everyone, at least for a while.<page>You need wings and shells, right? Ha!

original_en_text: Swamps born in the Citadel’s shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
original_zh_text: 圣堡阴影下的沼泽，这里的水曾经清澈过。
translated_text: 水在城堡的阴影下诞生。证据是 ， 水已经干净了。
secondary_translated_text: Water was born in the shadow of the castle. The evidence is that the water is clean.

original_en_text: Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
original_zh_text: 荆棘盘踞的险路。这里的植物和住民一样要命。
translated_text: 这条路上充满了荆棘和根。这些植物通常与它们所居住的生物体一样致命。
secondary_translated_text: This road is full of thorns and roots. These plants are often as deadly as the organisms they inhabit.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? The test of endurance remains at your ready! Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 要比赛吗？耐力测试随时恭候！
translated_text: 速度误差是什么意思？准备好考验你的耐心。"走 ， 走 ， 走。"
secondary_translated_text: What does speed error mean? Be prepared to test your patience. "Go, go, go. "

original_en_text: Zaza and I will fight through these cursed lands until every last one of the black-twisted fiends has been cut down!
original_zh_text: 扎扎和我会杀遍这些鬼地方，直到怪物一个不剩！
translated_text: 我和我将杀死这片被诅咒的土地上所有的黑色和扭曲的恶魔！
secondary_translated_text: I and I will kill all black and twisted demons in this cursed land!

original_en_text: <page=M>Hurry, Old One. The ritual can’t commence while you remain host to that writhing root.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>快去吧，古老者。有那根须在你体内，仪式没法开始。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧。她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>“过来 ， 老人 ， 当你熟练地弯曲根部时 ， 意识不会开始。<page=B>她寻求庇护 ， 寻找 Balhart ， 据我所知 ， 她被赶出了潮湿的沙漠。<page=B>他有工具来完成他的使命 ， 并在当下生存的狡猾。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>"Come here, old man, consciousness will not begin when you skillfully bend the roots.<page=B>She sought refuge, looking for Balhart, and as far as I know, she was driven out of the humid desert.<page=B>He has the tools to fulfill his mission and the cunning to survive in the present.

original_en_text: The red-shells, hiding through the fields, stalking the boney beasts. They are part of it, somehow, the life that flourishes here.<page>Even haunted, they seem to lose less of themselves... What anchor allows them to retain such strength?
original_zh_text: 红壳怪潜伏猎杀骨兽，是这里生态的一部分。<page>被丝咒侵蚀，它们却还能基本保持神智……靠的是什么？
translated_text: 一只红色的野兽躲在田野里 ， 追逐一只骨头野兽。由于某种原因 ， 它们是生活繁荣的一部分。<page>即使你是一个幽灵 ， 你也不会经常迷路 ， 那么你会怎么做呢 ？谁将拥有权力？
secondary_translated_text: A red beast hides in a field, chasing a bone beast. For some reason, they are part of life's prosperity.<page>Even if you were a ghost, you wouldn't get lost often, so what would you do? Who will have power?

original_en_text: Oh, but of course I sing! I am Sherma, a pilgrim just like you. I hear the call of the great Citadel just like every other devout soul.
original_zh_text: 当然要唱！我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。圣堡在召唤每个虔诚信徒，你我都听见了！
translated_text: 当然 ， 我可以唱歌。我是一个萨满 ， 一个朝圣者 ， 就像你一样 ， 就像其他快乐的灵魂一样 ， 我听到了伟大的城堡的召唤。
secondary_translated_text: Of course, I can sing. I am a shaman, a pilgrim, just like you, and like other happy souls, I hear the call of the great castle.

original_en_text: Hoy! Hoyyyy! You there! Get us out of here! Since when’s a little light thievery worth a lifelong sentence?
original_zh_text: 喂！喂喂！那边的！快放我们出去！偷点小东西至于关一辈子吗？
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。我在这里！“把我扔出去！ ”盗窃罪什么时候可以判无期徒刑 ？
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. I'm here! "Throw me out! "When can theft be sentenced to life imprisonment?

original_en_text: Our great Citadel has lost its voice, and now the black threads rise up to tear its shell apart. I fear holy Pharloom is truly dying...<page>But I still have hope, red maiden! Though kingdoms may fall, life endures still, and we bugs can build our lands anew!<hpage>I share your hope, Sherma. Remember though that whatever is built next belongs not to the past, but to you.<hpage>Your instincts are strong. Let it be those that guide you, rather than any reverence toward a kingdom’s corpse.<page>Oho, you flatter me so! But it is my fellows who shall guide me, those whose voices sing out still, even in these ruined times...
original_zh_text: 我们伟大的圣堡已失却歌声，如今黑丝翻涌要撕裂它的躯壳。恐怕神圣的纺络真要灭亡了……<page>但我仍怀希望，红衣姑娘！王国可以倾覆，但生命将延续，我们虫子能重建家园！<hpage>我与你同怀希望，谢尔玛。但记住，新建之物不属于过去，而属于你们。<hpage>你的直觉很强。让它指引你和这些虫子，别再膜拜王国的残骸。<page>噢，您过誉了！但指引我的该是我的同胞们——那些在废墟中仍放声歌唱的同胞……
translated_text: 我们伟大的城堡正在失去声音 ， 黑线正在上升 ， 打破它的外壳。<page>一个王国可能会灭亡 ， 但生命仍然存在 ， 昆虫可以重建地球。<hpage>谢尔曼 ， 我和你一样 ， 但是你后来创造的东西是你的 ， 而不是过去的。<hpage>他有强烈的本能。你不要害怕那些在地上引导你的人的尸体。<page>你会佩服我！我的同伴带领我。他们的声音在这个毁灭的时刻歌唱。
secondary_translated_text: Our great castle is losing its sound, and the black line is rising, breaking its shell.<page>A kingdom may die, but life still exists and insects can rebuild the earth.<hpage>Sherman, I'm just like you, but what you create later is yours, not what was in the past.<hpage>He has strong instincts. Don't be afraid of the bodies of those who guide you on the ground.<page>You will admire me! My companions lead me. Their voices sing in this moment of destruction.

original_en_text: Hahhh... well met, sister. The task of hunting down these black-twisted fiends is no small one, eh? Still, we must not rest! Not while the cries of the innocent echo from every corner of the kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哈……又见面了。清剿这些黑怪可不轻松，对吧？但只要王国还有哭喊声，我和扎扎就不能歇！
translated_text: 是的 ， 是的！杀死恶魔容易吗 ？但是你不能休息！当无辜者的哭声在整个王国都能听到！
secondary_translated_text: Yes, yes! Is it easy to kill demons? But you can't rest! When the cries of innocent people can be heard throughout the kingdom!

original_en_text: Sign yourself as a snitch! And scoop up more rosaries from your bested foes. Just watch it when you’re snitchin’ that you don’t lose sum’a your own...
original_zh_text: 带上这个我们就是一伙的了。打赢了多赚，打输了赔本！
translated_text: 注册成为告密者！玫瑰花又一次被敌人夺走了。当你说你错过了什么时 ， 要小心。
secondary_translated_text: Register as a whistleblower! The roses were once again taken away by the enemy. Be careful when you say you missed something.

original_en_text: What’s this? The spider arrives at last, here to stand acquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Your lands have yet to prove my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这是谁？小蜘蛛终于到了，在伟大的圣堡面前瑟瑟发抖。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: 这是什么 ？蜘蛛终于是这座美丽城堡的买家。<hpage>他是一个蓝色的男孩， 不是吗？你又减少了吗？“你的国家还没有被证明是我的敌人 ， 沉睡的圣人没有改变。<page>“亲爱的 ， 亲爱的 ， 你为什么这么乐观 ？ ”“我不认为我有这种力量； 它很快就扼杀了希望。<hpage>愚蠢的孩子 ， 你以为我永远不会见到你的国王吗 ？嗯 ， 对吧 ？<hpage>地球的美丽 ， 昆虫的忠诚 ， 以及围绕它们的诅咒。<hpage>他的王国是由一个超然的存在 ， 蠕虫 ， 最高的种姓之一统一。<hpage>无论你多么渴望丝绸和贝壳 ， 你都会发现你对这两样东西都有强烈的依恋。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? Spiders are finally the buyer of this beautiful castle.<hpage>He's a blue boy, isn't he? Have you reduced it again? "Your country has not been proven to be my enemy, and the sleeping saint has not changed.<page>"Honey, honey, why are you so optimistic? "I don't think I have that power; it kills hope quickly.<hpage>Foolish boy, do you think I will never see your king? Yeah, right?<hpage>The beauty of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that surrounds them.<hpage>His kingdom is unified by one transcendent being, the worm, one of the highest castes.<hpage>No matter how much you crave silk and shells, you will find that you have a strong attachment to both.

original_en_text: Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 研究生物很辛苦，但努努超满足！快去打猎吧大姐姐！
translated_text: 我学到了很多关于生物学的知识 ， 这对 Nova 非常有用。“我们去打猎。" "
secondary_translated_text: I learned a lot about biology, which was very useful for Nova. "Let's go hunting. " "

original_en_text: Hoy there, fancy bug! How you farin’, now that the ‘ole world’s creakin’ and crackin’ around us? Desperately needin’ some supplies, I’ll wager! Heh heh!<hpage>You seem in good spirits, thief. Are you not disturbed by the great rending of the kingdom?<page>Heh, end of the world don’t bother ol’ Grindle none. We’ll just go find another one to plunder, won’t we?
original_zh_text: 哟！阔气虫来啦！外面世界要完蛋了，急需补给吧？哦嚯嚯！<hpage>你看着倒挺精神，不怕王国崩塌？<page>王国崩塌关我们屁事！大不了换个地方偷！
translated_text: 多么可爱的狗啊！现在 ， 一个 “旧世界 ” 正在我们周围展开 ， 我们迫切需要物资。<hpage>“小偷 ， 你看起来很好。“你怕你的王国崩溃吗 ？ ”"<page>“嘿 ， 这是世界末日 ， 别担心 ， 你在寻找 Grindell 奖杯吗 ？ ”"
secondary_translated_text: What a lovely dog! Now, an "old world" is unfolding around us, and we urgently need supplies.<hpage>"Thief, you look good. "Are you afraid of the collapse of your kingdom?”"<page>"Hey, it's the end of the world, don't worry, are you looking for the Grindell Trophy?”"

original_en_text: <page=M>Our spells’re woven, our parts prepared. Whenever you’re ready, lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.<page=M>Best you don’t dawdle now. Pharloom’s time is short, and those hearts won’t go on beating forever.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们已经准备好施咒，您躺上祭坛便可开始。<page=M>劝您别再耽搁了，纺络时日无多，这些心也跳不了多久。
translated_text: <page=M>我们的订单已经完成 ， 我们的部分已经准备好了。当你准备好了 ， 坐在舞台上 ， 开始。<page=M>法鲁的时间很短暂 ， 他的心不会永远跳动。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Our order is complete and our part is ready. When you are ready, sit on the stage and go.<page=M>Faro's time is short, and his heart will not beat forever.

original_en_text: No more talk, warrior. Permit me this final moment of memorial.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I shall disturb you no longer.
original_zh_text: 别说了，战士。让我在这最后时刻安静怀念吧。<hpage>如你所愿，不再打扰。
translated_text: - 别告诉我 ， 记住你生病的最后一刻。<hpage>无论如何 ， 我不会再打扰你了。
secondary_translated_text: - Don't tell me, remember the last moment of your illness.<hpage>Anyway, I won't bother you again.

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time perhaps, sir. My own tasks cannot be easily ignored.<page>Then I shall continue to train in anticipation of that future moment!<page>Having met, it is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!
original_zh_text: <hpage>下次吧，我有要事在身。<page>我会继续特训等着比赛那天！<page>命运注定我们要一决高下！
translated_text: <hpage>“下一次 ， 他的工作不容易被忽视。<page>继续我们的旅程吧！<page>命运需要竞争。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Next time, his work will not be easily ignored.<page>Continue our journey!<page>Destiny requires competition.

original_en_text: Oh, welcome miss grown-up! Come to inspect the red-rocky creatures, like Nuu? We have found a very big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!<hpage>A pair of beasts attacked me here, burrowing through the stone with their spiral shells. I cut this one down, and the other fled.<page>Ooooh ma! Really? Nuu wishes that she had the pair! She could have studied much. Unlucky, to miss such a big feast of learnings!
original_zh_text: 噢！欢迎大姐姐！也来研究红石头吗？我发现个大家伙！还算新鲜！<hpage>两只带螺旋壳的怪物用石头攻击我。斩了一只，跑了一只。<page>哎呀！努努好想要一对！能学好多东西呢！真可惜！
translated_text: 欢迎各位先生们。看看那些红色的石头生物 ， 像 Nu 。我找到了一些很酷的东西。很新鲜 ， 但不太新鲜。<hpage>两只野兽攻击我 ， 用螺旋壳在石头上钻了一个洞 ， 一个被切割 ， 另一个被隐藏起来。<page>哦 ， 妈妈！- 事实上？我希望你有一对夫妇。我非常怀念这次学术活动。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, gentlemen. Look at those red stone creatures, like Nu. I found something cool. It's fresh, but not very fresh.<hpage>Two wild beasts attacked me and used their spiral shells to drill a hole in the stone. One was cut and the other was hidden.<page>Oh, mom!- Actually? I hope you have a couple. I miss this academic event very much.

original_en_text: We must press on... There is so much more... for us to do...
original_zh_text: 必须继续……我们还有……很多事要做……
translated_text: 如果我们不继续前进 ， 其他人就会。
secondary_translated_text: If we don't move forward, others will.

original_en_text: I see much wasted effort in these docks. There is too much flourish to the form of it all. The ways of others are strange indeed...
original_zh_text: 码头修得花里胡哨，净是浪费。外族人的路子真怪……
translated_text: 这种形式有很多繁荣 ， 我们消耗了大量的能源。
secondary_translated_text: There is a lot of prosperity in this form, and we consume a lot of energy.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! We both know our previous run was only warm-up, yes? Only a tiny test to prepare for the real match, Hoi hoi!<page>Well that match is now! A new track worthy of your skill, and mine. No longer merely a test!<page>Meet the challenge and my speed full. Let us break through our limits and see what waits beyond!
original_zh_text: 上次只是热身对吧？真正的好戏现在开始！<page>新的挑战，新的赛道！配得上你我的实力！<page>接受我的全速挑战，一起冲刺突破极限吧！
translated_text: 这是个明智的错误！最后一场比赛是热的 ， 不是吗 ？准备一个真正的游戏是一个考验 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？<page>来吧 ， 游戏开始了！这首歌很值得她的才华。这不再只是一次测试。<page>我们必须用我们所有的力量来挑战它。让我们到国外去看看会发生什么！
secondary_translated_text: This was a wise mistake! The last game was hot, wasn't it? Preparing for a real game is a test, isn't it? Actually?<page>Come on, the game starts! This song is worthy of her talent. This is no longer just a test.<page>We must challenge it with all our strength. Let's go abroad and see what happens!

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>我常用它标强力敌人的位置。
translated_text: 您可以使用它在地图上显示重要地点和回忆。<br><br>它经常被用来评价别人。
secondary_translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>It is often used to evaluate others.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>I was intrigued by the challenge you issued on the bell settlement’s wishwall, sir, though having reached this place I wonder at your choice of location.<hpage>If you seek challengers you should choose somewhere less far afield. It is rare chance any bug would journey to a cavern so distant.<page>True, perhaps. Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！终于啊！<hpage>先生，我对您在钟心镇祈愿墙下的战书很感兴趣。不过抵达此地后，倒对您选的位置有些疑惑。<hpage>若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: 这是什麽啊！我们有一个灵活的伙伴。无限 （Infinite）<hpage>我对挑战殖民野心的墙壁非常感兴趣。我们已经到达这个地方 ， 但我很想知道你选择了哪里。<hpage>如果你正在寻找一个竞争对手 ， 选择一个不太远的地方。很少有昆虫能爬到这么远的洞穴里。<page>这可能是真的 ， 但一旦你明白了 ， 理想是什么 ？这具巨大的骨头尸体离国家农场很远。<page>你可以自由地测试你的速度和敏捷性。你可以在这里竞争。<page>挑战者？你想做这样的事情吗？我希望我的愿望能实现！让我们一起探索边界！
secondary_translated_text: What is this? We have a flexible partner. Infinite (Infinite)<hpage>I am very interested in challenging the walls of colonial ambition. We have arrived at this place, but I would love to know where you chose.<hpage>If you are looking for a competitor, choose a place that is not too far away. Few insects can climb into caves so far.<page>This may be true, but once you understand, what is the ideal? The huge bone corpse is far from the national farm.<page>You are free to test your speed and agility. You can compete here.<page>Challenger? Do you want to do something like this? I hope my wish can come true! Let's explore the boundaries together!

original_en_text: Uahhhhh... So close... Nuu could almost taste it.
translated_text: 是的， 这是非常接近， 你可以步行。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, it's very close and you can walk.

original_en_text: Ho! Are you observing them too, hunter? The red-shells are plentiful here, stalking these vast grassy plains and the last of its bony beasts.<page>Compared to the caves below, this lush growth feels even greater. Have we crawled close to the source of their sustenance?<page>I must discover its secret! I will! By my father’s wish, and for hope that our dying lands might find means to endure.<hpage>Just be careful, young one. I urge you. Here you’ve reached the ants’ heart-domain.<hpage>There may be discoveries worth making, but a single mistake will see your shell’s sharp end.
original_zh_text: 嘿！你也在观察红壳怪吗？它们在这片原野上猎杀最后的骨兽。<page>这里的植物比下面的洞穴更茂盛，难道接近能量源了？<page>我必须找到源头！对！不止是为了父亲的遗愿，也是为了这片大地存续的希望！<hpage>要小心，小虫子。此处是蚁族的核心区域。<hpage>或许能有宝贵发现，但走错一步就会丢了性命。
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！“你在看猎人吗 ？ ”“在宽阔的牧场和最后一只骨头野兽之间 ， 有一个红色的贝壳。<page>这种茂密的生长感觉比下面的洞穴要好得多。<page>我们必须揭露这个秘密！你必须这么做！在天父的愿望和希望下 ， 我们驾驭死亡的土地 ， 并且可以找到生存的道路。<hpage>我们来到了蚂蚁的心脏。<hpage>您可能会发现一些有价值的发现 ， 但错误可能会使外壳变得锋利。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! "Are you looking at hunters? "Between the broad pasture and the last bone beast, there was a red shell.<page>This dense growth feels much better than the caves below.<page>We must expose this secret! You have to do this! With the will and hope of the Father, we control the land of death and can find the way to survive.<hpage>We have come to the heart of the ant.<hpage>You may find some valuable discoveries, but mistakes can sharpen the shell.

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, opened the way forward for us!<page>What luck for us to meet at this moment! We can set off on the great road together!<page>Or p’raps I’ll tarry here just a little longer. I want to sing a song of gratitude to this noble gate!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘快看！骨门听见歌声，为我们让路了！<page>能在这相遇多有缘呀！我们可以结伴踏上圣途！<page>不过我想再再待会儿，给这好骨门唱首感恩曲！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。你看到这个了吗？红色的老妇人 ， 大门 ， 倾听我的歌声 ， 以无限的慈悲为我们开辟道路！<page>我很幸运现在见到你！我们一起度过了一段伟大的旅程！<page>让我们为这座高贵的大门唱一首感恩之歌！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Do you see this? Red old woman, door, listen to my song, open the way for us with infinite mercy!<page>I'm lucky to see you now! We had a great journey together!<page>Let us sing a song of thanks for this noble gate!

original_en_text: In these lands names are given freely, are they not? I am Shakra, Wielding Rings. If our hunts intertwine again, I will have new maps to trade.<page>Until then, farewell, Child Wielding Needle.
original_zh_text: 在这地方，名字都起的很随意，对吧？我是沙克拉，驭环者。要是能再碰上，会准备好新地图卖给你。<page>后会有期，使针的小姑娘。
translated_text: 在我们的国家 ， 你不太自由地说出你的名字吗 ？你是一个脉轮 ， 一枚戒指。当狩猎恢复时 ， 您将收到一张新地图。<page>告别带着针的孩子。
secondary_translated_text: Don't you say your name too freely in our country? You are a chakra, a ring. When hunting resumes, you will receive a new map.<page>Say goodbye to the child with the needle.

original_en_text: This place is holy, yes... but I worry at the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. So many are hurt or exhausted!<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not heal them, little one.<hpage>If you would aid your fellows, you can start by dressing their wounds. The simple rags found around the settlement will do for bandages.<page>Oh, that’s an excellent idea, red maiden! Normally I’d think a song would suffice, but... yes, more direct action is certainly needed.<page>And the Citadel itself shall provide the materials! Praise be to this holiest of holy places!
original_zh_text: 这里虽然是圣地……可看着同袍受苦真难受！<hpage>光着急没用。<hpage>若想帮忙，可以先从包扎开始。找点破布当绷带吧。<page>好主意！我平常就知道唱歌……这次得动真格了！<page>材料圣堡里随便找！圣地就是灵验！
translated_text: 这是神圣的 ， 但我们担心我们的朝圣者。<hpage>你的怀疑和担忧不会治愈你 ， 孩子。<hpage>如果你想帮助一个朋友 ， 那就从治愈伤口开始。在膝盖周围使用简单的布料作为调味品。<page>通常 ， 我认为一首歌就足够了 ， 但我需要更直接的行动。<page>堡垒将下令祝福这个神圣的地方。
secondary_translated_text: It is sacred, but we are worried about our pilgrims.<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not cure you, son.<hpage>If you want to help a friend, start by healing the wound. Use a simple cloth around your knees as a seasoning.<page>Usually, I think one song is enough, but I need more direct action.<page>The fort will order blessings on this sacred place.

original_en_text: Fear not, brothers and sisters! If we work hard and keep our faith, the Citadel will provide for us... I have no doubt!
original_zh_text: 兄弟姐妹别怕！只要我们勤勉且守住信念，圣堡不会亏待我们……肯定不会！
translated_text: 兄弟姐妹们 ， 不要害怕。如果我们努力工作并保持忠诚 ， 上帝会滋养我们。
secondary_translated_text: Brothers and sisters, don't be afraid. If we work hard and stay faithful, God will nourish us.

original_en_text: <page=M>The hearts you seek, we can share their locations as best we know.<page=M>Three will be needed to construct our spell and draw clear memory of the flower from your Silk.<page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们会把知道的古心位置尽数相告。<page=M>我们需要三颗心来施咒，从您的灵丝中抽出花影。<page=S>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=M>如果您正在寻找心脏， 我们将尽最大努力与您分享这个地方。<page=M>你需要三个人来构建我们的咒语 ， 并为你的丝绸之花带来生动的回忆。<page=S>亲爱的朋友们 ， 请把你们的心给我。最后 ， 我失败了。在保留这些记忆之前 ， 让我们来看看被遗忘的昆虫的地球力量。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>If you are looking for a heart, we will do our best to share this place with you.<page=M>You need three people to build our mantra and bring vivid memories to your silk flowers.<page=S>Dear friends, please give me your hearts. In the end, I failed. Before retaining these memories, let's take a look at the earth power of the forgotten insects.

translated_text: 戒指来了。
secondary_translated_text: Here comes the ring.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... A test was needed, to ensure my strength before a greater challenge soon to come.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只年迈的巨蚁……她刚死没多久，可她却出现在这里……<page>那是她本人吗？难道真是她？支撑这些洞穴的力量究竟是什么？若真如此，如今会发生什么？<hpage>它们终将枯萎凋零……你也许会含泪明白，是我手中的针了结了她的生命。<page>这位姑娘，你？可为什么？为什么要摧残这般珍贵的东西？<hpage>这事难以三言两语解释……在更大的考验来临前，我必须通过试炼，证明自身的力量。<hpage>终有一日，这些洞穴或许能重新焕发生机，甚至繁盛昌荣。但那重生之路，漫长艰难，超越一生又一生。<hpage>而这份重任，便要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子。
translated_text: 这只巨大的蚂蚁看起来最近死了 ， 但它在这里。<page>是你吗 ？嗯 ， 对吧 ？什么样的力量支撑着这个洞穴 ？如果是这样的话 ， 未来会发生什么 ？<hpage>他们消失了 ， 他们消失了 ， 不幸的是 ， 我的针杀死了她。<page>“是你吗 ， 小姐 ？ ”为什么呢？你在寻找这么重要的东西吗 ？<hpage>这很难简单地解释 ， 但面对我们面临的巨大挑战 ， 我们需要测试来展示我们的实力。<hpage>随着时间的推移 ， 洞穴看到了再次成长和繁荣的机会 ， 但再生可能是一项艰巨的任务。<hpage>如果你想成功 ， 你必须依靠像你这样的昆虫播下第一颗种子。
secondary_translated_text: This giant ant appears to have died recently, but here it is.<page>Is that you? Yeah, right? What forces support this cave? If so, what will happen in the future?<hpage>They disappeared, they disappeared, and unfortunately, my needle killed her.<page>"Is that you, miss? "Why? Are you looking for something so important?<hpage>It's hard to explain simply, but faced with the huge challenges we face, we need testing to show our strength.<hpage>Over time, the cave sees an opportunity to grow and prosper again, but regeneration can be a difficult task.<hpage>If you want to succeed, you must rely on insects like you to plant the first seed.

original_en_text: Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的隧道网。到处是他们的仓库和冥想室，方便在野地快速移动。
translated_text: 红北路的洞穴散落着商店和神社 ， 隧道迅速穿过下面的田野。
secondary_translated_text: The caves on Hongbei Road are dotted with shops and shrines, and the tunnel quickly cuts through the fields below.

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要下潜并斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>如果我想跳过并将地球从黑暗的诅咒中分离出来 ， 我必须首先找到一种方法来追逐入侵者。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I wanted to skip and separate the earth from the curse of darkness, I had to first find a way to chase the invaders.

original_en_text: So I am freed, despite no request of mine for aid.<hpage>And I do not ask gratitude. The key merely fit the lock. If you choose, stay in here and wait till your shell hardens to crust.<page>No. I shall depart shortly. With my way clear, my wish again propels me, though I tried to avoid it.<hpage>Then safe journey, tall bug. I’ll not pry further. Clearly you bear your own burden.
original_zh_text: 我未曾求救，倒也被放出来了。<hpage>不必道谢，钥匙碰巧能用罢了。若想留在这，请自便。<page>不，我这就走。前路已通，纵使逃避，他的遗愿仍会推着我前行。<hpage>那便祝你一路顺利。看得出你有重担在身，我无意深究。
translated_text: 我被释放了 ， 没有寻求帮助。<hpage>这把钥匙只会打开锁 ， 你必须呆在这里 ， 直到你的水槽关闭。<page>我的道路是清晰的 ， 我试图避免它 ， 但我的愿望让我回来了。<hpage>很棒的旅程 ， 可爱的昆虫！我不会再学习了。你把你的重量扛在肩上。
secondary_translated_text: I was released without seeking help.<hpage>This key will only open the lock and you must stay here until your sink closes.<page>My path was clear and I tried to avoid it, but my wish brought me back.<hpage>Great trip, lovely insects! I won't study anymore. You carry your weight on your shoulders.

original_en_text: Mm, mrm? Oh, hoy again!<page>I hadn’t meant to drop off like that. It’s hard to stay awake in such a cosy place, isn’t it?
original_zh_text: 唔嗯？哎呀又睡着了！<page>这地方太舒服了，让人犯困，你说是吧？
translated_text: 这是什么 ？嗨 ， 他们回来了！<page>很难在这样一个舒适的地方醒来， 不是吗？
secondary_translated_text: What is this? Hey, they're back!<page>It's hard to wake up in such a comfortable place, isn't it?

original_en_text: Oh hear me pray, please hear me sing,<br>My path’s ahead, but here’s the thing,<br>I can’t squeeze past, o gate of bone,<br>So please wake up, and help...oh?
original_zh_text: 听我祈祷，听我歌唱，<br>前路虽近骨门却挡，<br>求您醒来助我闯荡……哦？
translated_text: 听我的祷告 ， 听我的歌。<br>我的路就在我面前 ， 但他就在那里。<br>你不能通过骨头的门进入。<br>“起来 ， 帮帮我。” 实际上？
secondary_translated_text: Listen to my prayers, listen to my songs.<br>My path is right in front of me, but he is there.<br>You cannot enter through the bone door.<br>"Get up and help me." Actually?

original_en_text: <page=M>Up top of those caves lost to wind and sand rests a crusted old ruler, a once great warrior king.<page=M>In their prime, they and their order held half of Pharloom under hardened claw. Some bugs relished that strength. Most lived in fear of it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>在风沙侵蚀的洞窟顶端，藏着位甲壳斑驳的老暴君。<page=M>全盛时他与部族以铁爪统治半个纺络。有人仰慕其强权，更多则活在恐惧中。
translated_text: <page=M>在沙子覆盖的山洞顶部 ， 有一位疲惫的老君主 ， 他曾经是一位伟大的战士和国王。<page=M>在他们的巅峰时期 ， 他们和他们的指挥官用他们的爪子控制了帕拉姆的一半。昆虫喜欢这种能量。大多数人都生活在恐惧和恐惧中。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>At the top of the sand-covered cave, there was a tired old monarch who had been a great soldier and king.<page=M>At their peak, they and their commanders controlled half of Param with their claws. Insects love this energy. Most people live in fear and terror.

original_en_text: Oooh ma! Sweet surprise for Nuu! You are adult, yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 哇哦大姐姐！努努好惊喜！你已经长大了对吧？完全体？能打猎了吧？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: 哦 ， 妈妈！联合国的惊喜很棒 ， 你是个成年人 ， 对吧 ？事实上？总增长？“你准备好打猎了吗 ？ ”»<hpage>我不是孩子 ， 当然。<page>更多在这里。你必须许一个愿望！» 为此 ， 你可以在灯塔里找到很多新鲜的昆虫 ， 并切割它们。<page>你用刀子割断了它！用一颗成熟的心摧毁它 ， 测试一颗成熟的心。<page>你需要帮助南希吗？你能带一个卷轴来填写你的编辑知识页面吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Oh, mom! The U. N. Surprise is great. You're an adult, right? Actually? Total growth? "Are you ready to hunt?”»<hpage>I'm not a child, of course.<page>More here. You must make a wish!" To do this, you can find a lot of fresh insects in the lighthouse and cut them.<page>You cut it with a knife! Destroy it with a mature heart and test a mature heart.<page>Do you need help Nancy? Can you bring a scroll to fill out your editing knowledge page?

original_en_text: Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip?<hpage>I’ve no intent to disturb, sir bug. I am merely passing these towers and sought to better understand the lay of the place.<page>Hmmph! Knowing the battlefield? A warrior’s reason! Just look at you! Your stance and blade, almost alone they declare a fight.<page>As the bravest of knights, if direct challenge were offered, honour would see noble Garmond accept!<page>Fortunate that seems not your intent. In truth, I’m still sleeping off something of an altercation myself. Had our meeting called for a knightly duel, you’d not have had the luck to behold my finest form.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！歹徒！谁敢打扰勇者加蒙德的美梦？<hpage>无意冒犯，只是路过这座塔想探探路。<page>哼！勘察战场？战士的借口！看你这架势就是来找架打的！<page>作为最勇猛的骑士，要决斗我奉陪！<page>算你走运，我还没睡醒。真要决斗你可打不过全盛期的我！
translated_text: 师傅！哦 ， 我的上帝。哦 ， 天哪！恶魔！谁会把勇敢的哈蒙德从他急需的睡眠中唤醒 ？<hpage>不间断地 ， 恩塞托先生 ， 我穿过塔楼 ， 以便更好地了解这个地方。<page>哦 ， 我的上帝！你知道战场吗？但是 ， 一个士兵有一个理由 ， 而他的位置和刀片是宣战的唯一理由。<page>作为最勇敢的骑士 ， 如果他曾经挑战过自己 ， 哈蒙德勋爵会同意的！<page>愤怒不是你的意图 ， 它不是你的意图。事实上 ， 在这次讨论中 ， 我睡着了。如果这是一场骑士决斗 ， 你不会更好地看到我。
secondary_translated_text: Master! Oh, my God. Oh, my God! Demon! Who will wake brave Hammond from the sleep he desperately needs?<hpage>Without interruption, Mr. Enseto, I walked through the tower in order to better understand the place.<page>Oh, my God! Do you know the battlefield? But a soldier has a reason, and his position and blade are the only reason to declare war.<page>As the bravest knight, if he had ever challenged him, Lord Hammond would have agreed!<page>Anger is not your intention, it is not your intention. In fact, I fell asleep during this discussion. If this were a knight's duel, you wouldn't see me better.

original_en_text: Hoy then, what’s a fancy-prancy bug like you creepin’ into Grindle’s cosy little nook for?<page>Heard we had some nice stuff, did ya? O-hoho! All kinds of tasty goodies find their way here, that’s for sure.<hpage>I care little for how you procured your goods, thief. If you have something worth trading, I may part with my rosaries.<page>Well, we never say no to a fair swap, heh heh! Now take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 哦嚯！阔气虫，你溜进格林德尔的宝窝想干嘛？<page>是不是听说我这有好货？哦嚯嚯！那可不，宝贝们都是自己溜进来的！<hpage>我不在乎你的货怎么来的，如果有好东西，我拿念珠来换。<page>成交！不过我们可不做赔本买卖，嚯嚯！你先随便看看吧……
translated_text: 嘿 ， 你觉得怎么样？当你爬上格林代尔舒适的角落时 ， 美妙的昆虫看起来像什么 ？<page>我听说你有一个好男孩， 不是吗？真的吗？哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！在这里 ， 你会发现很多美味的食物。<hpage>无论你如何购买它 ， 如果有什么值得交换的东西 ， 你可以扔掉。<page>没有人对公平贸易说 “不 ”让我们看看我们有什么。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, what do you think? What does the wonderful insect look like when you climb into the comfortable corner of Greendale?<page>I hear you have a nice boy, don't you? Really? Oh, Oh, Oh! Here, you will find a lot of delicious food.<hpage>No matter how you buy it, if there is anything worth exchanging, you can throw it away.<page>No one says "no" to fair trade. Let's see what we have.

original_en_text: Now I shall remain, and train. And know! Though I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to grace my track, as many times as you wish.
original_zh_text: 我要继续训练了！不过记着，虽然没其他奖品了，但随时欢迎你来赛道上奔跑！
translated_text: 我会做的 ， 我知道。没有什么比这更好的了 ， 但如果你愿意 ， 请加入我们。
secondary_translated_text: I will do it, I know. There is nothing better than this, but if you want, please join us.

original_en_text: The sharp-faced bugs of these drizzled caves love to swoop and play, don’t they? If only I could understand their beautiful language...
original_zh_text: 这些尖脸虫就爱在雨里扑腾。要是能听懂它们的语言多好……
translated_text: 雾洞里的酸性昆虫喜欢潜水和玩耍 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？我希望我能理解你美丽的语言。
secondary_translated_text: Acid insects in fog holes like to dive and play, don't they? Actually? I wish I could understand your beautiful language.

original_en_text: ...At the bottom of a well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those who look forward...<page>...Those echoes may guide you still. Yes, that’s true. For the kind-hearted, a weapon can also be a friend...<page>...You’re so eager to follow in her footsteps. But what are you leaving for those who come next?
original_zh_text: ……身居井底唯见上方。沉湎过往者难窥前路……<page>……余音仍可指明方向。善者手中，利器亦可为友……<page>……你执着追随她的足迹。可曾为后来者留有余地？……
translated_text: ...在井的深处 ， 你只能看到过去是隐藏的那些谁看到未来。<page>...这种感觉让你感动。是的 ， 是的 ， 是的。一个好人可以有一把枪作为朋友。<page>...他真的想追随他的脚步。你想留下什么给下一个？
secondary_translated_text: ... Deep in the well, you can only see the past that is hidden by those who see the future.<page>... This feeling moves you. Yes, yes, yes. A good person can have a gun as a friend.<page>... He really wanted to follow in his footsteps. What do you want to leave for the next one?

translated_text: Bilworth 唐飞
secondary_translated_text: Bilworth Map

original_en_text: Hoof... Always you impress... nimble bug...<page>As many times as you may, let us speed forth! Gladly will I strive to match your spritely grace.
original_zh_text: 呼……每次都被你惊艳……<page>想再比赛的话随时奉陪！我一定要追上你！
translated_text: 我感觉到了。你总是令人印象深刻 ， 它是一个非常快的昆虫。<page>尽可能快地赶快。我想像你一样好。
secondary_translated_text: I feel it. You are always impressive, it is a very fast insect.<page>Hurry as quickly as possible. I want to be as good as you.

original_en_text: This poor traveller finds her resolve waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse I scarcely heard it!<page>’Tis no cause for worry, though. My song will lift her from her torpor! Join your voice with mine, red maiden, and together we shall rouse our fellow pilgrim!
original_zh_text: 这位同袍意志消沉，初遇时她嗓音沙哑，几乎听不见！<page>莫慌！我的歌声能唤醒她！红衣姑娘一起唱，唤起这位同路人！
translated_text: 可怜的旅行者注意到他的决心减弱了。当我第一次问候她时 ， 我几乎听不见她。<page>别担心 ， 我的音乐会会把你从瘫痪中解救出来。红色的女人 ， 你和我一起 ， 我们将唤醒朝圣者！
secondary_translated_text: The poor traveler noticed that his determination had weakened. When I first greeted her, I could hardly hear her.<page>Don't worry, my concert will save you from paralysis. Red woman, you and I, we will awaken the pilgrims!

original_en_text: In time, even these great steps will be swept away by the sands. Nothing is immovable.
original_zh_text: 再大的台阶也迟早被风沙埋了，没有什么是永恒的。
translated_text: 随着时间的推移 ， 即使是这个巨大的梯子也会被拖进沙子里。
secondary_translated_text: Over time, even this huge ladder will be dragged into the sand.

original_en_text: Ooh ma ma! Look here, miss grown-up! Very fascinating creature here, all dead in bits now, but still good!<page>She takes the shape of the woods for her body, and her hair like bitter leaves! Clever, thinks Nuu!<hpage>This creature staked its territory here and attacked as I passed through.<hpage>You should not linger long. Her tribe remains hidden amongst the branches, disguised and waiting to strike.<page>Oooh! So the cutting-up was done by you? Nuu gives her warm thanks! Now Nuu can inspect this creature well, all its gooey insides and crunchy shell!
original_zh_text: 哇！大姐姐快看！这只死透的怪物超有趣！<page>身体像树干，头发像苦叶子！努努觉得它超聪明！<hpage>这生物占据此处，袭击路人。<hpage>别久留，它的同族还在树丛里埋伏呢。<page>哇！是你干掉的？太感谢啦！现在可以好好研究它的粘液和脆壳了！
translated_text: 妈妈 ， 先生 ， 所有人。“这里的迷人生物已经死了 ， 但它们仍然很好！"<page>你的身体就像一片森林 ， 你的头发就像一片落叶。<hpage>这些生物在这里创造领土 ， 当他们经过时 ， 他们会攻击。<hpage>他的部落躲在树枝中 ， 等待攻击。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！你剪了吗 ？谢谢你的出席！来自地幔的光线使我们能够很好地研究这种生物 ， 包括它粘稠的内部空间和脆弱的外壳。
secondary_translated_text: Mom, sir, everyone. "The charming creatures here are dead, but they are still fine! "<page>Your body is like a forest, and your hair is like a fallen leaf.<hpage>These creatures create territory here, and when they pass by, they attack.<hpage>His tribe hid among branches, waiting to be attacked.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Did you cut it? Thank you for coming! Light from the mantle allows us to study this creature well, including its sticky interior space and fragile outer shell.

original_en_text: Oi! I’m wishin’ for that bothersome bellringer! That you readin’ this? Then head up top beside the shrine. Might be we two should have a little chat...
original_zh_text: 喂！我有事找那个烦人的敲钟者！你有看到吗？看到了就来上面钟殿找我。我们得聊两句……
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。我喜欢敲这个无聊的钟声 ， 你读了吗 ？我们在圣殿里 ， 我们可以互相交谈。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. I like ringing this boring bell. Have you read it? We are in the temple and we can talk to each other.

translated_text: 三重旋律的一部分留给了勤奋的建筑师。
secondary_translated_text: Part of the triple melody is left to hard-working architects.

original_en_text: The Pollen Heart has been claimed from Nyleth.

secondary_translated_text: Go back to the key next to the safe.

secondary_translated_text: There is not much time, and this is proof.

original_en_text: Flintbeetles have awoken in the Marrow. The gems that grow in their bellies provide a pure, constant warmth. Harvest these treasures and be rewarded!
original_zh_text: 髓骨洞窟的燧甲虫苏醒了，它们腹中的宝石能提供纯净恒温。收割这些宝物换取奖励吧！
translated_text: 胃中生长的珍珠提供干净而持久的热量。寻找宝藏并获得奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Pearls growing in the stomach provide clean and long-lasting calories. Find treasure and earn rewards.

original_en_text: Confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
translated_text: 让我们面对那些在农场受苦的人。
secondary_translated_text: Let's face those who suffer on the farm.

translated_text: 复印派对 （ Copy Party ）
secondary_translated_text: Copy Party

translated_text: Nami Utopia 的面具
secondary_translated_text: Mask of Nami Utopia

original_en_text: Find aid in Deep Docks to access its diving bell and descend beneath Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在深坞寻求帮助并找到潜钟以潜入纺络之下。
translated_text: 在深水码头寻求帮助 ， 进入潜水钟 ， 然后下到灯塔下。
secondary_translated_text: Ask for help at the deepwater terminal, get into the diving bell, and then get down under the lighthouse.

original_en_text: If the world is truly ending, I would test my pin in combat one last time. Come to my home at border’s edge and accept my challenge!
original_zh_text: 若世界真要终结，我希望最后一次用针证明自己。来边境小屋接受挑战！
translated_text: 如果世界真的被摧毁了 ， 我会在最后的战斗中测试这个符号。来到我家 ， 在边界尽头 ， 接受我的挑战！
secondary_translated_text: If the world was really destroyed, I would test this symbol in the final battle. Come to my home, at the end of the border, and accept my challenge!

translated_text: 安静的房间。
secondary_translated_text: Quiet room.

translated_text: 这是一个致命的决定。
secondary_translated_text: This was a fatal decision.

translated_text: Burhart 的家。
secondary_translated_text: Burhart's home.

original_en_text: Investigate the resting sites marked by Steel Seer Zi to uncover the location of her vassal.

translated_text: 探索马克的安息之地 ， 找出汉塞尔的人在哪里。
secondary_translated_text: Explore Mark's resting place and find out where Hansel's people are.

translated_text: Bernhardt 住宅
secondary_translated_text: Bernhardt House

secondary_translated_text: I had just returned to Grahammore and was talking to Crick.

translated_text: 他试图通过在 Berhardt 的墙上连接一根管子来赚钱。
secondary_translated_text: He tried to make money by attaching a pipe to Berhardt's wall.

original_en_text: Ascend through the lands of Pharloom and reach the Citadel at the kingdom’s peak.

translated_text: 他们将穿越帕洛姆的土地 ， 到达位于王国顶部的城堡。
secondary_translated_text: They will travel through the land of Palome to the castle at the top of the kingdom.

secondary_translated_text: Volatility in China

translated_text: 警察的良心。
secondary_translated_text: The conscience of the police.

original_en_text: Those blasted crawbugs are fouling up my roof! I’ve come up with a clever solution to keep them away, but I’ll need some help. Enquire at the Halfway Home if you’re fit for the task.
original_zh_text: 那些该死的腐囊虫弄脏了我的屋顶！我有个绝妙的解决办法，但需要帮助。有能力者请来中途酒馆洽谈。
translated_text: 这家伙在屋顶上搞砸了！我已经找到了一个很好的解决方案来阻止他们 ， 但我需要帮助。
secondary_translated_text: This guy blew it on the roof! I've found a great solution to stop them, but I need help.

translated_text: 你需要许个愿吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Do you need to make a wish?

original_zh_text: 寻找送货员蒂普的踪迹。<br><br>他最后出现在甲木林下层。
translated_text: 搜索邮箱并跟踪其位置。<br><br>Tip Tip Tip Tip 最后一次出现在 Lower Sherwood 。

original_zh_text: 那些在外游荡的癫狂朝圣者……其披肩对骸底镇大有用处。诛灭此等暴虐之徒，实为赐予慈悲解脱！

secondary_translated_text: Violent pilgrims, streets without spiritual pollution, wearing veils deep into the bones.

translated_text: 在浅水的海岸上 ， 有一条通往灯塔的小路。

translated_text: 他说 ： “把你的旧心带走。
secondary_translated_text: He said: "Take your old heart away.

translated_text: 三重旋律的一部分留给了这个人。
secondary_translated_text: Part of the triple melody was left to this man.

secondary_translated_text: Nomi Musk's caravan

original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交育母之眼领取奖励。
translated_text: 她的羊的眼睛变成了对太阳能墙的渴望 ， 她得到了报酬。
secondary_translated_text: Her sheep's eyes turned to longing for a solar wall, and she was paid.

translated_text: 最快的就是光。
secondary_translated_text: The fastest thing is light.

original_en_text: Fragile egg containing a young Silkeater Queen. Though the Queen cannot gather Silk itself, with time and care it could be raised to breed more Silkeaters.
original_zh_text: 内含噬丝蛆女王的脆弱虫卵。虽不能自行收集灵丝，但培养后可繁殖更多噬丝蛆。
translated_text: 在一个脆弱的鸡蛋里面 ， 有一个年轻的丝绸女王。女王不能单独采摘丝绸 ， 但如果她有特殊的时间和注意力 ， 她可以繁殖和繁殖更多的丝绸。
secondary_translated_text: Inside a fragile egg, there is a young silk queen. The Queen cannot pick silk alone, but if she has special time and attention, she can breed and reproduce more silk.

translated_text: 别名 ： The Thanklove
secondary_translated_text: Title: The Thanksgiving

translated_text: 格雷特尔城堡 （Gretel Castle）
secondary_translated_text: Gretel Castle

secondary_translated_text: Belhart's Peacock

secondary_translated_text: Martian Manhunter
