original_zh_text: 将扭曲的畸芽缚于体内。
translated_text: 按错了按钮。
secondary_translated_text: I pressed the wrong button.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, I have caught fresh scent of my master in those stricken swamps beside the Citadel. I ask you now to follow, to meet together at trail’s end.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，我在圣堡旁的沼泽嗅到了导师的新踪迹。请随我一同前往踪迹终点。
translated_text: 作为一只老鹰的孩子 ， 他在城堡附近的荒凉沼泽中闻到了主人新鲜的气味。
secondary_translated_text: As the child of an eagle, he smelled his owner's fresh scent in the desolate swamp near the castle.

original_en_text: Return to Fleamaster Mooshka of the Flea Caravan, in the Marrow.
original_zh_text: 返回髓骨洞窟向穆什卡复命。
translated_text: 他回到了跳蚤大篷车。回到巴黎的骨髓 ， 跳蚤之王。
secondary_translated_text: He returned to the flea caravan. Back to the bone marrow of Paris, the king of fleas.

original_en_text: As was warned long ago, the black times have come. There is one last act to perform. Meet us at what was once called Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 正如古老预言警示，黑暗时代已至，但尚存最后一幕等待上演。请前往曾经的蚤托邦。
translated_text: 正如我所说的 ， 黑暗时代已经到来 ， 最后一幕已经到来。让自己发现曾经被称为 “糟糕的乌托邦 ” 的东西。
secondary_translated_text: As I said, the dark ages have arrived and the last scene has arrived. Allow yourself to discover what was once called "bad utopia."

translated_text: The Whisper Dome 附近酒店
secondary_translated_text: Hotels near The Whisper Dome

translated_text: 骨髓是什么 ？
secondary_translated_text: What is bone marrow?

translated_text: 奖励 （Award）
secondary_translated_text: Reward (Award)

original_en_text: Search for traces of the merchant, Jubilana, and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen near the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 寻找朱比拉娜的踪迹。<br><br>她最后出现在圣堡忆廊附近。
translated_text: 他们正在寻找商人 Zubilee ， 并追踪他的位置。<br><br>纪念日最后一次出现在城堡纪念碑附近。
secondary_translated_text: They are looking for businessman Zubilee and tracking his location.<br><br>Memorial Day was last seen near the castle monument.

translated_text: 愿望实现了。
secondary_translated_text: The wish came true.

translated_text: 其他朝圣者
secondary_translated_text: other pilgrims

translated_text: 这个展览已经完成了。
secondary_translated_text: This exhibition is complete.

original_en_text: Our dear merchant left to scavenge treasures from the Citadel’s Memorium. She’s been gone far too long. Please make sure she’s safe!
original_zh_text: 我们的商人去圣堡忆廊寻宝后失踪太久，请确认她的安全！
translated_text: 我们宝贵的商人去挖掘城堡纪念碑的宝藏。你很久以前就离开了。
secondary_translated_text: Our precious merchants went to dig for the treasures of the castle monument. You left a long time ago.

original_en_text: Seek out the distressed bug near the Blasted Steps Bellway.
original_zh_text: 在蚀阶钟道附近寻找遇险者。
translated_text: 在贝尔维尤爆炸性的楼梯附近寻找危险的昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: Look for dangerous insects near Bellevue's explosive staircase.

original_en_text: Give the Spine Cores to the Seamstress waiting in Far Fields.
original_zh_text: 将棘刺芯交给在远野等待的裁缝。
translated_text: 将柱芯移动到远程应力场时钟。
secondary_translated_text: Move the column core to the remote stress field clock.

original_en_text: Collect Plasmium from Plasmium buds in the lower Wormways.<br><br>Plasmium can be extracted from buds using a fully charged stab from the Needle Phial tool.
original_zh_text: 在沙噬虫道下层的生质花苞上收集生质液。<br><br>使用蓄满力的储液注射器抽取。
translated_text: 下一个蠕虫将从 Plasma Minimizza 的逃生蠕虫中收集等离子体。<br><br>带有针的工具用于液化刺 ， 然后从树枝中提取血浆。
secondary_translated_text: The next worm will collect plasma from the escape worms from Plasma Minimizza.<br><br>Tools with needles are used to liquefy the thorns and then extract plasma from the branches.

translated_text: 液体墨水类型
secondary_translated_text: Liquid ink type

translated_text: 伯恩哈德的进球。
secondary_translated_text: Bernhard's goal.

translated_text: 从房间到房间
secondary_translated_text: from room to room

original_zh_text: 在圣堡核心的雕像前演奏三重旋律。
translated_text: 在城堡中心的雕像前演奏 “三旋 ” 。
secondary_translated_text: Play the "triple spin" in front of the statue in the center of the castle.

translated_text: 钱已经交了 ” 。
secondary_translated_text: The money has been paid."

translated_text: 他们祈祷玫瑰经来帮助宋卡人民。
secondary_translated_text: They prayed for the rosary to help the people of Songkhla.

original_en_text: Travel to Pinstress’s home at the far edge of Blasted Steps and accept her challenge.
original_zh_text: 前往蚀阶边缘的针姬居所，接受她的挑战。
translated_text: 在爆炸性的游行结束时 ， 他去了 Pinstress 的家 ， 接受了他的挑战。
secondary_translated_text: At the end of the explosive march, he went to Pinstress's home and accepted his challenge.

translated_text: 器官石 （ Organo Stone ）
secondary_translated_text: Organo Stone

translated_text: 贝尔哈特 （ Belhardt ）
secondary_translated_text: Belhardt

translated_text: 自由的乌托邦。
secondary_translated_text: A free utopia.

translated_text: 猎人。
secondary_translated_text: Hunter.

original_zh_text: 将物资送至费耶山的面甲匠。
translated_text: 面具制造商被移交给 Faisan 。
secondary_translated_text: The mask manufacturer was handed over to Faisan.

original_zh_text: 捐献甲壳碎片帮助建造希望丰碑。
translated_text: 我们将为您提供一个外壳 ， 帮助您创建自己的偶像。
secondary_translated_text: We will provide you with a shell to help you create your own idol.

original_en_text: Turn in the Grass Doll to Bellhart’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向钟心镇祈愿墙提交草娃娃领取奖励
translated_text: 传递一个娃娃在柏哈特的愿望墙上 ， 并获得奖品。
secondary_translated_text: Pass a doll on Burhart's Wish Wall and receive a prize.

translated_text: 钢铁烧烤。
secondary_translated_text: Steel barbecue.

original_en_text: Sweetness! Sourness! Bitterness! I need it all with hastiness! If you have the precious fruits, come to me in Mosshome and share all you have!
original_zh_text: 甜味！酸味！苦味！我要所有莓果！如果有珍果，到苔栖乡找我分享！
translated_text: 一大片酸！疼痛 ， 继续前进！如果你有珍贵的水果 ， 来莫索 ， 分享你所拥有的！
secondary_translated_text: A large area of acid! Pain, keep moving! If you have precious fruits, come to Moso and share what you have!

original_en_text: Present the filled out Hunter’s Journal to Nuu at the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 向灰沼中途酒馆的努努出示完整猎手日志。
translated_text: 猎人的日记描述了格里莫瓦家中的一只昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: The hunter's diary describes an insect in Grimois's home.

original_zh_text: 与蚤托邦的跳蚤首领穆什卡交谈。
translated_text: 自由的乌托邦正在寻找一个伪装的老师。
secondary_translated_text: The Utopia of freedom is looking for a teacher in disguise.

original_zh_text: 远野的飞毛腿斯威夫特
translated_text: 奔向远方的田野。
secondary_translated_text: Run to the distant fields.

original_zh_text: 在圣堡鎏金穹顶寻找指挥家的旋律。
translated_text: 从城堡的金色高处寻找表演的旋律。
secondary_translated_text: Find the melody of the performance from the golden heights of the castle.

translated_text: 我的钱包不见了。
secondary_translated_text: My wallet is missing.

original_en_text: Give the Plasmified Blood to the Alchemist at the top of the Wormways.
original_zh_text: 将生质血交给沙噬虫道顶部的炼金师。
translated_text: 请将您的血浆捐献给 Vermes 山顶的炼金术士。
secondary_translated_text: Please donate your plasma to the alchemist on top of Vermes.

translated_text: 谢尔伍德的烤架
secondary_translated_text: Shelwood's grill

translated_text: 删除 crawbug 。
secondary_translated_text: Remove crawbug.

secondary_translated_text: The survivors 'camp is the bone marrow.

translated_text: 他输了。
secondary_translated_text: He lost.

original_en_text: Learn the Threefold Melody and open the path to the Citadel’s crest.
original_zh_text: 学会三重旋律的三个部分，开启通往圣堡核心的道路。
translated_text: 学习三重旋律 ， 然后去城堡顶部。
secondary_translated_text: Learn the triple melody and go to the top of the castle.

translated_text: 在森林的中间。
secondary_translated_text: In the middle of the forest.

original_en_text: Confront the Caretaker and his family in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 在骸底镇旁的颓败教堂直面看守者及其家族。
translated_text: 一座废弃的教堂 ， 靠近骨头的底部 ， 站在警卫和他们的家人面前。
secondary_translated_text: An abandoned church, near the bottom of the bones, stood in front of guards and their families.

translated_text: 这就是保罗收集稀有食物的地方。
secondary_translated_text: This is where Paul collects rare foods.

translated_text: 休息的朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: Rest pilgrims.

translated_text: 他们一起收集。
secondary_translated_text: They collect together.

original_en_text: The Architect’s Melody has been learned.
translated_text: 我听了建筑师的歌。
secondary_translated_text: I listened to the song of the architect.

original_en_text: Deliver to Mergwin in Choral Chambers.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至圣咏殿的梅尔格温。
translated_text: 我向合唱团的 Mel Gwyn 致敬。
secondary_translated_text: I pay tribute to Mel Gwyn of the choir.

original_en_text: Hunt Crawbugs in Greymoor and collect their Ragpelt.
original_zh_text: 猎杀灰沼腐囊虫并收集破毛皮。
translated_text: 他们捕食螃蟹 ， 并在阴影中收集碎片。
secondary_translated_text: They prey on crabs and collect debris in the shadows.

original_en_text: The Conductor’s Melody has been learned.
translated_text: 控制旋律的方向。
secondary_translated_text: Control the direction of the melody.

original_en_text: Our settlement sits defenceless! No more! When the worst comes, we must stand ready. Bring us pins of the choirbugs, those blades still sharp and strong.
original_zh_text: 我们的聚落需要防卫！带来机枢咏者的锋利尖钉。
translated_text: 我们的系统不能容忍这种情况。当最坏的情况发生时 ， 我们必须做好准备。叶子仍然锋利而强壮 ， 以恢复角虫的脊柱。
secondary_translated_text: Our system cannot tolerate this situation. When the worst happens, we must be prepared. The leaves remain sharp and strong to restore the hornworm's spine.

translated_text: 门 （ 门 ）
secondary_translated_text: door (door)

translated_text: 迷失的奴隶？
secondary_translated_text: A lost slave?

translated_text: 关于 El Beretic
secondary_translated_text: About El Beretic

original_en_text: Track down Flintbeetles in the Marrow and defeat them to collect Flintgems.<br><br>Flintbeetles can be tracked by their stone-sheddings and their aromatic dung.
original_zh_text: 在髓骨洞窟追踪并击败燧甲虫收集燧晶。<br><br>可通过石屑和带香味的粪便追踪。
translated_text: 跟随 Flintby 到骨头 ， 击败他们 ， 收集 Flint 的宝石。<br><br>它的厚度可以追溯到石头碎片或粪便气味碎片。
secondary_translated_text: Follow Flint to Bones, defeat them, and collect Flint's gems.<br><br>Its thickness can be traced back to stone fragments or feces odor fragments.

original_en_text: Search for traces of the merchant, Jubilana, and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen in the lower Choral Chambers.
original_zh_text: 寻找商人朱比拉娜的踪迹。<br><br>她最后出现在圣咏殿下层。
translated_text: 他们正在寻找商人 Zubilee ， 并追踪他的位置。<br><br>最后 ， Zubillie 出现在一楼的小号室。
secondary_translated_text: They are looking for businessman Zubilee and tracking his location.<br><br>Finally, Zubillie appeared in the trumpet room on the first floor.

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to complete the rebuilding of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 捐献念珠完成钟心镇重建。
translated_text: 他们祈祷玫瑰经 ， 以完成伯哈特的重建。
secondary_translated_text: They prayed for the Rosary to complete the reconstruction of Burhart.

translated_text: 这是一个希望的标志。
secondary_translated_text: This is a sign of hope.

translated_text: 银色的运动。
secondary_translated_text: Silver movement.

translated_text: 关于 frey
secondary_translated_text: About frey

original_en_text: Acquire Steel Spines from Crull and Benjin in Sinner’s Road so Yarnaby can remove the parasite.
original_zh_text: 从罪途的克鲁尔与班金身上获取钢棘用于寄生体清除。
translated_text: Kurul 和 Benjin 在罪人的路上买了一个勺子 ， 这样 Yarnabi 就能摆脱寄生虫。
secondary_translated_text: Kurul and Benjin bought a spoon on Sinners 'Road so Yarnabi could get rid of the parasite.

original_zh_text: 向盟地看守者运送补给。
translated_text: 保护我的侄子。
secondary_translated_text: Protect my nephew.

original_en_text: Give the Ragpelt to Creige of the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 将破毛皮交给灰沼中途酒馆的克雷吉。
translated_text: 他把毛巾递给克里克 ， 克里克又回到了格拉莫尔。
secondary_translated_text: He handed Crick the towel, and Crick returned to Gramore.

translated_text: 资产 （Asset）
secondary_translated_text: Asset

original_zh_text: 将苍白油交给钟心镇的普林尼。
translated_text: 柴油运输到 Bernhardt Prinius 。
secondary_translated_text: Diesel oil is transported to Bernhardt Prinius.

original_en_text: Horrible cries have been heard from that prison beside the Citadel. What profanities must be happening within to cause such awful sound?
original_zh_text: 圣堡旁的监狱传出可怕哀嚎，里面究竟发生了什么？
translated_text: 我听到可怕的尖叫声从监狱旁边的城堡。
secondary_translated_text: I heard terrible screams from the castle next to the prison.

translated_text: 隐藏结果。
secondary_translated_text: Hide results.

original_zh_text: 使用深坞的潜钟潜入纺络之下。
translated_text: 您可以使用 Deep Dock Bell 进入农场。
secondary_translated_text: You can access the farm using the Deep Dock Bell.

secondary_translated_text: Sanklaves House

translated_text: 地面的黑暗。
secondary_translated_text: The darkness of the ground.

translated_text: 较低的水平。
secondary_translated_text: Lower level.

original_en_text: How do all of these wretched, lost bugs keep finding their way here?! Each hungry and squalling for shelter! We need more rosaries, so empty your pockets.
original_zh_text: 为什么总有迷途的可怜虫找到这里？！我们需要更多念珠，快掏空你的口袋！
translated_text: 为什么这只消失的小昆虫要找你 ？每个人都在挨饿 ， 他们正在为避难所付钱。
secondary_translated_text: Why does this little disappeared insect want to find you? Everyone is starving and they are paying for shelter.

translated_text: 黑暗的心。
secondary_translated_text: Dark heart.

original_en_text: Track down the wailing creature in the Slab and slay it.<br><br>The creature can be tracked by its slime trail.
original_zh_text: 追踪并击杀罪石牢狱的哀嚎生物。<br><br>可以通过生物的黏液痕迹追踪。
translated_text: 找到一个在桌子上哭泣的生物并杀死它。<br><br>微生物可以在粘液中检测到。
secondary_translated_text: Find a creature crying on the table and kill it.<br><br>Microorganisms can be detected in mucus.

original_en_text: Hard forged spines, intended for use in heavy machinery and able to pierce through even the toughest shell.
original_zh_text: 锻造尖刺，专门用在重型机械上，连最硬的甲壳都能扎穿。
translated_text: 重型机械中使用的硬锻造脊柱即使在最硬的外壳中也可以穿孔。
secondary_translated_text: Hard-forged spines used in heavy machinery can be perforated even in the hardest shells.

translated_text: 请打开它。
secondary_translated_text: Please open it.

original_en_text: Return to the Snail Shamans in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 返回骸底镇旁的颓败教堂寻找蜗牛萨满。
translated_text: 萨满 — 最终回到教堂废墟附近的骨头底部。
secondary_translated_text: Shaman-Eventually returns to the bottom of the bones near the ruins of the church.

original_zh_text: 清除纺络各地的虚空聚合体。
translated_text: 他摧毁了整个法鲁市。
secondary_translated_text: He destroyed the entire city of Faro.

original_en_text: Hunt pin-wielding choirbugs of the Citadel and collect Fine Pins.
original_zh_text: 猎杀机枢咏者并收集精致刺针。
translated_text: 随着唱诗班的到来 ， 歌手朱迪摇动松树 ， 为城堡收集珍贵的松树。
secondary_translated_text: With the arrival of the choir, singer Judy rocks the pine trees to collect precious pine trees for the castle.

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to the Fleamaster Mooshka in Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 向跳蚤首领穆什卡运送补给。
translated_text: 《自由大师 ： 马斯卡的乌托邦》
secondary_translated_text: Master of Liberty: Masca's Utopia

original_zh_text: 沙噬虫道炼金师奇洛托。
translated_text: Wormway Alchemist 就是其中之一。
secondary_translated_text: Wormway Alchemist is one of them.

original_en_text: Deliver the Steel Spines to Yarnaby in Greymoor so they can remove the parasite.
original_zh_text: 将钢棘交给灰沼的雅纳碧进行手术。
translated_text: 他们将厌氧钢的尖端移到一个灰坑中以杀死寄生虫。
secondary_translated_text: They moved the tip of the anaerobic steel into an ash pit to kill the parasite.

secondary_translated_text: The widow's businessman.

translated_text: L 'ecstasy （ 英文 ）
secondary_translated_text: L'ecstasis (English)

translated_text: 让我们回到乌托邦
secondary_translated_text: Let's go back to Utopia

secondary_translated_text: Pensioner's assistant

secondary_translated_text: According to Songclave.

translated_text: 关于 Mosso Medro
secondary_translated_text: About Mosso Medro

original_en_text: Turn in the Shining Cogs to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交闪亮齿轮领取奖励。
translated_text: 闪闪发光的牙齿冲向宋卡的愿望墙 ， 并获得奖品。
secondary_translated_text: Shimmering teeth rush to Songkhla's wish wall and win a prize.

translated_text: 愿意妥协。
secondary_translated_text: Willing to compromise.

translated_text: 他们正在学习。
secondary_translated_text: They are learning.

translated_text: 一切都结束了！
secondary_translated_text: It's over!

original_en_text: I’ve heard tell pilgrims sometimes fall down that big hole beside the settlement. Nasty way to end your journey, before it even begins. I could build a bridge, if I only had the materials!
original_zh_text: 听说有些朝圣者会掉进聚居地旁边的大坑里，还没开始旅程就悲惨结束。如果有材料，我可以造座桥！
translated_text: 据说 ， 朝圣者有时会掉进定居点附近的大洞里。这是一个艰难的方式来结束之前的旅程开始。如果你有足够的材料 ， 你可以做你的腿。
secondary_translated_text: It is said that pilgrims sometimes fall into large holes near settlements. This is a difficult way to end before the journey begins. If you have enough material, you can make your legs.

translated_text: 白色君主制。
secondary_translated_text: White monarchy.

original_en_text: One part of the Threefold Melody, entrusted to the secretive Vaultkeepers.
original_zh_text: 三重旋律之一，托付给了神秘的书库管理员。
translated_text: 三重旋律的一部分被送到神秘的守卫。
secondary_translated_text: Part of the triple melody is sent to the mysterious guard.

original_en_text: Our haunted brethren wandering the great halls still wear their fine white cloaks. This settlement would greatly benefit from their protection. Please fetch some for us!
original_zh_text: 那些游荡在外的同袍们，至今仍披完好的白色外衣。如果能拿到这些外衣，大家就更安全了！请帮我们带一些回来！
translated_text: 我们的幽灵兄弟总是穿着柔软的白色外套走在走廊里。这种解决方案在保护方面有更大的帮助。请给我拿点东西。"
secondary_translated_text: Our ghost brothers always walk down the corridors wearing soft white coats. This solution is more helpful in terms of protection. Please bring me something. "

original_en_text: Turn in the Flintgems to Bone Bottom’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向骸底镇祈愿墙提交燧晶领取奖励。
translated_text: 如果你把克里姆林宫送到 Bone Bottom 的欲望墙上 ， 你会得到奖励。
secondary_translated_text: If you send the Kremlin to Bone Bottom's Wall of Desire, you will be rewarded.

original_en_text: Deliver the Roach Guts to Crull and Benjin of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 将蟑螂内脏交给罪途的克鲁尔与班金。
translated_text: 将昆虫器官捐赠给罪人进行循环和主要路径。
secondary_translated_text: Donating insect organs to sinners goes through the circulation and main path.

translated_text: 他说他正在进入你的心。
secondary_translated_text: He said he was entering your heart.

original_en_text: Give the Pollip Hearts to Greyroot of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 将花芯交给壳木林的灰蕨。
translated_text: 她穿着皮革的衣服 ， 走在灰色的街道上 ， 拥抱保罗的心。
secondary_translated_text: Wearing leather, she walked down the gray street, hugging Paul's heart.

original_en_text: Collect Pollip Hearts from the purple flowers of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 从甲木林的紫色花朵中收集花芯。
translated_text: 从树皮树上的紫罗兰花收集息肉。
secondary_translated_text: Collect polyps from violet flowers on bark trees.

original_en_text: Give the collected Plasmium to the Alchemist at the top of the Wormways.
original_zh_text: 将生质液交给沙噬虫道顶部的炼金师。
translated_text: 我把收集到的勺子交给了虫洞上方的炼金术士。
secondary_translated_text: I handed the spoons I collected to the alchemist above the wormhole.

translated_text: 最后的公众。
secondary_translated_text: The last public.

translated_text: Olio Pin Master （ 油针大师 ）
secondary_translated_text: Olio Pin Master

translated_text: Faro 说道 ：
secondary_translated_text: Faro said:

original_en_text: The old merchant pilgrim, Jubilana, was seen wandering down in the Choral Chambers, but she never made it up here. Has some foul fortune befallen her?
original_zh_text: 据说老商贩朱比拉娜在圣咏殿下层徘徊，但她从未到达这里。她遭遇不幸了吗？
translated_text: 人们可以看到一个古老的朝圣商人穿过唱诗班参加禧年 ， 但他不在那里。
secondary_translated_text: One can see an ancient pilgrim merchant walking through the choir to attend the Jubilee, but he is not there.

original_en_text: A huge red-shell stole my precious keepsake and disappeared into the fields! Please chase down the thief and recover my treasure!
original_zh_text: 有个红壳大块头偷走了我的草娃娃并逃进原野！请追回我的宝物！
translated_text: 一个巨大的红色贝壳偷走了一件珍贵的纪念品 ， 然后从乡村消失了！追赶小偷 ， 拿走宝藏。
secondary_translated_text: A huge red shell stole a precious souvenir and disappeared from the countryside! Chasing the thief and taking away the treasure.

original_en_text: Find Pinstress on the stormward side of Mount Fay and defeat her in battle.
original_zh_text: 在费耶山风暴面找到针姬并击败她。
translated_text: 在山坡的荒凉一侧 ， Pi 遇到了在战斗中被击倒的 Finza 。
secondary_translated_text: On the desolate side of the hillside, Pi encounters Fenza, who is knocked down in battle.

original_en_text: Harken, ye holy! Our home has been cleansed of evil, but now we are tasked with restoring its former glory! Share your rosaries with us, that the work may begin.
original_zh_text: 聆听吧虔信者们！我们的家园净化了邪恶，现在要重现昔日荣光！捐献念珠助力重建吧！
translated_text: 我们的国家已经被邪恶洗净 ， 但现在我们的任务是让它恢复昔日的荣耀。
secondary_translated_text: Our country has been cleansed of evil, but now our task is to restore it to its former glory.

translated_text: 第二名哨兵。
secondary_translated_text: Second sentry.

original_en_text: Deliver the rare delicacies to Mergwin in the dining chamber of the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 将稀有美食交给圣堡餐厅的梅尔格温。
translated_text: 城堡内的餐厅供应来自 Meigen 的稀有菜肴。
secondary_translated_text: The restaurant in the castle serves rare dishes from Meigen.

translated_text: 他们正在学习。
secondary_translated_text: They are learning.

translated_text: 等待到最后一刻。
secondary_translated_text: Wait until the last moment.

original_en_text: Search the mechanised core of the Citadel for the melody of the Architects.
original_zh_text: 在圣堡机械核心寻找建筑师的旋律。
translated_text: 在城堡的机械化中心发现建筑师的旋律。
secondary_translated_text: Discover the architect's melody in the mechanized center of the castle.

translated_text: 基金 （ 基金 ）
secondary_translated_text: Fund (Fund)

translated_text: 我借给他了。
secondary_translated_text: I lent it to him.

original_en_text: Venture inside the Citadel and confront the veiled bugs.
original_zh_text: 潜入圣堡内部，直面覆面之虫
translated_text: 进入城堡与隐藏的昆虫作斗争。
secondary_translated_text: Enter the castle to fight hidden insects.

translated_text: 发光的牙齿
secondary_translated_text: Glowing teeth

translated_text: 《力量的心》
secondary_translated_text: "Heart of Power"

original_en_text: Attend this Sentinel’s request, Hunter in Red. Meet in halls high, the chamber of its fellows. The way shall be marked.
original_zh_text: 红衣猎手，应戍卫要求前往高庭，在其族裔群聚之厅会面，路径已有标记。
translated_text: 红色猎人的房间是朋友的房间。你会看到一个指南。
secondary_translated_text: The Red Hunter's room is a friend's room. You will see a guide.

translated_text: Sanklaves 住宅
secondary_translated_text: Sanklaves House

translated_text: 法老的味道。
secondary_translated_text: The smell of Pharaoh.

translated_text: 费希尔 （Fayhill）
secondary_translated_text: Fayhill

original_en_text: I am Mooshka, humble stranger to this land and master of the Flea Caravan! I wish for aid, that all fleas may travel safely together!
original_zh_text: 我是穆什卡，这片土地的新来者，也是跳蚤旅团的主事！希望能得到帮助，让所有跳蚤都能安全同行！
translated_text: 我就是 Musk 。一个卑微的陌生人 ， 住在这片土地上 ， 一个跳蚤商队的主人！我们需要帮助 ， 以确保所有的跳蚤可以一起安全地移动！
secondary_translated_text: I am Musk. A humble stranger living in this land, the owner of a flea caravan! We need help to ensure that all fleas can move safely together!

original_en_text: Speak to Fleamaster Mooshka of the Flea Caravan, in the Marrow.

secondary_translated_text: Fleamaster Mooshka interviewed the Brain Flea Team.

original_en_text: For the sake of our ailing brothers and sisters, I will descend into the holy Whiteward and search for healing supplies. If you are able, please join me! Company will make the work much merrier.
original_zh_text: 为了生病的同伴，我将前往圣堡白愈厅寻找治疗物资。如果愿意，请与我同行！

translated_text: 谢谢你的复活！
secondary_translated_text: Thank you for your resurrection!

secondary_translated_text: for salvation

original_zh_text: 在焦热远野横冲直撞的兽蝇啊！愿你不再阻碍虔信者！愿你被神圣怒火击溃！

secondary_translated_text: If this place is a refuge for all stray insect repellents, then services and money are necessary. If you are reading this article, empty your pockets

secondary_translated_text: Kill many creatures in the pit and fill the Hunter's Diary.

original_en_text: The road is hard for we pilgrims. I want to build a beautiful symbol of hope, to stand beside Bone Bottom and welcome all those who are about to begin their long journey.
original_zh_text: 朝圣之路太过艰难。我想建造一座希望的象征，矗立在骸底镇用以指引即将开始艰苦旅程的朝圣者。

secondary_translated_text: I wanted to create a beautiful symbol of hope, welcoming all those who begin a long journey deep within the bones.

secondary_translated_text: It released fragments of the shell and rebuilt the surrounding bone base.

secondary_translated_text: He and Farham worked together to monitor the pilgrims and collect their tables.

original_zh_text: 在最黑暗的阴影中，真相终将显现。王国正咽下最后一口痛苦之气，而我们仍要完成演出。来圣堡剧台共赴苦难……

secondary_translated_text: In the deepest darkness, everything becomes clear. Those who stay will have to endure the pain of death.

secondary_translated_text: Cut the crown block from the wall of the main bone to earn a reward.

original_zh_text: 在纺络低地的苔藓区域收集苔莓。

secondary_translated_text: Not far away, friend.

original_zh_text: 已学会书库管理员的旋律。

secondary_translated_text: I learned the melody of "Vault Keepers".

original_en_text: Need help-help quick! Me brother Pill is gone missing, vanished somewhere in Greymoor! Please, to help me find-find him!

original_en_text: Search for traces of the pilgrim, Sherma, and track his location.<br><br>Sherma was travelling to the Citadel’s Whiteward.

original_en_text: When searching the bellveins carefully, you can sometimes find rare, silver bells. If we can salvage some, the material would be of great use!

translated_text: 如果你仔细观察这些物种 ， 你会发现一种罕见的银色物种。如果你能节省材料 ， 材料将是一个很大的帮助！
secondary_translated_text: If you look closely at these species, you will find a rare silvery species. If you can save materials, materials will be a big help!

original_en_text: Rise above the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 跨越圣堡之巅，直面灾厄之源。
translated_text: 去城堡 ， 面对那些污染农田的人。
secondary_translated_text: Go to the castle and face the people who pollute the farmland.

translated_text: 蒙弗罗伊 Monfroy
secondary_translated_text: Monfroy

translated_text: 修复花粉核。
secondary_translated_text: Repair pollen cores.

original_en_text: Track down the Savage Beastfly in the Far Fields and defeat it.<br><br>The Beastfly can be tracked by its shell sheddings and claw marks.
original_zh_text: 在远野追踪并击败兽蝇。<br><br>可通过外壳脱落物和爪痕追踪。
translated_text: 跟随一个远处飞行的野兽 ， 并击败它。<br><br>苍蝇可以在贝壳和下垂的腿上看到。
secondary_translated_text: Follow a distant flying beast and defeat it.<br><br>Flies can be seen on shells and drooping legs.

translated_text: 转移至下骨
secondary_translated_text: Metastasis to inferior bone

translated_text: 克拉夫的话。
secondary_translated_text: Kraough's words.

translated_text: 我怎么知道 ？
secondary_translated_text: How should I know?

original_en_text: Search for Shakra and her master in Bilewater.<br><br>Shakra can be tracked by her trail of rings.
original_zh_text: 在腐汁泽寻找沙克拉与其导师。<br><br>可通过她遗留的环状痕迹追踪。
translated_text: 他在比尔沃特遇到了沙克尔和他的老师。<br><br>沙库尔能够追踪到戒指。
secondary_translated_text: He met Shaker and his teacher in Bealwater.<br><br>Shakur was able to trace the ring.

translated_text: 骨骼弹药。
secondary_translated_text: Bone ammunition.

original_en_text: Be you nimble? Be you quick? If you would prove yourself Pharloom’s fastest bug, meet me at the furthest border of the Far Fields! With all haste!
original_zh_text: 身法够快？动作迅捷？若想证明自己是纺络最快的虫子，就来远野边际见我！刻不容缓！
translated_text: 它很快吗 ？我可以加快速度吗 ？如果你想证明自己是秘鲁最快的昆虫 ， 那么在费尔菲尔德最偏远的边境与我见面！快跑！
secondary_translated_text: Is it fast? Can I speed up? If you want to prove you are the fastest insect in Peru, meet me at Fairfield's most remote border! Run!

original_en_text: Give the Mossberries to the Druid of Mosshome.
original_zh_text: 将苔莓交给苔栖乡的德鲁伊。
translated_text: 机器人 Mashama Cocous 。
secondary_translated_text: Robot Mashama Cocous.

original_en_text: A distressed bug was heard calling for help near the Bellway atop the great sandy steps. Will no one come to the sad wretch’s aid?
original_zh_text: 在蚀阶顶部的钟道附近听到了求救声，难道没有能者帮助那个可怜虫吗？
translated_text: 我听到生病的昆虫在贝尔维尤附近的一个巨大的沙质楼梯上呼救。
secondary_translated_text: I heard sick insects calling for help on a huge sandy staircase near Bellevue.

original_en_text: Reach the source of the black threads within the Abyss.
original_zh_text: 在深渊中找到黑灾的源头。
translated_text: 移动到黑色下划线的原点。
secondary_translated_text: Move to the origin of the black underline.

translated_text: 骨骼弹药。
secondary_translated_text: Bone ammunition.

translated_text: Burhart 的重建
secondary_translated_text: Burhart's Reconstruction

original_en_text: Bring the old hearts to the Snail Shamans in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 将古老心脏带给颓败教堂的蜗牛萨满。
translated_text: 把这颗古老的心放在一个废弃的教堂的萨满教外壳里 ， 就在骨头的根部旁边。
secondary_translated_text: Place this ancient heart in the shaman shell of an abandoned church, next to the roots of the bones.

original_en_text: Achieve the high score in all Flea Games and become the Grand Champion.
original_zh_text: 在所有跳蚤游戏中夺得最高分，成为终极冠军。
translated_text: 在游戏中的每一个筹码上下注 ， 你将成为冠军。
secondary_translated_text: Bet on every chip in the game and you will become a champion.

translated_text: 失踪的使者
secondary_translated_text: The missing messenger

original_en_text: Break the silken curse ensnaring the town of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 破除缠绕钟心镇的丝缚诅咒。
translated_text: 摧毁困扰着伯哈特城的丝绸诅咒。
secondary_translated_text: Destroy the silk curse that plagued the city of Burhart.

original_en_text: Descend into the bellway and defeat the hostile creature within.
original_zh_text: 深入钟道，击败其中的凶恶生物。
translated_text: 进入时钟塔 ， 杀死敌人的生物。
secondary_translated_text: Enter the Clock Tower and kill enemy creatures.

translated_text: 法罗群岛皇冠 The Crown of Faroe Islands
secondary_translated_text: Faroe Islands The Crown of Faroe Islands

original_en_text: Fatty meat of indeterminate origin. Once prepared it will quickly spoil if not stored properly.
original_zh_text: 来源不明的肥肉，若不妥善保存会快速变质。
translated_text: 来源不明的肉 ， 如果在烹饪后不保存 ， 很快就会分解。
secondary_translated_text: Meat of unknown origin will quickly decompose if it is not preserved after cooking.

original_en_text: Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,
translated_text: 当王国掌握在教会的手中时 ，
secondary_translated_text: When the kingdom is in the hands of the Church,

original_en_text: Deliver the Queen’s Egg to Styx of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 将女王之卵交给罪途的奴仆。
translated_text: 你怎么能把女王的蛋给罪人呢 ？
secondary_translated_text: How can you give the queen's egg to a sinner?

translated_text: 在回家的路上大喊大叫。
secondary_translated_text: Screaming on the way home.

original_en_text: Hunt Cogworks in Cogwork Core and collect Shining Cogs.
original_zh_text: 猎杀机枢核心的机械虫并收集闪亮齿轮。
translated_text: 在 Cogwork 评分中找到 Cogworks ， 收集 Channing Cogworks 。
secondary_translated_text: Find Cogworks in Cogwork scores and collect Channing Cogworks.

translated_text: 制作公司 ： Songklav
secondary_translated_text: Production company: Songklav

original_en_text: Hunt cloaked choirbugs of the Citadel and collect Choir Cloaks from their bodies.
original_zh_text: 猎杀圣堡游荡的圣咏机兵并收集外衣。
translated_text: 在城堡狩猎合唱团 ， 收集合唱团的服装。
secondary_translated_text: At the Castle Hunt Choir, collect choir costumes.

original_en_text: Return to the Grand Gate and open the way to the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 返回巨扉圣门，叩启通往圣堡的道路。
translated_text: 打开通往城堡的道路 ， 然后回到大门。
secondary_translated_text: Open the road to the castle and return to the gate.

translated_text: 更新任务 （Update Task）
secondary_translated_text: Update Task

original_en_text: Investigate the ritual site beside Bonegrave.
original_zh_text: 调查骸冢旁的仪式地点。
translated_text: 查看 Bonigraves 附近的仪式场所。
secondary_translated_text: Check out the ceremony venues near Bonigraves.

original_en_text: The Encrusted Heart has been claimed from Crust King Khann.
original_zh_text: 已从壳王卡汗处获得壳王之心。
translated_text: 贝壳之王的心脏
secondary_translated_text: Heart of the King of Shell

translated_text: 女王的鸡蛋。
secondary_translated_text: Queen's eggs.

translated_text: 血的萨满。
secondary_translated_text: Shaman of blood.

original_en_text: A Skull Tyrant, largest of the Marrow’s loathsome bony predators, prowls the caves above the great path. Slay the beast and keep us all safe!
original_zh_text: 髓骨洞窟最巨大的骸骨掠食者——骷髅暴君正在上层洞穴游荡。斩杀它以保大家平安！
translated_text: 骨头暴君 ， 骨髓中最可恨的捕食者 ， 在街上徘徊。杀死野兽 ， 拯救我们所有人。"
secondary_translated_text: The Bone Tyrant, the most hateful predator in the bone marrow, roams the streets. Kill the beast and save us all. "

translated_text: 返回汽车 （ 上 ）
secondary_translated_text: Return to the car (Part 1)

translated_text: 合唱团的斗篷
secondary_translated_text: The cloak of the choir

translated_text: Faro 说道 ：
secondary_translated_text: Faro said:

translated_text: 远处的朱利安。
secondary_translated_text: Julian in the distance.

translated_text: 罪人的道路。
secondary_translated_text: The path of sinners.

original_en_text: Track the one who stole Gilly’s keepsake near the Bellshrine between Deep Docks and Far Fields.
original_zh_text: 追踪在深坞与远野之间的钟殿附近偷走吉莉纪念品的窃贼。
translated_text: 跟随一个人在 Shin Hai 和 Palpa 之间的钟楼神庙附近偷走了一个公会令牌。
secondary_translated_text: Following a man and stole a guild token near the Bell Tower Temple between Shin Hai and Palpa.

translated_text: 丝绸和灵魂
secondary_translated_text: Silk and soul

translated_text: 调查结果 （ 结果 ）
secondary_translated_text: Survey results (results)

translated_text: 最后一跳。
secondary_translated_text: Last jump.

original_en_text: Scale the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 攀登圣堡，直面萦绕纺络的灾厄。
translated_text: 去城堡 ， 面对那些污染农田的人。
secondary_translated_text: Go to the castle and face the people who pollute the farmland.

translated_text: 一个可怕的暴政
secondary_translated_text: A terrible tyranny

translated_text: 弹性裂变；
secondary_translated_text: elastic fission;

original_en_text: Pale glaze used in the preparation and protection of bone masks.
original_zh_text: 用于骨甲面甲制备和防护的苍白涂料。
translated_text: 一种用于准备和保护骨面具的轻质搪瓷。
secondary_translated_text: A lightweight enamel used to prepare and protect bone masks.

original_en_text: Give the collected components to the Caretaker of Songclave.
original_zh_text: 将收集的组件交给圣歌盟地看守者。
translated_text: 他把钱交给买家。
secondary_translated_text: He gave the money to the buyer.

translated_text: 地面的黑暗。
secondary_translated_text: The darkness of the ground.

translated_text: 距离的压力；
secondary_translated_text: The pressure of distance;

original_en_text: A lotta repairs to be done around here, but I need more materials! All I wish for is some shell shards so I can get to work. Not asking too much, am I?
original_zh_text: 这里有很多东西要修理，但我需要更多材料！我只想要些甲壳碎片来开工，这要求不过分吧？
translated_text: 有足够的空间进行维修。我需要更多的材料！我希望你有一些小事情可以开始。
secondary_translated_text: There is enough space for repairs. I need more materials! I hope you have some small things to start with.

original_en_text: My dear little courier was last seen in Shellwood. Please someone, find Tipp and send him home, along with all of his precious stock!
original_zh_text: 我的小送货员最后一次出现在甲木林，请帮忙找到蒂普并送他回家，还有他那些珍贵的货物！
translated_text: 我最喜欢的信使最后一次出现在舍伍德。有人把他送回家 ， 带着贵重物品去找一个疯子！
secondary_translated_text: My favorite messenger was last seen in Sherwood. Someone sent him home with valuables to find a madman!

original_en_text: Such horror upon the roads! Those black mounds formed of husks and bugs, corrupting everything around. If only someone would cut them down and grant the poor souls their rest!
original_zh_text: 道路上的恐怖景象！那些由空壳与虫尸堆成的黑色肿块，正腐蚀周边一切。希望有人能斩除它们，让可怜的灵魂安息！
translated_text: 这条路很坏！黑贝壳和昆虫可能会在你周围腐烂 ， 如果有人能把它们砍下来 ， 让可怜的灵魂休息！"
secondary_translated_text: This road is bad! Black shells and insects may rot around you, if someone could cut them down and give the poor soul a rest! "

translated_text: 他是活的血。
secondary_translated_text: He is living blood.

translated_text: Shi—hyun 镇
secondary_translated_text: Shi-hyun Town

original_en_text: Turn in the Choir Cloaks to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交圣咏外衣领取奖励。
translated_text: Soncrafts 的愿望得到了墙上唱诗班的奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Soncrafts 'wish was rewarded by the wall choir.

translated_text: 美丽的！
secondary_translated_text: Beautiful!

original_en_text: Track the Second Sentinel by their markers left near Songclave.
original_zh_text: 通过圣歌盟地附近的标记追踪次席戍卫。
translated_text: 跟随第二个警卫 ， 然后跟随左侧购买旁边的标志。
secondary_translated_text: Follow the second guard, then follow the sign next to the purchase on the left.

original_en_text: Collect Silver Bells in the bellvein tunnels above and below Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 在钟心镇上下的钟脉收集银光铃铛。
translated_text: 收集银色的钟从上部和下部的钟道。
secondary_translated_text: Collect silver bells from the upper and lower bell lanes.

translated_text: 大使俄罗斯
secondary_translated_text: Ambassador Russia

original_en_text: Deliver to Styx of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至罪途的奴仆。
translated_text: 这是罪人的罪。
secondary_translated_text: This is the sin of sinners.

original_en_text: Use tools to acquire organs of various types so Runt may feed.
original_zh_text: 使用工具获取各类器官喂养幼兽。
translated_text: 您可以使用这些工具快速收集各种器官。
secondary_translated_text: You can use these tools to quickly collect various organs.

translated_text: Bernhardt 住宅
secondary_translated_text: Bernhardt House

original_en_text: Here they limply lay, the castaways and the disillusioned and the used-up.<page>It’s a sorry settlement you’ve summoned, miss bellringer, and a blasted bother for me. Not sure we have anything to offer ‘em... Not even hope.
original_zh_text: 看看这些疲惫的虫子，不是漂泊一生，就是失去信念。<page>敲钟者小姐，你搞出来的这个避难所真是大麻烦，我还得伺候这帮难民……我们连丁点希望都给不起。
translated_text: 他们无能为力 ， 受害者 ， 失望和疲惫。<page>M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A. A.贝林格 ， 你提出的解决方案没有成功 ， 给我带来了很大的不适。
secondary_translated_text: They are powerless, victims, disappointed and exhausted.<page>M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A. A. Bellinger, the solution you proposed failed and caused me a lot of discomfort.

original_en_text: Ready the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血……
translated_text: 我正在准备针。在下面寻找血浆细菌。<page>我正在为菲尔尽我所能 ， 深深地推进等离子体。
secondary_translated_text: I'm preparing the needle. Look for plasma bacteria below.<page>I'm doing everything I can for Phil to push the plasma deeply.

original_en_text: Assistant... to learn more of Plasmium’s wonders... I know what we must do... <page>The bugs below... who have imbibed the substance... and evolved... their bodies are full with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 助手……想更了解生质液……我知道该怎么办了……<page>下面那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: 我的助手了解了更多关于等离子体的奇迹。<page>如果你喝这种物质 ， 你的身体会充满由血浆组成的血液。<page>为了提取珍贵的蜂蜜 ， 您需要使用紫色针。仔细检查一下我能学到更多吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: My assistant learned more about the miracle of plasma.<page>If you drink this substance, your body will be filled with blood composed of plasma.<page>To extract precious honey, you need to use purple needles. Can I learn more by checking it carefully?

original_en_text: The bugs below who have imbibed the substance and evolved... their bodies are filled with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: 昆虫吸收并发育这些物质。它们的身体充满了血浆中形成的血液。<page>为了提取珍贵的蜂蜜 ， 您需要使用紫色针。请您仔细检查。你能学到更多吗？
secondary_translated_text: Insects absorb and develop these substances. Their bodies are filled with blood formed in plasma.<page>To extract precious honey, you need to use purple needles. Please check carefully. Can you learn more?

original_en_text: What fear arrests you...? This must be done... or we will never learn the deeper truth... Never become what is needed...
original_zh_text: 怕什么？……不这么做……永远不懂真相……永远无法进化……
translated_text: 是什么恐惧阻止了他？我们必须这么做。否则 ， 你将无法掌握深刻的真理 ， 你将无法成为你需要成为的人。
secondary_translated_text: What fear stopped him? We have to do this. Otherwise, you will not be able to grasp the profound truth, and you will not be the person you need to be.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract their Plasmified Blood.<page>Once we have it... we can peer deeper... learn more... enlighten ourselves fully...
original_zh_text: 啊……好助手……拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血。<page>有了它……我们能更深入……学习……完全开悟……
translated_text: 哦 ， 是的 ， 对。他的助手很忠诚。拿着针的座位。请在下面搜索血浆细菌。<page>我会尽我所能为菲利普。<page>一旦你有了它 ， 你可以更仔细地看它。足够的鼓励。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, yeah, right. His assistant is loyal. Seat with needle. Please search for plasma bacteria below.<page>I will do everything I can for Philip.<page>Once you have it, you can look at it more closely. Enough encouragement.

original_en_text: <hpage>The roaches outside, why are they kept in pens? They seem a dangerous creature to cage or tame.<page=S>Us moorbugs gotta eat, don’t we? They’re wild fast breeders, them Muckroaches. Hard shells and tough meat, if you can even crack ‘em open, but options ain’t plentiful so we ain’t choosy.<page=S>Ain’t so bad to eat, once you’re used to it. The guts is the best bit, but them’s a choice cut and we ain’t had it for ages now.<page=L>Har har, life is tough all right! Benj’n here’s wasting away before us, poor wretch!<page=L>Tugs at your emotions, eh missy? How ‘bout you put that poker to good use? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts. There’d be fair trade waitin’ for you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头的蟑螂为何要圈养？此等凶兽关起来有什么好处？<page=S>我们这些沼地的虫子总得吃饭吧？淤秽蟑螂繁殖得贼快。虽然壳硬肉糙，破开都费劲，但我们也没得挑嘛。<page=S>吃惯了也倒还行。内脏最香，但这种精贵部位我们早八百年没尝过了。<page=L>哈！日子苦啊！瞧班金这体格，已经饿得瘦骨伶仃了！<page=L>是不是很可怜我们啊，小姐？要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <hpage>为什么蟑螂被关在围栏里 ？他们就像危险的生物 ， 不能被监禁或驯服。<page=S>吃昆虫 ， 对吧 ？事实上？这些是硬壳和硬肉 ， 如果你能打开它 ， 你有很多选择 ， 所以你不会固执。<page=S>一旦你习惯了它 ， 你就不会再闻到难闻的气味。明胶是最好的 ， 但我已经很久没有吃了 ， 因为它是一种选择。<page=L>生活真的很辛苦！本杰明在他面前减肥了 ， 可怜的男孩！<page=L>感觉就在外面 ， 对吧 ？你在干什么？为什么不玩扑克呢 ？“你拿一只甲虫 ， 给自己买个好肚子。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Why are cockroaches kept in pens? They are like dangerous creatures that cannot be imprisoned or tamed.<page=S>Eating insects, right? Actually? These are hard shells and hard meat, and if you can open it, you have a lot of options, so you won't be stubborn.<page=S>Once you get used to it, you will no longer smell the bad smell. Gelatin is the best, but I haven't eaten it in a long time because it's an option.<page=L>Life is really hard! Benjamin lost weight in front of him, poor boy!<page=L>Feels like you're out there, right? What are you doing? Why not play poker? "You take a beetle and buy yourself a good belly.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have brought a Queen’s Egg, at request of Bellhart’s couriers. It was a hazardous journey, but the creature inside has made it here alive.<page>Sssssss! How sss-ssublime! To think that my dear misss-stress would be the one to deliver the preciousss package! I had feared for the competence of those feeble couriersss...<hpage>It surprises me to know you correspond with them. I must wonder where else you go and who else you speak to after you scurry back up into the darkness...<page>Ssss. My whispersss-ss travel far, misstressss. You need not worry yourssself with my comingsss and goingss-ss. All I do... is in your sssss-service.<page>And now, pleasssse... give her to me... the little queen!
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我应钟心镇送货员之请，带来了一枚女王之卵。路途虽险，但卵内的生物尚且还活着。<page>咝——！何等殊荣！竟然由主人亲自护送这样宝贵的包裹！奴才我早就觉得这些送货员无能了……<hpage>你与他们有过联系？这倒是让我惊讶。不知道你遁入这片黑暗后，还与哪些虫往来过……<page>咝——奴才的低语声能传得很远，主人您无需担心我的行踪。奴才所为……皆为效忠于您。<page>现在，恳请您……将小女王……交给我！
translated_text: <hpage>在信使贝尔哈特的要求下 ， 我带来了女王的蛋 ， 这是一次危险的旅程 ， 但住在里面的生物还活着。<page>S. S.太棒了！我认为是我亲爱的压力太太给我寄来了珍贵的行李！我担心邮局的弱点。<hpage>当我回到黑暗中时 ， 我想知道他在哪里 ， 他和谁说话。<page>” 我的声音已经走了很长的路， 夫人。你不必担心我的入口。<page>那是 Va！那是瓦！那是 Va！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>At the request of Messenger Berhart, I brought the Queen's eggs. It was a dangerous journey, but the creatures that lived in them were still alive.<page>S. S. Great! I think my dear stressed wife sent me precious luggage! I worry about the weakness of the post office.<hpage>When I went back into the darkness, I wondered where he was and who he was talking to.<page>"My voice has come a long way, ma 'am. You don't have to worry about my entrance.<page>That's Va! That's tiles! That's Va!

original_en_text: <hpage>The beasts outside and their masters alike are all ensnared by this land’s silken affliction. You are lucky bugs to have not succumbed.<page=L>The Haunting? Oh, we’s got that all worked out. Benj’n and me are a right pair of philosophers when we bend our minds to it.<page=L>It’s faith that gets you. It’s all caused by being too devout!<page=S>Yeah! Or maybe not bein’ devout enough!<page=L>Or maybe it’s safest not to think about it at all. Har har!
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头那些虫兽与其饲主都遭受丝咒侵蚀。二位未被沾染，实属侥幸。<page=L>丝咒？早研究透啦！班金和我可是哲学大师！<page=L>信仰过头的才会中招！全是虔诚惹的祸！<page=S>对！但如果不够虔诚，兴许也会中招！<page=L>要我说，最安全的办法就是别去瞎琢磨！哈！
translated_text: <hpage>这是一件好事 ， 在野兽和它们的主人之间 ， 在大地的丝绸之路的痛苦中 ， 你的内疚感并没有消失。<page=L>幽灵？如果你专注于这一刻 ， 本杰明和我都是伟大的哲学家。<page=L>吸引你的就是信仰。<page=S>哦 ， 是的！他们不相信宗教。<page=L>也许你能做的最安全的事情就是不要去想它。哈！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>It's a good thing that between the beasts and their masters, in the pain of the Silk Road of the earth, your guilt has not disappeared.<page=L>Ghost? If you focus on this moment, Benjamin and I are both great philosophers.<page=L>What attracts you is faith.<page=S>Oh, yes! They do not believe in religion.<page=L>Maybe the safest thing you can do is not think about it. Ha!

original_en_text: While you sss-stalk through the black-ravaged world, morsss-ssels will I grow. For the promiss-sse of what my misss-tress will become... I will toil, alwayssss...
original_zh_text: 只要主子您还在黑灾肆虐之地穿行，咝——奴才便会辛勤劳作，为主人进行培育。为主人脱胎换骨的承诺……咝——奴才至死方休！
translated_text: “我在黑人的荒凉中成长 ， 我成熟了一点 ， 我们将永远工作。
secondary_translated_text: "I grew up in the desolation of black people, I matured a little, and we will always work.

original_en_text: <page=S>It’s said the moors used to grow a bounty of fresh food, way back befores that Citadel set us about catchin’ their fallin’ thread.<page=S>Sounds right lovely, eh missy? Always eatin’, never troubled by no grumblin’ belly?<page=L>Har har! Yer like a hatchling, Benj’n! So given to fancies! <page=L>Now breedin’ roaches is what keeps us from starvin’. Dangerous work, and not the finest diet, but we ain’t complainin’.<page=L>Specially as more and more of them keepers are succumbing to the strange sickness. Only means more meat for us. Har!
original_zh_text: <page=S>传说在圣堡逼我们捡拾掉落的丝线之前，沼地也曾盛产新鲜美食。<page=S>听着多美啊，小姐。一天到晚地吃，不用担心饿肚子。<page=L>哈！班金，你是刚破卵的吗？净做白日梦！<page=L>现在我们只能靠养蟑螂混口饭吃。这活危险，伙食差，但我们从不抱怨。<page=L>你看吧，越来越多的监管者都染上怪病。但往好处想，对我们来说，肉倒是更加管够了！哈！
translated_text: <page=S>据说 ， 在城堡提供线索之前 ， 咬人已经种植了大量的新鲜食物。<page=S>听起来很好。不 ， 不 ， 夫人 ？你是否总是对食物感到紧张或愤怒 ？<page=L>哈！本杰明 ， 你就像一只鸟 ， 你会被幻想所吸引。<page=L>今天 ， 繁殖昆虫不饿。工作是危险的 ， 食物是不好的。但我不会抱怨。<page=L>特别是 ， 越来越多的农民死于这种奇怪的疾病。这意味着更多的肉。"
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>It is said that before the castle provided clues, bite people had grown a large amount of fresh food.<page=S>Sounds great. No, no, ma 'am? Are you always nervous or angry about food?<page=L>Ha! Benjamin, you are like a bird, you are attracted to fantasy.<page=L>Today, breeding insects are not hungry. Work is dangerous and food is bad. But I won't complain.<page=L>In particular, more and more farmers are dying of this strange disease. This means more meat. "

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re all fine here, miss. Content, like. P’raps it were time you made your way, eh?<page=S>Yeah, be on your way! And, erm, thanks for yer help there.
original_zh_text: <page=L>我俩在这儿好得很，小姐。差不多该动身了吧？<page=S>对，赶紧走！另外，呃……多谢帮忙。
translated_text: <page=L>- 好吧 ， 那个女孩被控制住了 ， 我的意思是 ， 现在你必须走你的路。<page=S>重复一遍 ， 谢谢你的工作。
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>- Well, the girl is under control, I mean, now you have to go your way.<page=S>I repeat, thank you for your work.

translated_text: 你想买钢铁吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Do you want to buy steel?

original_en_text: Sssss. Your hunger betrayssss-ss you, misstress. The morsel was not yet grown, but let it anger you not. I will grow you another... for I am your sss-ssslave.
original_zh_text: 咝——您看起来饥饿难耐了，主人。食物还未养成，请您息怒。奴才我继续努力……因为我永远是您的仆从。
translated_text: 你的饥饿背叛了你。压力太高了。我还没成熟 ， 但请不要生气。我会为你做另一个。我是你的奴隶。"
secondary_translated_text: Your hunger betrays you. The pressure is too high. I'm not mature yet, but please don't be angry. I will make another one for you. I am your slave. "

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my cutting down of those black masses aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意当你的主人。若清除那些黑暗之物帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞……？不行不行……咝——强者当纳弱者，弱者理应侍奉！奴才归您了，主人您必须庇护我！<page>快瞧奴才为您建的巢穴！专为恭迎您的到来！我强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: 谎言 ， 谎言！谎言 ， 谎言！谎言 ， 谎言！骗人！谎言！谎言！骗子！- 谎言 ， 谎言！谎言， 谎言！你问我 ， 你问我。我知道他们是你的。<hpage>如果我的黑色档案能帮到你 ， 那是个意外 ， 再见。<page>再见 ， 再见 ， 再见 ？较强者被称为弱者 ， 较弱者被称为 SS—SS 。我将是你的爱。"<page>“看我做了什么！“准备好迎接你心爱的妻子吧。<page>当你去打猎时 ， 你会帮助他们种植好东西 ， 但这项任务需要时间。你必须马上到我这里来。"

"<page>"Look what I did! "Get ready to welcome your beloved wife.<page>When you go hunting, you help them grow good things, but the task takes time. You must come to me immediately. "

original_en_text: <page=S>Wh... why the delay? You keepin’ them guts for yourself? Here, Crull, she’s goin’ back on her promise!<page=L>Har. Promises is easily broken. But then, so’s a lot of other things. How ‘bout you reconsider yer greed there, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=S>啧……怎么磨磨蹭蹭的？你想私吞内脏？克鲁尔，她反悔啦！<page=L>哈，承诺不就是易碎。虽然其他东西也挺易碎的。小姐，要不重新掂量下你这贪心值不值当？
translated_text: <page=S>这是...你为什么迟到了 ？你有勇气去做吗？“你在这里 ， 克莱尔 ， 你违背了诺言。<page=L>哈利的承诺很容易兑现。还有很多其他的。嗯 ， 对吧 ？你为什么不反思一下你的贪婪 ？

original_en_text: <page=S>Oi! You ain’t got the beads? Or you just not wantin’ to part with ‘em? <page=L>Hardly the time to be a miser, missy. You’re gonna be livin’ sick till you buy these spines from us.
original_zh_text: <page=S>喂！你是身上没念珠，还是舍不得花？<page=L>小姐，现在可不是抠门的时候！不买这些钢棘，你就只能继续病着了！
translated_text: <page=S>嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。你有珍珠吗 ？你想和他们分手吗 ？<page=L>现在不是穷人的时代。在你从我们这里买这个刺之前 ， 你会生病的。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Hey, hey, hey. Do you have pearls? Do you want to break up with them?<page=L>This is not the era of the poor. You'll get sick before you buy this thorn from us.

original_en_text: <hpage>Good bugs, I am here on request of the doctor Yarnaby. She requires spines forged of steel for a crucial operation.<page=L>Argh! Look at ‘er, Benj’n. She’s all sick like! If she’s wantin’, we’s gotta be gettin’ paid!<page=L>Ah! ‘Fraid the little one speaks true, missy. You might be ailin’, but we can’t be offerin’ charity. <page=L>We’re stockin’ the spines you need. You just gotta be ready to part with some beads!
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位，我受雅纳碧医生所托来到此处。她需要一些钢棘来完成一场重要的手术。<page=L>啊呀！班金快看，她病恹恹的！壳里缠着怪东西，手术是要给自己做的吧！<page=S>惨是惨，但咱的废料也是辛辛苦苦收集来的。想要就得掏钱！<page=L>唉！班金说得对，小姐。您虽然是病患，但我们不做慈善。<page=L>只要念珠够，钢棘有的是！

original_zh_text: 咝——！此等丝弦天籁，主人，这真是神迹……<hpage>这项技艺所有虫子皆可习得。你若愿意，也能精通。<page>不……仆从必须为主人培育食物。但这天籁之音……实在是令我感到抚慰……

original_en_text: <page=S>That smell! S’overwhelming! I ain’t never seen so many roach guts at once!<page=L>Benj’n, me old mate, get a grip on yerself. Har har!<page=L>Still, maybe this tool is enough for you to ‘member us by? A pointed weapon of me own makin’, from when I used to wrangle the Muckroaches meself. I bet you’ll get some good use from it.

original_zh_text: 回心转意了？明智的选择！没我帮忙你可走不远。
translated_text: 他 创造 了 我  ，   你 准 备 好 带 我 去 前 线 了 吗 ？它 在你 里 面 !“ 没有 我的 帮助  ，  你 走 不 远 。
secondary_translated_text: He created me,   Are you ready to take me to the front line? It's inside you! "You can't get far without my help.

original_en_text: I’ll grant you my courtesy, stray one. I’ll even offer aid where I’m able. Just don’t be hanging around too long.<page>I may not be a fan of that Citadel, but I’m smart enough to avoid its ire.
original_zh_text: 我愿意给你几分面子，浪游者。需要帮助时也会搭把手，但可别赖着不走。<page>我虽然厌恶圣堡，但可没傻到去触霉头。
translated_text: 我向你表达我的敬意。  让我和他谈谈。  哈尔正在尽最大努力让枪支远离。<page>您可能不是这款智能电视的粉丝 ， 但它足以让您品尝到这种空气。
secondary_translated_text: I want to pay tribute to you.  Let me talk to him.  Hal is doing his best to keep guns away.<page>You may not be a fan of this smart TV, but it is enough for you to taste the air.

original_zh_text: 喀 玛阿克。诺库 格日？
translated_text: 影子女 ？
secondary_translated_text: Shadow girl?

original_en_text: Back here again? It’s a strange pilgrimage that bends and doubles back on itself. Still, you may as well take the opportunity to share your rosaries.
original_zh_text: 又绕回来了？没见过像你这样在朝圣路上兜兜转转的。不过正好把念珠拿来交易。
translated_text: 另一个 ？有一个多星期， 所以你可以每周来两次。
secondary_translated_text: The other one? For more than a week, so you can come twice a week.

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursued you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>I have seen their Citadel and its state, and I have strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell. Not for themselves but for the one atop it all. <page>Ahh ha! Truth. In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>The one atop this kingdom... They share my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen their Silk at work, in vast scale.<hpage>It snares the shells of those upon the roads, and guides with false life the many hollowed husks left to lapse.<page>Hmm... You’ve looked far towards the truth of it. Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! It’s past time you were going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>见过如今的圣堡后，我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力，而且是为了顶上那位。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>王国之上那位……与我同源，曾见识过相似的灵丝。<hpage>用丝线缠缚朝圣者，操纵空壳作为傀儡<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: 我不想破坏这个惊喜 ， 但我想问一个问题 ， 但你从一开始就打断了我吗 ？<hpage>当我看到他们的无辜和他们的条件 ， 我怀疑他们是一样的。<hpage>对于丝绸 ， 我没有头 ， 我有一个脸。<page>哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！法老的真理能力确实是一种罕见而珍贵的技能 ， 承载着人类的灵魂。<page>这是大多数疯子所缺乏的技能 ： 旧的组织已经被拆除 ， 但它已经死了。<hpage>它的本性与我的本性相同 ， 或者是本性的一部分。我看了很多丝绸作品。<hpage>这条路通向无数的空壳 ， 关闭了人们的壳 ， 留下了虚假的生活。<page>是的 ， 是的 ， 是的 ... ...我们可以从远处看到真相 ， 而我比以往任何时候都更接近 ， 但当然 ， 我能够面对这样一个有趣的任务。"<page>来吧 ， 现在！我得走了！他们的风格和丝绸真的很棒， 但如果你停留更长的时间， 你会发现它。
secondary_translated_text: I don't want to ruin the surprise, but I want to ask a question, but did you interrupt me from the beginning?<hpage>When I saw their innocence and their conditions, I suspected they were the same.<hpage>Regarding silk, I have no head, I have a face.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! Pharaoh's ability to truth is indeed a rare and precious skill that carries the soul of mankind.<page>This is a skill most lunatics lack: the old organization has been dismantled, but it is dead.<hpage>Its nature is the same as my nature, or is part of it. I have read a lot of silk works.<hpage>This road leads to countless empty shells, closing people's shells and leaving behind false lives.<page>Yes, yes, yes... ... We can see the truth from a distance, and I am closer than ever before, but of course, I am able to face such an interesting task. "<page>Come on, now! I have to go! Their style and silk are really great, but if you stay longer, you will find it.

original_en_text: A smart choice. Get out there and gather those spine cores, and best you be quick about it.<page>As nice as it is to have the company, if you hang around too long, those Citadel bugs’ll turn their gaze on me as well.
original_zh_text: 明智的选择。那就快去收集棘刺吧，最好手脚麻利点。<page>虽说有身边个伴也挺好，但你在这待太久会连累我也遭到圣堡注目。
translated_text: 这将是合理的选择。让我们来看看这根柱子的核心。<page>我很想有一个伴侣 ， 但如果我停留更长的时间 ， 昆虫会把我的目光移开。
secondary_translated_text: This would be a reasonable choice. Let's take a look at the core of this pillar.<page>I would love to have a partner, but if I stayed longer, the insects would take my eyes away.

original_en_text: If you’re planning to ascend from these low fields, you’ll be needing some lift, and I’m just the bug to help.<page>Head for the caves beyond my home. The bugs within produce a spine with a marvellous core, flexible yet strong.<page>Cut their spines and collect the cores. Return to me, and I’ll soon have your old cloak transformed into something far more buoyant.
original_zh_text: 想从这低地往上去，得靠点助力，我正好能帮忙。<page>去我家附近的洞窟，里头的甲虫能产出一种奇妙棘刺，柔韧又结实。<page>收集棘刺交给我，保准把你的旧披风改造得轻巧如羽！
translated_text: 如果你需要电梯爬上这个低洼的平原 ， 你只需要帮助昆虫。<page>从我家到这个洞穴。里面的昆虫发展出一个灵活耐用的核心和一个大的脊柱。<page>切断脊柱 ， 抬起核心 ， 回家 ， 立即将旧外套换成轻便的外套。
secondary_translated_text: If you need an elevator to climb this low-lying plain, you just need to help the insects.<page>From my home to this cave. The insects inside develop a flexible and durable core and a large spine.<page>Cut the spine, lift the core, go home, and immediately replace the old coat with a light coat.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing harsh our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>I seek only to save these lands, great one, to break them free from this fatal sickness born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you may... beast... If you can...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>我只为拯救这片土地而来，蚁后，将众生从丝线与虚空带来的灾厄中解放。喀嚓！……若汝能……异兽……若汝可……
translated_text: 我们感受到他工作的残酷 ， 我们的最终命运。<page>如果你有力量 ， 就来把她带走。我的力量已经消失了 ， 人们通常需要更多的时间。<hpage>“伟大的人 ， 你正在拯救地球免于这种致命的疾病 ， 这种疾病是由电线和真空引起的。"<page>这里有！如果可能的话 ， 动物。
secondary_translated_text: We feel the cruelty of his work and our ultimate destiny.<page>If you have the power, come and take her away. My power has disappeared and people usually need more time.<hpage>"Great man, you are saving the planet from this deadly disease caused by wires and vacuum. "<page>Here is it! If possible, animals.

original_en_text: Well, then! I can tell by the rattling from within your cloak, your hunt was a success! If you’ll kindly pass over the cores, I can get to work.
original_zh_text: 嗯，我能听到你披风里的窸窣声，看来是满载而归！棘刺拿来，我马上开工。
translated_text: 那我们走吧！从外套的声音 ， 我知道你的狩猎成功了！如果你能通过核心 ， 你可以开始工作。
secondary_translated_text: Then let's go! From the sound of your coat, I know your hunt was a success! If you can get through the core, you can get started.

original_en_text: Save them... if you can... pale beast...
original_zh_text: 拯救他们……若汝可……苍白异兽……
translated_text: 保存！” 如果可能的话。稻草人的野兽 The Beast of the Scarecrow
secondary_translated_text: Save!" If possible. The Beast of the Scarecrow

original_en_text: Ahhh... I am so tired. But to tarry long would be sacrilege...
original_zh_text: 唉……太累……但久留便是渎神……
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。他很累 ， 但很惭愧地呆了太久。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. He was very tired, but ashamed to have stayed for too long.

original_en_text: Very well, ssspiidderr. Keep your organsss, for now.
original_zh_text: 好吧，小蜘蛛……留着你的内脏，咝——暂时。
translated_text: 一段时间 ， 保存 IDR 器官。
secondary_translated_text: For a period of time, preserve IDR organs.

original_en_text: <page>Oooh! Stray one. Do tell, how goes the journey?<hpage>I have ventured high, seen the Citadel and its state. That place is long lost... generations lost, a gilded tomb, drowned in Silk dregs.<hpage>For its minions, so compelled in my capture, I now see clearly the source of their unity, and their strange strength... They are husks bound tight by the one who waits at its crest...<page>Agh! Look at you! Seeing right through to the truth of it! Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! Best you be heading. You’re clearly planning to stir up some serious trouble. I don’t want to be close when it kicks off!
original_zh_text: <page>哟！浪游者。最近怎么样？<hpage>我攀到了高处，见到了如今的圣堡。宛如一座镀金坟冢，浸在腐朽丝渣里。<hpage>那些想抓我的喽啰，我也看清了。都是被顶端那位用丝线操控的傀儡……<page>嗬！这就看清了真相！比我更敢深究。看你这副神情，摆明了是要碰一碰这硬茬……<page>那就赶紧上路！既然你要惹大麻烦，我可不想被波及！
translated_text: <page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！告诉我们一个流浪汉是如何旅行的。<hpage>我去看城堡 ， 我看到了它。他们消失了很久。一代人已经过去了 ， 金色的坟墓被丝绸废墟覆盖。<hpage>至于他们的人民 ， 我被迫俘虏了太多的人 ， 所以我可以清楚地看到他们的团结和奇怪的力量来源。<page>是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！看看你自己！看看真相！“它比以往任何时候都更接近 ， 但当然 ， 它有能力处理这些令人兴奋的任务。"<page>来吧 ， 现在！最好去 ， 你会陷入严重的麻烦 ， 你不想太接近游戏开始。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Tell us how a homeless person travels.<hpage>I went to see the castle and I saw it. They disappeared for a long time. A generation has passed, and the golden tomb is covered in silk ruins.<hpage>As for their people, I had been forced to capture too many people, so I could clearly see their unity and strange source of strength.<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! Look at yourself! Look at the truth! "It's closer than ever before, but of course it has the ability to handle these exciting tasks. "<page>Come on, now! Better go, you'll get into serious trouble and you don't want to get too close to the start of the game.

original_en_text: That pouch of yours... With the scraps left here and a little work, I could add some pockets for you, let you carry more tools and shards while on the road. That’d be nice, wouldn’t it?
original_zh_text: 你这工具袋……我能加点布料，让它能多塞工具。这样路上也方便，对吧？
translated_text: 一个袋子可以把垃圾放在这里 ， 另一个袋子 ， 用更多的工具和更少的工作来把垃圾带到街上。
secondary_translated_text: One bag can put garbage here, another bag, with more tools and less work to bring garbage out onto the street.

original_en_text: All those gooey bugssss, all so reluctant to share their organs. Sssooo much coaxing and gnawing, and prodding.<page>They should be proud! Their ssmall sssacrifice would become much sssustenance for my ferocious young.
original_zh_text: 那些黏糊糊的虫子，个个抠门不肯掏出内脏给我。咝——连哄带骗，又咬又戳，才肯给我。<page>他们该骄傲！咝——这点小牺牲能养大我那群凶猛的孩子。
translated_text: 然而 ， 并非所有蠕虫都共享器官。<page>我们应该为他们感到骄傲！你的小小的牺牲将是我留给我骄傲的一代人的遗产。
secondary_translated_text: However, not all worms share organs.<page>We should be proud of them! Your little sacrifice will be my legacy to my proud generation.

original_en_text: For your efforts, take these rosaries as payment. May they not lay too heavy upon your shell.
original_zh_text: 这是酬劳，但愿念珠不会压垮你的行囊。
translated_text: 把这个当作奖励 ， 不要在头盔上施加太多重量。
secondary_translated_text: Consider this as a reward and don't put too much weight on your helmet.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not offer my own organs, hunter, though I may bring the meat of others slain.<page>Good ssspidderr! Ssskewered. Ssshredded. Ssseared! Bring it all. Much will be needed, enough to sate my brood to come.<hpage>Several of my tools can prepare the meats as you request. I have been fortunate to find so varied an arsenal within your lands.<page>My brood has not long till hatching, ssssspiddderrr. Do your duty ssswift, and you shall sssee reward for the sssslaughter.
original_zh_text: <hpage>猎手，我不会为你献上自己的内脏，但也许我能带给你其他猎物的血肉。<page>咝——！好啊，小蜘蛛！串烧、撕碎、炙烤！统统带来。我的孩子需要大量血肉才能饱足。<hpage>我带的工具能按你的要求处理血肉。你们这地界真像个武器库，各种装备种类齐全。<page>我的孩子就快孵化了，咝——小蜘蛛……动作快点，完成我的需求，必有重谢。
translated_text: <hpage>我不会牺牲器官 ， 猎人也不会 ， 我会牺牲更多。<page>蜘蛛 ， 西斯。嘘！— 嘘！你需要所有这些 ， 你将需要很多为你的孩子和孙子。<hpage>我们可以根据要求提供肉类烹饪工具。<page>我的孩子很快就会出生 ， SSSpiddderr 。如果他履行了他的职责 ， 他将受到法律的奖励。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I would not sacrifice organs, nor would hunters, I would sacrifice more.<page>Spider, Sith. Shh!- Shh! You need all of this and you will need a lot for your children and grandchildren.<hpage>We can provide meat cooking tools on request.<page>My child will be born soon, SSSpiddderr. If he fulfills his duties, he will be rewarded by the law.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’ll have the spine cores for you shortly, madam.<page>Good, good! The caves just beyond here are full of the creatures, floating carelessly in the warm air.<page>I’m sure your big needle there can coax them into sharing their spines. Then it’s only a quick matter of cutting them open and grabbing the cores.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我稍候就带来棘刺，女士。<page>好！附近的洞窟里到处是那种浮空的蠢虫。<page>你的长针肯定能"劝"它们献出棘刺。
translated_text: <hpage>你的脊椎很快就会准备好了。<page>一切都会好起来的 ， 一切都会好的。遥远的洞穴充满了漂浮在温暖空气中的生物。<page>你认为你可以说服你的大针共享脊柱 ， 这样你就可以快速切割它并抓住它的核心。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your spine will be ready soon.<page>Everything's gonna be okay, everything's gonna be okay. Remote caves are filled with creatures floating in the warm air.<page>You think you can convince your big needle to share the spine so you can quickly cut it and grab its core.

original_en_text: A holy burden to help maintain your poise. Whether striking others or being struck yourself, you’ll remain firmly in place.
original_zh_text: 这份神圣负赘能帮助你维持姿态，无论攻守都能稳如磐石。
translated_text: 建立自己是一个神圣的职责 ， 如果你攻击别人或你自己 ， 你将坚定地站在你的立场。
secondary_translated_text: Building yourself is a sacred duty, and if you attack others or yourself, you will stand firm in your shoes.

original_en_text: Not interested in trade? I wonder, will your rosaries weigh you down during your ascent?
original_zh_text: 不做买卖？揣着念珠攀登不怕负担过重？
translated_text: 你对这笔交易感兴趣吗 ？当你醒来时 ， 玫瑰花会变得更重吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Are you interested in this deal? Will the roses get heavier when you wake up?

original_en_text: Perfect! These should be more than enough. Wait there just a moment and we’ll soon have you soaring up and away from these lowlands.
original_zh_text: 完美！这些够用了。稍等片刻，保你能够腾空而起，远离这破地方。
translated_text: 更多在这里。“等一下 ， 我会把你从这个低洼的地方拉出来。
secondary_translated_text: More here. "Wait a minute, I will pull you out of this low-lying place.

original_en_text: Rkraha. Uohk kha!<hpage>My apologies, sir. Though I can grasp the language of many bugs, your words are unfamiliar even to me.<page>Kha... kha mauak. Noku... gri?<hpage><hpage>These items you have collected. These are the wares of a warrior. Do you wish to trade?<page>Noku... noku!
original_zh_text: 尔克拉哈。乌奥赫克 喀！<hpage>抱歉，先生。虽然我略懂各族虫语，但你的语言我实在不熟。<page>喀……喀 玛阿克。诺库……格日？<hpage><hpage>你收集的这些东西……是战士的货。你想交易？<page>诺库……诺库！
translated_text: 我们走吧 ， 卢卡斯。哇 ， 哈哈！<hpage>我听得懂许多昆虫的语言 ， 但听不懂你的。<page>” 你是蟑螂， 杰瑞王尔德吗？" " "<hpage><hpage>收集的物品属于战士。你会交换它吗？<page>野蛮 ， 野蛮！
secondary_translated_text: Let's go, Lucas. Wow, haha!<hpage>I can understand the language of many insects, but I can't understand yours.<page>"Are you a cockroach, Jerry Wilde? " " "<hpage><hpage>The collected items belong to the warrior. Would you exchange it?<page>Barbaric, barbaric!

original_en_text: Get a move on, stray one! We’re all suffering for your conflict... Maybe next time you act towards calmer conclusions, aye?
original_zh_text: 快去吧！大伙都在遭罪……下次闹腾的时候悠着点行不？
translated_text: “来吧 ， 游侠 ， 也许下次我们会得出一个更谨慎的结论。
secondary_translated_text: "Come on, Ranger, maybe next time we'll come to a more cautious conclusion.

original_en_text: These humble shards can form together into something grand, if you possess the vision to shape them.
original_zh_text: 这些碎片应该能拼凑成形，但要看你有无打磨的技巧。
translated_text: 如果你有一个愿景 ， 你可以把这些小块放在一起 ， 创造出更大的东西。
secondary_translated_text: If you have a vision, you can put these little pieces together and create something bigger.

original_en_text: After all that hunting, you won’t trust me with your spoils? You’re a funny one. They won’t do you any good just filling up your pockets!
original_zh_text: 大费周折取来棘刺，却信不过我？你可真逗。揣着这些刺有什么用！
translated_text: 打猎后 ， 你害怕把食物还给我吗 ？你是个有趣的人。填满口袋 ， 赚不到钱！
secondary_translated_text: After hunting, are you afraid to give me back my food? You are an interesting person. Fill your pockets and make no money!

original_en_text: That’s a fancy pin you’re flaunting upon your cloak there. Here’s hoping you didn’t have to kill to claim it.<hpage>The emblem was given freely, Seamstress, as reward for a fierce duel won fair.<page>Given freely!? My, my. So my sister’s welcomed another to the order... Sounds like age might’ve softened even her stoic style.<page>Can’t say I think too fondly on the old ways... but some rituals, and some memories... those are still worth preserving.
original_zh_text: 披风上别着的针徽挺漂亮嘛，但愿不是从尸壳上抢来的。<hpage>这针徽是公平比斗赢来的，女士。<page>她自愿给的？！哎呀呀，竟然纳新成员入团……岁月到底是软了她古板心肠。<page>我不待见那些古训……但有些仪式，有些回忆……还是值得留存。

original_en_text: Well, aren’t you a sight! No, don’t tell me! You’re as odd as they come.<page>Your poise! Your form! Are you hunted? Pursued? These are bleak times, but a powerful stray like you could certainly cause some change.<page>Well then! I’ve no love for that holy caste, and I do worry for this kingdom’s ailing state. If you’re seeking to settle a score, perhaps I can lend some aid?
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这模样！让我猜猜，你不是这里的虫吧？<page>这仪态！这身姿！你正被追杀？被通缉？圣堡肯定很重视你。<hpage>如你所言，女士。覆面虫将我带来此地，我打算向圣堡讨个说法。<page>哈！还挺凶！现在外面乱得很，你这般强悍的浪客肯定能搅出点动静。<page>正好！我也讨厌那群圣徒，也忧心王国的灾祸。你要找他们算账的话，或许我能帮衬？
translated_text: ” 你不是一个有远见的人。不 ， 不 ， 不！别告诉我这个！奇怪的是 ， 他们做了什么。<page>她的行为！正式的！你被迫害了吗？你追着他吗？城堡会把你当作宝藏。<hpage>正如你所说的 ， 夫人 ， 一条蠕虫把我从城市带到他的国家。现在 ， 我正在寻找一个能够回答这个问题的人 ， 如果需要的话 ， 他可以抓住一个巨大的力量。<page>哦！哦！他被迫！这些天来 ， 这是一个洞 ， 但像你这样强大的保镖肯定会改变这种情况。<page>我没事 ， 我没事！好吧 ， 好吧！好吧！我不喜欢这个神圣的类 ， 我担心王国的可怕的条件。如果我需要一个点 ， 你能帮我吗 ？

The castle will treat you as a treasure.<hpage>As you said, madam, a worm took me from the city to his country. Now, I'm looking for someone who can answer that question and seize a huge force if needed.<page>Oh! Oh! He was forced! These days, it's a hole, but a powerful bodyguard like you will definitely change that.<page>I'm okay, I'm okay! Okay, okay! Okay! Course it had to be you. Here I was, hoping you’d bring a shake up. Instead you’ve brought an ending!<page>Well, move it, I say! Get to your fixing. We’re all now suffering for the scale your conflict... Maybe this time you act towards calmer conclusions, aye?

"<page>The sound is over, is now the best time? Will the United States grow? The nails were sharp and the skin was hard, and the brothers and sisters were gone.

original_en_text: That beast! What wicked punishments are sent to test us! Why must we pilgrims, who have done no evil, be so tormented?<page>Tell me, where is it written? This law that says we must suffer every hardship just to earn the merest hope of happiness?<hpage>Wild lands like these are ruled by instinct, not laws. You must rely on your own strength and skill to survive.<page>I have neither! If what you say is true, I may as well crawl outside and let myself be devoured right now. Save myself some worry!<hpage>Do as you wish, but I think perhaps you underestimate yourself. To climb this far and survive here so long is a task beyond most of your fellow pilgrims.<page>Hmph. I’m no better than any of them. It’s only luck that has gotten me this far, and it’s on luck that I shall continue to rely.
original_zh_text: 那头凶兽！肯定是降罪试炼！我们朝圣者未行恶事，为何要遭此折磨？<page>告诉我，哪本法典写着必须历尽苦难才配期盼幸福？<hpage>荒野奉行本能，而非法典。想要生存，唯有靠自己的能耐。<page>自己的能耐？如果真是如此，不如出去喂了野兽，省得煎熬！<hpage>请便。但别低估了自己，能攀登至此，你已强过多数同袍。<page>哼，我与他们无异。全凭运气苟活，往后也指望运气。
translated_text: 这个野兽！多么可怕的惩罚啊！为什么一个从来没有做过任何坏事的朝圣者会遭受这么多的痛苦 ？<page>“法律是否说 ， 为了有幸福的希望 ， 我们必须忍受一切痛苦 ？ ”" "<hpage>这种野性是由本能驱动的 ， 而不是法律。为了生存 ， 你必须依靠自己的力量和能力。<page>我两者都有！“如果你说的是真的 ， 那么我最好去吞咽。别担心 ， 伙计！<hpage>飞得这么远 ， 活得这么久 ， 是大多数朝圣者做不到的事情。<page>我是偶然来到这里 ， 所以我信任她。
secondary_translated_text: This beast! What a terrible punishment! Why would a pilgrim who had never done anything wrong suffer so much?<page>"Does the law say that in order to have any hope of happiness, we must endure all suffering?”" "<hpage>This wildness is driven by instinct, not by law. In order to survive, you must rely on your own strength and abilities.<page>I have both! "If what you say is true, then I'd better swallow it. don't worry, man!<hpage>Flying so far and living so long is something that most pilgrims cannot do.<page>I came here by accident, so I trust her.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir pilgrim, I bring supplies from Bellhart, for the aid of travellers who pass this waystation.<page>Such service... It seems our prayers do not go completely unheard. Many a small wish will be granted by these supplies.
original_zh_text: <hpage>旅者，我带钟心镇的物资来援助此驿站。<page>这份恩赐……看来圣堡仍能回应我等祈祷。这些补给能实现许多小愿。

original_en_text: Would you gift organs for my brood, sssppiidderr? Upon first waking my children will be consumed with craving.
original_zh_text: 咝——要献出你的内脏喂我的孩子们吗，小蜘蛛？他们睁眼后可饿得慌，急需饱餐一顿。

original_en_text: <hpage>I had promised organs for your mother, child. Though she has passed, I would provide them to you, if some small reward were traded?<page>The meatsss?... For ussss?... Yesss, hunter! We have giftssss... Clawsss long...<page>Bring meatssss... Givess meatsss... Usss’s wantss grow sssstrong... much... Be like siblingsss, sharp, hard...
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我答应过给你母亲送来脏器血肉。她虽死了，你若是肯给我点报酬，我可以转送给你。<page>咝——血肉？……给我？……好啊，猎手！我有宝贝……长长的爪子……<page>咝——带血肉来……给我血肉……我要变强壮……像我的兄弟姐妹一样……壳硬爪利……

Hunters are very talented and have long legs.<page>Give me some meat. Free meat. Oz's desire grew stronger and stronger. more... ... We live like brothers and sisters.

original_en_text: Even us’sss... Now we’sss too grow... Fiercesss... Hard...<page>We’sss becomesss hunter too...
original_zh_text: 咝——就连我……现在也能长壮了……变得凶猛起来……坚硬起来……<page>咝——我也要成为猎手……
translated_text: 即使与我们。现在 ， 他们长大了。一个美丽而复杂的男人。<page>她也是一位公主猎人。
secondary_translated_text: Even with us. Now they are grown up. A beautiful and complex man.<page>She is also a princess hunter.

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursue you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>No certainty, but I’ve a strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell.<page>Ahh ha! Truth, no doubt! In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>There is another alive in this kingdom that shares my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen Silk similar to my own. It snares the shells of those upon the roads.<hpage>I’ve seen it wrap them, possess them whole. There is will within that thread, one that seems to come from somewhere above us. The Citadel...<page>Hmmmm... Good, sharp sight you’ve got. That Citadel... All roads towards and all answers waiting, and a long climb up there m’dear.<page>Now! It’s time you get going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>不确定，但我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>此地尚存一虫与我同源，曾见到它用相似灵丝缠缚朝圣者。<hpage>用丝线操纵空壳，且其中藏有源自高处的意志，定是圣堡……<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: 我不想破坏惊喜 ， 但出于好奇 ， 我问 ： “你知道我为什么看着你吗 ？ ”” 昆虫城堡。<hpage>” 我不知道， 但我怀疑。<hpage>他们追赶我 ， 因为我是用我的贝壳做的丝绸。<page>哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！事实上 ， 毫无疑问！在帕洛姆 ， 他们的能力是一种罕见而珍贵的能力 ， 可以将人类灵魂凝聚在一起。<page>这是大多数疯子所缺乏的技能 ： 旧的组织已经被拆除 ， 但它已经死了。<hpage>在这个王国里 ， 有一些人具有相同的性质或属于它。我见过一条像我一样的蛇 ， 它在街上捡起人们的贝壳。<hpage>我看到了它们是如何包装的 ， 并且完全拥有。这一事实有一个意志 ， 似乎要来我们。城堡 （Castello）<page>哦 ， 天哪！“你的愿景是活的 ， 城市的每一条街道都在等待 ， 所有的答案都在等待 ， 亲爱的 ， 还有很长的路要走。<page>来吧 ， 现在！我得走了！他们的风格和丝绸真的很棒， 但如果你停留更长的时间， 你会发现它。
secondary_translated_text: I didn't want to spoil the surprise, but out of curiosity, I asked,"Do you know why I'm looking at you? "Insect Castle.<hpage>"I don't know, but I doubt it.<hpage>They chased me because I was made of silk from my shells.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! In fact, there is no doubt! In Palome, their ability is a rare and precious ability that holds human souls together.<page>This is a skill most lunatics lack: the old organization has been dismantled, but it is dead.<hpage>In this kingdom, there are some people of the same nature or belonging to it. I have seen a snake like me picking up people's shells on the street.<hpage>I saw how they were packaged and fully owned. This fact has a will that seems to come to us. Castle (Castello)<page>Oh, my God! "Your vision is alive, every street in the city is waiting, all answers are waiting, honey, there is still a long way to go.<page>Come on, now! I have to go! Their style and silk are really great, but if you stay longer, you will find it.

original_en_text: She keepsss?.. We’sss wants meatsss, hunter... We’sss need strengthsss... As much as othersss... As much as mothersss...

original_en_text: Memories only weigh us down, but some pilgrims still cling to them with unseemly devotion. This memory isn’t yours, but perhaps you could find some use for it?

To witnesss their first flight, their first hunt. To see them kill, and grow? <hpage>Your choice is your own, tall mother. You won’t be judged by me. I’ve seen enough sacrifice. SSSSSSPppSpider is no surprise.<hpage>I've seen kids like you many times. They were born hungry, with sharp teeth and sharp claws.<hpage>During reproduction, meat is as comfortable as other insects. Celebrate your first flight, your first soldier, kill it, and watch it grow.<hpage>Her choices are her mother's choices, she doesn't judge them, she has seen enough victims, and she doesn't like the show.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing, harsh, our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>Great one, I come not to see you as you are, rather I would know you as were, before the pale monarch, when once your heart beat bright and brave.<page>Kcha! Then see me... beast... Those distant memories... Mine once was power... wild... proud...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>蚁后，我来此并非为了觐见，而是追忆您昔年的英姿。在苍白君主降临前，当您的英勇之心仍炽烈搏动之时。<hpage>喀嚓！……那就见证……异兽……久远记忆……吾曾执掌……狂野……伟力……傲然……

I believe you wrote a cruel and ultimate destiny.<page>If I had power, I would take it, my things would disappear, and it would take time for ordinary people.<hpage>"Great man, I have not come to see your face, but to see a pale king whose heart is bright and beating bravely. "<page>Here is it! Shit, you came to see me. My long memory is my strength and the pride of nature.

original_en_text: My strength... my power... Could you claim it, pale beast? Are you so strong?...<hpage>Let us find out together, great one...

I’ve rare opportunity to practice such intricate sewing, and a warrior sort like you will be able to properly appreciate my additions.<page>Float away now, stray one, and do try not to die. original_en_text: Have you seen it... small sspidderrr.... that cruel Citadel, weighing heavy atop tthissss land?<page>My hunger may seem great, but that place... that is consumption unending...
original_zh_text: 咝——小蜘蛛，我仍能闻到你的紧张感。我还是让你觉得危险？<hpage>这片土地处处危机，高个子，我自然得保持戒备。你的利爪看起来没少沾血。<page>咝——我乐于杀戮，但也只是为了喂饱自己，以及我即将出生的孩子们。<page>那座圣堡压在这片土地之上。咝——那地方的“饥饿”与我的相比，可算是个无底洞。

secondary_translated_text: Do you see this? Is it cruel that this castle places a heavy burden on the earth?“<page>Although it may seem hungry, it is a place for unlimited consumption.

original_en_text: We pilgrims provide for each other, living or dead. Sharing is a sign of devotion, particularly for those who give.

original_en_text: You stay, ssppidderrr? My brood needsss meat, much.. the organsss of othersss, or would you instead offer your own?<page>Gift a sshhell’s warm insidess as sweet feast for my brood’sss birth-meal?

translated_text: ” 你为什么不在这里， Spedler？“孩子们需要肉 ， 他们需要肉 ， 别人的器官是你的。"<page>你想给你的孩子一顿热腾腾的饭 ， 就像一个甜蜜的蛋糕 ？

original_en_text: You have them, sspiiddderrr! The smell is upon you, all those organs, rich prepared for feasssting.
