original_en_text: Oho? You linger here still? Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow?<page>Then join me, you must! A new assistant is needed. Together we shall unlock the secrets of this wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？你还没走呢？难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？<page>那就加入我吧！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开这宝贝的秘密！
translated_text: 你在干什么？嗯 ， 对吧 ？你想和我玩吗？像我一样 ， 你也被美丽的山光迷住了。<page>留在我们身边！跟我来 ， 请！我需要一个新的助手。让我们一起来发现这个神奇材料的秘密！
secondary_translated_text: What are you doing? Yeah, right? Do you want to play with me? Like me, you are also fascinated by the beautiful mountain light.<page>Stay with us! Follow me, please! I need a new assistant. Let's discover the secret of this magical material together!

original_en_text: There, you are replete with wonderful Plasmium once more! You can begin injecting it at once. Now, off with you!
original_zh_text: 拿好，神奇生质液又重新装满了！你又可以注射了，快出发吧！
translated_text: 此外， 你也有一个很棒的菜！你可以立即开始注射。是的， 是的， 是的！
secondary_translated_text: Besides, you also have a great dish! You can start the injection immediately. Yes, yes, yes!

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: ” 请， 助手， 你能帮助我吗？“真的吗 ？ ”” 球已经打。血浆的恢复已经开始。
secondary_translated_text: "Please, assistant, can you help me? "Really? "The ball has been played. The recovery of plasma has begun.

original_en_text: Leave your fear behind... Cast it off like an old shell. Give me what I need...
original_zh_text: 抛开恐惧……像蜕壳一样扔掉。把东西给我……
translated_text: 像旧贝壳一样扔掉 ， 给他们你需要的东西。
secondary_translated_text: Throw it away like old shells and give them what you need.

original_en_text: Bring the Pure Plasmium. It must be tested... ingested.<page>Ready the Needle Phial to full charge... Strike deep the ripened buds. Return that precious liquid life to me... Assistant.
original_zh_text: 带纯净生质液来……必须测试……吸收……<page>把储液针管蓄满力……扎进成熟花苞……把生质液带回来……
translated_text: 获得干净的血浆需要吸入测试<page>准备好安装针 ， 深深地享受成熟的按钮。让宝贵的生命流动。
secondary_translated_text: Obtaining clean plasma requires inhalation testing<page>Get ready to install the pins and deeply enjoy the mature buttons. Let precious life flow.

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he up and vanished, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那前任助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: 这太不可思议了！任务中的两个错误将大大提高探测速度。<page>来吧 ， 现在！在我醒来并消失之前 ， 我的前助手在我下面的小屋里培养了一种寄生微生物。<page>如前所述 ， 按钮必须成熟 ， 并且所含的蜂蜜必须在成熟之前提取。<page>有了正确的指甲工具 ， 蜂蜜采集是一个简单的过程。我会借你一根针。<page>当你找到按钮时 ， 用针头填充它 ， 直到它准备好了 ， 然后将针头放在按钮的中心。一旦你离开它 ， 它会看起来干净 ， 吸蜂蜜。<page>收集所需样品后 ， 请将样品退还给我。通过正确的蜂蜜和正确的测试 ， 等离子体显示出更令人惊叹的特性。
secondary_translated_text: This is unbelievable! Two errors in the mission will greatly speed up detection.<page>Come on, now! Before I woke up and disappeared, my former assistant cultivated a parasitic microbe in the cabin below me.<page>As mentioned earlier, the button must be ripe and the honey it contains must be extracted before ripening.<page>With the right nail tools, honey collection is a simple process. I will lend you a needle.<page>When you find the button, fill it with the needle until it is ready, then place the needle in the center of the button. Once you leave it, it will look clean and suck honey.<page>After collecting the required samples, please return the samples to me. With the right honey and the right testing, the plasma shows even more amazing properties.

original_en_text: Assistant, that odour... aahhh... you have the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 助手……这气味……你拿到生质血了……
translated_text: 它有一种气味 ， 但它有血浆。
secondary_translated_text: It has a smell, but it has plasma.

original_en_text: Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. Once your Plasmium reserve runs dry, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: 继续使用等离子体火焰 ， 享受它对你身体的所有奇妙效果。如果您没有 plasumium ， 请联系我们。<page>我们正在收集一些帐户 ， 但我们相信每个帐户都将用于重要的研究！
secondary_translated_text: Keep using the plasma flame and enjoy all its wonderful effects on your body. If you don't have plasumium, please contact us.<page>We are collecting some accounts, but we believe each account will be used for important research!

original_en_text: Do you fear the Plasmium, even now? Ahhh... Assistant... open your mind to the possibilities...
original_zh_text: 现在还怕生质液？啊……助手……敞开心扉接受可能……
translated_text: 你害怕高度吗 ？哦 ， 是的！他的助手打开了心扉 ， 抓住了这个机会。
secondary_translated_text: Are you afraid of heights? Oh, yes! His assistant opened his heart and seized the opportunity.

original_en_text: Assistant... What we might become... together.
translated_text: 帮助我们了解我们是谁 ， 我们是谁。
secondary_translated_text: Help us understand who we are and who we are.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the buds below. They are ripe...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract that Pure Plasmium.<page>This shell shall become what you need it to be... Plasmium can cure all.
original_zh_text: 啊……对……助手……真忠诚……拿着储液针管……去下面找熟透的花苞……<page>蓄满力……扎透核心……提取纯净生质液……<page>这副躯壳将完成蜕变……生质液会治愈一切……
translated_text: 哦 ， 是的 ， 对。他的助手很忠诚。取代针的位置。请按下下面的按钮进行搜索。他们成熟了。<page>我已经尽了最大的努力 ， 菲尔 ， 深入挖掘纯粹的等离子体。<page>血浆可以治愈一切。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, yeah, right. His assistant is loyal. Replace the position of the needle. Please press the button below to search. They mature.<page>I've done my best, Phil, to dig deeper into pure plasma.<page>Plasma can cure everything.

original_en_text: Assistant! You’re still dallying about here? I’ve an eager need for pure Plasmium, fresh from the bud.<page>Just one fully charged stab of my Needle Phial straight into a ripe bud! You’ll suck the Plasmium right up!<page>Now, pop down into those worm warrens and extract it for me! What could possibly be more important?
original_zh_text: 助手！怎么还在这磨蹭？我要花苞里的新鲜生质液！<page>用储液针管扎成熟花苞，把生质液抽出来就行！<page>好了，快去虫道干活！还有什么比这更重要的？
translated_text: 助手！你想和我玩吗？我需要一个干净的等离子体按钮。<page>您所需要做的就是将针头完全加载 ， 然后直接按下成熟按钮。它会吸收血浆。<page>进入蠕虫的王国 ， 为我挖掘它！什么是重要的 ？
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! Do you want to play with me? I need a clean plasma button.<page>All you need to do is fully load the needle and press the maturity button directly. It absorbs plasma.<page>Enter the kingdom of worms and dig it for me! What is important?

original_en_text: <hpage>I am curious about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is undisputable fact!<page>Plasmium was discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow? Would you assent then, to assisting me in my studies?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？要不要当我的研究助手？
translated_text: <hpage>我对你的设备和那里的蓝色液体感兴趣。什么样的研究会消耗能源 ？<page>是的 ， 对。是的 ， 是的 ， 这种神奇的材料也会让你着迷！惊喜之外的奇迹， 精彩的材料！<page>血浆。史无前例的自然奇观愈合伤口 ， 加强外壳。我相信我可以忍受死亡。<hpage>这座山叫什么名字？你以前见过他吗 ？他们看起来很相似。<page>这是一个不可否认的事实 ， 这个大陆的灰色和荒凉的土地从来没有产生过如此奇怪的东西。<page>这些等离子体被发现隐藏在法罗群岛边缘附近的海水深处 ， 在他的指导下 ， 他们被带到一个洞穴中 ， 研究它们如何在未知的地方茁壮成长。<page>你可能会像我一样被这个美丽的通道迷住。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm interested in your equipment and the blue liquid there. What kind of research consumes energy?<page>Yes, right. Yes, yes, this amazing material will fascinate you too! Miracles beyond surprises, wonderful materials!<page>Plasma. An unprecedented natural wonder heals wounds and strengthens the shell. I believe I can endure death.<hpage>What is the name of this mountain? Have you seen him before? They look very similar.<page>It is an undeniable fact that the gray and desolate land of this continent has never produced anything so strange.<page>The plasmas were found hidden deep in the water near the edge of the Faroe Islands, and under his guidance they were taken to a cave to study how they thrive in unknown places.<page>You may be fascinated by this beautiful passage as I am.

original_en_text: Plasmium is a marvel of nature! And a new assistant is sorely needed. Together, let us unlock its secrets!
original_zh_text: 生质液是自然奇迹！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开它的秘密吧！
translated_text: 高原是一个自然奇观。我需要一个新的助手。让我们一起来发现这个秘密！
secondary_translated_text: The plateau is a natural wonder. I need a new assistant. Let's discover this secret together!

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>In a dark cave below here, I encountered a shell not dissimilar from your own. I suspect your assistant may have met an unfortunate end.<page>Ah ha! That careless buffoon. No surprises then. That lump never shone with the talent for true discovery.<page>Now! To my work I must return! With my assistant so rudely dying on me, I’ve tasks enough for two bugs.<page>Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>我在下方一黑暗洞窟里见到过和你挺像的尸壳，看来你的助手可能遭遇了不幸。<page>哈！那个冒失鬼。一点也不意外，废物本来就没科研天赋。<page>好了！我得赶紧开始研究了！现在死了助手，我得干双份活。<page>除非你对生质液感兴趣，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: 你在干什么？嗯 ， 对吧 ？新的面孔！” 你不想打扰我， 是吗？事实上？我们正在对这条曲折的隧道进行严格的研究。<page>你从来没有见过一个助手， 是吗？什么样的休息？速度 ， 速度 ， 可靠性。<hpage>在下面的黑暗洞穴中 ， 我发现了一些与它的壳没有什么不同。<page>哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！公众从未表现出发现的天赋 ， 这并不奇怪。<page>来吧 ， 现在！我要回去工作了！我的工作可以承受两个错误 ， 因为我的助手已经死了 ， 他不尊重我。<page>如果你不关心我宝贵的血浆 ， 让我休息。"
secondary_translated_text: What are you doing? Yeah, right? New faces!" You don't want to bother me, do you? Actually? We are conducting a rigorous study of this winding tunnel.<page>You've never met an assistant, have you? What kind of rest? Speed, speed, reliability.<hpage>In the dark cave below, I found something no different from its shell.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! It is not surprising that the public has never shown a gift for discovery.<page>Come on, now! I have to get back to work! My job can tolerate two mistakes because my assistant is dead and he disrespects me.<page>If you don't care about my precious plasma, let me rest. "

original_en_text: Oh? Those who hesitate learn nothing, you know! The wondrous bright glow of Plasmium makes all things clear!
original_zh_text: 哦？犹豫可学不到新知识！生质液的美丽蓝光会照亮一切！
translated_text: 你在干什么？真的吗？我不知道嫌疑人。等离子体令人难以置信的明亮光将揭示一切！
secondary_translated_text: What are you doing? Really? I don't know the suspect. The incredibly bright light of the plasma will reveal everything!

translated_text: 饰 Suri Gran
secondary_translated_text: as Suri Gran

original_en_text: <hpage>I have retrieved the Pure Plasmium, as requested. Know that, in your current state, I feel some reservation passing it to you.<hpage>This path your research takes... The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure Plasmium? No... Assistant... You must not doubt... It is precious. Perfect. It was needed... You have done well. As always...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你要的纯净生质液。但要交给这样状态的你，我有点犹豫。<hpage>你的研究方向……结局可能不太妙。<page>纯净生质液？不……助手……别怀疑……这是珍宝……完美……必须的……干得好……
translated_text: <hpage>我会在需要的时候拿起盘子。关于你目前的处境 ， 我很担心你。<hpage>学校继续这样做 ， 最终的结果可能不会令人愉快。<page>血浆是干净的。不 ， 我们不能怀疑这一点。是的， 我说。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I will pick up the plate when needed. I'm worried about you about your current situation.<hpage>Schools continue to do this, and the end results may not be pleasant.<page>The plasma is clean. No, we cannot doubt that. Yes, I said.

original_en_text: These lands have taken the Plasmium well... the soil has drunk it deep, and the creatures bloom so beautifully... have you seen them?<hpage>The effect of your Plasmium on the beasts here is all too evident. Great change has been inflicted upon them.<hpage>There is an echo also of other infections I have witnessed. I wonder at the meaning of it all... or if I am perhaps imagining similarities where there are none.<page>Assistant, ahhh... you grow more inquisitive... We both seek deeper insight...<page>Could we... peer deeper inside somehow...? Let us think on it...
original_zh_text: 这片土地吸收了生质液……深入土壤，深入生物，花苞绽放……看见了吗？<hpage>你的生质液让野兽变异，影响太明显了。<hpage>这让我想起以前见过的其他感染，不知是巧合还是……<page>助手啊……你也变好奇了……想深入探索……<page>或许……我们该更进一步研究？……让我想想……
translated_text: 土壤是如此饱和 ， 我看到这些生物绽放美丽的花朵。<hpage>桌子对动物的影响在这里非常明显。<hpage>它与我见过的其他感染相似。“我想知道你的意思。你可以想象一个地方就像另一个。<page>你越来越好奇 ， 我们都在寻找想法。<page>你能帮我看看吗 ？让我们考虑一下时间。
secondary_translated_text: The soil was so saturated that I saw these creatures blooming beautiful flowers.<hpage>The impact of tables on animals is very obvious here.<hpage>It is similar to other infections I have seen. "I want to know what you mean. You can imagine one place being like another.<page>You're getting more and more curious, and we're all looking for ideas.<page>Can you take a look for me? Let's think about time.

original_en_text: Ahhhh... Assistant... greed was ever your greatest failing. Do not guard your discoveries so jealously...
original_zh_text: 啊……助手……贪婪是你的弱点……别独占成果……
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦...他的助手们的贪婪是他最大的失败。不要冒着后果的危险。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh... The greed of his aides was his biggest failure. Don't risk the consequences.

original_en_text: For you... dear assistant... drink deep my liquid life...
original_zh_text: 喝吧……亲爱的助手……饮下我的生命精华……
translated_text: 亲爱的助手 ， 喝下我生命的液体。
secondary_translated_text: Dear assistant, drink the liquid of my life.

original_en_text: Since you have proven yourself a capable assistant, take this delightful implement of my own invention, a Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject precious Plasmium straight into your body. Almost painlessly!<hpage>Your tool certainly looks sharp enough to pierce my shell, sir, but why should I want to do so?<page>Because filling your body with Plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! And it feels so exquisitely good!<page>My assistant and I have been injecting Plasmium into the local flora and fauna since we arrived. No ill effects have been observed, and so we can conclude that the process is utterly, completely safe.<page>Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. If you ever run out of Plasmium, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 既然你够格当助手，送你个好东西——生质液瓶！<page>有了它，就能直接往甲壳里注射生质液，几乎不疼！<hpage>这工具确实足够扎穿我的外壳，但我为何要这么做？<page>因为注射生质液好处多多！不仅能防止受伤，而且感觉非常好！<page>我和助手给本地动植物都打过，没出现任何副作用，完全安全！<page>尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: 现在你已经证明了你是一个熟练的助手 ， 给我带来一个有趣的工具 ， 等离子瓶 ， 我发明的。<page>在它的帮助下 ， 我们可以直接将珍贵的塑料引入我们的身体。<hpage>你的乐器看起来锋利到足以打破我的外壳， 不是吗？你为什么要这么做 ？"<page>补充你身体的血压是非常有益的！他会保护你免受邪恶。我感觉好多了！“<page>自从我到达以来 ， 我和我的助手们已经看到等离子体注射到当地的动植物中。由于没有观察到任何副作用 ， 我们可以得出结论 ， 该过程是绝对安全的。<page>继续使用等离子体火焰 ， 享受它对你身体的所有奇妙效果。“如果你去过血浆 ， 请回到我身边。<page>我们正在收集一些帐户 ， 但我们相信每个帐户都将用于重要的研究！
secondary_translated_text: Now that you have proven you are a skilled assistant, you have brought me an interesting tool, the plasma bottle, which I invented.<page>With its help, we can introduce precious plastic directly into our bodies.<hpage>Your instrument looks sharp enough to break my shell, doesn't it? Why are you doing this? "<page>Supplementing your body's blood pressure is very beneficial! He will protect you from evil. I feel much better!“<page>Since I arrived, my assistants and I have seen plasma injected into local flora and fauna. Since no side effects were observed, we can conclude that the process is absolutely safe.<page>Keep using the plasma flame and enjoy all its wonderful effects on your body. "If you have been to plasma, please come back to me.<page>We are collecting some accounts, but we believe each account will be used for important research!

original_en_text: Ahh, and exactly the required amount! A satisfactory effort, assistant!<page>With this pure Plasmium extract, I may finally come to understand this wondrous substance.
original_zh_text: 啊，分量刚好足够！干得不错！<page>有这纯净生质液，终于能破解奥秘了！
translated_text: 这就是我们需要的金额。好吧 ， 先生。<page>在这种纯血浆提取物的帮助下 ， 我终于能够理解这种令人惊讶的物质。
secondary_translated_text: This is the amount we need. All right, sir.<page>With the help of this pure plasma extract, I was finally able to understand this surprising substance.

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: ” 请， 助手， 你能帮助我吗？“真的吗 ？ ”” 球已经打。血浆的恢复已经开始。
secondary_translated_text: "Please, assistant, can you help me? "Really? "The ball has been played. The recovery of plasma has begun.

original_en_text: <hpage>Take it, sir, though what insight it will grant you I cannot say.<page>Have faith, dear assistant... After all this I understand... the greatest knowledge comes only from faith... faith in Plasmium.<page>This blood you have collected... sparkles... I see it! A glorious form... a glorious future, shimmering back at us...
original_zh_text: <hpage>拿去吧，虽然不知能研究出什么。<page>要有信念，好助手……我现在明白了……真理源自信念……对生质液的信念……<page>你收集的血……在发光……我看见了！辉煌形态……辉煌未来……等着我们……
translated_text: <hpage>你不知道它对你意味着什么 ， 但你必须接受它。<page>亲爱的朋友们 ， 经过这一切 ， 我明白了 ， 最伟大的知识只能来自于对等离子体的信仰。<page>他收集的血液闪闪发光。一个光明的未来就在我们面前。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You don't know what it means to you, but you have to accept it.<page>Dear friends, after all this, I have learned that the greatest knowledge can only come from belief in plasma.<page>The blood he collected glistened. A bright future lies before us.

original_en_text: You decline, Assistant? You cannot. The buds... The harvest. It must occur... For the source, and your saving...
original_zh_text: 你拒绝？花苞……必须收割……为了源头，也为了救你……
translated_text: 助手 ， 你说 “不 ” 了吗 ？我们不能 ， 我们需要收获 ， 您的收入和您的储蓄。
secondary_translated_text: Assistant, did you say "no"? We can't, we need to reap, your income and your savings.

original_en_text: You would refuse?! There is much work to be done, and it is all so achingly slow when I have no aid!
original_zh_text: 你要拒绝？！这么多活要干，没助手进度太慢了！
translated_text: 你会拒绝这么做！有很多工作要做 ， 但如果你不帮忙 ， 一切都会变慢。
secondary_translated_text: You will refuse to do this! There is a lot of work to do, but if you don't help, everything will slow down.

original_en_text: Ohhhhh... Assistant? Is that you?... You return at last, my friend?<hpage>Sir, you are in a disturbing state. This substance sprouts from within your shell. Time will see it consume you entirely. Would you seek aid?<page>No... No... Assistant... you are confused. A wonderful thing, we become. The Plasmium, our great research... We have progressed.<page>The research must continue. Soon... I shall become a source.
original_zh_text: 呃啊啊……助手？是你吗……终于回来了……<hpage>先生，你身体状态异常。某种物质在你壳内滋生，迟早会吞噬你。需要帮助吗？<page>不……不……助手……你错了。我们在进化……生质液……研究大突破……<page>研究必须继续……很快……我将成为源头……
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。助理 ？是你吗 ？朋友们 ， 你终于回来了吗 ？<hpage>这种物质是由知觉产生的。随着时间的推移 ， 它会告诉你你已经完全筋疲力尽了。你需要帮助吗 ？<page>不 ， 对等离子体的研究正在增加。<page>调查将很快继续进行 ... ...我会是源头。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Assistant? Is that you? Friends, are you finally back?<hpage>This substance is produced by perception. Over time, it will tell you that you are completely exhausted. Do you need help?<page>No, research on plasmas is increasing.<page>The investigation will continue soon... ... I will be the source.

original_en_text: Assistant! Have you come to refill your reserve of Plasmium?
original_zh_text: 助手！你是来补充生质液的？
translated_text: 助手！你是来装血浆的吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! Are you here to hold plasma?

translated_text: 恢复血浆积累。
secondary_translated_text: Restoration of plasma accumulation.

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>I have not, sir. I am curious though, about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is indisputable fact.<page>Plasmium was first discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Now! To my work I must return! Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, or chance upon my truant assistant, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>没见过。不过我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>好了！我要继续工作了！除非你对生质液感兴趣，或者碰见我那翘班助手，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: 你在干什么？嗯 ， 对吧 ？新的面孔！” 你不想打扰我， 是吗？事实上？我们正在对这条曲折的隧道进行严格的研究。<page>你从来没有见过一个助手， 是吗？什么样的休息？速度 ， 速度 ， 可靠性。<hpage>但是我对这个设备和蓝色液体感兴趣 ， 什么样的研究消耗能量 ？<page>是的 ， 对。是的 ， 是的 ， 这种神奇的材料也会让你着迷！惊喜之外的奇迹， 精彩的材料！<page>血浆。史无前例的自然奇观愈合伤口 ， 加强外壳。我相信我可以忍受死亡。<hpage>这座山叫什么名字？你以前见过他吗 ？他们看起来很相似。<page>毫无疑问 ， 非洲大陆的灰色和贫瘠的土壤不可能产生如此奇怪的东西。<page>这些等离子体被发现隐藏在法罗群岛边缘附近的海水深处 ， 在他的指导下 ， 他们被带到一个洞穴中 ， 研究它们如何在未知的地方茁壮成长。<page>来吧 ， 现在！我要回去工作了！如果你不在我的宝贵血浆中 ， 或者知道我没有助手 ， 请让我休息。"
secondary_translated_text: What are you doing? Yeah, right? New faces!" You don't want to bother me, do you? Actually? We are conducting a rigorous study of this winding tunnel.<page>You've never met an assistant, have you? What kind of rest? Speed, speed, reliability.<hpage>But I am interested in this device and blue liquid, what kind of research consumes energy?<page>Yes, right. Yes, yes, this amazing material will fascinate you too! Miracles beyond surprises, wonderful materials!<page>Plasma. An unprecedented natural wonder heals wounds and strengthens the shell. I believe I can endure death.<hpage>What is the name of this mountain? Have you seen him before? They look very similar.<page>There is no doubt that the gray and barren soil of the African continent could produce something so strange.<page>The plasmas were found hidden deep in the water near the edge of the Faroe Islands, and under his guidance they were taken to a cave to study how they thrive in unknown places.<page>Come on, now! I have to get back to work! If you are not in my precious plasma, or know that I have no assistant, please let me rest. "

original_en_text: There... more. Let it seep deep into your shell... do not begrudge the pain...
original_zh_text: 灌满了……让液体渗入甲壳深处……别怕疼……
translated_text: 你离开了 ... ...不要嫉妒痛苦。
secondary_translated_text: You left... ... Don't be jealous of pain.

original_en_text: The Pure Plasmium... you have it. I can... smell it on you.
original_zh_text: 纯净生质液……你带来了。我闻到了……
translated_text: 等离子体 — 我能闻到你的气味。
secondary_translated_text: Plasma-I can smell you.

original_en_text: Through consumption of the blood... we shall at last attain enlightenment...<page>For your reward... take the gland from within my shell... my gift to you.<page>I have no more need of it... and it shall grant you... unending reserves of Plasmium...<page>Yes... Plasmium. Pure... beautiful... Plasmium...
original_zh_text: 吸收生质血……我们终将开悟……<page>给你的奖励是……拿走吧……我壳里的腺体……<page>我不需要了……它会给你……无限生质液……<page>没错……生质液……纯净……美丽……
translated_text: 他们将吃血 ， 并将在适当的时候被揭示。<page>作为奖励 ， 请把我皮肤上的铁去掉。<page>我们不再需要它 ， 我们会给你一个无限的山区储备。<page>” 是的， 先生。李说 ...关于 Plasma
secondary_translated_text: They will eat blood and will be revealed in due course.<page>As a reward, please remove the iron from my skin.<page>We no longer need it, and we will give you an unlimited mountain reserve.<page>"Yes, sir. Li said... About Plasma

original_en_text: Assistant! How goes your work? Have you extracted a sufficient amount of Plasmium for me?
original_zh_text: 助手！进展如何？提取到足够生质液了吗？
translated_text: 助手！你的工作怎么样 ？等离子体足够吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! How is your job? Is there enough plasma?

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he went and died, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那死鬼助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: 这太不可思议了！任务中的两个错误将大大提高探测速度。<page>来吧 ， 现在！在我去世之前 ， 我的前助手在他的地下室小屋里用等离子体饲养蚊子。<page>如前所述 ， 按钮必须成熟 ， 并且所含的蜂蜜必须在成熟之前提取。<page>有了正确的指甲工具 ， 蜂蜜采集是一个简单的过程。我会借你一根针。<page>当你找到按钮时 ， 用针头填充它 ， 直到它准备好了 ， 然后将针头放在按钮的中心。一旦你离开它 ， 它会看起来干净 ， 吸蜂蜜。<page>收集所需样品后 ， 请将样品退还给我。通过正确的蜂蜜和正确的测试 ， 等离子体显示出更令人惊叹的特性。
secondary_translated_text: This is unbelievable! Two errors in the mission will greatly speed up detection.<page>Come on, now! Before I passed away, my former assistant used plasma to raise mosquitoes in his basement cabin.<page>As mentioned earlier, the button must be ripe and the honey it contains must be extracted before ripening.<page>With the right nail tools, honey collection is a simple process. I will lend you a needle.<page>When you find the button, fill it with the needle until it is ready, then place the needle in the center of the button. Once you leave it, it will look clean and suck honey.<page>After collecting the required samples, please return the samples to me. With the right honey and the right testing, the plasma shows even more amazing properties.

original_en_text: Are you so enchanted by the Plasmium that you will not part with it? You are more like that dolt Zango than I first thought!<page>Its enlightenings are beyond your meagre mind! Give me the phial, assistant, or the deeper secrets of this substance will never be revealed!
original_zh_text: 舍不得交出来？你和赞戈那蠢货一个德行！<page>你这脑子参不透其中奥秘的！不交出生质液就永远别想知道秘密！
translated_text: 你不想放弃 ， 因为你被这个美丽的国家所吸引 ？珊瑚看起来比它们看起来要多。<page>请给我一个瓶子和一个帮助。否则 ， 这个问题的最深层次的秘密将永远不会被揭露。
secondary_translated_text: You don't want to give up because you are attracted to this beautiful country? Corals look more than they seem.<page>Please give me a bottle and help. Otherwise, the deepest secrets of this issue will never be revealed.

original_en_text: Aahhh... and you have been using your Plasmium... good. Let me replenish your reserve...
original_zh_text: 啊……你一直在注射生质液……很好。让我给你补满……
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。等离子体的利用率很高。我们将尊重您的预订。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. The utilization rate of plasma is high. We will respect your reservation.

original_en_text: Now. Share the discovery... Take this Plasmium Phial... Plunge it deep. Feel its vigour soak your shell...<page>If more is needed... If the Plasmium runs dry... return. Visit me again... That you may live, long... my loyal assistant.
original_zh_text: 现在，分享成果……拿着生质液瓶……扎进去……感受活力渗透……<page>用完再来找我……这样你才能……活得长久……我的好助手……
translated_text: 快速分享结果。Vial 盘子 ： 感受皮肤的活力 ， 你会感觉到它。<page>如果你需要更多。当你的血浆干涸时 ， 再看看我 ， 你会活得很长。
secondary_translated_text: Share results quickly. Vial Plate: Feel the vitality of your skin and you will feel it.<page>If you need more. When your plasma dries up, look at me again, you will live a long time.

secondary_translated_text: Cradle game

secondary_translated_text: fanatics.

secondary_translated_text: I bought my first Christina.

secondary_translated_text: The soul of steel.

original_zh_text: 击败“斯卡尔歌后”卡梅莉塔
translated_text: 斯卡辛加卡梅里塔酒店 The Ska Singa Camerita

original_zh_text: 在畸芽之咒状态下击败苍白之母
translated_text: 妈的 ， 奶奶。

original_en_text: <hpage>Very well. This final rite... what would you have me do?<page>The time... of birth is close. Now give... its shell. Host... the final rite.<page>The time of birth... is near.

translated_text: <hpage>好吧 ， 好吧 ， 这是个仪式 ， 你想让我做什么 ？<page>什么是时间？出生的时刻即将到来 ， 现在让我告诉你 ， 他是宴会的最后一位客人。<page>出生的时间越来越近。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Okay, okay, it's a ritual. What do you want me to do?<page>What is time? The moment of birth is coming, and now let me tell you that he was the last guest at the banquet.<page>The time of birth is getting closer and closer.

original_en_text: You may rest here in this sacred place, but know, if you choose to step further, you shall see my weapon raised.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，但记住，越界意味着面对我的兵刃。
translated_text: 你们可以在这个神圣的地方休息 ， 但如果你们决定走得更远 ， 你们将看到我的手到来。
secondary_translated_text: You can rest in this sacred place, but if you decide to go further, you will see my hand coming.

original_en_text: The time... the time of birth approaches. The bud cries. Yearning. The final rite may begin.<page>White shell. Red cloak. Bug strong and old. The time of birth is near. Aid now the final rite.
original_zh_text: 时刻……诞生之时将至。花苞啼哭。终仪可启。<page>白面红袍。古老强虫。诞生之时已至，此刻助我终仪。
translated_text: 现在是时候了 ， 诞生的时刻已经到来 ， 谎言在尖叫 ， 投票开始了。<page>白色皮肤。红外套。昆虫是强壮和古老。出生的时间越来越近了。我会帮助你完成最后的仪式。
secondary_translated_text: Now is the time, the moment of birth has arrived, lies are screaming, and voting has begun.<page>White skin. Red coat. Insects are strong and ancient. The time of birth is getting closer and closer. I will help you complete the final ritual.

original_en_text: P... Pollip Hearts. Gathered. Gathered all. All that is needed, is given.
translated_text: P.C. 先生我不知道。息肉的心把你绑在一起 ， 给了她她所需要的一切。
secondary_translated_text: P.C. Sir, I don't know. The polyp heart binds you together and gives her everything she needs.

original_en_text: <hpage>I hear your request, but I must decline. My travels will take me far beyond this wood.<page>Decline. No. Decline, not. The time of birth approaches. The first rite must begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，我有要事在身，没法帮忙。<page>拒绝。不可。诞生之时将至。仪式必启。
translated_text: <hpage>我听了你的请求 ， 但我不得不拒绝。“我的旅程远远超出了这片树林。<page>他没有堕落 ， 他被拒绝了 ， 分娩的时刻已经到来。第一个仪式开始。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I listened to your request, but I had to refuse. "My journey goes far beyond these woods.<page>He has not fallen, he has been rejected, and the time for childbirth has come. The first ceremony began.

original_en_text: <hpage>If you have knowledge or power to grant, I will aid you. These Pollip Hearts you desire... they can be found about the wood?<page>P... Pollip Hearts. Found in the wood. Yes, bug.<page>Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.

translated_text: <hpage>如果您有任何知识或技能 ， 我们可以帮助您。您想要的聚乙烯你能在树上找到他吗？<page>P.S.我不知道。我是 Polyphemos 的心脏。我在树林里找到了他。<page>我在找粉红色的花朵。心 ， 心 ， 心。<page>我需要一个鲤鱼精神来携带它们 ， 昆虫和力量共享。

I found him in the woods.<page>I'm looking for pink flowers. Heart, heart, heart.<page>I need a carp spirit to carry them, insects and power to share.

translated_text: 穿上红色外套 ， 是时候恢复了。<page>第一个仪式结束后 ， 他们准备分娩。<page>雷沃 ... ...是的 ， 我坚决拒绝。
secondary_translated_text: Put on a red coat and it's time to recover.<page>After the first ceremony, they prepared to give birth.<page>Revo... ... Yes, I firmly refuse.

original_en_text: <hpage>I am unable to help you. Not now. Perhaps another traveller will offer aid.<page>None... none come now. Once times, many bugs. Many. Now none. The final rite... the time of birth approaches...
original_zh_text: <hpage>我现在无法帮助你，或许会有其他旅者伸出援手。<page>无虫……曾有许多……如今无虫。终仪……诞生之时将至……
translated_text: <hpage>你无法帮助自己 ， 但你可以帮助其他旅行者。<page>有很多错误 ， 没有人会犯 ， 有些人会犯 ， 但到目前为止还没有最后的事件。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You can't help yourself, but you can help other travelers.<page>There are many mistakes that no one will make, some will make, but so far there is no final incident.

original_en_text: Bug. Red cloak. Far-travelled. Bring it here... the bud.<page>It calls. It cries for the rite. Offer it.
original_zh_text: 虫。红袍虫。远旅者。你带来了……花苞。<page>它在呼唤。呼唤仪式。献上吧。
translated_text: 红色的衣服离这里很远 ， 请把它带到这里来。<page>我们需要意识 ， 我们提供。
secondary_translated_text: The red dress is far away from here, please bring it here.<page>We need awareness, and we provide it.

original_en_text: Then go no further, that peace may remain between us.

translated_text: 你不必再去了。我们之间有和平。
secondary_translated_text: You don't have to go anymore. There is peace between us.

original_en_text: The bud... weak. New. It must be nourished.<page>Nnn... nourished. It will be nourished.

secondary_translated_text: This is a weak news... ... They need to be fed.<page>Oh, my God! "You can feed us.

original_en_text: Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the precious hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.
original_zh_text: 寻找紫花。内有……珍贵花芯。<page>诞生之时将至。带来花芯，共享力量。
translated_text: 我在找粉红色的花朵。宝贝宝贝<page>我需要一个鲤鱼精神来携带它们 ， 昆虫和力量共享。
secondary_translated_text: I'm looking for pink flowers. baby Baby<page>I need a carp spirit to carry them, insects and power to share.

original_zh_text: ……诞生之时将至。现在，花芯仪式。<page>虫。只剩你。无虫来此。<page>仪式需要花芯。带来此处。

original_en_text: You may remain here and rest, if you choose. I am no enemy of yours. Only if you try to step beyond will I raise my weapon against you.<hpage>Then tell me, warrior, of the shrine you guard. These caves on wood’s edge seem long forgotten.<page>Some things may be hidden, but never forgotten. The shrine remains to remember the wood’s first seed, her that once was and always is.<page>I am the last bound to protect it. Sadly, in that service, many have fallen to my blade.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，只要不越界，我就不是你的敌人。<hpage>那就说说这处圣所吧。这深林边缘的洞窟似乎早已被遗忘。<page>事物或许会被被隐藏，但不会被遗忘。最初之种记得这处圣所，而她永恒存在。<page>我是最后一位守卫者。很遗憾，至今已有无数试图越界的亡魂。

He always does this, even though he is used to it.<page>Unfortunately, in this incident, many people were knocked down by my sword.

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss courier! Pharloom’s bugs are wishing, waiting, sad and scared. The deliverings are needed, now more than more!

translated_text: <page=S>交货丢失了！坠落的昆虫充满了希望和期望 ， 痛苦和恐惧 ， 现在他们需要交付 ， 但这不是全部。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Delivery is lost! The falling insects are full of hope and expectation, pain and fear, and now they need to be delivered, but that's not all.

original_en_text: But what’s this?! I smell something on you right now! You have a relic for me!
original_zh_text: 慢着！你身上有味儿！揣着古董呢！
translated_text: 这是什么 ？现在我听到你的声音了！” 你有一个遗产。"
secondary_translated_text: What is this? Now I hear your voice!" You have a legacy. "

original_en_text: Aha! The spines! Specimen, you have them! Then it is time, indeed! Bzzt! To free you of your wriggling torment, and show my genius clear!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！棘刺到手！病患，该手术了！滋滋！让你摆脱痛苦，见证本神医天才手段吧！
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！赛季冠军 ， 现在是时候了。M.M.M.它将你从幻觉的痛苦中解放出来 ， 让你清楚地看到我的天才！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Season championship, now is the time. M.M.M. It frees you from the pain of hallucination and allows you to see my genius clearly!

original_en_text: Oh my, what a state you’re in! You look like you’re one breath away from keeling over dead!<hpage>I will continue to live, madam, but I am indeed afflicted. A parasite has taken root within my shell... Perhaps you have something that could help me? A medicine?<page>Mmm, not so sure I stock anything like that. You should ask Pavo there. It’s his job to give directions and such, so he may have some useful advice.<page>In the meantime... shopping itself is a type of medicine, isn’t it? You should buy something now. Given your condition, this might be your last chance!
original_zh_text: 圣堡在上！你这模样看着像要咽气了似的！<hpage>还死不了，女士，但确实抱恙。甲壳遭受寄生……可有药能治？<page>唔，我这不卖药。去问帕沃吧，他管指路，或许有招。<page>话说回来……购物也算疗愈嘛！趁还能动快买点，过了这村没这店！
translated_text: 你是谁？你看起来像是要死了！<hpage>我还活着 ， 但我不快乐。寄生虫已经在我的壳里扎根了吗 ？我可以帮你什么吗？你的药怎么样 ？<page>我不知道是否有这样的东西。我问包裹。您的工作是提供指导等 ， 以便您可以提供有用的建议。<page>与此同时 ， 在 ...购物本身就是一种毒品 ， 对吧 ？事实上？鉴于目前的情况 ， 这可能是我们最后的机会。
secondary_translated_text: Who are you? You look like you're going to die!<hpage>I am still alive, but I am not happy. Has the parasite taken root in my shell? Is there anything I can do for you? How's your medicine?<page>I don't know if there is such a thing. I asked about the package. Your job is to provide guidance, etc., so that you can provide useful advice.<page>At the same time, at... Shopping is a drug in itself, right? Actually? Given the current situation, this may be our last chance.

original_en_text: <page=S>Ughhh! What-what is this? Your body is all twisting, creaking! Horrid fiend inside! <hpage>A parasite has lodged deep inside my shell. It has taken some strength of will to keep its thrashing at bay.<page=T>With a shell like such, you cannot be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would-would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=S>呃！什、什么东西？您甲壳里在扭动！有怪物！<hpage>是寄生体，暂时压制住了。<page=T>这样可不能送货！会污、污染货物！<hpage>有道理，若我能除掉它，或许再来帮忙。
translated_text: <page=S>哦！哦！你在干什么？你的身体在旋转和燃烧！有一个可怕的恶魔。<hpage>寄生虫被困在我的外壳里 ， 我必须有意愿停止。<page=T>有了这样的盒子 ， 就不可能停止交付。您可能已经感染了您想要的产品。<hpage>交付是好的。如果你能摆脱寄生虫 ， 请回来帮忙。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Oh! Oh! What are you doing? Your body is spinning and burning! There is a terrible demon.<hpage>The parasite is trapped in my shell, and I must have the will to stop.<page=T>With a box like this, it is impossible to stop delivery. You may have been infected with the product you want.<hpage>Delivery is good. If you can get rid of the parasite, please come back and help.

original_en_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slave? I am a traveller, stranger, not a slave.<page>Grnk. Exactly what a slave would say. Begone!
original_zh_text: 你来做什么，奴隶？<hpage>奴隶？我是旅者，不是奴隶。<page>哼，奴隶都这么说。滚！
translated_text: ” 知道， 你想要什么？" "<hpage>还有奴隶吗 ？“我是一个旅行者 ， 一个陌生人 ， 不是一个奴隶。<page>1 月！奴隶们说了什么 ？快跑快跑！
secondary_translated_text: "Know, what do you want? " "<hpage>Are there still slaves? "I am a traveler, a stranger, not a slave.<page>January! What did the slaves say? Run, run, run!

original_en_text: <hpage>Soon, Pavo, I shall calm the chaos. Please guard these bugs safe till then.<page>Of course, dear resident! Of course! Know all our faith, and our wishes go with you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，我会尽快平息混乱。在此之前，请守护好这些虫子。<page>放心吧，亲爱的居民！请带上我们全体的信念与祈愿前行吧。
translated_text: <hpage>迟早 ， 帕沃 ， 我会结束混乱。<page>亲爱的居民！是啊 ， 不！我们所有的希望和期望都与你同在。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sooner or later, Paavo, I will end the chaos.<page>Dear residents! Yeah, no! All our hopes and expectations are with you.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries will escape your pockets at the worst of times, and I’m a deft claw at stringing them tight! I can string you a whole necklace, safe and stylish.
original_zh_text: 危急时刻念珠易失，但我能将其编成项链！既牢靠又时髦！
translated_text: 在最坏的情况下 ， 玫瑰会滑进你的口袋。我可以把指甲绑好！您可以绑定所有项链 ， 既安全又优雅。
secondary_translated_text: In the worst case scenario, roses will slip into your pocket. I can tie my nails! You can bind all necklaces safely and gracefully.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have taken your wish, Tipp. If I find your brother safe, I’ll be sure to send him back this way.<page>My many thanks, miss saving! You are brave-brave. Same as brother! My faith goes all with you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我接下了你的祈愿，若找到皮尔，会让他回这里。<page>多谢救星小姐！您和皮尔一样勇、勇敢！祝您好运！
translated_text: <hpage>如果我看到我哥哥没事 ， 我会带他回去。<page>“谢谢你 ， 萨尔瓦多 ， 你像你哥哥一样勇敢。“我的信心与你同在 ” 。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I see my brother is okay, I'll take him back.<page>"Thank you, Salvador, you are as brave as your brother. "My faith is with you."

original_en_text: Up there, in that Citadel, the fabled oil is waiting. Bestow it upon this fine pinmaster, and your blade shall sing louder yet.<hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. Keep your skills sharp.
original_zh_text: 圣堡藏着秘油。取来此油，你的针鸣将响彻纺络！<hpage>我会寻得此油，请针匠磨好利爪等候。
translated_text: 把它留给这位温柔的乐器演奏者 ， 他的剑将会唱得更响亮。<hpage>寻找机油并打磨 Finmaster 技术。
secondary_translated_text: Leave it to this gentle instrumentalist, and his sword will sing louder.<hpage>Find oil and polish Finmaster technology.

original_en_text: Now now! What’s all this? Infested are you, bzzt?<page>Do you even know who I am? Why, ‘tis the great Yarnaby, genius physician, unfairly outcast, who now towers before you!<hpage>I apologise for intruding upon your work, but if you are the skilled physician you claim, I ask your assistance.<hpage>A parasite has wormed its way inside of me. Its roots twist and pull inside my shell, draining my strength. If you possess the skills and tools, I would see it removed.<page>Bzzt! Well, well! So you’re a special, sickly specimen, are you?! That changes matters, yes. Turns them on their head!<page>Let me see. Hm. Not haunted, indeed. No Silk-sickness. But something strange has certainly clawed its way in!<page>These “roots” that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something nasty inside a shell that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!<page>...Hmmm, but to crack your stiff shell we’ll first need some extra strength. The healing can be done, yes! But before that my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 哟哟！这是什么情况？被寄生了，滋滋？<page>知道我是谁吗？伟大的雅纳碧！遭庸才排挤的天才医师！<hpage>冒昧打扰，但若您真如自称般医术高明，还请相助。<hpage>有寄生体钻入了我的躯壳，在体内扎根生长，吸收气力。若您真有本事，请帮我去除。<page>滋滋！哎哟！特殊病例啊？！这就另当别论了！<page>让本神医瞧瞧。嗯……非邪咒非丝病。但确实有怪东西钻进去了！<page>折磨你的'根须’……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！<page>……但想撬开你这硬壳，得先升级机器！
translated_text: 快点 ， 快点！快点 ， 快点！你在干什么？你被感染了吗 ？<page>你知道他们是什么吗？一个伟大的阿拉伯人 ， 一个伟大的医生 ， 有一个不公正的地方 ， 但现在他比你更伟大。<hpage>我很抱歉打扰你 ， 但如果你是合格的医生 ， 我希望我能帮助你。<hpage>寄生虫入侵了我们的身体 ， 根在我的壳里扭曲 ， 消耗了我的力量。“有了这些技能和工具 ， 你将被淘汰。<page>M. M.是的 ， 是的。这个变化很重要 ， 请再看看！<page>事实上 ， 没有鬼魂 ， 没有丝绸瓶 ， 奇怪的事情正在发生！<page>我的根很痛。我不知道细节 ， 但会没事的。<page>如果您需要从橱柜内清除烦人的东西 ， 您可以使用 Yarnavi 挤出机！这是我唯一的希望 ， 嘘！<page>...但是 ， 要打破壳 ， 首先需要额外的力量。愈合是可能的 ， 但在此之前 ， 你需要更新你的强大的供应商！
secondary_translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! What are you doing? Are you infected?<page>Do you know what they are? A great Arab, a great doctor, had an injustice, but now he is greater than you.<hpage>I'm sorry to bother you, but if you're a qualified doctor, I wish I could help you.<hpage>The parasite invaded our bodies, twisted its roots in my shell, consuming my strength. "With these skills and tools, you will be eliminated.<page>M. M. Yes, yes. This change is very important, please look again!<page>In fact, there are no ghosts, no silk bottles, and strange things are happening!<page>My roots hurt. I don't know the details, but it's gonna be okay.<page>If you need to remove annoying things from your cabinets, you can use the Yarnavi extruder! This is my only hope. Shh!<page>... However, to break the shell, extra strength is first needed. Healing is possible, but before that, you need to update your powerful supplier!

original_en_text: Travellers should always keep spare shards close by. We Bellharters were once praised for our fine claw-work. An art lost on most modern pilgrims... excepting yourself I’m sure.
original_zh_text: 旅者该随身带碎片。钟心镇的虫昔年以各种技艺闻名，如今朝圣者都不懂……你除外。
translated_text: 乘客必须随时携带备件。贝哈特欣赏他们美丽的指甲。大多数现代朝圣者相信他们已经失去了艺术 ， 除了他们自己什么都没有。
secondary_translated_text: Passengers must carry spare parts at all times. Behart admired their beautiful nails. Most modern pilgrims believe they have lost art and have nothing but themselves.

original_en_text: What a persistent little worm you are. Amuse me then. Why did you cut those poor bugs from their comforting curse?<hpage>There was old power in the creature that guided the thread, and a talent of Silk, now taken, that shall prove useful to me.<hpage>That the town is freed and its service returned is a benefit too. I may ofttimes feel myself apart from these bugs, but even I recoil to see Silk strung in such sickening service.<page>Grnk. To free them was no favour. But the gathering of power... In that goal, we may understand each other some.
original_zh_text: 真是阴魂不散的虫子。行啊，陪我解个闷。为何要把那些可怜虫从舒坦的诅咒里拽出来？<hpage>操控丝咒的古兽有我要的力量，它的灵丝天赋现已归我。<hpage>顺带让镇子回复往常也算好事。我虽与这些虫子不同，但见到灵丝被这般滥用也觉得恶心。<page>哼……蠢材才会解救他们！不过夺取力量这点……咱们倒是臭味相投。
translated_text: 你是个顽固的小昆虫。“你为什么要把这只可怜的昆虫从和平主义的诅咒中移除 ？ ”"<hpage>让丝绸诞生的生物拥有古老的力量 ， 现在带走我的丝绸的礼物帮助了我很多。<hpage>它们经常与昆虫分开。然而 ， 看到丝绸做这样一个令人不快的服务是令人厌恶的。<page>边境！“解放不是一种恩典 ， 而是一种力量的积累 ， 让我们稍微了解对方。"
secondary_translated_text: You are a stubborn little insect. "Why did you remove this poor insect from the curse of pacifism?”"<hpage>The creatures that gave birth to silk have ancient powers, and now the gift that took away my silk has helped me a lot.<hpage>They are often separated from insects. However, it is disgusting to see silk do such an unpleasant service.<page>Border! "Liberation is not a kind of grace, but an accumulation of strength that allows us to get to know each other a little. "

original_en_text: Ahh... I smell something on you. Heavy with the past, you are. You have a relic for me, don’t you?
original_zh_text: 啊哈……闻着老灰味儿了。你肯定藏着好货！
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。我背负着过去的重量。事实上？
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. I carry the weight of the past on my back. Actually?

original_en_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needle sings from your care. But I must ask, can the blade be honed further?<page>You seek further sharpening? Further than Plinney does provide? Impertinence! But... Maybe? But... No...<hpage>You hesitate? Then it is possible? Are you incapable? Should I seek others within the kingdom?<page>Wait! Yes. Seek not others, but an oil, fabled and fine. With it the Citadel once brought gleaming edge and point to its pins.<page>Though the Citadel’s pinmasters are long past, some small store of that miraculous elixir may remain within its halls.<page>Were even a meagre drop pilfered, and gifted upon Plinney, your blade could shine brighter still...<page>Just know, dear friend, the veiled bugs would be oh so unkind to the thief who’d claim that fine prize for themself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠手艺了得，此针经你打磨如获新生。但还能更锋利么？<page>还想更锋利？嫌普林尼手艺糙？真是无礼！不过……或许？但……不行……<hpage>犹豫？那就是可行？难道你办不到？我得另寻高匠？<page>慢着！不用找别家，但要找油。传说圣堡藏着秘油，昔年靠它磨出绝世神锋。<page>虽说圣堡针匠早已绝迹，但没准还囤着点。<page>偷来几滴给我，您这针刃还能更亮……<page>但丑话说前头，覆面虫对偷油贼可不客气。
translated_text: <hpage>我的针在为你的护理唱歌 ， 但我有一个问题 ： 刀锋利吗 ？<page>您是否正在寻找额外的教育？比佩林所能提供的还要多吗 ？没有意义！更多 ... ...妈...这个数字是<hpage>你有疑问吗？是可能的吗 ？他们无能为力吗 ？“你需要在王国里找到另一个人吗？»<page>等待 ， 等待。别再看了 ， 你会发现传奇般的精致油。因此 ， 这座城堡曾经以闪闪发光的边缘和荆棘表示过它。<page>城堡的主人是过去的事情 ， 但城堡可能有一个充满神奇药水的小商店。<page>从费城偷来的 ， 剑点亮了。<page>如你所知 ， 这种面具蠕虫对于想要切割的小偷来说非常有害。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>My needle is singing for your care, but I have a question: Is the knife sharp?<page>Are you looking for additional education? More than Palin can provide? No meaning! more... ... Mom... this figure is<hpage>Do you have any questions? Is it possible? Is there nothing they can do? "Do you need to find another person in the kingdom?"<page>Wait, wait. Stop looking and you will find legendary refined oils. Therefore, the castle once represented it with its glittering edges and thorns.<page>The owner of the castle is a thing of the past, but the castle may have a Ministores full of magical potions.<page>Stolen from Philadelphia, sword lit up.<page>As you know, this mask worm is very harmful to thieves who want to cut it.

original_en_text: You’ve a tool pouch on you? I can add a few pockets so you can carry more tools, and more shards to make’em. My sewing skills are quite renowned in these parts.
original_zh_text: 带着工具袋？我可以给你多缝几格，附近就数我的手艺最好了。
translated_text: 我有一套吗？通过添加多个口袋 ， 您可以携带更多的工具和细节。她的缝纫技巧是众所周知的。
secondary_translated_text: Do I have a set? By adding multiple pockets, you can carry more tools and details. Her sewing skills are well known.

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss saving! We are together, at last! My brother and myself, both returned to safety’s safe.<hpage>I am pleased you have found one another. If you are planning to venture out again, I would urge you reconsider for the sake of your shells.<page=S>We know it! Muchly-much! We cannot be leaving this home of bells. No more! Heres we will remain, for shells to survive. <page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those pilgrims, them that pass, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=T>Even you, miss saving! Yes-yes! Saving is done. Our wishes now we ask. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！我们兄弟终于团圆啦！<hpage>我很欣慰你们能重逢，但若再想外出送货，要小心。<page=S>知、知道啦！我们再也不离开钟心镇了。保命要紧。<page=T>但我们想了个妙、妙招！让路过的朝圣者帮忙送货，给点小报酬！<page=T>救星小姐也可以！您送完了货，换我们帮您实现愿望！<page=S>每单顺、顺利送达，客户都会给念珠！快看待送清单！
translated_text: <page=S>我失去了我的储蓄。终于在一起了！我丈夫和我都安全回来了。<hpage>我很高兴他们找到了彼此。如果你想回去 ， 我建议你看看封面。<page=S>我明白了！这里有很多人！我不能把我的手表拿走。再也没有什么了！“如果贝壳活了下来 ， 我们就会留下来。<page=T>朝圣者和路人会帮助像我们这样的小奖品吗 ？<page=T>没有救援！哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！救援工作已经完成。让我告诉你我们的愿望 ， 是时候成为供应商了！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>I lost my savings. Finally together! My husband and I are back safely.<hpage>I'm so happy they found each other. If you want to go back, I suggest you take a look at the cover.<page=S>I understand! There are many people here! I can't take my watch away. There is nothing more! "If the shells survive, we will stay.<page=T>Will pilgrims and passers-by help small prizes like ours?<page=T>No rescue! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Rescue work has been completed. Let me tell you our wish, it's time to become a supplier!

original_en_text: Lost within that fortress above, the fabled oil of my profession... Such sharpness one could achieve...<page>But, oh! ‘Tis an awful thing. Too cruel, the many stabbing pins you’d face in its seeking.
original_zh_text: 圣堡里头藏着的针匠秘油……那锋利劲……<page>唉，但要寻得，这一路上有多险呐！多少针刺等着扎穿您的壳呢。
translated_text: 我传奇的石油工作在上面的堡垒中丢失了。<page>妈妈 ， 哦 ， 哦 ， 她是残忍的 ， 她在搜索过程中遇到了许多刀伤。
secondary_translated_text: My legendary oil job was lost in the fortress above.<page>Mom, oh, oh, she was cruel, she encountered many stab wounds during the search.

original_en_text: We’ve made a good start on the painting, resident! Give us a little more time and your bell’ll be shining like new.
original_zh_text: 刷漆进度不错！再给点时间，保准焕然一新！
translated_text: 我的绘画有了一个良好的开端。过一会儿 ， 你的仆人必像新人一样发光。
secondary_translated_text: My painting had a good start. After a while, your servants will shine like a new man.

original_en_text: Hnff... So the slave comes seeking?<page>I’ve heard it. Wishing on a world cut free, yes? Along with my nephew up there. Sounds he’s sunk as simple as you.<hpage>Will you not provide your aid, bug? This trap he plans requires power, and I suspect you’re hoarding more than most.<page>Oh no. I’ll give it. Not in the hope you’ll succeed... Bah! In that, there’s slim chance. I give just to see that restless energy unleashed.<page>So much soul, found and formed. Generations of it, all going to waste. Better it’s given a chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 嗤……奴隶来讨东西了？<page>听说了。想挣脱束缚，取得自由？还有我侄儿掺和？他跟你一样蠢。<hpage>不帮忙吗？他那陷阱缺少力量，而你囤了不少吧？<page>帮，当然帮。但不是指望你们成事……哈！八成没戏。就想看你们折腾。<page>囤了世代的灵魂全在浪费，不如放把火烧个痛快。
translated_text: 奴隶带走了吗？<page>你有没有听说过世界是自由的 ？事实上？还有我的孙子们。<hpage>“你能帮我吗 ， 鲍勃？“你的陷阱需要力量 ， 我怀疑你能救得比大多数人多。"<page>” 不， 不， 我给你。“我不想让你成功。付出代价 ， 让你的担心能量被释放。<page>许多灵魂将被发现和训练 ， 几代人的努力将被浪费和烧毁。
secondary_translated_text: Were the slaves taken?<page>Have you ever heard that the world is free? Actually? And my grandchildren.<hpage>"Can you help me, Bob? "Your traps require strength, and I suspect you can save more than most people. "<page>"No, no, I'll give it to you. "I don't want you to succeed. Pay the price and let your worrying energy be released.<page>Many souls will be discovered and trained, and the efforts of generations will be wasted and burned.

translated_text: 携带封闭的行李。<br>- 妈 ？
secondary_translated_text: Carry enclosed luggage.<br>- Mom?

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, my shell has been overcome by a foreign force. Plasmium, it has been called in your land.<hpage>Though the substance provides some regenerative aid, I feel my mind at dangerous risk of being overtaken.<page>Bzzt! Maybe overtaken is good? Better even? Why go thinking yours is a mind so precious?<page>The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，我的躯壳遭异物侵占，在您这似乎叫生质液。<hpage>此物虽然能疗伤，但我感到意识有被夺舍的风险。<page>滋滋！被占岂不是更好？你这脑子有啥金贵的？<page>本神医只医病患！不医因病得利的。享你的福去，别烦我！
translated_text: <hpage>我的外壳是由外力控制的 ， 在地球上 ， 它被称为等离子体。<hpage>这种物质提供了再生的帮助 ， 但我的大脑觉得我处于过度的风险中。<page>- M. M.除此之外 ， 还有什么好事吗 ？或者更好的东西？你的想法为什么有用 ？<page>美丽的雅娜比治愈疾病！他们不是那些从痛苦中获利的人。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>My outer shell is controlled by external forces, and on earth it is called a plasma.<hpage>The substance provides regenerative help, but my brain feels like I'm at excessive risk.<page>- M. M. Other than that, is there anything good? Or something better? Why is your idea useful?<page>Beautiful Yanabi cures diseases! They are not the ones who profit from pain.

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket? What is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Pah. I care not for the miseries and struggles of them outside! None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，若您被外面的响动打扰，那我很抱歉。<page>嘁。外头虫子的死活关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 这是什么 ？我们现在应该做什么 ？那是什么声音 ？你在干什么？<hpage>如果你不接受土地的分配 ， 我将承担责任。"<page>哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！我不关心你的痛苦和痛苦 ， 他们不尊重我的愿景和我的过去！<page>你在这里非常有能力。“来吧 ， 你被绑架了。如果你有好东西 ， 别忘了带上。我买了他们。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? What should we do now? What is that sound? What are you doing?<hpage>If you do not accept the allocation of land, I will take responsibility. "<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! I don't care about your pain and suffering, they don't respect my vision and my past!<page>You are very capable here. "Come on, you've been kidnapped. If you have something good, don't forget to bring it with you. I bought them.

original_en_text: <page=S>Keep safe, miss courier! You and your deliverings, fragile both can be!
original_zh_text: <page=S>保重啊救星小姐！您和货物都伤不得！
translated_text: <page=S>你和你的孩子都很脆弱。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>You and your children are fragile.

original_en_text: <page=T>Do not wait, miss courier! You hold the deliverings, so nows you must away! A quick-quick bug, you must become yourself.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐，别耽搁了！拿着货物赶紧动、动身吧！要快！
translated_text: <page=T>“别等了 ， 信使 ， 我们有食物了 ， 我们走。错误在于你必须做你自己。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>"Don't wait, messenger, we have food, let's go. The mistake is that you have to be yourself.

original_en_text: <hpage>Tipp, I have promised a wish to an old bug of the Citadel, ingredients for a dish to stir a gourmand’s stomach.<hpage>Do you hold in your belongings a Courier’s Rasher? It seems a key element.<page>Courier’s Rasher! Not me, miss savings! Smelly, fatty foods, good for most. Not good for my sensitive stomach!<page>You want-want my brother, Pill! Pill is big. Pill loves rashers! Can prepare them fresh for you, but first, Pill must be found, saved, safe-safe!
original_zh_text: <hpage>蒂普，我答应了圣堡老虫做道大菜，需要送货虫的熏肉。<hpage>你身上有存货吗？若有，我想讨要。<page>熏肉？我才不带！油腻腻的，我肠胃可受不了！<page>您应、应该找皮尔！他块头大，爱死熏肉了！但得先找到他，救、救回来！
translated_text: <hpage>提示 ： 我想要一种烹饪材料 ， 一种古老的城堡钉钉 ， 可以让我的心感到惊讶。<hpage>您是否有产品的紧急信息 ？这似乎是一个关键因素。<page>这不是储蓄 ， 而是储蓄。有气味的脂肪食物不适合敏感的胃。<page>我希望我的兄弟彼得爱我。新鲜的药物可以制备 ， 但首先必须找到 ， 保存和安全地保存。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Tip: I wanted a cooking material, an ancient castle nail that would amaze my heart.<hpage>Do you have urgent information about your product? This seems to be a key factor.<page>It's not savings, it's savings. Sodorous fatty foods are not suitable for sensitive stomachs.<page>I hope my brother Peter loves me. Fresh medicines can be prepared, but first they must be found, preserved and stored safely.

original_en_text: Bzzt! What now?! Not another bother for the great Yarnaby?<hpage>Madam, I have returned with the spines requested. Allow me to enter, that you may remove this parasite from my shell.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！又干嘛？！还来烦伟大的雅纳碧？<hpage>女士，棘刺已准备好，请开门为我去除寄生体。
translated_text: M.M.M.我们现在该怎么办？你和 Abbey 有问题吗？<hpage>现在你带着必要的列回来了 ， 让我们从外壳中删除这个寄生虫。
secondary_translated_text: M.M.M. What should we do now? Do you have a problem with Abbey?<hpage>Now that you're back with the necessary columns, let's remove this parasite from the shell.

translated_text: 添加 ， 锐？
secondary_translated_text: Add, sharp?

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! My finest work by far. Pharloom may ail, but across its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！我毕生的杰作！旅者，纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: “卡尔 ， 卡尔！她用指甲。“这是我做过的最好的工作。跳跃可能会导致疼痛 ， 但在瓶子的黑暗中 ， 针头闪闪发光。
secondary_translated_text: "Carl, Carl! She uses her nails. "This is the best job I have ever done. Jumping can cause pain, but in the darkness of the bottle, the needle glows.

original_en_text: Care to refresh yourself in a steaming spa? Given your hard labours, I’m sure your shell would thank you for it.
original_zh_text: 想不想泡个蒸汽浴？劳累这么久，甲壳该舒坦下！
translated_text: 想在 SPA 放松吗？随着你的努力 ， 你的皮肤会感谢你。
secondary_translated_text: Want to relax in the SPA? As you work hard, your skin will thank you.

original_en_text: Twine-strung globes filled with gleamflies. These’ll brighten up even the darkest bell.
original_zh_text: 充满荧虫的玻璃球串成的灯串，再黑的钟屋都能照亮！
translated_text: 世界上有两道光。最黑暗的钟声响了。
secondary_translated_text: There are two lights in the world. The darkest bell rings.

original_en_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another grossy eater queen. Delivery for the big-big creature beyond the roaches. Maybe this one travels safer than last?
original_zh_text: <page=S>又一枚噬丝蛆女王的卵，给蟑螂堆旁的大、大块头。这次会比上回安全些吗？
translated_text: <page=S>邪恶的女王以便宜的价格将货物送给巨大的生物。这次旅行比以前的旅行安全吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>The evil queen gave the goods to the giant creature at a cheap price. Is this trip safer than previous trips?

original_en_text: Specimen, we must! There are secrets to uncover, bzzt! Progress can not be denied!
original_zh_text: 病患，我们必须搞清楚！有秘密就有揭秘，滋滋！进步是不可阻挡的！
translated_text: 我们需要一个有秘密要揭开的冠军。进步是不能否认的。
secondary_translated_text: We need a champion who has secrets to reveal. Progress cannot be denied.

original_en_text: <page=T>With your shell all a’wriggle, you can’t be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=T>甲壳里有东西在动，不能送货！会搞砸的！<hpage>嗯，若能解决寄生体，我会再来。
translated_text: <page=T>当水槽摇晃时 ， 你不能把任何东西带回家！污染物品。<hpage>交付是好的。如果你能摆脱寄生虫 ， 请回来帮忙。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>You can't take anything home when the sink rocks! Contaminant items.<hpage>Delivery is good. If you can get rid of the parasite, please come back and help.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Bravo! A specimen who sees my brilliance!<page>The task for you is simple. Head over into that tangled mess of cages, on the roads above the moors.<page>Two bugs hide away there, Benjin and Crull. Simple types, woefully ignorant... yet they have been useful in procuring me materials.<page>It’s Steel Spines I need. A full bundle of them, forged hard and sharp. Tougher than I’ve ever had. Tough enough to crack stone! And to pierce your thick shell, bzzt!<hpage>Then prepare your machine for my return, madam. I shall soon return with the spines, for I am eager to see myself freed.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！上道！是个识货的病患！<page>任务很简单：去沼地上边的铁笼堆找班金和克鲁尔。<page>那俩蠢货有我要的钢棘——要硬过石头！利到能捅穿你厚壳！<hpage>那请女士准备好机器，我这就去取棘刺来。
translated_text: - M. M.太棒了！这就是我天赋的冠军。<page>进入一个肮脏的笼子在沙漠的道路上。<page>这里有两个隐藏的错误 ： 精油和蓖麻。简单的家伙 ， 可悲的无知 ， 但他们对材料非常有用。<page>你所需要的只是钢铁。整个包装变得坚硬和锋利 ， 比我经历过的任何事情都难。经常离开你的壳 ， 单击！<hpage>准备好车子 ， 直到我回来 ， 我想自由 ， 然后我会勇敢地回来。"
secondary_translated_text: - M. M. Great! This is the champion of my talent.<page>Enter a filthy cage on the desert road.<page>Here are two hidden mistakes: essential oils and castor. Simple guys, sadly ignorant, but they are very useful for the material.<page>All you need is steel. The entire packaging became hard and sharp, harder than anything I had ever experienced. Leave your shell often and click!<hpage>Get the car ready until I come back, I want to be free, and then I will come back bravely. "

translated_text: 这个桌子。
secondary_translated_text: This table.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. My needle has seen much use in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect many more battles are due. I will value your further skills upon my blade. <page>It is a dangerous wish you accept of this poor pinmaster. I welly hope this one’s professional desire does not cost you your life.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我会把油取来，针匠。往后旅途愈发凶险，这针刃还多有用处，你的手艺对我大有助益。<page>我这祈愿确实太过危险，希望您别为此送了命。
translated_text: <hpage>我会找到油 ， 香料和我的针 ， 在这个残酷的王国中扮演着重要的角色。" "<page>接受这位可怜的路德运动员的愿望对你来说是危险的。我希望这个人的职业抱负不会以牺牲他的生命为代价。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I will find oil, spices and my needles that play an important role in this cruel kingdom. " "<page>Accepting the wishes of this poor Lutheran athlete is dangerous for you. I hope this man's professional ambitions will not come at the expense of his life.

original_en_text: If you insist on surviving your infestation, seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 非要治这寄生物，就去找被钟心镇放逐的雅纳碧。听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: 如果你声称自己在入侵中幸存下来 ， 那就去寻找被巴尔克哈特驱逐的尤纳维。
secondary_translated_text: If you claim to have survived the invasion, look for Yunawi, who was expelled by Balkhart.

original_en_text: I’ll waste no more words on a slave. Begone.
translated_text: 不要把时间浪费在奴隶身上！他有我一个人。
secondary_translated_text: Don't waste your time on slaves! He has me.

original_en_text: <page=T>More deliverings for those sad survivors in their cave below. <page=S>Deliver them quick-quick, miss courier! They will help much.
original_zh_text: <page=T>再给下面洞穴里那些可怜虫送趟货吧。<page=S>快点送去吧，救星小姐！能帮大忙呢！
translated_text: <page=T>它为下面洞穴中哀悼的幸存者提供了额外的安慰。<page=S>送货服务 ， 我送你。他们会提供大量的帮助。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>It provides added comfort to the mourning survivors in the cave below.<page=S>Delivery service, I'll send you. They will provide a lot of help.

original_en_text: That cry upon you, sister! Those are the sour sobs of a grey and twisted thing.<hpage>You speak of the bud? It is a mysterious thing indeed. In the dank swamps above the moor, I sought towards its plaintive wails, and found it resting there... Waiting, it almost seemed.<hpage>But you speak of its form, without sighting it upon me. Is it a thing familiar to you?... Have you heard these cries before?<page>Aye, yes! Not your own specimen, surely, but way back, other travellers did sometimes carry similar. Odd types they all were. Offerings they’d call the crying things, and towards the core of Shellwood they would trek.<page>Never I did see one again, not the buds nor the bugs that brought the gift...<page>If you’re planning to follow their path, I’ll wish on your safety, but ‘tis an ill omen to hear such sad sounds returned after so long.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐，你身上那哭声！是灰色扭曲之物发出的哀鸣。<hpage>你是说那花苞？确实神秘。我在沼泽深处追寻它的哀鸣，发现它就躺在那里……仿佛在等待着什么。<hpage>可你未见过实物却知其形态，莫非你认得此物？……或是曾听过这哭声？<page>啊，没错！以前确实有旅者携带过类似之物，尽是些怪客。他们称这哭嚎之物为祭品，然后向着甲木林深处进发。<page>此后我再未见过那些花苞，也没再遇见过献祭之虫……<page>如果你要去寻找它们的踪迹，愿你平安。但这悲哭声重现，实属不祥之兆。
translated_text: 姐姐哭了！它是灰色和变形的 ， 但怀疑酸性。<hpage>你在保险杠上吗 ？这真是一个谜 ， 在沙漠的沼泽中 ， 我寻找一口悲伤的叹息 ， 发现他躺在那里。我刚刚看到他。<hpage>我给了他一个表格 ， 但他没有把它放在里面。你听到那尖叫声了吗？<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！当然 ， 这不是他的标本 ， 但其他古代旅行者也有类似的标本 ， 都有奇怪的脸。他们大喊 “什么 ” 哭泣 ， 然后向谢伍德市中心游行。<page>我再也看不见了 ， 我再也看不见那束花 ， 我再也看不见带着礼物的昆虫。<page>如果你愿意跟随他的道路 ， 让我们为和平祈祷 ， 但长时间倾听痛苦的声音是一个警告信号。
secondary_translated_text: Sister cried! It was gray and deformed, but suspiciously acidic.<hpage>Are you on the bumper? It was a mystery, and in the desert swamp I searched for a sad sigh and found him lying there. I just saw him.<hpage>I gave him a form, but he didn't put it in it. Did you hear that scream?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Of course, this is not his specimen, but other ancient travelers have similar specimens, all with strange faces. They cried "what" and then marched towards downtown Sherwood.<page>I can no longer see, I can no longer see the bouquet of flowers, I can no longer see the insects with gifts.<page>If you are willing to follow his path, let us pray for peace, but listening to the sounds of pain for a long time is a warning sign.

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller, one hoping you were not too badly affected by the cursed snare set upon this town.<page>Pah! What binds them outside means nothing to me. None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，想看看你有没有被镇上的邪咒祸害。<page>嘁！外头虫子中招关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 这是什么 ？你在干什么？你在干什么？你是谁？你在干什么？你想要什么？<hpage>我只是一个旅行者 ， 我希望我不会受到这个小镇的陷阱的严重影响。<page>哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！封闭的东西对我来说没有意义 ， 对我的过去没有知识或尊重。<page>你在这里非常有能力。“来吧 ， 你被绑架了。如果你有好东西 ， 别忘了带上。我买了他们。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? What are you doing? Who are you? What are you doing? What do you want?<hpage>I'm just a traveler and I hope I won't be severely affected by this town's traps.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! What is closed has no meaning to me, no knowledge or respect for my past.<page>You are very capable here. "Come on, you've been kidnapped. If you have something good, don't forget to bring it with you. I bought them.

original_en_text: And now! This pinmaster must work! Let the sharpening begin!
original_zh_text: 好了！针匠该干活了！纺络许久未见的锋芒该再现了！
translated_text: 是时候了！Pingmaster 正在运行。让我们开始清理！
secondary_translated_text: It's time! Pingmaster is running. Let's start cleaning up!

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I defeated the cruel creature above the town, and awoke the old bell stilled by Silk. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了镇子上头的恶兽，敲醒了被灵丝封禁的古钟。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: 噪音又回来了。太小了 ， 孩子们失去了联系。<page>你是谁？不要切断它 ， 也不要否认它。<hpage>他为什么否认这一点 ？我把残忍的生物扔到城市上空 ， 唤醒了一只破旧的丝绸钟。<page>不快乐！如果你还活着 ， 你还在呼吸 ， 那么你就不快乐。只有死去的人才是幸福的。<page>“你是个奴隶 ， 婊子 ， 走吧。
secondary_translated_text: The noise is back. Too young, the children lost touch.<page>Who are you? Do not cut it off or deny it.<hpage>Why did he deny this? I threw cruel creatures over the city and awakened a dilapidated silk clock.<page>Unhappy! If you are still alive and you are still breathing, then you are not happy. Only the dead are happy.<page>"You're a slave, bitch, let's go.

original_en_text: Resident! What a marvel you are, continuing to dare the wilds and darkness, and returning home to us unscathed.<hpage>I return with hope worth sharing, Pavo. I have seen a way to calm this chaos, one I now work swiftly towards.<hpage>The chance remains slim, but if this town can hold, and my efforts succeed, Pharloom may see a future yet.
original_zh_text: 居民！您真是奇迹般的存在，外面如此黑暗危险，不仅仍旧只身闯荡，还能安然无恙地回来。<hpage>我是带着值得分享的希望回来的，帕沃。我已找到平息混乱之法，正全力推进。<hpage>虽然希望渺茫，但只要你们能继续坚守，只要我的努力能成功，纺络或许仍有未来。
translated_text: 令人惊讶的是 ， 尽管野生动物和黑暗 ， 并非法返回家园。<hpage>我带着分享的希望回来了 ， 并找到一种方法来平息这种混乱 ， 现在我正在努力工作。<hpage>目前还没有机会 ， 但如果这座城市坚持下去 ， 我的努力成功了 ， 那么法鲁将能够看到未来。
secondary_translated_text: Surprisingly, despite the wildlife and darkness, and illegally returned to their homes.<hpage>I came back with the hope of sharing and finding a way to calm the chaos, and now I am working hard.<hpage>There is no chance yet, but if the city persevere and my efforts succeed, then Faro will be able to see the future.

original_en_text: The Citadel crafted some marvellous machines, and this looks to be one of its finest! Apparently sent by some creepy slitherer hidden away up there, for sale only to you!
original_zh_text: 圣堡精工杰作！据说是上头阴森爬行的家伙带来的，这宝贝我只卖给你！
translated_text: 城堡创造了一个伟大的机器 ， 我认为这是最好的。当然 ， 疯狂的科学家们潜伏在那里。这是为您准备的！
secondary_translated_text: The castle created a great machine, and I think it's the best. Of course, crazy scientists are lurking there. This is for you!

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 我的工作是收集过去的残余。如果你发现一个漂亮的旧物品 ， 别忘了把它带到这里。我买了他们。
secondary_translated_text: My job is to collect remnants of the past. If you find a beautiful old object, don't forget to bring it here. I bought them.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can not aid you, couriers. Not now. My own tasks are too pressing to consider taking on your deliveries. <hpage>With luck, some pilgrims may pass with sound mind and strength remaining. They may choose to promise your wishes.<page=T>Then we shall pray they come, miss saving! Our thanks go muchly with you, still.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我帮不了，有要事在身。<hpage>若有神志清醒的朝圣者路过，或许他们会帮忙。<page=T>那就祈祷他们快来！还是谢谢您！
translated_text: <hpage>我帮不了你 ， 我帮不了你 ， 我帮不了你。我的工作太快了 ， 无法完成。"<hpage>如果你幸运的话 ， 会有纯洁而充满活力的朝圣者同意你的意图 ， 但事实并非如此。<page=T>过来 ， 我需要帮助 ， 谢谢！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I can't help you, I can't help you, I can't help you. My work is too fast to finish. "<hpage>If you are lucky, there will be pure and energetic pilgrims who agree with your intentions, but this is not the case.<page=T>Come here, I need help, thank you!

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them down. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I severed the thread and defeated the creature guiding the curse upon the town. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了丝线，灭了给镇子下咒的怪物。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: 噪音又回来了。太小了 ， 孩子们失去了联系。<page>你是谁？如果你剪了 ， 请不要剪。<hpage>他为什么否认这一点 ？他们杀死了统治这座被诅咒的城市的生物。<page>不快乐！如果你还活着 ， 你还在呼吸 ， 那么你就不快乐。只有死去的人才是幸福的。<page>“你是个奴隶 ， 婊子 ， 走吧。
secondary_translated_text: The noise is back. Too young, the children lost touch.<page>Who are you? If you cut it, please don't cut it.<hpage>Why did he deny this? They killed the creatures that ruled this cursed city.<page>Unhappy! If you are still alive and you are still breathing, then you are not happy. Only the dead are happy.<page>"You're a slave, bitch, let's go.

original_en_text: <page=T>We’s heard the word! Many fleas together, settled high in Pharloom, calling out their wants of us!<page=T>Clever grubbers, fleas, but theys too need-need our deliverings. See them served, miss courier! Always goodly-good to gain the thanks of fleas.
original_zh_text: <page=T>听说跳蚤们在上面建了窝！找我们要货！<page=T>跳蚤们都很机、机灵，送货交朋友准没、没错！
translated_text: <page=T>我听到这些话！许多跳蚤聚集在我们手臂的高原上 ， 向我们喊叫要求！<page=T>这些昆虫和跳蚤可以变得更聪明 ， 但它们也需要我们的帮助。“上车吧 ， 总是很好 ， 谢谢你的跳蚤。"
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>I heard these words! Many fleas gathered on the plateau on our arms and shouted for us!<page=T>These insects and fleas can become smarter, but they also need our help. "Get in the car, it's always nice, thank you for the fleas. "

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. I’d ask to trade, but your store seems a little bare.<page>Ahem! Well, yes. Our little town’s seen some dire times, and now my courier’s gone and got themself lost.<page>But don’t worry! I’ve a few small things, still! And if that courier ever makes it safely back, we’ll have plenty more treasures to haggle over.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。本想交易，但货架有点空。<page>咳！时局艰难，送货虫又跑丢了。<page>别急！还有点小玩意！等那小子平安归来，货品管够。
translated_text: <hpage>早上好 ， 商家们。我想开一家公司 ， 但店里空荡荡的。<page>你有咳嗽！是的 ， 我们的城市经历了一段可怕的时期。现在 ， 邮件不见了 ， 我迷路了。<page>但不要担心！我有一个小的！即使狮子非法返回 ， 也有很多宝藏。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, merchants. I wanted to open a company, but the store was empty.<page>You have a cough! Yes, our city has gone through a terrible period. Now, the mail is gone and I am lost.<page>But don't worry! I have a small one! Even if the lion returns illegally, there is still a lot of treasure.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！别烦我！本神医只医病患！享你的福去！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: 嗯 ，请 ， 关上！美丽的雅娜比治愈疾病！他们不是那些从痛苦中获利的人。<hpage>” 不， 我不想浪费你的时间。
secondary_translated_text: Well, please, close it! Beautiful Yanabi cures diseases! They are not the ones who profit from pain.<hpage>"No, I don't want to waste your time.

original_en_text: Bonva! It is done, brave warrior. By my expert claw, your strange blade has received some fast-sharp shine. It shall cut cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts provide great aid, pinmaster. You have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 好了！完活啦勇士！经我利爪打磨，您这针刃寒光逼人，削铁如泥啊！<hpage>有劳了，针匠。感激不尽。
translated_text: 救援 ， 救援 ， 救援。由于我的专业技能 ， 它奇怪的叶子很快就获得了闪亮的光泽。<hpage>你的工作对我很有帮助。
secondary_translated_text: Rescue, rescue, rescue. Thanks to my professional skills, its strange leaves quickly gained a shiny luster.<hpage>Your work has been very helpful to me.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss courier! What horror here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! When caves turn dark, the deliverings are essential, more than more.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！这儿太可怕了！洞窟震得像在惨叫！<page=T>钟居底下挤满了可怜的新朋友，全都吓坏了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！情况越危险，送货就越要紧！
translated_text: <page=T>交货丢失了！多可怕啊！洞穴颤抖着 ， 尖叫着最野蛮的伤口。<page=T>当我看到一个贫穷的朋友聚集在一个满是仆人的房子里时 ， 我的心因恐惧而跳动。<page=S>发生了什么事？你在这里帮助我吗？事实上？放弃我们 ， 我们需要你！当洞穴变暗时 ， 结构变得更加重要。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery is lost! How terrible! The cave trembled, screaming for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>When I saw a poor friend gathered in a house full of servants, my heart beat with fear.<page=S>What happened? Are you here to help me? Actually? Give up on us, we need you! As caves darken, structure becomes more important.

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings! They are broken-broke! Gone and spilled!<page=T>Do not lose hearty-heart, miss courier! This is Pharloom! Danger, deadly. In times as these, is a rarer thing for goods to get to their goings.<page=S>Would you try-try again? For the bugs so much in need of their deliverings?
original_zh_text: <page=T>货毁、毁了！全丢了！<page=T>别灰、灰心！纺络现在处处凶、凶险，能送到才是稀罕事！<page=S>要再试一次吗？那么多虫等着货救、救命呢！
translated_text: <page=T>交付！它破碎了！他已经离开了。<page=T>购买 ， 不要失望！这是一个灯。它是危险和致命的。在这个时候 ， 货物几乎没有到达。<page=S>你为什么不回来了？这是一个你必须避免的错误。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery! It broke! He's already gone.<page=T>Buy it, don't be disappointed! This is a light. It is dangerous and deadly. At this time, almost no goods arrived.<page=S>Why didn't you come back? This is a mistake you must avoid.

original_en_text: Those bugs, cowering in their gleaming bells. Grnk. They claim a common calling, to serve the pilgrims as they make their path upwards.<page>Such a crucial role they award themselves, surely worthy of praise!<page>A sweet lie, of course. They, like their predecessors, are simply too weak and fearful to venture any farther. A settlement born from indolence.
original_zh_text: 那些缩在亮堂钟屋里的怂包，哼。自诩要侍奉攀登圣堡的朝圣者。<page>给自己戴高帽，真当是个人物！<page>甜美的谎言罢了。他们和前代一样，不过是没胆往上爬的懦夫。这镇子就是怠惰的产物。
translated_text: 昆虫敲响灯钟 ， 声称他们有一个共同的使命 ， 为朝圣者服务。<page>毫无疑问 ， 你自己也在其中扮演着重要的角色！<page>这是一个甜蜜的谎言， 当然。像他们的前辈一样 ， 他们不再太弱 ， 不敢冒险。出生于懒惰的选择！
secondary_translated_text: Insects ring light bells, claiming they have a common mission to serve the pilgrims.<page>There is no doubt that you yourself play an important role in this!<page>That's a sweet lie, of course. Like their predecessors, they are no longer too weak to take risks. Born of lazy choices!

original_en_text: <hpage>He would have been wise to do so. If, on my travels, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send him your way.
original_zh_text: <hpage>他倒是聪明。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那就谢谢了！敢闯荒野帮助同类的虫可不多见。
translated_text: <hpage>如果我在旅行中犯了错误 ， 我会把它带给你。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I make a mistake while traveling, I will bring it to you.

original_en_text: By claw! Are you then our saviour in the shell? Standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>What clue, sir, tells of my part in your town’s liberation?<page>Why your blade, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>T’was a vile curse that struck here. No simple bug, nor basic pin could have granted our release. No!<page>That blade though, so expertly clutched in claw. That could welly have met the task. It was you who cut us free, yes?<hpage>I’ll grant you’ve sharp sight, pinmaster, and your saving is fortuitous. This blade that restored your town would now benefit from your service.<page>Welly, yes! I’ve a busy backlog of pins to tend, but your gracious heroism decrees that unique weapon receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?
