Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<hpage>Your town seems returned to healthy form, good bug. I had some concern that, upon cutting you free, I’d find only husks.<page>Yes, well, many ahh... err... most of our residents did not fare so well... Still, it’s no good to dwell on dark things! We shall build, and grow, and welcome! As is any good bellbug’s task.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽然不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<hpage>看来镇子已然恢复生机，原以为斩断丝咒后只能见空壳遍地。<page>呃……这个……许多居民确实没挺过来……但沉溺于哀伤没有意义！我等将重建、成长、迎接！此乃钟心镇虫民的天职。
translated_text: 欢迎来到我们疲惫的朝圣者！光荣的 Berhardt 可能生活在他的巅峰时期 ， 但这是城堡前的最后一站。<page>“我的职责 ， 美丽的孔雀 ， 是尊重像你这样的死人的善良。»"<hpage>她的村庄似乎正在恢复健康和良好的昆虫。我有点担心。如果你明白了 ， 我去找贝壳。<page>是的 ， 是的 ， 是的。大多数人做不到。坚持在黑暗中是没有用的。我们长大了 ， 我们得到了它。这也是工作的好时机。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome to our tired pilgrims! The glorious Berhardt may be living at his peak, but this is the last stop in front of the castle.<page>"My duty, beautiful peacock, is to respect the kindness of dead people like you." "<hpage>Her village seems to be returning to health and good insects. I'm a little worried. If you understand, I'll go find shells.<page>Yes, yes, yes. Most people can't do it. It is no use persisting in the dark. We grew up and we got it. This is also a good time to work.

original_en_text: You’ve met Frey, miss? She’s usually stocking useful items for travellers such as yourself.
original_zh_text: 见过芙蕾了么？她那常备着些旅者用得上的好货。
translated_text: 你见过弗雷德吗 ？我们通常会为像你这样的旅行者提供一些有用的东西。
secondary_translated_text: Have you met Fred? We usually provide something useful for travelers like you.

original_en_text: The perfect choice! Your bell’s about to be looking the finest in town. We’ll get the work started straight away.
original_zh_text: 选得好！你这钟屋就要变成全镇最好的一间了。立马开工！
translated_text: 这是完美的选择。你的种子将是最好的城市。我们将立即开始我们的工作。
secondary_translated_text: This is the perfect choice. Your seeds will be the best city. We will start our work immediately.

original_en_text: If you’re ever finding that bellhome a little bare, make sure to speak with Frey. She’s been known to gather all sorts of fancy furnishings.<page>That stock’s useless for a passing pilgrim, but for a new resident it’s just the stuff to turn a bell into home.
original_zh_text: 如果觉得钟居空荡，可找芙蕾购置家具。<page>那些家具对过客无用，但对新住民来说正好可以营造归家之感。
translated_text: 如果钟楼有点裸体 ， 弗雷。你必须检查大量的家具收藏。<page>过去的朝圣者几乎没有帮助 ， 只是把新居民带回家。
secondary_translated_text: If the Bell Tower is a little naked, Frey. You have to check a large collection of furniture.<page>Past pilgrims provided little help, simply bringing new residents home.

original_en_text: <page=S>Up-up, in the big Citadel, a new place we heard is now claimed safety-safe! Theys too needing our deliverings, we is sure!<page=T>That Citadel. We knows its truths! Not so nicely-nice as pilgrims tells! Even if brave bugs would settle, danger still is close!<page=S>They would need deliverings, for food, for healings, for protection. Please takes them, miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>听说上、上面的圣堡有新据点！肯定缺物资！<page=T>我们知道圣堡真相！根本没朝圣者说的那、那么好！就算有勇者定居也危险！需要食物药品护具——救星小姐去送吧！
translated_text: <page=S>在大城堡里 ， 我宣布我听到的新地方是安全的！我们也需要帮助！<page=T>卡斯蒂略 ， 我知道真相 ， 但朝圣者不安全。即使勇敢的昆虫已经冷静下来 ， 危险总是在附近！<page=S>我们需要食物 ， 护理和保护。我恳求你。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>In the Great Castle, I declared that the new place I heard was safe! We need help too!<page=T>Castillo, I know the truth, but pilgrims are not safe. Even if the brave insect has calmed down, danger is always nearby!<page=S>We need food, care and protection. I beg you.

original_en_text: Tarano! We shall work, now as never. What joy you grant this humble artisan, traveller. Let us seek that shine thought lost within these lands...
original_zh_text: 开工！这是毕生难求的机会。旅者，谢谢您让我这卑微匠人重拾失传荣光……
translated_text: 泰隆！您给这些卑微的工匠和旅行者带来了什么欢乐 ？我们正在寻找地球上失去的光芒。
secondary_translated_text: Tyrone! What joy have you brought to these humble craftsmen and travelers? We are looking for the lost light on earth.

original_en_text: <page>Welly, ho! That oil! You have it! That rare substance, hoarded close by the Citadel. Few are the pinmasters of our age that ever chanced to work its wonders.<page>Would you see it, traveller? The finest work of this fair pinmaster and your blade sharper still! Pass me the oil, and we can commence!
original_zh_text: <page>哎呀呀！那就是圣油！您竟然有！圣堡秘藏的圣物，当世针匠谁摸过这玩意！<page>旅者，可愿见证纺络针匠的绝活？把油给我，肯定不会让您失望！
translated_text: <page>威利 ， 约翰 ， 这是油 ， 好吧！这种罕见的材料保存在城堡附近。今天很少有人能创造奇迹。<page>旅行者们 ， 你看到了吗 ？这是一个好音乐家最好的作品 ， 他的刀更锋利。让我们从石油开始吧。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Willie, John, this is oil, okay! This rare material is preserved near the castle. Few people today can work miracles.<page>Travelers, did you see it? This is the best work of a good musician, whose knife is sharper. Let's start with oil.

translated_text: 纪念品的架子。
secondary_translated_text: Souvenir shelves.

translated_text: 一份神圣的礼物？
secondary_translated_text: A sacred gift?

original_en_text: Welly, yay? Reconsider my offer? Your blade would gleam at my fine skill!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！改主意了？我这手艺保准让刃口锃亮！
translated_text: 这就是威廉吗？事实上？你接受我的建议吗？他的剑照亮了我的天赋。
secondary_translated_text: Is this William? Actually? Do you accept my advice? His sword illuminated my talents.

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, I am sickly. Maggots of the fetid bogs beyond the moors writhe upon my shell. I would ask your aid in removing them.<page>Maggots! That’s all you bring the great Yarnaby?! My time is precious! Only for the seriously afflicted! The truly, hideously enfeebled. Bzzt!<page>Find a bench, or a bed, or a rock! It’s only rest you need. Settle yourself somewhere, and those maggots will soon wriggle themselves out of your shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，沼地的蛆虫在我壳上乱爬，请您帮忙清除。<page>蛆虫？！就为这破玩意烦本神医？！重症！我要治的是重症！惨不忍睹那种！滋滋！<page>找长椅、床铺、石头歇着去！睡一觉蛆虫自会掉光。
translated_text: <hpage>“女士 ， 我病了。沙漠外的沼泽地里的牡蛎的味道刺痛了我的贝壳。<page>这是一个 bug！你带了这么多吗 ？我们的时间是宝贵的。这只是一个严重的伤口 ， 一个真正可怕的弱点 — M.M.M.<page>找到一张长凳 ， 一张床和一块石头。一旦蠕虫在某个地方定居下来 ， 它就会从壳里出来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Ma 'am, I am sick. The smell of oysters in the swamps outside the desert stung my shells.<page>This is a bug! Did you bring that much? Our time is precious. It's just a serious wound, a truly terrible weakness- M.M.M.<page>Find a bench, a bed and a stone. Once the worm settles somewhere, it comes out of its shell.

original_en_text: Welcome, fellow resident! Can I interest you in something special before you’re away again on your travels?
original_zh_text: 欢迎你，好邻居！出门前要不要买点特别的东西？
translated_text: 每个人都欢迎！你想在再次旅行之前做一些特别的事情吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Everyone is welcome! Do you want to do something special before traveling again?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then. Although... your store now seems quite bare.<page>Ahem. Yes. I’ll admit, the wait was longer than I’d anticipated, and a bug has to eat...<page>I’ll have more to offer you once my courier turns up. No doubt he’s been avoiding Bellhart since the curse set its sights on us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。不过……你这铺子如今空荡得很。<page>咳，是。实话说，这劫难拖得比预期久，虫总要吃饭嘛……<page>等我家送货虫回来就有新货了，那小子肯定绕着钟心镇躲灾呢。
translated_text: <hpage>早上好 ， 商人 ， 你似乎从丝绸的痛苦中恢复过来了。<page>是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！当一根奇怪的绳子从上面掉下来时 ， 我默默地挂在警卫的房间里。<page>这对其他人来说可能是一个问题 ， 但我的商店有很多用品 ， 所以我不必担心饿死。<hpage>你的训练对我帮助很大。与此同时 ， 或 ...商店似乎是空的。<page>但是我承认等待时间比预期的要长 ， 我不得不吃昆虫。<page>当我的使者来的时候 ， 我会给你更多的。毫无疑问 ， 自从我们的诅咒开始 ， 他就一直躲在贝尔哈特里。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, merchant, you seem to have recovered from the pain of silk.<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! When a strange rope fell from above, I silently hung in the guard's room.<page>This may be a problem for others, but my store has a lot of supplies, so I don't have to worry about starving to death.<hpage>Your training has helped me a lot. At the same time, or... The store seemed empty.<page>But I admit that the wait was longer than expected and I had to eat insects.<page>When my messenger comes, I will give you more. There is no doubt that he has been hiding in Berhart since our curse began.

translated_text: 闪存 （ 闪速记忆 ）
secondary_translated_text: Flash memory (flash memory)

original_en_text: You bother me again? Begone, I said!<hpage>I ask only if you know what has happened to the bugs above us. They hang trapped in a vast snare of thread.<page>Hff. Hardly surprising. That there’s the final fate for all in Pharloom. Just come seeking a little sooner for them above.<page>Surely, oh surely, you don’t imagine your own end will be different? All that hunger, and fear, and pride, filling your fragile heart. You too are bound to end ensnared!<page>Grnk! Begone. In Pharloom, only a fool believes themselves free.
original_zh_text: 又来烦我？说了滚！<hpage>我只想问你可知上头虫子的遭遇？他们受困于邪丝之中。<page>嗤，迟早的事。纺络的众生终归此路，他们不过是早走一步。<page>难道……你觉得自己能逃过？饥渴、恐惧、傲慢塞满你那脆壳，你早晚也得落网！<page>哼！滚吧。在纺络，相信自己自由的都是蠢货。
translated_text: 你还在烦我吗 ？“我们离开这里 ，“ 我说。<hpage>我知道上面的虫子发生了什么事 ， 我问他是否掉进了一个大陷阱。<page>吉姆并不惊讶。朋友是每个人的终极目标。请来吧。<page>你认为结果会有所不同吗 ？饥饿 ， 恐惧和骄傲充满了你脆弱的心。<page>在法罗群岛 ， 人们相信只有傻瓜才是自由的。
secondary_translated_text: Are you still bothering me? "Let's get out of here," I said.<hpage>I knew what had happened to the bugs above, and I asked him if he had fallen into a big trap.<page>Jim was not surprised. Friends are everyone's ultimate goal. Please come.<page>Do you think the results will be different? Hunger, fear and pride fill your fragile heart.<page>In the Faroe Islands, people believe that only fools are free.

original_en_text: You want to cut them down? Hff. Yes, you look cruel enough.<page>Once the strings are cut, pain will return to them. They will remember fear and longing.<page>What a choice you make for them! Such power you grant yourself!
original_zh_text: 想斩断丝线？嗤，瞧你倒有几分机灵。<page>丝线一断，痛苦、恐惧、渴求都将复归。<page>你替他们选的好啊！好大的威风！
translated_text: 你能剪吗 ？他看起来很残酷。<page>绳子被切断后 ， 疼痛回到绳子上 ， 你记得恐惧和欲望。<page>你为他们做了一个很好的选择！给自己这种力量。
secondary_translated_text: Can you cut it? He seemed cruel.<page>After the rope is cut, the pain comes back to the rope, and you remember the fear and desire.<page>You made a good choice for them! Give yourself this strength.

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, I have acquired oil with which my needle may see further sharpening.<page>Bonva! What wonder? What wish? To steal a gift so fine. Few are the pinmasters of our age who ever worked with such a substance.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠，我取来磨针秘油了。<page>太好了！这等圣物，这年头还有哪个针匠能摸到这宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>Finmaster ， 有一种油可以使针尖。<page>拯救 ， 奇迹 ？你在干什么？我真不敢相信我收到了这么好的礼物。今天 ， 它几乎没有被使用。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Finmaster, there is an oil that can make needle tips.<page>Rescue, miracle? What are you doing? I can't believe I received such a wonderful gift. Today, it is hardly used.

original_en_text: How grand! To face an opponent with a bit of energy.<page>You’re a skilled one, clear enough. I hope my training has granted some insight.
original_zh_text: 痛快！总算遇到像样的对手。<page>身手不错，我的指导对你有用吧？
translated_text: 这是太棒了！现在 ， 他面临着一个强大的对手。<page>你是一个非常有能力和清晰的人 ， 我希望你的教育是一种鼓励。
secondary_translated_text: This is great! Now he faces a powerful opponent.<page>You are a very capable and clear person, and I hope your education is an encouragement.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find a bug of sound mind alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, strange as it is’n all, but it’s the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom.<page>Given I’m now awake, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two.
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有清醒的虫活着？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针才是纺络的荣耀武器——你那根怪模怪样的针虽然趁手，但终究不是正统。<page>既然醒了，要不要来练练手？想试试刺针的威力吗？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: ” 公主醒了。<page>如果你继续保持这种傲慢的态度 ， 你很快就会有麻烦。<hpage>令人惊讶的是 ， 健康的昆虫生活在这样一个荒凉的地方。你是一个在这个国家学习的士兵吗 ？<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！你的针可能适合你 ， 虽然奇怪 ， 但它是法老的光荣武器。<page>现在你醒了 ， 为什么不练习呢 ？发现女巫的力量。这位老师会教你一些东西。
secondary_translated_text: "The princess woke up.<page>If you continue to maintain this arrogant attitude, you will soon be in trouble.<hpage>Surprisingly, healthy insects live in such a desolate place. Are you a soldier studying in this country?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Your needle may suit you, but strange as it is, it is the glorious weapon of the pharaoh.<page>Now that you're awake, why don't you practice? Discover the power of witches. This teacher will teach you something.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims were useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. I’ve travelled the length of this kingdom, yet the strength and skills hidden throughout continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. If only we’d met in less troubled times, just think of all we could have learned from one another!
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。即便我走遍整个王国，仍为这里隐藏的实力感到惊讶。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量。要是我们生在太平年代，本可以互相学习！
translated_text: 很长一段时间以来 ， 我没有那么多的精力 ， 这不是对我天赋的考验。<hpage>Yuya Black 公主对我来说是一个巨大的挑战 ， 但她仍然以她隐藏的力量和能力让我感到惊讶。<page>你有一个奇怪的力量 ， 针虫。想想看 ， 如果你已经认识对方 ， 那么你很可能已经认识对方了！
secondary_translated_text: For a long time, I haven't had that much energy. This is not a test of my talent.<hpage>Princess Yuya Black was a huge challenge for me, but she still surprised me with her hidden strength and abilities.<page>You have a strange power, needle worm. Think about it, if you already know each other, then you probably already know each other!

original_en_text: Bold choice, needle bug. Let’s get our shells a’shaking!
original_zh_text: 有胆识！让我们战个痛快！
translated_text: 祝你好运 ， 昆虫。创建一个 shell
secondary_translated_text: Good luck, insect. create a shell

translated_text: 鳍应力训练
secondary_translated_text: Fin stress training

original_en_text: <hpage>These sands mark the edge of Pharloom’s territory. I was brought to this land through the caverns beyond.<hpage>Something at this kingdom’s height still hungers for me. Were I to flee now, I would again be pursued.<hpage>Until I find the source of that hunger, and slay it, I will not be free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这片沙原是纺络的边界。我是穿过远处洞窟被带到此地的。<hpage>纺络的顶端仍有存在渴求着我。若此刻逃离，必将再次受到追捕。<hpage>唯有找到源头并将其斩杀，我才能获得自由。
translated_text: <hpage>沙子标志着蓝色区域的边界。我来到这片土地 ， 穿过一个遥远的山洞。<hpage>在这个王国时期 ， 有更伟大的事情等着我。如果你现在逃跑 ， 他们会再次追赶你。<hpage>我永远不会自由 ， 直到我发现饥饿的根源 ， 并根除它。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sand marks the boundary of the blue area. I came to this land and walked through a distant cave.<hpage>In this kingdom, greater things await me. If you run now, they will chase you again.<hpage>I will never be free until I discover the root cause of hunger and eradicate it.

original_en_text: Back again, needle bug? Surely you’ve more important places calling than these sandy steps?<hpage>I shan’t stay long, Pinstress. Your home and your skills offer a sense of safety rare about these lands.
original_zh_text: 还不走？没有更要紧的事要做吗？<hpage>我不会久留。不过有你这般身手，待在这里反而安全。
translated_text: ” 你回来了， 上帝吗？“还有什么比这座楼梯更重要的吗 ？ ”" "<hpage>您的家和技术给您一种安全感 ， 这在这些国家很难找到。
secondary_translated_text: "You're back, God? "Is there anything more important than this staircase?”" "<hpage>Your home and technology give you a sense of security that is hard to find in these countries.

original_en_text: Find the vassal... pale It. Return them to us... Save us both from the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: 找到仆从……苍白者。将其归还……平息主人怒火。
translated_text: 求祢拯救他 ， 使他脱离上主的忿怒。
secondary_translated_text: Save him from the wrath of the Lord.

original_en_text: Needle bug! With those black quakes, Pharloom’s finale is fast arriving.<page>Raise your blade! Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 看这黑色震动，纺络的终局将至了。<page>举针吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: 随着这场黑色地震 ， 灯塔的终结迫在眉睫。<page>举起刀子！让我们看看是否至少有一个人忠实于我们的本性！
secondary_translated_text: With this black earthquake, the end of the lighthouse is imminent.<page>Raise the knife! Let's see if there is at least one person who is true to our nature!

original_en_text: Ah ha! Needle bug! Who else would dare wake a Pinstress with such force?!<page>Saw my wish, I’m guessing? Here hopin’ to fulfill it?<hpage>I know what you are seeking, Pinstress... a death duel, an end from battle, not cavern’s collapse.<hpage>I can oblige... to a point... But a greater challenge still awaits me below.<page>Whatever else you’re about, you might be finding it futile now, needle bug. The black quakes... Pharloom’s finale arrives.<page>So let’s stop the yapping, aye! How’s ‘bout we begin? Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 哈！是你！除了你谁敢这么粗暴地吵醒一名针姬！<page>看到我的祈愿了？想来帮我实现？<hpage>我知道你在渴求什么……一场死斗，你想战死而非被沙土掩埋。<hpage>我可以满足你……但下面还有更大的挑战在等着我。<page>不管你要做什么，可能都是徒劳。这黑色震动……纺络的终局将至。<page>少废话！开打吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！谁能用这种力量唤醒公主 ？<page>你看到我的愿望了吗 ？你为什么不留在这里？<hpage>我知道我在寻找什么 ： 不是战斗的结束 ， 不是山洞的崩溃 ， 而是一场死亡决斗。<hpage>我本可以说 “是的 ” 。“但在某种程度上 ， 这是一个更大的挑战。<page>无论你做什么 ， 你都会认为这是浪费。这是一场黑色地震。这就是法老的末日。<page>让我们停止这些愚蠢的事情。你在干什么？让我们看看是否至少有一个人忠实于我们的本性！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Who can use this power to awaken the princess?<page>Do you see my wish? Why don't you stay here?<hpage>I knew what I was looking for: not the end of the battle, not the collapse of the cave, but a death duel.<hpage>I could have said "yes". "But to some extent, it's a bigger challenge.<page>No matter what you do, you will think it's a waste. This was a black earthquake. This was the end of Pharaoh.<page>Let's stop these stupid things. What are you doing? Let's see if there is at least one person who is true to our nature!

original_en_text: Creature, higher... It has been sent... by Masters served... to retrieve Zi’s vassal lost?
original_zh_text: 上位者……主人派你来……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: 生物学 ， 让它服务。失落的王子归来
secondary_translated_text: Biology, let it serve. The lost prince returns

original_en_text: No. No. No... My saviour slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Already it attacks these lands with enough force to end them. To summon it stronger will only hasten that fall.<hpage>For this moment at least, your shell is saved. It was only by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment, that I arrived in time.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为什么这么残忍？为什么要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可被召唤。纺络已然深受其害，再度召唤只会使情况更糟。<hpage>若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，我又及时赶到，你必死无疑。
translated_text: 不 ， 不。<page>杀人犯 ， 你为什么要这样做 ？为什么需要这么长时间 ？<hpage>这个 bug 不是空的。他们会以足够的力量攻击地球。简单的掌权会加速衰退。<hpage>至少这一次 ， 贝壳被拯救了 ， 我的铁朋友的意志和对我主人惩罚的恐惧 ， 我及时到达了。
secondary_translated_text: No, no.<page>Murderer, why would you do this? Why does it take so long?<hpage>This bug is not empty. They will attack the earth with enough force. Simply taking power will accelerate recession.<hpage>At least this time, the shell was saved, the will of my iron friend and the fear of my master's punishment, I arrived in time.

original_en_text: Gah! Bested fair, and yet you choose to stay the killing blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pinstress, and myself for what’s to come, but I will not cut you down.<hpage>Despite its quakes, Pharloom’s demise is not as certain as it seems. I shall act to change that fate.<hpage>If I succeed at my task, the land that remains will require the watch of strong bugs like you.<page>Well, ain’t you an inspiration! Makin’ me seem a right fool, here thinkin’ only on the end while you’re looking to a future fair...<page>Seems you’ve beaten me twice, needle bug, both my pin’s edge, and my heart’s resolve...
original_zh_text: 咳！你已经赢了，为什么还不动手？<hpage>我可以与你比试，但不会杀你……<hpage>纺络的命运尚有转机，我要改变它。<hpage>若我成功，幸存的世界需要你这样的强者守护。<page>你可真是乐观！显得我像个只想着末日的蠢货……<page>你赢了我两次，无论是武艺还是觉悟……
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。哦 ， 是的！选择接受致命一击是正确的吗 ？<hpage>你和我 ， 彭斯和我可能会考验自己 ， 但我不会原谅你。<hpage>尽管发生了地震 ， 但农场的死亡并不像看起来那样确定。<hpage>如果我成功了 ， 地球的其余部分将不得不受到像你这样强大的昆虫的保护。"<page>没有灵感 ？你让我看起来像个傻瓜 ， 最后一次在这里 ， 在未来寻求正义。<page>我觉得好像我被击中了两次 ， 针打断了我的针 ， 我决定了。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! Is it the right choice to accept the fatal blow?<hpage>You and I, Burns and I may test ourselves, but I will not forgive you.<hpage>Despite the earthquake, the farm's death was not as certain as it seemed.<hpage>If I succeed, the rest of the earth will have to be protected by powerful insects like you. "<page>No inspiration? You made me look like a fool, here for the last time, seeking justice in the future.<page>I felt as if I had been hit twice and the needle broke my needle, and I decided.

original_en_text: <hpage>Not for your Masters, but by my own will I may aid you, Zi, as long as the path permits.<hpage>Of your vassal, I have met one before, a scurrilous, scheming sort, and well able to remain hidden.<hpage>If your own servant shares similar disposition, they may prove hard to retrieve. Where would you advise I begin my search?<page>Zi has sensed their movement... She knows their places of rest. For pale It... Zi shall mark their chart.<page>Seek the vassal... Retrieve them, or their corpse... either is appropriate... either will aid... to avoid the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若是顺路，我会你一臂之力。但并非为了你主人，而是为了我自己。<hpage>至于那仆从，我曾遇过同类。卑劣狡诈，极善藏匿。<hpage>若你的仆从也是如此，搜寻将很困难。你觉得该从何处下手？<page>梓能感知其动向……知晓其方位……苍白者，梓会在地图标记。<page>找到仆从……无论死活……皆能平息怒火……
translated_text: <hpage>我可以帮助你 ， 不是为了你的主人 ， 而是如果道路允许的话。<hpage>他看着他的一个仆人。肮脏 ， 阴险 ， 隐藏得很好。<hpage>如果您的仆人有类似的倾向 ， 那么恢复可能很困难。<page>他听到了 ， 然后休息了。孩子们画了一张地图。<page>客户要么埋葬他们 ， 要么寻找他们的尸体 ： 两者都有资格。或者他们可以帮你。为了避免主人发怒。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I can help you, not for your master, but if the road permits.<hpage>He looked at one of his servants. Dirty, sinister, well hidden.<hpage>If your servant has similar tendencies, recovery may be difficult.<page>He heard it and rested. The children drew a map.<page>Customers either bury them or search for their bodies: both qualify. Or they can help you. To avoid the owner's anger.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find any bug still alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, but the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom, least it was... It’s sure starting to feel like Pharloom doesn’t have long left.<page>Well, given I’m now awake, and time’s suddenly short, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有活虫？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针曾是纺络的荣耀武器……虽然这王国恐怕撑不久了。<page>既然醒了又时日无多，要不要来练练手？让我这老师傅最后教你两招？
translated_text: ” 公主醒了。<page>如果你继续保持这种傲慢的态度 ， 你很快就会有麻烦。<hpage>我很惊讶地发现 ， 昆虫生活在这样一个荒凉的地方。你是一个在这个国家学习的士兵吗 ？<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！诗人 ， 你的荆棘可能对你有好处 ， 但荆棘是法老荣耀的武器 ， 而法老似乎已经远离了很长一段时间。<page>你刚刚醒来 ， 时间已经过去了 ， 不是吗 ？你想练习一会儿吗？也许你的老师会教你这一点。
secondary_translated_text: "The princess woke up.<page>If you continue to maintain this arrogant attitude, you will soon be in trouble.<hpage>I was surprised to find that insects lived in such a desolate place. Are you a soldier studying in this country?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Poet, your thorns may be good for you, but thorns are the weapon of Pharaoh's glory, and Pharaoh seems to have been away for a long time.<page>You just woke up, time has passed, hasn't it? Do you want to practice for a while? Maybe your teacher will teach you this.

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug. I’ve respect for you and your sharp blade, but my hospitality shouldn’t be abused.
original_zh_text: 走吧！我敬重你和你的利刃，但别滥用我的善意。
translated_text: 我尊重你和你的指甲 ， 但你不应该滥用我的款待。
secondary_translated_text: I respect you and your nails, but you should not abuse my hospitality.

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<hpage>I have visited the core, Pinstress. It was a remarkable site indeed. I only hope that it shall not soon be lost.<page>Course you’ve seen it! Master at the blade and at the seeking. You’ve proven yourself an imposing talent. <page>Well, given you seem done up here, maybe it’s time you get back to your all important business?
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<hpage>我去过那，确实是奇观。希望它不会很快消失。<page>你果然去过！看来你找东西的本事和打架一样好。<page>既然这里的事忙完了，你该去忙正事了吧？
translated_text: 你可能听说过它 ， 但在这座山的中心 ， 有一个光明的秘密。<page>至少姐妹们是这么说的 ， 他说 ： “这是一个奇迹 ， ”“ 一个巨大的洞穴 ， 充满了水晶。<hpage>我看着中心。这是一个非常美丽的地方。我希望它不会在不久的将来消失。<page>你当然知道！他是剑术和学习的大师。他们已经展现了自己的才华。<page>也许是时候回到最重要的事情了。
secondary_translated_text: You may have heard of it, but in the heart of this mountain, there is a bright secret.<page>At least that's what the sisters said."It's a miracle," he said,"A huge cave full of crystals.<hpage>I looked at the center. This is a very beautiful place. I hope it will not disappear in the near future.<page>Of course you know! He is a master of swordsmanship and learning. They have shown their talents.<page>Maybe it's time to get back to the most important thing.

original_en_text: <page>But the seer knows nothing! Nothing of the pain. All small Sula’s to bear... To watch, watch these lands dying, slow, the bugs suffering, falling, while our shell sustains...<page>The steelhearts feel so little... but we forced to serve, we endure it all. We alone. Why?<hpage>...Others may know that pain, small bug... Or at least something similar.<page>So will you chain me again? Herd me by point of your blade, and knowingly return me to that pain?<hpage>...I will not. I will inform the child of steel of what has transpired here, but I cannot force any bug to return to a task so cruel.<page>Then, then... Sula is free? At least to run? By your mercy, bug, these legs must move, quick, quick and far, far!
original_zh_text: <page>但先知不懂痛苦！苏拉独自承受……看着大地衰亡……虫民受苦……<page>钢铁之心没有痛觉……而我们独自承受一切……为什么？<hpage>……会有其他虫了解这份痛的，小虫……或类似的苦楚。<page>你要再次禁锢我吗？用针刃逼我回到那里？<hpage>……我不会。我会告知钢铁之子真相，但不会强迫任何虫回去受苦。<page>那么……苏拉自由了？至少能逃亡？谢谢你的慈悲！我要快逃，越远越好！
translated_text: <page>先知不知道什么不是痛苦。看着地球慢慢干涸 ， 昆虫痛苦地倒下 ， 我们的甲壳类动物幸存下来。<page>在钢铁般的心灵中 ， 这并不重要 ， 但我们必须服务并忍受它。"<hpage>...其他人感觉疼痛和昆虫 ， 或至少类似的东西。<page>他会再次坐牢吗 ？你用刀子把我拉出来 ， 让我受苦吗 ？<hpage>...你不会告诉孩子们这里发生了什么 ， 但你不能强迫昆虫做这么残忍的事情。<page>南方是自由的吗 ？我需要跑步吗 ？可怜的虫子 ， 这只脚必须走得更快 ， 更远 ， 更远！
secondary_translated_text: <page>The prophet does not know what is not suffering. Watching the earth slowly dry up, insects fall miserably, our crustaceans survive.<page>In a steel mind, it doesn't matter, but we must serve and endure it. "<hpage>... Others feel pain and insects, or at least something similar.<page>Will he go to prison again? Did you pull me out with a knife and make me suffer?<hpage>... You won't tell children what's happening here, but you can't force insects to do something so cruel.<page>Is the South free? Do I need to run? Poor bug, this foot must go faster, farther, farther!

original_en_text: Zi must watch, record... and wait... Always she is true to her function... Ore-bound... To duty.
original_zh_text: 梓必须观察、记录……等待……恪守职责。
translated_text: 紫罗兰总是可见的或记录。他总是忠于自己的储蓄。
secondary_translated_text: Violets are always visible or recorded. He is always true to his savings.

original_en_text: A mighty battle we had, my friend... Time now you get to your all important business. I’ll be wishing for your success.
original_zh_text: 真是场激战啊朋友……快去忙你的事吧。祝你成功。
translated_text: 先生们 ， 先生们 ， 我们已经打了一场艰苦的战斗 ， 现在是开始重要工作的时候了。
secondary_translated_text: Gentlemen, gentlemen, we have fought an uphill battle, and now it is time to start important work.

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting. Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent to Zi, yes? By Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: ...先进生物学的会议正在进行中。” 维莉醒了。这不是巧合 ， 它是紫色的 ， 对吧 ？事实上？主人的服务。如何挽回失去的客户 ？
secondary_translated_text: ... A conference on advanced biology is underway." Violet woke up. It's not a coincidence, it's purple, right? Actually? Master's service. How to recover lost customers?

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinstress, why do you choose to live amidst these storm-swept caverns? Surely there are more hospitable places?<page>Somewhere gentler? Warmer? I’d only go soft! How else is one expected to maintain their wits?<hpage>Then this is not a place of hiding? That Citadel up top seems no friend to the free, or the strong who’d choose to remain apart.<page>...Aye. Well, yes. That too’s a reason, though one that shames me some.<page>Our grand Citadel learnt well from the training of Pinstresses past. Then it went and turned those teachings upon us!<page>Despite our superior skills, our numbers have always been few, and their strength overwhelmed.<page>Of my once revered order, only two of us remain, wormed away in Pharloom’s forgotten corners, and my pin-sibling, she’s lost herself to more peaceable pursuits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针姬，为何要住在风暴肆虐的洞窟？没有更舒适的地方吗？<page>更舒适？更温暖？那样只会让我变迟钝！<hpage>难道是在躲避什么？圣堡似乎容不下自由的强者。<page>……确实有这个原因，说来惭愧。<page>从前圣堡向我们讨教技艺，学成后却反过来对付我们！<page>我们虽然技艺高超，但终究寡不敌众。<page>曾经备受尊崇的教团，如今只剩两个。我躲在这遗忘角落，另一位更是彻底放弃了战斗。
translated_text: <hpage>你为什么选择住在一个被暴风雨摧毁的山洞里 ？有更受欢迎的地方吗 ？<page>你想去一个更安静的地方吗 ？暖？我只是弱者！我们如何才能保持智慧 ？<hpage>这难道不是一个隐藏的地方吗？上面的城堡似乎对那些决定离开的自由和强大的人不友好。<page>...” 是的， 这是原因之一。这里有很多人。<page>我们宏伟的城堡从女演员过去的训练中吸取了教训 ， 他把这个教训强加给了我们！<page>我们的技能是优秀的 ， 但我们的人数很少 ， 我们的力量是难以忍受的。<page>按照我服从的命令 ， 我们被困在帕拉姆的一个被遗忘的角落里 ， 兄弟姐妹们迷失在寻找更宁静的和平。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Why did you choose to live in a cave destroyed by a storm? Is there a more popular place?<page>Do you want to go somewhere quieter? Warm? I am just weak! How can we remain wise?<hpage>Isn't this a hiding place? The castle above seems unfriendly to the free and powerful people who decide to leave.<page>...”Yes, that's one of the reasons. There are many people here.<page>Our magnificent castle learned a lesson from the actress's past training, and he imposed this lesson on us!<page>Our skills are excellent, but our numbers are small and our strength is unbearable.<page>Following orders I followed, we were trapped in a forgotten corner of Param, our brothers and sisters lost in search of a more peaceful peace.

original_en_text: <hpage>I cannot yet leave this land. Until I slay its source, this kingdom’s hunger for me will never abate.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我还不能离开。只要源头尚存，这国度对我的渴求不会消退。
translated_text: <hpage>如果我们不消灭这个国家的源头 ， 我们对这个国家的渴望将永远不会得到满足。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If we do not eliminate the source of this country, our desire for this country will never be satisfied.

original_en_text: Pale It... You would reject the role? Are you not tamed, bound, by Masters?... You would know... obedience is essential.<page>Recall, the fate of those who defy... Even you higher... Especially you higher...<page>...Compression... We have suffered it. We would never wish it upon another.
original_zh_text: 苍白者……你要违抗？你未被主宰驯服？……你该明白服从的重要性。<page>想想违抗者的下场……即便是上位者……尤其是上位者……<page>……压缩之苦……我们经历过……不愿它降临他者。
translated_text: 你会放弃这个角色吗？你和师父有联系吗 ？如你所知 ， 倾听很重要。<page>看看那些反抗的人的命运。虽然你老了。特别是当你老了。<page>...他们被压迫了。我受够了。我不想让别人遭受同样的痛苦。
secondary_translated_text: Would you give up the role? Do you have any contact with the master? As you know, listening is important.<page>Look at the fate of those who resist. Although you are old. Especially when you are old.<page>... They were oppressed. I'm done. I don't want others to suffer the same pain.

original_en_text: Ahh, is your needle too shy to show its edge? What a shame.
original_zh_text: 呵，你的针不敢出鞘吗？真没劲。
translated_text: 你羞于露出你的脸吗 ？遗憾的是 ， 他认为
secondary_translated_text: Are you ashamed to show your face? Unfortunately, he believed

original_en_text: Even my welcome has limits, needle bug.<page>I’ve become well accustomed to solitude, and it’s unnerving to play host to your strange strength overlong.
original_zh_text: 我的耐心有限。<page>独居惯了，你这种异常存在让我不安。
translated_text: 好客也有其局限性。<page>他已经习惯了独自一人。我很抱歉接受了你的奇怪力量这么久。
secondary_translated_text: Hospitality also has its limitations.<page>He was used to being alone. I'm sorry I've accepted your strange powers for so long.

original_en_text: Planning to hang about are you, needle bug?<page>Fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 暂时不打算走吗？<page>那要不要来场训练，试试刺针的威力？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: 玩 Needle Worms 吗 ？<page>你想训练我吗 ？发现女巫的力量。也许你的老师会告诉你怎么做。
secondary_translated_text: Play Needle Worms?<page>Do you want to train me? Discover the power of witches. Maybe your teacher will tell you what to do.

original_en_text: Having second thoughts on our bout, needle bug? Good! I’ll not hold back my blade, and I’ll expect the same from you.
original_zh_text: 回心转意了？很好！我不会手下留情，希望你也一样！
translated_text: 你有没有改变过日期 ， 蠕虫 ？好吧 ， 好吧！好吧！“我不想放弃我的剑 ， 我希望你放弃。
secondary_translated_text: Have you ever changed the date, worm? Okay, okay! Okay! "I don't want to give up my sword, I want you to give up.

original_en_text: ...Bug... Higher... It has come seeking... Zi is found... She is awoken.<hpage>Greetings, child of steel. I have known your type, in past. From your presence, it is clear this land too has caught the long gaze of your Masters.<page>Masters... Yes... For them, Zi observes... obedient... always...<page>And you... a creature in half... Pale It... Bug It... old... stubborn... alone... You too are observed.
original_zh_text: ……虫……上位者……它来寻找……梓被发现了……她苏醒了。<hpage>钢铁之子，我见过你的同类。你的到来说明你的主人已将目光投向此地。<page>主人……是的……梓侍奉他们……永远服从……<page>而你……半身者……苍白者……虫身者……古老……固执……独行……你也被注视着。
translated_text: ...昆虫很高。我去找那个男孩。<hpage>很明显 ， 在其存在中 ， 土地也吸引了其所有者的长期利益。<page>老师 ， 妈妈<page>你...半人半动物。他们是透明的。在经典中 ， 我把一个非常固执和固执的昆虫放在一起。你也会观察到的。
secondary_translated_text: ... Insects are tall. I went to find the boy.<hpage>It is clear that in its existence, the land also attracts long-term interests of its owners.<page>Teacher, Mom<page>you... Half man, half animal. They are transparent. In the classic, I put together a very stubborn and stubborn insect. You will observe it too.

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting, Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent, by Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?<page>But no... pale It cannot.. First, a chart is needed. Pale It must acquire one. Only then can Zi provide the marks... Their vassal’s location sensed strong.
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？<page>不……苍白者……须先有地图……梓才能标记其方位……仆从感知强烈。
translated_text: ...没有更高形式的存在 ， 相遇和觉醒是偶然的。如何挽回失去的客户 ？<page>不 ， 它太微妙了 ， 无法理解。首先 ， 你需要一张桌子。有一个蓝色的， 它应该是。紫色是唯一的标记。你的生活会让你感觉坚强。
secondary_translated_text: ... Without a higher form of existence, encounters and awakening are accidental. How to recover lost customers?<page>No, it's too subtle to understand. First, you need a table. There is a blue one, and it should be. Purple is the only mark. Your life will make you feel strong.

original_en_text: <hpage>Zi, your vassal is gone, alive, fled beyond these lands.<hpage>I chose to allow their escape, even if your wish may not be granted.<page>The wish? No... pale It... Zi sensed clear your meeting... The rite... The vassal is tarnished. They have touched the dark. By the Masters, they will now be hunted... no matter the distance fled.<hpage>Perhaps, for your vassal, that is preferable? Waste here in servitude or flee free. They made their choice, and proclaimed it clear by their black action.<hpage>Their dark champion is slain, but luck or guile may yet see them survive.<page>Hope!.. Pale It... For a vassal who defies the Masters?... You give Zi a thought, complex...<page>The outcome is different... and Zi must now observe alone... but this may be the better way?<page>Zi shall accept the happening... shall pray the Masters still see her loyal... and Zi too will share the hope... that her vassal lives long unbound.
original_zh_text: <hpage>梓，你的仆从已叛逃出境。<hpage>我选择放他们走，即使这样会违背你的愿望。<page>愿望？不……苍白者……梓很清楚……仪式……仆从已玷污，触及黑暗……逃不过主人追猎。<hpage>或许他们觉得这样更好？与其在奴役中腐朽不如自由逃亡。<hpage>其黑暗眷属已除，但或许能凭机遇存活。<page>希望？……苍白者……给背叛主人的仆从？……这想法……令梓困惑……<page>结果不同……梓将独自观察……或许这是更好结局？<page>梓将接受现实……祈祷主人知晓梓忠诚……但梓也希望……她的仆从能自由活着。
translated_text: <hpage>” 你的仆人活了下来。<hpage>即使他们的愿望没有实现 ， 我也会选择离开。<page>你有什麽愿望 ？不 ， 不 ， 他很苍白。我感觉到他的相遇。善良的人是肮脏的她在黑暗中触摸我。<hpage>这对客户有好处吗？他们做出了选择 ， 并以黑色行为证明了这一点。<hpage>他们的黑暗战士已经死了 ， 但运气或诡计将拯救他们。<page>我希望它是！很难想象一个人会反抗他的主人。<page>结果是不同的。紫罗兰应该单独考虑 ， 但它是最好的方式吗 ？<page>儿子同意这一点。祷告的主总是看见祂的信实。玫瑰有希望。他的人没有呆很长时间。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Your servant survived.<hpage>Even if their wishes are not realized, I will choose to leave.<page>What do you wish for? No, no, he's pale. I felt his encounter. A good person is dirty and she touches me in the dark.<hpage>Is this good for customers? They made the choice and proved it with black behavior.<hpage>Their dark warriors are dead, but luck or trickery will save them.<page>I hope it is! It's hard to imagine a man resisting his master.<page>The results are different. Violet should be considered alone, but is it the best way?<page>The son agreed with this. The praying Lord always sees His faithfulness. Roses have hope. His people didn't stay long.

original_en_text: For your talents, needle bug, in blade and strength... and restraint, take this emblem of my order.<page>Hadn’t ever thought another’d be joining our slim ranks, but you’re as deserving a member as’s ever come before.
original_zh_text: 为你的武艺、觉悟……和克制，收下我们教团的徽章吧。<page>没想到还会有新成员加入，但你当之无愧。
translated_text: 你的天赋在剑和力量。<page>“没有人认为你是精英团队的一员 ， 但你比以往任何时候都更应该成为那支球队的一员。" "
secondary_translated_text: Your talent lies in sword and strength.<page>"No one thinks you're part of an elite team, but you deserve to be part of that team more than ever. " "

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not flee. I cannot abandon the kingdom to a collapse of my making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不会逃走。不能任由下方王国因我而崩塌。
translated_text: <hpage>我不想逃跑 ， 我不想。“我不能为了我的生物而放弃我的王国。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I don't want to run away, I don't want to. "I cannot give up my kingdom for my creatures.

original_en_text: Creature, higher... return when a chart is acquired. A chart is needed, essential, to serve the Masters... to aid Zi.
original_zh_text: 上位者……取得地图再来……图是侍奉主人……协助梓的必要之物。
translated_text: 先进的生物学。请给我这封信。要为师父服务 ， 地图是必不可少的。帮帮我 ， 请。
secondary_translated_text: Advanced biology. Please give me this letter. To serve the Master, maps are indispensable. Help me, please.

original_en_text: Ahh... Shame. Surely battle’d be the better end, no?<page>If not by blade, we’ll just have to accept whatever conclusion this new quaking calamity flings upon our heads.
original_zh_text: 唉……真遗憾。战死本是更好的结局不是吗？<page>既然不能战死，我们就只能接受这黑暗带来的结局了。
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。这场战斗将会有更好的结局。<page>没有一片叶子 ， 我们别无选择 ， 只能接受这个令人震惊的新灾难已经降临到我们的结论。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. This battle will have a better ending.<page>Without a leaf, we have no choice but to accept the conclusion that this shocking new disaster has befallen us.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cease your summoning, fool bug!<hpage>Though you may yearn for freedom, that saviour you hope to call will bring only death.
original_zh_text: <hpage>停止召唤，蠢虫！<hpage>即便你渴求自由，那救赎者也只会带来死亡。
translated_text: <hpage>请不要再说我是个傻瓜。<hpage>但你们所呼求的救主只会带来死亡。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Please don't say I'm a fool again.<hpage>But the Savior you call for will only bring death.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims are useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. The strength and skills hidden about this kingdom continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. More I think than you’d be willing to reveal to me.<page>What, I wonder, are you planning to turn all that power towards?
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。这王国暗藏的实力总是出乎意料。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量，用针的。远不止你愿意展示的这些吧？<page>我很好奇，你打算用这力量做些什么？
translated_text: 我已经很久没有那么多的精力了 ， 所以不是所有无聊的朝圣者都能体验到我的天赋。"<hpage>你的剑公主是一个巨大的挑战 ， 你将继续惊讶于隐藏在这个王国的力量和能力。<page>你有一个奇怪的力量 ， 针虫。<page>我们将把权力转移到哪里 ？
secondary_translated_text: I haven't had that much energy in a long time, so not all boring pilgrims can experience my talent. "<hpage>Your Sword Princess is a huge challenge and you will continue to be amazed at the power and abilities hidden in this kingdom.<page>You have a strange power, needle worm.<page>Where will we transfer power?

original_en_text: No. No. No... My champion slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Not ever. None can control it, though many have tried. <hpage>Any strength you hoped it offered would fast be proven false.<hpage>Consider yourself fortunate I arrived in time. Your shell is saved, all by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为何如此残忍？为何要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可驾驭，故不可召唤，这是无数血泪换来的教训。<hpage>无论你指望能从它身上获取什么力量，你都会后悔。<hpage>你该庆幸我来得及时。若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，你必死无疑。
translated_text: 他们没有死 ， 士兵们死了。<page>杀人犯 ， 你为什么要这样做 ？为什么需要这么长时间 ？<hpage>请注意 ， 此错误不能为空。很多人都尝试过 ， 但没有人能够控制它。<hpage>你试图给予的权力很快就会出错。<hpage>我很高兴我们及时到达。他的尸体被救了。这是他的铁伴侣的愿望 ， 也是对上帝的惩罚的恐惧。
secondary_translated_text: They weren't dead, the soldiers were dead.<page>Murderer, why would you do this? Why does it take so long?<hpage>Please note that this error cannot be null. Many people have tried it, but no one has been able to control it.<hpage>The power you try to give will quickly go wrong.<hpage>I'm glad we arrived in time. His body was rescued. It was the wish of his iron partner and the fear of God's punishment.

original_en_text: <hpage>If I chose to head beyond, I would abandon Pharloom to a collapse of my making.<hpage>While I live, and still possess the strength to act, I will not allow that end to come to pass.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若我选择逃离，下方王国将因我而崩塌。<hpage>只要力气尚存，我绝不容许这样的结局。
translated_text: <hpage>如果我决定走得更远 ， 我就会放弃法轮 ， 我的事业就会崩溃。<hpage>只要我还活着 ， 只要我还能打球 ， 我就不会让这种事情发生。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I decide to go further, I will give up Falun and my career will collapse.<hpage>As long as I am alive and as long as I can play, I will not let this happen. "

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<page>If you’re hanging around these heights, and time’s allowing, maybe you’ll get to seeking it?<page>Course you’d first have to find the entrance, but you’ve certainly shown the skills to wriggle up in there, provided you’re so inclined.
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<page>要是有时间不妨去找找？<page>当然得先找到入口，不过以你的身手肯定没问题。
translated_text: 你可能听说过它 ， 但在这座山的中心 ， 有一个光明的秘密。<page>至少姐妹们是这么说的 ， 他说 ： “这是一个奇迹 ， ”“ 一个巨大的洞穴 ， 充满了水晶。<page>如果你曾经去过这个高度 ， 如果时间允许 ， 你可以去寻找它。<page>当然 ， 首先你必须找到一条路 ， 但如果你必须这样做 ， 你肯定会在那里测试你的追踪技能。
secondary_translated_text: You may have heard of it, but in the heart of this mountain, there is a bright secret.<page>At least that's what the sisters said."It's a miracle," he said,"A huge cave full of crystals.<page>If you have ever been to this height, if time permits, you can look for it.<page>Of course, first you have to find a path, but if you have to do that, you will definitely test your tracking skills there.

original_en_text: <page>A small gift for you, pale It... for the thought, complex... rock of the home spear... and of Zi’s birth. May it aid your further action in this land.
original_zh_text: <page>苍白者，赠礼……为感谢你给的希望……梓诞生故土的岩石……愿它助你在此地的行动。
translated_text: <page>一份小礼物会让你感觉更好。想想复杂性。兰斯 · 洛克和他儿子的出生将帮助我们在这个国家迈出另一步。"
secondary_translated_text: <page>A small gift will make you feel better. Think about the complexity. The birth of Lance Rock and his son will help us take another step in this country. "

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug! A Pinstress of my substantial talent requires their deep meditation, especially after such a satisfying bout.<hpage>Goodbye, Pinstress. May your blade remain sharp.
original_zh_text: 走吧！针姬需要继续冥想——激烈战斗后更需要静修。<hpage>再会，愿你的锋芒永不褪色。
translated_text: 像我这样有才华的歌手需要深入的冥想。尤其是在这样一个开端之后。<hpage>早上好 ， 公主 ， 检查一下刀。
secondary_translated_text: A talented singer like me needs deep meditation. Especially after such a start.<hpage>Good morning, princess. Check the knife.

original_en_text: Ho, miss! How’s all this then? Lotta dials to be trackin’, but at least the controls seem in good order.<page>From here, I can guide your bell down, best as any bug.<page><hpage>Then you’ve no prior experience with this type of transport?<page>No one does, miss! Them’s who used to dive’re all long dead, or cursed ta half life. An’ there ain’t no bug left alive’s been brave or stupid enough to try... ‘til now, at least.<page>I’ll work it best’s I can. Can’t do much more, I’m afraid. At least the forgings of these docks were built to last. Now we’s only gotta pray they hold for you.<page>Here’s the key that’ll see you inside its metal belly. Pop in there once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 嚯，小姐！这玩意儿够复杂的！仪表盘多得数不过来，好在操控装置还算正常。<page>我能在这儿引导潜钟下潜，保准比任何虫子都靠谱。<page><hpage>这么说，你从没操作过这种器械？<page>谁都没这种经验，小姐！以前开潜钟的早死绝了，剩下的也半死不活。活着的虫里，就没有哪个又疯又蠢的敢用这玩意……直到现在。<page>我会尽力而为，但别的可不敢打包票。好在码头造的这家伙够结实，现在只能祈祷它下潜后不会出什么故障。<page>这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: 哦 ， 天哪！究竟发生了什么事 ？拉塔诺夫继续移动 ， 但至少球队看起来很好。<page>从那里 ， 我可以打倒你的奴隶。<page><hpage>“你用过这辆车吗？<page>” 没有人会， 夫人。谁掉进水里 ， 就会被诅咒 ， 要么死了 ， 要么半活着。蠕虫没有活着 ， 所以他大胆而愚蠢地挑战它。至少现在，<page>至少这个港口是可持续的 ， 你只需要祈祷他们会支持你。<page>这就是打破金属的关键。当你感觉好的时候试试。直到我看到了里面的一切。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God! What happened? Ratanov keeps moving, but at least the team looks good.<page>From there, I can defeat your slaves.<page><hpage>"Have you ever used this car?<page>"No one will, ma 'am. Anyone who falls into the water will be cursed, either dead or half-alive. The worm was not alive, so he challenged it boldly and foolishly. least for now,<page>At least the port is sustainable and you just have to pray that they will support you.<page>This is the key to breaking metal. Try it when you feel good. Until I saw everything inside.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now, that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获取终结这场黑灾所需的力量。终结动荡、拯救这片地区就在此一举。<page>啧，好家伙！小尖头虫，没想到你个头不大，魄力和干劲倒是真不小。<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: <hpage>由于我女儿的训练 ， 我有能力结束这种黑色的疯狂。我们将立即采取行动 ， 防止地震并拯救地球。<page>对于这样一个小的人来说 ， 我找到了他们的能量 ， 能量是令人难以置信的巨大。<page>当他得知他收到了巴罗的信时 ， 他描述了他在水下修理时钟的工作如下 ： “在这一点上 ， 工作已经完成。"<page>如果你想尝试你的工作 ， 你必须再次尝试它。如果我们的专业服务能够满足您的基本需求 ， 我们将继续提供。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Thanks to my daughter's training, I have the ability to end this black madness. We will take immediate action to prevent earthquakes and save the planet.<page>For such a small person, I found their energy, and the energy was unbelievably huge.<page>When he learned he had received a letter from Barrow, he described his work on repairing the clock underwater as follows: "At this point, the work is complete. "<page>If you want to try your job, you have to try it again. If our professional services can meet your basic needs, we will continue to provide them.

original_en_text: Erm, you may notice your prize there is a little light, my lady...<page>Awful truth is, you’ve cleaned us out. We’ve not a single measly rosary left between us. Turns out we were just no match for you!<hpage>It was a game fairly played, sir, though I’ve no wish to see you destitute. Would you like to make another kind of wager, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 呃，您可能会觉得这次的奖品有点寒酸，女士……<page>实话说，您把我们家底都赢光了。半颗念珠都不剩！我们根本不是您对手！<hpage>先生，游戏确实公平公正，但我也不想见你倾家荡产。要不要换个赌注？
translated_text: 正如你可能已经注意到的 ， 价格有点高。<page>可怕的事实是 ， 你偷走了我们之间的空间。"<hpage>这是一场公平的比赛 ， 但我不想让它破产。
secondary_translated_text: As you may have noticed, the price is a bit high.<page>The terrible truth is, you stole the space between us. "<hpage>It was a fair game, but I don't want it to go bankrupt.

original_en_text: Grfff... So it’s gotten that bad, aye? I guess... If that’s how it is, I’ll be your bug.<page>Meet me below, at the diving bell. We’ll see if I can get you ready for the drop.
original_zh_text: <page>嘶……已经糟到这地步了？行吧……如果真是这样，那我帮你。<page>去潜钟底下碰头，我看能不能给你整备好。
translated_text: 然后它变得更糟。事实上？我觉得是 ... ...如果是这样的话 ， 那就是你的 BAP 。<page>请参阅下面的表格。我会帮你准备飞机的。
secondary_translated_text: Then it got worse. Actually? I think it's... ... If so, that's your BAP.<page>Please refer to the table below. I'll help you prepare the plane.

original_en_text: Holler when you’re ready, miss. The upgrades are done. That bell’s as ready as it’ll ever be.
original_zh_text: 准备好了就喊我一声，小姐。升级已经完成，这只潜钟现在状态绝佳。
translated_text: 当你准备好了 ， 呼叫更新完成 ， 声音就绪。
secondary_translated_text: When you are ready, the call update is complete and the sound is ready.

original_en_text: Ahhh... Can you feel it yet? All your troubles dripping away...
original_zh_text: 啊哈……感觉到了吗？烦心事都在随着汗液滴落……
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。你听到了吗？你所有的烦恼都会消失。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. Did you hear that? All your worries will disappear.

original_en_text: The deposits around here, those long-burning rocks. They’re useful to the Citadel, in whatever their shadowy business, but useless if you require tools of us!<page>We need finer material. Rare metal. Pharloom would provide a bounty to the able explorer. Find us some, and we’ll build your violent aids.
original_zh_text: 储备在附近的长效燃烧石？圣堡那帮虫子拿去搞些见不得虫的勾当倒合适，对我们来说屁用没有！<page>去找些更好、更稀有的金属！只要你有本事，纺络遍地都是是宝贝。找着了，我们就有办法给你造那些家伙什。
translated_text: 周围的沉积物是很久以前烧毁的石头。即使在城堡里 ， 您的秘密业务也很有用 ， 但如果您不需要我们的工具！<page>轻型金属灯塔奖励有能力的研究人员。为我们找到一些东西 ， 帮助暴力。"
secondary_translated_text: The surrounding sediments are stones that were burned long ago. Even in the castle, your secret business is useful, but if you don't need our tools!<page>The Light Metal Lighthouse rewards capable researchers. Find something for us that helps violence. "

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Our lady has missed her mark, and so thusly ends our challenge!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！这位女士脱靶了，挑战结束！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。我们错过了目标 ， 挑战结束了！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. We missed the goal and the challenge is over!

translated_text: ...国际空间站是 ...总是 ， 总是 ， 学习 ， 是一个公民。
secondary_translated_text: ... The International Space Station is... Always, always, learn, be a citizen.

original_en_text: My lady, I pray you reconsider! T’would be an honour to see those strong limbs of yours in action, truly!
original_zh_text: 女士，再考虑考虑吧！要是能见识到您矫健的风姿，定会是我们的荣幸！
translated_text: 请求您的评论！我很高兴看到大量的参与！
secondary_translated_text: Request your comment! I am very happy to see the large amount of participation!

original_en_text: A respectable enough effort, truly. You didn’t earn enough rosaries to make a profit off us, but that should only spur you on to try again!
original_zh_text: 表现非常不错！虽然赚的念珠还不够回本，或许正好能激励您再试一次！
translated_text: “我们还没有赢得足够的袖子来利用我们 ， 但这将再次是一个挑战！
secondary_translated_text: "We haven't won enough sleeves to take advantage of us, but it will be a challenge again!

original_en_text: An old diving bell. Its door is shut tight by an ornate clamp.
original_zh_text: 一具古旧的潜钟，钟门被一只华丽的夹钳紧紧锁闭。
translated_text: 一个漂亮的旧时钟门是用一个漂亮的夹子关闭。
secondary_translated_text: A nice old clock door is closed with a nice clip.

original_en_text: The diving bell’ll be ready again soon, miss. Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 潜钟很快就能再用，小姐。新护壳装好后绝对能扛住下坠！绝对！
translated_text: 腕表在短时间内准备就绪 ， 并且有了新的保护器 ， 它能够承受跌落。
secondary_translated_text: The watch was ready in a short period of time and with a new protector, it was able to withstand falls.

translated_text: ...这条街。阿诺德， 美联社。放开， 奥利。从国际空间站。
secondary_translated_text: ... This street. Arnold, Associated Press. Let go, Ollie. From the International Space Station.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 是时候玩了！当你看到目标时 ， 直接抓住钉子并击中它！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, it's time to play! When you see the target, grab the nail directly and hit it!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I require a moment. Please unlock the bell for me.<page>Aye. Can do, miss. Hail me again when you’re ready to travel.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我还需要点时间。麻烦打开钟门。<page>没问题，小姐。等您准备妥当了，再喊我一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>我需要时间来敲响钟。“<page>当你准备好旅行时 ， 要快乐。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I need time to ring the bell.“<page>Be happy when you are ready to travel.

original_en_text: Here to sweat away your sorrows, miss? The steam does wonders for a mind set sullen, or a shell gone stiff.<hpage>I’ve found these lowlands hot enough already, and mine is a shell more resilient than most.<hpage>To challenge that further seems a unique sort of madness.<page>Aye, well, this is Pharloom, miss! Madness is catching. I’d say this here’s the smallest form of it.
original_zh_text: 有烦心事吗，小姐？来蒸桑拿吧，蒸汽对郁结的心绪或僵硬的甲壳有奇效。<hpage>我倒觉得这里已经够热了，何况我这副甲壳比多数虫子都硬实。<hpage>热上加热，怕不是疯得别致。<page>哎，这儿可是纺络，小姐！疯病是会传染的。要我说，在这蒸桑拿算最轻的症状了。
translated_text: “你是来出汗的吗？蒸汽适合患有抑郁症的人和皮肤僵硬的人。<hpage>这些平原是相当温暖的 ， 我的水槽比大多数地方更灵活。<hpage>更多的讨论将是疯狂的。<page>疯狂的吸引力 ， 这是最小的形式。
secondary_translated_text: "Are you here to sweat? Steam is suitable for people with depression and people with stiff skin.<hpage>These plains are quite warm and my sink is more flexible than most places.<hpage>More discussions will be crazy.<page>Crazy attraction, this is the smallest form.

original_en_text: What an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: 我很高兴能和你一起玩！每当你感觉到口袋里念珠的痛苦时 ， 请想起我们。
secondary_translated_text: I am so happy to play with you! Whenever you feel the pain of rosary beads in your pocket, please think of us.

translated_text: 你想取消这艘船吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Do you want to cancel the boat?

original_en_text: There is no choice! Not for us. We cannot leave, not ever. We are a Forge Daughter, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: 没得选！从来就没得选。咱是熔炉之女，生来就和这熔炉缔结了契约。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: 我们别无选择 ， 我们不配。我们将教育我们的女儿 ， 并将她们奉献给这位领袖和他的服务。
secondary_translated_text: We have no choice. We don't deserve it. We will educate our daughters and dedicate them to this leader and his service.

original_en_text: If you’re planning passage below, Ballow’s the one to assist you. We must remain by the forge, always.
original_zh_text: 若想下潜，去找巴洛帮忙。咱得永远守着熔炉。
translated_text: 如果您在地面上 ， Barolo 可以帮助您。
secondary_translated_text: If you are on the ground, Barolo can help you.

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work? The world cracks and quakes to some grave new calamity, surely you should seek somewhere safer?<hpage>As far as I might flee, I suspect no such place exists, and in any case, I would not see this land’s bugs abandoned to their end.<hpage>What of you? Why do you choose to remain so diligent at your task, given the fell state of your lands?
original_zh_text: 哟！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰咱干活？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得地动山摇，你该找个安全地儿躲躲才对啊？<hpage>恐怕无论逃到哪里，都无处可避。更何况，我不愿抛下此地生灵，让它们无力地面对终结来临。<hpage>你们呢？既然明白此地危在旦夕，为何还要死守这熔炉？
translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！这是一个 bug ， 不是吗 ？为什么要干涉我们的业务 ？世界正在崩溃 ， 地震正在发生 ， 新的灾难正在出现。<hpage>我怀疑没有这样一个地方 ， 直到我能逃跑 ， 但即使这样 ， 我也不会看到这片土地上的昆虫被遗弃到最后。<hpage>我该怎么办 ？为什么在国家衰落的时候工作这么辛苦 ？
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! It's a bug, isn't it? Why interfere with our business? The world is collapsing, earthquakes are occurring, and new disasters are emerging.<hpage>I suspect there is no such place until I can escape, but even then, I will not see the insects on this land abandoned until the end.<hpage>What should I do? Why is it so hard to work when the country is in decline?

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work?<hpage>The sound of your craft called me to investigate. What is your duty here? Are you a smith of some kind?
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们干活？<hpage>你们的锻打声引我前来。你们在这儿做些什么？可是铁匠？
translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！小的急性昆虫 ： 为什么它们干扰我们的工作 ？<hpage>船的噪音让我检查。你在这里的任务是什么 ？史密斯？
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Small acute insects: Why do they interfere with our work?<hpage>The noise of the boat asked me to check. What is your mission here? Smith?

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target fifteen times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 是时候玩了！当你看到目标时 ， 直接抓住钉子并击中它！<page>当你达到你的目标 15 次 ， 奖品是你的！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, it's time to play! When you see the target, grab the nail directly and hit it!<page>When you reach your goal 15 times, the prize is yours!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: 史密斯怎么样 ？不是太红。我们是创造的孩子。为什么我看不到昆虫 ？<page>我们的旅程是一条古老的旅程 ， 一份荣誉的文件。这个港口和周围的土地是我们的经验。<hpage>如果你有这种天赋 ， 你能帮我吗 ？由于缺乏通用的工具 ， 我们无法找到一个好的替代品。<page>拉脱维亚的陷阱你知道我的男朋友吗？<hpage>这在我们国家是罕见的吗？他们中的一些人在这个过程中制造了严重的问题。<page>哦 ， 天哪！但我会的！他们用我们的设备和时间来奖励我们。
secondary_translated_text: How about Smith? Not too popular. We are the children of creation. Why can't I see insects?<page>Our journey is an ancient journey, a document of honor. This port and the surrounding land are our experience.<hpage>If you have this talent, can you help me? Due to the lack of universal tools, we were unable to find a good replacement.<page>Trap in Latvia Do you know my boyfriend?<hpage>Is this rare in our country? Some of them created serious problems in the process.<page>Oh, my God! But I will! They reward us with our equipment and time.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target twenty-five times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子二十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 是时候玩了！当你看到目标时 ， 直接抓住钉子并击中它！<page>如果你达到目标 25 次 ， 奖品就是你的！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, it's time to play! When you see the target, grab the nail directly and hit it!<page>If you reach your goal 25 times, the prize is yours!

original_en_text: Well, perhaps that’s enough games for now, eh?<page>We’ll need to come up with a much trickier challenge to best you, my lady!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我想就先玩到这里为止？<page>我们得琢磨个更刁钻的挑战才能赢过您，女士！
translated_text: 这个游戏已经足够了 ， 对吧 ？你在干什么？<page>你将不得不面对更困难的任务来打败自己。"
secondary_translated_text: This game is enough, right? What are you doing?<page>You will have to face more difficult tasks to defeat yourself. "

original_en_text: This world may not have long, but we shall face its end still delivering our duty.
original_zh_text: 这世界或许时日无多，但咱就算直面末日也要把活干完。
translated_text: 和平可能不会持续很长时间 ， 但我们将承担责任 ， 承担责任。
secondary_translated_text: Peace may not last long, but we will take responsibility and take responsibility.

original_en_text: To maintain one’s tools is a constant task. These shards should be kept close when you travel, that you can repair and replenish as the need arises.
original_zh_text: 保养工具需要持之以恒。旅程中应当随身携带这些碎片，以便随时进行修理和补充。
translated_text: 由于设备的维护是一项持续的工作 ， 因此在必要时 ， 在维修和交付的过程中将其保存在附近。
secondary_translated_text: Since maintenance of equipment is a continuous task, when necessary, keep it nearby during repair and delivery.

original_en_text: Pop inside the diving bell once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: 当你感觉良好并准备好时 ， 你可以跳上潜水钟。
secondary_translated_text: When you feel good and ready, you can jump on the diving bell.

original_en_text: A vicious stabbing trap? We can build it. Just know, it disturbs us, these devious implements you conceive to kill.
original_zh_text: 带尖刃的陷阱是吧？能造。但你得知道，我们可不喜欢鼓捣这些阴险的杀戮工具。
translated_text: 伤口不好？我知道你会用你想要杀死的看不见的工具来激怒我们。
secondary_translated_text: Bad wound? I know you will anger us with the invisible tools you want to kill.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Welcome, my lady, so glad you found us here! I can see you’re blessed with strong limbs and keen sight.<page>Fond of frolics are you? Keen to test your aim? We’d be right honoured to play a little game with you. A little test of skill we’ve set up.<hpage>I’ve no need to test my skills, sir, nor do I have time for frivolities.<page>Oh, but we’d make it worth your while! A prize awaits you, if you can meet our challenge!<hpage>If you offer a prize, that changes matters. I can meet any challenge if the reward is sufficient. What are the rules of your game?<page>Exceedingly simple, my lady! I’ll provide the pins for throwing, and my associate will provide a target. Hit the target fifteen times and you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！欢迎大驾光临！真高兴您找到这儿！一看您就是肢强目锐的虫。<page>喜欢玩游戏吗？要不要来试试准头？我们设计了个小游戏，可以考验您的技巧。<hpage>先生，我无需试炼技艺，更无空闲嬉闹。<page>别呀！奖品丰厚着呢！只要完成挑战，奖品就是您的！<hpage>既然有奖品，倒可以尝试。只要奖励足够丰厚，任何挑战都能接受。游戏规则是什么？<page>简单至极！我将为您提供掷针，我的伙计会提供靶子。击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。欢迎 ， 很高兴你找到了我们！他有强壮的手臂和腿和良好的视力。<page>你喜欢玩它吗 ？想看看你的目标吗 ？我很荣幸能和他一起玩。我们将进行能力测试。<hpage>你不需要测试你的技能 ， 你没有时间学习你的智力。<page>但是我们应得的。如果您接受挑战 ， 您将获得奖励！<hpage>如果我赢了 ， 一切都会改变。如果有奖励 ， 挑战就不重要了。你的游戏规则是什么 ？<page>很简单 ， 女孩。我将提供发射器 ， 我的同伴将提供目标。击中目标 15 次 ， 您将获得宝贵的奖励！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Welcome, I'm so glad you found us! He has strong arms and legs and good vision.<page>Do you like playing with it? Want to see your goals? I am honored to play with him. We will conduct a competency test.<hpage>You don't need to test your skills, you don't have time to learn your intelligence.<page>But we deserve it. If you accept the challenge, you will be rewarded!<hpage>If I win, everything will change. If there is a reward, the challenge is not important. What are your rules of the game?<page>It's simple, girl. I will provide the launcher and my partner will provide the target. Hit the target 15 times and you will receive a valuable reward!

original_en_text: A heavy door chained with a simple padlock.
original_zh_text: 一扇厚重的门扉，挂着一只简易挂锁。
translated_text: 沉重的门被一个简单的锁关闭。
secondary_translated_text: The heavy door was closed with a simple lock.

original_en_text: <hpage>This bell could carry me below, but it will first require a key, and an operator to aid its descent.<hpage>I cannot complete this task alone. Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此钟可载我下沉，但需要钥匙开启，还需要操作员协助下潜。<hpage>我自己难以达成此事，需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>您可能会摔倒在这个手表上 ， 但首先 ， 钥匙和操作员将帮助您将它们移除。<hpage>你不能独自做。” 岛上的人会帮助我们。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You may fall on this watch, but first, the key and operator will help you remove them.<hpage>You can't do it alone." The people on the island will help us.

original_en_text: Oi! What’s with all these tremors? This smelt still need shovelling, and the shakes’re only making it harder.
original_zh_text: 啊喂！这震天动地的，到底是怎么回事？晃荡个没完，还让不让干活了？
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。你为什么这么发抖 ？“此外 ， 南瓜需要铲子 ， 所以混合南瓜会使它更难品尝。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Why are you shaking so much? "Also, pumpkins require shovels, so mixing the pumpkin makes it harder to taste.

original_en_text: <hpage>Though tied by charge, would you provide me your service, Forge Daughter? I have need of tools that your skills could likely provide.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们虽有使命在身，但可否为我打造些工具？你们的手艺应该能胜任。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>差不多，有些可能是你们没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: <hpage>你会提供服务 ， 以有限的成本欺骗你的女儿吗 ？您需要一些工具来发展您的技能。<page>拉脱维亚的陷阱你知道我的男朋友吗？<hpage>这在我们国家是罕见的吗？他们中的一些人在这个过程中制造了严重的问题。<page>哦 ， 天哪！但我会的！他们用我们的设备和时间来奖励我们。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Would you provide services to deceive your daughter at a limited cost? You need tools to develop your skills.<page>Trap in Latvia Do you know my boyfriend?<hpage>Is this rare in our country? Some of them created serious problems in the process.<page>Oh, my God! But I will! They reward us with our equipment and time.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to return above. Please ready the bell for me.<page>Aye, miss. Sit on the bench, and let’s get you hauled up.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我需要返回地面。请准备上浮。<page>好嘞，小姐。坐稳扶牢，这就把你拽上来。
translated_text: <hpage>我得回去。按下铃声。<page>她坐在长凳上帮助他们。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have to go back. Press the bell.<page>She sat on the bench to help them.

original_en_text: Quite a lot of targets struck, and quite a lot of rosaries earned! Our lady never fails to impress us!
original_zh_text: 击中了非常多目标，念珠赚得盆满钵满！女士，您总能让我们大开眼界！
translated_text: 他得分了很多球 ， 得到了很多玫瑰！女人总是有痛苦的感觉。
secondary_translated_text: He scored a lot of goals and got a lot of roses! Women always have painful feelings.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Have to stop you there. That’s three times now you’ve missed your mark! I’m afraid that makes you the loser of our little game, with all due respect.<page>Fret not though, for we never tire of playing! Step over here, and we can start another game.
original_zh_text: 哎哎！得叫停啦。您已脱靶三次！恕我直言，这局算您输。<page>没关系，我们的游戏永远欢迎您！请移步这边来，我们再开一局。
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。你必须放弃 ， 你输了三次！“对不起 ， 我们会输掉一场小比赛。<page>别担心 ， 你永远不会感到无聊！一旦你到达 ， 你可以开始一个新的游戏。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. You have to give up, you lost three times! "Sorry, we will lose a small game.<page>Don't worry, you'll never get bored! Once you arrive, you can start a new game.

translated_text: 取消价格上涨？
secondary_translated_text: Cancel the price increase?

original_en_text: This trinket is our own invention. It wards against the deadly lava and heat around these docks. The workers used to request them of us. Now they’ve lost the mind to care.
original_zh_text: 这宝贝可是我们的独家发明，可以用来抵御深坞致命的熔岩与高温。往日工虫们争相求购，如今它们却连心智都已涣散。
translated_text: 装饰是发明。他们忍受了致命的熔岩和这个海岸附近的热量。工作人员问了我一遍又一遍。他失去了兴趣， 我认为。
secondary_translated_text: Decoration is an invention. They endured the deadly lava and the heat near this coast. The staff asked me over and over again. He lost interest, I think.

original_en_text: Farewell, then. If you require our craft, this forge is always hot.
original_zh_text: 慢走不送，需要造东西的话随时过来。
translated_text: 再见再见再见如果你需要我们的过程 ， 这个炉子总是热的。
secondary_translated_text: Goodbye If you need our process, this stove is always hot.

original_en_text: The new shell-shield’s all bolted on tight, miss. If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you where you’re goin’.
original_zh_text: 我把新护壳加固得很严实，小姐。如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: 新的箱子和盾牌将被锁定 ， 当你再次摔倒时 ， 洗头大喊大叫。
secondary_translated_text: New boxes and shields will be locked, and when you fall again, wash your hair and shout.

original_en_text: <hpage>The behaviour of your fellow workers, I’ve seen similar... agitation upon the roads. These docks are not alone in the strangeness of their occupants.<page>’Tis odd behaviour to be sure, but not for Ballow and us to know. Ours is busy work, and we keep to ourselves.<page>Whatever the goings on of the world outside, no bother to us, as long as our craft can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你同僚的这般行径，我在路上也见过类似的……狂躁。这码头的住民并非孤例。<page>这种行为确实奇怪，但我们和巴洛可懒得深究。我们只管埋头干活，少管闲事。<page>外头天塌地陷都与我们无关，只要这门锻造手艺能传下去就行。
translated_text: <hpage>我在他的同事中看到了类似的行为 ， 并在街上感到震惊 ， 港口并不是当地人不知道的唯一地方。<page>这是一个非常奇怪的行为 ， 但我和巴罗都不知道。“我太忙了 ， 没法照顾你。"<page>无论发生什么 ， 只要我们的船还在继续 ， 我们就不会干涉它。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I saw similar behavior among his colleagues and was shocked on the street that the port was not the only place locals didn't know about.<page>It was a very strange behavior, but neither Barrow nor I knew about it. "I'm too busy to take care of you. "<page>No matter what happens, as long as our ship continues, we will not interfere with it.

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to serve these docks, Forge Daughter?<page>Sent from our Forgehome we were, at request of those holy bugs above.<hpage>The Citadel dwellers? The veiled bugs? They ordered you here?<page>Yes! An age ago that. Such is duty! We Forge Daughters live to hone the craft, and aid the line.<page>By the Citadel’s patronage, and our long duty upon these docks, our Forgehome would swell in holy esteem.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们为何来此码头效力？<page>是上头那些圣虫召我们来的，我们在熔炉乡收到了调令。<hpage>圣堡的住民？那些覆面虫？是他们下令调遣你们来这儿的？<page>正是！都是陈年旧事了。职责所在嘛！我们熔炉之女活着就为磨砺手艺，延续传承。<page>靠着圣堡的庇佑和在这些码头长年累月的苦工，熔炉乡的名望自会愈发神圣。
translated_text: <hpage>他是如何到达港口的？<page>在前面提到的神圣昆虫的要求下 ， 我们被赶出了沃格尔的房子。<hpage>谁是你的城市的居民？隐藏的错误？你是奉命来这里的吗 ？<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！我们帮助女儿建立了自己的生活 ， 提高了她的技能 ， 并建立了生产线。<page>多年来 ， 随着城堡的保护和这些港口的责任 ， 我们的船长们受到神圣的尊重。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>How did he get to the port?<page>At the request of the aforementioned sacred insect, we were kicked out of Vogel's house.<hpage>Who are the residents of your city? Hidden mistakes? Are you here on orders?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! We helped our daughter build her life, improve her skills, and build a production line.<page>Over the years, with the protection of the castle and the responsibility of these ports, our captains have been treated with sacred respect.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’d expected this workshop too would contain only combative types, but you seem composed, Forge Daughter.<page>You’ve met the workers? They’re all wound up! They still work at their tasks, in a simple way, but they’re useless for conversation. It’s only ourselves and young Ballow with any sense left.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我原以为这工坊里全是些好斗之徒，但你们倒是沉着清醒，熔炉之女。<page>见过那些工虫没？个个跟上了发条似的！它们没日没夜机械式地干活，但早就不会聊天了。如今只剩咱和那边的巴洛还保留着些清醒。
translated_text: <hpage>我以为这个研讨会是为好斗的人准备的 ， 但它非常安静 ， 帮助我抚养我的女儿。<page>你看到工人了吗？大家都很紧张！在家里做作业总是很容易的 ， 但不管出于什么原因 ， 只有我和年轻的巴罗在谈话中没有帮助。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I thought this seminar was for aggressive people, but it was very quiet and helped me raise my daughter.<page>Do you see the workers? Everyone is very nervous! It was always easy to do homework at home, but for whatever reason, it was only young Barrow and I who were not helpful in the conversation.

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that last plunge must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And see below, for its failure I’ve been workin’ hard at improving the design! Your last journey ended up being a valuable test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is long closed to me, and your bell is now needed again.<page>Again? We’ll if you’re game enough to try a second time... A shell-shield’s been fitted, and the bell’s like new. Better’n new!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……护壳已经装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: 是的 ， Missy 。是的 ， 是的 ， 是的 ... ...他是怎么活下来的 ？最后一次跳跃是他的结局。<hpage>我在事故中幸存下来 ， 回到了我的冒险中。<hpage>我可以理解水表的故障。<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！正如你所说的！“时间会找到一种方法来打破做得好的东西。"<page>请看下面的内容。当我们失败时 ， 我们试图改进我们的设计！最后一次旅行是一次非常有价值的经历。<hpage>好吧 ， 好吧 ， 我的路已经关闭了很长一段时间 ， 所以我需要你的仆人。<page>再次在这里？如果有第二次尝试 ， 我会的。盖上盖子后 ， 铃是新的。最好的更新！<page>当你再次下来时 ， 低下头 ， 尖叫。如果你这样做 ， 我会带你上街。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, Missy. Yes, yes, yes... ... How did he survive? The last jump was his end.<hpage>I survived the accident and returned to my adventure.<hpage>I can understand the malfunction of the water meter.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Just as you said! "Time will find a way to break down what is done well. "<page>Please see the content below. When we fail, we try to improve our design! The last trip was a very valuable experience.<hpage>Well, well, my road has been closed for a long time, so I need your servant.<page>Here again? If I had a second try, I would. After the lid is closed, the bell is new. The best update!<page>When you come down again, lower your head and scream. If you do this, I'll take you on the street.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I am ready. Please prepare the bell for departure.<page>S’time to take the plunge, aye, miss? Just sit on the bench, and I’ll see you strapped in tight.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我已就绪。请准备下潜。<page>好嘞，小姐，跳水时间到了。在椅子上坐稳，我来给你捆严实咯。
translated_text: <hpage>我准备好了 ， 我准备好了。<page>现在是冒险的时候了 ， 不是吗 ？你在干什么？他坐在一张长凳上 ， 似乎被紧紧地绑着。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm ready, I'm ready.<page>Now is the time to take a risk, isn't it? What are you doing? He was sitting on a bench, seemingly tied tightly.

original_en_text: An old mechanism with a keyhole.
original_zh_text: 一个带钥匙孔的老旧机关。
translated_text: 旧的设备与封闭的孔。
secondary_translated_text: Old equipment with closed holes.

original_en_text: It’s done, miss! I’ve fitted the shell-shield. Bell’s like new. Better’n new even!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.<hpage>Your work is appreciated, sir. Know that, with luck, the threat from below might soon be quelled, and your lands shall rest calm.<page>Well... Good! I’m only really wishin’ to return to the forge, and my regular duties... A little purpose, routine...<page>Frankly, miss, all this action’s more’n a bit overwhelming for bugs like me. I’ll be glad when it’s all over... Providing we survive, of course.
original_zh_text: 搞定啦小姐！护壳装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。<hpage>辛苦你了。若是运气好，下面的威胁很快便会平息，此地也能重回安宁。<page>那敢情好！我只盼着早日回熔炉干回老本行……有点奔头，按部就班……<page>说真的，小姐，这种大场面对我这种小虫子来说太刺激了。等这一切都结束后，我们……当然，前提是我们能活下来。
translated_text: 结束了 ， 女孩！我戴着盾牌 ， 新的钟声是新的 ， 新的 ， 更好的。<page>当你再次下来时 ， 低下头 ， 尖叫。如果你这样做 ， 我会把你从街上带走。<hpage>如果你幸运的话 ， 潜在的威胁很快就会被消除 ， 你的土地可能会变得和平。<page>好吧 ， 回到大爆炸 ， 我想做我的例行公事。小路径 ， 小路径。<page>老实说 ， 先生 ， 对于像我这样的昆虫来说 ， 这一切都有点遥远。生存是前提条件。
secondary_translated_text: It's over, girl! I wear a shield, and the new bells are new, new and better.<page>When you come down again, lower your head and scream. If you do this, I will take you off the street.<hpage>If you are lucky, potential threats will soon be eliminated and your land may become peaceful.<page>Well, back to the Big Bang, I want to do my routine. Small path, small path.<page>To be honest, sir, it's all a bit far away for an insect like me. Survival is a prerequisite.

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that drop must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And you can see here, for its failure I’d already been workin’ at improving the design! Ended up being a useful test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is now closed to me, and your bell may still be needed if I choose to descend again.<page>Again? Well, if you’re game enough to try a second time...Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……等新护壳装好，保准能扛住下坠！绝对没问题！
translated_text: 是的 ， Missy 。是的 ， 是的 ， 是的。他们幸存了下来。” 一滴， 我想， 无论如何， 结束了。<hpage>我在事故中幸存下来 ， 回到了我的冒险中。<hpage>我可以理解水表的故障。<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！正如你所说的！“时间会找到一种方法来打破做得好的东西。"<page>正如你所看到的 ， 我们的项目已经失败了 ， 所以我们正在努力改进它！这是一个有用的测试。你咳嗽了吗？<hpage>一切都很好 ， 一切都很好 ， 回归已经结束了。如果您决定再次下降 ， 您可能仍然需要一个铃铛。<page>再次在这里？如果你想再试一次 ， 一旦安装 ， 这个新的保护盖绝对不会掉下来！是啊 ， 不！
secondary_translated_text: Yes, Missy. Yes, yes, yes. They survived." One drop, I think, anyway, it's over.<hpage>I survived the accident and returned to my adventure.<hpage>I can understand the malfunction of the water meter.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Just as you said! "Time will find a way to break down what is done well. "<page>As you can see, our project has failed, so we are working hard to improve it! This is a useful test. Are you coughing?<hpage>Everything is fine, everything is fine, the return is over. If you decide to go down again, you may still need a bell.<page>Here again? If you want to try again, once installed, this new protective cover will never fall off! Yeah, no!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then soon, yes! I may accept. But not now! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那行，你过阵子再来！咱会造出来给你看！这会儿活儿太多，咱忙不过来！
