translated_text: 史密斯怎么样 ？不是太红。我们是创造的孩子。为什么我看不到昆虫 ？<page>我们的旅程是一条古老的旅程 ， 一份荣誉的文件。这个港口和周围的土地是我们的经验。<hpage>如果你有这种天赋 ， 你能帮我吗 ？由于缺乏通用的工具 ， 我们无法找到一个好的替代品。<page>拉脱维亚的陷阱你知道我的男朋友吗？<hpage>这在我们国家是罕见的吗？他们中的一些人在这个过程中制造了严重的问题。<page>哦 ， 天哪！是的 ， 马上！我被认可了 ， 但现在不是。我们有很多工作要做 ， 所以我们不必担心。
secondary_translated_text: How about Smith? Not too popular. We are the children of creation. Why can't I see insects?<page>Our journey is an ancient journey, a document of honor. This port and the surrounding land are our experience.<hpage>If you have this talent, can you help me? Due to the lack of universal tools, we were unable to find a good replacement.<page>Trap in Latvia Do you know my boyfriend?<hpage>Is this rare in our country? Some of them created serious problems in the process.<page>Oh, my God! Yes, now! I was recognized, but not now. We have a lot of work to do, so we don't have to worry.

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother this Forge Daughter at their work?<hpage>These black quakes that wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You would wish to descend so deep?... It is true these docks possess the means. Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharoom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们熔炉之女干活？<hpage><hpage>如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！小虫子 ， 你干嘛干涉商业 ？<hpage>这些黑色的地震摧毁了你们的土地 ， 你们希望看到它们从火湖下的喷泉中消失。<page>为什么不跳得更深呢 ？这些端口有一个解决方案 ， 但我们无法独自解决。无论我们是一家健康的公司还是死掉的公司 ， 我们的责任始终在于这种模式。<page>我认为巴罗有怀疑 ， 如果我们的命运是可怕的 ， 我们必须立即确定它 ， 正如他的行为所暗示的那样。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Bug, why are you interfering in business?<hpage>These black earthquakes have destroyed your land, and you want to see them disappear from the fountains under the lake of fire.<page>Why not jump deeper? There is a solution for these ports, but we cannot solve it alone. Whether we are a healthy company or a dead company, our responsibility always lies with this model.<page>I think Barrow has doubts that if our destiny is terrible, we must determine it immediately, as his actions imply.

original_en_text: Return later, pointy bug! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 过阵子再来，小尖头虫！眼下正忙着呢，少添乱！
translated_text: ” 我会回来， 亲爱的。我们有很多工作要做 ， 所以我们不必担心。
secondary_translated_text: "I will be back, honey. We have a lot of work to do, so we don't have to worry.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>We shall remain here, still. If our service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获得终结黑灾的力量。很快便将行动，平息震动，拯救此地。<page>干得好，小尖头虫。你这小身板里的劲头倒是大得出奇。<page>咱还会守在这儿。若咱这手艺能助你成事，尽管开口便是。
translated_text: <hpage>由于我女儿的训练 ， 我有能力结束这种黑色的疯狂。我们将立即采取行动 ， 防止地震并拯救地球。<page>对于这样一个小的人来说 ， 我找到了他们的能量 ， 能量是令人难以置信的巨大。<page>如果我们的服务可以帮助您完成重要工作 ， 我们将很乐意继续帮助您。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Thanks to my daughter's training, I have the ability to end this black madness. We will take immediate action to prevent earthquakes and save the planet.<page>For such a small person, I found their energy, and the energy was unbelievably huge.<page>If our services can help you complete important work, we will be happy to continue to help you.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Forge Daughter. If I require your aid, I shall return.<page>Our wishes go with you, pointy bug. Calm the raging of our world, that our task can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>祝你好运，小尖头虫。平息这外头的狂乱，咱才能继续安心干活。
translated_text: <hpage>如果我真的需要帮助来抚养我的女儿 ， 我会回来的。<page>Mr. Sharpberg ， 祝你一切顺利。我们的使命只有在停止对世界的破坏时才能继续下去。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I really need help raising my daughter, I will come back.<page>Mr. Sharpberg, I wish you all the best. Our mission can only continue if it stops the destruction of the world.

original_en_text: <hpage>These controls are complex. If I’m to descend within the bell below, I will first require an operator.<hpage>Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此操控装置颇为复杂。若想要乘潜钟下潜，需要有操作员协助。<hpage>需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>如果你想去门铃下 ， 你首先需要一个操作员。<hpage>港务局将帮助你。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If you want to go under the doorbell, you need an operator first.<hpage>The Port Authority will help you.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I wish to depart. Please ready the bell for travel.<page>Sure thing, miss. Sit on the bench, and I’ll send you down.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我可以出发了。请整备好潜钟。<page>好嘞，小姐。在椅子上坐稳，我这就送您下潜。
translated_text: <hpage>我想走 ， 但请你收拾行李。<page>“好吧 ， 女士 ， 坐在长凳上。我要打你。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I want to leave, but please pack your bags.<page>"Okay, ma 'am, sit on the bench. I'm going to hit you.

original_en_text: Interested in our little game, my lady?<page>If you can hit the target fifteen times you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 对我们的小游戏感兴趣吗，女士？<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: 你对我们的游戏感兴趣吗 ？<page>如果您达到目标 15 次 ， 您将赢得奖品！
secondary_translated_text: Are you interested in our games?<page>If you reach the goal 15 times, you will win a prize!

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, you return? Our world cracks and cries from some grave new calamity.<page>Nevertheless, we must remain, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: <page>嘿！小尖头虫，你回来了？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得哭天抢地的。<page>不过无所谓，咱还得守着熔炉干活。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！史密斯 ： 你回来了吗 ？我们的世界被摧毁了 ， 我们面临着另一场严重的灾难。<page>但是 ， 我们必须继续支持这家工厂及其服务。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Smith: Are you back? Our world has been destroyed and we face another serious disaster.<page>But we must continue to support this factory and its services.

original_en_text: If you need something, talk to the boss. I’m busy.
original_zh_text: 有事找老板说去。我正忙着呢。
translated_text: 如果你需要什么 ， 联系你的老板。我非常忙。
secondary_translated_text: If you need anything, contact your boss. I'm very busy.

original_en_text: A control panel with various levers and gauges.
original_zh_text: 布满操纵杆与仪表的控制台。
translated_text: 控制面板多个障碍物和工具。
secondary_translated_text: Control panel for multiple obstacles and tools.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame.<hpage>There is a diving bell at the base of this structure that seemed fit for the task. I require it opened, and an operator to send it deep.<hpage>As one of few upon these docks with mind still sound, that role must fall to you.<page>Can’t you see I’m busy, miss? Ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. Its collapse is inevitable. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。<hpage>此建筑底部有座潜钟可用。我需要把它打开，并有个操作员送我下沉。<hpage>如今码头清醒者寥寥无几，此事只能由你来办。<page>没看我正忙吗，小姐？眼下铲矿石的活还干不完呢。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌，覆灭无可避免。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>我想去火湖。<hpage>在设计的底部有一个水下手表 ， 看起来很适合工作。让操作员打开并将其推入深处。<hpage>这封信落在你身上 ， 作为在这个港口想到我们的人之一。<page>你不觉得我很忙吗？当你挖掘地面时 ， 你没有时间做别的事情。<hpage>如果你不帮助我 ， 你的努力很快就会白费。王国崩溃了。崩溃似乎不可避免。如果你想继续你的工作和生活 ， 你现在必须帮助我。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I want to go to the lake of fire.<hpage>There is an underwater watch at the bottom of the design that looks great for work. Let the operator open it and push it deep.<hpage>This letter falls on you as one of the people who thought of us in this port.<page>Don't you think I'm busy? When you dig into the ground, you don't have time to do anything else.<hpage>If you don't help me, your efforts will soon be in vain. The kingdom collapsed. Collapse seems inevitable. If you want to continue your work and life, you must help me now.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame. Can you aid me in this task?<hpage><page>Hmmm... Well if you head down below to the very base of the docks, there’s an old diving bell built for just what you’re askin’. <page>Thing is, you can ride it, but it takes an operator stood dockside to send it. I might be capable, but I ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling still needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, sir, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。能否请你助我一臂之力？<hpage><page>唔……如果您是往深坞最底层去，那边倒是有口老潜钟专门干这活的。<page>可这玩意儿需要有另一只虫在地面操作才能下水。我虽然会弄，但眼下铲矿石的活儿堆成山，实在没闲工夫管别的啊。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>“我想去火湖 ， 你能帮帮我吗 ？ ”"<hpage><page>是的 ， 是的 ， 是的 ... ...当你下到码头的底部时 ， 你会发现一只古老的水下手表 ， 专为你想要的任何东西而制造。<page>问题是 ， 它可以安装 ， 但必须由码头上的操作员发送。我可以 ， 但我没有时间做其他事情。<hpage>如果你想保住你的工作 ， 我现在必须帮助你。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"I want to go to Fire Lake. Can you help me?”"<hpage><page>Yes, yes, yes... ... When you get down to the bottom of the dock, you will find an ancient underwater watch made specifically for anything you want.<page>The problem is that it can be installed, but it has to be sent by an operator on the dock. I can, but I don't have time to do anything else.<hpage>If you want to keep your job, I have to help you now.

translated_text: 你准备好迎接挑战了吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Are you ready for the challenge?

original_en_text: Oi! Who’sat? Whoever’s down there, if you’re feelin’ mad enough to try and travel, best meet me up at the controls, and we can chat.
original_zh_text: 喂！谁在那儿？不管你是谁，如果想要下潜，最好来操控台找我聊聊。
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。谁坐着？不管你是谁 ， 如果你生气了 ， 想去旅行 ， 让我在控制台上等着和你说话。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Who's sitting? No matter who you are, if you're angry and want to travel, let me wait on the console to talk to you.

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still alive! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff, pointy bug.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet, in time near, I will need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure. We shall wish on your continued survival, even if you seem intent on ending it.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你被火焰吞噬了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！尽管你像在自寻死路，咱还是祝你多活些时日。
translated_text: 好吧 ， 好吧 ， 他还活着 ， 他向你展示了你可以做最困难的事情。<page>巴洛为水下手表的复杂性和丢失而道歉。<page>他害怕被困在火中 ， 但让我猜猜。<hpage>从底部回来是历史上最困难的攀登 ， 但在不久的将来 ， 我们将不得不再次攀登。<page>” 你疯了， Bob 。她也很勇敢。虽然我想结束这一切 ， 但我希望它能继续下去。
secondary_translated_text: Well, well, he's still alive, and he shows you the most difficult things you can do.<page>Barlow apologized for the complexity and loss of the underwater watch.<page>He was afraid of being trapped in the fire, but let me guess.<hpage>Coming back from the bottom was the most difficult climb in history, but in the near future we will have to climb again.<page>"You're crazy, Bob. She was also brave. Although I want this to end, I want it to continue.

original_en_text: The frolics haven’t ended, my lady! If you’d like to really test yourself, we should play again!<page>Hit the target twenty-five times and you’ll earn yourself a beautiful necklace of rosaries! What say you?
original_zh_text: 游戏还没完全结束，女士！想真正挑战自己一把吗？再来一局如何？<page>击中靶子二十五次，这条精美的念珠项链就是您的！意下如何？
translated_text: ” 游戏还没有结束， 夫人。如果你真的想证明你自己 ， 那就去玩吧。<page>如果你击中目标 25 次 ， 你就会得到一条漂亮的 Rosalie 项链！你说了什么 ？
secondary_translated_text: "The game is not over yet, ma 'am. If you really want to prove yourself, go ahead and play.<page>If you hit the target 25 times, you will get a beautiful Rosalie necklace! What did you say?

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep well, Forge Daughter. I shall return if I require your aid.<page>Yes! Or no. Either is fine by us, as long as the craft continues.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>行！不来也行。只要手艺没断，咱都没意见。
translated_text: <hpage>把我的女儿扶起来 ， 如果她需要你的帮助 ， 她会回来的。<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！只要这个过程继续下去 ， 我们就会没事的。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Get my daughter up, and if she needs your help, she will come back.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! As long as this process continues, we will be fine.

original_en_text: Hesitate not, my lady! Take aim and throw true!
original_zh_text: 别犹豫，女士！瞄准了就狠狠地扎过去！
translated_text: 不要犹豫 ， 设定一个目标 ， 然后实现它。
secondary_translated_text: Don't hesitate to set a goal and achieve it.

original_en_text: If you add the implements from this set to your own, the quality of your crafting will increase. You will produce finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 若将此套器具与你的工具结合，你的制作水准将更上一层楼。你将打造出更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: 您可以将此工具集添加到工具中 ， 以提高生产质量。更薄 ， 更锋利 ， 更致命的工具被创造出来。
secondary_translated_text: You can add this toolset to tools to improve production quality. Thinner, sharper, and more deadly tools were created.

original_en_text: Planning to lay a carpet of spikes? These would surely slow your prey. We’d never have considered using such common tools for combat.
original_zh_text: 用布满尖刺的毯子让敌人减速？如此普通的工具还能在战斗中应用，我们可从没想到过。
translated_text: 你的指甲断了吗 ？我从来没有想过我可以用这么普通的工具战斗。
secondary_translated_text: Are your nails broken? I never thought I could fight with such a common tool.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, ola! Perhaps I neglected to tell you not to cross past those markers? It’s a law of the game, and we all abide by laws here, don’t we?<page>Your actions have disqualified you, my lady, but we harbour no ill will! Step over here and we can begin a new round at once!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我可能忘了告诉您别越过那个标记？游戏规矩总得遵守，对吧？<page>您犯规出局，但我们之间绝不会因此产生芥蒂！请移步这边来，我们马上新开一局。
translated_text: 哦 ， 哦 ， 哦！也许我忘了告诉他不要超越指示。<page>你的行为将被取消资格 ， 但我没有冒犯你。一旦你到达这里 ， 你可以立即开始新的一轮！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Maybe I forgot to tell him not to exceed instructions.<page>Your actions will be disqualified, but I have not offended you. Once you get here, you can start a new round immediately!

original_en_text: Ola, ola! That’s it then. Our lady has struck the target fifteen times! A beautiful victory!<page>Hopefully you enjoyed yourself! A little levity is a balm in these troubled times, don’t you think?<hpage>I’d have thought such games best saved for times of peace, but perhaps there is truth in what you say.<hpage>And now that I have bested your challenge, you will produce the prize I have earned?<page>Oh... o-of course! I see you have a tool pouch of your own there. Full to bursting with baubles and trinkets, no doubt!<page>I’ll fit another pocket onto it, so you can carry even more tools and shards with you. A fair prize, wouldn’t you say?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！成了！这位女士成功击中靶子十五次，完美胜出！<page>玩得开心吧？在这病怏怏的世道里找点乐子也算是良药，您说是不是？<hpage>我原以为这类游戏该留在太平年月，但或许你说的也有道理。<hpage>现在我已完成挑战，是否该兑现奖品了？<page>当……当然！我看您自带工具袋，里面准是塞满了各种零碎小玩意！<page>我给您的工具袋上加个新口袋，能多装点工具。这奖品公道吧？
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。这个女人已经达到了 15 个目标！多么伟大的胜利啊！<page>享受吧！在困难时期 ， 即使是一点点的轻松也能给你安慰 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？<hpage>我认为这个游戏更好地节省你的正常时间 ， 但你可能说的是实话。<hpage>既然我赢得了你的挑战 ， 你会接受我得到的奖励吗 ？<page>是的 ， 对。是啊 ， 不！他们有自己的团队 ， 他们有很多小东西！<page>您可以在上面放一个单独的口袋 ， 这样您就可以携带更多的工具和垃圾。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. This woman has achieved 15 goals! What a great victory!<page>Enjoy it! In difficult times, even a little bit of relief can give you comfort, right? Actually?<hpage>I think this game saves you normal time better, but you may be telling the truth.<hpage>Now that I have won your challenge, will you accept the reward I received?<page>Yes, right. Yeah, no! They have their own team, they have a lot of little things!<page>You can put a separate pocket on top so you can carry more tools and garbage.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! We’ve devised a final challenge for you, my lady, if you’re interested.<page>Hit the target as many times as you can without missing. The more targets you hit, the more rosaries you’ll win from us! Care to try?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我们给您准备了终极挑战，女士！<page>连续击中靶子次数越多，赢取的念珠越多！敢试试吗？
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。如果你有兴趣 ， 这是你的挑战。<page>不要错过尽可能多的目标。达到的目标越多 ， 你赢得的袖子就越多！你想做一个实验吗？
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. If you are interested, this is your challenge.<page>Don't miss as many goals as possible. The more goals you achieve, the more sleeves you will win! Do you want to do an experiment?

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, within an old Weaver nest I discovered a weapon. Though much damaged by age, I believe your skills could see it restored.<page>Ho. An impressive tool that, and a fine challenge. We can reforge the weapon, if the price fits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我在一处古老织巢中发现了这件武器。虽年代久远损毁严重，但以你们的手艺应该能修复。<page>嚯，好东西！这活儿够意思，只要报酬合适，咱就帮你重铸。
translated_text: <hpage>总经理的女儿在一块旧布里找到了一把枪。衰老可能会伤害很多人 ， 但我认为我们可以恢复我们的能力。<page>这是一个令人印象深刻的工具 ， 但也是一个巨大的挑战。如果价格不错 ， 你可以重建你的武器。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The general manager's daughter found a gun in an old cloth. Aging may hurt a lot of people, but I think we can restore our abilities.<page>It's an impressive tool, but it's also a huge challenge. If the price is good, you can rebuild your weapon.

original_en_text: A fair exchange made, pointy bug. Now our work calls. Return again if you find need of our trade and talent.
original_zh_text: 交易愉快，小尖头虫。眼下我们的活儿还多着呢，有需要再来。
translated_text: 公平交换是个大错误。现在任务被召回了。如果您能够满足我们的业务和人力资源需求 ， 请回来。
secondary_translated_text: Fair exchange is a big mistake. The mission has now been recalled. If you can meet our business and human resource needs, please come back.

original_en_text: We hope Ballow serves you well, pointy bug. In our long time serving these docks, he’s the finest assistant we’ve found.
original_zh_text: 希望巴洛能帮上忙，小尖头虫。在码头干了这么多年，他是咱见过最得力的助手。
translated_text: Spike Bug ， 我希望 Ballow 能为你工作。
secondary_translated_text: Spike Bug, I hope Ballow can work for you.

translated_text: 加强？
secondary_translated_text: Strengthen?

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still about, pointy bug! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its first retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet I now need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你已经葬身火海了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: 一切都很好 ， 这是个大错误！你已经证明了你做了最困难的事情。<page>Barlow 坦率地谈到了潜水的复杂性 ， 以及他在第一次康复期间缺乏潜水。<page>他害怕被困在火中 ， 但让我猜猜。<hpage>从底部回来是一个艰难的攀登 ， 我从来没有经历过 ， 但我必须回去。<page>” 你疯了， Bob 。也非常勇敢。<page>当他发现自己收到了巴罗的一封信时 ， 他描述了水下时钟的修复如下 ：<page>如果你想尝试你的工作 ， 你必须再次尝试它。如果我们的专业服务能够满足您的基本需求 ， 我们将继续提供。
secondary_translated_text: Everything is fine, this is a big mistake! You have proven that you did the most difficult thing.<page>Barlow spoke candidly about the complexity of diving and his lack of diving during his first rehab.<page>He was afraid of being trapped in the fire, but let me guess.<hpage>Coming back from the bottom was a tough climb that I had never experienced before, but I had to go back.<page>"You're crazy, Bob. And very brave.<page>When he found he had received a letter from Barrow, he described the restoration of the underwater clock as follows:<page>If you want to try your job, you have to try it again. If our professional services can meet your basic needs, we will continue to provide them.

original_en_text: And not a single target was struck... a right shame, that! We can’t reward you with any rosaries, my lady, but we’d love to see you test your aim once more!
original_zh_text: 一次都没中……太可惜啦！我没法给您念珠，女士，但欢迎随时再来试试准头！
translated_text: 没有瞄准目标 ， 这是一种罪恶。我没有奖励罗萨里奥 ， 但我迫不及待地想尝试另一个目标！"
secondary_translated_text: Not aiming at the target is a sin. I didn't reward Rosario, but I can't wait to try another goal! "

original_en_text: A weapon from a long distant past. We can combine the Weaver components with our own mouldings to repair the tool.
original_zh_text: 远古时期遗留下来的武器。可以将织者的部件与我们自造的铸件结合，修复这件工具。
translated_text: 您可以将织物组件与您的模具相结合 ， 以修复遥远过去的武器工具。
secondary_translated_text: You can combine fabric components with your molds to repair weapon tools from the distant past.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, these black quakes that now wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You wish to descend so deep, pointy bug?... It is true these docks possess a craft capable.<page>Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharloom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: <hpage>这些黑色的地震正在摧毁你们的土地 ， 我们将看到它们在火湖下面的泉源中定居下来。<page>你想跳进这么深 ， 这么锋利的昆虫 ？5 月航天飞机<page>我们没有这种权力。“无论法老是健康还是虚弱 ， 我们的职责总是在摇篮里。<page>我认为巴罗有怀疑 ， 如果我们的命运是可怕的 ， 我们必须立即确定它 ， 正如他的行为所暗示的那样。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>These black earthquakes are destroying your land, and we will see them settling in the springs below the Lake of Fire.<page>Do you want to jump into such a deep, sharp insect? May Space Shuttle<page>We have no such power. "Whether the pharaoh is healthy or weak, our duty is always in the cradle.<page>I think Barrow has doubts that if our destiny is terrible, we must determine it immediately, as his actions imply.

original_en_text: Crafting by claw alone produces inferior results. With this kit, you can craft finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 单凭你的肢爪，只能造出粗劣的工具。有此匣相助，你便可打造更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: 单独的指甲不能很好地工作。这套工具使它更薄 ， 更锋利 ， 更致命。这就是你想要的， 先生。
secondary_translated_text: Nail alone does not work well. This tool set makes it thinner, sharper and more deadly. This is what you want, sir.

translated_text: 绝望 ？
secondary_translated_text: Desperate?

original_en_text: My lady, you left our game in such a hurry! No doubt some task of great import pulled you away.<page>That’s an instant disqualification, of course. You understand. But we don’t hold it against you, not at all! Care to play again?
original_zh_text: 女士，您离开得很匆忙！肯定是有要事要忙吧。<page>这局只能直接判负，希望您理解。但我们不会计较这种小事！要不要再来一局？
translated_text: 快速玩游戏中的一些重要任务将释放你。<page>这是一种立即取消资格。我明白 ， 但我没有意见。你想再玩一次吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Playing quickly some important tasks in the game will free you.<page>This is an immediate disqualification. I understand, but I have no opinion. Do you want to play again?

original_en_text: <hpage>I need a moment, sir. Please unlock the bell that I may exit.<page>Seein’ some sense? Can’t blame ya if you’re thinkin’ on backin’ out. It’s a mad hope that old bell’d even survive the trip.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我还需要一点时间。打开钟门让我出来。<page>总算清醒了？打退堂鼓也不怪你。那破钟能撑到湖底本就是个疯念头。
translated_text: <hpage>这将需要一段时间 ， 铃响了。<page>你是什么意思？如果你想离开 ， 我不会责怪你的。人们焦急地希望这个古老的物种能在这次旅行中幸存下来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>It will take a while, and the bell rings.<page>What do you mean? If you want to leave, I won't blame you. People are anxious to hope that the ancient species will survive the trip.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, if you can hear me, there has been an accident during the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is unfit for travel. Retrieve it if you may, but I shall not return within.<page>...iss...istake...erwhelm...retrie...a...ssible...
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，能听见吗？下潜途中出了点故障。<hpage>钟体已损坏，无法继续下潜。你可试着把它打捞上岸，但我无法乘它返回。<page>……错……错误……过载……无法……打捞……
translated_text: <hpage>如果你正在听 ， 路上发生了一起事故。<hpage>在这种路线状态下 ， 钟声不适合旅行。如果我可以 ， 我会告诉你 ， 但我不会再进去了。<page>...国际空间站是 ...总是 ， 总是 ， 学习 ， 是一个公民。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If you are listening, there was an accident on the road.<hpage>In this route state, the bell is not suitable for travel. If I could, I would tell you, but I'm not going in there again.<page>... The International Space Station is... Always, always, learn, be a citizen.

original_en_text: Oh no... no, not at all. Wouldn’t do us any good, would it? No, it seems like this little frolic of ours is well and truly finished.<page>Oh, but what an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 不不……不用。我们玩得起，也输得起。看来我们的游戏需要告一段落了。<page>但与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。我知道 ， 如果你不在那里 ， 对我们所有人都不好。事实上？我的小游戏结束了。<page>我很荣幸能和你一起玩！每当你感觉到口袋里念珠的痛苦时 ， 请想起我们。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. I know it wouldn't be good for all of us if you weren't there. Actually? My Mini games are over.<page>I am honored to play with you! Whenever you feel the pain of rosary beads in your pocket, please think of us.

original_en_text: Ola! That’s... that’s twenty-five times the target has been struck!<page>My lady... I thought perhaps you’d have a little more trouble with this round, but you’ve emerged victorious again.<page>I’ll have to speak to my associate. I don’t think he provided you with enough of a challenge, truth be told.<hpage>It was challenge enough. My prize, sir?<page>
original_zh_text: 哎！这……命中二十五次了！<page>女士……本以为这局能让您吃点苦头，结果您又赢了。<page>我得找我的伙计谈谈，说实话他给您设的挑战不够难。<hpage>我觉得够难了。那么奖品呢，先生？
translated_text: 嘿 ， 嘿 ， 嘿。这是什么？这一目标已经实现了 25 次。<page>我认为本轮比赛会有更多的问题 ， 但我们再次获胜。<page>坦率地说 ， 我不认为有足够的挑战。<hpage>太复杂了 ， 不是吗 ？这是我的价格吗？<page>
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. What is this? This goal has been achieved 25 times.<page>I think there will be more problems in this round, but we won again.<page>Frankly, I don't think there are enough challenges.<hpage>It's too complicated, isn't it? Is this my price?<page>

original_en_text: Urk! A prize, of course! My lady must have a prize!<page>Here then... a lovely necklace full with rosaries. I’d been hanging onto this for a while, but you’ve earned it fairly.<page>I just hope you think of me when you wear it, my lady!
original_zh_text: 啊！当然有！必须有！<page>给您……缀满念珠的漂亮项链。我私藏好久了，但您赢得实至名归。<page>希望您佩戴它时能想起我，女士！
translated_text: 哦！哦！当然 ， 价格！女人将付出代价。<page>这就是我在这里的原因 ， 这是一条美丽的项链 ， 上面覆盖着玫瑰花。我在这里已经很久了 ， 我应得的。<page>我只想让你在使用它时想着我。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! Of course, the price! Women will pay the price.<page>That's why I'm here, it's a beautiful necklace covered with roses. I've been here a long time, and I deserve it.<page>I just want you to think of me when you use it.

original_en_text: Leave us! My great master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: 快走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: 离我们远点！业主需要时间反思 ， 但他们也需要重新考虑口味。
secondary_translated_text: Get away from us! Owners need time to reflect, but they also need to rethink their tastes.

original_en_text: Pilgrim who would hold our song within your shell, rise above.<page>Offer your most devout self unto our sacred heart.
original_zh_text: 心怀圣歌的朝圣者，升华吧。<page>将虔信之魂献予圣心。
translated_text: 朝圣者把我们的歌藏在贝壳里。<page>请将你最神圣的奉献给我们的圣心。
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrims hide our songs in shells.<page>Please dedicate your most sacred to our sacred heart.

original_en_text: ...ilgrim!... ast aside those many sinful hopes for rest ...d reward... remain pure... within our midst... sk for nothing! <page>See... Citadel’s simple stone, bare an... dorned. See h...ain our garb, how sparse o... meal. Know that... excess is sin!<page>Stay vigil... ys, for tho... wretched pilgrims... dare relen... their base desi... Left unpunish... thin our pure chorus... eir seductive sin... pread like flame...
original_zh_text: ……朝圣者！……抛弃休憩与奖赏的邪念……保持纯洁……在我们中间……无欲无求！<page>看这圣堡素石……无华无饰。看这粗布麻衣……清汤寡水。须知奢侈即罪！<page>保持警惕……因那些堕落朝圣者……放纵卑劣欲望……若不惩戒……污秽将如野火蔓延……
translated_text: ...¡坏人！我放弃了休息的希望。1.获奖。在我们之间。别听我说！<page>请你听我说。看上去只是一块石头。我们的衣服是多么的分散 ， 我们的衣服是多么的分散 ， 过度是一件可悲的事情。<page>“是的 ， 小心那些可怜的朝圣者。然后 ， 他有勇气再做一次。基本的设计。幸运的是 ， 他逃脱了惩罚。他们有一个干净的合唱团； 这是一个外部的诱惑。它像火焰一样蔓延开来。
secondary_translated_text: ...¡Bad guys! I gave up hope of rest. 1. Award. Between us. Don't listen to me!<page>Please listen to me. It just looks like a stone. How scattered our clothes are, how scattered our clothes are, excessive is a sad thing.<page>"Yes, be careful of those poor pilgrims. Then he had the courage to do it again. Basic design. Fortunately, he escaped punishment. They have a clean choir; it's an external temptation. It spread like a flame.

original_en_text: Accept, a t-t-token of the sentinel’s order.<page>As friends... let us p-part.
original_zh_text: 收下，哨卫信、信物。<page>以友、友人之谊……告别。
translated_text: 信号被接收 ， 保安人员下达了命令。<page>作为朋友 ， 我们分享 p 。
secondary_translated_text: The signal was received and the security guard gave the order.<page>As friends, we share p.

original_en_text: <hpage>I would view your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>She may see it. A perfect set. This Vaultkeeper is rich with insights. Jealous its fellows would be... If still their minds remained.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我要看看你的收藏，管理员。<page>可以。看这完美收藏。羡慕死其他管理员……如果它们还有脑子的话。
translated_text: <hpage>宝藏 ， 检查您的收藏。<page>领导者有远见 ， 我羡慕我的同伴 ， 心还在那里。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Treasure, check your collection.<page>Leaders have foresight, and I envy my companions, but my heart is still there.

original_en_text: Aaaahh. What’s this? The rasher of a courier, tied up tight! I can see its fat still dripping fresh!
original_zh_text: 送货虫的熏肉！瞧瞧这油脂，还在滴汁呢！
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。你在干什么？邮局已经关闭。你可以看到一些新鲜的脂肪！
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. What are you doing? The post office is closed. You can see some fresh fat!

original_en_text: This stew, of Mossberries stirred thick. Good. Good! It shall form the base once set in mould.
original_zh_text: 德鲁伊的苔莓浓汤，够稠，够味！冻成型就能当基底。
translated_text: 准备鸽子 ， 混合非常厚 ， 好的！一旦你把它放在形状上 ， 它就成为基础。
secondary_translated_text: Prepare the pigeons, mix very thick, okay! Once you put it on the shape, it becomes the foundation.

original_en_text: Ahh... you have brought song again, though perhaps it is wasted on one as unworthy as I.<hpage>You needn’t satisfy my curiosity if it pains you, sir, but I must ask, for what crime or sin did the Citadel imprison you?<page>My sin? A grave transgression, the cause of much pain for many. But to speak of a sin... is to invite its return. I will say no more.
original_zh_text: 啊……你又带来歌声，可惜我这罪躯不配聆听。<hpage>若勾起你伤痛可以不答，但我必须问：圣堡因何罪囚禁你？<page>我的罪过？我犯的错带来了许多伤痛。但罪过……是请它归来。我不想多说。
translated_text: 是的 ， 对。对于像我这样的人来说 ， 这首歌可能没有帮助 ， 但这首歌又回到了我身边。<hpage>如果你受苦了 ， 你不必满足我的好奇心 ， 但我是一个虔诚的人。<page>你没有自己的 ， 是吗 ？这是一种严重的违反行为 ， 给许多人带来了巨大的痛苦。当我们说 “不 ” 时 ， 记住它 ， 什么都不要说。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, right. For someone like me, this song may not have helped, but it came back to me.<hpage>If you suffer, you don't have to satisfy my curiosity, but I am a pious person.<page>You don't have your own, do you? This is a serious violation that has caused great suffering to many people. When we say "no", remember it and don't say anything.

translated_text: 国歌是什么意思？
secondary_translated_text: What does the national anthem mean?

original_en_text: By the purity of your will... the c-c-clarity of your intent... you are innocent of the silken curse.<page>Failed, has this sentinel. Your j-judgment, will it accept.<hpage>Is this truly failure, gilded one? You meant to test me and have done so. I would expect nothing less of a true guardian.<hpage>The matter is resolved. There is no need for death. Stand, and let us part as friends.
original_zh_text: 凭纯、纯粹意志……清明本心……你未受魂丝侵蚀。<page>哨卫失、失职。甘受裁、裁决。<hpage>真有失职吗？你完成了测试，我认为已经尽了守卫之职。<hpage>此事到此为止，无需生死相搏。起身吧，你我以友相别。
translated_text: 纯洁的意志。他的意图很清楚。你是一个无辜的丝绸诅咒。<page>” 你失败了， 警卫。"<hpage>金牌是失败吗 ？我们对真正的后卫的期望并没有降低。<hpage>问题解决了 ， 你不必死。站起来 ， 我们做朋友。
secondary_translated_text: Pure will. His intentions are clear. You are an innocent silk curse.<page>"You failed, guard. "<hpage>Is the gold medal a failure? Our expectations for real defenders have not been lowered.<hpage>The problem is solved, you don't have to die. Stand up and let's be friends.

original_en_text: Seek out a Pickled Muckmaggot, the sacred treat revered and reviled for its intensity. It was a specialty of the chef Lugoli, long ago banished for culinary sacrilege.<page>Rumours sing that the great chef retreated to their home-caves in the dank midlands below...
original_zh_text: 找一份腌淤秽蛆。那是被放逐的卢戈利大厨的招牌菜。<page>听说那混蛋躲到中部地区的潮湿洞穴了……
translated_text: 找到 Kimchlamet ， 上帝的喜悦 ， 被崇拜和谴责的力量。这是一位厨师的杰作 ， 他因为糟糕的烹饪而被监禁。<page>据说 ， 这位伟大的厨师躲在他的家乡潮湿的中央洞穴里。
secondary_translated_text: Find Kimchlamet, the joy of God, the power to be worshipped and condemned. It was the work of a chef who was imprisoned for poor cooking.<page>The great chef is said to be hiding in the damp central cave of his hometown.

original_en_text: <hpage>With this I have fulfilled my promise, sir. The ingredients have all been delivered. I trust now the meal can be made, and the oil awarded for my efforts?<page>You’ll have your oil, whelp! Firstly learn some patience! The dish must be prepared perfectly, enough to rouse my master and see them sated. <page>Now! Permit me to work my skill, and you’ll stand to see a meal of scent and taste that would dazzle Pharloom in her prime!
original_zh_text: <hpage>现在食材已备齐，该给我油了吧？<page>你这小虫急什么！得先把菜做得完美才能唤醒主人。<page>在这好好看着！见证这飘香万里的盛宴是怎么诞生的！
translated_text: <hpage>我信守了我的诺言。所有的食物都已经到了。我真的会做饭。<page>“你会吃黄油的 ， 我的孩子。“这道菜必须准备得足够好 ， 才能唤醒我的客人 ， 看到他们的胃已经饱了。"<page>来吧 ， 现在！亲自了解哪些食物吸引了 Farroom！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I kept my promise. All the food has arrived. I can really cook.<page>"You will eat butter, my child. "This dish has to be prepared well enough to wake up my guests and see that their stomachs are full. "<page>Come on, now! Find out for yourself which foods attract Farroom!

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, ‘tis merely the livid red bug. I was expecting some word from those above to explain the meaning of all this rumbling and shaking.<page>They fail in their holy duties! My master must be shielded from such inconveniences, else their digestion be disrupted.<hpage>There are worse fates than indigestion, sir. You are fortunate to be unharmed.<page>Fortune has nothing to do with it. I am simply of a hardier breed than the insipid young servants of these recent, wretched times!
original_zh_text: 嗯？是你这红衣虫啊，我还以为上面有虫来解释地震是怎么回事呢。<page>上面那帮渎职的家伙！惊扰主人的消化谁担待得起！<hpage>比起消化不良，你该庆幸自己没有受伤。<page>跟运气可没什么关系，我这把老骨头比现在那些软脚虾仆从硬朗多了！
translated_text: 这是什么 ？你在干什么？我希望上面的人能说些什么来解释这种咆哮和颤抖的含义。<page>我的老师应该尽量避免这种不便。"<hpage>很高兴你没有受伤。这是因为消化不良是更严重的。<page>我是一个比过去悲剧时代无聊的年轻仆人更强大的种族！
secondary_translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? I wish the people above would say something to explain the meaning of this roar and trembling.<page>My teachers should try to avoid this inconvenience. "<hpage>I'm glad you weren't hurt. This is because indigestion is more serious.<page>I am a more powerful race than the boring young servants of the tragic past!

original_en_text: Rkkt! I know she has it. Keeps it. Carried coveted in her cloth. This one searched for it. Give it! Give it to us!
original_zh_text: 咔！我知道她藏着。揣在披风里。本管理员找了好久。交出来！立刻交出来！
translated_text: 他说他总是躲在他的衣服下面 ， 我看到他 ， 你可以来。
secondary_translated_text: He said he always hides under his clothes. I see him, you can come.

original_en_text: Divine music... The soul of Pharloom eternal laid bare... That our cursed age could still receive such blessing...<page>So, Weaver-spawn, our melody is yours now, held in mind to carry beyond our walls. Was the learning worth its thieving? <hpage>It was, Vaultkeeper. And know to me your service continues. Keep the cylinder safe, along with any others I may bring.
original_zh_text: 神圣旋律……纺络永恒之魂的具现……这黑暗时代竟能重现荣光……<page>织者坏种，圣歌归你了，带出圣堡吧。这番追寻值得吗？<hpage>值得，而你将继续为我效命。保管好音筒，包括我以后带回来的。
translated_text: 法老的灵魂已经被揭示 ， 即使在这个被诅咒的时代 ， 我们也可以得到这样的祝福。<page>因此 ， 韦伯的孩子们 ， 我们的旋律是你们的。别忘了把它从墙上拿下来。<hpage>是的 ， 财政部长。让我们知道我们的服务将继续。确保您的气缸和其他气缸是安全的。
secondary_translated_text: The soul of the pharaoh has been revealed, and even in this cursed era, we can receive such blessings.<page>So, Weber children, our melody is yours. Don't forget to take it off the wall.<hpage>Yes, Treasury Secretary. Let us know that our services will continue. Make sure your cylinder and other cylinders are safe.

original_en_text: ...Dear... grim... Dark it seems now... et these word... become your guide...<page>Hear our voice... Let it... your own! Give... of yourself... for great Pharloom, for... first-children who bequeath it to us... for our salva... sure to come!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的……朝圣者……黑暗笼罩时……谨记这些箴言……<page>倾听吾声……化为己念！为纺络献身……为赐予我们一切的初代子嗣……为即将到来的……救赎！
translated_text: ...亲爱的...现在我们可以让它变暗 ， 我们会有一个指南。<page>拯救伟大的法老萨尔巴的长子。“请到这边来吧。
secondary_translated_text: ... Dear... Now we can darken it, and we'll have a guide.<page>Save the eldest son of the great pharaoh Sarba. "Please come here.

original_en_text: For a sweet simmer, find me some Vintage Nectar. A rare brew, treasured by bugs with a keen scent for excellence.<page>There’s slim chance such an old yield might still exist. Alas! Its depth of flavour is a necessity for the holy dish!
original_zh_text: 甜味得用陈年蜜露，嗅觉敏锐的老饕才懂欣赏。<page>这陈酿怕是失传了……唉！可圣宴缺不得这醇香！
translated_text: 如果你想要一个甜蜜的龙舌兰 ， 寻找蜂蜜的背面 ， 这是一种罕见的啤酒 ， 精致的昆虫和追求完美的赞赏。<page>这种古老的回归仍然存在的可能性很小。哦！哦！它的味道深度对于一道神圣的菜肴来说是不可或缺的！
secondary_translated_text: If you want a sweet tequila, look for the back of honey, which is a rare beer, admired for refined insects and the pursuit of perfection.<page>There is little chance that this ancient return will still exist. Oh! Oh! Its depth of flavor is indispensable for a sacred dish!

original_en_text: Hark! ...ilgrim! You... climb... our eternal embrace... who stand stru... the threshold... our stark Citadel of stone... kno... true service may now commence.<page>Forget... your weary shell. Forgo... urge to still... arloom commands... give... greatest gift! Join our chor... Raise... shell... voice... and sing!
original_zh_text: 哈！……朝圣者！……你已攀至……永恒怀抱……立于圣堡石阶……须知……真正侍奉现在开始。<page>忘却……疲惫躯壳……摒弃……休憩之欲……纺络……命你……献上……最珍贵礼物！加入合唱……抬起躯壳……放声高歌！
translated_text: 听着 ， 朋友！坏人！你是谁？站在永恒的怀抱中 ， 谁能站起来 ？在石头城堡里 ， 真正的服务开始了。<page>我忘记了他们。我们放弃了 ， 势头继续。Arom 的命令是 ... ...最美丽的礼物！加入合唱团。他的脖子有所改善。她的声音 ...贝维！
secondary_translated_text: Listen, friend! Bad guys! Who are you? Standing in the arms of eternity, who can stand up? In the stone castle, real service begins.<page>I forgot about them. We gave up and the momentum continued. Arom's orders are... ... The most beautiful gift! Join the choir. His neck has improved. Her voice... Bevy!

original_en_text: For the core of the meal, find that marvellous meat... The rasher of a courier, those spritely bugs who once arrived at the toll of every second bell.<page>I saw many a courier gorge upon this fatty snack. Where are they all? Have they abandoned their holy toil?
original_zh_text: 主菜要送货虫的熏肉，那群按点报时的家伙最爱吃。<page>往日时常能在这看见他们，如今连个虫影都没了！
translated_text: 食物的中心是活泼的昆虫 ， 每次它们敲响钟声 ， 就会寻找美味的肉和垃圾。<page>我见过很多邮递员吃着肥胖的零食。你是否放弃了神圣的努力 ？
secondary_translated_text: At the center of the food are lively insects, and every time they ring the bell, they look for delicious meat and garbage.<page>I have seen many postmen eat fat snacks. Have you given up on sacred efforts?

original_en_text: The master has a mighty endurance, yet all of this rumbling and breaking makes me fearful for their safety.<page>Fear not. I will stay by their side until my old shell crumbles away.
original_zh_text: 虽说主人铜肠铁胃，但这动静也太吓人了。<page>不过不用怕，我就算拼了命也会保护主人！
translated_text: 业主是非常坚固的， 但噪音和裂缝可能会让你担心安全。<page>“别担心 ， 我会一直陪着他们 ， 直到我的旧贝壳被打破。»
secondary_translated_text: Owners are very sturdy, but noise and cracks can make you worry about safety.<page>"Don't worry, I'll stay with them until my old shells are broken."

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy, hee hee! I’ll eat a lot, grow big and fat. Then I’ll lay a lot of eggies!<page>They bring me plenty of food, so they must want plenty of eggies.<page>And plenty they shall have, if they’re nice to me! Hee hee!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋，生蛋蛋！吃饱饱，长胖胖，就能下好多蛋蛋！<page>他们给我这么多吃的，肯定想要好多蛋蛋！<page>只要对我好，要多少有多少！嘻嘻！
translated_text: 蛋大多数时候 ， 我是胖的 ， 胖的。我试着把更多的鸡蛋。<page>鸡蛋为我们提供了大量的食物 ， 所以我们想要它。<page>如果每个人都很好 ， 就会有很多人。
secondary_translated_text: Eggs Most of the time, I am fat, fat. I tried to put more eggs.<page>Eggs provide us with a lot of food, so we want it.<page>If everyone is good, there will be many people.

original_en_text: <hpage>I had thought I was answering your summons as a friend, or at least an ally, but now that we stand together in this place I can sense your intent.<hpage>You mean to raise your blades against me. Am I your enemy, then?<page>D-defence of the sacred Citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is the eternal duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.<hpage>You believe me haunted, a slave to the pale threads? I think you are more perceptive than that. My Silk is my own, as is my will.<page>Unsure, is this sentinel. B-both haunted and innocent, you seem. With regret, this sentinel must t-t-test the strength of your will.
original_zh_text: <hpage>原以为响应的是友军召唤，但此刻感知到你的意图。<hpage>你要兵刃相向？视我为敌？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清、清除所有被魂丝蛊惑者……是必要使命。<hpage>你认为我被苍白丝线操控？恐怕你错了，我的灵丝与意志皆属于我。<page>判、判断存疑。你似被侵蚀又似清白。遗憾……哨卫必须测、测试你的意志。
translated_text: <hpage>我以为我以朋友的身份回应了他的召唤 ， 或者至少是作为盟友 ， 但现在我在这里 ， 我能感觉到他的意图。<hpage>他们必用刀剑攻击我 ， 我岂是你们的仇敌吗 ？<page>守护者永恒的使命是保护城堡 ， 并满足那里的声音。<page>结局是所有被丝绸耳语所吸引的人的必然命运。<hpage>你以为我是鬼吗？白色丝绸的奴隶 ？西尔纳克是我的 ， 这是我的观点。<page>我不知道 ， 他是个保镖。他看起来很无辜。不幸的是 ， 保镖不得不考验他的意志。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I thought I had answered his call as a friend, or at least as an ally, but now that I am here, I can feel his intentions.<hpage>They will attack me with the sword. Am I your enemy?<page>The keeper's eternal mission is to protect the castle and satisfy the sounds there.<page>The ending is the inevitable fate of all those attracted by the whisper of silk.<hpage>Do you think I'm a ghost? Slaves of white silk? Sirnak is mine, that's my opinion.<page>I don't know. He's a bodyguard. He seemed innocent. Unfortunately, the bodyguard had to test his will.

original_en_text: An ornate lock mechanism with a keyhole at its centre.
translated_text: 一个美丽的封闭的身体 ， 中心有一个封闭的孔。
secondary_translated_text: A beautiful closed body with a closed hole in the center.

original_en_text: The nectar! To think, such an aged extract still exists! What an exquisite tragedy that I cannot taste it myself. My master must have every drop!
original_zh_text: 陈年蜜露！没想到真的还存在，这等陈酿我都没福品尝，全都得给主人留着！
translated_text: 马纳！哪儿啊！玛娜！哪儿啊！哪儿啊！哪儿啊！让我们想象一下 ， 这样古老的东西存在 ， 这是一个美丽的悲剧 ， 我不能享受我的悲剧。
secondary_translated_text: Manna! Where? Mana! Where? Where? Where? Let's imagine that such an ancient thing exists, it's a beautiful tragedy, and I can't enjoy my tragedy.

original_en_text: Yes! Yes! She gives... It is ours! <hpage>I have passed the relic, Vaultkeeper. Now uphold your promise and aid me with your insight.<page>Fool! Demanding of a Vaultkeeper. Hers is impudence enough to bring death... If she did not carry the scent of Weaver-spawn.<hpage>So you know something of my ancestry, learned bug. If it gains me favour here, then I’ll expect your service in full.<page>Bleg! Dead! Dead, your vicious kind are meant to be. Better methinks to stay as such... <page>Gkkkt. But this one was taught. It shall fold its claws. It shall pass its knowledge, as much as is gleaned.<page>Only to a first child must a Vaultkeeper defer.
original_zh_text: 好！好！她交出了……归我们了！<hpage>遗物给你了，管理员。该兑现承诺了。<page>蠢货！竟敢命令本管理员。这般傲慢本该处死……若不是你带着织者的味道。<hpage>看来你知晓我的血脉，学者虫。若此地以我血脉为尊，我要求你为我效劳。<page>哼！早该灭绝的坏种……还是死干净为好……<page>咳，但本虫受过训诫。它会收起利爪，会分享知识，尽其所能。<page>唯有初代子嗣，能让本管理员低头。
translated_text: 哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！“你给了我 ， 它是我们的。"<hpage>现在 ， 请你信守诺言 ， 帮助你实现你的愿景。<page>如果他的肿胀没有带来布鸡蛋的气味 ， 这将足以杀死他。<hpage>我们承认我们的祖先所犯的错误如果你会在这里找到我的偏好 ， 我等不及你的全面服务。<page>新鲜！他的坏伙伴死了 ， 被判处死刑 ， 但我认为最好让他留在他的位置。<page>GKKT 。这就是他们教我的。用指甲填满它。<page>财宝只属于大儿子。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! "You gave it to me, it's ours. "<hpage>Now, please keep your word and help you realize your vision.<page>If his swelling didn't bring the smell of cloth eggs, it would be enough to kill him.<hpage>We acknowledge the mistakes of our ancestors and if you will find my preferences here, I can't wait for your full service.<page>Fresh! His bad partner died and was sentenced to death, but I thought it would be better to keep him in his place.<page>GKKT 。This is what they taught me. Fill it with your nails.<page>The treasure belongs only to the eldest son.

original_en_text: Oh drab and trembling squib, you who timidly step upon the Great Stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Cast away your fear and join me as my partner. Pharloom’s flame may flicker, but together we shall spark it ablaze!<page>Let us enliven this Citadel lost to silence! Let us rouse the soul of this once great land!
original_zh_text: 怯懦的可怜虫啊，既踏上伟大舞台，便是命运所选！<page>抛却恐惧，与我共演！重燃纺络将熄的火焰！<page>唤醒沉寂的圣堡！唤醒这片土地的魂魄！
translated_text: 哦 ， 单调而颤抖的裤子 ， 大舞台上的懦夫 ， 命运看到了选择！<page>放下你的恐惧 ， 做我的朋友 ， 一起骑马 ， 火可能会燃烧！<page>重建宁静的城堡！让我们唤醒这个伟大的国家的精神！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, monotonous and trembling pants, coward on the big stage, fate sees a choice!<page>Let go of your fears, be my friend, ride together, the fire may burn!<page>Rebuild the tranquil castle! Let us awaken the spirit of this great country!

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I am seeking a melody held by your vaults, part of a set to open a path above. Tell me what you know of it.<page>The Weaver-thing would claim our sacred melody?! How grim the age we survive to see... Vile sacrilege for it to pass to an outsider...<page>Only our pontiff, lived long and low within our vault, they held the melody, jealously, covetously... A learning for the highest Vaultkeeper, and them alone.<page>A truth they were told to have found... There in the dark. Something within the melody, or the words. Something to set them silent... <hpage>I am not afraid of what I’ll hear, Vaultkeeper. If your pontiff and their melody wait below, I shall find them both.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在寻找书库的旋律，用于开启上层通路。把你知道的告诉我。<page>织者竟想染指圣歌？！……何等黑暗的时代……异乡客妄图窃取圣律……<page>唯有深居书库之底的主教知晓……最高机密，独享的学识……<page>据说他们在地底发现了什么……旋律或歌词中的真相……令其沉默的真相……<hpage>我不惧真相，管理员。若你的主教在底下等着，我会找到他们。
translated_text: <hpage>财政部 ， 我正在寻找一个旋律下载到磁带上作为上述开放路径的一部分。"<page>有没有什么东西让你失去神圣的旋律 ？生命是多么艰难 ， 把它传递给一个陌生人是多么的轻蔑！<page>只有这位在我们的坟墓中过着漫长而卑微的生活的父亲 ， 才以邪恶和贪婪理解了这首旋律。<page>他们说他们找到了真相 ， 因为旋律中的某些东西 ， 黑暗中的文字 ， 可以帮助你平静下来。<hpage>” 我不怕听到它， 亲爱的。如果爸爸和梅洛迪在等你 ， 我会找到你的。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ministry of Finance, I am looking for a melody to download onto tape as part of the above-mentioned open path. "<page>Is there anything that makes you lose your sacred melody? How difficult life is, how contemptuous it is to pass it on to a stranger!<page>Only this father, who lived a long and humble life in our graves, understood this melody with evil and greed.<page>They say they found the truth because something in the melody, words in the dark, can help you calm down.<hpage>"I'm not afraid to hear it, honey. If Dad and Melody are waiting for you, I will find you. "

original_en_text: Yes! A fair gift, Weaver-spawn. This Vaultkeeper shall glean what knowledge a great mind can.
original_zh_text: 好！公平交易，织者坏种。本管理员将用智慧解析其中奥义。
translated_text: 哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！这是来自 Weaver 的礼物。我们收集知识 ， 以便专业人士可以有伟大的想法。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, yes! Oh, yes! This is a gift from Weaver. We collect knowledge so that professionals can have great ideas.

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall guide.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等引领。
translated_text: 当音乐结束时 ， 音乐继续。<page>因为我们所驾驶的虚假永恒。
secondary_translated_text: When the music ends, the music continues.<page>Because of the false eternity we drive.

original_en_text: Grkkt. What has she brought it? More treasures waiting on a Keeper’s insight, yes? The sacred cylinders of our holy Citadel? Pass them. Give them. Now! She must!
original_zh_text: 咔！她带了什么？更多需要解读的圣物？圣堡的圣咏音筒？快交出来！必须立刻交出来！
translated_text: 问 ： 你带了什么？有许多宝藏在等待管家的本能 ， 神圣城堡的宝藏。“应该是！"
secondary_translated_text: Question: What did you bring? There are many treasures waiting for the steward's instincts, the treasures of the Holy Castle. "It should be! "

translated_text: <hpage>” 我在这里， 戈德曼。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"I'm here, Goldman.

original_en_text: Eternal, is the Citadel. Et-t-ternal, is the devotion of the sentinels.<page>While its shell is f-f-functional, this sentinel will hold true to its duty.
original_zh_text: 圣堡永存，哨、哨卫的忠诚也永存。<page>只要机能尚存……职责不怠。
translated_text: 永恒的忠诚是守护者的忠诚。<page>尽管其船体功能齐全 ， 但哨兵仍然忠实地执行其使命。
secondary_translated_text: Eternal loyalty is the loyalty of the guardian.<page>Despite its fully functional hull, the Sentinel faithfully carried out its mission.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, you rare chosen who hath ascended to this final threshold, listen to our wish, deliver it, that you may rise above and see your pilgrimage end.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，荣登终阶的稀世天选。聆听我等祈愿，实现我等祈愿。方可升华，得见朝圣终焉。
translated_text: 他不寻常的选择 ， 永恒的朝圣者的签名 ， 使我们能够到达这最后的入口 ， 听到我们的誓言 ， 实现它 ， 并看到他的朝圣之旅的结束。
secondary_translated_text: His unusual choice, the signature of the eternal pilgrim, enabled us to reach this final entrance, hear our oath, fulfill it, and see the end of his pilgrimage.

original_en_text: Interloper! On you, our pontiff’s sacred melody! You have found it, hold it, and now you dally, lost like a mite in our shelves!<page>Return to the listening room below! The sacred cylinder can be played, and the melody of our vaults heard at last in this damned age stretched long.
original_zh_text: 入侵者！你已经找到主教圣歌，却还在此游荡！<page>回下层聆听室去！圣音筒可以演奏了，圣歌终将在此黑暗时代重现！
translated_text: 你是我们父的神圣旋律！你找到了它 ， 你已经拥有了它 ， 但现在你在我们的同伴中徘徊。<page>回到下面的听力室。我们触摸了神圣的柱子 ， 终于在这个该死的时刻听到了我们宝藏的旋律。
secondary_translated_text: You are the sacred melody of our Father! You found it, you already had it, but now you linger among our companions.<page>Go back to the listening room below. We touched the sacred pillar and finally heard the melody of our treasure at this damn moment.

original_en_text: Taste, smell, texture... It is done! A meal to rival Pharloom’s finest.<page>Mighty master, how long you have waited to set your jaw upon so perfect a dish! Join us, and dine!
original_zh_text: 色、香、味……俱全！纺络的绝世盛宴！<page>我的主人，让您久等了！快醒醒，开饭啦！
translated_text: 食物充满了味道 ， 气味和一致性 ， 可以与农场中最美味的食物相媲美。<page>师傅们 ， 你们等了多久才吃到这么美味的菜 ？让我们吃晚饭！
secondary_translated_text: The food is full of flavor, smell and consistency, and can rival the most delicious food on the farm.<page>Shifu, how long have you waited to eat such delicious food? Let's have dinner!

original_en_text: Yummy, yummy... oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I am merely a visitor here, little one. Have you made this place your home, then?<page>My home? Oh yes! Lovely and warm. The big ones, they bring me food whenever I’m hungry. And I’m hungry now!
original_zh_text: 饿饿……咦？你是来喂我的吗？<hpage>我只是路过，小家伙。你把这当作巢穴了？<page>巢穴？对呀！又暖又舒服。大个子们总给我带吃的！现在就好饿！
translated_text: 很好 ， 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！“你来为我服务吗 ？ ”<hpage>我只是一个来访者 ， 一个小人物 ， 但你认为这是你的家吗 ？<page>我的家？哦 ， 是的！他是如此的好和温暖 ， 当我饿了 ， 他给我一些食物。
secondary_translated_text: Good, oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! "Are you here to serve me?”<hpage>I'm just a visitor, a little person, but do you think this is your home?<page>My home? Oh, yes! He was so nice and warm that when I was hungry, he gave me some food.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more pressing tasks, sir. Perhaps your master should content themself with a humbler meal?<page>Blasphemy! My master shall have the holy indulgence they deserve, even if I must douse my shell in oil and climb onto a dish myself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我有要事在身，让你主人先将就吃点吧？<page>放肆！就算把我榨成油膏摆上桌，也要让主人享用圣宴！
translated_text: <hpage>我们有一个直接的任务。你想让你的客人吃得好吗？"<page>我的主人值得上帝的宽恕 ， 即使他不得不把我的外壳浸在油里 ， 然后爬上盘子。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>We have a direct task. Do you want your guests to eat well? "<page>My master deserves God's forgiveness, even if he had to soak my shell in oil and climb onto the plate.

original_en_text: To season a meal such as this... only a Crustnut will do. Once, scores of them could be gathered, high atop those coral crusted caves beyond the Grand Gate.<page>Surely some must still grow within that sand-ravaged land?
original_zh_text: 调味……一定得用硬壳果。珊瑚川里以前满地都是，现在就算只剩沙堆，应该也能刨到几颗。
translated_text: 这盘子的味道。坚果是用贝壳做的。数十只鸟聚集在一个曾经被珊瑚覆盖的洞穴的顶部。<page>它会在沙子里生长吗？
secondary_translated_text: The taste of this plate. Nuts are made from shells. Dozens of birds gathered on the top of a cave once covered by coral.<page>Will it grow in the sand?

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall teach.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等教化。
translated_text: 当音乐结束时 ， 音乐继续。<page>我教导你们要作永恒的门徒。
secondary_translated_text: When the music ends, the music continues.<page>I teach you to be eternal disciples.

original_en_text: We would hear the voice of the Keepers, within their grand vaults.<page>They who guard our history, our prayers and our secrets, across the ages.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻典藏司铎之音，回荡宏伟书库。<page>他们守护历史、祷文与秘辛，跨越无尽纪元。
translated_text: 你会听到守护者的声音在你美丽的胸膛里。<page>它包含我们的历史 ， 我们的祈祷和永恒的秘密。
secondary_translated_text: You will hear the voice of the keeper in your beautiful chest.<page>It contains our history, our prayers and eternal secrets.

original_en_text: Pickled Muckmaggot! So that banished chef’s recipes outlived them after all!<hpage>Not so, sir. I claimed the maggot from the chef themself. Their brutish work continued, even with their shell claimed by cursed thread.<page>Incredible! A bug so devout, they could cook with mind expunged. This Citadel was far too hasty to expel such brilliance.
original_zh_text: 腌淤秽蛆！卢戈利的秘方居然没失传！<hpage>我从他本人手里抢的，那家伙变丝傀了还在做菜。<page>厉害！没脑子还能掌勺，圣堡当初就不该赶他走！
translated_text: Kimchomwe ： 为什么难民的食谱更持久<hpage>我不认为那是真的。昆虫被从水槽中移走。虽然水槽上覆盖着被诅咒的丝绸 ， 但他们残酷的工作仍在继续。<page>这太不可思议了！有了这样一个忠诚的昆虫 ， 你可能不会想到做饭。城堡渴望获得这样的声誉。
secondary_translated_text: Kimchomwe: Why refugee recipes last longer<hpage>I don't think that's true. Insects were removed from the sink. Although the sink is covered with cursed silk, their brutal work continues.<page>This is unbelievable! With such a loyal insect, you may not think of cooking. The castle longed for such a reputation.

original_en_text: <hpage>I could track down any ingredient you desire, for a price. The oil you keep here may be of some use to me.<hpage>Promise it as reward, and your master shall have his meal.<page>Hrmph! Such a squalid bargain ill befits a holy servant... but so be it. Fetch me the ingredients and you shall have that pale condiment for yourself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不能白白替你跑腿，拿这瓶油当酬劳吧。<hpage>答应的话，你的主人说不定能如愿吃上大餐。<page>哼！卑劣的交易……罢了，找回食材，苍白油就归你！
translated_text: <hpage>根据价格 ， 您可以找到您喜欢的材料。黄油可能会有帮助。<hpage>作为奖励 ， 业主将给业主一个奖励。<page>哦 ， 天哪！这种肮脏的贝壳不适合武士 ， 但你可以跳过配料 ， 享受柔和的气氛！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Depending on the price, you can find the materials you like. Butter may help.<hpage>As a reward, the owner will give the owner a reward.<page>Oh, my God! This dirty shell is not suitable for samurai, but you can skip the ingredients and enjoy the soft atmosphere!

original_en_text: What an awful clattering! Would you kindly conduct yourself a little more carefully?<page>And why are you adorned in such an awful, livid red? By my oath, those above must make a sport of sending me the most wretched servants they can find!<hpage>I am no servant, sir, rather a guest of sorts, invited by the Citadel. Tell me, is this vial of oil on display your own?<page>Nothing here is my own, you impertinent young mite! This sacred hall, and all the food contained within, belong to my most exalted master.<page>The Great Gourmand! The finest connoisseur who has ever lived, the one whose tastes transcend the ages!<page>None are left now who venerate them as they deserve, save for the loyal, lonely bug who stands before you.<page>That oil is merely a small savoury to whet their appetite for the grand meal to come. A spectacular, Pharloom spanning dish that I have been planning for an age.<page>But alas, those above seem to have forsaken my poor master! And I have grown so old. Now I can never hope to gather the necessary ingredients. Blast their indolence!
original_zh_text: 叮叮咣咣吵死了！能安静点吗？<page>还有你为什么穿这身鲜红刺眼的装扮？上面那些混蛋专派些歪瓜裂枣来侍奉我！<hpage>我可不是仆从，算是圣堡的客人。这瓶油是你的藏品？<page>当然不是我的，你这没耐心的小虫！这里一切都属于我尊贵的主人——大胃王！<page>那是空前绝后的美食家！品味超越时代的存在！<page>如今只剩我忠心耿耿侍奉主人，其他虫早忘了本分。<page>那点油不过是开胃小菜，我筹备的可是横跨纺络的盛宴！<page>可恨上面那帮懒鬼断了供给，我这把老骨头哪凑得齐食材！
translated_text: 这是一首很棒的 CM 歌曲。你会小心吗 ？"<page>“你为什么穿得这么差 ？ ”“人们发誓要给我他们能找到的最幸福的仆人。<hpage>“我不是统治者 ， 我只是宫殿里的客人。展览的瓶子是你的吗？<page>“不是我 ， 小金刚。“这个神圣的房间和里面所有的食物都属于我的至尊主。<page>很棒的食物。品味没有时间。<page>没有人能得到他们应得的尊重 ， 除了在他们面前的一只忠诚而孤独的昆虫。<page>黄油有微咸的味道 ， 可以刺激下一顿饭的食欲。我在法罗群岛做了很长一段时间的美味。<page>但是 ， 哦 ， 所有在那里的人都有我可怜的老师。我知道我是老了。我还没有收集到必要的材料。狗屎 ， 种族。
secondary_translated_text: This is a great CM song. Will you be careful? "<page>"Why are you dressed so badly? "People swore to give me the happiest servant they could find.<hpage>"I am not a ruler, I am just a guest in the palace. Are the bottles in the exhibition yours?<page>"Not me, Little King Kong. "This sacred room and all the food in it belong to my Supreme Lord.<page>Great food. Taste has no time.<page>No one gets the respect they deserve except a loyal and lonely insect in front of them.<page>Butter has a slightly salty taste and can stimulate the appetite for the next meal. I have been cooking delicious food in the Faroe Islands for a long time.<page>But, oh, everyone there has my poor teacher. I know I'm getting old. I haven't collected the necessary materials yet. Shit, race.

original_en_text: Horrid she! What fool dares strike a holy Vaultkeeper! It has knowledge! Insight! As much as any could possibly retain in our fallen age.<page>Would she cast it all aside just to create more death? If so, she is Weaver to the core!
original_zh_text: 疯婆子！竟敢袭击本管理员！本管理员可是掌握着末世最全的学识！<page>你要为了杀戮抛弃这些知识？果真是纯血织者！
translated_text: 你太可怕了！“你是个傻瓜 ， 攻击卫兵 ， 我知道。我们在检查！在此期间尽可能多地节约。<page>他能放弃一切 ， 造成更多的死亡吗 ？如果是这样的话 ， 这是一个完美的平台！
secondary_translated_text: You are terrible! "You are a fool, attacking the guards, I know. We're checking! Save as much as possible during this period.<page>Can he give up everything and cause more deaths? If so, this is the perfect platform!

original_en_text: So be it, impudent louse! Deny our kingdom’s agony. Refuse its touch upon your fickle shell!<page>Carve your hapless path. Stalk, and strike, and fight, but know your foe is fate herself, and she has risen raging!
original_zh_text: 那就这样吧，狂妄的虱子！拒绝感受王国的苦痛。让你善变的甲壳隔绝这一切！<page>走你的死路吧。即便你能潜伏、突袭、战斗，但记住你的敌人是命运本身——而她已怒火滔天！
translated_text: 别害羞。不要触摸我王国的反复无常的外壳 ， 否认痛苦。<page>打猎 ， 战斗 ， 战斗 ， 你的敌人是命运本身。然后 ， 他生气了！
secondary_translated_text: t be shy. Do not touch the capricious shell of my kingdom and deny the pain.<page>Hunt, fight, fight, your enemy is destiny itself. Then, he became angry!

original_en_text: Pain! Pain! Do you hear her cries, cursed spider-spawn!? Pharloom suffers for our pathetic, mortal ignorance! We fail it and it falls! <page>Knowledge is needed. More and more! It must be hoarded, sought! Strength to understand, to calm and quell.<hpage>It is action now that needs taking, Vaultkeeper, by myself and those left alive who would aid me.<hpage>Seek solutions in your texts and psalms as you may, but they alone will not be enough to heal a pain so great.
original_zh_text: 痛苦！痛苦！听见她的哀嚎了吗，该死的蜘蛛坏种！？纺络正因我们可悲的愚昧受苦！我们辜负了它，它要灭亡了！<page>需要知识。无穷无尽的知识！必须囤积，必须追寻！需要力量去理解，去安抚，去镇压。<hpage>现在需要的是行动，管理员。由我，以及其他愿意相助的生者来执行。<hpage>你尽管在经卷圣歌中寻求解法，但光靠这些不足以治愈如此深重的伤痛。
translated_text: 这会伤害你！很痛！我听到你哭了 ， 蜘蛛！帕劳是一个男人 ， 一个男人。<page>我们需要越来越多的知识！拯救和搜索！理解 ， 冷静 ， 冷静的力量。<hpage>守护者是现在必须采取的行动 ， 以帮助我和那些仍然活着的人。<hpage>尽你所能在圣经和诗篇中找到答案。然而 ， 仅仅这还不足以治愈巨大的痛苦。
secondary_translated_text: This will hurt you! It hurts! I hear you crying, spider! Palau is a man, a man.<page>We need more and more knowledge! Rescue and search! Understanding, calm, the power of calm.<hpage>Guardians are the action that must be taken now to help me and those who are still alive.<hpage>Find answers as much as you can in the Bible and Psalms. However, this alone is not enough to cure the tremendous suffering.

original_en_text: Yessss! See them all! Its collection gleams complete. Such sacred understanding, stored safe.<page>You have performed your part, Weaver-spawn... The agreement is concluded. Knowledge and rosaries, all were passed fair. No more between us.<page>Leave this Keeper to its treasures and their insights. It has given its service. Now this Keeper wants its time alone!
original_zh_text: 好极了！看啊！藏品终于完整了。如此神圣的智慧，安然封存。<page>你完成了约定，织者坏种……交易结束。知识与念珠，两清。你我两不相欠。<page>让本管理员独享珍宝与真知吧。职责已尽。现在我只想独处！
translated_text: 哦 ， 是的！伙计们 ， 看看他！这场演出太精彩了。神的认识仍然是真实的。<page>你已经完成了你的职责 ， 或者你的一代。我们达成了一项协议。知识和逻辑是良好的沟通。我们之间什么都没有。<page>把这个保镖留给你的宝藏和直觉。他们已经提供服务。现在 ， 这个男人想要他的时间！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, yes! Guys, look at him! This performance was so wonderful. God's knowledge is still true.<page>You have completed your duties, or your generation. We reached an agreement. Knowledge and logic are good communication. There's nothing between us.<page>Leave this bodyguard to your treasure and instincts. They already provide services. Now, this man wants his time!

original_en_text: <hpage>Show me your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>Grkt, Weaver-spawn! She is a bother! Nuisance! Bring more gifts. The collection still has gaps!
original_zh_text: <hpage>展示你的收藏，管理员。<page>咔！烦人的坏种！拿更多贡品来！本管理员的收藏还有空缺！
translated_text: <hpage>请给我看看你的收藏。<page>来吧 ， 海狸。我有麻烦！这很酷！请再给我一份礼物。这个系列有一些缺点。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Please show me your collection.<page>Come on, beaver. I'm in trouble! This is cool! Please give me another gift. This series has some shortcomings.

original_en_text: <hpage>Gilded one, what remained of the Citadel has been torn apart by the black threads. Still you keep to your duty?<page>While voices still fill the g-g-great chambers... the sacred task of the sentinels continues.<page>To defend... To p-p-protect.
original_zh_text: <hpage>金甲虫，圣堡残骸已被黑丝撕裂。还不放弃职责么？<page>只要圣、圣殿……仍存余音，哨卫之职……不止。<page>守、守卫……守护。
translated_text: <hpage>一个金色堡垒的残余突破了黑线。<page>他的声音总是 Mr. G ， 我不能。- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -<page>保护是为了保护。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The remnants of a golden fortress broke through the black line.<page>His voice is always Mr. G, I can't. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -<page>Protection is for protection.

original_en_text: You dally, still? If you wish to earn your reward, you should be hunting down those ingredients! Or do you need directions from a serving-bug with some experience?
original_zh_text: 还磨蹭什么？想要报酬就赶紧的！还是说要本大厨给你指点指点方向？
translated_text: 你在窃窃私语？如果您想购买此产品 ， 请购买此产品！您需要专业的建议来解决您的业务错误吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Are you whispering? If you want to buy this product, please buy this product! Do you need professional advice to resolve your business mistakes?

original_en_text: The Weaver-spawn, she has found it! Our pontiff’s sacred cylinder, stolen from the dark below...<page>Never! States our law. Never must our melody pass to a bug not Keeper! But you, fool Weaver, would shatter those tenants with reckless ease.<hpage>Your pontiff is gone, Vaultkeeper. Your fellows have fallen to husk or thread. What laws once bound these vaults died with them.<page>Ackk! Fine, cursed she. Claim the sacred song, and pain to you if we both are damned forever for it!
original_zh_text: 织者坏种，她得手了！她夺走主教的圣音筒……<page>休想！律法规定，圣歌绝不可外传！但你这坏种竟然轻易践踏戒律。<hpage>你的主教死了，管理员。同僚都化作空壳或丝偶，昔日的律法也随他们入土了。<page>咳！随你便，诅咒你。带走圣歌吧，愿我们永堕地狱！
translated_text: 教皇的方舟在黑暗中被偷走。<page>没有什么我们可以做的！法律解释说 ： 我们的旋律不能触动昆虫和守卫！但是你愚蠢的阁楼很容易压垮租户。<hpage>你的伴侣掉在贝壳和绳子上 ， 管理这些资源的方式消失了。<page>我没事 ， 我没事！唱这首圣歌。如果你永远被诅咒 ， 你会受到惩罚。
secondary_translated_text: The Pope's Ark was stolen in the darkness.<page>There is nothing we can do! The legal interpretation says: Our melody cannot touch insects and guards! But your stupid loft can easily crush tenants.<hpage>Your partner falls on shells and ropes, and the way to manage these resources disappears.<page>I'm okay, I'm okay! Sing this hymn. If you are cursed forever, you will be punished.

original_en_text: <hpage>I return, bug, and ask to hear your melody again, that I may lock it clear in my mind.<page>Very well, good pilgrim. For one so fiercely devout as yourself, gladly will I give this gift.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我回来了，请你再演奏一遍旋律，我要记牢。<page>好，虔信者。为了你这般赤诚，我很乐意演奏。
translated_text: <hpage>我回来了 ， 虫子 ， 我想再听一次我的音乐 ， 这样我就可以清楚地把它关在我的脑海里。<page>一个美丽的朝圣者像你这样的人 ， 我送给你这份礼物。".
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm back, Bug, and I want to listen to my music again so I can keep it clearly in my mind.<page>A beautiful pilgrim like you, I give you this gift. ".

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master seems satisfied, sir. It is time you gave what was promised.<page>Yes. Yes! It has been done! Made and served. A dish to match my master’s refined desires.<page>The pale trifle is yours. Take it and leave! My master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的主人看来很满意，该兑现承诺了吧？<page>对，对！主人吃得很满意！<page>苍白油是你的了，拿走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: <hpage>店主似乎对此很满意。现在是兑现承诺的时候了。<page>哦 ， 是的！哦 ， 是的！我们准备好了 ， 饭菜是根据客人的需要准备的。<page>小白是你的。教师需要时间去思考。您将不得不重新考虑您的偏好。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The owner seemed satisfied with this. Now is the time to fulfill the promise.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! We are ready, and the meal is prepared according to the needs of the guests.<page>Xiaobai is yours. Teachers need time to think. You will have to rethink your preferences.

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I bring the psalm cylinder recovered from the dark chambers below here. I would learn its melody.<page>Kak! Then pass it, filthy Weaver-spawn! A cylinder so sacred should not remain a moment longer in your grubby claws!
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我带来了下层密室的圣咏音筒，要学习其中旋律。<page>咔！交出来，肮脏的织者坏种！此等圣物岂能在你脏爪中多留一秒！
translated_text: <hpage>我拿起我在保险箱下面黑暗的房间里找到的民族琵琶 ， 学会了旋律。<page>这里有！如此神圣的圆柱体不再适合你肮脏的指甲！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I picked up the national lute I found in the dark room below the safe and learned the melody.<page>Here is it! Such a sacred cylinder no longer fits your dirty nails!

original_en_text: Hold them, will she? Covet them? Can she not part with such a small prize?<page>Remain blind fool she. This Keeper’s understanding stays with itself.
original_zh_text: 她想私藏？如此贪婪？连这点小礼都吝啬？<page>她就继续当瞎子吧。本管理员的智慧自会保留。
translated_text: 我可以带着她吗？你想要这个吗？你不想要这个价格吗？<page>如果你继续盲目撒谎 ， 你父母对你的看法不会改变。
secondary_translated_text: Can I take her with me? Do you want this? Don't you want this price?<page>If you continue to lie blindly, the way your parents think of you will not change.

original_en_text: Weaver-thing! Does she hope to spy upon our treasured records?<page>Within our vast store, always more there is to know, the old methods of prayer, to this land, to its rulers, and to the strength at its heart.
original_zh_text: 织者坏种！她想窥探我们的珍贵典籍？<page>在我们的浩瀚典藏中，有古老祷文，有统治之术，还有……核心力量的秘辛。
translated_text: 日内瓦想要窃取一些珍贵的文件？<page>在我们庞大的仓库和我们古老的祈祷形式中 ， 总有一些关于地球 ， 它的统治者和核心力量的东西可以学习。
secondary_translated_text: Geneva wants to steal some precious documents?<page>In our vast warehouses and our ancient forms of prayer, there is always something to learn about the earth, its rulers and core forces.

original_en_text: She carries a precious cylinder! She must give it! Share it! Claw to claw!<page>Pass it! And this Vaultkeeper shall grant their wisdom. Just a small taste! A trickle! A glimmer! Of our Citadel’s sacred understandings.
original_zh_text: 她带着圣咏音筒！必须交出来！分享！交出来！<page>递过来！本管理员便赐予智慧。只需浅尝！一滴！一缕！圣堡的至高真知！
translated_text: 我有一瓶很棒的酒 ， 值得拥有。让我们分享这个！帕达帕达帕<page>透过这一切！财富给你智慧 ， 蜂鸣器！一盏灯！上帝对性的理解。
secondary_translated_text: I have a great bottle of wine that is worth having. Let's share this! Padapa<page>Through it all! Wealth gives you wisdom, buzzer! A lamp! God's understanding of sex.

original_en_text: Woken, is this sentinel. F-f-f-functional, is its shell.<page>Still devoted, is this s-s-sentinel, and awaiting your commandment.<hpage>You speak, gilded one? I’ve no command for you, but my curiosity is piqued.<hpage>You call yourself a sentinel. What is it you are charged with protecting?<page>Defence of the sacred C-c-citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is our eternal duty.<hpage>I had assumed as much. Yet look around you, gilded one. During your slumber, the Citadel has fallen, and its voices lay silent. This place is dead, or very nearly.<hpage>Some would argue that standing guard over a kingdom’s corpse is a foolish task, empty of meaning. I wonder then, will you still hold true to your charge?
original_zh_text: 苏、苏醒，本哨卫。功、功能正常。<page>忠、忠诚依旧，静候指令。<hpage>金甲虫，你会说话？我无意下令，但很好奇。<hpage>你自称哨卫，是在守护何物？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音，是哨卫的永恒之职。<hpage>意料之中。但环顾四周吧，圣堡已然倾颓，圣音皆已沉寂。此地已是坟冢。<hpage>守卫已死的王国已没有意义，你依然要恪守职责么？
translated_text: 一个警卫醒了。f—f — f 函数是一个 shell 。<page>守卫是忠诚的 ， 等待你的命令。<hpage>你的意思是 O？虽然我没有收到订单 ， 但我很感兴趣。<hpage>他们被称为守护者 ， 保护什么 ？<page>维护 C—C 的圣洁性和充满它的声音是我们永恒的职责。<hpage>我也是这么想的 ， 但你看看周围。当你睡着的时候 ， 城堡倒塌了 ， 你听不到任何声音。这个地方已经死了 ， 或者几乎死了。<hpage>有些人认为 ， 保护王国的身体是无用的和无用的。
secondary_translated_text: A guard woke up. The f-f - f function is a shell.<page>The guards are loyal and await your orders.<hpage>You mean O? Although I didn't receive an order, I was very interested.<hpage>They are called guardians, what do they protect?<page>Maintaining the sanctity of C-C and the voice that fills it is our eternal responsibility.<hpage>That's what I thought, but look around. While you were asleep, the castle fell down and you couldn't hear anything. This place is dead, or almost dead.<hpage>Some people believe that protecting the body of the kingdom is useless and useless.

original_en_text: One must not wander idle between these sacred shelves! This is a holy place. Reverence! It is demanded.<page>If the fool she wishes to view this Keeper’s collection, head to the listening room below.
original_zh_text: 休要在圣架间闲逛！此处是圣地，需心怀敬畏！<page>想看本管理员的收藏？去下层聆听室。
translated_text: 你不能走在这些神圣的平台上 ， 这是神圣的地方 ， 请尊重我 ， 这是必要的。<page>想要观看《卫报》收藏的傻瓜可以去下面的礼堂。
secondary_translated_text: You cannot walk on these sacred platforms, these are sacred places, please respect me, it is necessary.<page>Fools who want to view the Guardian collection can go to the auditorium below.

original_en_text: <hpage>My choice is made. I cannot leave. I must descend again, and see Pharloom freed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我意已决，不能就这样离开。必须重返地底，解放纺络。
translated_text: <hpage>我不能再走路了 ， 我看到灯光被释放了 ， 然后又摔倒了。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I couldn't walk anymore, I saw the lights released and then fell down again.

original_en_text: <hpage>The signs of battle here are clear, gilded one. Is it your charge then to hunt the haunted, even if they be of the Citadel’s ruling castes?<page>Defence of the sacred Cit-t-tadel, and the voices that fill it, is the eternal d-duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此地战斗痕迹明显，金甲虫。你的职责包括猎杀圣堡贵族中的被蛊惑者？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清除受魂、魂丝蛊惑……...是必要使命。
translated_text: <hpage>战斗的痕迹显然是金色的。即使你属于一个省的统治阶级 ， 你知道吗 ？猎人是你的工作吗 ？<page>守护者们永恒的使命是保护圣城塔德尔 ， 迎接它的喧嚣。<page>结局是所有被丝绸耳语所吸引的人的必然命运。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The traces of the battle were clearly golden. Even if you belong to the ruling class of a province, you know? Is hunting your job?<page>The eternal mission of the guardians is to protect the holy city of Tadr and meet its din.<page>The ending is the inevitable fate of all those attracted by the whisper of silk.

original_en_text: <hpage>Out there lie the endless wastes... If I cross them now, Pharloom shall fall to a black fate of my making.<hpage>My choice is made. I will not abandon its bugs to that grim end. I must descend again, and cut them free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若现在越过那片荒原，纺络将因我堕入黑暗……<hpage>我意已决，不能抛下纺络的虫民。必须折返，斩断丝缚。
translated_text: <hpage>如果你现在经历了这些 ， 法轮就会落入我为你创造的黑暗命运。<hpage>我们不会屈服于导致这个艰难结局的错误。我们需要再次拯救他们。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If you go through this now, Falun will fall into the dark destiny I have created for you.<hpage>We will not give in to the mistakes that led to this difficult ending. We need to save them again.

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep safe, Vaultkeeper. I may expect your service in future, and I’d not have you pass before that task is complete.<page>Gyak... No fool this Keeper. It has lived long, watched its fellows wither, but it shall not die, not yet, not while knowledge needs be sought.<page>This pact is made, Weaver-spawn, insight for us, both she and it.<page>This holy Citadel, in glory and fall, there are holes in its history, even to a Keeper’s knowledge, even to the vaults.<page>Seek the cylinders, she must, those objects of intricate insight. Bring more for this Keeper and only this Keeper, for in this Citadel none are left possessed of such sound, sharp mind as it.
original_zh_text: <hpage>好好活着，管理员。你还有用，别早早死去。<page>咔……本管理员不傻。活了很久，目睹同僚凋零。但只要尚有知识未明，就不会死。<page>契约成立，织者坏种。你我今后各取所需。<page>荣耀与衰落并存的圣堡，藏着连浩瀚书库都未记载的空白。<page>去找音筒吧，那些智慧的结晶。只献给本管理员，因圣堡再无这般敏锐之脑。
translated_text: <hpage>您可以注意警卫 ， 等待下一个任务 ， 但不要在完成任务之前通过。<page>他活了很多年 ， 看着他的同伴消失 ， 但他没有死在寻求知识。<page>对于韦弗的后代来说 ， 这是我们和她以及 Insight 之间的契约。<page>无论是在辉煌还是衰落中 ， 这座神圣城堡的历史都有一个漏洞 ， 尽管它的守护者知道 ， 但它的时代也是如此。<page>加入不止一个守护者。在这个城市里 ， 没有人有这么强大的声音和这么强大的心。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You can keep an eye on the guards and wait for the next task, but don't pass before completing the task.<page>He lived for many years, watching his companions disappear, but he did not die in search of knowledge.<page>For Weaver's descendants, this is the contract between us and her and Insight.<page>Whether in glory or decline, there is a loophole in the history of this sacred castle, and although its guardians knew it, so did its times.<page>Join more than one guardian. No one in this city has such a strong voice and such a strong heart.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，献上三重圣歌，方可升华，觐见王国圣心。
translated_text: 永恒的朝圣者在天堂 ， 支持我们与我们的三首歌曲 ， 崇敬我们 ， 超越我们王国的心脏。
secondary_translated_text: Eternal pilgrims in heaven support us with our three songs, reverence us, beyond the heart of our kingdom.

original_en_text: Still you tarry here, bug who calls herself a guest? If your idle claws need work, put them to service for our exalted Great Gourmand!<page>I must remain by my master, so you will need to leave the Citadel and gather the ingredients for their meal in my stead!
original_zh_text: 还杵在这呢？既然你闲着也是闲着，就帮我伟大的主人搜集食材吧！<page>我得守着主人，去圣堡外收集食材的任务就交给你了！
translated_text: 你还在这里 ， 称自己为昆虫客人吗 ？如果你的指甲需要工作 ， 让他们为我们亲爱的朋友工作。<page>我必须和我的主人住在一起 ， 而你必须离开城堡为我收集材料。
secondary_translated_text: Are you still here, calling yourself an insect guest? If your nails need work, let them work for our dear friends.<page>I must live with my master, and you must leave the castle to collect materials for me.

original_en_text: A rusted statue of a pilgrim.
original_zh_text: 一尊朝圣者的锈蚀雕像。
translated_text: 朝圣者的雕像。
secondary_translated_text: Statue of pilgrim.

original_en_text: <hpage>To learn the melody upon this cylinder will require a working listening device. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>That last keeper still sane, in the vaults above... Their chambers hold just such a machine. I need only return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>播放音筒需要完好的设备，这台已经坏了。<hpage>之前在上层遇到的清醒管理员……他们的密室就有这种机器。我得回去一趟。
translated_text: <hpage>要理解本专栏中的旋律 ， 您需要一个长期无法正常工作的功能助听器。<hpage>最后一个警卫总是聪明的 ， 在他的房间里有一辆这样的车。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>To understand the melody in this column, you need a functional hearing aid that will not work properly for a long time.<hpage>The last guard was always smart and had one of these cars in his room.

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I recovered a psalm cylinder in the dark chambers below here. I believe it contains the melody unique to these vaults. I would have you play it for me now.<page>Kakrt! She has visited the pontiff’s depths and stolen the sacred song! Where is your respect, Weaver-spawn?! Our venerable dead deserve better than to have their chambers transgressed by your filthy foraging!<hpage>In this moment, Vaultkeeper, I’ve slim patience for your impudence. Either prepare the cylinder and stay silent, or ready yourself to learn regret.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在下层密室找到了圣咏音筒。里面应存有此书库的专属旋律，我要你立即为我演奏。<page>咔！你擅闯主教密室窃取圣歌！织者坏种毫无敬畏！先贤安息之地岂能容你玷污！<hpage>管理员，我的耐心有限。要么闭嘴准备播放音筒，要么准备明白什么叫后悔。
translated_text: <hpage>我认为这些宝藏包括独特的旋律 ， 你可以在盒子下面的黑暗房间里看到 ， 在国歌的管道里。<page>卡莉！！他进入了教皇的心脏 ， 偷走了国家！达斯基 ， 尊重在哪里 ？我们光荣的死亡应该得到比走廊里的脏食物更好的待遇！"<hpage>现在 ， 财政部长 ， 我对你的邪恶没有耐心。在准备好的汽油瓶里保持沉默。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I think these treasures include unique melodies that you can see in the dark room under the box, in the pipes of the national anthem.<page>Carly!! He entered the heart of the Pope and stole the country! Dusky, where is the respect? Our glorious deaths deserve better than dirty food in the corridors! "<hpage>Now, Treasury Secretary, I have no patience for your evil. Keep silent in the prepared gasoline bottle.

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy! I want to lay a lot of pretty eggies! So tell the big ones, bring me more food!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋！我要下漂亮蛋蛋！叫大个子们多送吃的来！
translated_text: 鸡蛋 ， 鸡蛋 ， 我想种更多的鸡蛋 ， 我请你给我带来更多的食物。"
secondary_translated_text: Eggs, eggs, I want to grow more eggs, and I ask you to bring me more food. "

original_en_text: <hpage>Your chambers are surely grand, sir bug, but it is plain to see you are no sovereign here.<page>Is our state so bare, pilgrim?... “By the will of the Conductors,” we once boomed, and this Citadel shook at our decree.<page>But the words... How hollow they echoed. The mantle of rule, claimed greedily from Pharloom’s fading first children, those bitter Weavers... it was yoke, not crown.<page>Now, in our Citadel’s silence, we share their truth. Only one monarch’s claws ever clutched this kingdom, though we raised our voices to cry otherwise.<page>Would you see her, pilgrim? Up there at our Citadel’s crown? Reach those heights we’d hoped to hide and bow before this land’s true ruler.<hpage>In time near, sir bug, I shall indeed climb to meet your monarch...
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生的居所虽大，却不像是贵族风格。<page>看着如此寒酸吗？当年我们高喊着"遵指挥家之命"，整座圣堡都为之震颤。<page>但激昂的呼喊现在也只剩空洞的回响。从垂死织者手中夺来的权柄，实际上却是枷锁。<page>如今在圣堡的寂静中，我们才真正明白……坐在王座上的从来只有那位。<page>想觐见她吗？登上圣堡之巅，向真王跪拜吧。<hpage>很快我就会登顶的，先生……
translated_text: <hpage>你的房间真的很漂亮 ， 伯杰先生 ， 但你肯定不是这里的国王。<page>地球真的那么裸露吗 ？“在指挥官的命令下 ， 我们进攻一次 ， 在我们的命令下 ， 城堡在颤抖。"<page>法老的第一个堕落的儿子 ， 一个手工艺摔跤手 ， 由于贪婪而被剥夺了王国的外套。这不是一顶皇冠 ， 而是一条链子。<page>现在 ， 在城堡的寂静中 ， 我们分享他的真相。尽管我们大声疾呼 ， 只有真正的格里芬才能征服王国。<page>” 你想看看它， 佩里？“我们已经到了一个我们想要躲藏和向这个国家真正的领导人鞠躬的地步。<hpage>“迟早 ， 贝克先生 ， 我一定会遇到你的主人。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your room is really beautiful, Mr. Berger, but you are certainly not the king here.<page>Is the earth really that naked?
