"At the commander's order, we attacked once, and at our order, the castle was trembling. "<page>Pharaoh's first fallen son, a craft wrestler, was stripped of his kingdom's coat due to greed. This is not a crown, but a chain.<page>Now, in the silence of the castle, we share his truth. Despite our cries, only the real Griffin can conquer the kingdom.<page>"You want to see it, Perry? "We have reached a point where we want to hide and bow to the real leaders of this country.<hpage>"Sooner or later, Mr. Baker, I will surely meet your master. "

original_en_text: Cleansed, is this place. Eternal, is the d-d-duty of the sentinels.
original_zh_text: 净、净化完成。哨卫之职……永存。
translated_text: 清洁是一个地方 ， 永恒是守护者的责任。
secondary_translated_text: Cleanliness is a place, and eternity is the responsibility of the guardian.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring ingredients for the dish.<page>At last! My master is withering away from hunger! Let us see what gifts you bring.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我带食材来了。<page>终于！主人快饿扁了，快呈上来！
translated_text: <hpage>我找到了这道菜的原料。<page>当然了！你的主人饿了。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I found the ingredients for this dish.<page>Of course! Your master is hungry.

original_en_text: <hpage>Will you tell me of those who guard this structure? They are servants of the Citadel, are they not?<page>Servants...? They too are penitents. In a past age, that caste committed their own sacrilege against the Citadel.<page>A sin long forgotten, but so grave that their offspring and the offspring of their offspring carry the guilt with them still. To serve here is their only hope of absolution.
original_zh_text: <hpage>可以说说这里的守卫么，他们是圣堡仆从？<page>仆从？不，都是赎罪者。祖辈犯下亵渎圣堡的重罪。<page>虽被遗忘，但其后代仍然在此服役，这是唯一的赎罪之道。
translated_text: <hpage>谁来保护这座大楼 ？他们是城堡的仆人 ， 不是吗 ？<page>” 服务？".过去 ， 城堡对城堡犯下了暴行。<page>这是一种早已被遗忘的罪恶 ， 但严重到足以让后代忍受。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Who will protect this building? They are servants of the castle, aren't they?<page>"Service? ". In the past, the castle has committed atrocities against the castle.<page>This is a long forgotten sin, but serious enough for future generations to endure.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，献上三重圣歌，方可升华，觐见王国圣心。
translated_text: 永恒的朝圣者在天堂 ， 支持我们与我们的三首歌曲 ， 崇敬我们 ， 超越我们王国的心脏。
secondary_translated_text: Eternal pilgrims in heaven support us with our three songs, reverence us, beyond the heart of our kingdom.

original_en_text: <hpage>If this place was holy once, no evidence remains. Even as a prison, it has been neglected.<hpage>If you wish, I can free you. You can descend through the caverns below until you find a settlement.<page>You... are asking me to leave this place? Wh-what a strange, fearful thought! Such a sin would never... no.<page>By the grace of the Citadel, I am here as a penitent. Here, I can hide from the shame of my sins until they are withered away by time.<page>Leave this place...? Please! Strike me down dead before you speak such blasphemy again!
original_zh_text: <hpage>若这里曾是圣地，如今也面目全非，连监狱都称不上。<hpage>想走的话，我可以放你下去，直到找到聚居地。<page>离……离开？多么可怕的想法！这等罪孽万万不可……<page>承蒙圣堡慈悲，我在此忏悔。直到时光洗刷罪孽。<page>求你了！再说这种渎神之言就杀了我吧！
translated_text: <hpage>这是一个神圣的地方 ， 但没有证据证明这一点。<hpage>如果你愿意 ， 我会送你。你可以穿过洞穴 ， 直到你找到一个定居点。<page>你是谁？“你想离开这个地方吗 ？ ”多么奇怪和可怕的想法啊！这样的罪行从未发生过。<page>感谢上帝的恩典 ， 我能够来到这里作为忏悔者 ， 并隐藏我的罪恶的耻辱 ， 直到时间耗尽。"<page>离开这个地方 ... ...“在你告诉我这个之前杀了我。"
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>This is a sacred place, but there is no evidence to prove it.<hpage>If you want, I will drive you. You can walk through the caves until you find a settlement.<page>Who are you? "Do you want to leave this place? "What a strange and terrible idea! Such a crime has never occurred.<page>Thanks to the grace of God, I was able to come here as a confessor and hide the shame of my sin until time ran out. "<page>Leave this place... ... "Kill me before you tell me this. "

original_en_text: The mantle of conductor weighs heavy. Had I known the cost before its bearing, would I have accepted the duty?
original_zh_text: 指挥之职重若千钧。如果早知这份代价，我还会接过这担子吗？
translated_text: 司机的外套很重。如果你在事情发生之前就知道了 ， 你是否有责任 ？
secondary_translated_text: The driver's coat was heavy. If you knew about it before it happened, would you be responsible?

original_en_text: S... song, is it? You have brought song? You are of the Citadel, then? How... how many of you?<hpage>I am alone, sir. You needn’t fear, I am no servant of the Citadel. Are you a prisoner of theirs?<page>P... prisoner? I understand you not. There is no prison here.<page>This is a holy place of forgiveness. Please, speak with reverence.
original_zh_text: 歌……歌声？你带了歌？是圣堡的？来了……来了多少？<hpage>就我一个。别怕，我不是圣堡的走狗。你是他们的囚犯吗？<page>囚……囚犯？听不懂。<page>这儿是赎罪圣地，请怀着敬畏之心说话。
translated_text: 这是什么？这是一首歌 ， 对吧 ？事实上？你带了一首歌吗？你是从城堡来的吗？这是...有多少人 ？<hpage>我只是个男人。“别担心 ， 我不是囚犯。"<page>” 我不知道， 但他是一个囚犯。“我不知道 ， 没有监狱。<page>这里是宽恕的圣所。请你小心地说话。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? It's a song, right? Actually? Did you bring a song? Are you from the castle? This is... How many?<hpage>I'm just a man. "Don't worry, I'm not a prisoner. "<page>"I don't know, but he's a prisoner. "I don't know, there is no prison.<page>This is the sanctuary of forgiveness. Please speak carefully.

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall build.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等筑造。
translated_text: 当音乐结束时 ， 音乐继续。<page>我们创造了永恒。
secondary_translated_text: When the music ends, the music continues.<page>We created eternity.

original_en_text: We would hear the song of the Architects, at the core of our Citadel.<page>They who sustain our realm, its walls, its floors and its voice, even as others fall silent.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻建筑匠团之歌，响彻圣堡核心。<page>他们维系疆域、高墙、楼宇与圣音，纵使万籁俱寂。
translated_text: 在城堡的中心 ， 可以听到建筑师们的歌声。<page>他们将守护我们的王国 ， 它的城墙 ， 它的床 ， 它的声音。
secondary_translated_text: In the center of the castle, the songs of the architects can be heard.<page>They will guard our kingdom, its walls, its beds, and its sound.

original_en_text: A Crustnut! Stale and dull, you’ll be thinking, yes? But ground to finest powder, that’s when its tart taste blooms!
original_zh_text: 硬壳果！你是不是觉得又干又不新鲜？得磨成粉才有酸香味！
translated_text: 本地人！我认为它是旧的和无聊的 ， 但如果你把它转移到最好的粉末上 ， 它的味道会开花！
secondary_translated_text: Local! I think it's old and boring, but if you transfer it to the best powder, its flavor will bloom!

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to learn the melody upon this cylinder, I’ll first need to find a working device to play it. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>The vaults above would surely hold another such device. I must search thoroughly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要解读音筒旋律，先得找到能用的设备。这台早就坏了。<hpage>上层书库肯定还有，我得仔细寻找。
translated_text: <hpage>要了解这个圆柱体的旋律 ， 你首先需要找到一种乐器来演奏它。<hpage>顶部的盒子应该有另一个装置。我们必须深入研究它。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>To understand the melody of this cylinder, you first need to find an instrument to play it.<hpage>The box at the top should have another device. We must study it deeply.

original_en_text: You! Mite or mourner! Fell fated chosen left till last!<page>Relent! Submit! The fatal blow was struck. Fair Pharloom wails its end.<page>We woe befallen few remained, let us join here, at last, and show our fires fierce.<page>Together to share our kingdom’s pain, feel it scorch our shells, and know clear its suffering, its sorrow!
original_zh_text: 你！蝼蚁或悼亡者！最后的倒霉蛋！<page>认命吧！致命一击已出，纺络在哀嚎！<page>让我们这些余孽在此共赴末路！<page>共品王国的灼痛，让烈焰焚尽甲壳！
translated_text: 是你！昆虫是一个永远哭泣的人。命运选择了左边 ， 直到最后。<page>对不起！大战 ： 致命的打击即将到来。Fair Farm 的最后一集<page>我们的不幸落在了剩下的 ， 我们终于聚集在这里 ， 展示我们火焰的力量。<page>我们分担我们王国的痛苦 ， 感受到我们燃烧的贝壳 ， 我们理解你们的痛苦和苦难。
secondary_translated_text: It's you! Insects are people who always cry. Fate chose the left until the end.<page>Sorry! Great War: A fatal blow is coming. Fair Farm's final episode<page>Our misfortune falls on what remains, and we are finally gathered here to demonstrate the power of our fire.<page>We share the pain of our kingdom, feel our burning shells, and we understand your pain and suffering.

original_en_text: Our song upon a silken thread.... Such beautiful sound, so long absent from our halls.<page>Keep safe our melody, good pilgrim. You shall likely be the last to receive it.
original_zh_text: 丝弦上的旋律啊……殿堂久违的天籁。<page>请妥善保存我们的旋律，你怕是最后一位听到此曲的了。
translated_text: 这首歌是丝绸。在这个房间里没有什么好东西。<page>好朝圣者 ， 你可能是最后一个这样做的人。
secondary_translated_text: This song is silk. There is nothing good in this room.<page>Good pilgrim, you may be the last one to do this.

original_en_text: We would hear the melody of the Conductors, high in their gleaming towers.<page>They bearing the heaviest mantle, who would guide our land ever on to greatness.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻执政指挥之旋律，萦绕辉光尖塔。<page>他们肩负千钧权柄，引领王国永续辉煌。
translated_text: 从灯塔上 ， 可以听到大师的旋律。<page>他们将肩负最重的武器 ， 让我们的土地变得伟大。
secondary_translated_text: From the lighthouse, you can hear the master's melody.<page>They will shoulder the heaviest weapons and make our land great.

original_en_text: A visitor? Now this is rare.<page>I must apologise for not rising to greet you. After an age spent sickly, I find myself unable to lift from this bedchamber.<page>I hope, good pilgrim, our Citadel has shown you the courtesy deserved of a bug devout.<hpage>I’ve borne its hospitality well enough, aged one...<page>Ahhh... My sympathies, pilgrim... We have fallen so far. And now, sadly, if you’ve come seeking aid or understanding, I fear I too shall disappoint. <page>Whatever you would ask, I have only my melody left to offer. It is a simple thing, the smallest of gifts, but perhaps more special now, for it has been rarely heard in these quietened times.
original_zh_text: 有访客？这倒是稀奇。<page>恕我不能起身相迎，卧于病榻多年，这把老骨头动不了啦。<page>朝圣者能到这里不容易，希望圣堡对你这虔信者有以礼相待。<hpage>已经领教过它的待客之道了，老人家……<page>唉……抱歉，圣堡已堕落至此。如果你想求助，怕是要让你失望了。<page>我能赠予你的只剩这首曲子。虽然微薄，但在这孤寂的时代也算珍品。
translated_text: 访客们 ？今天不是这样的。<page>对不起 ， 我不能站起来打招呼 ， 我身患绝症 ， 我不能离开这个房间。<page>亲爱的朝圣者们 ， 愿我们的城市表现出虔诚的昆虫的礼貌。<hpage>在一岁时， 他对他的热情好客非常满意。<page>是的 ， 对。朝圣者 ， 我已经走了这么远 ， 但不幸的是 ， 即使当你寻求帮助或理解时 ， 我也感到失望。<page>无论你想要什么 ， 我只会给你我的歌。这么简单的礼物 ， 小 ， 但现在可能会更特别。我从来没有听说过它在一个安静的时间。
secondary_translated_text: Visitors? Today is not like this.<page>I'm sorry, I can't stand up and say hello, I'm terminally ill, I can't leave this room.<page>Dear pilgrims, may our cities show the courtesy of pious insects.<hpage>At the age of one, he was very satisfied with his hospitality.<page>Yes, right. Pilgrim, I have come this far, but unfortunately I am disappointed even when you seek help or understanding.<page>Whatever you want, I will only give you my song. Such a simple gift is small, but it may become more special now. I have never heard of it in a quiet time.

original_en_text: If the weight of your sins bear down upon you, you may remain here with me in penitence, sister.
original_zh_text: 若你自觉罪孽深重，可留下与我一同忏悔。
translated_text: 如果你们的罪孽临到你们身上 ， 你们就与我一同悔改吧！ ”
secondary_translated_text: If your sins come upon you, repent with me!”

original_en_text: Ah.... your s-song. So long I’ve sat in silence. Tell me... are all songs played now as exquisite as this? Or has time made my hearing unrefined?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my skill is limited, but your appreciation is not unwelcome.<page>Ahh. The beauty of it. It is almost painful to my weary senses. Perhaps though, this pain is merely part of my penitence. <page>Play on, will you? I would join your tune. Just forgive me if my voice has become brutish.
original_zh_text: 啊……你的歌。沉寂太久，现在所有曲子都这般动听吗？还是我耳朵钝了？<hpage>我技艺粗浅，承蒙你不嫌弃。<page>这美感……刺痛我麻木的感官。或许这正是赎罪的一部分。<page>继续演奏，可以么？我想试着应和，尽管嗓音已经嘶哑。
translated_text: 这首歌是你沉默了很长时间。你能告诉我这首歌有多好听吗？<hpage>这种艺术对我来说是新的 ， 我的能力是有限的 ， 但我不欢迎你的评价。<page>哦 ， 是的 ， 对。这太酷了。疲劳几乎伤害了我。这种痛苦可能是忏悔的一部分。<page>继续玩吧 ， 好吗 ？你同意吗 ？添加你的歌曲。我很抱歉 ， 我的声音太粗鲁了。
secondary_translated_text: This song kept you silent for a long time. Can you tell me how good this song is?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my abilities are limited, but I don't welcome your evaluation.<page>Oh, yeah, right. This is so cool. Tiredness almost hurt me. This pain may be part of confession.<page>Keep playing, okay? Do you agree? Add your songs. I'm sorry, my voice was so rude.

original_en_text: You refuse to play our sacred melody! Why pause, Weaver-thing? Do you cower at the truths it may illuminate? Surely you are not the lesser sort that bows to fear?<hpage>When the moment calls, Vaultkeeper, I shall listen. For now, your task remains to keep the cylinder safe. And know, you shall answer to my blade if you fail.
original_zh_text: 你拒绝演奏圣歌！在害怕吗，织者？畏惧被照亮的真相？原来你也是怯懦之辈？<hpage>时机到了自然会听。现在你的任务是保管好音筒，若出了纰漏，我的针刃可不认虫。
translated_text: 我拒绝弹奏神圣的旋律！“你为什么停下来 ， 虫子 ？ ”“你害怕将要被揭露的东西吗 ？ ”“你不是一个害怕的孩子吗 ？ ”"<hpage>CSC ， 听着 ， 现在你的工作是保护你的煤气瓶 ， 如果你做不到 ， 你将负责我的剑。
secondary_translated_text: I refuse to play sacred melodies! "Why did you stop, bug? "Are you afraid of what will be revealed? "" Aren't you a scared child?”"<hpage>CSC, listen, your job now is to protect your gas bottles, and if you can't do that, you will be responsible for my sword.

translated_text: 在这首诗中 ， 有一种祝福。
secondary_translated_text: In this poem, there is a blessing.

original_en_text: For our base, we require the gelatinous Mossberry Stew. Its concoction is a druidic art, a jealously guarded secret of the moss-painted caverns deep below us.
original_zh_text: 基底需要苔莓浓汤。配方是沼地德鲁伊的不传之秘。
translated_text: 在我们的基地 ， 我们需要一个泡沫吸管来制作冰淇淋。他们的混合是德鲁兹人的艺术 ， 隐藏在我们下面的洞穴中的秘密。
secondary_translated_text: At our base, we need a foam straw to make ice cream. Their mixture is Druze art, the secret hidden in the caves below us.

original_en_text: Sweet fruit that grows in moist environments. Its seeds are toxic to most creatures.
original_zh_text: 生长在潮湿环境中的甜味浆果，种子对大多数生物有毒。
translated_text: 它是一种甜蜜的水果 ， 生长在潮湿的环境。种子对大多数生物都有毒。

original_en_text: Deflective technique of a creature spun from thread. Bind Silk around the needle to deflect enemy attacks and instantly strike back.
original_zh_text: 灵丝生物的防御技艺。用灵丝缠绕针身格挡敌人的攻击，并立即进行反击。
translated_text: 如果你把丝绸绑在针上 ， 敌人会立即附着并反击。
secondary_translated_text: If you tie silk to a needle, the enemy will immediately attach itself and fight back.

original_en_text: Gleaming pearl carved over with intricate markings. The rarest and most highly valued rosaries in all of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 精雕细琢的闪耀珍珠，纺络地区最珍贵的货币。
translated_text: 闪亮的珍珠具有复杂的特征。您可以在法纳姆的每个地区找到最稀有和最珍贵的念珠。
secondary_translated_text: Shining pearls have complex characteristics. You can find the rarest and most precious rosary beads in every area of Farnham.

translated_text: 我们在这里。{0}?
secondary_translated_text: Here we are.{0}?

translated_text: 银行， 银行。
secondary_translated_text: Bank, bank.

original_en_text: One half of an artefact left behind by the Weavers, designed to collect and hold Silk.<br><br>A completed spool will allow one to hold more Silk within their shell.
original_zh_text: 织者遗失圣器的一半，用于收集和储存灵丝。<br><br>完整的灵丝轴可提升甲壳内灵丝储量上限。
translated_text: 剩余的一半的织物用于收集和保存丝绸。<br><br>整个卷可以用来生产大量的丝 ， 它的外壳可以容纳更多的丝。
secondary_translated_text: The remaining half of the fabric is used to collect and preserve silk.<br><br>The entire roll can be used to produce large amounts of silk, and its shell can accommodate more silk.

translated_text: 尺寸 ：
secondary_translated_text: size:

translated_text: 乌鸦在呼唤。
secondary_translated_text: The crow is calling.

original_en_text: Deadly Weaver technique. Throw the needle forward with force amplified by coiled Silk.
original_zh_text: 致命的织者技艺。用灵丝缠绕织针，向前奋力投掷，拥有令人生畏的穿透力。
translated_text: 他把致命的框架针扔在他面前 ， 用编织的丝绸加强了他的力量。
secondary_translated_text: He threw the fatal frame needle in front of him and strengthened his strength with woven silk.

original_en_text: Tattered decree of the Citadel.<br><br>“Bug of voice grown hoarse or shell fallen frail, you have been selected for duty most sacred.<br><br>Become our light, our guide in darkness, that others worthy may climb to join the holy song.”
original_zh_text: 圣堡的破损敕令。<br><br>“声音嘶哑或甲壳脆弱的虫民，你已被选中承担最神圣的职责。<br><br>成为我们的光，黑暗中的指引，让其他有资格者得以攀登加入圣歌。”
translated_text: 城堡被摧毁了。<br><br>你的声音消失了 ， 你的外壳破裂了 ， 你被选中履行你最神圣的职责。"<br><br>在黑暗中 ， 成为我们的光 ， 成为我们的向导 ， 让其他人有机会站起来 ， 加入我们的歌唱。"
secondary_translated_text: The castle was destroyed.<br><br>Your voice is gone, your shell is cracked, and you are chosen to perform your most sacred duties. "<br><br>In the darkness, be our light, be our guide, and give others the opportunity to stand up and join our singing. "

original_en_text: Meat harvested from a defeated creature. It has been cleanly speared through, but is otherwise intact.
original_zh_text: 击败怪物获得的肉类。被刺穿一个窟窿，但整体还算完整。
translated_text: 他被打了 ， 但他是无辜的。
secondary_translated_text: He was beaten, but he was innocent.

original_en_text: Heirloom of a village lost to Pharloom’s Haunting.
original_zh_text: 迷失于丝咒的村庄遗留的传家宝。
translated_text: 在法鲁起义期间 ， 城市的所有宝藏都丢失了。
secondary_translated_text: During the Faro Uprising, all the city's treasures were lost.

translated_text: 损失 （ Loss ） 。
secondary_translated_text: Loss (Loss).

translated_text: 这个地图在这里。
secondary_translated_text: This map is here.

original_en_text: Shard of an ancient mask worn to protect oneself from harm.<br><br>Complete a mask to strengthen the shell and protect against damage.
original_zh_text: 古老的面甲碎片。<br><br>集齐碎片可重塑完整的面甲，强化甲壳防护。
translated_text: 这是他用来保护自己的面具。<br><br>填充的面具加强了外壳并保护其免受损害。
secondary_translated_text: This is the mask he used to protect himself.<br><br>The filled mask strengthens the shell and protects it from damage.

translated_text: 珍珠中的珍珠
secondary_translated_text: Pearl among pearls

original_en_text: Metallic cylinder of Citadel make, etched with a recording of sound.<br><br>The cylinder can be played in a gramophone.
original_zh_text: 圣堡铸造的金属音筒，刻录着声音的波形。<br><br>可在留声机处播放。
translated_text: 城堡内建造的金属柱上刻有铭文。<br><br>这个圆柱体可以用声音频谱来再现。
secondary_translated_text: The metal pillars built in the castle are engraved with inscriptions.<br><br>This cylinder can be reproduced using the sound spectrum.

translated_text: 气缸 （ 气缸 ）
secondary_translated_text: Cylinder (Cylinder)

translated_text: 在王冠上。
secondary_translated_text: In the crown.

translated_text: 母亲的眼睛。
secondary_translated_text: Mother's eyes.

translated_text: 销售产品？
secondary_translated_text: Selling products?

translated_text: 燃烧器官 （ burned organs ）
secondary_translated_text: Burning organs (burned organs)

translated_text: 车是空的。
secondary_translated_text: The car is empty.

original_en_text: Faded parchment containing the last words of a lost pilgrim.<br><br>“-ter I die here in the damp dark than join those poor sods, trapped to stumble, aimless and empty, until their limbs fall to dust.”
original_zh_text: 褪色的羊皮纸，一名惊惶的朝圣者在上面留下了遗言。<br><br>“宁死于阴湿之地，不愿做空壳游魂。”
translated_text: 一个褪色的卷轴 ， 描绘了一个迷失的朝圣者的最后一句话<br><br>除非你死在潮湿的黑暗中 ， 否则你不能和那些疯狂的混蛋站在街上 ， 直到你的脚变成灰尘。"
secondary_translated_text: A faded scroll depicting the last words of a lost pilgrim<br><br>Unless you die in the damp darkness, you can't stand on the street with those crazy bastards until your feet turn to dust. "

translated_text: 白色的钥匙。
secondary_translated_text: The white key.

translated_text: 草人 （ 草的形状 ）
secondary_translated_text: Grass man (shape of grass)

translated_text: 无意中的钥匙。
secondary_translated_text: An inadvertent key.

translated_text: 血浆回收 （ Plasma Recovery ）
secondary_translated_text: Plasma Recovery

translated_text: 他们不得不停止。
secondary_translated_text: They had to stop.

original_en_text: Map of Pharloom and a quill for recording one’s travels. When resting at a bench or elsewhere, the map will be updated with newly discovered areas.
original_zh_text: 纺络的地图及羽毛笔。当在长椅或其他地方休息时，将更新地图以显示新发现的区域。
translated_text: 当您停在其中一个海岸时 ， 地图将更新为新的开放区域。
secondary_translated_text: When you stop on one of the coasts, the map will update to a new open area.

original_en_text: Deadly Weaver technique. Cast the needle in a whirl of Silk around oneself, lashing foes.
original_zh_text: 致命的织者技艺。旋针卷丝形成护体风暴，鞭笞近身的敌人。
translated_text: 一种致命的组织技术 ， 将针头插入身体以攻击敌人。
secondary_translated_text: A deadly tissue technique in which a needle is inserted into the body to attack an enemy.

translated_text: 修理。
secondary_translated_text: Repair.

translated_text: 器官石 （ Organo Stone ）
secondary_translated_text: Organo Stone

translated_text: 钥匙给外科医生
secondary_translated_text: Give the key to the surgeon

original_en_text: Holy Weaver talent. Play ancient melodies by stringing Silk along the needle.
original_zh_text: 神圣的织者天赋。用灵丝给针身上弦，拨弹悠长的古调。
translated_text: 上帝有天赋在古代世界演奏古老的歌曲。
secondary_translated_text: God had the gift to play ancient songs in the ancient world.

original_en_text: Essence of a being merged within. Silk will be restored when resting at a bench.
original_zh_text: 灵魂与认知浑然一体。在长椅休息时恢复灵丝。
translated_text: 存在的本质消失了 ， 丝绸在海滩上被发现。
secondary_translated_text: The essence of existence disappeared and silk was found on the beach.

original_en_text: Metallic cylinder of Citadel make, etched with the melody of the Vaultkeepers.<br><br>The cylinder can be played in a gramophone.
original_zh_text: 圣堡制造的金属圆筒，刻有书库管理员圣歌。<br><br>音筒可用留声机播放。
translated_text: 城堡上建造的金属柱保持着守卫的基调。<br><br>这个圆柱体可以用声音频谱来再现。
secondary_translated_text: The metal pillars built on the castle maintain the tone of the guard.<br><br>This cylinder can be reproduced using the sound spectrum.

original_en_text: Long burning rock from the base of Pharloom. Mined and used by the Citadel in its forgings.
original_zh_text: 储备于纺络底部的长效燃烧石，由圣堡开采，并用于其产品锻造。
translated_text: 在农场的地板上有一块燃烧的石头 ， 它是在城堡里挖出来的 ， 用于伪造。
secondary_translated_text: On the farm floor there is a burning stone dug out in the castle and used for forgery.

original_en_text: One part of a cogwork heart, containing an intricate mechanism of wheels and regulators.
original_zh_text: 一个内含精密轮组结构的机心部件。
translated_text: 它是变速器核心的一部分 ， 具有由车轮和控制器组成的复杂机制。
secondary_translated_text: It is part of the core of the transmission and has a complex mechanism consisting of wheels and controllers.

original_en_text: Simple protective garb, sewn through with flexible spines.
original_zh_text: 缝入了柔韧棘刺芯的轻便披风，提供基础防护。
translated_text: 简单的防护服 ， 弹性指甲缝合 ，
secondary_translated_text: Simple protective clothing, elastic nail stitching,

original_en_text: Seal symbol given in recognition of a true Hunter, stamped in sticky goo.
original_zh_text: 用不知名粘稠物戳印的印章标识，代表了对一名猎人的认可。
translated_text: 印章上的标志是为了纪念真正的猎人 ， 并用胶水印刷。
secondary_translated_text: The logo on the seal commemorates the real hunter and is printed with glue.

translated_text: 获得的项目。
secondary_translated_text: Projects obtained.

original_en_text: Tough, furred seed from the centre of a corpora cluster. Stale to taste, but strong once ground as seasoning.
original_zh_text: 珊瑚砫丛中心的坚硬毛壳种实，直接食用味同嚼蜡。研磨成粉后辛香浓烈，常作为调味料。
translated_text: 一个强大的 ， 邪恶的种子来自 Deka 集团的中心。虽然味道很差 ， 但被原料浸湿后会非常强烈。
secondary_translated_text: A powerful, evil seed comes from the heart of the Deka Group. Although the taste is very bad, it will be very strong when soaked in raw materials.

translated_text: 入侵者。{0}shell 片段 （ shell ）
secondary_translated_text: Intruders.{0}Shell fragment (shell)

translated_text: 粉红色项链
secondary_translated_text: Pink necklace

translated_text: 格洛斯康 （ Gloscan ）
secondary_translated_text: Gloscan

original_en_text: Guide track for the Choir, with a theme of ascendence.
original_zh_text: 圣咏导引曲目・升天篇。
translated_text: 歌曲 ： Rising Up
secondary_translated_text: Song: Rising Up

translated_text: 效率低下。
secondary_translated_text: Inefficient.

translated_text: 他命令这些事。
secondary_translated_text: He ordered these things.

translated_text: Mission / 任务
secondary_translated_text: Mission /Mission

original_en_text: Old Weaver recording instrument, strung with Silk runes. The faded runes hold a Weaver’s words from ages gone.
original_zh_text: 古老的织者乐器，缀满灵丝符文。斑驳的符文承载着一名织者的往世箴言。
translated_text: 古代编译器记录了用丝绸符号绑定的工具。
secondary_translated_text: Ancient compilers recorded tools bound with silk symbols.

translated_text: 一切都结束了！
secondary_translated_text: It's over!

original_en_text: Key with the mark of ‘Indolent’. Opens the way to certain cells and passages of the Slab.
original_zh_text: 带有“怠惰”标记的钥匙。可开启罪石牢狱中的部分牢房和通路。
translated_text: 关键是冷漠 ， 它为斑块内的特定细胞和通道开辟了道路。
secondary_translated_text: The key is apathy, which opens the way for specific cells and channels within the plaque.

translated_text: 面罩 （ 面罩 ）
secondary_translated_text: Mask (Mask)

original_en_text: Tattered pelt taken from the body of a Crawbug. Fragile and drab, it is considered to have few practical uses.
original_zh_text: 腐囊虫身上的破碎毛皮。细碎且邋遢，实用性极低。
translated_text: 螃蟹的厚壳被认为是脆弱的 ， 单调的 ， 几乎没有实际用途。
secondary_translated_text: The thick shells of crabs are considered fragile, monotonous, and have little practical use.

original_en_text: Deadly Weaver technique. Pierce through enemies in a blur of blade and Silk.
original_zh_text: 致命的织者技艺。灵丝与刃锋交织，高速穿透多个敌人。
translated_text: 攻击你的敌人与致命的织物和丝绸模糊技术。
secondary_translated_text: Attack your enemies with deadly fabric and silk obscuration technology.

translated_text: 消灭他们的。
secondary_translated_text: Destroy them.

translated_text: shell 片段 （ shell ）
secondary_translated_text: Shell fragment (shell)

translated_text: 改变你的商标。
secondary_translated_text: Change your trademark.

original_en_text: Hard horn piece, broken from the tip of a Conchfly’s shell.
original_zh_text: 取自螺蝇外壳尖端的硬角。
translated_text: 固体碎片从壳的边缘掉下来。
secondary_translated_text: Solid fragments fall from the edge of the shell.

translated_text: Gift 是什么意思
secondary_translated_text: What does Gift mean?

original_en_text: Small bundle of shell shards tied together with string. Can be broken to use the shards for crafting.
original_zh_text: 一小捆甲壳碎片，由细绳串在一起。拆解后获得的甲壳碎片可用于制作。
translated_text: 一个小贝壳被绳子绑在一起。你可以使用这份工作。
secondary_translated_text: A small shell was tied together with rope. You can use this job.

translated_text: 关于 moss
secondary_translated_text: About moss

translated_text: 角落的碎片。
secondary_translated_text: Fragments in the corner.
Installation:{0}?

original_en_text: Heavy bell filled with the shimmering soul of the Bell Hermit.
original_zh_text: 沉重的大钟，封存着钟之隐者发光的灵魂。
translated_text: 沉重的仆人充满了隐藏的贝尔的光。
secondary_translated_text: The heavy servant was filled with the hidden light of Bell.

translated_text: 器械 （ 器械 ）
secondary_translated_text: Device (Device)

translated_text: 生产工具套件
secondary_translated_text: Production tool kit

original_zh_text: 完成度可以在物品栏中查看
translated_text: 显示库存中的完成百分比。
secondary_translated_text: Displays the percentage completed in inventory.

translated_text: 科学家的灵魂。
secondary_translated_text: The soul of scientists.

original_en_text: Singed parchment containing a pilgrim’s scrawl.<br><br>“My dear companions, all are gone now, devoured, scorched, fallen to exhaustion, or worse, seduced by the Haunting.”
original_zh_text: 烧焦的羊皮纸，一名朝圣者在上面留下了潦草的笔迹。<br><br>“同伴皆逝，或遭吞噬，或焚为灰烬，或力竭而亡，甚至......堕于丝咒。”
translated_text: 在烧毁的卷轴上有一幅祈祷的涂鸦。<br><br>“亲爱的同志们 ， 在折磨我的诱惑下 ， 一切都消失了 ， 吞噬了自己 ， 燃烧了自己 ， 耗尽了自己 ， 变得更糟。"
secondary_translated_text: There is a prayer graffiti on the burned scroll.<br><br>"Dear comrades, under the temptation of torturing me, everything disappeared, swallowed me, burned me, exhausted me, and became worse. "

original_en_text: Meat harvested from a defeated creature. It has been seared in a way that noticeably affects the flavour.
original_zh_text: 击败怪物获得的肉类。焦黑部分已严重影响其口味。
translated_text: 它是被征服的生物的肉 ， 它的烹饪方式会影响味道。
secondary_translated_text: It is the meat of conquered creatures, and the way it is cooked affects the taste.

original_en_text: Liquid lifeseed, possessed of remarkable regenerative qualities. A substance foreign to Pharloom, introduced by the Alchemist Zylotol.
original_zh_text: 具再生功效的液态生命精华。源自异域，由炼金术士奇洛托引入。
translated_text: 液体的生命周期具有再生的能力 ， 这是炼金术士 Gilotto 提出的来自 Farom 的外星物体。
secondary_translated_text: The life cycle of liquids has the ability to regenerate, which was proposed by the alchemist Gilotto as an alien object from Farom.

translated_text: 更好的可扩展性
secondary_translated_text: Better scalability

original_en_text: Protective garb lined with the soft down of a Fayforn and sewn through with flexible spines.
original_zh_text: 缝入了柔韧棘刺芯的保护性披风，内衬幻羽煌蛾的柔软绒毛。
translated_text: 防护服用柔软的火角羽毛覆盖 ， 并用柔性缝纫线缝制。
secondary_translated_text: The protective clothing is covered with soft firehorn feathers and sewn with flexible sewing thread.

translated_text: 让他们旅行。
secondary_translated_text: Let them travel.

translated_text: 这个地图在这里。
secondary_translated_text: This map is here.

translated_text: 鲁尼的怒火。
secondary_translated_text: Rooney's anger.

translated_text: 最长的合约。
secondary_translated_text: Longest contract.

original_en_text: Hardened chunk of horned shell collected from a defeated Savage Beastfly.
original_zh_text: 击败暴怒兽蝇获得的硬化角状碎片。
translated_text: 硬角贝壳取自屠宰的动物。
secondary_translated_text: Hard-horned shells are obtained from slaughtered animals.

translated_text: 大篷车 （Caravan）
secondary_translated_text: Caravan

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver talent. Throw the needle upward and launch to tremendous heights.
original_zh_text: 古老的织者天赋。向空中掷针并跃升至高处。
translated_text: 古代工匠的才华。放下指针 ， 从很高的高度发射。
secondary_translated_text: The talent of ancient craftsmen. Lower the pointer and launch from a high altitude.

translated_text: 贝壳玫瑰 （ Shell Rose ）
secondary_translated_text: Shell Rose

original_en_text: Advanced Weaver talent. Throw the Silk-strung needle like a harpoon and charge towards it.
original_zh_text: 高阶织者天赋。掷针为锚，牵引冲刺。
translated_text: 他们像长矛一样投掷线条 ， 并在前面奔跑。
secondary_translated_text: They threw lines like spears and ran in front of them.

translated_text: 杂志。
secondary_translated_text: Magazine.

original_en_text: Sentence issued by the Citadel Ministers.<br><br>“Chosen of the Choir, by grace of our magnanimous Conductors you are granted mercy. When you exit that cage, an elder bug of sins absolved, you may rejoin our flock and feel our light, and never again shall your voice fall silent.”
original_zh_text: 圣堡大臣宣判的特赦令。<br><br>"圣咏团的选民，你因指挥家的宽宏获得赦免。走出牢笼，作为洗清罪孽的长者，重归我们的群体，永沐光明，歌喉永不沉寂。"
translated_text: 雅各布总统的决定。<br><br>当他们从这个笼子里出来 ， 旧的罪被赦免时 ， 他们将加入我们的羊群 ， 感受到我们的光 ， 他们的声音将不再沉默。"
secondary_translated_text: President Jacob's decision.<br><br>When they come out of this cage and old sins are forgiven, they will join our flock, feel our light, and their voices will no longer be silent. "

original_en_text: Heavy necklace laden with pearl rosaries. Can be broken and the rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 缀满珍珠念珠的重链，拆解后取出的念珠可用于交易。
translated_text: 珍珠项链可以打破 ， 然后交换珍珠。
secondary_translated_text: Pearl necklaces can be broken and then exchanged for pearls.

translated_text: 必要的供应商。
secondary_translated_text: necessary suppliers.

original_en_text: Carving of Keelal, Weaver of the path. A prayer is etched upon it.<br><br>“Blessed Weaver, lady of grace, you who see our sin, our frail shells, our voices weak, and still offer your protection. How great your mind to care so much for ones so lowly.”
original_zh_text: 道路织者奇拉尔的雕像，像上刻有祷文。<br><br>“仁慈织者啊，您洞悉我们的罪过、甲壳的脆弱、歌喉的微弱，但仍施予庇护。心怀蝼蚁，何其伟大。”
translated_text: 雕塑 ， 织造雕塑在街上。我有一本祷告书。<br><br>“有福了 ， 韦弗夫人 ， 你看到了我们的罪恶 ， 我们脆弱的外壳 ， 我们微弱的声音。"
secondary_translated_text: Sculpture, weaving sculptures on the street. I have a prayer book.<br><br>"Blessed are you, Mrs. Weaver, for you have seen our sins, our fragile shells, our weak voices. "

translated_text: 荷兰语。
secondary_translated_text: Dutch.

original_en_text: Consume the Silkeater to retrieve a cocoon after falling in battle.

original_en_text: Carved child’s toy of a bug clad in leaves.
original_zh_text: 披叶虫子造型的儿童玩具。
translated_text: 儿童切割玩具 ， 蠕虫只安装在树叶上。
secondary_translated_text: Children cut toys, and worms are only installed on leaves.

translated_text: 隐藏的灵魂
secondary_translated_text: Hidden Soul

translated_text: 玫瑰的链条。
secondary_translated_text: Chain of roses.

translated_text: 粉红色项链
secondary_translated_text: Pink necklace

translated_text: 粉红色项链
secondary_translated_text: Pink necklace

translated_text: 表面记忆。
secondary_translated_text: superficial memory.

original_en_text: Common weapon of Pharloom, still in good condition despite long use. An expertly crafted metal rod with a sharpened tip.
original_zh_text: 纺络的常见武器，精制的金属杆配上锐利的尖端，历久弥新。
translated_text: 模型中的普通手枪 ， 虽然使用了很长时间 ， 但状况良好。这根棍子是由金属制成的 ， 有一个尖锐的末端。
secondary_translated_text: Although the ordinary pistol in the model has been used for a long time, it is in good condition. The stick is made of metal and has a sharp end.

translated_text: 玫瑰花消失了。
secondary_translated_text: The roses disappeared.

translated_text: 你确定吗？
secondary_translated_text: Are you sure?

translated_text: 卖出去。
secondary_translated_text: Sell it.

original_en_text: Last surgery of Conductor Mizello, performed in Whiteward’s operating theatre.
original_zh_text: 指挥家米泽洛在白愈厅的手术室中进行的最后一场手术。
translated_text: Mi Zero 所做的最后一件事就是去 Whitley 的房间。
secondary_translated_text: The last thing Mi Zero did was go to Whitley's room.

translated_text: 丝绸之心
secondary_translated_text: Silk Heart

original_en_text: Fine thread spun from the soul of its creator. Highly coveted for its remarkable strength and mystical properties. Used to heal wounds, extend life and weave powerful runes.
original_zh_text: 由其创造者的灵魂纺成的精细丝线，因其非凡的强度和神秘特性而备受珍视。可用于治愈伤口、延续生命，以及编织强力的符文。
translated_text: 物质是造物主灵魂的结构 ， 因其非凡的力量和神秘的性质而受到高度赞扬 ， 它被用于愈合伤口 ， 延长寿命和编织强大的符文。
secondary_translated_text: Matter is the structure of the creator's soul and is highly praised for its extraordinary power and mysterious nature. It is used to heal wounds, extend life and weave powerful runes.

translated_text: Rosalie 的
secondary_translated_text: Rosalie's

original_en_text: Map of Pharloom, partially filled out. Without a quill it cannot be updated.
original_zh_text: 沙克拉绘制的纺络局部地图。可使用羽毛笔更新地图以显示新发现的区域。
translated_text: 弗拉门戈 ， 部分装满。你不能更新它 ， 除非你有一支笔。
secondary_translated_text: Flamenco, partially filled. You can't update it unless you have a pen.

original_en_text: A frustrating fiend. They flee beneath the bone whenever I try to strike them down.
original_zh_text: 恼人的小恶魔，每当我挥针便钻入骸骨缝隙逃遁。
translated_text: 每当我想杀死他们 ， 他们就躲在我的骨头下面。
secondary_translated_text: Whenever I try to kill them, they hide under my bones.

translated_text: 船长 Waiter
secondary_translated_text: Captain Waiter

original_en_text: Is this abundance a sign of purity or greed? The way faith is measured in this land is curious indeed.
original_zh_text: 这般财富象征着虔信还是贪婪？多数虫肯定视此等囤积为罪孽。
translated_text: 这种财富只不过是纯洁或贪婪的象征。
secondary_translated_text: This wealth is nothing more than a symbol of purity or greed.

original_en_text: Once they summoned song from their subjects. Now they rise only to command an end to those unstrung.
original_zh_text: 昔日的乐章指挥者，如今只为剿灭清醒者而挥棒。
translated_text: 有一首关于这件事的歌。现在 ， 他们正在为那些还没有完成的人服务。
secondary_translated_text: There is a song about this. Now, they are serving those who have not yet finished.

translated_text: 饰 Sheikh Khan
secondary_translated_text: as Sheikh Khan

original_en_text: Automatons of impeccable construction, welcoming entrants to their chamber with a display of deadly dance.
original_zh_text: 以致命舞姿迎接访客的精密自动机。
translated_text: 机器人的结构是完美的 ， 你会被欢迎到房间与死亡的舞蹈。
secondary_translated_text: The robot's structure is perfect and you will be welcomed into the room with the dance of death.

original_en_text: Mad matriarch of the Slab rarely seen outside her warren. From her all jailers are born and bred.
original_zh_text: 罪石牢狱的癫狂主宰，所有狱卒皆由其孕育。
translated_text: 斯兰茨的疯狂女王在她的领地之外几乎是隐形的。所有的囚犯都是出生和成长的。
secondary_translated_text: The crazy queen of Slanz is almost invisible outside her territory. All prisoners were born and raised.

original_en_text: Flight it possesses, but only just. It may lift from the stone, but those sad wings would never carry it far.
original_zh_text: 那对萎缩的翅膀勉强能使它们离地数尺，但没法飞多远。
translated_text: 他有飞行的能力 ， 但没有别的。它可以用石头飞翔 ， 但它悲伤的翅膀永远不会飞得远。
secondary_translated_text: He has the ability to fly, but nothing else. It can fly with stones, but its sad wings will never fly far.

translated_text: 朝圣者的指南。
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrim's guide.

translated_text: Trobo （ Trobo ）
secondary_translated_text: Trobo （ Trobo ）

original_en_text: Mindless infant larva, coated in thick slime.
translated_text: 没有大脑的幼虫的身体通常覆盖着粘液。
secondary_translated_text: The bodies of larvae without brains are usually covered with mucus.

original_en_text: Chief and chaplain of the Stilkin, forever raging against the Citadel that chokes their caves and sees them suffer.
original_zh_text: 斯提金部族酋长兼祭司，对圣堡切齿痛恨——圣堡毁掉了斯提金部族的洞穴，令其族虫苦不堪言。
translated_text: Stirkin 的酋长和牧师对城堡感到愤怒 ， 城堡仍然关闭了洞穴 ， 看着他们受苦。
secondary_translated_text: Stirkin's chiefs and priests were angry at the castle, which still closed the cave and watched them suffer.

translated_text: Boran 服务
secondary_translated_text: Boran Services

translated_text: 推荐 （ Recommend ）
secondary_translated_text: Recommended (Recommended)

original_en_text: An essential bug if one ever hoped to navigate that dark maze of stacks and scrolls.
original_zh_text: 如果没有此虫引路，没有其他虫能在那个由书卷堆砌的黑暗迷宫中穿行。
translated_text: 如果你想在一堆书籍和卷轴的黑暗迷宫中导航 ， 这是一个不可避免的错误。
secondary_translated_text: If you want to navigate through a dark maze of books and scrolls, this is an inevitable mistake.

original_en_text: Child of Verdania, fully capable to fight despite its young age.
original_zh_text: 翠庭的幼童，虽年幼却战力完备。
translated_text: 比尔达尼亚的孩子们虽然年轻 ， 但他们能够战斗。
secondary_translated_text: Although the children of Birdanha are young, they can fight.

original_en_text: Their thick shroud leaves them sightless, yet it seems to matter little. They have no care for their own safety, wishing only to charge at those they sense as sinful.
original_zh_text: 厚罩使其目不能视，却仍疯狂冲击周围感知到的“罪人”。
translated_text: 他们不担心自己的安全 ， 他们只想责怪那些感到内疚的人。
secondary_translated_text: They don't worry about their safety, they just want to blame those who feel guilty.

translated_text: 克莱夫会说话。
secondary_translated_text: Clive can talk.

original_en_text: Large, gelatinous drifter. Chases away threats by hurling its bulk around.
original_zh_text: 巨大的凝胶状漂浮生物。利用自己身体冲撞，驱赶威胁。
translated_text: 这是一种类似凝胶的漂移 ， 增加了威胁的大小 ， 从而减少了威胁。
secondary_translated_text: This is a gel-like drift that increases the size of the threat and thus reduces it.

translated_text: 合唱团的老人。
secondary_translated_text: Old man in the choir.

original_en_text: Aggressive fly of Pharloom’s lowlands. Rams prey with its hardbone mask.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地区域的暴脾气飞蝇，善于使用骨质头甲冲撞猎物。
translated_text: 帕拉姆平原的莫哈。他们戴着面具去狩猎。
secondary_translated_text: Moha in the Param Plain. They wore masks and went hunting.

original_en_text: Blade maiden of a once renown warrior sect, survived long beyond the rest of her order.
original_zh_text: 纺络曾出现过一个赫赫有名的勇士宗派，而这位女针客就是其最后的幸存者。
translated_text: 臭名昭著的武士 Lady Blade 比任何其他邪教都活得更长。
secondary_translated_text: The infamous samurai Lady Blade has lived longer than any other cult.

translated_text: ” 埃格姆的仆人。
secondary_translated_text: "Egham's servant.

original_en_text: Blindingly fast, winged warrior able to launch pointed pinions from its forelimbs.
original_zh_text: 能从前肢发射尖刺的极速飞翼勇士。
translated_text: 翅膀的前臂突出了锋利的羽毛 ， 使它们能够以令人难以置信的速度射击。
secondary_translated_text: Sharp feathers protrude from the forearms of the wings, allowing them to fire at incredible speeds.

translated_text: 法官 ， 法官。
secondary_translated_text: Judge, judge.

translated_text: 最后的法官
secondary_translated_text: The last judge

translated_text: 贝利 ， 守护者
secondary_translated_text: Bailey, the keeper

original_en_text: Leaping hunter of a bygone age. The swiftest of their sect, deftly skilled with spinning foreblades.
original_zh_text: 善用旋转刀刃的传奇猎手，曾以速度称霸整个派系。
translated_text: 您阵营中最有经验的士兵熟练地向前转动剑。
secondary_translated_text: The most experienced soldier in your camp skillfully turns the sword forward.

original_en_text: They seek to slay their only chance at survival. Alas, any words would fall useless. I have only my blade to offer response.
original_zh_text: 它们想要斩断族群最后的生机。我任何的言语劝解皆为徒劳，唯有利刃能终结这愚行。
translated_text: 他们寻找唯一的生存机会。上帝 ， 没有什么会出错。
secondary_translated_text: They seek their only chance of survival. God, nothing can go wrong.

translated_text: 寡妇 （Vovova）
secondary_translated_text: Widow (Vovova)

original_en_text: They call out to warn their fellows at the smallest sense of threat. A successful hunt here means staying silent and hidden right up until the decisive strike.
original_zh_text: 稍有威胁迹象便会向同伴鸣叫示警。在此地成功捕猎的秘诀，在于无声潜行直至发动致命一击前的最后一刻。
translated_text: 当你感觉到轻微的威胁时 ， 通知你的伴侣。在这里 ， 狩猎的成功意味着在决定性的打击到来之前保持沉默。
secondary_translated_text: When you feel a slight threat, notify your partner. Here, successful hunting means staying silent until the decisive blow comes.

translated_text: 我在寻找一位救世主。
secondary_translated_text: I'm looking for a savior.

original_en_text: Though the Weavers have long passed from Pharloom, this servant still performs its function.
original_zh_text: 纺络的织者虽已绝迹，这位仆从仍恪守古老的职责。
translated_text: 法老丢掉了衣服 ， 但他的臣仆却尽了他们的职责。
secondary_translated_text: Pharaoh lost his clothes, but his servants did their duty.

original_en_text: Hard-shelled bug with a climber’s pin. Their pin, once aid, has become a weapon, though the bug is unrefined in its use.
original_zh_text: 身负硬壳的朝圣者，将攀爬用的长针作为武器，尽管使用手法粗陋。
translated_text: 带有尖锐针头的蜥蜴昆虫曾经是一种帮助 ， 现在它们是一种武器 ， 但滥用并不完美。
secondary_translated_text: Lizard insects with sharp needles were once a help, now they are a weapon, but abuse is not perfect.

original_en_text: Huge ant hunter tasked to protect the stores and passages of its tribe.
original_zh_text: 守护部族仓库及通道的重甲巨蚁。
translated_text: 巨型蚂蚁猎人的任务是保卫部落的商店和走廊。
secondary_translated_text: The giant ant hunter's mission is to defend the tribe's shops and corridors.

original_en_text: Staunch and skilled bladebug of a once flourishing land lost to time.
original_zh_text: 失落王朝的精锐刀虫，双刃技法堪称艺术。
translated_text: 在这个曾经繁荣的国家 ， 强大而有经验的妓女随着时间的推移消失了。
secondary_translated_text: In this once-prosperous country, powerful and experienced prostitutes have disappeared over time.

original_en_text: Aged pilgrim, overgrown with lichen and moss.
original_zh_text: 浑身覆满地衣苔藓的老迈信徒，会从胃囊喷射苔藓团块攻击。
translated_text: 古老的朝圣者充满了苔藓和苔藓。
secondary_translated_text: Ancient pilgrims were full of moss and moss.

original_en_text: There is no finesse in its use of Silk. It consumes its slim supply only to amplify its force.
original_zh_text: 它对灵丝的运用毫无精妙可言，只是消耗那本就稀少的灵丝储备来增强自身的力量。
translated_text: 我们不使用丝绸技术！吃少量的食物来增加你的力量。
secondary_translated_text: We do not use silk technology! Eat small amounts of food to increase your strength.

original_en_text: Steel horned floater, able to defend itself and its companions.
original_zh_text: 长有螺旋犄角的浮空甲虫，能够有效保卫自身与同伴。
translated_text: 钢质胶囊保护你自己和你的卫星。
secondary_translated_text: The steel capsule protects you and your satellite.

original_en_text: Tormented will of countless husks made manifest in a pit of Silk dregs.
original_zh_text: 灵丝残渣深坑中凝聚无数空壳的怨念集合体。
translated_text: 在废墟中出现了许多不稳定的贝壳。
secondary_translated_text: Many unstable shells appeared in the ruins.

original_en_text: That they ever hoped to keep their domain clean... What futility.
original_zh_text: 妄图维持这片土地的洁净……何等徒劳。
translated_text: 保持这个地方干净是浪费时间。
secondary_translated_text: Keeping this place clean is a waste of time.

translated_text: 导演 ： Fared Diver
secondary_translated_text: Directed by: Fared Diver

original_en_text: I would very much like to feel their soft fur, if only they weren’t so hostile.
original_zh_text: 要不是它们现在对谁都充满敌意，我真想摸摸这身柔软的绒毛。
translated_text: 如果你不是敌对的 ， 你真的想感觉软。
secondary_translated_text: If you are not hostile, you really want to feel soft.

original_en_text: This kingdom appears more advanced in metalwork than my own ever was, in great part due to the natural heat source at its base. Working in such an environment is an impressive feat.
original_zh_text: 此地的冶金技术远超我的故国，全因地下天然热源的优势。能在如此高温环境中劳作生存，实为壮举。
translated_text: 这个自然区域似乎比采矿更先进的冶金 ， 但这主要是由于底部的热源。
secondary_translated_text: This natural area appears to be more metallurgical than mining, but this is mainly due to the heat source at the bottom.

original_en_text: Aerial worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Bears a pouch full with flintstone which they will fling at intruders.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的空中劳工，随身携带一个装满燧石的袋子，投掷燧石攻击入侵者。
translated_text: 这名乘客因帕林的疼痛而死亡。熊拿起一个装满石头的袋子 ， 把它扔给了攻击者。
secondary_translated_text: The passenger died from Palin's pain. The bear picked up a bag full of stones and threw it to the attacker.

original_en_text: Haughty thespian convinced that only dazzling performance can raise Pharloom from the throes of death.
original_zh_text: 坚信华丽演出能拯救纺络的傲慢演员。
translated_text: 这位伟大的演员相信 ， 只有戏剧性的喜剧才能将法罗从死亡的痛苦中拯救出来。
secondary_translated_text: The great actor believed that only dramatic comedy could save Farrow from the pain of death.

translated_text: Lo 清扫器
secondary_translated_text: Lo Cleaner

translated_text: 格莱德，
secondary_translated_text: Glyde,

translated_text: Tour of Klovis 附近的景点
secondary_translated_text: Things to do near the Tour of Klovis

translated_text: 第四首歌曲
secondary_translated_text: The fourth song

original_en_text: Hard-shelled insect common upon the surface of Shellwood Pond. Once a staple food for passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池沼的硬壳水栖虫，曾是朝圣者途中的主要食物。
translated_text: 一种常见的硬壳昆虫 ， 位于贝壳形池塘的表面 ， 是朝圣者的主食。
secondary_translated_text: A common hard-shelled insect that sits on the surface of shell-shaped ponds and is a staple food for pilgrims.

original_en_text: Old knight consumed by black thread.
translated_text: 这个人被一条黑线迷住了。
secondary_translated_text: The man was fascinated by a black line.

original_en_text: I would not have guessed so large and marvelous a flea existed. I am pleased it saw sense before I had to strike a killing blow.
original_zh_text: 我未曾料想竟存在如此巨大的跳蚤。幸好它在最后关头恢复理智，免于我下杀手。
translated_text: 没有跳蚤大到足以让你高兴地看到真相。
secondary_translated_text: No flea is big enough to make you happy to see the truth.

original_en_text: A terrifying achievement of Pharloom, to build a construct so large and yet so nimble.
original_zh_text: 竟能建造出如此庞大却又灵巧非凡的构造，实乃纺络工造技艺巅峰之作。
translated_text: 对于 Faro 来说 ， 建造如此庞大且灵活的建筑物是一项伟大的成就。
secondary_translated_text: For Faro, building such a large and flexible building is a great achievement.

translated_text: Bagerman Group 公司
secondary_translated_text: Bagerman Group Company

translated_text: 主人的主人。
secondary_translated_text: The master's master.

translated_text: 妈的 ， 妈的！
secondary_translated_text: Shit, shit!

original_en_text: Their rough, ridged shell grips tight to any surface. Even walls and roofs become pathways for these nimble bugs.
original_zh_text: 粗糙的带棱甲壳可攀附任何表面。峭壁和洞顶对它们来说都是畅通无阻的道路。
translated_text: 经常和膨胀的外壳牢固地附着在任何表面上。墙壁和天花板也可以成为这些狡猾的昆虫的跳板。
secondary_translated_text: Always adhere firmly to any surface with the expanded shell. Walls and ceilings can also serve as springboards for these cunning insects.

translated_text: 防护装备 （ Protective Equipment ）
secondary_translated_text: Protective Equipment

translated_text: 罗马尼亚失去了。
secondary_translated_text: Romania lost.

original_en_text: Nature distorted... This bug was born tiny and mild. The Citadel deformed it in futile hope it may sustain.
original_zh_text: 自然天性惨遭扭曲..……此虫原本小巧温顺，却被圣堡强行改造。它的改造者竟然妄想它能承受这种畸变……
translated_text: 细菌非常小 ， 大自然是友好的。城堡扭曲了他 ， 希望他继续下去。
secondary_translated_text: Bacteria are very small and nature is friendly. The castle twisted him and wanted him to continue.

translated_text: 赛顿滑板车 （Setton Scooter）
secondary_translated_text: Seton Scooter

original_en_text: They would make effective hunting companions, though even without the Haunting I suspect their loyalty would always remain to their clan.
original_zh_text: 它们是优秀的狩猎伙伴。就算没有丝咒作祟，我相信它们也会永远忠于自己的部族。
translated_text: 他们是高效的猎人 ， 但他们对部落的忠诚不会永远持续下去 ， 即使没有鬼魂。
secondary_translated_text: They are efficient hunters, but their loyalty to the tribe will not last forever, even without ghosts.

translated_text: 马的。
secondary_translated_text: horse's.

original_en_text: Shell plated worm that lives beneath pools of shifting sand.
original_zh_text: 潜伏流沙之底的板甲蠕虫，突袭吞噬猎物。
translated_text: 昆虫生活在软沙湖。
secondary_translated_text: Insects live in soft sand lakes.

translated_text: 大兔子 （ Big Rabbit ）
secondary_translated_text: Big Rabbit

original_en_text: Large male Driznit, ferocious and territorial. Fires its heavy coral mask at intruders.
original_zh_text: 领地意识强烈的雄性掷面虫，投掷其沉重的珊瑚面甲御敌。
translated_text: 一个大的 Deznit 女性有一个强大而锋利的轮廓。用沉重的珊瑚面具射击入侵者。
secondary_translated_text: A large Deznit female has a strong and sharp silhouette. Shooting intruders with heavy coral masks.

original_en_text: With its wranglers long dead, the Moorwing stalked the towers of Greymoor, feasting on passing pilgrims and tenders alike.
original_zh_text: 自从其驯兽师死后，荒沼翼主常年盘踞在灰沼的众多高塔，猎食过往的朝圣者和居民。
translated_text: 当守卫死去时 ， 沼泽的翅膀飞到 Gremorta 塔的顶部 ， 喂过往的朝圣者和骑士。
secondary_translated_text: When the guards died, the swamps 'wings flew to the top of the Gremorta Tower to feed passing pilgrims and knights.

original_en_text: Hiding its tongue amongst fronds so similar... There is impressive style to this one’s trickery.
original_zh_text: 将捕食舌伪装在相似钟乳石间的策略，展现惊人的欺诈美学。
translated_text: 用这张床单盖住舌头。这个人的风格非常令人印象深刻。
secondary_translated_text: Cover your tongue with this sheet. This man's style is very impressive.

original_en_text: Scissor-wielding bug charged to cut and spool fallen dregs of Silk for return to the Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 挥舞剪刀处理灵丝碎屑的工匠虫，处理好的灵丝会被送回圣堡。
translated_text: 昆虫摇动织物 ， 切断掉落的丝绸部分 ， 将其移除 ， 然后将其放回锁的顶部。
secondary_translated_text: The insect shakes the fabric, cuts off the fallen silk portion, removes it, and puts it back on the top of the lock.

translated_text: CogWork 开始起飞。
secondary_translated_text: CogWork began to take off.

original_en_text: What seems at first a purely defensive mechanism may also be necessary to rid this creature of excess heat.
original_zh_text: 看似防御的行为，实为排出过量热量的必要生理机制。
translated_text: 还需要一个干净的外部保护机制来消除这种过剩的生物恐怖。
secondary_translated_text: A clean external protection mechanism is also needed to eliminate this excess of bioterrorism.

translated_text: 螺旋壳
secondary_translated_text: spiral shell

original_en_text: For his stern stewardship his legions seemed utterly loyal. For less combative bugs his would have been a hard rule.
original_zh_text: 其铁腕统治赢得了军团的绝对忠诚，但对非战斗种群来说则是暴政。
translated_text: 由于他的严格控制 ， 他的军队似乎完全忠诚 ， 他们的规则对最具侵略性的细菌严格。
secondary_translated_text: Because of his tight control, his army seems completely loyal, and their rules are strict with the most aggressive bacteria.

translated_text: 克雷格星系团 Craig 's Cluster of Galaxies
secondary_translated_text: Craig 's Cluster of Galaxies

original_en_text: Remains of a Citadel bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will lash out wildly with the many sharp pins caught inside its thread.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣控制的圣堡残躯，用丝线中缠绕的尖针发动无序攻击。
translated_text: 甲虫的残骸和子弹的丝状残骸将剧烈燃烧 ， 许多锋利的针头将穿过线。
secondary_translated_text: The remains of beetles and the threadlike remains of bullets will burn violently, and many sharp needles will pass through the thread.

original_en_text: Altered servant of the Citadel’s Whiteward, responsible for the cremation of husks and the recycling of Silk from their shells.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅改造仆从，负责火化躯壳并回收灵丝。
translated_text: 怀特伍德城堡的仆人焚烧贝壳并回收丝绸。
secondary_translated_text: Servants at Whitewood Castle burn shells and recycle silk.

original_en_text: Short elder crawbug eagerly serving in their court.
original_zh_text: 热衷审判的矮小腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: 老螃蟹在法庭上辛苦工作。
secondary_translated_text: The old crab works hard in court.

translated_text: 这就是 Sterling 。
secondary_translated_text: This is Sterling.

original_en_text: Theirs is the perfect shell for their duty, a wall of a warrior and an adept fighter. If I hope to claim their treasures, I must bring my best.
original_zh_text: 它们拥有攻防兼备的重型甲壳，能完美适配其守卫的差事。想要取得它们看守的宝物，必须做好全力以赴战斗的准备。
translated_text: 他们的盾牌是完成任务的完美外壳 ， 也是熟练士兵和士兵的高墙。如果你想拥有你的财富 ， 你必须尽你所能。" "
secondary_translated_text: Their shields are the perfect shell for completing tasks and high walls for skilled soldiers and soldiers. If you want to have your wealth, you must do the best you can. " "

translated_text: 水中的水。
secondary_translated_text: Water in the water.

translated_text: 黄金珊瑚
secondary_translated_text: golden coral

original_en_text: Their bells would once have rung with hope and mirth, lifting the spirits of any climbing companions. Sadly, those instruments have turned purely to combative use.
original_zh_text: 这些钟曾为众多朝圣者奏响希望与欢乐的乐章。而今却成了投向清醒者的凶器——仿佛要砸碎最后一丝未被腐蚀的理智。
translated_text: 仆人们已经充满了希望和喜悦 ， 这加强了登山者的精神。不幸的是 ， 这个工具只在战斗中使用。
secondary_translated_text: The servants were already filled with hope and joy, which strengthened the spirit of the climbers. Unfortunately, this tool is only used in combat.

translated_text: 真空中的质量
secondary_translated_text: Quality in vacuum

translated_text: 森林中的舰队
secondary_translated_text: Fleet in the Forest

translated_text: RIA （ 记忆 ）
secondary_translated_text: RIA (Memory)

translated_text: 洗涤。
secondary_translated_text: Wash.

original_en_text: The way they skate along the water’s surface is so elegant. Surely it is a skill that can be learned? When time permits, I should attempt the task.
original_zh_text: 如此优雅的水面滑行技艺，或许可以通过练习掌握？待战事稍歇，我定要试试这 "凌波微步"。
translated_text: 在水上滑行很有趣 ， 这是一种需要学习的技能 ， 不是吗 ？事实上？如果我有时间 ， 我会这么做。
secondary_translated_text: Skating on the water is fun, it's a skill that needs to be learned, isn't it? Actually? If I had time, I would do this.

original_en_text: A creature long familiar to me. I suspect that no matter how far I travel, if I descend deep enough they will always be there.
original_zh_text: 这种生物于我而言早已熟悉。无论我跋涉多远，只要深入足够的地底，它们必会如影随形。
translated_text: 不管你走多远 ， 它会永远持续下去。
secondary_translated_text: No matter how far you go, it will last forever.

original_en_text: When defeated, it splits into many smaller forms. Yet another remarkable creature of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 击败后分裂为多个小型个体。圣堡崛起前，纺络土地上又一奇异而非凡的生灵。
translated_text: 当它被击败时 ， 它会分解成许多较小的形式。在君主之前 ， 这片土地是另一种不寻常的生物。
secondary_translated_text: When it is defeated, it breaks down into many smaller forms. Before the monarch, this land was another unusual creature.

translated_text: 带翅膀的朝圣者的钟
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrim's clock with wings

original_en_text: Winged insect with a flaky shell that perfectly mimics its environment.
original_zh_text: 拥有一副古怪甲壳的飞虫，能完美拟态周围环境。
translated_text: 这些昆虫是昆虫 ， 其壳完全模仿环境。
secondary_translated_text: These insects are insects whose shells completely mimic the environment.

translated_text: 提克 （Tyk）
secondary_translated_text: Tyk

original_en_text: Unnaturally overgrown Mossgrub, bred within the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 圣堡忆廊培育的变异苔原蠕虫。
translated_text: 城堡的纪念碑被不自然的泡沫覆盖。
secondary_translated_text: The castle's monuments are covered with unnatural foam.

original_en_text: While these bothersome bugs are left free to forage, no loose rosary or trinket is safe.
original_zh_text: 只要这些可恶的虫子尚存，任何散落的念珠与宝物皆不得安宁。
translated_text: 这些讨厌的昆虫可以自由地吃食物 ， 但没有玫瑰和自由的装饰是安全的。
secondary_translated_text: These pesky insects are free to eat food, but are safe without roses and free decorations.

original_en_text: Younger form of a Muckroach. Attacks prey by leaping from the water and snapping with its flexible jaws.
original_zh_text: 淤泥蟑螂的近亲变种，形态更类似于蛆虫。
translated_text: 它们跳出水面 ， 攻击猎物 ， 弯曲下巴 ， 弯曲成柔软的下巴。
secondary_translated_text: They jump out of the water, attack their prey, bending their chin into a soft chin.

original_en_text: Elite former hunter acting as the final line of defence before their mother.
original_zh_text: 精锐的猎手，曾作为最后防线守卫它们的母亲。
translated_text: 前猎人是对抗母亲的最后一道防线
secondary_translated_text: The former hunter is the last line of defense against his mother

original_en_text: All are haunted here, the jailers and the jailed. Do they realise they will never leave this place? Or how long they have stayed already?
original_zh_text: 此处的狱卒与囚徒皆被丝咒侵蚀。它们可曾意识到自己将永远无法逃离此地？是否知道已经在这地方困了多久？
translated_text: 你知道吗 ， 所有的囚犯和看守都不会离开这个鬼地方 ？你在这里多久了 ？
secondary_translated_text: Did you know that all prisoners and guards are not leaving this hellhole? How long have you been here?

translated_text: 小米 （ Minos ）
secondary_translated_text: Minos

original_en_text: Such feeble creatures could only survive thanks to the rarity of predators in these super-heated caverns.
original_zh_text: 唯有在这缺乏天敌的高温洞穴中，如此脆弱的生物方能幸存。
translated_text: 这种脆弱的生物可以在非常高的温度下生存 ， 因为在这些洞穴中捕食者很少。
secondary_translated_text: This fragile creature can survive in very high temperatures because there are few predators in these caves.

original_en_text: Fully grown mollusc able to unleash a gushing torrent of burning fluid from its back.
original_zh_text: 成年软体生物，能从背部喷射灼热流体洪流
translated_text: 成熟的海鸥从背部吐出热液体。
secondary_translated_text: Mature seagulls spit hot liquid from their backs.

original_en_text: By this swooping menace, a simple bug could be easily overcome. More dangerous still, they rarely attack alone.
original_zh_text: 对于其单个个体，尚可周旋，但它们鲜少单独行动。成群俯冲时，普通虫类极易被瞬间击溃。
translated_text: 有了这种身临其境的威胁 ， 简单的错误很容易被克服。更危险的是 ， 他们几乎没有攻击。
secondary_translated_text: With this immersive threat, simple mistakes can be easily overcome. What's even more dangerous is that they hardly attack.

original_en_text: A common enough bug, though not to be underestimated. The acuteness of their other senses more than makes up for their lack of vision.
original_zh_text: 一种相当常见的虫子，但不可小觑——它们其他感官的敏锐完全弥补了视觉的缺陷。
translated_text: 虽然这是一个非常常见的错误 ， 但不应低估。其他感官的敏锐性足以弥补视力的缺失。
secondary_translated_text: Although this is a very common mistake, it should not be underestimated. The acumen of other senses is enough to make up for the lack of vision.

original_en_text: Darting predator that clings fast to roofs and outcrops, often summoned to aid its larger companions.
original_zh_text: 擅长攀附在岩顶或峭壁的飞镖猎手，常被其大型同伴叫来支援。
translated_text: 快速捕食者紧紧抓住屋顶和突出物 ， 经常寻求更大的同伴的帮助。
secondary_translated_text: Fast predators cling to roofs and protrusions, often seeking help from larger companions.

original_en_text: Is it the Haunting that drove them to cackling madness, or was their unending toil the cause even before that?
original_zh_text: 究竟是丝咒导致了疯癫，还是在无尽苦役中早已精神失常？答案已无从考据。
translated_text: 是鬼魂让他们疯狂 ， 还是这就是他们无休止地努力的原因 ？
secondary_translated_text: Do ghosts drive them crazy, or is this why they work endlessly?

original_en_text: Short, nimble bug who uses barbed bolas to keep beasts corralled and caged.
original_zh_text: 矮小敏捷的饲育者，擅于使用带刺流星索圈养腐汁蟑螂。
translated_text: 一种小巧狡猾的昆虫 ， 可以用短喙将野生动物关在笼子里
secondary_translated_text: A small, cunning insect that can use a short bill to keep wild animals in cages

translated_text: 大包
secondary_translated_text: big bag

original_en_text: Despite their youth, they are impressive opponents. It seems likely their tribe were trained for combat from birth.
original_zh_text: 虽然年轻却训练有素，显然它们从出生开始就被部族作为战士培养。
translated_text: 尽管他年轻 ， 但他是一个非常强大的敌人 ， 显然他的部落从他出生的那一刻起就接受了战斗训练。
secondary_translated_text: Despite his youth, he was a very powerful enemy, and apparently his tribe had received combat training from the moment he was born.

translated_text: 米色 ， 米色。
secondary_translated_text: Beige, Beige.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Whispering Vaults, tasked to navigate its dim recesses to retrieve old scrolls.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的信徒，负责在幽暗的书库中搜寻古籍。
translated_text: 男爵对财务主管低声说 ， 他的任务是在黑暗深处寻找古老的轮子。
secondary_translated_text: The baron whispered to the treasurer that his task was to find the ancient wheel deep in the darkness.

original_en_text: This one’s strength was much enhanced by stolen soul. They are not the first who tried to hoard it, or to mould it towards such violent ends.
original_zh_text: 靠着窃取灵魂强化自己的力量，他并非第一个妄图驾驭此力的施暴者。
translated_text: 这名男子的权力因被盗灵魂而大大增加。他们不是第一个积累它们或试图将它们推向如此暴力的目标的人。
secondary_translated_text: The man's power was greatly increased by the stolen soul. They are not the first to accumulate them or try to push them towards such violent targets.

original_en_text: With all the refuse collapsing throughout their domain, the worker’s stiff shell would be essential if they held any hope to survive.
original_zh_text: 在废墟持续崩塌的领域，硬化甲壳成为他们最后的生存保障。
translated_text: 由于该地区的所有垃圾都在崩溃 ， 工人们的洗手池对他们的生存至关重要。
secondary_translated_text: Because all garbage in the area is collapsing, the workers 'sinks are crucial to their survival.

original_en_text: Civilisation encroaches from this kingdom’s crown, but the lowlands are still ruled by great beasts. Its roar stirs something deep within me, some primal instinct.
original_zh_text: 文明从王冠之地蔓延开来，但低地区域仍是野兽的疆域。它的咆哮唤醒了我血脉深处的某种原始悸动。
translated_text: 文明已经入侵了王国的王冠 ， 但动物仍然占主导地位 ， 这种朗姆酒唤起了我的一些原始本能。
secondary_translated_text: Civilization has invaded the crown of the kingdom, but animals still dominate, and this rum evokes some of my primitive instincts.

original_en_text: The poor creature has lived a life too calm and coddled. It would not fare well in the world beyond its walls.
original_zh_text: 这可怜虫一生过于安逸，若离开高墙庇护必难存活。
translated_text: 这只小动物过着安静舒适的生活。
secondary_translated_text: This little animal lives a quiet and comfortable life.

original_en_text: Lithe, winged scouts frequently paired with their heavier brethren.
original_zh_text: 与重装部队配合作战的敏捷翼兵。
translated_text: 轻型侦察机经常与全副武装的侦察机结合使用。
secondary_translated_text: Light reconnaissance aircraft are often used in conjunction with fully armed reconnaissance aircraft.

translated_text: 葬礼 （ Funerals ）
secondary_translated_text: Funerals (Funerals)

original_en_text: Their throwing weapon is well-suited to the wide caverns they inhabit. These sly little bugs must have a keen claw for crafting.
original_zh_text: 其长索武器的高效性在栖居的宽阔洞窟中总能发挥到极致，这般狡诈的小虫竟也有颗巧匠之心。
translated_text: 他们的武器非常适合他们居住的巨大洞穴。这种狡猾的小昆虫需要尖锐的爪子。
secondary_translated_text: Their weapons are well suited to the huge cave they inhabit. This cunning little insect needs sharp claws.

original_en_text: Toughened Kai capable of extending sharp spikes from within its shellsack.
original_zh_text: 甲囊中可弹出尖刺的硬化凯虫。
translated_text: K. K.斯特朗可以用口袋里的锋利尖端塞进头盔。
secondary_translated_text: K. K. Strong can stuff a sharp tip from his pocket into his helmet.

original_en_text: An impressive act of mimicry. To match so closely with its land, their clover caves must have sustained through generations uncounted.
original_zh_text: 与环境的契合程度，印证了千万年演化的精妙。
translated_text: 为了适应地球 ， 它们的三叶洞穴已经存在了几代人。
secondary_translated_text: Their three-leaf caves have existed for generations in order to adapt to the earth.

original_en_text: This bug is soft and clumsy, but to its fortune its home caves seem relatively free of effective predators. I wonder why that is.
original_zh_text: 这种虫子柔弱笨拙，所幸其栖息洞穴缺乏高效捕食者。此地的生态平衡奥秘值得探究。
translated_text: 这些昆虫是甜蜜和愚蠢的 ， 但幸运的是 ， 洞穴中没有有效的捕食者。
secondary_translated_text: These insects are sweet and silly, but fortunately there are no effective predators in the cave.

original_en_text: Towering iron automaton, driven by rotor and cog.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮驱动的巨型铁质自动机。
translated_text: 由车轮和旋转齿轮驱动的高速自动铁路车辆。
secondary_translated_text: A high-speed automatic railway vehicle driven by wheels and rotating gears.

original_en_text: Small bug that crafts a shell of sharpened coral. Spins its shell at rapid speed to cut through crust and bone.
original_zh_text: 用锋利珊瑚作为外壳的小型生物，旋转切割无往不利。
translated_text: 小昆虫可以由尖锐的珊瑚贝壳制成。旋转外壳 ， 分离外壳和骨骼。
secondary_translated_text: Small insects can be made from sharp coral shells. Rotate the shell to separate the shell and bone.

original_en_text: Plump, plentiful drifter of a coral past.
original_zh_text: 昔日围绕珊瑚塔群居的漂浮生物。
translated_text: 曾经有一个巨大的珊瑚礁和大量的漂流。
secondary_translated_text: There was once a huge coral reef and a lot of rafting.

translated_text: 身体或爬行动物。
secondary_translated_text: Body or reptile.

original_en_text: Far tougher for being matched inside their encrusted domain. They must have lived their whole lives within their tower, to command it so.
original_zh_text: 外壳比内部要坚硬太多。终生固守一地的生存方式，造就了独特的战斗形态。
translated_text: 他一生都在塔里度过。
secondary_translated_text: He spent his whole life in the tower.

translated_text: 导演 ： Reed， Reed
secondary_translated_text: Director: Reed, Reed

original_en_text: Tall bug charged to pile Silk dregs in preparation for respooling. Their sharp rake now doubles equally well as a stabbing weapon.
original_zh_text: 负责灵丝残渣回收的高个虫子，尖利的耙子现已成为它的武器。
translated_text: 大型昆虫会积累丝绸废料 ， 为处理做准备。锋利的手可以用作刀子。
secondary_translated_text: Large insects accumulate silk waste in preparation for disposal. Sharp hands can be used as knives.

translated_text: 特拉布洛 （ Trablo ）
secondary_translated_text: Trablo

translated_text: 路易莎的男人。
secondary_translated_text: Louisa's man.

translated_text: 被特罗维尔折磨的人
secondary_translated_text: The people tortured by Trovel

original_en_text: Few creatures of that Silk stricken place would find nourishment enough to grow so large.
original_zh_text: 丝咒之地鲜有生物能获取足够养分长至此等体型。
translated_text: 在被丝绸淹没的地区 ， 很少有生物能够找到足够的营养物质来生长到这种大小。
secondary_translated_text: In areas flooded by silk, few organisms can find enough nutrients to grow to this size.

original_en_text: Anguished spectre of lingering thread. Despite its ephemeral nature, strong strikes can dispel the Wraith for a time.
original_zh_text: 游荡的丝线怨魂，重击可将其暂时驱散。
translated_text: 虽然鬼魂的生命自然是短暂的 ， 但它们可以被一击而暂时驱逐。
secondary_translated_text: Although the lives of ghosts are naturally short-lived, they can be temporarily expelled with a single blow.

original_en_text: A tragic fate for a once honourable bug. Those void soaked threads... Their physical might is nothing compared to the corruption they wreak upon a soul.
original_zh_text: 昔日荣光骑士的悲剧命运。这些沾染虚空的丝线，对灵魂的腐化远胜肉体摧残。
translated_text: 他们的体力与埋在真空中的电线的灵魂腐蚀相比 ， 什么都不是。
secondary_translated_text: Their physical strength is nothing compared to the soul erosion of wires buried in a vacuum.

translated_text: 调查结果 （ 结果 ）
secondary_translated_text: Survey results (results)

translated_text: 姐妹们分开了。
secondary_translated_text: The sisters separated.

original_en_text: The coldshard, even when destroyed it remembers its former shape. A remarkable material, and perhaps even more astonishing there seems life contained within it.
original_zh_text: 冰晶被毁后仍存有对其原形的记忆，这等材料特性已属非凡，更神奇的是其中似乎竟蕴含着生命？
translated_text: 当冰块破裂时 ， 它仍然记得它原来的形状。这是一种罕见的物质 ， 也许更令人惊讶的是 ， 它似乎包含生命。
secondary_translated_text: When the ice breaks, it still remembers its original shape. This is a rare substance, and perhaps more surprisingly, it seems to contain life.

original_en_text: The talent and intelligence of this construct goes far beyond others I have witnessed. They seem less built as a tool to serve than an attempt at life itself.
original_zh_text: 其智力远超我所见过的其他造物。它们似乎并非单纯作为工具而被打造，而更像是在追求生命的自我意识。
translated_text: 这个结构的礼物和智慧远远超出了我所见过的任何其他结构 ， 它似乎更被生活而不是服务工具所诱惑。
secondary_translated_text: The gifts and wisdom of this structure are far beyond any other structure I have ever seen, and it seems more seduced by life than by the tools of service.

original_en_text: In entering their domain, I freed these bugs to infest the greater vaults. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 我闯入了这些虫子的领地，并释放了它们。如今它们已蔓延到了各个书库，这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: 入侵他们的领土后 ， 我用这种昆虫感染了我的大胸部。
secondary_translated_text: After invading their territory, I infected my large breasts with this insect.

original_en_text: Winged mite-beast, bred large to catch workers who once tried to flee their tasks.
original_zh_text: 精心培育出的巨型螨兽，用于追捕逃役工虫。
translated_text: 许多动物被饲养来捕捉逃离工作的工人。
secondary_translated_text: Many animals are raised to capture workers fleeing work.

translated_text: 齿轮 （Gear）
secondary_translated_text: Gear

original_en_text: The way it darts in and out of the ground has an almost playful quality to it. An amusing and effective way to ambush prey.
original_zh_text: 从地面突然窜出的攻击方式，兼具实用性与趣味性。
translated_text: 进入和离开地下室是一种有趣的感觉 ， 这是一种有趣而有效的观察矿山的方式。
secondary_translated_text: Entering and leaving the basement is an interesting feeling, a fun and effective way to observe the mine.

original_en_text: Floral foe with a core shaped to mimic a mask. The core can be thrust forth to bludgeon unwary bugs.
original_zh_text: 花芯长得像恐怖面甲的阴险植物，会突然向外猛戳，重击那些缺乏警惕的虫子。
translated_text: 模仿面具的形状。你的头脑可能会把一个鲁莽的错误推到你身上。
secondary_translated_text: Imitate the shape of the mask. Your mind may push a reckless mistake on you.

translated_text: Roach 服务器 （Roach Server）
secondary_translated_text: Roach Server

original_en_text: The servitor has been heavily damaged by time and the elements. Its actions have grown erratic. It seems no longer able to discern friend from foe.
original_zh_text: 岁月的侵蚀使这位仆从行为失常，似乎已经变得敌我不分。
translated_text: 他们的行动变得不稳定 ， 敌人和盟友之间不再有区别。
secondary_translated_text: Their actions become unstable and there is no longer a distinction between enemies and allies.

original_en_text: A unique mask and impressive form. Now just another near forgotten specimen of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 拥有独特的体型和面甲，本应成为传奇生物，如今却处于被遗忘的边缘。
translated_text: 他是这个国家被遗忘的冠军。
secondary_translated_text: He is the forgotten champion of this country.

original_en_text: These bugs work mainly as finders and foragers for the warriors of their tribe. Combat has not long been their nature.
original_zh_text: 主要负责探索和采集，本非战斗种族，最近才开始具有攻击性。
translated_text: 这些昆虫主要被部落士兵用作狩猎者和食肉者。
secondary_translated_text: These insects are mainly used by tribal soldiers as hunters and predators.

original_en_text: Pharloom shall quickly learn the curse of this substance. What benefits it provides can be swiftly outweighed.
original_zh_text: 纺络很快就会领教这种物质所带来的诅咒。它所赋予的好处，很快就会被更沉重的代价所掩盖。
translated_text: 最终 ， 凶手意识到这种物质的诅咒。他们提供的好处很快就会得到回报。
secondary_translated_text: Eventually, the killer realized the curse of the substance. The benefits they provide will soon be rewarded.

translated_text: 童子军 Scout
secondary_translated_text: Scout

translated_text: 泊可那滨 （泊可那滨）
secondary_translated_text: Poconabin (Poconabin)

original_en_text: Puppet servant of the Citadel, suspended on strings of Silk. An early form of automaton, requiring extensive Silk to maintain its service.
original_zh_text: 由灵丝悬吊操控的傀儡，圣堡的仆从。一种早期形态的自动构造，需要大量的灵丝来维持其运作。
translated_text: 那个男人的洋娃娃用丝绸挂着。第一台机器需要大量的丝绸来维护。
secondary_translated_text: The man's doll was hung in silk. The first machine required a large amount of silk to maintain.

original_en_text: Eternal defender of Shellwood Shrine. His pin and cymbal show many marks of their use.
original_zh_text: 甲木林圣所的永恒守卫者，佩针与钹尽显沧桑。
translated_text: 松树和松树是谢泼德先生的永恒守护者 ， 用于许多目的。
secondary_translated_text: Pines and pine trees are Mr. Sheppard's eternal guardians and are used for many purposes.

original_en_text: It is no wonder these constructs were cast. No mortal bug would last long inside that scorching place. Even my shell struggles to withstand its heat.
original_zh_text: 这些造物被投入使用是有原因的——没有凡虫能在那片炽热之地撑太久，就连我的甲壳也难以抵御那里的高温。
translated_text: 宫殿仍在建设中 ， 毫不奇怪。在如此炎热的气候下 ， 昆虫不能长期生存。皮肤也不能忍受热量。
secondary_translated_text: It is no surprise that the palace is still under construction. Insects cannot survive for long in such a hot climate. The skin cannot tolerate heat.

original_en_text: Fabled first Cloverstag of Verdania’s wilds. Commands the grass and leaves to aid its attack.
original_zh_text: 翠庭荒野传说中的苜鹿始祖，能号令草木协同作战。
translated_text: 第一个传说与令人眼花缭乱的三叶草沙漠有关。我祈祷草和叶子帮助我攻击。
secondary_translated_text: The first legend has to do with the dazzling shamrock desert. I prayed for grass and leaves to help me attack.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, charged to maintain its perfect order, by sharp pin if necessary.
original_zh_text: 维护咏者团秩序的迅捷信徒，必要时以利针执法。
translated_text: 喇叭按钮负责保持完美的顺序 ， 如果需要 ， 可以使用锋利的剃须刀。
secondary_translated_text: The horn buttons are responsible for maintaining the perfect order, and a sharp razor can be used if needed.

original_en_text: When they do not hinder my path, I find their simple motion rather pleasant.
original_zh_text: 当它未阻挡前路时，笨拙的蠕动反而显得几分憨态可掬。
translated_text: 在散步时享受简单的运动。
secondary_translated_text: Enjoy simple exercise while walking.

original_en_text: Holds an extensive supply of searing acid in a layered sack within its shell. The acid rains from its mouth upon any creature it sees as food.
original_zh_text: 它胃囊里的酸液储量足以蚀穿圣堡城墙，所幸那对退化的小眼睛总让攻击准头欠佳。
translated_text: 贝壳的涂层含有大量的皮酸。从你嘴里流出的酸雨落在你认为是食物的所有生物身上。
secondary_translated_text: The coating of shells contains a large amount of skin acid. The acid rain that comes out of your mouth falls on all living things you think are food.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled worker, forever repairing the Citadel’s crumbling Underworks.
original_zh_text: 永不停歇修缮圣堡工厂的重甲劳工。
translated_text: 重工业工人正在修复永久摧毁城堡的地下工程。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy industry workers are repairing underground works that permanently destroyed the castle.

original_en_text: It has no means to defend itself. Its only hope for survival is to be mistaken for a plant.
original_zh_text: 生存的唯一希望，便是被误认作植物。除此之外，它们没有任何防御手段。
translated_text: 他无法保护自己 ， 他唯一的生存希望就是用一株植物取代他。
secondary_translated_text: He couldn't protect himself, and his only hope for survival was to replace him with a plant.

original_en_text: This one has allied themself with me, either as thanks for their saving or respect for one judged as equal. Whichever the reason, their fellowship is welcome.
original_zh_text: 这一只现在成了我的盟友，不知道是报救命之恩，还是单纯觉得我实力强大，但多个帮手总是好的。
translated_text: 这个人和我在一起是为了感谢他的救赎 ， 或者是为了尊重那些被认为是平等的人。
secondary_translated_text: This man is with me to thank him for his redemption, or to respect those who are considered equal.

original_en_text: Bugs like these crossed the caves to bring me to Pharloom. I cut down many before my capture. Then I had thought them minded and cunning. Now I can see the singular will that haunts them all.
original_zh_text: 正是这类虫子穿越洞穴将我带至纺络。被俘前我斩杀了许多，当时认为它们具备独立心智与狡诈。如今我明白是同一意志在支配它们全体。
translated_text: 蠕虫在雨中穿过洞穴 ， 直到我被抓住。他们认为自己是快速和聪明的。现在我看到一个让他们吃惊的愿望。
secondary_translated_text: The worms passed through the cave in the rain until I was caught. They think they are fast and smart. Now I see a wish that surprises them.

translated_text: 卡卡亚奥
secondary_translated_text: Kakayao

original_en_text: Its sticky spit would no doubt make a useful crafting material if moulded fresh. Unfortunately, I cannot stop to experiment.
original_zh_text: 它们喷射的粘稠物质经过及时塑形，一定可以作为优质的制造材料。可惜我无暇采集实验。
translated_text: 如果它是最近形成的 ， 厚唾液无疑是这个过程中的有用材料。不幸的是 ， 我们无法阻止这种体验。
secondary_translated_text: If it is recently formed, thick saliva is undoubtedly a useful material in the process. Unfortunately, we cannot stop this experience.

original_en_text: The smell from these jailers overwhelms my senses. I strongly doubt they have ever thought to bathe.
original_zh_text: 这些狱卒的恶臭令我窒息。我怀疑它们从未有过沐浴的概念。
translated_text: 警卫的气味使我失去知觉 ， 而不是想游泳。
secondary_translated_text: The smell of the guards made me lose consciousness, not wanting to swim.

original_en_text: A creature at its most basic. This one is no threat to me, or any other.
original_zh_text: 作为最基础的生命形态，它对我或任何生物都不构成威胁。
translated_text: 这是最基本的机构之一 ， 不会对我或任何人构成威胁。
secondary_translated_text: This is one of the most basic institutions and does not pose a threat to me or anyone else.

original_en_text: Aged former pilgrim. Uses their wings to position above threats and crush them under their large shell.
original_zh_text: 年迈的前朝圣者，利用飞行优势从上方压制目标。
translated_text: 用翅膀把它们放在威胁 ， 然后把它们压在大壳下。
secondary_translated_text: Use your wings to put them under threat, then press them under the big shell.

translated_text: 英文片名 ： Sprint On Tone
secondary_translated_text: Title: Sprint On Tone

translated_text: 洛伍德。
secondary_translated_text: Lowood.

translated_text: 《圆圈》 （ The Circle ）
secondary_translated_text: "The Circle"

original_en_text: A bug once frail, pushed by twisted thread beyond its mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 灵丝撑开了它脆弱的甲壳，强行将这副残躯突破凡虫的限制。
translated_text: 在扭曲线条的帮助下 ， 脆弱的昆虫将它们推向极限。
secondary_translated_text: With the help of twisted lines, fragile insects push them to their limits.

original_en_text: The threat of its exploding rear is an effective deterrent to predators, but the slightest jolt or fall can cause its premature end.
original_zh_text: 尾部爆炸威胁能威慑捕食者，但轻微碰撞就会导致其提前自毁。
translated_text: 尾巴爆炸的威胁可以有效地阻止捕食者 ， 但即使是小碰撞或跌倒也会很快结束。
secondary_translated_text: The threat of a tail explosion can effectively deter predators, but even a small collision or fall can end quickly.

original_en_text: To live only a single, bright moment... What would one feel? Is it glorious, or only despair? Or could it be both, mixed equal?
original_zh_text: 生命仅有瞬息的璀璨——它们会感到辉煌还是绝望？抑或是二者交织？
translated_text: 活在最光明的时刻 ， 是荣耀还是绝望 ？你能把两者结合起来吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Is it glory or despair to live in the brightest moment? Can you combine the two?

original_en_text: Though their mind is largely lost their skill with a chain has not been forgotten. Does the Haunting eternally bind a bug to the task it had in life?
original_zh_text: 锁链破空之声依旧精准狠厉——丝咒是否将生前的执念化作了死后的永恒苦役？
translated_text: 虽然他们的精神几乎消失了 ， 但他们使用锁链的能力并没有被遗忘。你能把这个错误变成一辈子的工作吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Although their spirits had almost disappeared, their ability to use chains had not been forgotten. Can you turn this mistake into a lifetime's work?

original_en_text: Angered, adult Beastfly with a weighty body and a thickened hardshell mask.
original_zh_text: 暴怒的成年兽蝇，身形沉重，戴着厚重面甲。
translated_text: 一个邪恶的成年人爬上天空 ， 戴着一个巨大的厚面具。
secondary_translated_text: An evil adult climbed into the sky wearing a huge thick mask.

original_en_text: Young, bony bug that can curl its body to form a ball.
original_zh_text: 能蜷缩成球形的小型骨虫。
translated_text: 年轻的骨甲虫可以圆形身体形成球体。
secondary_translated_text: Young bone beetles can round their bodies into spheres.

translated_text: 火的父亲。
secondary_translated_text: Father of Fire.

translated_text: 关于 Toz
secondary_translated_text: About Toz

original_en_text: So close to a perfect furred form... If only they’d been able to breed out the spines.
original_zh_text: 近乎完美的毛茸形态，唯有背刺未去除。改造自然的尝试总是难以尽善尽美。
translated_text: 接近完美的皮肤形状。假如荆棘能生长，
secondary_translated_text: Close to perfect skin shape. If thorns could grow,

original_en_text: Bulky worm of the deepest depths. Lives in tight crevices and uses its weighty body to batter.
original_zh_text: 栖息狭窄裂隙的厚重蠕虫，以沉重身躯撞击敌人。
translated_text: 最大的就是生活在狭窄的空间里 ， 面对着沉重的身体。
secondary_translated_text: The biggest thing is living in a narrow space and facing a heavy body.

original_en_text: Crazed fanatic able to guide Pharloom’s haunted Silk by music played upon it.
original_zh_text: 癫狂的信徒，通过演奏音乐操控纺络的诅咒灵丝。
translated_text: 粉丝们可以通过播放音乐来控制老鹰的丝绸幽灵。
secondary_translated_text: Fans can control the eagle's silk ghost by playing music.

translated_text: 瓦尔特姆 （瓦尔特姆）
secondary_translated_text: Waltem (Waltem)

translated_text: 克莱夫 （Clive）
secondary_translated_text: Clive

original_en_text: There is old anguish bound upon these threads, the result of countless cruel procedures.
original_zh_text: 这些丝线承载着古老痛楚，源自无数残酷改造手术。
translated_text: 这些线索与古老的苦难有关 ， 这是无数残酷程序的结果。
secondary_translated_text: These clues are related to ancient suffering, the result of countless cruel procedures.

original_en_text: Rare, enormous Skull Scuttler. The Marrow’s largest predator, and the most feared for its ferocious temperament.
original_zh_text: 罕见的巨型头骨潜行者，髓骨洞窟的顶级掠食者，以凶暴性情令凡虫闻风丧胆。
translated_text: 骨髓中最大的捕食者也是最危险的 ， 因为它的凶猛性质。
secondary_translated_text: The largest predator in the bone marrow is also the most dangerous because of its ferocious nature.

original_en_text: Full-grown former pilgrim serving the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 侍奉圣堡的前朝圣者，体型发生过异变。
translated_text: 在城堡里长大的男人。
secondary_translated_text: A man who grew up in a castle.

original_en_text: Lord and justice of Pharloom’s craws. Delivers death to condemned bugs with his steel-plated beak.
original_zh_text: 执掌腐囊虫庭生杀大权的审判者，用其镀钢长喙对有罪的虫子执行死刑。
translated_text: 法老 ， 贪婪和正义的主 ， 在铁嘴的帮助下杀死了罪恶的昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: Pharaoh, the Lord of greed and justice, killed the evil insects with the help of iron mouth.

translated_text: 我留着空白的胡须。
secondary_translated_text: I have a blank beard.

translated_text: 消防飞行员。
secondary_translated_text: Fire pilot.

original_en_text: Rarely seen beetle that spends most of its life nestled deep in bone and rock. The Flintgems on its shell excrete an explosive powder.
