original_zh_text: 深藏岩骨深处的稀有甲虫，甲壳嵌满燧晶并分泌爆炸性体液。
translated_text: 这种不寻常的甲虫大部分时间都在骨骼和石头深处度过 ， 而克里姆林宫外壳中的宝石则会释放爆炸性粉尘。
secondary_translated_text: The unusual beetle spends most of its time deep in bones and stones, while gems in the Kremlin's shell release explosive dust.

original_en_text: Disgusting both in manner and stench. I feel no remorse to see them felled.
original_zh_text: 它们浑身散发着腐殖质恶臭，甲壳缝隙间还粘着陈年血痂。每当那对复眼在牢狱阴影中亮起，连最凶悍的囚徒都会瑟缩墙角。
translated_text: 我不喜欢它的味道和形状 ， 我不后悔失去它。
secondary_translated_text: I don't like the taste and shape of it, and I don't regret losing it.

translated_text: 朝圣者与翅膀。
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrims and wings.

original_en_text: Pharloom proves often the effectiveness of bells as weapons. Never before had I considered them as such.
original_zh_text: 纺络总在提醒我——钟亦可为兵器。只是从前，我从未想过这些圣器会被如此亵用。
translated_text: 法罗曾多次证明物种作为武器的有效性 ， 但他从来没有想过。
secondary_translated_text: Farrow has repeatedly demonstrated the effectiveness of species as a weapon, but he never thought about it.

translated_text: 蜘蛛的母亲
secondary_translated_text: Spider's mother

original_en_text: Enormous tubular beast uniquely suited to living close to the void below.
original_zh_text: 适应虚空环境的管状巨兽。
translated_text: 这种巨大的管状野兽非常适合生活在下面的洞穴附近。
secondary_translated_text: This huge tubular beast is perfect for living near the cave below.

translated_text: 塔拉乌法官
secondary_translated_text: Judge Talou

original_en_text: Old pilgrim carrying a heavy iron bell staff.
original_zh_text: 手持沉重铁制钟杖的年长领队，丝咒抹去了它昔日的权威。
translated_text: 老朝圣者手里拿着一根沉重的铁棒。
secondary_translated_text: The old pilgrim held a heavy iron bar in his hand.

translated_text: 关于飞行员。
secondary_translated_text: About pilots.

translated_text: 弗林特空军 （ Flint ）
secondary_translated_text: Flint Air Force (Flint)

original_en_text: If left to grow, these young bugs will fight for dominance until only one remains.
original_zh_text: 我曾目睹三只幼体将巢穴化作修罗场，最终胜者甲壳上插满兄弟的尖刺。这种养蛊式的成长，正是圣堡工厂默许的筛选机制。
translated_text: 当年轻的昆虫被迫成长时 ， 它们会争夺优势 ， 直到只剩下一个。
secondary_translated_text: When young insects are forced to grow, they compete for an advantage until there is only one left.

original_en_text: Living Silk commanding a dead shell... An affront to nature, and one all too common across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 活灵丝操纵死躯壳……违背自然的造物，在纺络却司空见惯。
translated_text: 用活绳子命令死贝壳是对自然的侮辱 ， 在法雷姆地区也很常见。
secondary_translated_text: Ordering dead shells with live ropes is an affront to nature and is also common in the Farem area.

translated_text: 红色鸡尾酒
secondary_translated_text: Red cocktail

translated_text: 阴影加载器 （Shadow Loader）
secondary_translated_text: Shadow Loader

translated_text: 一个有吸引力的杯子。
secondary_translated_text: An attractive cup.

translated_text: 世界的恐慌。
secondary_translated_text: The world's panic.

original_en_text: Coiled nest of charged worms. Assaults intruders with bolts of crackling electricity.
original_zh_text: 带电蠕虫团，释放霹雳闪电攻击入侵者。
translated_text: 由携带行李的昆虫组成的蛇形巢穴。他们使用爆炸性闪电攻击者。
secondary_translated_text: A snake-shaped nest of insects carrying luggage. They use explosive lightning attacks.

original_en_text: High caste bug, responsible for delivering sermons and leading prayer for those beyond the walls of the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 为低语书库墙外信众布道的高阶虫子。
translated_text: 上层阶级的蠕虫负责布道和指导那些在耳语墙之外的人的祈祷。
secondary_translated_text: The upper-class worms are responsible for preaching and guiding the prayers of those beyond the wall of whispers.

translated_text: 外科医生们，
secondary_translated_text: Surgeons,

original_en_text: Did he recognise my part played in this land’s void-strung state? If so, perhaps his judgment was not unfair. To these bugs I have brought much destruction.
original_zh_text: 若他知晓我与此地虚空缠结的关联，其裁决或许称得上公正——因我确实为腐囊虫族带来了毁灭。
translated_text: 你知道我在这个领域扮演了什么角色吗 ？如果是这样的话 ， 那么你的判断是错误的。
secondary_translated_text: Do you know what role I play in this field? If this is the case, then your judgment is wrong.

original_en_text: That incendiary material they carry is a natural wonder, with many potential applications. What a waste to carelessly throw it at me whenever I pass by.
original_zh_text: 其携带的燃烧材料堪称自然奇迹，具有多种潜在用途。每当路过就被随意投掷袭击，这等浪费行径实在令我扼腕。
translated_text: 温暖的材料是一个自然奇观 ， 有很多可能性。每次发生这种事 ， 你不小心把我扔进去是没有意义的。
secondary_translated_text: Warm materials are a natural wonder with many possibilities. Every time something like this happens, it makes no sense for you to accidentally throw me in.

translated_text: 来自可可的食品
secondary_translated_text: Food from cocoa

original_en_text: Not a frontline force, but in my assault upon their tower all emerge to see me stilled.
original_zh_text: 虽非主力部队，但当我进攻其高塔时，它们倾巢而出进行阻截，阵势不容小觑。
translated_text: 这不是一支前线的军队 ， 但当我攻击他们的塔时 ， 每个人都出现了 ， 看到我平静下来。
secondary_translated_text: It was not a front-line army, but when I attacked their towers, everyone showed up and saw me calm down.

translated_text: 公主 ， 公主。
secondary_translated_text: Princess, princess.

translated_text: 原名 ： The Craft
secondary_translated_text: Original name: The Craft

translated_text: Sig. Wisp （ Wisp ）
secondary_translated_text: Sig. Wisp （ Wisp ）

original_en_text: A cowardly sort. They will try to remain at range to throw their sharp weapons. Best to rush them down and cut quick.
original_zh_text: 怯战而擅长投掷攻击。最佳策略是快速近身解决。
translated_text: 这是一种懦弱。他们试图在十字路口停下来 ， 投掷锋利的武器。最好马上切掉。
secondary_translated_text: This is a kind of cowardice. They tried to stop at the intersection and threw sharp weapons. Better cut it off immediately.

original_en_text: Wide-masked aerial attacker trained to act as support for its grounded companions while remaining at range.
original_zh_text: 佩戴宽幅面甲的远程支援型飞行攻击者。
translated_text: 戴着口罩的飞行员接受过训练 ， 通过帮助地面上的同事来保持自主性。
secondary_translated_text: Pilots wearing masks are trained to maintain autonomy by helping colleagues on the ground.

original_en_text: Most likely this one’s true charge was to root out and condemn those not seen as sufficiently fervent.
original_zh_text: 表面传播教义，实为铲除异端的思想刽子手。
translated_text: 也许这个人的真正责任是根除和谴责那些似乎不活跃的人。
secondary_translated_text: Perhaps this person's real responsibility is to eradicate and condemn those who seem inactive.

translated_text: 卡亚 （ Kaia ）
secondary_translated_text: Kaia

original_en_text: Old catcher over Shellwood Pond, bearing a longpin and stricken by the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池塘的老迈捕手，手持长针，遭受丝咒之苦。
translated_text: 老接收器在舍伍德的池塘里被一个鬼魂袭击 ， 手里拿着一根长针。
secondary_translated_text: The old receiver was attacked by a ghost in Sherwood's pond with a long needle in his hand.

translated_text: 被遗弃的师父
secondary_translated_text: Abandoned master

translated_text: 斯蒂尔金的陷阱
secondary_translated_text: Stillkin's Trap

translated_text: 佩纳拉贡
secondary_translated_text: Penaragon

original_en_text: Grizzled older roach tender weighted with a lasso of heavy chain.
original_zh_text: 心智迷失的老练饲育者，挥舞沉重锁链维持虫群秩序。
translated_text: 这只毛茸茸的蟑螂被绑在一条沉重的链子上。
secondary_translated_text: The furry cockroach was tied to a heavy chain.

original_en_text: These ones somehow learnt to call and guide the scorching Wisps that share their thicket. Whether through dominance or reverence is unclear.
original_zh_text: 这些家伙不知何故掌握了操控火灵之术。他们能随心所欲地召唤并指挥它们。
translated_text: 这些生物已经学会了召唤和引导生活在丛林中的精灵。
secondary_translated_text: These creatures have learned to summon and guide elves living in the jungle.

original_en_text: He carelessly seeded these caves with that cursed substance... His final fate seems fair reward for those efforts, yet I feel some sympathy. It is an alluring power.
original_zh_text: 他肆意播撒那种禁忌物质……最终结局可谓咎由自取，但我仍有些许同情。凡虫对力量的追寻时常令我感到唏嘘。
translated_text: 他最终的命运似乎是对这些努力的公正回报 ， 但我仍然同情他。
secondary_translated_text: His ultimate fate seems to be a just reward for those efforts, but I still sympathize with him.

original_zh_text: 被珊瑚包裹的软壳生物。
translated_text: 剧透是一个柔软的外壳 ， 由珊瑚签名。
secondary_translated_text: Spoilers are a soft shell, signed by Coral.

original_en_text: To pair with another is a base instinct, and one that brings some bugs great joy. I once sought similar union, but of my own mates none could match my lifespan.
original_zh_text: 与其他虫子结为伴侣是一种本能，是欢愉的来源。可惜我曾寻觅的伴侣都难敌岁月的变迁。
translated_text: 与他人交配是一种基本的本能 ， 也可以给昆虫带来极大的乐趣。我曾经寻求过这样的联盟 ， 但我没有一个伴侣可以与我的生活相匹配。
secondary_translated_text: Mating with others is a basic instinct and can also bring great pleasure to insects. I have sought such alliances before, but I have no partner who can match my life.

original_en_text: Song queen of the Skarr and their most talented warrior.
original_zh_text: 斯卡尔一族的歌后，并且是族史上最具天赋的战士。
translated_text: 歌手 Skelin 和他最有天赋的拳击手。
secondary_translated_text: Singer Skelin and his most talented boxer.

translated_text: 至于珊瑚礁 ，
secondary_translated_text: As for coral reefs,

original_en_text: For one to love another so similar to themselves, is that selfless or vain?
original_zh_text: 爱慕镜像般的另一个自己，究竟是无私还是极致的虚荣？
translated_text: 爱一个像你这样的人是自私还是虚荣 ？
secondary_translated_text: Is loving someone like you selfish or vain?

original_en_text: A crude construct of my father’s fallen domain. Only a fool believes that void can be fashioned to do their bidding.
original_zh_text: 我父亲陨落国度的粗劣造物。只有愚者才会相信虚空可被驾驭。
translated_text: 只有傻瓜才能在自己的指挥下创造真空。
secondary_translated_text: Only a fool can create a vacuum under his own command.

translated_text: 我正在燃烧。
secondary_translated_text: I am burning.

translated_text: 伯南克。
secondary_translated_text: Bernanke.

translated_text: 盖亚 （Gaya）
secondary_translated_text: Gaya

translated_text: Shadillad （英语）
secondary_translated_text: Shadilllad (English)

translated_text: 第一次没有。
secondary_translated_text: Not the first time.

original_en_text: Short-horned bug born with underdeveloped wings.
original_zh_text: 翅膀发育不全的短角虫。
translated_text: 短角昆虫基本上有不完整的翅膀。
secondary_translated_text: Short-horned insects basically have incomplete wings.

translated_text: 疤痕卡 （ Scar Card ）
secondary_translated_text: Scar Card

original_en_text: Common bug wielding a set of old bells. The bug will fling the bells at anyone it deems still free.
original_zh_text: 挥舞旧钟的普通信徒，向未被丝咒侵蚀者投掷旧钟。
translated_text: 一只普通的昆虫会响起一个古老的钟声。这个错误是对那些仍然相信自己是自由的人的警告。
secondary_translated_text: An ordinary insect will ring an ancient bell. This mistake is a warning to those who still believe they are free.

original_en_text: Born with many tools I would once have desired for myself. Fortunately, I have trained hard around those limits.
original_zh_text: 天生具备我曾渴求的利器。所幸我通过苦练突破了自身局限。
translated_text: 我天生就有必要的工具 ， 幸运的是 ， 我在这些限制内工作。
secondary_translated_text: I was born with the necessary tools, and fortunately I worked within these limits.

original_en_text: More bother than the bug themself are the countless traps they have already laid throughout their caves.
original_zh_text: 其洞穴内遍布的陷阱比这虫子本身更令我头疼。
translated_text: 比昆虫本身更令人困惑的是洞穴中的许多陷阱。
secondary_translated_text: More confusing than the insects themselves are the many traps in the caves.

translated_text: 水化； hydration
secondary_translated_text: hydration

translated_text: 外围观察员
secondary_translated_text: Peripheral observers

original_en_text: The lethality of these bugs is unexpected. Their bodies were never built for combat. The Haunting has altered their nature dramatically.
original_zh_text: 这些本非为战斗设计的虫子竟有致命的战力，看来丝咒显著地改变了其本质。
translated_text: 细菌的死亡率是意想不到的 ， 它们的身体并不是为了战斗而设计的。
secondary_translated_text: The mortality rate of bacteria is unexpected, and their bodies are not designed to fight.

translated_text: 一个小小的告白。
secondary_translated_text: A little confession.

original_en_text: Docile bug whose wings mimic the grasses of the Far Fields. A common snack for larger predators.
original_zh_text: 温顺的飞虫，翅膀模拟原野草叶的模样。比它们大的生物基本都能把它们当作小零食来吃。
translated_text: 柔软的昆虫与翅膀模仿田野中的草。它们以大型食肉动物为食
secondary_translated_text: Soft insects and wings imitate grass in the field. They feed on large carnivores

original_en_text: Exhausted bug, grown sickly from the smog of the Underworks. The worker’s twistpins, once tools of repair, now serve as spun projectiles.
original_zh_text: 被工业废气侵蚀的抱病劳工，将维修旋针改造为投掷武器。
translated_text: 地下烟雾侵扰无助的昆虫。工人的扭转针曾经被用作维修工具 ， 现在用作旋转球。
secondary_translated_text: Underground smoke infested helpless insects. Workers 'torsion pins were once used as maintenance tools and are now used as spinning balls.

original_en_text: Humbled prisoner serving their sentence for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 服刑中的卑微囚犯，曾在圣堡中犯下罪过。
translated_text: 这个卑微的囚犯消失在他的城市犯下的罪行。
secondary_translated_text: This humble prisoner disappeared in his city for the crimes he committed.

original_en_text: Ancient heart of Shellwood, connected to all its living things.
original_zh_text: 维系甲木林万物联结的远古之心。
translated_text: Shadowwood 的灵魂与所有生物相连。
secondary_translated_text: Shadowwood's soul is connected to all living things.

original_en_text: Guide and ofttimes leader within the Citadel’s Choir.
original_zh_text: 圣堡咏者团的向导与常任领袖。
translated_text: 他是城堡合唱团的总经理和总经理。
secondary_translated_text: He is the general manager and general manager of the Castle Choir.

original_en_text: Poor of sight but possessing a keen sense of smell, it uses its bulk to charge at foreign scents. Remaining fierce so far into old age is an admirable trait.
original_zh_text: 虽视力极差却嗅觉敏锐，凭借庞大身躯冲撞陌生气味源。暮年仍保有此等凶性，着实值得敬佩。
translated_text: 它们的视力很差 ， 但它们对气味非常敏感 ， 并利用体积来吸收奇怪的气味。
secondary_translated_text: Their vision is poor, but they are very sensitive to odors and use their volume to absorb strange odors.

original_en_text: Crawling insect with a sizzling bile sack in its abdomen.
original_zh_text: 腹部携带沸腾胆汁囊的爬行虫。
translated_text: 烧伤 ， Sistafira ， 喉咙窒息在胃里
secondary_translated_text: Burns, Sistafira, choking throat in stomach

translated_text: 一艘救援船的水
secondary_translated_text: Water from a rescue boat

original_en_text: If given a chance, this one will steal Silk from any significant source, including my own shell.
original_zh_text: 一旦有机会，它会从任何来源窃取灵丝——包括我的甲壳。
translated_text: 如果他幸运的话 ， 这个人从重要来源偷走了丝绸 ， 包括我的贝壳。
secondary_translated_text: If he was lucky, this man stole silk from important sources, including my shells.

original_en_text: Mindless sack filled with Plasmium. When broken the Plasmium can be consumed for its temporary benefits to health.
original_zh_text: 装满再生液体的活体炸弹。满载生质液的无智囊虫，打破后，可使用其生质液获得暂时性的生命值。
translated_text: 一个没有大脑的人充满了血液。一旦血浆分解 ， 你可以吃它 ， 因为它有暂时的健康益处。
secondary_translated_text: A person without a brain is full of blood. Once the plasma breaks down, you can eat it because of its temporary health benefits.

original_en_text: More effective an opponent than would be guessed. The precarity of its winding domain can make even its simple assault a challenge.
original_zh_text: 在错综复杂的齿轮迷宫中，这些机械的每一次俯冲都如同死神挥镰。
translated_text: 敌人比你想象的要有效率。伤口磁场的不稳定性使得简单的攻击变得困难。
secondary_translated_text: The enemy is more efficient than you think. The instability of the wound magnetic field makes simple attacks difficult.

translated_text: 无壳 （ 无壳 ）
secondary_translated_text: Shellless (Shellless)

original_en_text: Elder Conchfly crowned with a huge coral horn. Once partnered with a mate, they will rarely be seen alone.
original_zh_text: 头戴珊瑚巨角的古老螺类，与伴侣终生形影不离。
translated_text: 一只古老的贝壳头上有一个巨大的珊瑚角。当我和我的伴侣一起工作时 ， 我不会感到孤独。
secondary_translated_text: An ancient shell has a huge coral horn on its head. When I work with my partner, I don't feel lonely.

translated_text: 利奥 · 卡拉科
secondary_translated_text: Leo Caraco

original_en_text: Drained yet dedicated labourer, wielding a coarse steel brush.
original_zh_text: 手持劣质钢刷的劳工，尽管身体已被苦役榨干，但仍孜孜不倦。
translated_text: 他是一个勤劳的工人 ， 手里拿着一把沉重的钢笔。
secondary_translated_text: He is a hard-working worker, holding a heavy pen in his hand.

original_en_text: Fierce, strong and disciplined... yet these qualities do not protect them from the Haunting. Is such a fate inevitable in these lands?
original_zh_text: 勇猛强壮，且遵守纪律……连这样的战士都无法逃脱丝咒的侵蚀，难道纺络所有生物终将堕入此劫？
translated_text: 他们强壮 ， 坚强 ， 纪律严明 ， 但这些品质并不能保护他们免受问题。
secondary_translated_text: They are strong, strong, and disciplined, but these qualities do not protect them from problems.

original_en_text: A form well suited for combat, lithe and fast. No surprise it seems to rank so high amongst its cult.
original_zh_text: 纤瘦迅捷的体态完美适配战斗，难怪能在教团中身居高位。
translated_text: 最适合战斗 ， 轻盈 ， 快速的形式。毫不奇怪 ， 他们在邪教中占据了很高的地位。
secondary_translated_text: Best for fighting, light, fast form. Not surprisingly, they occupy a high position in the cult.

translated_text: (Il雷声 ）
secondary_translated_text: (Il Thunder)

original_en_text: Winged ant hunter that strikes from the air with its bone lance.
original_zh_text: 使用骨制长矛的飞蚁猎手，擅长从空中发起突刺。
translated_text: 战斗机在空中用大炮攻击蚂蚁。
secondary_translated_text: Fighter jets attack ants with cannons in the air.

translated_text: 沙皇后 The Queen of Sand
secondary_translated_text: The Queen of Sand

original_en_text: In my home caves, when once this substance was allowed to flourish, I saw similar aberrations. This is wonder tainted strong with revulsion.
original_zh_text: 在我故土的洞穴中，当这种物质开始蔓延时，我也目睹过类似的畸变。这是一种掺杂着强烈厌恶的“奇迹”。
translated_text: 在我的洞穴中 ， 当物质被允许繁荣时 ， 我们观察到了类似的扭曲。
secondary_translated_text: In my cave, we observe similar distortions when matter is allowed to flourish.

original_en_text: Furred bug beneath a heavy bell. It has grown too large to burrow, but in maturing has developed small wings.
original_zh_text: 毛茸茸的甲虫背负着沉重钟壳，胖得钻不进地洞，倒是长出了一对小翅膀。
translated_text: 它们太大了 ， 不能进入洞穴 ， 但当它们成熟时 ， 它们会长出小翅膀。
secondary_translated_text: They are too big to enter the cave, but when they mature, they grow small wings.

original_en_text: Aerial bug of the Citadel, unarmed but for its short horn.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的飞行虫，仅凭短角作为武器。
translated_text: 飞虫没有手 ， 但角很短。
secondary_translated_text: Flying insects have no hands, but their horns are short.

original_en_text: Adult Mossmir with a fully developed stinger and hardened hide.
original_zh_text: 成年苔翼虫，具备完全发育的毒刺与坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: 成熟的头发有坚硬的皮肤
secondary_translated_text: Mature hair with hard skin

original_en_text: Motherhood is an instinct that can push creatures beyond what seems their natural limits. It turns even weaker beasts like these into formidable foes.
original_zh_text: 为母则刚的本能，总能使弱小的生物展现出骇人的攻击性。
translated_text: 母性是一种本能 ， 它将身体推向其看似自然的极限 ， 将弱小的动物变成强大的敌人。
secondary_translated_text: Motherhood is an instinct that pushes the body to its seemingly natural limits, turning weak animals into powerful enemies.

original_en_text: The remains of an aged bug were housed at the pyre’s heart. The structure suggested they wished for immolation. If so, I have seen their wish granted.
original_zh_text: 一只年迈虫子的遗骸安放在火葬堆的中心。从构造上看，它们似乎希望通过自焚来进行献祭。若真如此，我想这一愿望已经实现。
translated_text: 在一堆树的中间 ， 有一只古老的昆虫的尸体。他想烧她。如果是这样的话 ， 你会发现你的愿望已经实现。
secondary_translated_text: In the middle of a pile of trees, there is the body of an ancient insect. He wanted to burn her. If this is the case, you will find that your wish has been fulfilled.

original_en_text: Skilled ant hunter bearing blade and armour fashioned from bone.
original_zh_text: 装备骨制武器及护甲的蚁族精锐。
translated_text: 熟练的蚂蚁猎人用刀和骨骼盔甲。
secondary_translated_text: Skilled ant Hunters use knives and bone armor.

translated_text: 蒙弗罗伊 Monfroy
secondary_translated_text: Monfroy

original_en_text: To survive while storing so much searing fluid within... Before I would have believed it impossible, but Pharloom is home to many marvels.
original_zh_text: 体内存储巨量高温液体仍能存活……原以为不可能，但纺络本就充满奇迹。
translated_text: 它们在体内积累大量的热液体以求生存。曾经被认为是不可能的 ， 殖民时期的房子现在是许多奇迹的诞生地。
secondary_translated_text: They accumulate large amounts of hot liquid in their bodies to survive. Once considered impossible, colonial houses are now the birthplace of many miracles.

original_en_text: Choir commander of the High Halls, able to summon and command cogflies at a flick of their baton.
original_zh_text: 高庭咏者团统帅，挥动指挥棒即可召唤机枢蝇群。
translated_text: 在上层大厅 ， 合唱团的领导者可以举起一个光球并指挥它。
secondary_translated_text: In the upper lobby, the choir leader can hold up a light ball and direct it.

translated_text: 一个骷髅的翅膀
secondary_translated_text: The wings of a skeleton

translated_text: 朝圣者 Hopper
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrim Hopper

translated_text: 古朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: Ancient pilgrims.

translated_text: 绿巨人的朝圣之旅
secondary_translated_text: Hulk's pilgrimage

original_en_text: Masked coral drifter, grown larger than its more numerous companions.
original_zh_text: 古老的漂浮生物，体型远超同类。
translated_text: 珊瑚的面罩漂移比它的许多卫星都要高。
secondary_translated_text: Coral's mask drifts higher than many of its satellites.

original_en_text: Many-legged insect fanatically obsessed with flame.
translated_text: 昆虫被火所吸引。
secondary_translated_text: Insects are attracted by fire.

translated_text: 关于飞行员。
secondary_translated_text: About pilots.

translated_text: 最后一艘船。
secondary_translated_text: The last ship.

translated_text: 混合挖掘机
secondary_translated_text: hybrid excavator

original_en_text: Curiosity saw me answer their summons, but I shall not allow them to stall me long. I must work fast to fix my grand mistake.
original_zh_text: 好奇心驱使我响应他们的召唤，但我不会在此浪费时间——我需要尽快修正我酿成的大错。
translated_text: 很有趣 ， 我接到了一个电话 ， 但我不能让你等太久。我必须尽快纠正我所犯的错误。
secondary_translated_text: Funny, I got a phone call, but I can't keep you waiting too long. I must correct the mistake I have made as soon as possible.

translated_text: 移动 ， 移动。
secondary_translated_text: Move, move.

translated_text: Lantain 的游戏
secondary_translated_text: Lantain's game

original_en_text: A revolting creature. My shell itches at their presence. In the pens where their numbers grow vast, I am forever on edge.
original_zh_text: 肮脏恶心的生物。光是它们的存在就让我甲壳发痒。在蟑群泛滥的养殖场中，我会时刻保持警惕。
translated_text: 他是一个邪恶的生物 ， 总是在他越来越大的围栏中紧张。
secondary_translated_text: He was an evil creature, always nervous in his growing enclosure.

translated_text: Keichle 。
secondary_translated_text: Keichle 。

original_en_text: Dancing around this simple creature as it charges back and forth is the sort of game I delighted in as a child. Alas, I now have more pressing matters to attend to.
original_zh_text: 我小时候就爱逗这种笨虫，在它身边闪转腾挪，看它来回乱撞可有意思了。唉，但我现在有更紧迫的事情要处理。
translated_text: 当这个简单的生物在奔跑时 ， 跳舞是我小时候最喜欢的游戏。"
secondary_translated_text: While this simple creature was running, dancing was my favorite game as a child. "

original_en_text: Theirs seems a sad, grueling task, serving their lifetime for a Citadel unseen.
original_zh_text: 它们的工作实属可悲的苦役，为那见不到的圣堡永世效劳。
translated_text: 他们似乎是一个悲伤和复杂的职业 ， 曾经是一个看不见的城堡。
secondary_translated_text: They seem to be a sad and complex profession that was once an invisible castle.

original_en_text: Airborne relative of the grounded Skull Scuttler, found only in the Marrow’s deepest, hottest caves.
original_zh_text: 头骨潜行者的飞虫近亲，髓骨洞窟深处灼热的洞穴独有。
translated_text: 它是封闭程度的石棉的近亲 ， 只有在骨髓中最深 ， 最热的洞穴中才能找到。
secondary_translated_text: It is a close relative of confined asbestos and can only be found in the deepest and hottest caves in the bone marrow.

original_en_text: Theirs would be a high risk life, followed by a short, searing end.
original_zh_text: 这是份高危职业，它们的结局注定短暂而炽烈。
translated_text: 他们的生命处于危险之中 ， 他们将有一个短暂的燃烧的结局。
secondary_translated_text: Their lives are in danger and they will have a brief burning ending.

original_en_text: Placid native of Verdania. Its hide closely mimics the flora of its territory.
original_zh_text: 温顺的翠庭原生生物，其皮毛完美拟态栖息地的植被。
translated_text: Prassid 出生在 Vidanya 。模仿当地植物的皮肤。
secondary_translated_text: Prassid was born in Vidanya. Imitate the skin of local plants.

original_en_text: They remorselessly eliminate any pilgrim or passerby deemed impure to their sight. The countless husks, strewn on paths beside them, tell of their conclusive decisions.
original_zh_text: 他们无情地消灭任何在他们眼中被视为不洁的朝圣者或过路者。堆积在路径旁的遗骸，无声控诉着所谓"净化"的残酷。
translated_text: 他们会毫不犹豫地排除不洁的朝圣者和行人。附近街道上散落的许多子弹让他知道了他的决定。
secondary_translated_text: They will not hesitate to exclude unclean pilgrims and pedestrians. Many bullets scattered on nearby streets let him know his decision.

translated_text: 减少你的管子。
secondary_translated_text: Reduce your pipes.

original_en_text: Weak, afraid, and aware of the imminent end. I understand their desperation, but my death will not prevent the coming fall.
original_zh_text: 弱小、恐惧，知道终局将至。我懂得它们的绝望，可我的死并不能阻止即将到来的灾祸。
translated_text: 我理解他们的绝望 ， 但我的死亡不会在明年秋天停止。
secondary_translated_text: I understand their despair, but my death will not stop next fall.

original_en_text: An inspired use of steam. I must remember its construction when designing future tools.
original_zh_text: 高温蒸汽在管腔内压缩爆鸣的声响，像极了垂死者的嘶吼。这种将杀戮伪装成清洁工程的设计，着实令人胆寒。
translated_text: 我们鼓励使用双胞胎。当我们设计未来的工具时 ， 我们必须考虑它们的结构。
secondary_translated_text: We encourage twins. When we design future tools, we must consider their structure.

original_en_text: They know well their domain, lurking in wait in its byways and bogs, always ready to pounce.
original_zh_text: 它们深谙领地内的每处沼泽暗道，时刻准备伏击。
translated_text: 他们很清楚自己的领土 ， 并在街道和沼泽地守卫 ， 准备发动攻击。
secondary_translated_text: They knew their territory well and guarded the streets and swamps in preparation for an attack.

original_en_text: Husk of an alchemist’s assistant granted false life by Plasmium.
original_zh_text: 被生质液赋予虚假生命的炼金术士助手的躯壳。
translated_text: 在炼金术士助手的外壳内 ， 他从等离子体中获得了虚假的生命。
secondary_translated_text: Inside the shell of the alchemist's assistant, he gained false life from the plasma.

original_en_text: The false mask alone is frightening enough to scare away smaller pests.
original_zh_text: 光凭这个惊悚的造型就能劝退不少胆小鬼。
translated_text: 口罩本身可以防止小寄生虫的感染。
secondary_translated_text: The mask itself prevents infection by small parasites.

original_en_text: In its natural state it would avoid potential predators, but Pharloom’s Haunting now compels it to aggression. Fortunately, its jaws are ill-suited for combat.
original_zh_text: 本性畏避掠食者，然而纺络的丝咒迫使其凶性毕露。幸好它们的颚钳钝拙，不善搏杀。
translated_text: 在自然界中 ， 它们会避开潜在的捕食者 ， 但当涉及到捕食者时 ， 它们可能会变得更具侵略性。
secondary_translated_text: In nature, they avoid potential predators, but when it comes to predators, they can become more aggressive.

translated_text: 德斯纳戈 （德斯纳戈）
secondary_translated_text: Desnago (Desnago)

original_en_text: Returned to their home caves, this chef continued to devise delicacies too repulsive for any bug still sane.
original_zh_text: 回到故土的洞穴后，这位厨师依旧沉迷于研制那些令任何尚存理智的虫子都难以接受的料理。
translated_text: 回到原来的洞穴 ， 面包师继续烹饪美味的菜肴 ， 以至于昆虫总是注意到它。
secondary_translated_text: Back in the original cave, the bakers continue to cook delicious dishes, so much so that the insects always notice it.

translated_text: 三片叶子在跳舞
secondary_translated_text: Three leaves are dancing

original_en_text: Hardened warrior lord of a bygone age, able to command the coral crust to his bidding.
original_zh_text: 能号令珊瑚甲壳的远古战主。
translated_text: 曾经 ， 一个强大的军事指挥官可以执行命令并指挥珊瑚礁。
secondary_translated_text: Once upon a time, a powerful military commander could carry out orders and command coral reefs.

original_en_text: There seem no ranks in their domain, yet this one has risen above the rest. A station likely gained through intimidation and thuggery.
original_zh_text: 该领域本无等级制度，此虫却凭威胁与暴力手段上位。
translated_text: 虽然他们似乎在自己的领域没有声誉 ， 但他们的声誉比其他人更好。
secondary_translated_text: Although they seem to have no reputation in their own field, their reputation is better than others.

original_en_text: Manic fencer who delights in battle.
translated_text: 他是个喜欢战斗的人。
secondary_translated_text: He is a man who likes to fight.

original_en_text: Sightless burrower that reacts violently to the slightest sound.
original_zh_text: 失去视力却听觉敏锐的穴居虫类，最细微的声响也会引起它们激烈的反应。
translated_text: 盲人洞穴人对小噪音反应强烈。
secondary_translated_text: Blind cavemen react strongly to small noises.

original_en_text: Monarch of Pharloom, and the primal source of Silk.
original_zh_text: 纺络的君主，灵丝的源头。
translated_text: 法老谢尔卡的出生地
secondary_translated_text: The birthplace of Pharaoh Sherkar

original_en_text: These bugs have been driven out of their vault’s recesses by Pharloom’s black collapse. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 由于纺络的崩塌，这些虫子被驱赶出书库的深处。这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: 农场的黑色碎片将昆虫从胸部后部赶走。这就是问题所在 ， 我为此责备自己。
secondary_translated_text: Black debris from the farm drives the insects away from the back of the chest. That's the problem, and I blame myself for it.

translated_text: 关于 Gammond&扎耶夫 （ Zayev ）
secondary_translated_text: About Gammond&Zayev

translated_text: 关于 Mosmeyer
secondary_translated_text: About Mosmeyer

original_en_text: Flying bone mite that lives near magma. Roasts its prey by spitting scorching tar.
original_zh_text: 栖息在熔岩区的飞行螨虫，喷射高温焦油灼烧猎物。
translated_text: 骨螨生活在岩浆附近。吐出热树脂 ， 烧掉食物。
secondary_translated_text: Bone mites live near magma. Spit out hot resin and burn food.

original_en_text: Plentiful pest with a sharp proboscis and a belly full of bile.
original_zh_text: 体内充满胆汁的群居蝠虫，死亡时剧烈爆炸。
translated_text: 有很多寄生虫 ， 尖鼻子和充满胆汁的胃。
secondary_translated_text: There are many parasites, pointed noses and a stomach full of bile.

original_en_text: Small arachnid found in many crevices and caves throughout Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 纺络的岩缝和洞穴里常见的小型蜘蛛。
translated_text: 在法罗河谷和许多洞穴中发现了小蜘蛛。
secondary_translated_text: Small spiders have been found in the Faro Valley and in many caves.

original_en_text: Large worm mutated heavily by Plasmium. The creature has become fused to the roof of its cave, no longer able to move freely.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的大型蠕虫。这只生物已与所处洞穴的洞顶融合，失去了自由移动的能力。
translated_text: 寄生虫的种类从寄生虫到寄生虫不等。生物体在洞穴的顶部融化 ， 不再能够自由移动。
secondary_translated_text: The types of parasites vary from parasite to parasite. The organisms melted at the top of the cave and were no longer able to move freely.

original_en_text: Its training resembles my own, favouring fast strikes and rapid movement. Once a hunter, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 战斗风格与我的技巧相似，崇尚速攻战术。或许它们曾经也是猎手？
translated_text: 就像我的训练。我喜欢快速射击 ， 快速移动。
secondary_translated_text: Just like my training. I like to shoot quickly and move quickly.

original_en_text: What exceptional senses it possesses. It detects me with ease, even when not a single sound is made.
original_zh_text: 感知极为敏锐，哪怕分毫响动都能惊动它。
translated_text: 多么美妙的感觉啊。你可以很容易地找到它 ， 没有噪音。
secondary_translated_text: What a wonderful feeling. You can find it easily without noise.

original_en_text: Young masked worm that delights in ambushing intruders within its tunnels.
original_zh_text: 热衷隧道伏击的面甲蠕虫幼体。
translated_text: 年轻的蒙面昆虫喜欢在隧道里种坏人。
secondary_translated_text: Young masked insects like to grow bad guys in tunnels.

original_en_text: Small automaton built to work, without complaint, in the scorching heat of the Underworks’ Cauldron.
original_zh_text: 为圣堡工厂内大熔釜的酷热环境打造的小型自动机。勤勤恳恳，任劳任怨。
translated_text: 小型自动驾驶机器的设计即使在冰箱的高温下也能无怨无悔地运行。
secondary_translated_text: Small self-driving machines are designed to run without complaint even in the high temperatures of refrigerators.

original_en_text: Elder overseers of the Deep Docks, responsible for the oversight and punishment of lesser workers.
original_zh_text: 深坞地区的监工，负责监管与惩戒低级别工人。
translated_text: 深圳中央航站楼的高层管理人员将对低层工人进行监督和处罚。
secondary_translated_text: Senior management at Shenzhen Central Terminal will supervise and punish lower-level workers.

original_en_text: Drifting creature with a wide coral mask and hard proboscis to stab its prey.
original_zh_text: 戴着宽大珊瑚面甲的漂流生物，使用坚硬的长喙攻击自投罗网的猎物。
translated_text: 浮游生物使用巨大的珊瑚面具和长长的硬鼻子来咀嚼食物。
secondary_translated_text: Plankton uses huge coral masks and long hard noses to chew food.

translated_text: 我是加拉加斯。
secondary_translated_text: I am Caracas.

translated_text: 冈萨雷斯 / 拉扎
secondary_translated_text: Gonzalez/Raza

original_en_text: The feeder’s curled pin looks designed to keep ravenous roaches at bay, and the tender from turning into the meal.
original_zh_text: 那柄弯钩长针的设计堪称精妙— 既能防止饥渴的蟑螂反将饲主当作美餐，又可随时给不听话的 "宠物" 放血。
translated_text: 甲虫身上覆盖的针似乎可以防止贪婪的甲虫成为猎物。
secondary_translated_text: The needles covered in beetles seem to prevent greedy beetles from becoming prey.

translated_text: Tsang 的 Plasma
secondary_translated_text: Tsang's Plasma

original_en_text: A creature born of a bug’s desperate hope for strength. Few possess the skill to call the void, and of those that can, none possess the means to tame it.
original_zh_text: 某只虫子在绝望中极度渴求力量，诞生出了此造物。能召唤虚空的虫子已寥寥无几，而在它们之中，更无虫子能真正驯服虚空。
translated_text: 很少有人有能力创造真空 ， 而那些有权力的人没有能力驯服真空。
secondary_translated_text: Few people have the ability to create a vacuum, and those with power do not have the ability to tame the vacuum.

original_en_text: Dark-furred bug protecting itself with a spiked coral nut.
original_zh_text: 以带刺珊瑚坚果自卫的深色绒毛甲虫。
translated_text: 深色头发的昆虫用短珊瑚果实保护自己。
secondary_translated_text: Dark-haired insects protect themselves with short coral fruits.

original_en_text: Thick-plated scuttler that prefers high places.
original_zh_text: 偏好占据制高点的厚甲虫，从口中倾泻灼热酸雨。
translated_text: 苏格兰人喜欢大个子。
secondary_translated_text: Scots love big people.

translated_text: 塞斯 ， 圣殿的守护者。
secondary_translated_text: Seth, keeper of the temple.

original_en_text: Drained worker on the verge of collapse. Consumed by the Haunting, they continue to work far beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的濒死劳工，超越生理极限持续劳作。
translated_text: 无能为力的工人正处于崩溃的边缘。他们对这种混乱感到愤怒 ， 并继续超越他们的极限。
secondary_translated_text: Helpless workers are on the verge of collapse. They are angry at the chaos and continue to push their limits.

original_en_text: Cunning bug that hunts with darts fashioned from stake and bile.
original_zh_text: 用尖桩与胆汁制作毒镖的狡诈虫子。
translated_text: 他们用指甲和胆汁制成的箭头猎杀隐藏的昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: They use arrows made of nails and bile to hunt hidden insects.

original_en_text: The void that will claim all things... In the barbed forms it chooses its nature can be seen clear.
original_zh_text: 吞噬万物的虚空本质，于此狰狞形态显露无遗。
translated_text: 他们的性质表现在他们选择的脊柱的形状。
secondary_translated_text: Their nature is reflected in the shape of the spine they choose.

original_en_text: Cogwork construct forged primarily for the Core’s protection. Bears a shield and poke-pin, and possesses a lethal understanding of their use.
original_zh_text: 持盾佩枪的核心守卫机械，具备战术应变能力。
translated_text: 该装置的结构主要用于保护核心。他拿起盾牌和针头 ， 他明白了他的致命目的。
secondary_translated_text: The structure of the device is mainly used to protect the core. He picked up the shield and needle, and he understood his fatal purpose.

translated_text: 新日记。
secondary_translated_text: New diary.

translated_text: 被偷的画。
secondary_translated_text: Stolen paintings.

translated_text: 尼尔斯 （ Nils ）
secondary_translated_text: Nils

original_en_text: Small bony bug that favours dark tunnels. Can expand its spiked carapace to ward against attacking predators.
original_zh_text: 喜欢待在阴暗隧道的硬壳虫，遇到危险时会突然炸开背刺。
translated_text: 喜欢隧道的小虫子。它尖锐的外壳可以膨胀以避免捕食者的攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Little bugs who love tunnels. Its sharp shell can expand to avoid predators.

translated_text: 犀牛的角。
secondary_translated_text: The horns of a rhinoceros.

original_en_text: Their sharp cleaning implement is as filthy as the rest of the place. They only layer grime on grime.
original_zh_text: 他们的清洁工具与周遭同样污秽，这样打扫只会越来越脏。
translated_text: 他们的锋利的清洁工具和其他地方一样脏。他们只是把土壤分层在土壤表面。
secondary_translated_text: Their sharp cleaning tools are as dirty as anywhere else. They just layer the soil on the soil surface.

original_en_text: High standing insect of the Choir, bearing a bow. This elite Reed has been trained and fed beyond its smaller fellows.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团中地位崇高的虫子，持弓而立。比起普通的簧片战士，这位精英成员受过更严格的训练，也享有更丰盛的供养。
translated_text: 那只昆虫站在一根弓上 ， 手里拿着弓。除了他们的小伙伴外 ， 这个精英团队还训练和教育他们。
secondary_translated_text: The insect was standing on a bow, holding the bow in its hand. In addition to their little friends, this elite team also trains and educates them.

original_en_text: It lies low to the ground, perhaps out of reverence for its task, but can spring up suddenly to attack. Its shear makes for a deadly weapon with surprising reach.
original_zh_text: 那柄形似剪枝钳的武器，既能精准剥离甲壳中的灵丝脉络，也能在瞬间绞碎试图逃逸的灵魂残片。
translated_text: 你可能躺在地板上 ， 履行你的使命 ， 但突然他们攻击你。他的组织是一个令人惊讶的致命武器。
secondary_translated_text: You may be lying on the floor, fulfilling your mission, but suddenly they attack you. His organization is an amazingly lethal weapon.

original_en_text: Small automaton with a shielded shell, intended to carry loads of dangerous flintflame.
original_zh_text: 配备防护甲壳的小型自动机，负责运输危险的燧焰。
translated_text: 带有危险火焰运输保护壳的小型自动装置
secondary_translated_text: Small automatic device with hazardous flame transport protective casing

original_en_text: They too seek the spectre at the Haunting’s heart, though I fear that foe would pose a challenge beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 他们同样在寻找那丝咒之源的幽魂——只是我担心，我们共同的敌人是超越凡虫极限的存在，恐怕不是他们所能应对的。
translated_text: 他们仍然在鬼魂的心中寻找鬼魂 ， 但他们担心这些敌人可能会带来超越国界的挑战。
secondary_translated_text: They are still searching for ghosts in their hearts, but they fear that these enemies may pose challenges that transcend national boundaries.

original_en_text: Defeat {0} more to complete the hunter’s notes.
original_zh_text: 再击败{0}只以解锁猎手的笔记。
translated_text: 他输了。{0}添加内容为猎人笔记。
secondary_translated_text: He lost.{0}Add content as hunter notes.

translated_text: 记忆里的女人。
secondary_translated_text: The woman in memory.

original_en_text: Nesting creature that fuses its face with sharpened coral.
original_zh_text: 将面部与珊瑚融为一体的巢居生物。
translated_text: 巢中的生物将脸部与尖锐的珊瑚混合。
secondary_translated_text: Creatures in the nest mix their faces with sharp coral.

original_en_text: The moss looks to grow even inside their stomach, which the pilgrim spits at foes in compressed gobs. A foul form of offence.
original_zh_text: 苔藓甚至在其胃囊内滋长，被压缩成团的腐殖质带着刺鼻腥气——这恐怕是纺络最肮脏的远程武器。
translated_text: 苔藓似乎生长在山顶上 ， 朝圣者向敌人吐痰 ， 形成压缩的粘液。
secondary_translated_text: Moss appears to grow on hilltops, and pilgrims spit on enemies, forming compressed mucus.

original_en_text: Rare automaton intended to perform the ringing of bells and cymbals in the depths of the Core.
original_zh_text: 专为敲击钟钹设计的稀有自动机。
translated_text: 这是一种罕见的机器 ， 可以敲钟和钟声。
secondary_translated_text: This is a rare machine that can ring and chime bells.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, elevated above other pilgrims, and forced to cowl their face forever more.
original_zh_text: 蒙面的高阶信徒，地位远超普通朝圣者。
translated_text: 长着角的小丑总是比其他朝圣者更谦卑。
secondary_translated_text: Horned clowns are always more humble than other pilgrims.

original_en_text: Pharloom’s structures seem almost built for them. The endless corners and cracks, so perfect for mites to burrow and nest.
original_zh_text: 纺络的建筑结构仿佛为其量身打造，这里有无尽的角落和缝隙供螨虫打洞筑巢。
translated_text: 法老的建筑主要是为他们建造的。无尽的角落和裂缝是螨巢的理想选择。
secondary_translated_text: The pharaohs 'buildings were mainly built for them. Endless corners and cracks are ideal for mite nests.

original_en_text: Flighted creature formed from coldshard. If shattered it will quickly reform.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的飞行生物，破碎后可以迅速重组。
translated_text: 飞行生物是由冷垃圾制成的 ， 一旦被摧毁 ， 就可以重建。
secondary_translated_text: Flying creatures are made from cold garbage and can be rebuilt once destroyed.

original_en_text: In every land, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One must be wary always.
original_zh_text: 不论在哪一片土地上，万物皆有巧妙的伪装法门，行走此间当时刻保持警觉。
translated_text: 在每个国家 ， 生物们都会找到新的和令人惊讶的伪装方式。一个人应该时刻警惕。
secondary_translated_text: In every country, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One should always be vigilant.

original_en_text: Aggressive winged bug of the lowlands. When angered, it rapidly whips its bladed tail as a weapon.
original_zh_text: 低地区域的暴躁飞虫，一生气就把带刃的尾巴甩成风车。
translated_text: 当它们在低地引起昆虫攻击时 ， 它们会立即使用刀片和尾巴作为武器。
secondary_translated_text: When they cause insect attacks in lowlands, they immediately use blades and tails as weapons.

original_en_text: Young ant hunter wielding sickles carved from teeth. Will often call for aid if danger comes close.
original_zh_text: 使用兽牙镰刀的年轻蚁族猎手，遇险时会呼叫支援。
translated_text: 年轻的蚂蚁猎人被骗了。当危险来临时 ， 他们经常寻求帮助。
secondary_translated_text: The young ant hunter was deceived. When danger comes, they often seek help.

original_en_text: Overgrown elder, able to spawn burning bubbles from within its coral-cased shell.
original_zh_text: 与珊瑚融合的长老巨虫，能从甲壳内喷发炽热气泡。
translated_text: 一旦被感染 ， BlackBerry 会在其珊瑚壳中产生燃烧的气泡。
secondary_translated_text: Once infected, BlackBerry produces burning bubbles in its coral shell.

translated_text: 总理宣布 ... ...
secondary_translated_text: The Prime Minister announced... ...

original_en_text: Imposing old insect nesting in the heights of Shellwood. Her command of twig and branch ensured no pilgrim ever survived within her territory.
original_zh_text: 盘踞甲木林高处的碎裂者女王，掌控树丛枝干屠尽领地内所有朝圣者。
translated_text: 他对军队的控制确保了他的领土上没有朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: His control of the army ensured that there were no pilgrims in his territory.

original_en_text: This bug’s fusion with the crust-growth... It seems intentional, though I imagine the union is far from comfortable.
original_zh_text: 这种融合看似自主选择，但其过程必定充满痛苦。
translated_text: 蠕虫的融合和贝壳的生长。这似乎是故意的 ， 但我认为工会对此并不满意。
secondary_translated_text: The fusion of worms and the growth of shells. It seems intentional, but I don't think the union is happy with it.

original_en_text: Born and built only to work until time stiffens its limbs. Perhaps it is mercy this construct knows nothing of the freedom it lacks.
original_zh_text: 生来只是为了劳作，直到岁月令它四肢僵硬。也许它对自己所缺失的自由一无所知，这反倒是一种仁慈。
translated_text: 他们出生 ， 被迫工作 ， 直到时间使他们的手和脚变硬 ， 也许结构不知道他们没有的自由是仁慈的。
secondary_translated_text: They were born and forced to work until time hardened their hands and feet, and perhaps the structure did not know that the freedom they did not have was benevolent.

translated_text: 关于 moss
secondary_translated_text: About moss

translated_text: 夫人 ， 走吧！
secondary_translated_text: Ma 'am, let's go!

original_en_text: Warrior cartographer of a tribe from Pharloom’s edge. Her skills in battle could challenge the kingdom’s best.
original_zh_text: 纺络边陲部落的勇士制图师，其战力在纺络可谓数一数二。
translated_text: 他是一个来自边境农场部落的地图战士 ， 拥有足够的战斗能力来挑战王国的顶峰。
secondary_translated_text: He is a map warrior from the Border Farm Tribe with enough fighting ability to challenge the pinnacle of the kingdom.

translated_text: Cogwork Crawler （ 英语 ： Cogwork Crawler ）
secondary_translated_text: Cogwork crawler

original_en_text: Once one of Pharloom’s favoured bugs, and yet their domain and their shells would have been the first to fall to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 曾经纺络的荣光加身者，却成为首批丝咒受害者。
translated_text: 再一次 ， 亲爱的虫子 ， 它的田野和树皮 ， 第一次落入鬼魂的手中。
secondary_translated_text: Once again, dear insect, its fields and bark, fell into the hands of a ghost for the first time.

original_en_text: Hidden amongst their tower’s matching crust, these smaller bugs would have survived and thrived.
original_zh_text: 这些小虫子依靠伪装得以繁衍生息。
translated_text: 这些小昆虫隐藏在塔的外壳中 ， 并且可以存活和繁殖。
secondary_translated_text: These small insects are hidden in the shell of the tower and can survive and reproduce.

original_en_text: This one lived long and fed much. The wood will be much safer for their slaying.
original_zh_text: 她存活久远且吞噬无数，诛杀她将使丛林安全倍增。
translated_text: 最好在森林里杀死他们。
secondary_translated_text: Better to kill them in the forest.

translated_text: 我开始大喊大叫。
secondary_translated_text: I started shouting.

original_en_text: They once teemed around their tower, in numbers immense. It is a rare chance to witness such a bountiful display of life.
original_zh_text: 其数量曾经可谓铺天盖地。目睹此等生命奇观的机会已越发稀少。
translated_text: 他们聚集在塔周围 ， 这是一个宝贵的机会 ， 离开奢侈的生活。
secondary_translated_text: They gathered around the tower, a precious opportunity to escape the luxurious life.

translated_text: 加拉加斯的鸡尾酒
secondary_translated_text: Cocktails in Caracas

original_en_text: Burrower that nests in the Bellvein and seeks out hard bells to protects its soft body.
original_zh_text: 在钟脉内部打洞栖息的毛球状虫类，专门找硬钟壳当作盔甲。
translated_text: 尼安德特人发现了坚硬的山峰 ， 并在海豚上筑巢以保护他们柔软的身体。
secondary_translated_text: Neanderthals discovered hard peaks and built nests on dolphins to protect their soft bodies.

original_en_text: It is easy to be caught off-guard by the ricocheting trajectory of its flung mask, especially in tight corners.
original_zh_text: 投掷面甲的反弹轨迹难以预判。在狭窄空间尤其需要提防其袭击。
translated_text: 特别是在近距离拍摄中 ， 很容易失去他画的面具的踪迹。
secondary_translated_text: Especially in close shots, it is easy to lose trace of the mask he drew.

original_en_text: Time allowed their shell to grow thick, all the better for battering their targets.
original_zh_text: 岁月让它们的甲壳变得厚重，能更轻易地猛击目标。
translated_text: 时间将加厚他们的外壳 ， 并将附着在更高的目标上。
secondary_translated_text: Time will thicken their shell and will attach itself to higher goals.

translated_text: 自主厨师
secondary_translated_text: Independent chef

translated_text: 医生。卡茨。
secondary_translated_text: Doctor. Katz.

original_en_text: Arachnid that nestles within dark holes in cavern roofs. Pounces on prey from far above.
original_zh_text: 隐藏在洞顶暗处的蜘蛛，擅长从高处一跃而下，偷袭猎物。
translated_text: 蜘蛛生活在洞穴顶部的黑洞中 ， 飞向远处的猎物。
secondary_translated_text: Spiders live in black holes at the top of the cave, flying towards distant prey.

translated_text: 标签 ： Kindle
secondary_translated_text: Tag: Kindle

original_en_text: A monster in the classic form of tales from youth. Its slaying was done as much by my fierce travelling companion as by myself.
original_zh_text: 童谣所述的经典魔物形态。此次诛杀多靠了我那勇猛的旅伴。
translated_text: 一个典型的年轻怪物 ， 被我和我可怕的同伴们杀死了。"
secondary_translated_text: A typical young monster, killed by me and my terrible companions. "

translated_text: 母亲马特
secondary_translated_text: Mother Matt

original_en_text: Passively waits for prey to blunder into its path. A technique that should not necessarily be derided. Whatever is effective is best.
original_zh_text: 静静等待猎物误入其攻击范围。看似消极的捕猎方式，往往能收获意外成效。
translated_text: 当地雷突然袭击他的道路时 ， 他被动地等待着。技术不应该被削减。最有效率的人是最好的。
secondary_translated_text: He passively waited when local thunder suddenly attacked his road. Technology should not be cut. The most efficient people are the best.

original_en_text: My unique shell can resist the darker deformations of this substance, but even I have limits...
original_zh_text: 我的甲壳虽能抵抗此物质带来的畸变，但承受力终有极限。
translated_text: 我独特的外层可以抵抗这种材料的黑暗变形 ， 但它也有局限性。
secondary_translated_text: My unique outer layer resists the dark deformation of this material, but it also has limitations.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger dyed black in mourning at their land’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 大地倾覆之际，绝望哀叫的黑色食腐虫。
translated_text: 当地板倒塌时 ， 尖叫的丧葬者被漆成黑色。
secondary_translated_text: When the floor fell, the screaming funeral people were painted black.

translated_text: 空中翼 （ 空中区 ）
secondary_translated_text: Air wing (air area)

original_en_text: Amazingly, the creature carries the void’s black liquid in its stomach, violently spraying it forth if threatened.
original_zh_text: 神奇的是，它竟能将虚空黑液储于胃中，受威胁时剧烈喷吐攻击。
translated_text: 令人惊讶的是 ， 这种生物的腹部充满了黑色液体 ， 当受到威胁时 ， 它会剧烈呕吐。
secondary_translated_text: Surprisingly, the creature's abdomen is filled with black liquid, and when threatened, it vomits violently.

original_en_text: A critical member of the larger flock. Without them present the Kai would be fast driven to extinction by larger predators.
original_zh_text: 它们是族群存续的关键——当凯旋转尖角筑起防御阵时，连髓骨洞窟的暴君都要暂避锋芒。
translated_text: 没有它们 ， 它们很快就会被大型捕食者灭绝。
secondary_translated_text: Without them, they would soon be extinct by large predators.

original_en_text: Strong bug replete with rosaries. If angered they will whip their strings in a ceaseless onslaught.
original_zh_text: 缠满念珠的强壮虫子，发怒时会挥舞珠串猛攻。
translated_text: 强大的虫子充满了玫瑰。如果我生气了 ， 我会继续工作。
secondary_translated_text: Powerful insects are full of roses. If I get angry, I will keep working.

original_en_text: To subsist on the sickly water in this fetid environment it spits out the most toxic elements. Over generations, this former survival technique has turned into an effective hunting tool.
original_zh_text: 过滤毒液的生存机制经代际演化，成为高效的狩猎手段。
translated_text: 清除最有毒的元素 ， 以便在如此困难的环境中生存。经过几代人的努力 ， 这种生存技术已经成为一种有效的狩猎工具。
secondary_translated_text: Remove the most toxic elements to survive in such a difficult environment. After generations of efforts, this survival technology has become an effective hunting tool.

translated_text: 你有缺点吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Do you have shortcomings?

translated_text: 巨大的石榴种子。
secondary_translated_text: Huge pomegranate seeds.

translated_text: 作者 Horn Psales
secondary_translated_text: Written by Horn Psales

original_en_text: Far more hostile than their younger companions but seemingly less likely to roam far from their nest.
original_zh_text: 看似凶暴，实为恋巢的保守派。
translated_text: 它们比年轻的同伴更具敌意 ， 但很少离开巢穴。
secondary_translated_text: They are more hostile than their younger companions, but rarely leave the nest.

translated_text: 课程之角
secondary_translated_text: Course Corner

original_en_text: Depressed thespian, consumed by the melancholy of a collapsing world.
original_zh_text: 被世界的崩解压垮的消沉演员。
translated_text: 抑郁的演员被世界崩溃的黑暗所笼罩。
secondary_translated_text: The depressed actor is shrouded in the darkness of world collapse.

original_en_text: Once exulted chef, exiled from the Citadel for repeated culinary crimes.
original_zh_text: 曾经备受赞誉的大厨，却因屡次触犯烹饪禁忌而被逐出圣堡。
translated_text: 一个同性恋厨师因为一系列的烹饪违规行为而被赶出城堡。
secondary_translated_text: A gay chef has been kicked out of the castle for a series of cooking violations.

original_en_text: Feeble servant of the Underworks with a long twistpin and hard shell.
original_zh_text: 手持长柄旋针的虚弱硬甲劳工。
translated_text: 软弱的仆人穿着披肩和硬毯子。
secondary_translated_text: The weak servant wore shawls and hard blankets.

original_en_text: Starved servant of the Slab, bearing a hooked longpin.
original_zh_text: 饥肠辘辘的罪石牢狱仆从，手持钩形长针。
translated_text: 饥饿的石头仆人手里拿着一根长针。
secondary_translated_text: The hungry stone servant held a long needle in his hand.

translated_text: 拉娜的树叶
secondary_translated_text: Lana's leaves

original_en_text: Spherical, winged automaton housing many sharp spikes.
original_zh_text: 装载尖刺的球型飞行自动机，防御功能存疑。
translated_text: 机枪 ， 里面有球形的翅膀和许多锋利的尖刺。
secondary_translated_text: Machine gun with spherical wings and many sharp spikes inside.

original_en_text: Their plump, round shape makes them well-suited for target practice. Difficult to resist testing my aim on them...
original_zh_text: 圆滚滚的身材十分适合用作靶子，不拿来练手都可惜……
translated_text: 它又厚又圆 ， 是射击练习的完美选择。“很难抵制我的目标的考验。"
secondary_translated_text: It is thick and round, making it a perfect choice for shooting practice. "It's hard to resist the test of my goals. "

original_en_text: Elder Drapefly grown big from age and consumption. Its heavy body allows it to hit much harder than its younger companions.
original_zh_text: 年迈体硕的帷虫，沉重的身躯赋予其强劲的冲击力。
translated_text: 旧船随着年龄和努力而增长 ， 重型船体可能比年轻的朋友更难对抗。
secondary_translated_text: Old ships grow with age and effort, and heavy hulls may be more difficult to fight against than younger friends.

translated_text: 葡萄酒。
secondary_translated_text: Wine.

original_en_text: Final arbiter of the Blasted Steps, tasked to ensure only the sinless ever step beyond the Grand Gate.
original_zh_text: 蚀阶的最终裁决者，确保唯有无罪者能跨越巨扉圣门。
translated_text: 爆炸阶段的最终调解人的任务是确保只有无辜的人才能通过大门。
secondary_translated_text: The task of the ultimate mediator in the bombing phase is to ensure that only innocent people get through the gate.

original_en_text: This one chose to embrace the doom to come. I shall not share such easy surrender.
original_zh_text: 他选择臣服于灾难的降临，我绝不会效仿这种懦弱行径。
translated_text: 他决心接受他的命运 ， 而我很容易放弃。
secondary_translated_text: He was determined to accept his destiny, and I gave up easily.

translated_text: 吃手表的人
secondary_translated_text: Watch eater

original_en_text: Gentle glider of Mount Fay. Its downy wings and cowl allow it to resist even the most cutting cold.
original_zh_text: 费耶山的温顺滑翔者，其绒翼可抵御极寒。
translated_text: 柔软的山地植物柔软的翅膀和腰带可以承受最冷的寒冷。
secondary_translated_text: Soft mountain plants with soft wings and belts can withstand the coldest cold.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled charger relying on weight and strength.
translated_text: 重型刚性装载机 ， 取决于重量和强度。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy duty rigid loaders depend on weight and strength.

original_en_text: This one’s husk held a masterful talent, to weave Silk into blazing runes. Throughout my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Was she the first to hone such skills?
original_zh_text: 其躯壳曾掌握将灵丝编织为燃烧符文的绝技。纵观我毕生所见的各类符文，她或是这项技艺的开山鼻祖？
translated_text: 人类有编织火链的天赋。我在我的生活中看到了很多龙。这是你第一次学习这种技术吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Human beings have the gift of weaving chains of fire. I have seen many dragons in my life. Is this your first time learning this technology?

translated_text: ghost 是什么意思
secondary_translated_text: What does ghost mean?

original_en_text: This one disturbs me... There is something in its simplicity. Do I almost feel fear?
original_zh_text: 这东西令我感到不安……其纯粹性中蕴含某种诡异的特质。我竟然感到一丝恐惧？
translated_text: 她担心他们。你害怕这种简单吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: She was worried about them. Are you afraid of this simplicity?

translated_text: 唱诗班鼓掌。
secondary_translated_text: The choir applauded.

translated_text: “我对陪审团感到失望。
secondary_translated_text: "I am disappointed with the jury.

original_en_text: Myth made real in memory. The creature seemed completely at one with the flora around it. Did it ever truly exist as I have seen it?
original_zh_text: 传说中的生物在忆境中成为了现实，与周遭植物浑然一体。我所见到的一切，真的曾经存在过吗？
translated_text: 神话是记忆中的真理。这种生物似乎与周围的植物完全融合在一起。它存在 ， 正如你所看到的。
secondary_translated_text: Myths are truth in memory. The creature appears to be completely integrated with the surrounding plants. It exists, as you can see.

original_en_text: Simple. Graceful. Another fine bug lost forever from these lands.
original_zh_text: 简约而优雅。又一个永远从这片土地消失的美丽物种。
translated_text: 另一个奇怪的昆虫从地球上永远消失了。
secondary_translated_text: Another strange insect has disappeared from the earth forever.

translated_text: 暴君 Skelton
secondary_translated_text: Tyrant Skelton

original_en_text: His desire to see Pharloom saved may have been well intentioned, but he seemed quite happy for others to die upon the stage in pursuit of his goal.
original_zh_text: 他拯救纺络的愿望或许出于善意，但为实现目标似乎乐于目睹他人在舞台上殒命。
translated_text: 他可能想拯救他的农场 ， 但他很高兴其他人当场死亡 ， 以推进他的事业。
secondary_translated_text: He may want to save his farm, but he is happy that others died instantly to advance his career.

translated_text: 加维多 （ 加维多 ）
secondary_translated_text: Gavido (Gavido)

original_en_text: Brave worker carrying unstable flintflame and wearing a heavy bell to protect against potential ignition.
original_zh_text: 运输燧焰的工虫。燧焰性质不稳定，所以它们需要佩戴重型防爆钟罩。
translated_text: 勇敢的工人携带不稳定的易燃物质 ， 并穿着沉重的铃铛以防止烧伤。
secondary_translated_text: Brave workers carry unstable flammable substances and wear heavy bells to prevent burns.

original_en_text: Its bright gems could be used to make beautiful, but short-lived jewellery. An amusing idea for a gift... or a trap.
original_zh_text: 每次甲壳碰撞都会迸发火星，这使得它们的巢穴成了行走的火药库。
translated_text: 闪亮的珠宝可以用来制作漂亮但持久的珠宝。
secondary_translated_text: Shiny jewelry can be used to make beautiful but lasting jewelry.

original_en_text: Small burrowing ant, servant to the larger Skarr.
original_zh_text: 为大型斯卡尔蚁服务的小个子掘地工。
translated_text: 蚂蚁和大骷髅的仆人在一个小洞穴。
secondary_translated_text: Ants and servants of the big skeleton are in a small cave.

original_en_text: Heavy, hairy jailer responsible for capturing sinners and punishing prisoners.
original_zh_text: 厚重的多毛蝇虫，负责抓捕罪犯和惩戒囚犯。
translated_text: 他们是一个沉重而软的警卫 ， 抓住罪犯 ， 惩罚囚犯。
secondary_translated_text: They are a heavy, soft guard, catching criminals and punishing prisoners.

original_en_text: Small fluttering creature capable of defending itself with its small stinger.
original_zh_text: 小型飞虫，使用自身毒刺进行攻击。
translated_text: 这个小飞行生物可以用一根小针保护自己。
secondary_translated_text: This little flying creature can protect itself with a small needle.

original_en_text: Agile bug of Pharloom, its higher functions have been lost to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒夺去神智的敏捷朝圣者，仅存扑跃攻击的本能。
translated_text: 前照灯缺乏灵活性导致了混淆和先进功能的丧失。
secondary_translated_text: The lack of flexibility of headlamps leads to confusion and loss of advanced functions.

translated_text: 使用 Cogwork 清洁色彩
secondary_translated_text: Clean colors with Cogwork

original_en_text: Old warrior guarding the border of their domain, stiffened by time and awoken by song.
original_zh_text: 守卫疆界的沧桑老将，因古老歌谣而苏醒。
translated_text: 边境巡逻老兵在温和的天气里唱歌醒来。
secondary_translated_text: Border Patrol veterans wake up singing in mild weather.

original_en_text: More dangerous in the moment of its explosive and corrosive death than it ever was in life.
original_zh_text: 其死亡瞬间的腐蚀性爆炸远比生前更具威胁。
translated_text: 爆炸性和腐蚀性的死亡时刻比生命中的任何其他时刻都更危险。
secondary_translated_text: Explosive and corrosive moments of death are more dangerous than any other moment in life.

original_en_text: The core member of a powerful order, trained fearless and faithful. Theirs was a kingdom of warriors, one built upon their blades.
original_zh_text: 作为精锐战团的骨干成员，经受了严酷的训练，无畏且忠诚。它们建立的刀锋王朝，正是尚武精神的巅峰体现。
translated_text: 强大的邪教的领导成员训练有素 ， 勇敢和忠诚。他们的王国是一个战士的王国 ， 建立在他们的骨头上 ， 他们是最强大的。
secondary_translated_text: The leading members of powerful cults are well-trained, brave and loyal. Their kingdom is a kingdom of warriors, built on their bones, they are the strongest.

translated_text: 财政部长。
secondary_translated_text: Minister of Finance.

translated_text: 格雷特 · 雷德 （ Grate Read ）
secondary_translated_text: Grate Read

original_en_text: If the woody hide is shattered, the bug will still bravely, foolishly try to attack.
original_zh_text: 它们至死都坚信那截空心木茎是神赐的圣枪——可悲的勇气，或是可敬的愚忠？
translated_text: 即使一头牛撕裂了一棵树 ， 昆虫也会大胆而愚蠢地攻击它。
secondary_translated_text: Even if a cow tears a tree, insects will attack it boldly and foolishly.

original_en_text: Young acolyte raised in the darkest vaults, destined to ascend to the rank of Scrollreader.
original_zh_text: 低语书库培育的诵经者接班人。
translated_text: 年轻的门徒 ， 在最黑暗的宝藏中长大 ， 注定要在羊皮纸的读者中得到提升。
secondary_translated_text: Young disciples, raised among the darkest treasures, are destined to be promoted among parchment readers.

translated_text: Nufamou 城市
secondary_translated_text: Nufamou City

original_en_text: Learned disciple of the Choir charged to maintain the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 受命维护圣堡忆廊的博学咏者团信徒。
translated_text: 一位才华横溢的合唱团学生负责保护城堡的纪念碑。
secondary_translated_text: A talented choir student is responsible for protecting the castle's monuments.

original_en_text: Heart of the Haunting, long lulled to slumber and desperate to wake. The higher being’s threads stretched throughout Pharloom, snaring its bugs and driving them to madness and discord.
original_zh_text: 丝咒的核心，长久沉眠却渴求苏醒。她的丝线遍布纺络，诱使这片土地上的虫子陷入疯狂。
translated_text: 心灵是一个幽灵 ， 一个漫长的睡眠 ， 渴望醒来。高级生活的孩子们在雨中行走 ， 关闭昆虫 ， 带领他们与疯狂作斗争。
secondary_translated_text: The mind is a ghost, a long sleep, longing to wake up. Children of advanced life walk in the rain, turning off insects and leading them to fight madness.

original_en_text: Vigorous old knight and their noble companion, working together to see their lands cut free from haunted madness.
original_zh_text: 精力充沛的老骑士与他忠诚的同伴。他们并肩作战，誓要将自己的家园从丝咒的疯狂中解救出来。
translated_text: 一位老精神骑士和一位高贵的同伴共同努力 ， 将地球从鬼魂的疯狂中解放出来。
secondary_translated_text: An old spiritual knight and a noble companion work together to liberate the earth from the madness of ghosts.

original_en_text: Winged insect that feeds upon moss and lichen in the caves above Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 栖息于骸底镇上方洞窟的飞虫，以苔藓地衣为食。
translated_text: 一种有翅膀的昆虫以苔藓为食 ， 咬骨头下的真空
secondary_translated_text: A winged insect that feeds on moss and bites the vacuum under the bones

original_zh_text: 监工兄弟 西格尼斯&格隆
translated_text: 哥哥信号&Gron 的重要性
secondary_translated_text: Brother signal&Importance of Gron

translated_text: 饰演 Camellite
secondary_translated_text: Playing Camellite

original_en_text: Mournful creature tasked alone to expel the Citadel’s choking refuse. Their talent with a longpin is unmatched.
original_zh_text: 独自清理圣堡秽物的哀伤生物，长针技艺登峰造极。
translated_text: 一个勇敢的生物的任务是独自清除城堡中令人印象深刻的垃圾。他作为远程战士的天赋是无与伦比的。
secondary_translated_text: A brave creature's task is to clear the castle of impressive garbage alone. His talent as a long-range soldier is unmatched.

original_en_text: They ceaselessly churn through rock and bone without ever seeming to rest. Do they have a destination? Or are they compelled to dig forever deeper?
original_zh_text: 它们似乎永远不知疲倦地向下挖掘。究竟是有目的地前进，还是被迫永无止境地穿行？
translated_text: 他们不断地在石头和骨头之间移动 ， 似乎从来没有休息过。
secondary_translated_text: They moved constantly between stones and bones, never seeming to rest.

original_en_text: Obese offshoot of Muckroaches, born of the Citadel’s exhaust smog. The winged roach’s sagging stomach is filled with sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 圣堡废气催生的肥胖蟑螂变种，鼓胀的腹部储存着沸腾胆汁。
translated_text: 一只甲虫 ， 一根大树枝 ， 从城堡的排水口飞了出来 ， 他虚弱的胃里充满了嘶嘶声和胆汁。
secondary_translated_text: A beetle, a big branch, flew out of the castle drain, his weak stomach filled with hissing and bile.

translated_text: Malores 的。
secondary_translated_text: Malores.

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver condemned for a transgression lost to time.
original_zh_text: 远古时期因某项重罪被囚禁的古老织者。
translated_text: 一个古老的工匠被指控犯下了在时间中迷失的罪恶。
secondary_translated_text: An ancient craftsman is accused of committing the crime of being lost in time.

original_en_text: A fine shot with its sharp mask. Its aggression has no ill effect on its aim.
original_zh_text: 面甲投掷精准异常，暴戾的性情并未损耗其分毫准度。
translated_text: 美丽的照片 ， 美丽的面具 ， 侵略性不会影响目标
secondary_translated_text: Beautiful photos, beautiful masks, aggression will not affect the target

translated_text: 一天的压力。
secondary_translated_text: The stress of the day.

original_en_text: Seeming soft, but hiding a sharp surprise. Any larger predator attempting a bite would learn a pointed and painful lesson.
original_zh_text: 看似柔软实则暗藏杀机，掠食者的撕咬只会换来锥心之痛。
translated_text: 这种咀嚼可能看起来很舒服 ， 但它隐藏着一个尖锐的惊喜。试图问的大型捕食者已经学到了一个艰难而痛苦的教训。
secondary_translated_text: This chewing may seem comfortable, but it hides a sharp surprise. The big predator who tried to ask has learned a difficult and painful lesson.

original_en_text: Not a bug but a projection of another’s will cast in smog and Silk.
original_zh_text: 烟雾与灵丝交织的意志投影，并非实体生物。
translated_text: 不是昆虫 ， 而是其他的被扔进烟雾和丝绸中。
secondary_translated_text: Not the insects, but others were thrown into the smoke and silk.

translated_text: 他们从井里逃走了。
secondary_translated_text: They escaped from the well.

original_en_text: Broken construct built by Weavers past, able to fire a focused beam of silklight to carve halls and chambers through ice and bone.
original_zh_text: 破损的古织者装置，能聚集并发射灵丝光束凿穿冰体和骸骨，通常用来开凿厅室。
translated_text: 一旦被摧毁 ， 韦弗的建筑物能够通过冰和骨头雕刻的盐和房间辐射马赛的浓缩空气。
secondary_translated_text: Once destroyed, Weaver's buildings were able to radiate concentrated air from Marseille through ice and bone-carved salt and rooms.

translated_text: Deep Dibs 关于
secondary_translated_text: Deep Dibs about

original_en_text: Short-lived sprite born of flickering flame.
original_zh_text: 闪烁火焰孕育出的精灵，其生命往往转瞬即逝。
translated_text: 一个转瞬即逝的灵魂诞生于明亮的火焰中。
secondary_translated_text: A fleeting soul was born in a bright flame.

original_en_text: Slow drifting bug with a heavy top shell. The bug reacts little to threats, even those that could claim its life.
original_zh_text: 顶覆厚重甲壳的漂浮虫，行动迟缓，对致命威胁也都反应微弱。
translated_text: 昆虫的皮肤很重。这个漏洞几乎没有反应 ， 即使是对生命的威胁。
secondary_translated_text: Insects have heavy skin. This loophole has little response, even if it is a threat to life.

original_en_text: Bell-clad bug responsible for mining the deeper, treacherous depths below their docks.
original_zh_text: 负责开采深坞下方危险矿区的虫子，身覆钟甲。
translated_text: 守护者负责在码头下面挖掘更深更危险的深度。
secondary_translated_text: Guardians are responsible for digging deeper and more dangerous depths under the dock.

original_en_text: Toothy growth that lives on cave roofs. Wraps wayward bugs with its long tongue and drags them up to be consumed.
original_zh_text: 栖身洞顶的齿舌生物，用拟态长舌诱捕猎物。
translated_text: 在山洞的屋顶上有一种有齿的植物 ， 它长长的舌头被邪恶的昆虫包裹着。
secondary_translated_text: On the roof of the cave lies a toothed plant with its long tongue wrapped in evil insects.

original_en_text: Fine winged flyer that survives in flocks.
translated_text: 爱尔兰飞行员队
secondary_translated_text: Irish Pilot Team

original_en_text: Long dormant centipede, awoken and enraged by Pharloom’s crumbling collapse.
original_zh_text: 长期蛰伏的远古蜈蚣，因纺络的崩塌而苏醒、暴怒。
translated_text: 在他漫长的睡眠中 ， Mukad 醒来时对法老的堕落感到愤怒。
secondary_translated_text: During his long sleep, Mukad woke up angry at the pharaoh's fall.

translated_text: 萨格拉 （萨格拉）
secondary_translated_text: Sagra (Sagra)

original_en_text: Erratic, flying pest that nests in rags and curtains.
original_zh_text: 寄居在破布和帷幔中的飞虫，居无定所。
translated_text: 一种不稳定且易挥发的寄生虫 ， 筑巢在织物或帐篷中。
secondary_translated_text: An unstable and volatile parasite that nests in fabrics or tents.

translated_text: 宙斯做到了。
secondary_translated_text: Zeus did it.

original_en_text: Once a hunter purely for food, now they hunt unthinking and unending.
original_zh_text: 曾是只为果腹而捕猎的猎手，如今却在丝咒驱使下沦为永不停歇的屠夫。
translated_text: 过去 ， 他们狩猎是为了寻找食物 ， 但现在他们不假思索地狩猎。
secondary_translated_text: In the past, they hunted in search of food, but now they hunt without thinking.

original_en_text: So light they can rest atop still water’s surface. An elegant bug indeed.
original_zh_text: 轻盈得能栖于静水表面，确为优雅之虫。
translated_text: 这意味着你可以生活在充足的光线和安静的水 ， 这是一个严重的错误。
secondary_translated_text: This means you can live in plenty of light and quiet water, which is a serious mistake.

translated_text: 钢铁人。
secondary_translated_text: Steel man.

original_en_text: Its form is absurd... Surely it should not be able to hold itself in the air? The noxious gases in its stomach must provide its levity.
original_zh_text: 如此畸形的躯体竟能悬空？想必是腹中毒气提供了浮力。
translated_text: 这种形状很可笑 ， 真的是在空气中吗 ？他胃里的有毒气体应该会给他一种解脱的感觉。
secondary_translated_text: This shape is ridiculous. Is it really in the air? The toxic gas in his stomach should give him a feeling of relief.

original_en_text: Once roused, the bug will crash its steely shell into walls, floors and foes.
original_zh_text: 被惊动后，会以钢甲撞击墙壁、地面与敌人。
translated_text: 当你醒来时 ， 昆虫会粉碎墙壁 ， 地板 ， 敌人会挖出钢壳。
secondary_translated_text: When you wake up, insects will crush walls, floors, and enemies will dig out steel shells.

translated_text: 《 Iron Man 》
secondary_translated_text: 《 Iron Man 》

original_en_text: Elder crawbug serving in a sacred ceremony.
original_zh_text: 参与神圣仪式的腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: 老螃蟹在神圣的仪式中服役。
secondary_translated_text: Old crabs serve in sacred rituals.

translated_text: 个人特使讲话
secondary_translated_text: Speech by the Personal Envoy

translated_text: 朝圣者在朝圣。
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrims are on pilgrimage.

original_en_text: Agile bug, and one of few hardy pilgrims to have reached the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 成功抵达圣堡的敏捷朝圣者。
translated_text: 这只狡猾的昆虫也是少数到达城堡的顽强朝圣者之一。
secondary_translated_text: This cunning insect is also one of the few tenacious pilgrims to reach the castle.

original_en_text: Their use of a pin shows hard training. Their use of Silk, unfurled from a spool held close, shows skill far beyond standard bugs.
original_zh_text: 其刺针技法明显是经过严格训练，近身灵丝轴的操控技艺更是远超普通虫子。
translated_text: 通过在附近的卷轴上使用丝绸 ， 他们展示了一种远远超出标准蠕虫的技术。
secondary_translated_text: By using silk on nearby scrolls, they demonstrated a technology that goes well beyond standard worms.

original_en_text: Gilded guardian of the Blasted Steps, bearing a cymbal and mallet.
original_zh_text: 镇守蚀阶的金甲守卫，用钹和木槌处决"不洁者"。
translated_text: 他有一个金色的警卫 ， 一个炸药梯 ， 一把锤子和一把锤子。
secondary_translated_text: He had a gold guard, an explosive ladder, a hammer and a hammer.

original_en_text: A rare, calmer bug of Bilewater, survives its hazardous surroundings by hiding as a plant.
original_zh_text: 腐汁泽罕见的温顺虫子，在危险的环境中拟态植物，得以生存。
translated_text: 罕见的软胆细菌可以在隐藏在植物中的危险环境中存活。
secondary_translated_text: Rare soft-bile bacteria can survive in dangerous environments hidden in plants.

original_en_text: Bug forged of iron, rotor and cog. The automaton works tirelessly to maintain the Core that houses it.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮与转子构成的铁质自动机，不知疲倦维护着机枢核心。
translated_text: 失去铁 ， 旋转盘和牙齿。机器人一直在不停地工作 ， 以保持它的核心。
secondary_translated_text: Loss of iron, rotating discs and teeth. The robot has been working non-stop to maintain its core.

original_en_text: Starved pack bug with an insatiable appetite. Despite their tough hide and pungent meat, roaches breed rapidly so are sometimes farmed for food.
original_zh_text: 贪婪的群居害虫，甲壳坚硬，虫肉腥臭，却因繁殖力超强被圈养作为为食物来源。
translated_text: 饥饿无法满足你的胃口。尽管甲虫的皮肤坚硬而辛辣 ， 但它们繁殖速度很快 ， 有时甚至是为了食物。
secondary_translated_text: Hunger cannot satisfy your appetite. Although beetles have hard and spicy skin, they reproduce quickly, sometimes even for food.

translated_text: 报纸上的消息。
secondary_translated_text: News in the newspaper.

translated_text: 影子的旁观者
secondary_translated_text: A bystander of the shadow

original_en_text: They cling fast to the shells of other bugs, destroying any hope for concentration or comfort.
original_zh_text: 它们紧附其他虫子的外壳，彻底摧毁宿主的专注力与安宁。
translated_text: 它们会攻击其他昆虫的外壳 ， 破坏集中和舒适的希望。
secondary_translated_text: They attack the shells of other insects, destroying hopes of concentration and comfort.

original_en_text: Pointed, darting insect that builds a hardy hive from Shellwood’s dried bark.
original_zh_text: 以甲木林干树皮筑巢的尖刺飞虫。
translated_text: 根尖的昆虫利用树干的树皮建造坚固的巢穴。
secondary_translated_text: Rooted insects use the bark of tree trunks to build sturdy nests.

original_en_text: Full-sized mite of the Citadel cloaked in an old curtain.
original_zh_text: 披挂破旧幕帘的圣堡巨型螨虫。
translated_text: 城堡的旧帐篷上覆盖着真实大小的螨虫。
secondary_translated_text: The castle's old tents are covered with life-size mites.

translated_text: 关于月亮
secondary_translated_text: about the moon

translated_text: 硝酸盐。
secondary_translated_text: Nitrates.

original_en_text: A snapping surprise on first encounter, though one easily avoided once aware.
original_zh_text: 初次遭遇的惊险过后，便再难构成威胁。
translated_text: 当你第一次见面时 ， 你会感到惊讶 ， 但一旦你写下来 ， 就很容易避免。
secondary_translated_text: You'll be surprised when you first meet, but once you write it down, it's easy to avoid.

translated_text: 磷酸钠的。
secondary_translated_text: Sodium phosphate.

translated_text: 斯卡利，
secondary_translated_text: Sculley,

original_en_text: His tracks and traps... It should have been obvious from the start, this old hunter sought to draw me in. But what reason drove him to test himself so brutally? That answer I suspect I shall never know.
original_zh_text: 早该察觉他的踪迹与陷阱……但这老猎手对自己进行如此残酷试炼的原因，看来是无从得知了。
translated_text: 从一开始 ， 很明显 ， 一个老猎人试图引诱我 ， 但那是什么 ？他想做什么 ， 他做得那么糟糕 ？不要回答我。
secondary_translated_text: From the beginning, it was obvious that an old hunter was trying to seduce me, but what was that? What does he want to do that he does so badly? Don't answer me.

original_en_text: Brutish cook responsible for dicing Muckroach meat into edible portions.
original_zh_text: 粗鲁的厨子，负责将淤秽蟑螂肉切分成便于食用的分量。
translated_text: 野蛮的厨师吃了甲虫的肉。
secondary_translated_text: The barbaric cook ate the meat of the beetle.

original_en_text: Flighted automaton, responsible for repairing and extending the Core.
original_zh_text: 负责维修扩建核心的飞行自动机，简单攻击暗藏杀机。
translated_text: 任务是修复和扩展飞行器的原子核。
secondary_translated_text: The mission is to repair and expand the aircraft's atomic nucleus.

original_en_text: Giant roller of the lowlands. Its ridged hide will crush smaller creatures beneath it.
original_zh_text: 在低地区域横冲直撞的巨型生物，带棱甲的躯体能轻易碾碎小型生物。
translated_text: 宽阔的低肋骨形皮肤压碎了下面的小生物。
secondary_translated_text: The broad, low rib-shaped skin crushed the small creatures below.

original_en_text: Shell of a small bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will stretch its Silk to form a crude, crushing wheel.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣附身的小型甲虫躯壳，伸展灵丝形成粗糙碾压轮。
translated_text: 小昆虫的身体用一块丝绸附着在身体上 ， 然后膨胀形成一个断裂的轮子。
secondary_translated_text: The body of the little insect is attached to its body with a piece of silk, which then expands to form a broken wheel.

original_en_text: Rag-winged adult crawbug bearing a scavenged pin.
original_zh_text: 翅膀破烂的腐囊成虫，使用捡来刺针作为武器。
translated_text: 螃蟹有厚厚的翅膀和掠食性的头部
secondary_translated_text: Crabs have thick wings and predatory heads

translated_text: 讽刺是。
secondary_translated_text: The irony is.

original_en_text: I have not yet seen the bell this automaton is designed to ring, nor do I ever wish to hear it. Such a clamour would no doubt be unpleasant to experience.
original_zh_text: 它们机械臂摆动的节奏暗合圣咏旋律，若真让这些击钹者齐聚奏响终章，恐怕整个机枢核心都会在共振中崩塌。
translated_text: 我从来没有见过这个机器人设计的钟声 ， 我不想听到它。
secondary_translated_text: I have never seen the bell designed by this robot, and I don't want to hear it.

translated_text: 在巴勒斯坦。
secondary_translated_text: In Palestine.

original_en_text: If allowed the opportunity, these creatures will grow into a form larger and more oppressive.
original_zh_text: 此刻脆弱，却是未来灾祸的种子。放任其成长将成为巨大威胁。
translated_text: 如果有机会 ， 这些生物会进化成更大 ， 更压抑的形式。
secondary_translated_text: Given the opportunity, these organisms would evolve into larger, more repressive forms.

original_en_text: He offered fair warning and challenge, a duel in the purest sense. I admire his honour, and his skill.
original_zh_text: 他向我发起了正式的挑战，那是一场最纯粹的决斗。我敬佩他的荣誉感，也钦佩他的技艺。
translated_text: 这是一个警告 ， 一个挑战 ， 从技术上讲 ， 一场战斗。
secondary_translated_text: This is a warning, a challenge, and technically a battle.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, born with sharp, retractable horns atop its head.
original_zh_text: 头部配备可收缩尖角的拟态树枝虫。
translated_text: 昆虫模仿树枝 ， 头部有锋利的角。
secondary_translated_text: Insects imitate branches with sharp horns on their heads.

original_en_text: Small, soft bug that uses the hard skulls of the Marrow for protection and disguise.
original_zh_text: 小型软体虫，利用髓骨洞窟内硬质头骨作为自己的护甲和伪装。
translated_text: 小而柔软的昆虫用坚硬的头骨保护它 ， 并将它变成木乃伊。
secondary_translated_text: The small, soft insect protected it with a hard skull and turned it into a mummy.

original_en_text: When roosting, it would look convincingly plant-like. In flight, its bulbous body quickly ruins the ruse.
original_zh_text: 停栖时，双翼能完美伪装成远野的草叶。但这小聪明总在飞行时露出破绽——它膨大的腹部让伪装功亏一篑。
translated_text: 当你看到它时 ， 它看起来像一株植物。在他的飞行过程中 ， 他的球体迅速摧毁了这项技术。
secondary_translated_text: When you see it, it looks like a plant. During his flight, his sphere quickly destroyed the technology.

translated_text: 喂 ， 喂 ， 喂！“我不知道。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, hey, hey! "I don't know.

translated_text: 电池型号 （ Battery model ）
secondary_translated_text: Battery model

original_en_text: Cloth-covered crawler with sharpened forelimbs. Lives and breeds in dark places.
original_zh_text: 栖息暗处的爬虫，身覆布料，前肢锐利。
translated_text: 爬行动物覆盖着布料 ， 前腿上有角 ， 在细胞核中生长和繁殖。
secondary_translated_text: Reptiles are covered in cloth, have horns on their forelegs, and grow and reproduce in their nuclei.

translated_text: 翼 （ 翼 ）
secondary_translated_text: Wing (wing)

original_en_text: The cost of so much grandeur... Did I peer closely enough into the foundations of my own kingdom?
original_zh_text: 辉煌背后的代价……我是否也曾如此审视过自己王国的根基？
translated_text: 你见过王国的根基吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Have you ever seen the foundation of the kingdom?

original_en_text: Stout adult crawbug bearing several short pins.
original_zh_text: 手持短刺的矮胖腐囊成虫。
translated_text: 成年人与短针。
secondary_translated_text: Adults with short needles.

translated_text: 价值，
secondary_translated_text: Value,

original_en_text: Greed will always see some bugs swell above their kin.
original_zh_text: 贪婪终会导致膨胀，这是所有生物共通的教训。
translated_text: 贪婪的人总是看到错误传播到他们的同事。
secondary_translated_text: Greedy people always see mistakes spread to their colleagues.

original_en_text: This graceful ruler once possessed skill to rival my own. At her youthful peak, her voice united all Skarr in her service.
original_zh_text: 这位优雅的统治者曾拥有与我匹敌的武艺。在她巅峰时期，其歌喉能让所有斯卡尔蚁族臣服效命。
translated_text: 这样的领导者已经能够与我相比 ， 他青春的声音总结了整个规模。
secondary_translated_text: Such a leader has been able to compare to me, and his youthful voice sums up the entire scale.

original_en_text: False fly with a rune etched shell. A tortured mix of soul and void is caged within.
original_zh_text: 外壳刻有符文的飞虫形装置，内部囚禁着灵魂与虚空的痛苦混合物。
translated_text: 一只假苍蝇的外壳里有字母 “鲁尼 ” ， 它被困在一个痛苦和灵魂空虚的笼子里。
secondary_translated_text: A fake fly with the letters "Rooney" in its shell is trapped in a cage of pain and soul emptiness.

original_en_text: Suction creature surviving on the thick slime that coats its caves.
original_zh_text: 依赖洞壁浓稠粘液维生的吸附生物。
translated_text: 你想要追求的人的身体是基于覆盖洞穴的粘液。
secondary_translated_text: The body of the person you want to pursue is based on mucus that covers the cave.

original_en_text: Tall roach tender charged to feed Muckroaches on a lean diet of maggot gruel.
original_zh_text: 负责用蛆虫糊喂养腐汁蟑螂的高瘦饲育者。
translated_text: 大的甲虫需要从蠕虫的肉中提取红肉。
secondary_translated_text: Large beetles need to extract red meat from the worm's meat.

original_en_text: Tiny, soft creature that armours itself using the hard, hollow growths of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 用甲木林硬质空茎武装自身的脆弱飞虫。
translated_text: 小而柔软的生物像外壳一样保护坚硬的植物。
secondary_translated_text: Small, soft creatures protect hard plants like shells.

original_en_text: Taken by Pharloom’s Haunting, the bug is now capable of little more than prayer and aggression.
original_zh_text: 丝咒侵蚀了它们的理智，如今这些虫子只剩祷告与攻击的本能。
translated_text: 在法勒姆的鬼魂中 ， 昆虫只能祈祷和攻击。
secondary_translated_text: In Farham's ghost, insects can only pray and attack.

translated_text: 格罗维尔和朝圣者
secondary_translated_text: Grovel and the Pilgrims

original_en_text: Oversized bug, briefly consumed by anger after its long time caged.
original_zh_text: 长期囚禁后暴怒的巨型跳蚤。
translated_text: 这只唱歌的昆虫被关在笼子里很长一段时间 ， 并且患有愤怒。
secondary_translated_text: The singing insect was kept in a cage for a long time and suffered from anger.

original_en_text: From the outset, theirs was a hopeless task. Those wild lands could never be replicated within a space so artificial.
original_zh_text: 从最初这就是徒劳之举——自然的荒野绝无可能在虫子造出的空间刻意复现。
translated_text: 从一开始 ， 她的任务就很绝望。他不会重生在一个人造宇宙中。
secondary_translated_text: From the beginning, her mission was desperate. He will not be reborn in an artificial universe.

original_zh_text: 低地地区的游荡者，绒毛下暗藏钢刺并具备远程发射能力。
translated_text: 低质量的注射剂。
secondary_translated_text: Low-quality injections.

original_en_text: Wriggling young grub that lives in darkness.
translated_text: 一只狗在黑暗中爬行
secondary_translated_text: A dog crawled in the dark

original_en_text: Their procedures with Silk may have prolonged life within the Citadel, but they unknowingly gifted many minds to the monarch.
original_zh_text: 他们的灵丝手术虽维系了圣堡的生命，却无意中将所有心智献予了君主。
translated_text: 丝绸可能延长了城堡的寿命 ， 但他在不知不觉中将许多想法传达给了君主。
secondary_translated_text: Silk may have extended the life of the castle, but he unknowingly conveyed many ideas to the monarch.

original_en_text: Floral foe that reacts instinctively to movement nearby. Spits pellets of crackling pollen that burst on impact.
original_zh_text: 对周围动静极其敏感的植物，能够喷射噼啪作响的花粉弹。
translated_text: 对手会本能地对关闭做出反应 ， 释放花粉球并在撞击中爆炸。
secondary_translated_text: Opponents will instinctively respond to the shutdown, releasing balls of pollen and exploding on impact.

translated_text: 你必须忏悔。
secondary_translated_text: You must confess.

translated_text: 法代多内
secondary_translated_text: Fadedone

translated_text: 贝灵格 （ Belingge ）
secondary_translated_text: Belingge

translated_text: 第二名哨兵。
secondary_translated_text: Second sentry.

original_en_text: In contests of speed against strength, I have seen the swift more often triumphant, a lesson I have taken to my own heart.
original_zh_text: 见证这以快制胜的案例，更坚定了我对敏捷的追求。
translated_text: 对我来说 ， 斯威夫特赢得了更多的速度和力量比赛 ， 这是一个教训。
secondary_translated_text: For me, Swift won more speed and power races, and that was a lesson.

translated_text: 这是 Loft 的最低层。
secondary_translated_text: This is the lowest level of Loft.

translated_text: Pound Catcher （ 英语 ： Pound Catcher ）
secondary_translated_text: Pound Catcher

translated_text: 我们分享。
secondary_translated_text: We share.

original_en_text: Pilgrim endowed with large wings, carrying a brace of iron bells.
original_zh_text: 配备一对铁钟的飞行朝圣者。
translated_text: 朝圣者有一个巨大的翅膀和一个铁钟。
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrims have huge wings and an iron bell.

translated_text: 兰斯和斯凯顿。
secondary_translated_text: Lance and sketon.

original_en_text: In my youth, I envied all bugs with wings. I even fancied I might grow a pair... I have since learned better. Accept the limitations of one’s body... and augment with tools as needed.
