original_zh_text: 年少时，我曾一度羡慕生来便有翅膀的虫族，甚至曾幻想自己也能长出一对来……如今我已明白，接受身体上的限制，并学会用工具弥补缺陷才是正途。
translated_text: 小时候 ， 我嫉妒虫子。我想做一对夫妇。从那以后 ， 我学得更好。接受你身体的局限性。如有必要 ， 可以添加工具。
secondary_translated_text: When I was a kid, I was jealous of bugs. I want to be a couple. Since then, I have learned better. Accept the limitations of your body. Add tools if necessary.

original_en_text: Devious ambusher that poses as a fossil.
original_zh_text: 伪装成化石的狡诈伏击者。
translated_text: 小丑是一个化石。
secondary_translated_text: The clown is a fossil.

translated_text: 他是个鬼魂。
secondary_translated_text: He's a ghost.

original_en_text: This bug bears a spool of Silk, which they flail to attack. Though somewhat crude, theirs is a technique much reminiscent of Weavers. I wonder who taught them such a use?
original_zh_text: 这只虫子携带着一轴灵丝，并挥舞它进行攻击。动作虽略显粗糙，但竟带着几分织者的神韵。不知是谁教会了它这样使用灵丝？
translated_text: 一只昆虫抓住一卷丝绸并摇晃它 ， 这有点复杂 ， 但技术似乎是一幅画。谁能告诉我如何使用它 ？
secondary_translated_text: It's a bit complicated for an insect to grab a roll of silk and shake it, but the technology seems to be a painting. Who can tell me how to use it?

original_en_text: Her presence would once have maintained the wood’s fragile order, allowing the safe passage of bugs across its branches.
original_zh_text: 昔日的她维持领域内脆弱的平衡，护佑虫子们安然通行其枝干。
translated_text: 它们的存在支持了森林脆弱的秩序 ， 使昆虫能够安全地通过树枝。
secondary_translated_text: Their presence supports the fragile order of the forest, allowing insects to safely pass through branches.

translated_text: 这里有很多朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: There are many pilgrims here.

original_en_text: Though generally passive, their sharp masks can cause injury if carelessly blundered into.
original_zh_text: 虽性情温顺，但若冒失冲撞其锋利面甲仍会受伤。
translated_text: 它通常是被动的 ， 但如果进入尖锐的面具 ， 它可能会造成伤害。
secondary_translated_text: It is usually passive, but if entered into a sharp mask, it can cause harm.

translated_text: 白蚁会飞。
secondary_translated_text: Termites can fly.

original_en_text: I like her. For her willingness to teach and her spirit still strong, despite a long age spent solitary... she has my respect.
original_zh_text: 我欣赏她——甘于传授技艺，孤寂长年也未磨灭斗志，值得尊敬。
translated_text: 他独自生活了很长一段时间 ， 但他很担心 ， 因为他喜欢教学 ， 而且有一颗坚强的心。
secondary_translated_text: He lived alone for a long time, but he was worried because he loved teaching and had a strong heart.

translated_text: 他们损坏了船只。
secondary_translated_text: They damaged the ship.

original_en_text: They held long at their vigil, far beyond the age of their brethren, yet still when roused they swung their blade with remarkable ease.
original_zh_text: 他们戍边的年岁就能远超同辈寿命，苏醒时仍能挥动利刃，动作流畅自如。
translated_text: 他们比我哥哥大 ， 但当他们醒来时 ， 他们用手指测量了一点。
secondary_translated_text: They were older than my brother, but when they woke up, they measured a little with their fingers.

original_en_text: Long-horned beast of Pharloom’s lowlands. Relies on its horn both to impale and to wrench the ground beneath it, flinging dangerous debris.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地的长角巨兽，依赖长角穿刺敌人并掘起地面制造危险碎片云。
translated_text: Lowland Fanham 's Long Horns ： 当他发现自己的角时 ， 他在地面上挖了一个洞 ， 扔出了危险的碎片。
secondary_translated_text: Lowland Fanham 's Long Horns: When he discovered his horn, he dug a hole in the ground and threw dangerous debris.

original_en_text: Could their actions be called skill? I see only a crude mangling of meat. Yet I wonder, before the Haunting snared their minds was it any different?
original_zh_text: 这般行径怎能称为厨艺？我只见到对血肉的粗暴摧残。它在丝咒侵蚀前，或许不会像现在这样粗鄙行事？
translated_text: 你认为你的行为是技术性的吗？但他不知道 ， 在幽灵王国之前 ， 一切都改变了。
secondary_translated_text: Do you consider your actions to be technical? But he didn't know that before the Ghost Kingdom, everything changed.

original_en_text: Darting warrior with sharpened forelimbs and heightened senses.
original_zh_text: 前肢尖利且感官强化的迅捷战士。
translated_text: 弓有一个锋利的手臂和敏锐的敏感性。
secondary_translated_text: The bow has a sharp arm and keen sensitivity.

original_en_text: Mighty percussive disciple of the Choir, wielding a mallet and a Silk spool to wrap and enhance their attacks.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的打击乐信徒，挥舞槌棒，并利用灵丝轴强化它们的攻击。
translated_text: 一个强大的攻击合唱团的追随者使用锤子和丝绸爬行动物来加强他们的攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Followers of a powerful attack choir use hammers and silk reptiles to intensify their attacks.

original_en_text: Dual princes of old Verdania, beloved by their subjects for their grace and for the ballet of death they delivered upon outsiders.
original_zh_text: 昔日翠庭王国的双生王子，以恩典治国，深受子民爱戴。对于不怀好意的外来者，他们会为其献上一支死亡芭蕾。
translated_text: 古代 Verdania 的双亲王子因他的文盲和死亡芭蕾舞而受到他的臣民的喜爱 ， 并且被发现没有名字。
secondary_translated_text: Ancient Verdania's parents, princes, were loved by his subjects for his illiteracy and death ballet, and were found to have no name.

original_en_text: Huge and soft, a fantastic combination ruined by their haunted aggression.
original_zh_text: 明明是个蓬松的大毛球，可惜被丝咒搞得见谁都想撞两下。
translated_text: 一个大的 ， 柔软的 ， 美丽的复杂 ， 但它被鬼魂的侵略性毁了。
secondary_translated_text: A big, soft, beautiful complex, but it was ruined by the ghost's aggression.

translated_text: 蓬内漏斗
secondary_translated_text: Pengnei funnel

original_en_text: On uneven terrain their union of flight and range can prove a challenge even for me.
original_zh_text: 崎岖地形中，其飞行阵列的配合连我也需谨慎应对。
translated_text: 在沙漠地形上飞行和自动驾驶仪的结合对我来说也是一个挑战。
secondary_translated_text: The combination of flying on desert terrain and autopilot was also a challenge for me.

original_en_text: They toiled incessantly for the Citadel, their shells bent and greyed, and now the kingdom’s curse means not even death can relieve them.
original_zh_text: 他们为圣堡鞠躬尽瘁直至甲壳弯折灰败，如今连死亡都无法终结这诅咒。
translated_text: 他们为城堡努力工作 ， 它的外壳变得弯曲和灰色 ， 王国的诅咒 ， 即使是死亡 ， 也无法释放他们。
secondary_translated_text: They worked hard for the castle, its shell became bent and gray, and the curse of the kingdom, even death, could not release them.

original_en_text: Destroying the hives will limit their presence in the wood. Useful to me now, as I pass along the branches. Dangerous in time for the wood’s order. Even a small disruption can tip a fragile balance.
original_zh_text: 摧毁蜂巢会限制它们在林中的活动。对我而言，这在穿行丛林时十分有用。但从长远来看，即便是微小的干扰，也可能打破丛林脆弱的生态平衡。
translated_text: 蜜蜂的破坏限制了它们在森林中的存在当我在树枝上行走时 ， 我需要它。这是一个危险的时刻 ， 命令树。即使是最小的伤害也会打破脆弱的平衡。
secondary_translated_text: The destruction of bees limits their presence in the forest and I need it when I walk on branches. This is a dangerous moment, Command Tree. Even the smallest injury can upset a fragile balance.

original_en_text: It has no true mind, and yet fights effectively, adjusting its strategy to my movements. Where exactly are its thoughts written?
original_zh_text: 当它用盾牌格挡我的织针突刺，同时以刁钻角度刺出长枪时，我仿佛在与某个沉睡在齿轮中的古老剑客对决。
translated_text: 我不确定 ， 但战斗是有效的 ， 所以我会根据我的动作调整我的策略。
secondary_translated_text: I'm not sure, but the fight is effective, so I'll adjust my strategy based on my movements.

original_en_text: A bug born entirely of thread. Much Silk would have been needed to see her sustained. A fragile form of life, but life nonetheless.
original_zh_text: 完全由灵丝编织而成的虫子。维持这种丝造生命需耗费海量的灵丝资源，虽形态脆弱却真实鲜活。
translated_text: 它需要大量的丝绸才能移动 ， 它是脆弱的生物 ， 但它是生命。
secondary_translated_text: It requires a lot of silk to move. It is a fragile creature, but it is life.

translated_text: 欢迎您的到来。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome to your arrival.

original_en_text: Individually they offer little challenge, but their numbers are surely vast, and most remain hidden.
original_zh_text: 单只不足为惧，但其庞大族群多潜藏暗处，如同阴影永难根除。
translated_text: 就个人而言 ， 他们面临的问题很少 ， 但他们的数量肯定很大 ， 而且大多数仍然隐藏。
secondary_translated_text: Personally, the problems they face are few, but their numbers are certainly large and most are still hidden.

original_en_text: A lucky bug to be able to grow old. Pharloom’s roads take most much earlier.
original_zh_text: 能在纺络活到这样的年纪堪称奇迹，只可惜这份长寿化作了更持久的折磨。
translated_text: 菲兰的路径 ， 幸运的蠕虫可以变老 ， 移动得很快。
secondary_translated_text: Filan's path, lucky worms can grow old and move quickly.

original_en_text: Huge flighted creature formed from coldshard.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的巨型飞行生物。
translated_text: 飞行生物 ， 由冷垃圾制成。
secondary_translated_text: Flying creatures, made from cold garbage.

original_en_text: She has lived a mere fraction of my lifetime and yet her rings prove a ferocious match. As gifted a warrior as I have ever encountered, and one I am fortunate to call a friend.
original_zh_text: 她的年岁不过我生命的一小段，但她的战环却展现出凶狠的实力。她是我所遇过最出色的战士之一，很庆幸能和她成为朋友。
translated_text: 我只活过我生命中的一小部分 ， 但她的戒指是完美的。我遇到过的最有才华的士兵是那些有幸称我为朋友的人。
secondary_translated_text: I have only lived a small part of my life, but her ring is perfect. The most talented soldiers I have ever met are those who have the privilege of calling me a friend.

original_en_text: Sheer bulk makes for an effective weapon, but requires much sustenance. This creature would have spent most of its time eating. An acceptable life for some.
original_zh_text: 庞大的身躯是它们致命的武器，但也需要大量营养来维持。这种生物绝大多数时间都在进食，倒也活得纯粹。
translated_text: 排水管清洁是一个有效的武器 ， 但它需要大量的支持。动物们大部分时间都在吃自己。对于一些人来说 ， 这是一种可以接受的生活。
secondary_translated_text: Drain cleaning is an effective weapon, but it requires a lot of support. Animals eat themselves most of the time. For some people, this is an acceptable life.

original_en_text: These ones grow large, yet I have never observed them eating, or sleeping. They seem such simple bugs... but I suspect they are not truly our cousins.
original_zh_text: 体型虽庞大，却从未见其进食或休眠。看似普通的虫子……实则与我们并非同类。
translated_text: 他长大了 ， 但我从来没有见过他吃饭或睡觉。
secondary_translated_text: He grew up, but I never saw him eat or sleep.

original_en_text: Huge, hardbone bug that lives within and travels through the veins of old bells across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 居住在古钟里并穿梭于纺络广阔钟脉里的骨甲大块头。
translated_text: 一只巨大的实体蠕虫生活在古代秋天钟的容器中 ， 穿过秋天。
secondary_translated_text: A huge physical worm lives in the container of an ancient autumn bell, passing through autumn.

original_en_text: Winged devout of the Citadel, carrying a brace of gilded bells.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的带翼信徒，背负一对镀金巨钟作战。
translated_text: 他骄傲地飞过城堡 ， 带着一个金钟。
secondary_translated_text: He flew proudly across the castle, carrying a golden bell.

original_en_text: This one would make a perfect pet, but for the freezing temperatures it requires for comfort.
original_zh_text: 本可成为完美的宠物，但其生存需依赖刺骨的低温。
translated_text: 这将使它成为一个伟大的动物 ， 但它应该是舒适的寒冷。
secondary_translated_text: This will make it a great animal, but it should be comfortably cold.

original_en_text: These creatures look to have been bred deliberately in watery pens. If they are food to be, their scent suggests they must taste vile.
original_zh_text: 刻意养殖的水栖变种，若作食用，其恶臭已昭示其滋味堪忧。
translated_text: 如果它是未来的食物 ， 那么气味表明它很难吃。
secondary_translated_text: If it is the food of the future, then the smell suggests it is terrible.

original_en_text: Their skill once saw them chosen, and I can plainly see why. They would have lived and trained only for this duty.
original_zh_text: 它们的高超技艺我已亲身体会，必然是终生磨练只为履行职责。
translated_text: 我知道为什么选择他们的技能。
secondary_translated_text: I know why I chose their skills.

original_en_text: For this bug to have survived Pharloom’s climb it must have teamed with stouter companions. I cannot imagine it succeeding alone.
original_zh_text: 单凭自身的力量，这虫子绝无可能攀越纺络的天堑，成功进入圣堡。想必曾与更强壮的伙伴互为倚仗。
translated_text: 昆虫在爬上农场时必须生存 ， 必须与更强大的同伴合作。
secondary_translated_text: Insects must survive as they climb onto the farm and must cooperate with more powerful companions.

original_en_text: Did this one grow large thanks to the Citadel’s excess, or was its formidable size the reason it ever survived to reach this place?
original_zh_text: 这家伙的巨大体型是因圣堡的恩赐而异变，还是正因其巨大体型才得以存活至此？
translated_text: 城堡的规模随着城堡的数量而增加 ， 还是它的宏伟仍然存在 ， 所以它来到这里 ？
secondary_translated_text: The size of the castle increases with the number of castles, or does its grandeur still exist, so it comes here?

original_en_text: Though surely fierce, the skull it bears looks taken from an even larger beast. If not for the bones as proof, I would scarcely believe bugs could grow to such scale.
original_zh_text: 它头顶的骷髅战盔竟取自更庞大的生物——若非有骸骨为证，我简直难以相信世间存在如此巨虫。
translated_text: 毫无疑问 ， 头骨是凶猛的 ， 但它似乎被一个更大的动物移除了。没有骨骼证据 ， 很难相信这种蠕虫已经达到了这个尺寸。
secondary_translated_text: There is no doubt that the skull is ferocious, but it appears to have been removed by a larger animal. Without skeletal evidence, it is difficult to believe that the worm has reached this size.

translated_text: 法里德 （ Farid ）
secondary_translated_text: Farid

translated_text: 丝绸狙击手
secondary_translated_text: Silk sniper

translated_text: 牙医模特。
secondary_translated_text: Dentist model.

original_en_text: Two cogwork bugs, and yet the soul seemed singular? A sad, yet masterful imitation of life, imbued inside shells of iron.
original_zh_text: 两只自动机虫却共享单一灵魂？这是栖身于铁壳内的生命仿品，展现出精湛的制造技艺，却难掩其悲哀的命运。
translated_text: 你有两个齿轮 ， 但你的灵魂似乎是一个。里面充满了铁。
secondary_translated_text: You have two gears, but your soul seems to be one. It is full of iron.

translated_text: 塑料。
secondary_translated_text: Plastic.

original_en_text: Heavy insect that lives near large bodies of water. Its weighty body is best avoided.
original_zh_text: 栖息大型水域附近的笨重昆虫，遇到最好绕道而行。
translated_text: 昆虫生活在大型物体附近。避免重物。
secondary_translated_text: Insects live near large objects. Avoid heavy objects.

translated_text: ” Kilick 说。
secondary_translated_text: "Kilick said.

original_en_text: Drifting bug disguised as a flower. Disperses crackling clouds of pollen if threatened.
original_zh_text: 伪装成花朵的漂浮生物，遇到威胁时会释放噼啪作响的花粉云自卫。
translated_text: 漂浮的昆虫伪装成花朵 ， 当它们处于危险之中时 ， 它们会散发花粉云。
secondary_translated_text: Floating insects disguise themselves as flowers and emit clouds of pollen when they are in danger.

original_en_text: Dense knot of husks bound tight by void soaked Silk.
original_zh_text: 由虚空浸染的灵丝捆缚的躯壳，密集成团。
translated_text: 幸存的贝壳结被丝绸紧紧地绑在一起 ， 浸在天空中。
secondary_translated_text: The surviving shell knots were tightly tied together with silk and immersed in the sky.

translated_text: 劳动者 Cog
secondary_translated_text: Worker Cog

translated_text: 拖轮 （ 日文 ）
secondary_translated_text: Tugboat (Japanese)

original_en_text: A smart hunter learns to wait long in ambush, always ready to strike the first blow.
original_zh_text: 优秀的猎手都懂得：耐心蹲点，一击必杀。
translated_text: 聪明的猎人学会了长时间等待 ， 并随时准备发出第一枪。
secondary_translated_text: Smart hunters learn to wait long and be ready to fire the first shot at any time.

original_en_text: Grazing creature with sharp senses that nimbly retreats from danger.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的食草生物，遇到危险会灵活撤退。
translated_text: 迟到的草食者可以灵活地从危险中撤退。
secondary_translated_text: Herbivores who are late can flexibly retreat from danger.

original_en_text: Tiny, timid creatures that huddle in flocks and flee at the first hint of danger.
original_zh_text: 胆小的小型群居生物，一旦察觉到危险便四散奔逃。
translated_text: 害羞的小动物在遇到危险时会聚集并逃跑。
secondary_translated_text: Shy little animals gather and run away when in danger.

original_en_text: Lost in the madness of the Haunting, they still commanded the endless excavation of their caves.
original_zh_text: 即便深陷丝咒癫狂，仍持续号令无休止的矿洞挖掘。
translated_text: 他们迷失在幽灵般的疯狂中 ， 挖掘着无尽的洞穴。
secondary_translated_text: They are lost in ghostly madness, digging endless caves.

translated_text: 导演 ： Julie Crowe
secondary_translated_text: Directed by: Julie Crowe

original_en_text: They rarely relax, always alert for potential danger, even deep in their own territory. To defeat them my focus must match their own.
original_zh_text: 就算在其领地深处，他们仍保持高度警戒。要想击败他们，我的专注力必须达到与其相当的水平。
translated_text: 他们也不会放松 ， 并保持警惕 ， 以防可能出现的危险。如果我们想打败他们 ， 我们必须非常小心。"
secondary_translated_text: They will not relax and remain vigilant in case of possible dangers. If we want to defeat them, we have to be very careful. "

original_en_text: Steam shooting automaton, forged to clean the Cogwork Core and keep it free of infestation.
original_zh_text: 喷射蒸汽清洁机枢核心的自动机。
translated_text: 蒸汽喷射发动机经过改造 ， 可清洁糖芯并保护其免受侵入。
secondary_translated_text: Steam jet engines have been modified to clean sugar cores and protect them from intrusion.

translated_text: 贝尔野兽 （ Bell Beast ）
secondary_translated_text: Bell Beast

original_en_text: Sticky young fly, born and grown in service to the Slab.
original_zh_text: 自幼服务于罪石牢狱的黏腻幼蝇。
translated_text: 年轻的粘性果蝇被用作仓库 ， 因此它们出生并繁殖。
secondary_translated_text: Young sticky fruit flies are used as warehouses, so they are born and reproduce.

translated_text: 周五的钟摆 （ Friday the Pendels ）
secondary_translated_text: Friday the Pendels

translated_text: 木头的蜜蜂。
secondary_translated_text: The wooden bee.

translated_text: 投诉的建议
secondary_translated_text: Suggestions for complaints

original_en_text: This mindless bug seems to sense only through its tendrils, yet despite that simplicity it still poses a serious threat.
original_zh_text: 虽只能凭借触须感知外界，这种虫子仍可以构成极大的威胁。
translated_text: 尽管它很简单 ， 但这种没有大脑的昆虫似乎是一个严重的威胁 ， 但它似乎只因其卷曲的胡须而脱颖而出。
secondary_translated_text: Despite its simplicity, the brainless insect seems to be a serious threat, but it seems to stand out only because of its curly beard.

translated_text: 酸性酸； 酸性酸；
secondary_translated_text: acidic acid; acidic acid;

translated_text: 野蛮的骷髅。
secondary_translated_text: Brutal skeleton.

original_en_text: Basic bug of Pharloom, laid low upon the ground.
translated_text: 落在地上的昆虫生活在地里。
secondary_translated_text: Insects that fall on the ground live in the ground.

original_en_text: I am fond of simple, effective traps such as this bug’s extendable spikes. An unwary predator would be skewered clean through.
original_zh_text: 我很欣赏它这一招，简单有效。莽撞的捕食者肯定会被它的背刺一击穿透。
translated_text: 我喜欢简单但有效的陷阱 ， 比如这个虚假的扩张点。
secondary_translated_text: I like simple but effective traps, such as this false expansion point.

original_en_text: Short pilgrim that uses their long horn to launch upon threats.
original_zh_text: 用长角将自己弹射向敌人的矮小朝圣者。
translated_text: 年轻的朝圣者用长号威胁他们。
secondary_translated_text: The young pilgrim threatened them with a trombone.

original_en_text: Thick-set bug consumed by haunted thread. Uses their solid frame to crush others.
original_zh_text: 被诅咒之丝缠裹的壮硕老者，用沉重甲壳碾压敌人。
translated_text: 厚的安装蠕虫被喇叭电缆消耗。用强大的身体摧毁别人。
secondary_translated_text: Thick installation worms are consumed by speaker cables. Destroy others with a strong body.

original_en_text: Fur covered crawler with a series of sharp spikes along its back.
translated_text: 一种多毛的爬行动物 ， 背上有尖刺。
secondary_translated_text: A hairy reptile with thorns on its back.

original_en_text: Burrowing worm that uses its many blunted teeth to dig through even the hardest bone.
original_zh_text: 拥有密集钝齿的穴居虫类，极其坚硬的骨质层也能被它们钻透。
translated_text: 头部蠕虫有许多钝齿 ， 甚至可以刺穿最硬的骨头。
secondary_translated_text: Head worms have many blunt teeth that can pierce even the hardest bones.

original_en_text: With this one vanquished, I hope to have sped the end for that jail and its distasteful order.
original_zh_text: 击败她或将加速那座监狱与其恶心秩序的终结。
translated_text: 我希望这次失败能加速监狱及其可恨秩序的结束。
secondary_translated_text: I hope this failure will accelerate the end of prisons and their hateful order.

original_en_text: Gelatinous coral drifter of simple mind and placid demeanour.
original_zh_text: 思维简单的凝胶状珊瑚生物，性情温和。
translated_text: Gum Coral 表达了一个简单而温和的观点。
secondary_translated_text: Gum Coral expressed a simple and moderate view.

original_en_text: Totem and god, built and worshipped by the Burning Bugs.
original_zh_text: 焚身信徒建造并敬奉的图腾神像。
translated_text: 它是由图腾 ， 神和燃烧的昆虫建造和崇拜的。
secondary_translated_text: It was built and worshipped by totems, gods and burning insects.

translated_text: 德里兹尼察村 （Driznica）
secondary_translated_text: Driznica Village

original_en_text: Skittish scrambler of the Far Fields. Its antennae resemble stalks of grass to aid in camouflage.
original_zh_text: 远野地区极易受惊的爬虫，触须能够伪装成草茎。
translated_text: 有一个缺陷隐藏在远处。水分类似于草茎 ， 有助于使其伪装。
secondary_translated_text: There is a flaw hidden in the distance. Moisture is similar to grass stems and helps camouflage it.

original_en_text: Infant fly, freshly hatched. At this age the soft, blind fly is little more than a bother.
original_zh_text: 刚破卵的盲眼软体幼蝇，不过是些烦扰的小东西。
translated_text: 小苍蝇刚长大。在这个年龄 ， 柔软和盲目的苍蝇会感到无聊。
secondary_translated_text: The little fly has just grown up. At this age, soft and blind flies can get bored.

translated_text: 原名 ： Tonbow
secondary_translated_text: Original name: Tonbow

original_en_text: Tall creature with sharp senses. Defends its herd with powerful legs and a sharp-tipped mask.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的生物，以尖角面甲与强健后肢守护族群。
translated_text: 它是一种非常性感的生物 ， 用强壮的脚和锋利的面具保护奶牛。
secondary_translated_text: It is a very sexy creature that protects cows with strong feet and a sharp mask.

translated_text: 坏项链。
secondary_translated_text: Bad necklace.

original_en_text: Cruel physician of Whiteward, responsible for operations and modifications on the Citadel’s bugs.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅的残酷医者，负责对圣堡甲虫实施手术与改造。
translated_text: Witthold ， 一个残酷的医生 ， 负责操纵和改变蠕虫。
secondary_translated_text: Witthold, a cruel doctor, is responsible for manipulating and changing worms.

original_en_text: The huge Judge likely stood through countless generations, never defeated, never wavering in their charge.
original_zh_text: 这庞然裁决者已矗立无数世代，未尝败绩，坚守职责从未动摇。
translated_text: 这位伟大的法官可能从未被无数代人打败过。
secondary_translated_text: This great judge may have never been defeated by countless generations.

original_en_text: These bugs look to have spent every waking moment at their work. Grim, endless labour in service of the unseen Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 这些虫子似乎将全部生命投入劳作。为自己从未见过的圣堡执行着阴郁无边的苦役。
translated_text: 我将不知疲倦地工作 ， 为上面看不见的岩石服务。
secondary_translated_text: I will work tirelessly to serve the invisible rocks above.

translated_text: 蒂米隆。
secondary_translated_text: Timiron.

translated_text: 等等 ， 等等。
secondary_translated_text: Wait, wait.

translated_text: 珀尔修斯 （ Perseo ）
secondary_translated_text: Perseo

original_en_text: Despite the Haunting of its shell, it has not been overcome with aggression. Its desire to flee remains too strong.
original_zh_text: 即使甲壳被丝咒侵蚀，其强烈的逃生本能依然压制住了被赋予的攻击性。
translated_text: 尽管它的美丽的外壳 ， 它并没有被入侵者征服。
secondary_translated_text: Despite its beautiful shell, it was not conquered by invaders.

original_en_text: Coral hulk with a dense shell, bred to immense size by the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 被圣堡忆廊催生至庞然体型的珊瑚厚甲虫。
translated_text: 被贝壳覆盖的珊瑚碎片爬上城堡纪念碑上的巨大珊瑚。
secondary_translated_text: Shards of coral covered by shells climb onto the giant coral on the castle monument.

translated_text: 卡拉尼达托
secondary_translated_text: Kalanidato

translated_text: Skull Tracker 的
secondary_translated_text: Skull Tracker

translated_text: 朝圣者的钟表
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrim's clock

original_en_text: Sturdy bug lost to the Haunting. Rolls at threats with no care for its own discomfort.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的健壮虫子。滚动碾压构成威胁的一切，无视自身痛楚。
translated_text: 强大的蠕虫被幽灵蠕虫摧毁。不要担心在面临威胁时感到不舒服。
secondary_translated_text: Powerful worms are destroyed by ghost worms. Don't worry about feeling uncomfortable when faced with threats.

original_en_text: Tiny empty creature, barely a bug. Swallows its prey whole and sucks their nutrients until nothing remains.
original_zh_text: 微型的虚无生物，几乎算不上是虫子。吞噬猎物至渣滓都不剩。
translated_text: 它是一个小生物 — 不是昆虫。它们完全吸收食物 ， 吸收营养 ， 直到没有食物留下。
secondary_translated_text: It's a small creature-not an insect. They completely absorb food and absorb nutrients until there is no food left.

translated_text: 培训不足的员工
secondary_translated_text: Inadequately trained employees

original_en_text: Quite a beautiful creature. In my own kingdom’s court, it would have been highly favoured as an ornamental pet.
original_zh_text: 如此美丽的生物。若在我故国的宫廷，定会成为贵族追捧的装饰性宠物。
translated_text: 在我的王国的花园里 ， 它们作为装饰动物非常受欢迎。
secondary_translated_text: They are very popular as decorative animals in the gardens of my kingdom.

original_en_text: There is surprising strength hidden in their thin, elegant limbs. It would be a pleasure to ride upon it...
original_zh_text: 优雅纤细的后肢中蕴含强大的力量，若能驯服必是绝佳坐骑。
translated_text: 他有纤细光滑的手臂和令人难以置信的力量的脚 ， 喜欢骑马。
secondary_translated_text: He has slender smooth arms and incredibly powerful feet and enjoys riding horses.

original_en_text: Whatever admiration I had for its fleecy down is spoilt by its disturbing mask... and its steely spines.
original_zh_text: 蓬松绒毛的吸引力被其阴森气质与钢刺彻底破坏。
translated_text: 他对羽毛的钦佩被他奇怪的面具和钢铁脊柱摧毁了。
secondary_translated_text: His admiration for feathers was destroyed by his strange mask and steel spine.

translated_text: 燃烧的昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: Burning insects.

original_en_text: Cymbal bearing worker of the Deep Docks. Pans the hauls of smokerock to find traces of more precious minerals.
original_zh_text: 深坞持钹工人，筛选烟岩中的珍贵矿物残渣。
translated_text: 为了寻找更有价值的矿物的痕迹 ， 一艘标志性的船只在一个深锚上摇摆着一系列岩石。
secondary_translated_text: Looking for traces of more valuable minerals, an iconic ship rocks a series of rocks on a deep anchor.

original_en_text: Sticky mollusc that defends itself by spraying burning fluid from growths on its back.
original_zh_text: 通过背部凸起喷射燃烧体液的防御型软体生物。
translated_text: 粘稠的软体动物通过从背部冲洗热液来保护自己。
secondary_translated_text: Sticky mollusks protect themselves by flushing hot fluid from their backs.

original_en_text: This one is pretty, but not as soft as first it seems. The plant it mimics is flaked and coarse, and the bug’s coat shares similar texture.
original_zh_text: 看似柔美实则粗粝，与其拟态植物的质感完全一致。
translated_text: 它很漂亮 ， 但一开始并不像看起来那么甜蜜。植物非常厚 ， 昆虫的外壳具有类似的纹理。
secondary_translated_text: It's beautiful, but not as sweet as it looks at first. The plants are very thick, and the shells of insects have similar textures.

original_en_text: Low level worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Instinct keeps them at their task, though in much simpler fashion than before.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的低级劳工，仍凭本能重复着旧日工作。
translated_text: 本能地 ， 他们比以前更容易做这项工作。
secondary_translated_text: Instinctively, it was easier for them to do the job than before.

original_en_text: Something in their assault reminds me of my own skill, though their talents are born purely of instinct. My technique is formed from hard training.
original_zh_text: 攻击套路和我有几分相像。不过他们靠的是祖传本能，我则是勤学苦练。
translated_text: “他的进攻让我想起了我的技能 ， 但他的天赋纯粹是本能的。
secondary_translated_text: "His offense reminds me of my skills, but his talent is purely instinctive.

original_en_text: Certain tools and skills can pierce its defences. I should adjust my strategy as needed.
original_zh_text: 正面硬撼绝非明智之举——只有特定的工具和技艺能撕开它的防御。
translated_text: 您可以使用不同的工具和技能来突破防御 ， 您的策略必须根据需要进行调整。
secondary_translated_text: You can use different tools and skills to break through defenses, and your strategy must be adjusted as needed.

translated_text: 雪莉的奶奶。
secondary_translated_text: Shirley's grandma.

translated_text: 给厨师准备一块地毯。
secondary_translated_text: Prepare a carpet for the chef.

original_en_text: Bug charged to catch dregs of Silk that fall from the Citadel. Will attack with its staff if provoked.
original_zh_text: 专职收集圣堡掉落灵丝碎屑的劳工，受干扰时会挥杖攻击。
translated_text: 煽动者的任务是收集从城堡中掉落的丝绸遗骸 ， 并用棍子攻击它们。
secondary_translated_text: The instigator's task was to collect silk remains that fell from the castle and attack them with sticks.

original_en_text: Similar bugs would gnaw away at unguarded food supplies in my homeland. As a child, I would hunt them, eager to make use of myself and test my skills.
original_zh_text: 我的故土也有类似的飞虫，它们会啃食未加看守的食物补给。年少时我经常猎杀它们，既为守护食物也为试炼技艺。
translated_text: 这些昆虫会在没有保护的情况下感染我们的食物。当我还是个孩子的时候 ， 我想追逐他们 ， 为自己而活 ， 并测试我的能力。
secondary_translated_text: These insects can infect our food without protection. When I was a kid, I wanted to chase them, live for myself, and test my abilities.

original_en_text: Automaton built in the shape of a scuttling bug. Its back contains retractable pins, intended to cut song cylinders free of any obstruction.
original_zh_text: 仿造爬虫外形的自动机，背部探针可切除阻塞音筒的障碍物。
translated_text: 该机器人的形状类似于飞行昆虫 ， 并且在其前面有一个扩展的刺 ， 旨在毫无障碍地切割弯曲的管道。
secondary_translated_text: The robot is shaped like a flying insect and has an extended thorn in front of it that is designed to cut curved pipes without obstacles.

translated_text: 手套是开放的。
secondary_translated_text: The gloves are open.

original_en_text: Uses their steel-bristled pin to scrub the soot from vents and pipes.
original_zh_text: 以钢鬃尖刺清理管道煤灰的劳工。
translated_text: 要从通风口和管道中去除灰尘 ， 请使用钢螺钉。
secondary_translated_text: To remove dust from vents and ducts, use steel screws.

original_en_text: Huge, yet stealthy Skarr. An expert trapper and master of the undergrowth.
original_zh_text: 精通丛林陷阱的斯卡尔猎手，身形庞大却又善于潜行。
translated_text: 巨大的 ， 但隐藏的图片。
secondary_translated_text: Huge but hidden pictures.

original_en_text: Lashing fragments of pure darkness, shaped into sharpened tentacles.
original_zh_text: 由纯粹黑暗凝聚而成的尖锐触手。
translated_text: 攻击纯粹黑暗的尖锐碎片 ， 形成触手。
secondary_translated_text: Attack sharp fragments of pure darkness, forming tentacles.

translated_text: 农场 （ 农业 ）
secondary_translated_text: Farm (Agriculture)

translated_text: 齿轮在舞蹈
secondary_translated_text: Gear in dance

original_en_text: Soft bug beneath a huge, horned skull. Charges at intruders to protect its territory and its smaller companions.
original_zh_text: 顶着怪兽头骨的软体虫，为保护地盘和自身柔软的内部，常对入侵者进行无差别冲锋。
translated_text: 头骨下面是一只大而柔软的昆虫 ， 有长长的角。侵略者必须保护他们的领土和他们的小伙伴。
secondary_translated_text: Below the skull is a large, soft insect with long horns. The invaders must protect their territory and their little partners.

original_en_text: Common winged bug of the lowlands. Generally docile, but will attack if threats come close.
original_zh_text: 低地区域常见的温顺飞虫，不过被惹急了也会攻击来犯者。
translated_text: 昆虫通常生活在低海拔地区。它们通常保持沉默 ， 但当威胁逼近时 ， 它们会发动攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Insects usually live in low-altitude areas. They usually remain silent, but attack when a threat approaches.

original_en_text: Foul creatures birthed into servitude. Their plight elicits no sympathy from me.
original_zh_text: 这些可悲的生物从蛹中钻出的瞬间，就被烙上了终生奴役的印记——但它们啃噬死囚腐肉时发出的欢快嗡鸣，实在让人难以怜悯。
translated_text: 不洁的生物生来就是奴隶 ， 她的处境并没有引起我的同情。
secondary_translated_text: The unclean creature was born a slave, and her situation did not arouse my sympathy.

original_en_text: The Haunting has stolen some important part of these bugs, yet still they attempt their former task. Until, that is, they sense my presence...
original_zh_text: 它们机械地重复着筛矿动作，直到感应到活物气息——那一刻，铜钹便化作呼啸的断头刃。
translated_text: Haunted 窃取了许多这些 bug ， 但看着以前的挑战 ， 我感觉到了我的存在。
secondary_translated_text: Haunted stole many of these bugs, but looking at previous challenges, I felt my presence.

translated_text: 分散它。
secondary_translated_text: Disperse it.

translated_text: 尤玛 ， 我的主人。
secondary_translated_text: Yuma, my master.

original_en_text: Mutated young worm infected with Plasmium. The new form displays potent regenerative skill.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的蠕虫幼体。其新形态展现出强大的再生能力。
translated_text: 突然被疟原虫感染的突变幼虫。
secondary_translated_text: Mutated larvae suddenly infected by malaria parasite.

translated_text: 杰里克的母亲。
secondary_translated_text: Jerick's mother.

original_en_text: Its core is filled with fine mechanisms, but that alone should not produce such a convincing mimic of life. Silk must also be used to animate this artifice, though exactly how I am not sure.
original_zh_text: 当灵丝顺着齿轮缝隙游走时，这台机器竟发出类似心跳的震颤——圣堡匠人究竟将多少生命奥秘编织进了这些钢铁躯壳？
translated_text: 它的核心充满了复杂的机制 ， 但这并不能使生活模拟器本身如此有吸引力。我们需要使用丝绸来激活这项技术 ， 但这不是我们使用它的方式。
secondary_translated_text: Its core is full of complex mechanisms, but that doesn't make the life simulator itself so attractive. We need to use silk to activate this technology, but that's not how we use it.

original_en_text: Its shell gives it the advantage of surprise, but also forces it into a slender, brittle shape that cannot withstand a heavy attack.
original_zh_text: 拟态外壳带来突袭优势，但纤细脆弱的体型难以承受重击。
translated_text: 它的外壳给它带来了意想不到的好处 ， 但同时也给了它一个长而脆弱的外观 ， 无法经受暴力攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Its shell gives it unexpected benefits, but also gives it a long, fragile appearance that cannot withstand violent attack.

original_en_text: Predatory plant with a powerful jaw shaped to resemble a lily pad.
original_zh_text: 伪装成睡莲的捕食性植物，拥有强有力的颚部。
translated_text: 捕食者 ， 像百合花一样硬的下巴
secondary_translated_text: Predator, jaw as hard as lily

translated_text: 烟幕 （Hisk）
secondary_translated_text: Smoke screen (Hisk)

translated_text: 摄影 ： Coylmaega
secondary_translated_text: Photo by Coylmaega

original_en_text: Airborne pest, less common than its grounded siblings. Attacks with sharp fangs if agitated.
original_zh_text: 其陆行同类的飞行变种，较为稀少。受到刺激时会使用利齿攻击。
translated_text: 空气传播的寄生虫比土壤中的类似寄生虫更常见。当他醒来时 ， 他会用锋利的牙齿攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Airborne parasites are more common than similar parasites in the soil. When he wakes up, he attacks with his sharp teeth.

original_en_text: The souls of so many bugs, obsessed with Silk, consumed by it. Their pain shall forever remain in that pit. Even I do not possess strength enough to cleanse it.
original_zh_text: 无数沉溺灵丝终被吞噬的灵魂，其苦痛将永远禁锢在这坑里。纵使是我也无力净化。
translated_text: 许多昆虫的灵魂被丝绸所占据 ， 被丝绸吞噬 ， 它们的痛苦永远留在它的洞里。
secondary_translated_text: The souls of many insects are occupied and swallowed by silk, and their pain remains in their holes forever.

original_en_text: Silk-spun child possessed by the void.
original_zh_text: 被虚空侵蚀的灵丝造物。
translated_text: 旋转器是空的。
secondary_translated_text: The spinner is empty.

original_en_text: Shell-plated worm found only in the deepest depths. Seems to survive despite consuming no food or liquid.
original_zh_text: 仅存于最深处的甲壳蠕虫，无需进食或饮水仍能存活。
translated_text: 在她身体最深处发现了一种癌症蠕虫 ， 显然她在没有吃食物或液体的情况下幸存下来。
secondary_translated_text: A cancer worm was found in the deepest part of her body and she apparently survived without eating food or fluids.

translated_text: 关于 Al Horistán
secondary_translated_text: About Al Horistán

translated_text: 对于读者：
secondary_translated_text: For readers:

original_en_text: Trap setting bug carrying a pouch of sharpened long-stakes.
original_zh_text: 携带尖锐长木桩布置陷阱的虫子。
translated_text: 抓住他的昆虫有一个长而锋利的袋子。
secondary_translated_text: The insect that grabbed him had a long, sharp bag.

translated_text: 导演： Doran Lord
secondary_translated_text: Directed by: Doran Lord

original_en_text: Aged female mite, grown larger and stronger than most of its kin.
original_zh_text: 年迈的雌性螨虫，体型力量都远超同类。
translated_text: 年龄较大的雌性比其他物种更大 ， 更强壮。
secondary_translated_text: Older females are bigger and stronger than other species.

original_en_text: Mass of old masks swollen and animated by writhing void.
original_zh_text: 由纠缠的虚空驱动而膨胀、复活的一团古老面甲。
translated_text: 许多旧面具是由裂缝爬行和扩张引起的。
secondary_translated_text: Many old masks are caused by cracks crawling and expanding.

original_en_text: Pernicious looter found all over Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在纺络全境四处劫掠的卑劣盗虫。
translated_text: 到处都有飞机。
secondary_translated_text: There are planes everywhere.

original_en_text: Small bug, shackled and cowled for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 戴着镣铐，被蒙住头部的圣堡罪徒。
translated_text: 巴加因在城堡里犯下的罪行而被戴上手铐 ， 并被迫戴面纱。
secondary_translated_text: Baga was handcuffed and forced to wear a veil for crimes committed in the castle.

original_en_text: Flighty insect that lives beside still waters.
original_zh_text: 栖息静水边的敏感飞虫。
translated_text: 生活在平静水域附近的轻型昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: Light insects that live near calm waters.

original_en_text: Its form is certainly based on bugs found outside the Citadel. In my own craftwork, I too often look to nature for inspiration.
original_zh_text: 那对仿生复眼能精准识别音筒纹路，探针起舞时溅起的火花，竟在钢壁上刻出类似灵丝符文的痕迹。
translated_text: 它的形状是基于自然在城堡外发现的昆虫。在我的艺术中 ， 我经常画大自然。
secondary_translated_text: Its shape is based on insects naturally found outside the castle. In my art, I often paint nature.

translated_text: 奶油 （奶油）
secondary_translated_text: Cream (cream)

original_en_text: Birth equipped this one well. In its assault it becomes its own projectile.
original_zh_text: 它们生来就是活体投掷物——将整个身躯化作飞矛，用长角贯穿目标。
translated_text: 那个男人的手臂天生就是在攻击中成为自己的投影。
secondary_translated_text: That man's arm was born to be his projection in attack.

original_en_text: Their heavier bells armour them well against my strikes, but against that oppressive heat... can they help at all?
original_zh_text: 它们厚重的钟甲可以抵挡我的针刃，但在酷热环境中恐怕难有作为。
translated_text: 他们沉重的奴隶将保护他们免受我的打击 ， 但他们也将保护他们免受炎热和蒸汽。
secondary_translated_text: Their heavy slaves will protect them from my blows, but they will also protect them from the heat and steam.

original_en_text: A rare built bug within these ailing lands. Most pilgrims’ shells seem small by comparison. What nourishment did they discover to grow so large?
original_zh_text: 在纺络这片病恹恹的土地上，这般体型的虫子实属罕见。与它们相比，其他朝圣者的外壳简直孱弱如卵。它们究竟吞食了什么，才能膨胀至此等体型？
translated_text: 这是在生病的土壤中罕见的昆虫。与此同时 ， 大多数朝圣者的贝壳看起来非常小。重要的营养成分有哪些？
secondary_translated_text: This is a rare insect in sick soil. At the same time, most pilgrims 'shells appear very small. What are the important nutrients?

original_en_text: With a softer shell than most, they would have relied on their athleticism to survive.
original_zh_text: 甲壳柔软脆弱，全靠昔日矫健的身手生存。
translated_text: 由于贝壳比大多数人更柔软 ， 它们只能靠自己的移动能力生存。
secondary_translated_text: Because shells are softer than most people, they can only survive on their own ability to move.

translated_text: 捕虫人
secondary_translated_text: insect catcher

original_en_text: Common crawler that lives beneath sand.
translated_text: 生活在海滩上的爬行动物。
secondary_translated_text: Reptiles living on the beach.

translated_text: 作者： Finch Bitter
secondary_translated_text: Written by Finch Bitter

translated_text: 架子的。
secondary_translated_text: It's shelf.

translated_text: 飞翔的动物
secondary_translated_text: Flying animals

original_en_text: Silk and shells corrupted. That void seeks now to claim this land whole. These poor shells are only the beginning.
original_zh_text: 灵丝与甲壳皆遭腐蚀，虚空正逐步蚕食这地界，这些可怜的甲壳不过是开端。
translated_text: 丝绸和贝壳都是腐蚀性的。现在 ， 他们正试图征服这片土地。
secondary_translated_text: Silk and shells are corrosive. Now they are trying to conquer this land.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger that roosts high in caverns and preys on passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 盘踞洞顶的食腐飞虫，惯用群体战术袭击朝圣者。
translated_text: 尖叫的猎人生活在洞穴中 ， 利用路过的朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: Screaming hunters live in caves, taking advantage of passing pilgrims.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, capable of remaining perfectly still for long periods, but unexpectedly swift when roused.
original_zh_text: 能长期静止拟态成树枝，受惊时发动闪电突袭。
translated_text: 模仿树枝的昆虫在很长一段时间内完全静止不动 ， 但它们可以以惊人的速度醒来。
secondary_translated_text: Insects that mimic branches remain completely stationary for long periods of time, but they can wake up at an alarming rate.

original_en_text: This larger form carries so much weight it can barely move from its place.
original_zh_text: 庞大身躯使其几乎无法离开原位。
translated_text: 这个巨大的形状是如此沉重 ， 几乎不可能从你的形状中取出它。
secondary_translated_text: This huge shape is so heavy that it is almost impossible to remove it from your shape.

translated_text: 这是 Scroll 。
secondary_translated_text: This is Scroll.

original_en_text: Small construct built by Weavers past, brought to life through Silk runes threaded within.
original_zh_text: 远古织者铸造的小型装置，通过灵丝符文赋予生命。
translated_text: Weaver 过去的小结构已经通过通往内部的丝绸走廊恢复。
secondary_translated_text: Weaver's small past structure has been restored through a silk corridor leading to the interior.

original_en_text: The less these gruesome bugs breed, the better.
original_zh_text: 这种烦扰的虫子繁殖得越少越好。
translated_text: 这些可怕的昆虫的繁殖越少 ， 就越好。
secondary_translated_text: The less these terrible insects reproduce, the better.

original_en_text: Gilded servant of the Whispering Vaults, born to read and recall the near endless scrolls of prayer.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的金袍仆从，专司诵读那些浩繁无尽的经文。
translated_text: 房间里的金色仆人低语是阅读和记忆无限的祈祷。
secondary_translated_text: The golden servant in the room whispered infinite prayers to read and remember.

translated_text: 鱿鸟
secondary_translated_text: Squid bird

original_en_text: I cannot decipher its function to the greater Core. Is it built for defence? If so, its passivity seems far from optimal.
original_zh_text: 这些悬浮铁球会在入侵者靠近时突然爆开尖刺，但过于迟缓的反应速度，让它们更像布满锈迹的装饰品。
translated_text: 能否破译其对核防御的最大影响 ？如果是这样 ， 这种被动性就不完美了。
secondary_translated_text: Can we decipher its greatest impact on nuclear defense? If this is the case, this passivity is imperfect.

original_en_text: If not for the spikes, I would think it an appealing bug.
original_zh_text: 若没有尖刺，我会觉得它笨拙可爱。
translated_text: 如果没有手指 ， 我认为这是一个迷人的错误。
secondary_translated_text: If there were no fingers, I think it would be a fascinating mistake.

original_en_text: Hovering pest with a hollowed proboscis able to spit gobs of sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 通过中空口器喷射胆汁的悬浮虫。
translated_text: 寄生在空茎上的寄生虫可以吐出胆汁。
secondary_translated_text: Parasites that live on empty stems can spit out bile.

original_en_text: This surface dweller is free of Silk. Its nature remains its own. The monarch’s influence must only have stretched below it.
original_zh_text: 这地表生物未被丝咒侵蚀，看来圣堡君主的控制尚未延伸至此。
translated_text: 这片土地上的居民不是丝绸。你的心是你的份额。国王的影响力较小。
secondary_translated_text: The inhabitants of this land are not silk. Your heart is your share. The king has less influence.

original_en_text: Did they ever truly understand those inscrutable scrolls? Or is it all merely pretence, an endless act to maintain their order’s station within the Citadel?
original_zh_text: 他们是否真的理解那些晦涩的经文？还是说，这一切不过是伪装，一场无休止的表演，只为维持他们在城堡中的地位？
translated_text: 你真的知道这个谜吗 ？或者它应该是一个无限的视图 ， 以保持城堡的秩序和地位 ？
secondary_translated_text: Do you really know this mystery? Or should it be an infinite view to maintain the order and status of the castle?

translated_text: 珊瑚之家 / Coral House
secondary_translated_text: Coral House/ Coral House

original_en_text: Its assault... like a young bug’s toy turned deadly. Could I, in time, fashion a spinning tool to match?
original_zh_text: 其攻击如同将孩童的玩具变成致命武器，或许我能制作类似原理的纺织工具？
translated_text: 它就像一只小昆虫变成了一个致命的玩具。你能及时创建旋转仪器吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: It's like a little insect turning into a deadly toy. Can you create a rotating instrument in time?

original_en_text: Though grey with age, their frayed form suggested a being strung from Silk, one who welcomed a decisive end in combat over a slow decline.
original_zh_text: 苍老的躯壳布满灵丝束痕。比起缓慢凋零，它更渴求战死的终局。
translated_text: 他的外表 ， 年龄撕裂 ， 是一个丝绸人面临着一个缓慢下降的战斗的决定性结局。
secondary_translated_text: His appearance, torn by age, is the decisive conclusion of a silk man facing a slow-descending battle.

translated_text: 伟大的大师。
secondary_translated_text: Great master.

original_en_text: Infant form of the more formidable Craggler.
original_zh_text: 酸蚀巨螯的幼年形态，通过同类相残争夺成长机会。
translated_text: 克鲁格勒最强大的儿子。
secondary_translated_text: Kruger's most powerful son.

original_en_text: Either its size has made it fearless or the Haunting has removed its sense of self-preservation.
original_zh_text: 要么是巨大的体型给了它勇气，要么是丝咒把它怕死的本性麻痹了。
translated_text: 要么你的形状吓到你 ， 要么你的依恋让你失去了自我保护的感觉。
secondary_translated_text: Either your shape scares you, or your attachment makes you lose your sense of self-protection.

original_en_text: Barely a bug, and possessing only basic thought, yet instinct alone proved enough to turn it deadly.
original_zh_text: 几乎算不上虫子，只有最基本的思维。然而，其攻击的本能已足够致命。
translated_text: 这是一个基本的想法 ， 不是一个错误 ， 但事实证明 ， 本能可能是致命的。
secondary_translated_text: This is a basic idea, not a mistake, but it turns out that instinct can be fatal.

translated_text: 螺旋的火花 （ 英文 ）
secondary_translated_text: Sparks of the spiral (English)

original_en_text: Bursts forth at movement sensed close, and will consume any object or bug careless enough to fall into its maw.
original_zh_text: 当流沙开始诡谲涌动时，你只剩半次心跳的时间逃离那张深渊巨口。
translated_text: 当他们听到附近移动的声音时 ， 他们会爆炸 ， 不小心吃掉物体或昆虫 ， 最终掉进胃里。
secondary_translated_text: When they hear movements nearby, they explode, accidentally eat objects or insects, and eventually fall into their stomachs.

original_en_text: Pointed scurrier posing as plant life.
original_zh_text: 伪装成植物的带刺疾行者。
translated_text: 蜘蛛模仿植物。
secondary_translated_text: Spiders imitate plants.

original_en_text: Verminous pest, common throughout the dark corners of Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 灰沼阴暗角落滋生的害虫。
translated_text: 寄生虫经常出现在格里莫尔的黑暗角落里。
secondary_translated_text: Parasites often appear in the dark corners of Grimmore.

original_en_text: Its fur is thick and silky. Sadly, lost to its Haunting, I shall never safely be able to touch it.
original_zh_text: 厚实丝绒般的皮毛令人神往，可惜其受丝咒侵蚀，再难安全抚触。
translated_text: 她的皮肤厚而柔软。不幸的是 ， 她永远不会安全 ， 因为她不会被触摸。
secondary_translated_text: Her skin is thick and soft. Unfortunately, she will never be safe because she will not be touched.

translated_text: Hawk Hooker 饰
secondary_translated_text: Hawk Hooker

translated_text: 最喜欢的翅膀
secondary_translated_text: Favorite wings

original_en_text: Her body seemed a Weaver’s, but her mask had been forcibly removed, and her own Silk was bound useless by heavy pins lodged through her spine.
original_zh_text: 她身形似织者，但面甲被强行剥离，脊背打入的重钉也使其灵丝失效。
translated_text: 她的身体看起来像一个框架 ， 但面具被强行取下 ， 丝绸被沉重的荆棘捆绑在一起 ， 插入脊柱。
secondary_translated_text: Her body looked like a frame, but the mask was forcibly removed and the silk was tied together by heavy thorns and inserted into the spine.

original_en_text: Fierce and fast, and defending their lands even from birth. These are children to be proud of.
original_zh_text: 凶猛迅捷，自出生起就守卫故土，是值得骄傲的后裔。
translated_text: 他坚强而敏捷 ， 从出生起就保护着祖国。
secondary_translated_text: He is strong and agile, protecting his country from birth.

original_en_text: Like fabric somehow sprung to life. Its pelt is perfectly matched to the rags it infests.
original_zh_text: 外色颜色与寄居的布料完美融合，就像被赋予生命的织物。
translated_text: 但不知何故 ， 它会复制。皮肤完全适合受感染的组织。
secondary_translated_text: But somehow, it will replicate. The skin fits perfectly into infected tissue.

original_en_text: Its wings are quite small compared to its bulk. Perhaps it uses the warm air of these fiery lands to help stay airborne. Clever, if so.
original_zh_text: 翅膀小身体胖，估计是利用这片炽热地带的热气流飞起来的——还挺聪明。
translated_text: 翅膀相对于它们的大小来说非常小 ， 所以使用来自温暖地球的热空气来保持空气是明智的。
secondary_translated_text: The wings are very small relative to their size, so it's wise to use hot air from the warm earth to hold the air.

original_en_text: Gold ranked disciple of the Choir and direct servant to the Citadel’s Conductors.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的高阶信徒，圣堡指挥家的直系仆从。
translated_text: 当地唱诗班的金门徒 ， 隶属于当地指挥官。
secondary_translated_text: The golden disciples of the local choir are subordinate to the local commander.

original_en_text: The large bell seems to signify them as once leader of a climbing troupe, though the Haunting has erased that former authority.
original_zh_text: 那柄铭刻朝圣路线的钟杖曾是领袖象征，如今却成了敲碎追随者颅骨的凶器。
translated_text: 巨大的奴隶似乎表明他们曾经是登山队的领导者 ， 但他们的痴迷使他们以前的权威消失了。
secondary_translated_text: The huge slaves seem to indicate that they were once leaders of the climbing team, but their obsession has wiped out their former authority.

original_en_text: Avoiding their ambush is a good test of my senses, and my ability to rapidly retaliate.
original_zh_text: 规避其伏击是对感知力的考验，快速反击能力同样关键。
translated_text: 躲避伏击对我的情绪和快速战斗能力来说是一个很好的考验。
secondary_translated_text: Avoiding an ambush was a good test of my emotions and ability to fight quickly.

original_en_text: To quell the mother’s rage, and see this kingdom saved, I will claim her back. This one... the dark shall not take.
original_zh_text: 为了平息苍白之母的暴怒、拯救这个王国，我必夺回这个孩子的本心——绝不容许虚空将她吞噬。
translated_text: 我把我的母亲还给我 ， 以便减轻我的愤怒 ， 拯救王国。
secondary_translated_text: I returned my mother to me to alleviate my anger and save the kingdom.

translated_text: 护卫舰飞行
secondary_translated_text: frigate flight

translated_text: 迷失的种族
secondary_translated_text: The lost race

original_en_text: Cogwork knight of Pharloom, once protector of its pilgrims, and master of the scissor blade.
original_zh_text: 曾护卫朝圣者的机械骑士，如今双刃剪成为致命凶器。
translated_text: 武装的秋季骑士是朝圣者和香料商人的守护者。
secondary_translated_text: Armed autumn knights are guardians of pilgrims and spice merchants.

original_en_text: <page>No. Not their enemy, and their prisoner not through malice. I am Eva, a thing... difficult to describe, a child of Weavers, yet not quite their kin...<hpage>How strange. That description could fit me as well as yourself. <page>Child of Weavers?... And not? I can detect your Weaver strain, yet you are different from them, and from me, a shifting, blended thing? What are you creature?<page>Step closer, lady, that my senses would better understand your nature.
original_zh_text: <page>不是，也并非因为罪行囚禁。我叫伊娃，是……有点复杂，是织者后裔但又不完全是……<hpage>真奇妙。这番描述同样适用于我。<page>你也是织者后裔？……但又不是？我能感知你的织者血统，但你既不同于他们，也不同于我，一个流动的混合体？你究竟是什么？<page>请靠近些，女士，方便我感知你的本质。
translated_text: <page>他的敌人和囚犯都不是韦弗的孩子 ， 但他的父母也不是。<hpage>这真是奇怪。这个描述对你来说是完美的。<page>INVC 纺织产品有很多选择 ， 但是 ... ...你不像他们 ， 你不像我 ， 你在进化和混合 ， 你是什么样的生物 ？<page>你越靠近 ， 你就越能理解我的感受。"
secondary_translated_text: <page>Neither his enemies nor prisoners were Weaver's children, but neither were his parents.<hpage>This is really weird. This description is perfect for you.<page>INVC textile products have many options, but... ... You are not like them, you are not like me, you are evolving and mixing, what kind of creature are you?<page>The closer you get, the more you understand how I feel. "

original_en_text: Lady, still my senses resound. You seem so far beyond the bounds of a bug.<page>Permit me to gaze again upon your nature, that I may offer clarity.
original_zh_text: 女士，我的感知再度震颤。您已远远超过凡虫界限。<page>请允许我再次深入感知，才好仔细说明
translated_text: 我的情绪总是在共鸣。看来你已经克服了这个错误。<page>如果你再看看你的本性 ， 我会给你最后的答案。
secondary_translated_text: My emotions are always resonating. It seems that you have overcome this mistake.<page>If you look at your nature again, I will give you the final answer.

original_en_text: Lady? So you live, still. This is good... I had felt the conflict commence, pale hearts ablaze, and the sudden well of darkness after.<hpage>I am sorry, Eva. I had hoped to slay the monarch, and was near achieving that goal, but the situation has become... complicated. Now, all of Pharloom threatens to fall.<page>But I can sense it in you, lady. You have not yielded to despair, so some hope must still remain?<hpage>...Slim hope, I suspect. But true, there may yet be a way through this disaster. I shall pursue that goal with whatever strength remains.<page>Then allow me to continue to aid you as I can... Mine might be a small contribution, but I shall provide it eagerly.
original_zh_text: 女士？你还活着，真是太好了……我早已感受到冲突的爆发，苍白之心熊熊燃烧，而后是突如其来的黑暗深渊。<hpage>抱歉，伊娃。我本希望斩杀君主，几乎就要达成目标，但情况变得……复杂了。如今整个纺络都濒临倾覆。<page>但我能从你身上感受到，女士。你仍未屈服于绝望，是否意味着尚存一线希望？<hpage>……希望渺茫。但确实，或许仍有办法化解这场灾难。我将用残存之力追寻这个目标。<page>那么请允许我继续尽力协助你……虽只是微薄之力，但我必倾心奉献。
translated_text: 夫人 ？所以你还活着 ， 一切都很好 ， 一切都很好 ， 我感觉到冲突 ， 苍白的心在燃烧 ， 然后突然间 ， 黑暗的深渊开始了。<hpage>我很抱歉 ， 我想杀了夏娃王 ， 但情况如何 ？情况变得越来越复杂 ， 现在整个帕哈姆都处于崩溃的危险之中。<page>“对不起 ， 小姐 ， 如果你不是绝望的 ， 你还有希望吗 ？ ”<hpage>...也许我们的希望是微弱的 ， 也许我们有办法克服这场灾难 ， 我们将尽一切努力实现这一目标。<page>我们的贡献可能很小 ， 但我们会努力为您服务。
secondary_translated_text: Madam? So you're still alive, everything is fine, everything is fine, I feel conflict, my pale heart is burning, and then suddenly, the dark abyss begins.<hpage>I'm sorry, I wanted to kill King Eve, but what happened? The situation has become more and more complex, and now the entire Paham is in danger of collapse.<page>"I'm sorry, miss, but if you weren't desperate, would you still have hope?”<hpage>... Maybe our hope is faint, maybe we have a way to overcome this disaster, and we will do everything we can to achieve this goal.<page>Our contribution may be small, but we will try our best to serve you.

original_en_text: Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bug’s. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing, worth my long life to behold.<page>With what power I possess, I may still be able to aid you further.
original_zh_text: 不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>以我的力量，或许可以助你更上一层。
translated_text: 不可思议 ... ...它的性质与人类蠕虫的性质大不相同。你的衣服很小 ， 塑料的。值得在我的生活中看到它。<page>如果我有力量 ， 我可以帮你更多。
secondary_translated_text: Incredible... ... Its properties are very different from those of human worms. Your clothes are small, plastic. Worth seeing it in my life.<page>If I had the power, I could help you more.

original_en_text: <hpage>Eva, I am seeking a tool, told to be somewhere in this structure. It is a snare device of Weaver make. Do you know of it?<page>I may, lady. Search over from here, on side where the moss meets the nest. There, my mothers built their tools, all traps and bindings. Small things, but tests for larger forms.<page>I still remember their thoughts as they worked, their desperation, and their hunger. Another hopeless attempt to wrest their freedom. All ended in failure, of course.
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，我在寻找织者制造的陷阱装置。你知道在哪么？<page>有点印象。您可以去青苔与巢穴交界处搜寻，母亲们曾在那制造工具。虽是些小玩意，却是为了更大的图谋。<page>我还记得她们制作时的思绪，那份绝望与饥渴，又一次争夺自由的徒劳尝试。当然，终归失败。
translated_text: <hpage>伊娃 ， 我在那栋楼里找一个工具。<page>- 看看这里是甲虫和巢的交叉口。母亲创造工具 ， 陷阱和限制。这是一个小问题 ， 但它正在以更大的方式体验。<page>我仍然记得他对工作、绝望和饥饿的想法 ， 这是一种徒劳的企图 ， 企图剥夺他的自由。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Eva, I was looking for a tool in that building.<page>- Look at the intersection of beetles and nests. Mothers create tools, traps and limitations. This is a small issue, but it is being experienced in a larger way.<page>I still remember his thoughts on work, despair and hunger, a futile attempt to deprive him of his freedom.

original_en_text: Ain’t you come a long way, bellringer! Granting wishes, saving bugs, even rousing my sullen family to act!<page>The snare is set above, our power bound along its thread. To your sight it may seem a crude thing, but there’s fair strength to it... enough to quell a god.<hpage>You and your family have done me well, sir. I shall prove your faith in the meeting ahead.<page>Aye. Bring your best, bellringer. Call forth our great pale god. Cut her weak, then drive the beast down atop the snare.<page>Contact made will stir the snare alight, but only your needle’s song will awaken the spell in full. When that moment arrives, you’ll see it clear.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者，你这一路可够折腾！祈愿、救虫，连我那些沉默的同族都让你说动了！<page>陷阱已在上方布好，我们的力量都缠在丝线上。看着简陋，但威力足够……连神都能制住。<hpage>你们一族对我多次相助，我必将不负所托。<page>那就好，敲钟者，拿出真本事。把那苍白之神引出来，先削弱她，再逼到陷阱上方。<page>触碰陷阱就会激活丝线，但只有你的织针之乐能彻底唤醒术式。时机一到，你自然明白。
translated_text: 你走了很长的路， 贝瑞。唤醒不幸的家庭成员 ， 实现你的愿望 ， 避免错误 ， 并采取行动！<page>这是一个陷阱 ， 我们的权力与之相连。他可能看起来不礼貌 ， 但他有相当大的权力。<hpage>你和你的家人对我都很好。<page>“成为你最好的性格 ， 贝林格 ， 祈祷伟大的上帝减少你的力量 ， 捕捉野兽。<page>陷阱通过触摸激活 ， 但只有针尖才能完全唤醒咒语。
secondary_translated_text: You've come a long way, Barry. Wake up unfortunate family members, fulfill your wishes, avoid mistakes, and take action!<page>This is a trap to which our power is connected. He may seem impolite, but he has considerable power.<hpage>You and your family have been very kind to me.<page>"Be your best character, Belinger, and pray the great God to reduce your strength and capture the beast.<page>The trap is activated by touch, but only the tip of the needle can fully awaken the spell.

original_en_text: <page>Lady, please. Permit me to look upon your nature, that I may offer clarity...
original_zh_text: <page>女士，请允许我深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: <page>让我们来检查它的本质并澄清。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Let's examine its essence and clarify it.

original_en_text: Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bug’s. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing, worth my long life to behold.<page>If in your travels you are able to further evolve, return to me. With what power I possess, I may be able to aid you further.<hpage>Thank you, Eva. If my nature expands as you say, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>如果旅途中你再度进化，请回来找我。以我的力量，或许可以助你更上一层。<hpage>多谢，伊娃。若我本质确实再度进化，我会回来找你。
translated_text: 不可思议 ... ...它的本性与人的本性截然不同。你的小可塑性是一个令人难以置信的现象 ， 值得在我漫长的一生中留下深刻印象。<page>如果你能在你的旅程中取得进步 ， 那就回到我身边。<hpage>谢谢 Eve！当我的本性被传播 ， 就像你说的 ， 我会回来。
secondary_translated_text: Incredible... ... Its nature is completely different from human nature. Your little plasticity is an incredible phenomenon that deserves to be impressed throughout my long life.<page>If you can make progress on your journey, come back to me.<hpage>Thanks Eve! When my true nature is spread, as you said, I will come back.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have known your kind before, sir. Yours is a tribe that works and trades in power, and I am about to extinguish its prime source.<hpage>Once this is done, will you truly delight in a land so bereft?<page>Aye, well... My family’s marks are all over that trap. And we’ve spent a hard age avoiding the gaze of our god.<page>If we earned it now, after such open opposition... that’s a bleak conclusion none of us’d care for.<page>Now! My job’s done. S’time your grand business began! We’ll be wishin’ victory to you, bellringer, for all our sakes!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我曾见过你的同族。你们一族专门兜售力量，而我正要掐灭这力量的源头。<hpage>事成之后，这力量真空的世界真能让你们感到高兴？<page>哈……陷阱上现在全是家族徽记，我们也躲那苍白之神半辈子了。<page>要是现在因为公然反抗栽了……这种憋屈结局谁受得了？<page>好了！我活儿干完了。该你大显身手了！敲钟者，你可一定要赢啊，都指望着你呢！
translated_text: <hpage>你的部落是一个充满工作和权力谈判的部落 ， 我正在努力消除这种情况的原因。<hpage>当这一切都结束了 ， 我会在失去亲人的地球上真正快乐吗 ？"<page>我们家的房子是封闭的 ， 很难逃脱上帝的眼睛。<page>在全国反对之后 ， 如果我们现在获胜 ， 那将是一个悲伤的结论 ， 没有人会在乎。<page>来吧 ， 现在！是时候开始伟大的职业生涯了。让我们大家敲响钟声 ， 祝愿胜利！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your tribe is a tribe full of work and power negotiations, and I am working to eliminate the reasons for this.<hpage>When this is all over, will I truly be happy on earth where I have lost loved ones? "<page>Our house is closed and it is difficult to escape the eyes of God.<page>After national opposition, if we win now, it will be a sad conclusion that no one will care.<page>Come on, now! It's time to start a great career. Let us all ring the bell and wish victory!

original_en_text: <hpage>You see one’s nature, Eva? It is a skill far beyond bugs.<page>One not without cost. My sight perceives a bug only through the imprint upon their soul. <hpage>You speak of their crest? That signifier of a bug’s essence and their invisible yoke born through a lifetime.<page>Crest? Yes, the old Weaver term. A simple word to attempt description of something so profound.<page>But wait. Your own nature... Is it?...<page>Lady, permit me to look deeper still, that I may offer clarity...
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，你能洞见本质？这等技艺远超虫类。<page>自然是有代价的。我需透过灵魂印记窥视生灵。<hpage>你是指纹章？那象征虫民全部存在与无形枷锁的标记？<page>纹章？对，织者用的古称，试图以简单词汇描述深邃之物。<page>等等，你的本质……莫非……<page>女士，请允许我深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: <hpage>你见过人性吗？错误就是超越错误的能力。<page>我的眼睛只能看到昆虫灵魂的痕迹。<hpage>您在 Winnipeg 吗 ？它象征着昆虫的天性和无形的生命链。<page>克里斯蒂娜的？在 Weaver 中 ， 这是一个古老的术语 ， 可以用一个词来概括。<page>你在等待你的本性 ， 真理。<page>它可以提供更深刻的理解和更清晰的信息。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Have you ever seen human nature? Mistakes are the ability to transcend mistakes.<page>My eyes can only see traces of insect souls.<hpage>Are you in Winnipeg? It symbolizes the nature and invisible chain of life of insects.<page>Christina's? In Weaver, this is an ancient term that can be summarized in one word.<page>You are waiting for your nature, the truth.<page>It can provide deeper understanding and clearer information.

translated_text: ” 的观点。
secondary_translated_text: "The view.

original_en_text: Lady, Pharloom’s time grows short. If you are able to further expand your nature, I urge you return to me.<page>Any power I possess, I shall grant it for your aid.<hpage>My thanks, Eva. If my nature expands as you say, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 女士，纺络时日无多。若你能进一步突破自身极限，请务必回到我身边。<page>我拥有的任何力量，都将为你所用。<hpage>感激不尽，伊娃。若真如你所言突破极限，我定会回来。
translated_text: 如果您在法罗群岛的时间很短， 如果您可以进一步传播自然， 我建议您回到我身边。<page>无论你有什么 ， 我都会用它来帮助你。<hpage>谢谢 Eve！当我的本性被传播 ， 就像你说的 ， 我会回来。
secondary_translated_text: If your time in the Faroe Islands is short and if you can further spread nature, I suggest you come back to me.<page>Whatever you have, I will use it to help you.<hpage>Thanks Eve! When my true nature is spread, as you said, I will come back.

translated_text: 夏娃的位置。
secondary_translated_text: Eve's location.

original_en_text: Stay back, twisted leech! Even lodged within another’s shell, your ravenous nature shines clear.<page>You shall not defoul this chamber, nor claim my soul. Begone!
original_zh_text: 退后，扭曲的寄生物！即便寄居他者躯壳也藏不住贪婪本性。<page>休想玷污此地，更别妄图吞噬我的灵魂。滚开！
translated_text: “回来吧 ， 弓断了。即使在别人的外壳里 ， 贪婪的天性也闪耀着光芒。<page>我不能夺走你的房间 ， 我不能夺走你的灵魂 ， 快跑！
secondary_translated_text: "Come back, the bow is broken. Even in the shell of others, the greedy nature shines.<page>I can't take away your room, I can't take away your soul, run!

original_en_text: Lady... Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bugs. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing. Worth my long life to behold.<page>Unbound one, though we know each other little, permit me to ask a selfish request.<hpage>Your talent has provided a great benefit, Eva. What is it you desire of me?<page>Only to have my own soul, my own memories, bound within your shell... As you have done with those others throughout these lands.<page>I would not define as a crest within you, but my small strength may still grant a final boon.<hpage>You ask to be subsumed? Know your mind would cease to be, in any independent sense.<page>To be united with one unbound... This is the kind of escape I once prayed for, though the weight of ages had almost made me forget.<page>Lady, would you grant me this request?
original_zh_text: 女士……不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>无羁者啊，虽然相交尚浅，但我仍想提出一个自私请求。<hpage>你帮了我很多，伊娃。你想要什么？<page>请您将我的灵魂与记忆缚于您的壳中，就像您其他生物所做的那样。<page>虽然称不上是纹章，但或许能为您献上最后一份微薄馈赠。<hpage>你想被我吞噬？你要知道，那意味着独立意识将不复存在。<page>我明白，但自愿如此。能与无羁者合而为一……是我昔日渴求的解脱，尽管岁月让我几乎遗忘。<page>亲爱的女士，您愿意成全我吗？
translated_text: 女士 ...不可思议 ... ...它们的性质与昆虫截然不同。我的小塑料它是如此之大。我很感激我的长寿<page>我们自由人提出我们不知道的自私的要求。<hpage>伊娃的天赋给了我们一个巨大的优势。你想让我做什么 ？<page>我依附于你的外壳 ， 拥有我的灵魂和记忆 ， 就像你在地球上的任何地方一样。<page>虽然我没有指定它为你灵魂的象征 ， 但我的小力量仍然可以带给你最大的祝福。<hpage>你想加入他们吗 ？你知道 ， 你的思想不再独立存在 ， 你不再在同一个地方。<page>与没有残疾的人一起工作一直是我祈祷的避难所 ， 但在时间的压力下 ， 我几乎忘记了。<page>你同意这个要求吗 ？" "
secondary_translated_text: Madam... Incredible... ... Their properties are completely different from those of insects. My little plastic it's so big. I am grateful for my long life<page>We free people make selfish demands that we don't know about.<hpage>Eva's talent gives us a huge advantage. What do you want me to do?<page>I cling to your shell and have my soul and memories, just as you are anywhere on earth.<page>Although I have not designated it as a symbol of your soul, my little power can still bring you the greatest blessings.<hpage>Do you want to join them? You know, your thoughts no longer exist independently, you are no longer in the same place.<page>Working with people without disabilities has always been a refuge in my prayers, but under the pressure of time, I almost forgot.<page>Do you agree to this request? " "

original_en_text: Lady, you are a multitude within a single shell. A being truly unbound. To aid your growth has proved a grand task, even for one as limited as me.<page>As my last act, permit me to ask a final, selfish request.<hpage>Your talents have provided great benefit, Eva. What is it you desire of me?<page>Only to have my own soul, my own memories, bound within your shell... As you have done with those others throughout these lands.<page>I would not define as a crest within you, but my small strength may still grant a final boon.<hpage>You ask to be subsumed? Know your mind would cease to be, in any independent sense.<page>I know. And still I seek it, gladly. To be united with one unbound... This is the kind of escape I once prayed for, though the weight of ages had almost made me forget.<page>Dear Lady, would you grant me this request?
original_zh_text: 女士，您这具躯壳中存在万千可能，是真正无拘无束的存在。能助您成长，是我的荣幸。<page>最后，请允许我提出自私的请求。<hpage>你帮了我很多，伊娃。你想要什么？<page>请您将我的灵魂与记忆缚于您的壳中，就像您其他生物所做的那样。<page>虽然称不上是纹章，但或许能为您献上最后一份微薄馈赠。<hpage>你想被我吞噬？你要知道，那意味着独立意识将不复存在。<page>我明白，但自愿如此。能与无羁者合而为一……是我昔日渴求的解脱，尽管岁月让我几乎遗忘。<page>亲爱的女士，您愿意成全我吗？
translated_text: 在一个真正自由的人的外壳里 ， 有很多人可以帮助你成长 ， 但对于像我这样有限的人来说 ， 这很难做到。<page>一般来说 ， 我希望。<hpage>伊娃 ， 你的天赋给了你很大的优势。<page>我依附于你的外壳 ， 拥有我的灵魂和记忆 ， 就像你在地球上的任何地方一样。<page>虽然我没有指定它为你灵魂的象征 ， 但我的小力量仍然可以带给你最大的祝福。<hpage>你想加入他们吗 ？要知道 ， 你的头脑不再独立存在 ， 你不再在同一个地方。<page>随着时间的推移 ， 她的祈祷逃脱几乎被遗忘 ， 但这是她的祈祷逃脱。<page>亲爱的朋友们 ， 你们是否同意这个要求 ？
secondary_translated_text: In the shell of a truly free person, there are many people who can help you grow, but for someone as limited as me.<page>Generally speaking, I hope.<hpage>Eva, your gift gives you a great advantage.<page>I cling to your shell and have my soul and memories, just as you are anywhere on earth.<page>Although I have not designated it as a symbol of your soul, my little power can still bring you the greatest blessings.<hpage>Do you want to join them? Know that your mind no longer exists independently and you are no longer in the same place.<page>As time went on, her prayer escape was almost forgotten, but this was her prayer escape.<page>Dear friends, do you agree to this request?

original_en_text: Who’s there? Has someone come to free me? Or are you here to bring my end? <hpage>I am Hornet, prisoner, only a traveller and not here to slay you.<hpage>What cause sees you caged in these ruins of Weavers past? Were you their enemy?
original_zh_text: 谁在那儿？是来解救我的？还是来取我性命的？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂，只是一名旅者，无意取你性命。<hpage>你为何被囚于织者遗迹？你曾是他们的敌人？
translated_text: 他是谁？谁在帮你 ？还是你想和我分手？"<hpage>我很困惑 ， 我是一个囚犯 ， 只是一个旅行者。"<hpage>是什么让你陷入了 Weaver 的废墟 ？你是我们的敌人吗 ？
secondary_translated_text: Who is he? Who is helping you? Or do you want to break up with me? "<hpage>I was confused. I was a prisoner, just a traveler. "<hpage>What caught you in the ruins of Weaver? Are you our enemy?

original_en_text: Lady, my senses resound. You have grown further beyond the bounds of a bug.<page>Permit me to gaze again upon your nature, that I may offer clarity.
original_zh_text: 女士，我的感知在震颤。你已远超凡虫界限。<page>请允许我再次深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: 你的成长正朝着错误的方向发展。<page>如果你再看看你的本性 ， 我会给你最后的答案。
secondary_translated_text: Your growth is heading in the wrong direction.<page>If you look at your nature again, I will give you the final answer.

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to be sealed here, Eva? <page>Lady, you mistake. What seems a cage is as much my shell as the form inside.<page>I was born within this space. To leave would be my death, an uninspired end, though one I’ve sometimes wished would come.<page>I am unique, you see. My mothers shared the curse of their tribe, to conceive a child is a painful, near impossible task. <hpage>I know the curse well, Eva, for I am also its victim, and spawn of one who managed to overcome its limits. <hpage>Are you too an attempt to defy that cruel constraint?<page>A flawed attempt. A life spun from rune and shell, sustained only by its cage. My thoughts may mimic a Weavers, but my senses are my own.<page>Over time, that difference brought only distance between us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，你为何会被困在这里？<page>女士误会了。这囚笼也是我的躯壳，与其中的形体并无差异。<page>我诞生于这里，离开意味着消亡，虽然有时也渴求这平淡结局。<page>我很特殊，母亲们承受着族群诅咒，生育子嗣近乎不可能。<hpage>我很了解这诅咒，伊娃。因为我也是受害者，更是突破禁忌的产物。<hpage>想必你也是对抗这残酷枷锁的尝试？<page>是失败的尝试。符文与甲壳铸就的生命，只能靠囚笼维系。我虽能模仿织者，但终究不是织者。<page>久而久之，这份差异使我们渐行渐远。
translated_text: <hpage>你是怎么来到这里 ， 伊娃 ？<page>看起来像一个细胞的东西是我的外壳 ， 我的内在形状。<page>开始是我的死亡 ， 一个有点令人兴奋的结局 ， 但有时我希望它会到来。<page>我是独一无二的 ， 不是吗 ？你看到这个了吗？母亲发誓怀孕像部落一样痛苦 ， 几乎是不可能的。<hpage>因为我也是一个受害者 ， 一个超越我极限的人的后代。<hpage>他能承受这么艰难的局面吗 ？<page>生命 ， 由符文和贝壳组成 ， 只能在我们内部保存。我的心可以模仿织物 ， 但我的情感是我自己。<page>随着时间的推移 ， 这些差异将使我们更接近。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>How did you get here, Eva?<page>What looks like a cell is my outer shell, my inner shape.<page>It started with my death, a somewhat exciting ending, but sometimes I hoped it would come.<page>I'm unique, aren't I? Do you see this? The mother swears that pregnancy is as painful as a tribe and almost impossible.<hpage>Because I am also a victim, the descendant of someone who exceeded my limits.<hpage>Can he endure such a difficult situation?<page>Life, made up of runes and shells, can only be preserved within us. My heart can imitate fabric, but my emotions are me.<page>Over time, these differences will bring us closer.

original_en_text: By your grace, I am at last broken from my fate.<hpage>Gladly I accept your union, Eva. No longer shall you suffer eternity alone.
original_zh_text: 蒙您恩典，我终于能挣脱宿命。<hpage>我欣然接受与你的联结，伊娃。你不必再承受永恒的孤寂。
translated_text: 多亏了你 ， 我终于走上了自己的道路。<hpage>我很高兴能嫁给伊娃 ， 我不能永远独自生活。
secondary_translated_text: Thanks to you, I am finally on my own path.<hpage>I'm so happy to marry Eva, I can't live alone forever.

original_en_text: Come no closer! I sense the forbidden blood coursing through you, that which grows and reshapes the world in its own vulgar image.<page>Whether it was imbibed willingly or not, none shall be allowed into this chamber while so afflicted. Begone!
original_zh_text: 站住！我能感知到你体内流淌的禁忌之血，那以粗鄙之形生长并重塑世界的秽物。<page>无论你是否自愿沾染此血，凡受其侵蚀者皆不得踏入这里。速速离开！
translated_text: 快跑快跑！你可以感觉到禁忌的血液在你的身体里流动 ， 成长为一个粗俗的形象 ， 重建世界。<page>在这个痛苦的时刻 ， 没有人可以进入这个房间 ， 不管它是否可取。
secondary_translated_text: Run, run, run! You can feel the blood of taboos flowing through your body, growing into a vulgar image and rebuilding the world.<page>At this painful moment, no one can enter this room, whether it is desirable or not.

original_en_text: Lady, if in your travels you are able to further expand your nature, return to me. With what power I possess, I may be able to aid you further.<hpage>If my nature expands as you say, Eva, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 女士，如果你的本质再度进化，请回来找我。以我的力量，或许能助你更上一层。<hpage>若我本质确实再度进化，我会回来找你。
translated_text: 女人 ， 如果你能在旅途中扩展你的本性 ， 那就来找我吧 ， 我可以用我的力量帮助你更多。<hpage>夏娃 ， 当我的本性扩展时 ， 就像你说的 ， 我会回来。
secondary_translated_text: Woman, if you can expand your nature on the journey, come to me, and I can use my strength to help you more.<hpage>Eve, when my nature expands, as you said, I will come back.

original_en_text: Lady, would you think again upon my last request? To be bound amidst your shimmering soul?<page>I understand it is a selfish thing to ask, and I will hold no ill will if you reject.
original_zh_text: 女士，可愿重新考虑我的请求？让我融入你璀璨魂灵？<page>我明白这是个自私的请求，若您拒绝我也绝无怨言。
translated_text: 我可以修改最后的请求吗 ？你被困在你的智能灵魂中吗 ？<page>我明白你是自私的 ， 我明白你否认这一点并没有什么错。
secondary_translated_text: Can I modify my last request? Are you trapped in your intelligent soul?<page>I understand you are selfish, and I understand there is nothing wrong with you in denying it.

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sorry, Eva. I cannot grant you this. At least, not yet.<hpage>Yours is a mind strong and strange. That union could prove dangerous to my identity.<page>I understand, Lady. I will be here, if ever you reconsider.
original_zh_text: <hpage>抱歉，伊娃。我不能答应你，至少现在不行。<hpage>你的心智强大而奇异，联结恐怕会危及我的存在。<page>我明白，女士。希望您能改变心意，我会永远在此等候。
translated_text: <hpage>“对不起 ， 伊娃 ， 但我不能保证。至少现在不是。<hpage>他的心是坚强和奇怪的 ， 这种组合对我的性格是危险的。<page>” 我在这里， 如果你知道。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"I'm sorry, Eva, but I can't promise. At least not now.<hpage>His heart is strong and strange, and this combination is dangerous to my character.<page>"I'm here, if you know.

original_en_text: Thank you for playing the demo.
original_zh_text: 试玩版体验结束，感谢您的游玩！
translated_text: 非常感谢您的介绍。
secondary_translated_text: Thank you very much for your introduction.

original_en_text: They see your peace, woven of faith and toil,
original_zh_text: 赞美你以信仰与劳役编织的片刻安宁，
translated_text: 和平是你们信仰和努力的结构。
secondary_translated_text: Peace is the structure of your beliefs and efforts.

translated_text: 在第三幕 ：
secondary_translated_text: In the third act:

original_zh_text: 强烈建议使用游戏手柄
translated_text: 推荐控制器
