translated_text: 太阳智慧
secondary_translated_text: Sun Wisdom

original_en_text: - From ‘Pharloom’s Folly’ by the Conductor Romino
original_zh_text: ——摘自《纺络谬世录》 指挥家罗米诺 著
translated_text: - 法老的愚蠢 ， 罗马大师。
secondary_translated_text: - The foolishness of the pharaoh, the Roman master.

translated_text: 第一个问题。
secondary_translated_text: The first question.

original_en_text: They forget your heart, bound in slumber and servitude,
original_zh_text: 谁又记得你沉睡于桎梏中的野兽之心？
translated_text: 他们注定要忘记自己的思想 ， 睡觉 ， 成为奴隶。
secondary_translated_text: They are destined to forget their thoughts, sleep, and become slaves.

original_en_text: They see your beauty, so frail and fine,
original_zh_text: 虫豸皆敬仰你纤弱的神迹之美，
translated_text: 他们使她美丽 ， 如此脆弱和美丽。
secondary_translated_text: They made her beautiful, so fragile and beautiful.

translated_text: 药房 （ 药房 ）
secondary_translated_text: Pharmacy (Pharmacy)

translated_text: 关于 Abyses
secondary_translated_text: About Abyss

original_en_text: When you wake they shall see your truth,
original_zh_text: 待你醒来，挣裂千丝缠茧——
translated_text: 当你醒来时 ， 你会看到真相。
secondary_translated_text: When you wake up, you will see the truth.

original_en_text: A beast’s nature bare to all.
translated_text: 野兽的本性对所有人来说都是赤裸的。
secondary_translated_text: The nature of the beast is naked to everyone.

translated_text: 房子有关闭的时间。
secondary_translated_text: The house has time to close.

translated_text: 制造的工具？
secondary_translated_text: Tools made?

original_en_text: Lift your voices. Know our grace.
translated_text: “请高举你的声音 ， 好叫我知道你的恩典。
secondary_translated_text: "Please hold up your voice, so that I may know your grace.

original_en_text: Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.<br> May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.<page>Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall step within our sacred halls.
original_zh_text: 纺络的虫民，你们已被选中，<br>愿圣堡的鎏金淬硬你们的软壳。<page>作为审判官永远伫立，使罪孽之徒永不得踏入圣殿。
translated_text: 这是一个在法鲁诞生的电池。你已经被选中了。<br>让我们城市的金色圣城覆盖它柔软的外壳。<page>就像永恒的中保一样 ， 邪恶的昆虫从不践踏圣殿。
secondary_translated_text: This is a battery born in Faro. You have been chosen.<br>Let the golden holy city of our city cover its soft shell.<page>Like the eternal mediator, evil insects never trample on the temple.

original_en_text: A rune-scroll depicting void given form.
original_zh_text: 描绘虚空化形的符文卷轴
translated_text: 月亮的卷轴表示真空。
secondary_translated_text: The scroll of the moon represents a vacuum.

original_en_text: Sisters, spiders, watch these waters flow,<br>Cleansing, Binding, as Silk from shell,<br>Memories of our kingdom calm.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，观此净水长流。<br>涤荡，缠缚，如壳中抽丝，<br>抚平王国的记忆褶皱。
translated_text: “兄弟们 ， 蜘蛛们 ， 看看水。<br>它是纯净的 ， 像从树皮中提取的丝绸一样游泳。<br>我们对王国的记忆是和平的。
secondary_translated_text: "Brothers, spiders, look at the water.<br>It is pure and swims like silk extracted from tree bark.<br>Our memory of the kingdom is peaceful.

original_en_text: At the seventh bell toll, send:<br>Thirty measures, four beats Smokerock,<br>Eight beats Sweetsmelt,<br>Mark of fealty, all workers.<page>At the ninth bell toll, send:<br>Twenty measures, two beats Smokerock,<br>Seven beats Sweetsmelt,<br>Mark of fealty, all workers.<page>
original_zh_text: 七钟响时运送：<br>三十节又四奏烟岩，<br>及八奏甜熔渣。<br>全体劳工需示忠诚。<page>九钟响时运送：<br>二十节又两奏烟岩，<br>及七奏甜熔渣。<br>全体劳工需示忠诚。<page>
translated_text: 第 7 颗子弹 ：<br>30 人中有 4 人摔断了手杖。<br>击中了 8 人。<br>这是对所有员工的忠诚。<page>第九次罢工<br>在 20 个策略中 ， 有两个击败了 Slok 。<br>其中 7 人赢得了奖杯。<br>它是对每一位员工忠诚的象征。<page>
secondary_translated_text: Seventh bullet:<br>Four of the 30 people broke their walking sticks.<br>Hit eight people.<br>This is loyalty to all employees.<page>Ninth strike<br>Of the 20 strategies, two defeated Slok.<br>Seven of them won the trophy.<br>It is a symbol of loyalty to every employee.<page>

translated_text: 观众地图 （ Audience Map ）
secondary_translated_text: Audience Map

translated_text: 生命地图。
secondary_translated_text: Map of life.

translated_text: 地下地图。
secondary_translated_text: Underground map.

original_en_text: When three fonts weep, our sacred shrine shall rise.
original_zh_text: 三眼泪泉涌流，圣坛自当升起。
translated_text: 说了这三句话 ， 圣殿就起来了。
secondary_translated_text: After saying these three sentences, the temple rose.

original_en_text: Damned are we! The lingered few bound still to suffer. Cursed thrice by Pharloom, to wait, to watch, to cry our anguish.<page>No more! We say! No more! We cry! We all have wailed and wept. Fair Pharloom’s fall has come at last. Its end we now accept.
original_zh_text: 万众受难！幸存者仍受折磨。纺络三度诅咒加身——苦候，守望，哀哭不休，<page>到此为止！我在此宣言！到此为止！我在此高呼！我们已流尽血泪。荣光纺络终将陨落，我们应接受终局。
translated_text: 妈的 ， 妈的！我们因堕落而被诅咒三次 ， 但我们等待 ， 看着 ， 痛苦地哭泣。<page>再也没有什么了！让我们谈谈这个！不再有了！他哭了！我们都哭了 ， 我们都哭了。“农场 ” 倒塌了。现在我们接受结局。
secondary_translated_text: Shit, shit! We were cursed three times for our fall, but we waited, watched, and cried in pain.<page>There is nothing more! Let's talk about this! No more! He cried! We all cried, we all cried. The "farm" collapsed. Now we accept the ending.

original_en_text: Litany of the Worker<br>May we catch the dregs and never tire,<br>May we clean the dregs and never hunger,<br>May we spool the dregs and never falter.
original_zh_text: 劳工祷词<br>愿我们滤渣不倦。<br>愿我们清秽不饥。<br>愿我们纺线不怠。
translated_text: 工作人员继续阅读。<br>他永远不会厌倦肮脏的东西。<br>清除污垢 ， 永远不会饿。<br>我不吃灰尘 ， 也不喝酒。
secondary_translated_text: The staff continued reading.<br>He will never get tired of dirty things.<br>Remove the dirt and never be hungry.<br>I don't eat dust or drink alcohol.

original_en_text: Oath of the Whiteward<br>While song must be sung, none may falter.<br>Infirmity. Sickness. Death.<br>All are banished from our Citadel.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅誓言<br>歌不可辍，虫不可怠。<br>孱弱、病痛、死亡——皆逐出圣堡。
translated_text: 白色誓言 （ White Oath ）<br>我唱歌 ， 但没人在乎。<br>死于疾病。<br>他们都被赶出了城堡。
secondary_translated_text: White Oath<br>I sing, but no one cares.<br>Died of disease.<br>They were all kicked out of the castle.

original_en_text: Penitent, Fourth of the Fourth.<br>Guilty of the sins of infirmity, sickness.<br>Penance by swallowing.<br>Absolution granted after death.<page>Penitent, Twelfth of the First.<br>Guilty of an unnamed sin.<br>Penance by casting.<br>Absolution not granted.
original_zh_text: 罪者，第四组第四号。<br>犯孱弱、病痛之罪。<br>处以吞刑。<br>死后得赦。<page>罪人，第一组第十二号。<br>犯未名之罪。<br>处以流放。<br>不予赦免。
translated_text: 第四次告白<br>从虚弱和疾病。<br>吐出来。<br>死后的宽恕。<page>忏悔 ， 十二。<br>发生了一起未知罪行。<br>我发誓我有罪。<br>没有原谅 ，
secondary_translated_text: Fourth confession<br>From weakness and disease.<br>Spit it out.<br>Forgiveness after death.<page>Confession, twelve.<br>An unknown crime has occurred.<br>I swear I am guilty.<br>Without forgiveness,

original_en_text: Penitent, Eighth of the Twelfth.<br>Guilty of the sin of irreverence.<br>Penance by chaining.<br>Absolution granted after death.<page>Penitent, Second of the Fourth.<br>Guilty of the sin of dissonance.<br>Penance by silencing.<br>Absolution granted after death.
original_zh_text: 罪者，第十二组第八号。<br>犯不敬之罪。<br>处以锁刑。<br>死后得赦。<page>罪者，第四组第二号。<br>犯杂音之罪。<br>处以禁言。<br>死后得赦。
translated_text: 12 月 8 日的忏悔<br>对别人不礼貌是罪恶。<br>我会在监狱里解释的。<br>死后的原谅。<page>第四卷的后悔<br>我已经说过了 ， 我不同意我的观点。<br>默默地忏悔。<br>死后的原谅。
secondary_translated_text: Confession on December 8<br>Being rude to others is a sin.<br>I'll explain it in prison.<br>Forgiveness after death.<page>Volume 4: Regret<br>As I said before, I disagree with me.<br>Confess silently.<br>Forgiveness after death.

original_en_text: Remains of a Muckroach crushed by falling rock.
original_zh_text: 蟑螂被落石碾压后的残渣。
translated_text: 甲虫的身体撞向掉落的岩石。
secondary_translated_text: The beetle's body crashed into the falling rock.

original_en_text: Anguished Aura<br>Eight masks hard, swirled soul enraged.<br>Twelve aknids flat, all juices strained.<page>Six pilgrims living, hung long to drain.
original_zh_text: 苦痛灵氛<br>八具硬质旋魂怒面。<br>十二只阿克尼，榨尽汁液。<page>六名活祭朝圣者，悬吊沥干。
translated_text: 你会受苦的。<br>8 他们的面容是硬的 ， 他们的心是发怒的。<br>收集 12 个粉刺坚果 ， 过滤所有的果汁。<page>六个朝圣者仍然活着 ， 等待着他们的愿望。
secondary_translated_text: You will suffer.<br>8 Their faces are hard, their hearts are angry.<br>Collect the 12 acne nuts and filter all the juice.<page>Six pilgrims are still alive, waiting for their wishes.

original_en_text: A white lock bearing a surgical symbol.
original_zh_text: 带有外科标志的苍白锁具。
translated_text: 白色的钥匙 ， 手术的标志。
secondary_translated_text: The white key is the symbol of the operation.

translated_text: 这个符号代表了大多数组织。
secondary_translated_text: This symbol represents most organizations.

translated_text: 项目图表 （ Item Chart ）
secondary_translated_text: Project Chart (Item Chart)

translated_text: 鲍尔特的耳语
secondary_translated_text: Bolter's whisper

original_en_text: Their shells are ours. Their souls are ours.<br>Our hate is forever.
original_zh_text: 他们的躯壳是我们的，他们的灵魂是我们的。<br>我们的恨意永世不灭。
translated_text: 他们的灵魂是我们的 ， 他们的贝壳是我们的。<br>恨是永恒的。
secondary_translated_text: Their souls are ours, and their shells are ours.<br>Hate is eternal.

original_en_text: Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.<br>Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.<br>Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.<br>Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.
original_zh_text: 封存溃败。记忆遗失。切除外区。维持内区。<br>甲木林封存稳定——须铭记。<br>髓骨地封存危急——须铭记。<br>翠庭生态失控——注定遗忘。
translated_text: 避免犯错误。记忆的损失是从外部消除的。我还在家里。<br>树皮和树木的停滞还在继续。<br>严重骨髓停止 — 记住。<br>除了令人印象深刻的气氛 — 注定要被遗忘。
secondary_translated_text: Avoid making mistakes. Memory loss is eliminated from the outside. I'm still at home.<br>The stagnation of bark and trees continues.<br>Severe bone marrow arrest-remember.<br>In addition to the impressive atmosphere-destined to be forgotten.

original_en_text: Here is established, by holy consent of the Conductors,<br>The Memorium of Pharloom.<br><br>What Is Remembered Is Never Lost.
original_zh_text: 经指挥家神圣授权，<br>于此建立纺络忆廊。<br><br>铭记者永存不灭。
translated_text: 经驾驶员同意后，<br>Farroom Memorial 附近酒店<br><br>记忆永远不会消失。
secondary_translated_text: With the consent of the driver,<br>Hotels near Farroom Memorial<br><br>Memories will never disappear.

original_en_text: A rune depicting paths away from Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 描绘离开纺络通路的符文。
translated_text: 罗恩从罪恶感中解脱出来。
secondary_translated_text: Ron was relieved of his guilt.

translated_text: 修理损坏的仪器
secondary_translated_text: Repair damaged instruments

translated_text: 门的地图。
secondary_translated_text: Map of the door.

original_en_text: Due to unacceptably high injury and unsanctioned deaths, Ventrica travel shall henceforth be denied to all.<br> For Pharloom eternal, a bug who serves must never die.
original_zh_text: 鉴于伤亡过甚并且非授命死亡，即日起禁止所有虫民使用圣脉枢管。<br>永恒纺络需要活着的仆从。
translated_text: 由于伤亡人数令人无法接受 ， 马达加斯加的旅行将被禁止。<br>在 Lighthouse 中 ， 持久的服务错误不会消失。
secondary_translated_text: Travel to Madagascar will be banned due to the unacceptable number of casualties.<br>In Lighthouse, persistent service errors do not disappear.

translated_text: 地图上最弱的地图
secondary_translated_text: The weakest map on the map

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>Spare a song for those who lay here silent.<br>By strength abandoned, they fell before the final ascent.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>为长眠于此的无声者歌一曲罢。<br>力竭而堕，未竟登攀。
translated_text: 关于飞行员。<br>给那些沉默的人留下一首歌。<br>他们失去了力量 ， 在最后一次攀登之前摔倒了。
secondary_translated_text: About pilots.<br>Leave a song for those who are silent.<br>They lost their strength and fell before making their final climb.

translated_text: Abyss 唐飞
secondary_translated_text: Abyss Map

original_en_text: <hpage>I understand now... The steel child’s servant grew bold...<hpage>I know what the fleeing bug seeks to call, and their etchings here suggest clear clues to where. <hpage>What they attempt is dangerous, stupid. It can only end badly. I must hurry if I’m to stop this.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我现在明白了……钢铁之子的手下越来越大胆……<hpage>也知道那只逃亡的虫子想召唤什么，这些刻痕明确指出了地点。<hpage>愚蠢又危险的做法，不会有好下场。得赶紧阻止。
translated_text: <hpage>现在 ， 我知道家里的男孩变得勇敢了。<hpage>这就是所谓的 “逃跑的昆虫 ” ， 这项工作给了我们一个明确的线索。<hpage>他们的努力是危险的 ， 毫无用处。结果很可怕。如果你想阻止它 ， 你必须赶快。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Now, I know that the boys at home have become brave.<hpage>This is the so-called "escaping insect", and this work gives us a clear clue.<hpage>Their efforts are dangerous and useless. The results were terrible. If you want to stop it, you have to hurry.

original_en_text: An old rune displaying the design for a Weaver weapon.
original_zh_text: 残破的织者武器设计图。
translated_text: 带底盘设计的老式赛车。
secondary_translated_text: Old racing car with chassis design.

translated_text: 打开更深的通道。
secondary_translated_text: Open deeper channels.

original_en_text: Sister, spider, sat between salt and stone,<br>Build those tools of brilliant mind imagined,<br>Aid us when our Silk has waned.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，坐于盐石之间，<br>铸造智械奇器，<br>助我们于灵丝枯竭之时。
translated_text: 姐妹们在盐和石头之间爬行。<br>虚拟大脑工具<br>如果丝绸掉了 ， 请帮帮我。
secondary_translated_text: The sisters crawled between salt and stone.<br>Virtual brain tools<br>If the silk falls off, please help me.

original_en_text: An old stone gate with a simple keyhole.
original_zh_text: 带有简易锁孔的古石门。
translated_text: 一个古老的塔门与一个简单的开口。
secondary_translated_text: An ancient tower gate with a simple opening.

original_en_text: Sister, spider, husk bound to branch,<br>Watch over these bugs, passing safe,<br>Warded by fear,<br>No longer your meal.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，缚枝之壳，<br>庇佑这些过客安然。<br>以恐惧为甲，<br>不再化作食粮。
translated_text: 姐妹们 ， 蜘蛛 ， 树枝上的贝壳 ，<br>为了认识到这些错误并自信地克服它们 ，<br>接受他们的恐惧，<br>这已经不是你的食物了。
secondary_translated_text: Sisters, spiders, shells on branches,<br>To recognize these mistakes and overcome them confidently,<br>Accept their fears,<br>This is no longer your food.

original_en_text: Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.<br> May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.<page>Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall ever step within our sacred halls.
original_zh_text: 纺络的虫民，你们已被选中，<br>愿圣堡的鎏金淬硬你们的软壳。<page>作为审判官永远伫立，使罪孽之徒永不得踏入圣殿。
translated_text: 这是一个在法鲁诞生的电池。你已经被选中了。<br>让我们城市的金色圣城覆盖它柔软的外壳。<page>就像我们的法官一样 ， 我们总是在圣殿里 ， 没有虫子 ， 没有罪。
secondary_translated_text: This is a battery born in Faro. You have been chosen.<br>Let the golden holy city of our city cover its soft shell.<page>Like our judges, we are always in the temple, without bugs, without sin.

original_en_text: I have departed to pay my respects at the graves within the great wood.<br>- Pinmaster Plinney
original_zh_text: 我去密林深处的墓园祭拜先灵<br>——针匠普林尼
translated_text: 我在树林里看到一座坟墓。<br>本斯 · 普林尼 （ Il Bens Pliny ）
secondary_translated_text: I saw a tomb in the woods.<br>Il Bens Pliny

translated_text: 你有地图吗？
secondary_translated_text: Do you have a map?

original_en_text: Penitent, First of the First.<br>Guilty of the sin of apostasy.<br>Penance by constriction.<br>Absolution denied.
original_zh_text: 罪人，第一组第一号。<br>犯背信之罪。<br>处以束刑。<br>永不赦免。
translated_text: 首先是忏悔者。<br>罪恶的不服从 ，<br>认识边界。<br>宽恕是一种否认。
secondary_translated_text: The first is the confessor.<br>Sinful disobedience,<br>Understand boundaries.<br>Forgiveness is denial.

original_en_text: Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, frail with age.<br>Tracked and taken in Sandsea Waste.<br>Seven Choristors, nine Envoys lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第八代织者，末裔，年迈体衰。<br>于沙海荒原追捕擒获。<br>折损七名圣咏使徒，九名特使。
translated_text: 韦弗是这个家庭的最后一个成员 ， 随着年龄的增长 ， 他变得越来越虚弱。<br>Sandy Creek Wildness 旧金山<br>七条诫命和九个使徒都失败了。
secondary_translated_text: Weaver, the last member of the family, grew increasingly frail as he grew older.<br>Sandy Creek Wilderness San Francisco<br>The seven commandments and the nine apostles failed.

translated_text: 磁性外观。
secondary_translated_text: Magnetic appearance.

original_en_text: Cloth and materials that could be fashioned into additional pockets.
original_zh_text: 可缝制附加口袋的布料。
translated_text: 面料和材料可以使口袋额外。
secondary_translated_text: Fabrics and materials can make pockets extra.

original_en_text: Sister, spider, husk bound to moss,<br>Watch over these bugs born low,<br>Raised up by fervour fostered,<br>Born and caught within our web unknowing.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，缚苔之壳。<br>庇佑这些卑微生物。<br>养育于狂热之中，<br>生于罗网而不自知。
translated_text: 姐妹 ， 蜘蛛 ， 贝壳 ， 绑在苔藓 ，<br>小心昆虫。<br>带着激情成长<br>我们天生无意识 ， 被困在一张网中。
secondary_translated_text: Sisters, spiders, shells, tied to moss,<br>Beware of insects.<br>Grow up with passion<br>We are born unconscious and trapped in a net.

original_en_text: Sister, spider, if seeking commune with the creature atop this mount, take the climb above as test, a challenge beyond even our setting.<page>Upon that summit gained, and creature hailed, know it shall choose what gift to grant, with death as likely as insight.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，若欲觐见此山巅之物，须攀登试炼之径，其险犹胜我等所设。<page>登顶谒见之时，须知其所赐或为顿悟，或为死期。
translated_text: 如果你想与姐妹们 ， 蜘蛛和这些山区生物交流 ， 请尝试上面的生物。<page>当它达到顶峰时 ， 生物会感到高兴 ， 知道应该给予什么礼物 ， 通过感知 ， 死亡成为可能。
secondary_translated_text: If you want to communicate with your sisters, spiders and these mountain creatures, try the creatures above.<page>When it reaches its peak, the creature feels happy, knows what gift to give, and through perception, death becomes possible.

original_en_text: Hate for their light. Hate for their pins. For their waste poured thick and endless.<page>Fill your hearts with hate, for power has now been claimed, and with it we shall punish.
original_zh_text: 憎其光辉，恨其刺针。怒其秽流无尽<br>以恨意填膺，因权柄已夺，吾等将施以惩戒。
translated_text: 我不喜欢灯光 ， 我讨厌别针 ， 他们的狗屎总是出来。<page>充满仇恨的心。因为权力是私有的 ， 所以我们惩罚了他们。
secondary_translated_text: I don't like lights, I hate pins, their shit always comes out.<page>A heart full of hatred. Because power is private, we punished them.

original_en_text: Here we honour the seed that sprung the wood. <page>By her grace may all bugs pass safe to join us and our song.
original_zh_text: 此地敬奉孕育森林的种子。<page>承其恩泽，万虫皆可安然穿行，共奏圣歌。
translated_text: 我们在这里向我们种下的种子致敬。<page>我们感谢大家的善意 ， 并希望所有的昆虫都能安全返回 ， 加入我们的音乐。
secondary_translated_text: We are here to pay tribute to the seeds we planted.<page>We thank everyone for your kindness and hope that all insects can return safely to join our music.

translated_text: 颓废的行为地图
secondary_translated_text: A decadent behavioral map

translated_text: 火山岩的完全喷发。
secondary_translated_text: A complete eruption of volcanic rock.

translated_text: 这是一张白纸。
secondary_translated_text: This is a blank sheet of paper.

original_en_text: Daughter of a distant land...<br>We who remained have waited long...<br>Bind our strength to yours...<br>Reclaim the future of our haunted kingdom...
original_zh_text: 远疆之女啊……<br>我们残存者久候……<br>愿以残力附汝身……<br>夺回这缠魂国度的未来……
translated_text: 一个遥远的国度的女儿<br>这里的人们已经等了很长时间。<br>增加我们的力量和你的力量。<br>重建幽灵王国的未来。
secondary_translated_text: Daughter of a distant country<br>People here have been waiting for a long time.<br>Increase our strength and your strength.<br>Rebuilding the future of the Ghost Kingdom.

original_en_text: If the haunted continue their work, leave them be! Only those who frustrate production shall be removed.
original_zh_text: 受丝咒侵蚀者若仍旧劳作，勿扰！唯怠工者当除。
translated_text: 如果鬼魂还在工作 ， 让它走吧！消除生产中的中断。
secondary_translated_text: If the ghost is still working, let it go! Eliminate interruptions in production.

original_en_text: An inert automaton with an empty chest.
original_zh_text: 胸腔空置的休眠自动机。
translated_text: 自动化从一个空盒子
secondary_translated_text: Automation from an empty box

original_en_text: On the eighth harvest, send:<br>Fifty measures, nine beats dregthread, spooled,<br>Fourteen measures dregthread, twined,<br>Oath of fealty, all workers.<page>On the twelfth harvest, send:<br>Forty measures dregthread, spooled,<br>Two beats fine thread, twined,<br>Oath of fealty, all workers.<page>
original_zh_text: 第八次收成时运送：<br>五十节又九奏卷线渣，<br>十四节编线渣。<br>全体劳工需立忠誓。<page>第十二次收成时运送：<br>四十节卷线渣，<br>两奏精编丝线。<br>全体劳工需立忠誓。<page>
translated_text: 如果是第八次收获 ， 请发送 ：<br>Thread Dregg 50 Bar ， 9 小时<br>第十四条贩毒<br>他们都是忠诚的。<page>在第 12 集 ， 请发送以下信息 ：<br>带 40 条测量线 ， 线圈<br>有两条线路，<br>我们的员工都宣誓效忠。<page>
secondary_translated_text: If this is the eighth harvest, please send:<br>Thread Dregg 50 Bar, 9 hours<br>Article 14 Drug trafficking<br>They are all loyal.<page>In Episode 12, please send the following information:<br>With 40 measuring wires, coils<br>There are two lines,<br>Our employees all swear an oath of loyalty.<page>

original_en_text: In the air. The water. Everywhere.<br>Inside their shells. Twisted inside. Guts.<page>Tightest around heart. Pulsing rhythm.<br>Sick. Alive. Dead?<br>Something worse.<page>Deeper. Must look deeper.
original_zh_text: 空气中，水流中，无处不在。<br>甲壳内，脏器间，扭曲盘踞。<page>紧缚心脏，搏动如歌。<br>病态，鲜活，死寂？<br>某种更糟的存在。<page>需深究……再深究……
translated_text: 空气中到处都是水。<br>在丝绸中。他的心在改变。价值 ， 价值<page>斑疹伤寒在你的心脏周围。<br>他生病了还是死了 ？<br>我很抱歉。<page>需要进行彻底的调查。
secondary_translated_text: There is water everywhere in the air.<br>In silk. His heart is changing. Value, value<page>Typhus is around your heart.<br>Is he sick or dead?<br>I'm sorry.<page>A thorough investigation is needed.

original_en_text: A bucket overflowing with smouldering Flintstone.
translated_text: 一堆原始的化石。
secondary_translated_text: A pile of primitive fossils.

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>This settlement welcomes all who step the holy path.<br>May you ease your shell within, that your strength renewed can carry you higher.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>此镇欢迎任何踏入圣途者。<br>愿您在此养精蓄锐，登攀更高处。
translated_text: 关于飞行员。<br>我们欢迎所有跟随上帝道路的人。<br>让你的心脏休息 ， 你的新力量将把你提升到更高的高度。
secondary_translated_text: About pilots.<br>We welcome all those who follow God's path.<br>Give your heart a rest and your new power will lift you to higher heights.

original_en_text: Weaver of Pharloom.<br>By grace you warded. By thread you healed.<br>For your favour, eternal, we offer our song.
original_zh_text: 纺络的织者啊<br>您以恩赐庇护，以丝线疗愈。我们献永恒之歌，报答您的垂青。
translated_text: 光明之酒<br>愿上帝保佑你 ， 医治你。<br>为了你的爱和永恒 ， 我们为你歌唱。
secondary_translated_text: Wine of Light<br>May God bless you and heal you.<br>For your love and eternity, we sing for you.

translated_text: 如何扩展您的工具包 ？
secondary_translated_text: How to expand your toolkit?

original_en_text: A crude map of the Underworks.
translated_text: 地下工程 （ Project Underground ）
secondary_translated_text: Project Underground

translated_text: 这是一个古老的监管体系。
secondary_translated_text: This is an ancient regulatory system.

original_en_text: O, great land whose flame doth falter!<br>Whose choir, conductors, all doth fail,<page>Observe! Take heart! That spark still burning,<br>Yon butterfly of crimson grace,<page>All bells shall peal, and voices raise,<br>When brave Trobbio steps, at last, upon the stage!
original_zh_text: 啊，辽阔疆土，其焰渐熄！<br>圣咏团与指挥皆已倾颓。<page>且看！且振作！星火犹存——<br>那优雅的绯红蝶影，<page>万钟齐鸣，众声高亢。<br>待勇者特罗比奥终登台！
translated_text: 大地啊 ， 降低你的火焰吧！<br>队长和指挥官都失败了。<page>看看我！把你的手放在我身上！火焰仍然燃烧。<br>深红色蝴蝶。<page>每一个钟声响起 ， 每一个声音响起。<br>终于 ， 舞台上一枚勇敢的奖杯！
secondary_translated_text: O earth, lower your fire!<br>Both the captain and commander failed.<page>Look at me! Put your hands on me! The flames are still burning.<br>Dark red butterfly.<page>Every bell rings, every sound rings.<br>Finally, a brave trophy on the stage!

original_en_text: Erase our fear,<br>Eliminate our desire,<page>To suffer no more,<br>Void, cleanse us.
original_zh_text: 抹除恐惧，<br>涤净欲念，<page>苦难终止，<br>虚空啊，净化吾等。
translated_text: 他们的恐惧越来越大。<br>为了摆脱自己的欲望 ，<page>为了停止痛苦。<br>真空的清理。
secondary_translated_text: Their fear grew.<br>In order to get rid of his desires,<page>To stop the pain.<br>Vacuum cleaning.

original_en_text: I have departed to scale Pharloom’s frigid mount. If any bug exists brave enough to match my pin’s fatal resolve, then climb and face me upon its stormward side.<br>- Pinstress
original_zh_text: 我将攀登纺络寒峰。若有虫愿意成全遗志，持针之决意者，请至风暴面峰顶相会。<br>——针姬
translated_text: 我开始向冰山的灯塔爬去 ， 如果一只昆虫决定与我的命运相匹配 ， 我会爬到风暴的某个地方 ， 他们会面对我。<br>“公主 ， 公主！
secondary_translated_text: I began to climb towards the beacon of the iceberg, and if an insect decided to match my fate, I would climb somewhere in the storm and they would face me.<br>"Princess, princess!

original_en_text: Flickering Flame<br>Five masks swirled soul, brought and broiled.<br>Four stones rage-baked, crushed powder coarse.<page>Three shells fresh from pilgrims fallen, to contain and age.
original_zh_text: 摇曳焰方<br>五具旋魂面甲，炙烤研磨。<br>四枚怒火焙石，碾作粗粉。<page>三副朝圣鲜壳，用以封存陈化。
translated_text: 《火焰的闪电》<br>五个面具 ， 可以旋转和佩戴 ， 以燃烧灵魂。<br>他要烧毁你的石头 ， 粉碎你的尘土。<page>刚刚从朝圣者手中掉落的三个贝壳被密封并崩溃了。
secondary_translated_text: "Lightning of Fire"<br>Five masks that can be rotated and worn to burn souls.<br>He will burn your stones and crush your dust.<page>Three shells that had just fallen from the hands of the pilgrims were sealed and collapsed.

original_en_text: Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, mortally wounded.<br>Tracked and taken in the Blackbarrens.<br>Four Choristors, one Reed lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第八代织者，末裔，重伤濒死。<br>于黑荒原追捕擒获。<br>折损四名圣咏者，一名战士。
translated_text: 韦弗在第八轮比赛结束时受了致命伤。<br>黑色的图片<br>包括里德在内的四名指挥官在执行任务时死亡。
secondary_translated_text: Weaver suffered a fatal injury at the end of the eighth round.<br>Black picture<br>Four commanders, including Reid, died in the line of duty.

original_en_text: A machine displaying a model of the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 展示圣堡结构的机械模型。
translated_text: 展示性别模型的机器。
secondary_translated_text: Machines that display gender models.

original_en_text: <hpage>The second spot marked by the child of steel. This camp too was used by their vassal, and another rite was conducted here, this one incomplete. <hpage>The action was clearly taken in haste. Did they believe themself pursued? The etchings here are crude, but the words are disturbing... and desperate.
original_zh_text: <hpage>钢铁之子标记的第二处地点。他们的仆从也在这里进行过仪式，但没完成。<hpage>行动如此匆忙，难道是怕被追杀？刻的字歪歪扭扭，内容让人不安……且绝望。
translated_text: <hpage>男人也用这个领域做另一个仪式 ， 但这次它没有完成。<hpage>你认为他们会被迫害吗？这里的切割是粗糙的 ， 但在那里它是非常不舒服的。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Men also used this field to do another ritual, but this time it was not completed.<hpage>Do you think they will be persecuted? The cutting here is rough, but there it is very uncomfortable.

original_en_text: Cloth and incendiary materials that could be fashioned into an explosive weapon.
original_zh_text: 可制成爆燃武器的布料与易燃物。
translated_text: 可用作爆炸性武器的衣服和火焰室
secondary_translated_text: Clothing and flame chambers that can be used as explosive weapons

original_en_text: Shellplates and cogs that could be fashioned into a flying automaton.
original_zh_text: 可组装飞行自动机的壳板与齿轮。
translated_text: 我们可以用药物和设备来制造飞行机器人。
secondary_translated_text: We can use drugs and equipment to build flying robots.

original_en_text: In silence your voice,<br>In darkness your form,<page>We higher who see you seeking,<br>Our shells yearn for your embrace.
original_zh_text: 静默即汝声，<br>晦暗即汝形。<page>吾等高瞻汝之追寻，<br>甲壳渴求汝之怀抱。
translated_text: 心灵的沉默 ，<br>在黑暗中 ， 在它的形式中 ，<page>当一个伟大的人看到你 ，<br>我在你的怀里饿了。
secondary_translated_text: Silence of the soul,<br>In the darkness, in its form,<page>When a great man sees you,<br>I'm hungry in your arms.

original_en_text: -ilgrim<br>You who have held tight to faith have been carried far.<br>This station shall offer brief rest to those devout.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>虔信之虫方能抵达此远境。<br>此站给予诚心者片刻安歇。
translated_text: 英语。<br>我认为她被绑架了。<br>这个地方为虔诚的人提供了一些休息。
secondary_translated_text: English.<br>I think she was kidnapped.<br>This place provides some rest for the pious.

original_en_text: Half-spawn of a distant land...<br>Within this cage I have waited...<br>Let my strength be bound to yours...<br>Reclaim the future of our accursed kingdom...
original_zh_text: 异乡的半血之子啊……<br>我在此笼中久候……<br>愿以残力附汝身……<br>夺回这诅咒国度的未来……
translated_text: 其中一半来自偏远地区。<br>在笼子里等待。<br>凭着我的力量和你的力量<br>恢复被诅咒王国的未来。
secondary_translated_text: Half of them come from remote areas.<br>Wait in the cage.<br>With my strength and your strength<br>Restoring the future of the cursed kingdom.

original_en_text: Child, I have answered the call to climb. I rise to join our elders in that holy place far above. May you, in time, grow strong enough to meet us there.
original_zh_text: 孩子，我已应召攀登，将赴上方圣地与前辈们相聚。愿你成长强健，来日同聚。
translated_text: 我被邀请去爬山。我起来 ， 和长老们一起去远方的圣所。坚强 ， 加入我们！
secondary_translated_text: I was invited to climb the mountain. I got up and went to the distant sanctuary with the elders. Be strong and join us!

original_en_text: An old map of the Putrified Ducts.
translated_text: 腐烂管道的旧地图。
secondary_translated_text: Old map of rotten pipes.

original_en_text: This low, her gaze escaped.<br>Prepare, sisters. Weave hope anew.<br>That we might break free this accursed web born of our naive foundation.
original_zh_text: 此处卑微隐秘，逃出她的视线。<br>准备吧，姊妹。重织希望。撕破这由我等天真所结的诅咒之网。
translated_text: 她很矮 ， 她的眼睛麻木不仁。<br>弟兄姊妹们 ， 准备好重建希望吧。<br>你可以从纯粹的基础上诞生的诅咒的网络中解脱出来。
secondary_translated_text: She was short and her eyes were insensitive.<br>Brothers and sisters, get ready to rebuild hope.<br>You can be freed from the cursed network born on a pure basis.

original_en_text: An ornate door closed with a simple lock.
translated_text: 门被一个简单的锁紧了。
secondary_translated_text: The door was locked tightly with a simple lock.

translated_text: cogwork 是什么意思？
secondary_translated_text: What does cogwork mean?

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>Accept the judgment of the rise beyond,<br>That all who stand at Pharloom’s holy crest prove pure of will and want.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>接受至高审判的洗礼。<br>凡欲立于纺络之巅者，当证心志纯净。
translated_text: 关于飞行员。<br>接受超越上升的判断。<br>任何戴着罪冠冕的人都是纯粹的意志和欲望。
secondary_translated_text: About pilots.<br>Accept the judgment of transcending the rise.<br>Anyone wearing the crown of sin is pure will and desire.

translated_text: 你有地图吗？
secondary_translated_text: Do you have a map?

original_en_text: Two children born entwined, apart,<br>Two children marked to rule,<page>They danced, they sang, proved blades beyond,<br>But none forgot their birth,<br>For lovers born on beat exact shall be forever cursed.
original_zh_text: 双子缠绕共生，命运连结，<br>双子共掌权柄，注定称王，<page>舞若惊鸿，歌撼四座，剑技超群，<br>但出身不可磨灭，<br>同卵双生之爱侣，诅咒永世缠身。
translated_text: 两个孩子在出生时就有联系。<br>两个未成年人都有罪。<page>他们跳舞 ， 唱歌 ， 证明喇嘛在那里。<br>没有人会忘记他的诞生。<br>对于一个天生有节奏的人来说 ， 精确性永远是一种诅咒。
secondary_translated_text: The two children were connected at birth.<br>Both minors were guilty.<page>They danced and sang to prove that the Lama was there.<br>No one will forget his birth.<br>For a person who is born with rhythm, accuracy is always a curse.

translated_text: 纪念馆地图
secondary_translated_text: Memorial Hall Map

original_en_text: Great bugs! You who weep as your kingdom fades,<br>join me upon the Stage.<br> Together, we shall enflame the passion of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 伟大的虫民！为王国衰颓而泣者。<br>请至剧台与我相会。<br>共燃纺络之激情！
translated_text: 误差！你的王国会崩溃 ， 你会哭泣。<br>请你和我一起上舞台。<br>让我们分享您对灯塔的热情！
secondary_translated_text: Error! Your kingdom will fall apart and you will cry.<br>Please come on the stage with me.<br>Let us share your passion for Lighthouse!

translated_text: 摇摆的角色。
secondary_translated_text: Swinging role.

original_en_text: <hpage>This location was marked by the steel child. This camp is old, but still shows clear evidence of an attempt at a rite.<hpage>Whatever the vassal hoped to achieve here seems to have failed. The other marked locations may provide more clues to its intent.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这是钢铁之子标记的地点。营地虽然老旧，但明显有试图举行仪式的痕迹。<hpage>无论仆从想做什么，似乎是失败了。其他标记点或许会有更多线索。
translated_text: <hpage>该营地是古老的 ， 但有明确的证据表明 ， 试图举行仪式。<hpage>我所希望的一切都失败了。其他星座的位置会给你暗示你的意图。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The camp is ancient, but there is clear evidence of attempts to hold rituals.<hpage>Everything I hoped for failed. The positions of other constellations will give you hints of your intentions.

original_en_text: Weaver, in quarter part, last of their line, staked to service.<br>Tracked and taken beneath the City of Steel.<br>Eight Choristors, twelve Envoys lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第四代织者，末裔，强制服役。<br>于钢铁之城地下追捕擒获。<br>折损八名圣咏使徒，十二名特使。
translated_text: 第四 （ 韦伯 ） 服务于最后一排。<br>铁城的照片。<br>在 12 枚戒指中 ， 有 8 枚未能完成任务。
secondary_translated_text: Fourth (Weber) serves the last row.<br>Photo of Tiecheng.<br>Of the 12 rings, 8 failed to complete the task.

translated_text: CogWorkCaremap
secondary_translated_text: CogWorkCaremap

original_en_text: By our Citadel’s glory, you treasured devout may bask brief in its holy light.
original_zh_text: 沐浴圣堡荣光，虔信者可暂享圣辉。
translated_text: 让你神圣的子民沐浴在你的圣光中 ， 透过我们宝贵城市的荣耀。
secondary_translated_text: Let your sacred people bathe in your light and shine through the glory of our precious city.

translated_text: 珊瑚室。
secondary_translated_text: Coral Room.

original_en_text: A husk with a map of the Slab etched upon its shell.
original_zh_text: 一具甲壳刻有罪石牢狱地图的尸骸
translated_text: 里面你会发现一张纸。
secondary_translated_text: You will find a piece of paper inside.
